quotes.text: I was dyslexic - was, still am - 'cause I would see words that weren't there. And people just started laughing, and I thought, well, this is a good way to make a living. I'll just go downtown to read and have people laugh, you know?
quotes.author: Tim Conway

quotes.text: I've played such serious characters that no one sees me the way I actually am, which is completely cheesy and goofy, so it would be fun to do a romantic comedy and just have a good laugh.
quotes.author: Laura Vandervoort

quotes.text: It's definitely a thing to be sitting there, getting a pedicure, and you look over and someone is reading an article about an aspect of your life that you know is not true. It's weird, it's uncomfortable, but I don't see it changing anytime soon, so I should figure a way to laugh through it.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.text: I never want to be anywhere else than in the rehearsal room. I mean, it's so lame to say, but it makes me supremely happy to work with people and to talk and invent and laugh.
quotes.author: Yael Stone

quotes.text: When people talk to me about tyranny, it makes me laugh and gives me the impression that people suffer from amnesia.
quotes.author: Jean-Claude Duvalier

quotes.text: I love to see people laugh and put a smile on peoples' faces. Anytime I'm doing that I'm happy.
quotes.author: Dexter Darden

quotes.text: Laughter and tears are both responses to frustration and exhaustion. I myself prefer to laugh, since there is less cleaning up to do afterward.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.text: I hasten to laugh at everything, for fear of being obliged to weep.
quotes.author: Pierre Beaumarchais

quotes.text: If we could all just laugh at ourselves, in hard times or good times, it would be an incredible world.
quotes.author: Jena Malone

quotes.text: And we should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once. And we should call every truth false which was not accompanied by at least one laugh.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: You should laugh everywhere you can find even the slightest glimmer of humour.
quotes.author: Doug Stanhope

quotes.text: When you see grown men near to tears because they've missed hitting a little white ball into a hole from three feet, it makes you laugh.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.text: I'm nuts and I know it. But so long as I make 'em laugh, they ain't going to lock me up.
quotes.author: Red Skelton

quotes.text: Every time you tear a leaf off a calendar, you present a new place for new ideas and progress.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.text: I have these accidents, these mistakes, these self-inflicted wounds, and then I tear my head to shreds about it for days.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.text: I think that both parties should declare the debt limit as a political weapon of mass destruction which can't be used. I mean, it is silly to have a country that has 237 years building up its reputation and then have people threaten to tear it down because they're not getting some other matter.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: If we can but tear the blindfold of self-deception from our eyes and loosen the gag of self-denial from our voices, we can restore our country to greatness.
quotes.author: Theodore C. Sorensen

quotes.text: The Lord compensates the faithful for every loss. That which is taken away from those who love the Lord will be added unto them in his own way. While it may not come at the time we desire, the faithful will know that every tear today will eventually be returned a hundredfold with tears of rejoicing and gratitude.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.text: The individual has become a mere cog in an enormous organization of things and powers which tear from his hands all progress, spirituality, and value in order to transform them from their subjective form into the form of a purely objective life.
quotes.author: Georg Simmel

quotes.text: Trying to tear down the past prohibits you from building up your future.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.text: France is the country where the money falls apart and you can't tear the toilet paper.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.text: Many of my cartoons are not a belly laugh. I go for nostalgia, the lump in the throat, the tear in the eye, the tug in the heart.
quotes.author: Bil Keane

quotes.text: Mr. Gorbachev, tear down this wall!
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: Fashion fosters cliches of beauty, but I want to tear them apart.
quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

quotes.text: There's only certain things you can control. I know how hard I work, I know how I take care of myself, and those are the two things I can control. As far as injuries and wear and tear and stuff like that, it's going to happen.
quotes.author: Jon Lester

quotes.text: You should hurry up and acquire the cigar habit. It's one of the major happinesses. And so much more lasting than love, so much less costly in emotional wear and tear.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: Youth is a lifestyle; it's not a blessing from God. If we treat our bodies as if they are not the most precious things we possess, then obviously we will show wear and tear. We're like a good pair of jeans. If we take care of them, they'll remain classic forever, but if we batter and abuse them they'll look like tattered old rags.
quotes.author: Akshay Kumar

quotes.text: The goal, I suppose, any fiction writer has, no matter what your subject, is to hit the human heart and the tear ducts and the nape of the neck and to make a person feel something about the characters are going through and to experience the moral paradoxes and struggles of being human.
quotes.author: Tim O'Brien

quotes.text: When you believe in God, you've got to believe in the all-powerful God. He's not just God, He's the all-powerful God and He has total control over everyone's life. The Devil, on the other hand, is a real character that's trying his hardest to tear your life apart.
quotes.author: Alice Cooper

quotes.text: I always liked the idea that America is a big facade. We are all insects crawling across on the shiny hood of a Cadillac. We're all looking at the wrapping. But we won't tear the wrapping to see what lies beneath.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.text: We cannot tear out a single page of our life, but we can throw the whole book in the fire.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.text: She's a tear that hangs inside my soul forever.
quotes.author: Jeff Buckley

quotes.text: For pleasures past I do not grieve, nor perils gathering near; My greatest grief is that I leave nothing that claims a tear.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: Our job is to sell our clients' merchandise... not ourselves. Our job is to kill the cleverness that makes us shine instead of the product. Our job is to simplify, to tear away the unrelated, to pluck out the weeds that are smothering the product message.
quotes.author: William Bernbach

quotes.text: Bring on your tear gas, bring on your grenades, your new supplies of Mace, your state troopers and even your national guards. But let the record show we ain't going to be turned around.
quotes.author: Ralph Abernathy

quotes.text: I just think we tear down women in this country for all these superficial reasons, and women are so great and strong.
quotes.author: Melissa McCarthy

quotes.text: When we can't bottle our tears up anymore, God catches every one in His bottle. God's catching every falling tear because He won't let us fall apart.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.text: When cyclones tear up Oklahoma and hurricanes swamp Alabama and wildfires scorch Texas, you come to us, the rest of the country, for billions of dollars to recover. And the damage that your polluters and deniers are doing doesn't just hit Oklahoma and Alabama and Texas. It hits Rhode Island with floods and storms.
quotes.author: Sheldon Whitehouse

quotes.text: We know that dismantling old oppressive regimes is a great deal faster and easier than building new flourishing democracies. Chinggis Khaan once said, 'It was easier to conquer the world on horseback than to dismount and govern.' True validation of democracy lies less in what we tear down, and more in what we build.
quotes.author: Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj

quotes.text: There's too much darkness in the world. Everywhere you turn, someone is tryin' to tear someone down in some way; everywhere you go, there's a feeling of inadequacy, or a feeling that you're not good enough. I want to bring a certain light to the world.
quotes.author: Alicia Keys

quotes.text: I can't stand to watch anything that I'm in. I tear it apart. The worst thing you can do is leave me alone and let me watch what I'm in. It's abusive.
quotes.author: Elias Koteas

quotes.text: Love is understood, in a historical way, as one of the great human vocations - but its counterspell has always been infidelity. This terrible, terrible betrayal that can tear apart not only another person, not only oneself, but whole families.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.text: I'm a guy, but I'm not afraid to cry. Not all of the time. But when I'm watching a movie, I'll sometimes shed a tear, especially 'Moulin Rouge'.
quotes.author: Zac Efron

quotes.text: It is foolish to tear one's hair in grief, as though sorrow would be made less by baldness.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: Nothing's harder than writing. There's no comparison. With directing, you can bounce a lot of ideas around. There's tremendous support - you've got editors and sound mixers. With writing, it's all you, and it's just crippling when people tear up your pages.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.text: People don't even understand that every bit of our food was once alive. We take another creature, plant, animal, microorganism, tear it apart in our mouths. And incorporate those molecules into our own bodies. We are the Earth in the most profound way.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.text: Jesus wept; Voltaire smiled. From that divine tear and from that human smile is derived the grace of present civilization.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Do you want to tear your life apart and get rid of everything you've known as a lifestyle? Like seeing your family? Being with your friends? A fishing trip? A hunting trip? A night's sleep?
quotes.author: Walter F. Mondale

quotes.text: We all have wings, but they have not been of any avail to us and if we could tear them off, we would do so.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.text: Like any creative human being, I would like a bit more control so that it would be a little easier for me when the director says, 'One tear, right now,' that one tear would pop out.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: People like to tear you down. People are always going to take shots. You've just got to go for it.
quotes.author: Joan Jett

quotes.text: One of my little girls is named Reagan. Her first words were, 'Mr. Larry, tear down this crib.' That was her first words, it was very sweet. My first words were, 'Are you going to finish that sandwich?'
quotes.author: Larry the Cable Guy

quotes.text: We either accept weaknesses in good people or we have to tear pages out of the Bible.
quotes.author: Robert Duvall

quotes.text: When we believe that God is Father, we also believe that such a father's hand will never cause his child a needless tear. We may not understand life any better, but we will not resent life any longer.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.text: I'm empathetic to a fault. I really do - embarrassingly enough - tear up when someone squishes a bug in front of me.
quotes.author: Kristen Bell

quotes.text: Smiles form the channels of a future tear.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: Whenever a toddler sees a pile of blocks, he wants to tear it down.
quotes.author: J. J. Abrams

quotes.text: Sure, the job of high school teachers is not to tear down students' self-esteem. But it's certainly not to inflate students' sense of self-worth with a bunch of unearned compliments and half-truths.
quotes.author: LZ Granderson

quotes.text: When I see somebody being mistreated, my eyes tear up and I want to stop it. And I believe that the best thing I can do is to write about it, because if I insert myself into the equation it doesn't really do much good, but if I write about it I think it could do more good.
quotes.author: John Pomfret

quotes.text: Don't try to tear down other people's religion about their ears, Build up your own perfect structure of truth, and invite your listeners to enter in and enjoy it's glories.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.text: Dreams are like paper, they tear so easily.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.text: George H. W. Bush may be a World War II hero and New England Yankee blue blood, but he has the tear ducts of a Sicilian grandmother.
quotes.author: Christopher Buckley

quotes.text: We encounter and enter our richest, most humanly defining experiences by way of a tear in the fabric of things, because we are running late, or because we recognize, across a crowded room, a face whose lack of perfection allows a unique light to shine through and to stir us with uncommon wonder.
quotes.author: Eugene Kennedy

quotes.text: The artist forges himself to the others, midway between the beauty he cannot do without and the community he cannot tear himself away from. That is why true artists scorn nothing: they are obliged to understand rather than to judge.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: The dew of compassion is a tear.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: Never a tear bedims the eye that time and patience will not dry.
quotes.author: Bret Harte

quotes.text: For a tear is quickly dried, especially when shed for the misfortunes of others.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: The words spoken by the leader of the free world can expand the frontiers of freedom or shrink them. When Ronald Reagan called on Gorbachev to 'tear down this wall', a surge of confidence rose that would ultimately breach the bounds of the evil empire.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: It's much more powerful and compelling to create a positive vision than it is to tear somebody down.
quotes.author: Mark McKinnon

quotes.text: My basis of morality is this: does this action enhance life, or does it denigrate life? Does it build up or does it tear down?
quotes.author: John Shelby Spong

quotes.text: It's human nature to be curious about people, and to be more curious about young people than old people. We want to cheer something on at the same time we want to tear it down. That's just so normal.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.text: You do not see the river of mourning because it lacks one tear of your own.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.text: If I have caused just one person to wipe away a tear of laughter, that's my reward.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.text: 2008 was to the American economy what 9/11 was to national security. Yet while 9/11 prompted the U.S. government to tear up half the Constitution in the name of public safety, after 2008, authorities went in the other direction.
quotes.author: Matt Taibbi

quotes.text: I see taking care of my emotional and mental health in the same way that I see taking care of a garment: After it's been through wear and tear, it needs attention.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.text: The reason we have cancer and heart disease is the same reason you can't get rid of the wear and tear on your tires on your car: as soon as you use them, you are wearing them away. You can't make eternal tires, and it's the same with the human body.
quotes.author: S. Jay Olshansky

quotes.text: When I had my first experiences of choral singing, the dissonance of those close harmonies was so exquisite that I would giggle or I would tear up, and I felt it in a physical way.
quotes.author: Eric Whitacre

quotes.text: I've always been intellectually restless, but it is the building part of it that most interests me. It is the constructing of the team that is my favorite part. Anyone who is familiar with the history of the A's franchise, even dating back to Philadelphia, knows that every five or 10 years, you have to tear it apart and rebuild it.
quotes.author: Billy Beane

quotes.text: Women risked their lives for the right to vote. When I hear people say, 'Oh, I'm not gonna vote,' I just wanna tear their heart out.
quotes.author: Judy Gold

quotes.text: While countless Americans are pulling together to lend a helping hand, Nancy Pelosi and Harry Reid are pointing fingers in a shameless effort to tear us apart.
quotes.author: Ken Mehlman

quotes.text: Brain surgery is a fairly aggressive process. There's a lot to get through. There's the beautiful, delicate shaving first, which is really lovely. There's a wonderful ceremony of putting all the covers on, so only the little bit you're operating on is revealed. But once they make the incision and tear the skin back, the drill comes out.
quotes.author: James Nesbitt

quotes.text: I wanted to play around with the format, really tear it to pieces and shake it up. For example, if Mitch saves someone from drowning, and that person then goes out and releases a virus that kills a million people. Imagine the moral implications of that.
quotes.author: David Hasselhoff

quotes.text: A tear dries quickly when it is shed for troubles of others.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: I've learned that being a celebrity is like being a sacrificial lamb. At some point, no matter how high the pedestal that they put you on, they're going to tear you down.
quotes.author: Megan Fox

quotes.text: I started a youth center in Houston. The kids would come in and want to learn to box; they wanted to tear up the world, beat up the world. And I'd try to show them they didn't need anger. They didn't need all that killing instinct they'd read about. You can be a human being and pursue boxing as a sport.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.text: To mourn and bewail your ill-fortune, when you will gain a tear from those who listen, this is worth the trouble.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.text: I can't get through some movies without shedding a tear; I can't lie.
quotes.author: David Beckham

quotes.text: When the kids are laughing in the audience, I tear up, I'm so happy I did a nice thing.
quotes.author: Adam Sandler

quotes.text: It bring a tear to my eye to see native New York people give me my props because New York is stubborn and arrogant.
quotes.author: ASAP Rocky

quotes.text: If you're going to tear down a hero, you should never forget that you're tearing down someone else's hero. You're tearing down somebody else's son. You might have to face her one day.
quotes.author: Kevin Costner

quotes.text: I allow myself to not feel the need to be some sort of wonder woman. You can't do everything at once and tear your hair out when you miss your baby using a potty for the first time, although my son was obviously very sad that his mum was not there on his big day.
quotes.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quotes.text: In some ways the ACL tear was a blessing. I had hesitated to return to elite gymnastics after the 2008 Olympics. I told myself I had already accomplished so much, and the road was just going to get harder if I continued.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.text: A continuing narrative throughout Australia's history that says it is better to build up than to tear down - this is the continuing mission of Labor.
quotes.author: Kevin Rudd

quotes.text: It is better to keep your mouth closed and let people think you are a fool than to open it and remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Everyone has a plan 'till they get punched in the mouth.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: Grant that I may not pray alone with the mouth; help me that I may pray from the depths of my heart.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: Nixon is one of the few in the history of this country to run for high office talking out of both sides of his mouth at the same time and lying out of both sides.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: Authenticity is the alignment of head, mouth, heart, and feet - thinking, saying, feeling, and doing the same thing - consistently. This builds trust, and followers love leaders they can trust.
quotes.author: Lance Secretan

quotes.text: I'm a sensationalist. I'm a big mouth. I get attention. In this world you have to - if you want a mass-market presentation, you have to get attention.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.text: When you lose, there is a whole bunch of room for negativity and I don't feed into this stuff and I do not do any talking. I don't run my mouth.
quotes.author: Allen Iverson

quotes.text: If you've got a big mouth and you're controversial, you're going to get attention.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.text: Lotsa people want to hurt me. That's the price you pay for being a big mouth.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.text: It's impossible to change the social without changing the personal - you have to put your money where your mouth is. And if you're not making those challenges at home, it's unlikely you'll make them in a larger setting.
quotes.author: Carrie Mae Weems

quotes.text: When you gossip, it's self-hexing. Because when you do it, it comes back to you. Everything starts with the word. The word is demonstrating a condition of the mind. If it's in your mind and comes out of your mouth, it will be created.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.text: Everything that goes into my mouth seems to make me fat, everything that comes out of my mouth embarrasses me.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.text: I'm not handsome in the classical sense. The eyes droop, the mouth is crooked, the teeth aren't straight, the voice sounds like a Mafioso pallbearer, but somehow it all works.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.text: The object of opening the mind, as of opening the mouth, is to shut it again on something solid.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: Hillary Clinton could say she was a woman and running for president. And Sarah Palin could say she was a woman and running for vice-president. But Obama couldn't say, 'I'm black and I'm running for president.' It couldn't come out of his mouth. He couldn't say that because, if he did, he'd lose votes.
quotes.author: Paul Mooney

quotes.text: I made a circle with a smile for a mouth on yellow paper, because it was sunshiny and bright.
quotes.author: Harvey Ball

quotes.text: One of the most beneficial things I've ever learned is how to keep my mouth shut.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.text: If you do build a great experience, customers tell each other about that. Word of mouth is very powerful.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.text: When I'm preparing for a swim, I imagine absolutely everything about it: the color of the water, how cold it is, the taste of salt in my mouth. I visualize each and every stroke.
quotes.author: Lewis Gordon Pugh

quotes.text: When even one American - who has done nothing wrong - is forced by fear to shut his mind and close his mouth - then all Americans are in peril.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: I've got a quick mouth, and I set my boundaries. Nothing ever happened that I couldn't handle. Once when a guy came on stage making rude gestures, I hit him over the head with my guitar.
quotes.author: Suzi Quatro

quotes.text: Word of mouth is the most valuable form of marketing, but you can't buy it. You can only deliver it. And you have to really deliver.
quotes.author: G-Eazy

quotes.text: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: Why did God give me two ears and one mouth? So that I will hear more and talk less.
quotes.author: Leo Rosten

quotes.text: Fork: An instrument used chiefly for the purpose of putting dead animals into the mouth.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: Flames from the lips may be produced by holding in the mouth a sponge saturated with the purest gasoline.
quotes.author: Harry Houdini

quotes.text: When doubt comes against us, we have to lift up the shield of faith. We do this when we open our mouth and say what God's Word says, rather than grumbling and complaining about the problem.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: This Halloween, the most popular mask is the Arnold Schwarzenegger mask. And the best part? With a mouth full of candy you will sound just like him.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.text: I started realizing that music is the one area where I've always let go. When that saxophone goes into my mouth, I get into a space where I never think about the notes I've already played or anticipate the notes ahead.
quotes.author: Kenny G

quotes.text: In Mexico, when we want to speak deep secrets, we drink pulgue together. It is a drink made from the cactus plant, and when you take the bottle from your mouth, it leaves a string behind, between the mouth and the bottle, like a spider's web. It shows that the truth sticks inside.
quotes.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quotes.text: Just because I'm sassy and have a mouth on me doesn't mean I'm coming from a negative place.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.text: The actual getting into the gym and working out process was easier, but the eating was harder. I had to eat every two hours. At one point, my trainer said, 'Put anything in your mouth. Go to McDonald's, get the biggest shake possible. I just need to get calories in you.' Because my body fat at the time was only, like, 7.5%.
quotes.author: Taylor Lautner

quotes.text: On more than one occasion, the camera has cut to me after a break as I'm still trying to swallow the last bite of cookie. Those of you who have thought to yourselves, 'That guy talks like he has marbles in his mouth,' should know that they are not marbles, but oatmeal cookies.
quotes.author: Lester Holt

quotes.text: Maybe you weren't born with a silver spoon in your mouth, but like every American, you carry a deed to 635 million acres of public lands. That's right. Even if you don't own a house or the latest computer on the market, you own Yosemite, Yellowstone, the Grand Canyon, Golden Gate National Recreation Area, and many other natural treasures.
quotes.author: John Garamendi

quotes.text: I want to tell you what it was really like to think death is imminent, but I can't. It's a taste in your mouth. And an emptiness.
quotes.author: Aaron Huey

quotes.text: His droll little mouth was drawn up like a bow, and the beard of his chin was as white as the snow.
quotes.author: Clement Clarke Moore

quotes.text: Just as the water of a river near its mouth, in its final form, is composed largely of many tributaries, so an idea, in its final form, is composed largely of later additions.
quotes.author: Willy Ley

quotes.text: The first kiss I had was the most disgusting thing in my life. The girl injected about a pound of saliva into my mouth, and when I walked away I had to spit it all out.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.text: I remember in 'Law of Desire,' where I played a homosexual, that people were more upset that I kissed a man on the mouth than I killed a man. It's interesting to see how people can pardon you for murdering a man, but they can't pardon you for kissing one.
quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

quotes.text: You learned the two greatest thing in life, never rat on your friends, and always keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Robert De Niro

quotes.text: Happy is the man whom the Muses love: sweet speech flows from his mouth.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.text: Word of mouth travels faster than anything else.
quotes.author: Cam Newton

quotes.text: With my mask, I controlled all of the mouth movements with my own mouth.
quotes.author: Peter Mayhew

quotes.text: The mouth obeys poorly when the heart murmurs.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: So long as you have food in your mouth, you have solved all questions for the time being.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.text: I was silent as a child, and silenced as a young woman; I am taking my lumps and bumps for being a big mouth, now, but usually from those whose opinion I don't respect.
quotes.author: Sandra Cisneros

quotes.text: Word of mouth is the best medium of all.
quotes.author: William Bernbach

quotes.text: It has long been known for sure that the sight of tasty food makes a hungry man's mouth water; also lack of appetite has always been regarded as an undesirable phenomenon, from which one might conclude that appetite is essentially linked with the process of digestion.
quotes.author: Ivan Pavlov

quotes.text: A kiss is a secret told to the mouth instead of the ear; kisses are the messengers of love and tenderness.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.text: Wine comes in at the mouth And love comes in at the eye; That's all we shall know for truth Before we grow old and die.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: My mouth is full of decayed teeth and my soul of decayed ambitions.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.text: Whiskey's to tough, Champagne costs too much, Vodka puts my mouth in gear. I hope this refrain, Will help me explain, As a matter of fact, I like beer.
quotes.author: Tom T. Hall

quotes.text: I am fiercely loyal to those willing to put their money where my mouth is.
quotes.author: Paul Harvey

quotes.text: A wise and frugal government, which shall restrain men from injuring one another, shall leave them otherwise free to regulate their own pursuits of industry and improvement, and shall not take from the mouth of labor the bread it has earned.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: A man's face as a rule says more, and more interesting things, than his mouth, for it is a compendium of everything his mouth will ever say, in that it is the monogram of all this man's thoughts and aspirations.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: You can never put too much pork in your mouth as far as I'm concerned.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.text: My mother, who grew up in Pennsylvania, literally washed my mouth out with soap once for saying, 'Shut up!' to my sister. She would have washed my mouth out with gasoline if she knew how foul my mouth was racially when she wasn't around.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.text: Costume, hair and makeup can tell you instantly, or at least give you a larger perception of who a character is. It's the first impression that you have of the character before they open their mouth, so it really does establish who they are.
quotes.author: Colleen Atwood

quotes.text: One's eyes are what one is, one's mouth is what one becomes.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.text: Repeal the Missouri Compromise - repeal all compromises - repeal the Declaration of Independence - repeal all past history, you still cannot repeal human nature. It will be the abundance of man's heart that slavery extension is wrong; and out of the abundance of his heart, his mouth will continue to speak.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Listen! Clam up your mouth and be silent like an oyster shell, for that tongue of yours is the enemy of the soul, my friend. When the lips are silent, the heart has a hundred tongues.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: A bore is a person who opens his mouth and puts his feats in it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: It seems that it had been destined before that I should occupy myself so thoroughly with the vulture, for it comes to my mind as a very early memory, when I was still in the cradle, a vulture came down to me, he opened my mouth with his tail and struck me a few times with his tail against my lips.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: I love oatmeal. To me, it's not boring. I agree that ordinary oatmeal is very boring, but not the steel-cut Irish kind - the kind that pops in your mouth when you bite into it in little glorious bursts like a sort of gummy champagne.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.text: Word of mouth works now, much more than ever. @-reply every single person.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: I always like to sing barefoot, but when I first started doing these dates with the symphonies, I of course thought I should clean up my act, being a Jewish girl from Long Island with a little bit of a trucker mouth. So I wore a gown and some high heels.
quotes.author: Idina Menzel

quotes.text: I put some red stuff on my mouth and cheeks so I look healthy - any old red lip pencil and a lip colour from Dr. Hauschka in a crushed berry tone. I never put anything on my eyes, or I look like Joan Crawford.
quotes.author: Jane Birkin

quotes.text: A portrait is a painting with something wrong with the mouth.
quotes.author: John Singer Sargent

quotes.text: Nothing is more pleasant than to see a pretty woman, her napkin well placed under her arms, one of her hands on the table, while the other carries to her mouth, the choice piece so elegantly carved.
quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.text: I'm well past the age where I'm acceptable. You get to a certain age and you are forbidden access. You're not going to get the kind of coverage that you would like in music magazines, you're not going to get played on radio and you're not going to get played on television. I have to survive on word of mouth.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.text: I'm a satirist, so I've got boxing gloves on if the person is worthy of satire. But I'm not an assassin. If that ever happens, it's only because something happened during the interview that got me going, and then I had to translate my feelings to the mouth of the character.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.text: Everywhere you go you hear things that are untrue. You've just got to learn that if I don't say it, physically out of my mouth, on camera, it's not true.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.text: Speech and silence. We feel safer with a madman who talks than with one who cannot open his mouth.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.text: I never can understand how anyone can not smoke it deprives a man of the best part of life. With a good cigar in his mouth a man is perfectly safe, nothing can touch him, literally.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.text: I grew up on a farm in a small town where you do or say one thing and everybody knows about it. You see it happen, there's always the town gossip - 'Oh did you hear about so and so, or did you hear what went on in this household?' So I learned at a very young age just to keep my mouth shut.
quotes.author: Garrett Hedlund

quotes.text: I wasn't born with a golden spoon in my mouth. It was a really tough life.
quotes.author: Yohan Blake

quotes.text: Mainstream media tend to just mouth the conventional wisdom, to see everything through the filter of right and left.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.text: Edible substances evoke the secretion of thick, concentrated saliva. Why? The answer, obviously, is that this enables the mass of food to pass smoothly through the tube leading from the mouth into the stomach.
quotes.author: Ivan Pavlov

quotes.text: If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.text: But I love Halloween, and I love that feeling: the cold air, the spooky dangers lurking around the corner.
quotes.author: Evan Peters

quotes.text: A little bit of mercy makes the world less cold and more just.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: The Cold War isn't thawing; it is burning with a deadly heat. Communism isn't sleeping; it is, as always, plotting, scheming, working, fighting.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: A teacher who is attempting to teach without inspiring the pupil with a desire to learn is hammering on cold iron.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.text: When friendship disappears then there is a space left open to that awful loneliness of the outside world which is like the cold space between the planets. It is an air in which men perish utterly.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.text: I am a bit difficult to be around sometimes. I can be stubborn on a lot of things, and I'm set, but I can also adapt in a conflict situation and don't hold on to an ego. I end up seeing the larger good and adapt to it, provided it benefits me. I may come across as a cold person, but I am extremely sentimental.
quotes.author: Emraan Hashmi

quotes.text: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: Every gun that is made, every warship launched, every rocket fired, signifies in the final sense a theft from those who hunger and are not fed, those who are cold and are not clothed.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: We're no longer in the Cold War. Eavesdropping on friends is unacceptable.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.text: As love without esteem is capricious and volatile; esteem without love is languid and cold.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: If I read a book and it makes my whole body so cold no fire can ever warm me, I know that is poetry.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.text: The great and abiding lesson of American history, particularly the cold war, is that the engine of capitalism, the individual, is mightier than any collective.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.text: After the Cold War ended, there was an agreement between the former Soviet Union and America to convert weapons-grade nuclear materials into reactor-grade materials. So disarmament and nuclear energy actually are strongly linked.
quotes.author: Susan Eisenhower

quotes.text: Six is the hardest number for me to experience, the smallest. It's the absence of something - it's cold, dark, almost like a black hole. If someone tells me they are depressed, I might imagine myself in the hole of a six to help me empathise.
quotes.author: Daniel Tammet

quotes.text: Deaf people are struggling to find their favorite show or something that represents them. It's hard. There are some examples of shows that have a deaf storyline in one episode, like Cold Case, or another show where they are focusing on the cochlear implant or the medical aspect.
quotes.author: Sean Berdy

quotes.text: The Opera was a very cold film, a hopeless and dark film, no hope, no love.
quotes.author: Dario Argento

quotes.text: I used to play too with a boy who played a saxophone. We didn't play no blues, we'd play a lot of love songs - 'Stardust', 'Blue Moon', 'Out Cold Again', 'Sophisticated Lady', 'Stars Fell On Alabama', a lot of different stuff.
quotes.author: David Edwards

quotes.text: I'd love to knock an audience cold with one note, but what do you do for the rest of the evening?
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.text: For me, one of the most perfect times to watch a horror movie is when it's cold and raining outside and there's pretty much no outdoor activity to be done. It kind of sets the mood.
quotes.author: Kirk Hammett

quotes.text: Drown in a cold vat of whiskey? Death, where is thy sting?
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: Much as Cold War nuclear strategists could argue about winning a nuclear war by having more survivors, advocates of a Global Warming War might see the United States, Western Europe, or Russia as better able to ride out climate disruption and manipulation than, say, China or the countries of the Middle East.
quotes.author: Jamais Cascio

quotes.text: A clear cold morning with high wind: we caught in a trap a large gray wolf, and last night obtained in the same way a fox who had for some time infested the neighbourhood of the fort.
quotes.author: Meriwether Lewis

quotes.text: The horrors of the Second World War, the chilling winds of the Cold War and the crushing weight of the Iron Curtain are little more than fading memories. Ideals that once commanded great loyalty are now taken for granted.
quotes.author: Jan Peter Balkenende

quotes.text: A library is thought in cold storage.
quotes.author: Herbert Samuel

quotes.text: Sydney is rather like an arrogant lover. When it rains it can deny you its love and you can find it hard to relate to. It's not a place that's built to be rainy or cold. But when the sun comes out, it bats its eyelids, it's glamorous, beautiful, attractive, smart, and it's very hard to get away from its magnetic pull.
quotes.author: Baz Luhrmann

quotes.text: I love cold, rainy weather.
quotes.author: Catherine Bell

quotes.text: I intend to do the Penn & Teller show until they pry my cheesy magic wand from my cold dead fingers.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.text: Being asked to describe what 'post-racial' means is a bit like being asked to describe a leprechaun, cold fusion or unicorns: we know what is meant, but, if we are willing to be honest, we also know that none of the four describe something real, something tangible, something true.
quotes.author: Tim Wise

quotes.text: My beauty tricks revolve around eyes. For the early morning shoots, I pop eye pads in the freezer the night before, and when I take them out in the morning they are already cold and active and are great under my eyes. I keep my eye pads right next to my red velvet Ben & Jerry's in the freezer.
quotes.author: Christine Teigen

quotes.text: My favourite British spots are any of the beautiful parks, especially on a sunny day such as this, after a long stretch of cold, cloudy and rainy days.
quotes.author: Richard Schiff

quotes.text: The real fact is that I could no longer stand their eternal cold mutton.
quotes.author: Cecil Rhodes

quotes.text: People get so in the habit of worry that if you save them from drowning and put them on a bank to dry in the sun with hot chocolate and muffins they wonder whether they are catching cold.
quotes.author: John Jay Chapman

quotes.text: Good is positive. Evil is merely privative, not absolute: it is like cold, which is the privation of heat. All evil is so much death or nonentity. Benevolence is absolute and real. So much benevolence as a man hath, so much life hath he.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Here at the Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory, we have genetically rearranged various viruses and bacteria as part of our medical research. In fact, we have been able to create entirely new types of DNA molecules by splicing together the genetic information from different organisms - recombinant DNA.
quotes.author: James D. Watson

quotes.text: Barack Obama's life was so much simpler in 2009. Back then, he had refined the cold act of blaming others for the bad economy into an art form. Deficits? Blame Bush's tax cuts. Spending? Blame the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan. No business investment? Blame Wall Street.
quotes.author: John Sununu

quotes.text: When I'm preparing for a swim, I imagine absolutely everything about it: the color of the water, how cold it is, the taste of salt in my mouth. I visualize each and every stroke.
quotes.author: Lewis Gordon Pugh

quotes.text: It's lonely and cold on the top... lonely and cold.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.text: I travel the world visiting global health programs as an ambassador for the global health organization, PSI, and sometimes the disconnect I see is truly striking: people can get cold Coca Cola, but far too infrequently malaria drugs; most own mobile phones, but don't have equal access to pre-natal care.
quotes.author: Mandy Moore

quotes.text: Watching a documentary with people hacking their way through some polar wasteland is merely a visual. Actually trying to deal with cold that can literally kill you is quite a different thing.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: The oil sequence was about two or three days. It was very cold and was snowing.
quotes.author: Jason Statham

quotes.text: I come from - I came from Wales, and it's a strong, butch society. We were in the war and all that. People didn't waste time feeling sorry for themselves. You had to get on with it. So my credo is get on with it. I don't waste time being soft. I'm not cold, but I don't like being, wasting my time with - life's too short.
quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

quotes.text: I love cold weather.
quotes.author: Seth Rogen

quotes.text: I don't know if it's the sunshine, or the fact that I actually have a job, but I do like L.A. a lot. In New York, it can be gray and rainy and cold, and you still don't have any money, and you feel like a bad Dickens character.
quotes.author: Rich Sommer

quotes.text: I'm a big believer in pairing classics with contemporary literature, so students have the opportunity to see that literature is not a cold, dead thing that happened once but instead a vibrant mode of storytelling that's been with us a long time - and will be with us, I hope, for a long time to come.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.text: Look, if you have somebody who doesn't have health insurance, who doesn't have a doctor or dentist, and in order to deal with their cold or flu or dental problem, they go to an emergency room - in general, that visit will cost ten times more than walking into a community health center.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.text: I am generally a very happy and easygoing person. I also believe it's always better to meet people with a smile rather than looking cold, especially when you first meet. It changes everything.
quotes.author: Heidi Klum

quotes.text: I know when I was here prosecuting homicides in the District of Columbia, one of the most effective units here was the cold case squad, which had on it FBI agents, as well as Metropolitan Police Department homicide detectives working together.
quotes.author: Robert Mueller

quotes.text: The sculptor who deals with form seeks to imprison beauty in a marble statue that will withstand the ravages of time during millenniums; but a marble statue is cold and speaks to but a few of the most evolved who are able to infuse the statue with their own life.
quotes.author: Max Heindel

quotes.text: Among men and women, those in love do not always announce themselves with declarations and vows. But they are the ones who weep when you're gone. Who miss you every single night, especially when the sky is so deep and beautiful, and the ground so very cold.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.text: Bliss is the ocean, a towel on the sand, the sun out, the chance to swim in waves or walk dragging a stick behind you, a good book, a cold drink.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.text: I'm not a big fan of cold weather; that's why I moved to Vegas!
quotes.author: Dave Keuning

quotes.text: The cold harsh reality is that we have to balance the budget.
quotes.author: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.text: The perfect antidote to dark, cold and creepy is light, warm and cozy.
quotes.author: Candice Olson

quotes.text: World's use is cold, world's love is vain, world's cruelty is bitter bane; but is not the fruit of pain.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.text: You know, in a workplace, when you shrink the size of a workforce, there is pain there. But there is no question: we have a government that we can no longer afford. That is the cold, hard fact. So we have to make this more efficient. We have to sunset programs that no longer work. We have to eliminate waste and fraud. We must do this.
quotes.author: Meg Whitman

quotes.text: For watching sports, I tend to drink Guinness; early evenings always begin well with a Grey Goose and tonic with plenty of lime; and on a cold winter's night, there's nothing quite like a glass of Black Maple Hill... an absolute peach of a bourbon.
quotes.author: Martin Bashir

quotes.text: I'm exactly as I appear. There is no warm, lovable person inside. Beneath my cold exterior, once you break the ice, you find cold water.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.text: Let us not be deceived we are today in the midst of a cold war.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.text: There are three reasons why I live in Scotland. First, I like silence, and you have to be a millionaire to buy silence in Italy. Second, I like cold weather. Third, in Italy I have too many relatives and know too many people, so I never get a quiet time.
quotes.author: Gian Carlo Menotti

quotes.text: I've taken a mail packet boat along the southern Newfoundland coast and spent some time on St. Pierre and Miquelon watching the seal colonies. I like pine trees. I like cold rivers.
quotes.author: Joseph Monninger

quotes.text: Cancer is like the common cold; there are so many different types. In the future we'll still have cancer, but we'll detect it very, very early, so that it won't kill anybody. We'll zap it at the molecular level decades before it grows into a tumor.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.text: Love keeps the cold out better than a cloak.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: You can have a wrestling idea, but you need to have these momentum-shifting moves. We had the Hulkamania movement, then it shifted to the beer-drinking, Stone Cold era, we reinvented the business with growing the black beard and becoming the bad guy, what's that next level.
quotes.author: Hulk Hogan

quotes.text: At the Summer Solstice, all is green and growing, potential coming into being, the miracle of manifestation painted large on the canvas of awareness. At the Winter Solstice, the wind is cold, trees are bare and all lies in stillness beneath blankets of snow.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.text: The problem with certainty is that sometimes it can sound cold and heartless, although it is the most compassionate and supportive answer.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.text: I don't mean to sound bitter, cold, or cruel, but I am, so that's how it comes out.
quotes.author: Bill Hicks

quotes.text: I love snow; I love building snowman. The only thing I don't like is the cold - so if we could have a hot Christmas, that would be amazing.
quotes.author: Ella Henderson

quotes.text: Death comes to all, but great achievements build a monument which shall endure until the sun grows cold.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The sway of alcohol over mankind is unquestionably due to its power to stimulate the mystical faculties of human nature, usually crushed to earth by the cold facts and dry criticisms of the sober hour.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: I mean, I have done scenes with animals, with owls, with bats, with cats, with special effects, with thespians, in the freezing cold, in the pouring rain, boiling hot; I've done press with every syndication, every country; I've done interviews with people dressed up as cows - there's honestly nothing that's gonna intimidate me!
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.text: I think what is British about me is my feelings and awareness of others and their situations. English people are always known to be well mannered and cold but we are not cold - we don't interfere in your situation. If we are heartbroken, we don't scream in your face with tears - we go home and cry on our own.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.text: Let me be the first to tell you, drinking alcohol is the worst thing to do in cold weather. Hot soup is the best because the process of digesting food helps to warm you up.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.text: Stop a minute, right where you are. Relax your shoulders, shake your head and spine like a dog shaking off cold water. Tell that imperious voice in your head to be still.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.text: Great things come out of being hungry and cold. Once you're pampered, you get lazy.
quotes.author: Rob Zombie

quotes.text: As winter approaches - bringing cold weather and family drama - we crave page-turners, books made for long nights and tryptophan-induced sloth.
quotes.author: Sarah MacLean

quotes.text: I grew up twelve miles outside of Montego Bay. In my early teens, I went to Kingston. It was like a different planet for me. In the country, people are kind. In the city, people are hard an' cold, like the concrete and steel.
quotes.author: Jimmy Cliff

quotes.text: I work out four days a week in the off-season, and in the warm, running weather months, I do five days. A push/pull regime of weightlifting, cycling, and the occasional Saturday or Sunday run with my oldest son, even if it's cold out.
quotes.author: Andre Dubus III

quotes.text: To see the earth as it truly is, small and blue in that eternal silence where it floats, is to see riders on the earth together, brothers on that bright loveliness in the eternal cold - brothers who know now they are truly brothers.
quotes.author: Archibald MacLeish

quotes.text: My house is my refuge, an emotional piece of architecture, not a cold piece of convenience.
quotes.author: Luis Barragan

quotes.text: Being cool is being your own self, not doing something that someone else is telling you to do.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.text: I'm a mirror. If you're cool with me, I'm cool with you, and the exchange starts. What you see is what you reflect. If you don't like what you see, then you've done something. If I'm standoffish, that's because you are.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.text: It's so important to realize that every time you get upset, it drains your emotional energy. Losing your cool makes you tired. Getting angry a lot messes with your health.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: I'm not the kind of person who tries to be cool or trendy, I'm definitely an individual.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.text: Let your soul stand cool and composed before a million universes.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: Keep a cool head and maintain a low profile. Never take the lead - but aim to do something big.
quotes.author: Deng Xiaoping

quotes.text: I never saw music in terms of men and women or black and white. There was just cool and uncool.
quotes.author: Bonnie Raitt

quotes.text: To create well I have to be in a good mood, happy and cool.
quotes.author: Marc Newson

quotes.text: I want to be a vampire. They're the coolest monsters.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.text: I think you have to be cool to be a good flirt, and I don't think I'm very cool.
quotes.author: Harry Styles

quotes.text: I don't think of myself as hot or cool or anything, just a dork.
quotes.author: Ashley Olsen

quotes.text: I'm a flamboyant type of guy, a cooler version of Liberace.
quotes.author: Usher

quotes.text: Sometimes just when I say hello the right way, I'm like, 'Whoa, I'm so cool.'
quotes.author: Robert Pattinson

quotes.text: Rather be dead than cool.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.text: Is a hippopotamus a hippopotamus, or just a really cool Opotamus?
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.text: Being uncool is being pretty much the coolest you can be.
quotes.author: Rufus Wainwright

quotes.text: My parents are the coolest of the cool on every single level, and it's because they have a deep appreciation for every moment of their lives.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: Be still and cool in thine own mind and spirit.
quotes.author: George Fox

quotes.text: I never cut class. I loved getting A's, I liked being smart. I liked being on time. I thought being smart is cooler than anything in the world.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: So there's nothing more provocative than taking a genre that everybody who's cool hates - and then making it cool.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: One cool judgment is worth a thousand hasty counsels. The thing to do is to supply light and not heat.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.text: And in a world without heroes, as the movie trailer voice-over guy might say, the slightly awkward can be slightly cool.
quotes.author: Adam Brody

quotes.text: Whatever hysteria exists is inflamed by mystery, suspicion and secrecy. Hard and exact facts will cool it.
quotes.author: Elia Kazan

quotes.text: To act coolly, intelligently and prudently in perilous circumstances is the test of a man - and also a nation.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.text: These days it's cool to be ethnic and to be different, but when I was a kid, it was not cool - at all. My friends would come over and my mom would make crepes with eggs, stuffed with mozzarella cheese, tomatoes and spinach. And they'd be like, 'What is this?'
quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

quotes.text: He who keeps his cool best wins.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.text: I still, at hotel rooms, I do this one sort of not-so-cool thing: continually shoving my room service tray in front of someone else's door. Because I don't want the remnants. I don't want to be caught, like, being like the pig that I was at two in the morning.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: I suppose being fierce is a very good thing, and a very cool thing. But more than fierce, I think I'm a strong person and a strong individual. And that's what I take with me every day.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.text: I used to make up stuff in my bio all the time, that I used to be a professional ice-skater and stuff like that. I found it so inspirational. Why not make myself cooler than I am?
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.text: When I was younger, the pressure was just being cool. I never thought of myself as a cool guy. I always thought of myself as more of the goofy guy.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.text: Sometimes life's so much cooler when you just don't know any better and all the painful lessons have not hammered your head open yet.
quotes.author: Anthony Kiedis

quotes.text: You don't have to carry a designer bag that costs more than a car to look cool.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.text: People look at me and see a calm, cool guy on the sidelines and I want them to know that my Christian faith affects my coaching and everything I do.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.text: I've never been cool - and I don't care.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.text: It was a very cool thing to be a smart girl, as opposed to some other, different kind. And I think that made a great deal of difference to me growing up and in my life afterward.
quotes.author: Elena Kagan

quotes.text: Nothing gives one person so much advantage over another as to remain always cool and unruffled under all circumstances.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: I think it would be cool if you were writing a ransom note on your computer, if the paper clip popped up and said, 'Looks like you're writing a ransom note. Need help? You should use more forceful language, you'll get more money.'
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: I think all jocks have a sensitive side. It's just, will they show it to anybody? Will they let their guard down and stop being tough and the cool jock guy around their friends, or just relax? I don't know if it's best to say opening up, but just relax and really say what you're actually thinking, and not what you think people want to hear.
quotes.author: Channing Tatum

quotes.text: Saturday morning, you knew what was cool by what was on 'Soul Train.'
quotes.author: Nick Cannon

quotes.text: Heroes don't wear diapers. It's just not cool.
quotes.author: Felix Baumgartner

quotes.text: Good words cool more than cold water.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.text: I don't think it's cool for people to say, 'You shouldn't reference God because I don't believe that, and I don't want to hear it.' Well, there's a lot of stuff I don't believe that I still gotta hear.
quotes.author: Steve Harvey

quotes.text: I've never been cool and I don't really care about being cool. It's just an awful lot of time and hair gel wasted.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.text: I'm cute - and God I hate that. Because that's not cool. I'm like your niece, and nobody wants to date their niece. It's the chubby cheeks. The whole reason people voted for me on American Idol is because I'm an everyday, normal girl.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.text: Nothing is cooler and more attractive than a big comeback, and that'll be me.
quotes.author: Steven Adler

quotes.text: A lot of people are obsessed with looking cool. They feel they have to look after their image.
quotes.author: Adrian Edmondson

quotes.text: I want kids of this generation to see that everything is cool, that there's some kind of unity in hip-hop. We all found something that's really important to us, and music is all we've really got.
quotes.author: Missy Elliott

quotes.text: I always preferred to hang out with the outcasts, 'cause they were cooler; they had better taste in music, for one thing, I guess because they had more time to develop one with the lack of social interaction they had!
quotes.author: John Hughes

quotes.text: The secret was to just be cool, stay in God's graces, and work it out.
quotes.author: Solomon Burke

quotes.text: All of my favorite people - people I really trust - none of them were cool in their younger years.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: It seems like once people grow up, they have no idea what's cool.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: Spiderman can climb walls and he's got a cool outfit.
quotes.author: Rhona Mitra

quotes.text: Some years I'm the coolest thing that ever happened, and then the next year everyone's so over me, and I'm just so past my sell date.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.text: Stop being conned by the old mantra that says, 'Leaders are cool, managers are dweebs.' Instead, follow the Peters Principle: Leaders are cool. Managers are cool too!
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.text: A girl came up to me in a bar and said she wanted to be my apple pie. I wish I'd said something cool, but I was stunned.
quotes.author: Jason Biggs

quotes.text: It's cool to have a well run, comfortable and inviting home.
quotes.author: Anthea Turner

quotes.text: Being cool, having a 'cool' energy is just not attractive to me.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.text: I wanted to escape Small Town U.S.A. To dismiss the boundaries, to explore. My life experience came from watching movies, TV, and reading books and magazines. When your culture comes from watching TV everyday, you're bombarded with images of things that seem cool, places that seem interesting, people who have jobs and careers and opportunities.
quotes.author: Trent Reznor

quotes.text: I'm cool with failing so long as I know that there are people around me that love me unconditionally.
quotes.author: Dave Chappelle

quotes.text: I used to lie between cool, clean sheets at night after I'd had a bath, after I had washed my hair and scrubbed my knuckles and finger-nails and teeth. Then I could lie quite still in the dark with my face to the window with the trees in it, and talk to God.
quotes.author: Frances Farmer

quotes.text: You can be cool and at the same time respect your woman, who will hopefully become your wife, who will hopefully become the mother of your kids. America needs to get back to family values.
quotes.author: Martin Lawrence

quotes.text: I can take it. The tougher it gets, the cooler I get.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: People see my photos and think I labor over my image and I'm this cool, brooding artist. But I'm just having fun with it.
quotes.author: Lenny Kravitz

quotes.text: Morgan Freeman is so class. He's so cool. He's so scary.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.text: The cool thing is that now that people have made this evolution where cooking is cool, people are doing it on weekends, they're doing their own challenges. It's back to cooking. And it's real cooking.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.text: I've never done anything because I thought it would look cool.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.text: Hip-hop is still cool at a party. But to me, hip-hop has never been strictly a party; it is also there to elevate consciousness.
quotes.author: Saul Williams

quotes.text: I am always looking for a cool tee shirt; maybe one with a rock band or an old advertisement.
quotes.author: Bridget Hall

quotes.text: All women do have a different sense of sexuality, or sense of fun, or sense of like what's sexy or cool or tough.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.text: There aren't many poster children for cool angst. Everybody thinks it's cool if you're the bad girl.
quotes.author: Fiona Apple

quotes.text: I just tried to keep my cool and continue with my race plan: to win.
quotes.author: Mark Spitz

quotes.text: We're always bombarded with images from magazines of what looks cool and sexy.
quotes.author: Marilu Henner

quotes.text: Apparently it's cool to watch The Daily Show.
quotes.author: Rob Corddry

quotes.text: Prominence is cool, but when the delusion kicks in it can be a drag. Especially if you choose to surround yourself with friends and not acolytes.
quotes.author: Barbara Kruger

quotes.text: If at any moment of the day I ever think I'm remotely cool at all, which is hardly ever, I have two daughters who make sure that never happens.
quotes.author: Pat Benatar

quotes.text: The simple truth is that balding African-American men look cool when they shave their heads, whereas balding white men look like giant thumbs.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: I think you create your own hipness.
quotes.author: Peabo Bryson

quotes.text: It's cool just because I've had this dream of changing the sport of swimming and it's finally happening.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.text: Some people are cool with the fact that their bodies bear witness to this great thing they produced, their children, and I understand that. But on a personal level, it makes me feel better that my breasts are not down to my knees when I'm undressed in front of my husband.
quotes.author: Patricia Heaton

quotes.text: Competition is great. And as long as it's friendly and not a malicious thing, then I think it's cool.
quotes.author: Janet Jackson

quotes.text: Hope is like the sun, which, as we journey toward it, casts the shadow of our burden behind us.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.text: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.text: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.text: We need to find God, and he cannot be found in noise and restlessness. God is the friend of silence. See how nature - trees, flowers, grass- grows in silence; see the stars, the moon and the sun, how they move in silence... We need silence to be able to touch souls.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.
quotes.author: Christopher McCandless

quotes.text: But I say to you, Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you, so that you may be sons of your Father who is in heaven; for he makes his sun rise on the evil and on the good, and sends rain on the just and on the unjust.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: After every storm the sun will smile; for every problem there is a solution, and the soul's indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
quotes.author: William R. Alger

quotes.text: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.text: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.text: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.text: Just imagine becoming the way you used to be as a very young child, before you understood the meaning of any word, before opinions took over your mind. The real you is loving, joyful, and free. The real you is just like a flower, just like the wind, just like the ocean, just like the sun.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.text: Some painters transform the sun into a yellow spot, others transform a yellow spot into the sun.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: The sun is new each day.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way. And don't pray when it rains if you don't pray when the sun shines.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: I only really and truly fully relax on my own. Give me a sun lounger, a pool and a sea view, and I'm happy.
quotes.author: Miranda Hart

quotes.text: The sun is gone, but I have a light.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.text: A man can no more diminish God's glory by refusing to worship Him than a lunatic can put out the sun by scribbling the word, 'darkness' on the walls of his cell.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: Doubt thou the stars are fire, Doubt that the sun doth move. Doubt truth to be a liar, But never doubt I love.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Truth is like the sun. You can shut it out for a time, but it ain't goin' away.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.text: Remember to be gentle with yourself and others. We are all children of chance and none can say why some fields will blossom while others lay brown beneath the August sun.
quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

quotes.text: Remember even though the outside world might be raining, if you keep on smiling the sun will soon show its face and smile back at you.
quotes.author: Anna Lee

quotes.text: I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: Modern science says: 'The sun is the past, the earth is the present, the moon is the future.' From an incandescent mass we have originated, and into a frozen mass we shall turn. Merciless is the law of nature, and rapidly and irresistibly we are drawn to our doom.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

quotes.text: The light which puts out our eyes is darkness to us. Only that day dawns to which we are awake. There is more day to dawn. The sun is but a morning star.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: I think that nothing is impossible when you want to fulfill a dream. A lot of people will tell you that you can't do it, that you don't have what it takes, but if it is in your heart and you feel it, there is nothing that will stop you. It is like the sun - you can't block it: it will shine regardless, if that is what you want.
quotes.author: Thalia

quotes.text: And Fall, with her yeller harvest moon and the hills growin' brown and golden under a sinkin' sun.
quotes.author: Roy Bean

quotes.text: Keep your nose out the sky, keep your heart to god, and keep your face to the raising sun.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.text: Every day is a good day to be alive, whether the sun's shining or not.
quotes.author: Marty Robbins

quotes.text: Most of us can remember a time when a birthday - especially if it was one's own - brightened the world as if a second sun has risen.
quotes.author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quotes.text: Following the light of the sun, we left the Old World.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.text: When I was a boy, the Sioux owned the world. The sun rose and set on their land; they sent ten thousand men to battle. Where are the warriors today? Who slew them? Where are our lands? Who owns them?
quotes.author: Sitting Bull

quotes.text: Philosophically, the universe has really never made things in ones. The Earth is special and everything else is different? No, we've got seven other planets. The sun? No, the sun is one of those dots in the night sky. The Milky Way? No, it's one of a hundred billion galaxies. And the universe - maybe it's countless other universes.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: At rest, however, in the middle of everything is the sun.
quotes.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

quotes.text: The sun, with all those planets revolving around it and dependent on it, can still ripen a bunch of grapes as if it had nothing else in the universe to do.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.text: Every friend is to the other a sun, and a sunflower also. He attracts and follows.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.text: It is best to be born in April or August when the life-giving Sun is in its exaltation sign Aries or Leo, its home, for then we enter the sea of life on the crest-wave and are backed in the battle of existence by an abundant fund of vim and energy.
quotes.author: Max Heindel

quotes.text: Florida has its own rhythm, too. People go to work, they watch their children learn and grow and start families of their own. They play in the sun and pass their lives enjoying the outsized blessings that make our state unique.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.text: 'The Sun Also Rises' by Ernest Hemingway is my favorite book. You feel manly reading it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Olsen

quotes.text: Loss and possession, death and life are one, There falls no shadow where there shines no sun.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.text: To morrow, I believe, is to be an eclipse of the sun, and I think it perfectly meet and proper that the sun in the heavens, and the glory of the Republic should both go into obscurity and darkness together.
quotes.author: Benjamin F. Wade

quotes.text: Burning carbon-based substances like oil, gas, and especially coal, produces billions of tons of extra carbon dioxide each year. Methane gas from cows and pigs and other animals on our large farms ends up in the atmosphere as well, trapping more of the sun's energy as heat.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.text: And if you don't believe the sun will rise, stand alone and greet the coming night in the last remaining light.
quotes.author: Chris Cornell

quotes.text: With just one polka dot, nothing can be achieved. In the universe, there is the sun, the moon, the earth, and hundreds of millions of stars. All of us live in the unfathomable mystery and infinitude of the universe. Pursuing 'philosophy of the universe' through art under such circumstances has led me to what I call 'stereotypical repetition.'
quotes.author: Yayoi Kusama

quotes.text: When I look up and see the sun shining on the patch of white clouds up in the blue, I begin to think how it would feel to be up somewhere above it winging swiftly thought the clear air, watching the earth below, and the men on it, no bigger than ants.
quotes.author: Eddie Rickenbacker

quotes.text: The conscious mind may be compared to a fountain playing in the sun and falling back into the great subterranean pool of subconscious from which it rises.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.text: Grant me the treasure of sublime poverty: permit the distinctive sign of our order to be that it does not possess anything of its own beneath the sun, for the glory of your name, and that it have no other patrimony than begging.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.text: Hear me, my chiefs! I am tired. My heart is sick and sad. From where the sun now stands, I will fight no more forever.
quotes.author: Chief Joseph

quotes.text: I love to exercise outside in the fresh air and sun: hiking, swimming, stand-up paddleboarding, and jogging.
quotes.author: Colbie Caillat

quotes.text: Laughter is the sun that drives winter from the human face.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: A man willing to work, and unable to find work, is perhaps the saddest sight that fortune's inequality exhibits under this sun.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.text: Constant kindness can accomplish much. As the sun makes ice melt, kindness causes misunderstanding, mistrust, and hostility to evaporate.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: Solar power is the last energy resource that isn't owned yet - nobody taxes the sun yet.
quotes.author: Bonnie Raitt

quotes.text: The sun shines everywhere, not just at the beach.
quotes.author: Brande Roderick

quotes.text: The conductor must breathe life into the score. It is you and you alone who must expose it to the understanding, reveal the hidden jewel to the sun at the most flattering angles.
quotes.author: Charles Munch

quotes.text: Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: Stay out of the sun, because it is the worst thing in terms of aging. I'm very medical. I come from a medical family.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.text: Sydney is rather like an arrogant lover. When it rains it can deny you its love and you can find it hard to relate to. It's not a place that's built to be rainy or cold. But when the sun comes out, it bats its eyelids, it's glamorous, beautiful, attractive, smart, and it's very hard to get away from its magnetic pull.
quotes.author: Baz Luhrmann

quotes.text: Unlike their Western counterparts, Africans take elections very seriously - rising up early to queue patiently in line for hours under the hot sun and cast their ballots. Any misguided attempt to nullify or steal their votes will evoke a strong reaction from them.
quotes.author: George Ayittey

quotes.text: You must be a lotus, unfolding its petals when the sun rises in the sky, unaffected by the slush where it is born or even the water which sustains it!
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.text: What is emitted from the divine, though it be only like the reflection from the fire, still has the divine reality in itself, and one might almost ask what were the fire without glow, the sun without light, or the Creator without the creature?
quotes.author: Max Muller

quotes.text: My sun sets to rise again.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.text: In 1860 a total eclipse of the sun was visible in British America.
quotes.author: Simon Newcomb

quotes.text: Pain and foolishness lead to great bliss and complete knowledge, for Eternal Wisdom created nothing under the sun in vain.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: I felt obligated to change music to art, the same way that Galileo proved the Earth was round to the world and that the Sun did not stand still.
quotes.author: Phil Spector

quotes.text: Follow thy fair sun, unhappy shadow.
quotes.author: Thomas Campion

quotes.text: I believe that God felt sorry for actors so he created Hollywood to give them a place in the sun and a swimming pool. The price they had to pay was to surrender their talent.
quotes.author: Cedric Hardwicke

quotes.text: Mama exhorted her children at every opportunity to 'jump at the sun.' We might not land on the sun, but at least we would get off the ground.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.text: The sun too penetrates into privies, but is not polluted by them.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.text: The sun, too, shines into cesspools and is not polluted.
quotes.author: Diogenes
