quotes.text: People get so in the habit of worry that if you save them from drowning and put them on a bank to dry in the sun with hot chocolate and muffins they wonder whether they are catching cold.
quotes.author: John Jay Chapman

quotes.text: The child often sees only what he already knows. He projects the whole of his verbal thought into things. He sees mountains as built by men, rivers as dug out with spades, the sun and moon as following us on our walks.
quotes.author: Jean Piaget

quotes.text: I felt like an extraordinary hero. I was only five or six and I had the whole of life in my hands. Even if I had been driving the carriage of the sun I could not have felt any better.
quotes.author: Dario Fo

quotes.text: Nature is the glass reflecting God, as by the sea reflected is the sun, too glorious to be gazed on in his sphere.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.text: The sun shines on everybody. You've got to keep believing.
quotes.author: Dontrelle Willis

quotes.text: I have no doubt that we will be successful in harnessing the sun's energy. If sunbeams were weapons of war, we would have had solar energy centuries ago.
quotes.author: George Porter

quotes.text: I couldn't wait for the sun to come up the next morning so that I could get out on the course again.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.text: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
quotes.author: Max Muller

quotes.text: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.text: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.text: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.text: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.
quotes.author: Charles Morgan

quotes.text: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: To say 'I love you' one must first be able to say the 'I.'
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.text: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyere

quotes.text: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.text: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.text: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.text: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Who, being loved, is poor?
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: True love cannot be found where it does not exist, nor can it be denied where it does.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.text: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: We are born of love; Love is our mother.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Love has reasons which reason cannot understand.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.text: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: 'Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.text: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.text: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.text: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Who so loves believes the impossible.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.text: If your heart is a volcano, how shall you expect flowers to bloom?
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.text: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: We loved with a love that was more than love.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: The course of true love never did run smooth.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.text: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Don't forget to love yourself.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.text: I long for the raised voice, the howl of rage or love.
quotes.author: Leslie Fiedler

quotes.text: Accustom yourself continually to make many acts of love, for they enkindle and melt the soul.
quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quotes.text: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.text: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Lord, grant that I might not so much seek to be loved as to love.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.text: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.text: Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: There is only one real deprivation... and that is not to be able to give one's gifts to those one loves most.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.text: The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.text: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough is love.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.text: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: Love is when he gives you a piece of your soul, that you never knew was missing.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.text: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Once the realization is accepted that even between the closest human beings infinite distances continue, a wonderful living side by side can grow, if they succeed in loving the distance between them which makes it possible for each to see the other whole against the sky.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.text: I was born with an enormous need for affection, and a terrible need to give it.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: It is love, not reason, that is stronger than death.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.text: Love is the crowning grace of humanity, the holiest right of the soul, the golden link which binds us to duty and truth, the redeeming principle that chiefly reconciles the heart to life, and is prophetic of eternal good.
quotes.author: Petrarch

quotes.text: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.text: In the flush of love's light, we dare be brave. And suddenly we see that love costs all we are, and will ever be. Yet it is only love which sets us free.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists, or simulate it where it does not.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: We are never so defensless against suffering as when we love.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.text: Let the rain kiss you. Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops. Let the rain sing you a lullaby.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.text: Kiss me and you will see how important I am.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.text: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.text: And when the day arrives I'll become the sky and I'll become the sea and the sea will come to kiss me for I am going home. Nothing can stop me now.
quotes.author: Trent Reznor

quotes.text: Happiness is like a kiss. You must share it to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.text: A kiss that is never tasted, is forever and ever wasted.
quotes.author: Billie Holiday

quotes.text: You can't please everyone, and trying to is the kiss of death. I don't care about Wayne Newton's demographics. When I do, I'll know that it's time to quit.
quotes.author: Criss Angel

quotes.text: A first kiss is hard to fake on screen. It's tempting to practice before you shoot, but why blow that natural awkwardness on a rehearsal? There's something so beautiful about it that can't be faked.
quotes.author: Maggie Grace

quotes.text: It's OK to do cute little things like kissing a turtle, but you can't kiss another person because he's a different color? Give me a break. And you have to remember, I'm from Dallas, Texas.
quotes.author: Aaron Spelling

quotes.text: She felt like a chess player who, by the clever handling of his pieces, sees the game taking the course intended. Her eyes were bright and tender with a smile as they glanced up into his; and her lips looked hungry for the kiss which they invited.
quotes.author: Kate Chopin

quotes.text: Yes, I've kissed a lot of guys. I like to kiss, but that's it. I don't go home with anyone. I sleep with my animals, like my baby monkey, Brigitte Bardot.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: It is the passion that is in a kiss that gives to it its sweetness; it is the affection in a kiss that sanctifies it.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.text: My first real kiss came when I was 10, and it was in an acting class. I had to do a scene from a movie where someone gets kissed under a tree, and I did not want to do it! But my acting partner wanted me to feel comfortable, so he bought a picnic basket with all these snacks. He made such an effort - and it was cute.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.text: But his kiss was so sweet, and so closely he pressed, that I languished and pined till I granted the rest.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.text: I had to have my first kiss in front of, like, a hundred people. I didn't know what to do. So my sisters told me to, like, practice on a pillow, you know? But it didn't kiss me back so I didn't know what to expect.
quotes.author: Lacey Chabert

quotes.text: Who ran to help me when I fell, And would some pretty story tell, Or kiss the place to make it well? My mother.
quotes.author: Jane Taylor

quotes.text: Nothing could ever stop Kiss. I've seen the band in down times where critics were like vultures circling overhead saying things like, 'Well, you know it's the end of your career.'
quotes.author: Paul Stanley

quotes.text: I don't kiss on screen. Period.
quotes.author: Shah Rukh Khan

quotes.text: I don't like Heather Graham. She did an interview and said, 'I didn't want to kiss Corey; I didn't want to catch his mononucleosis. He had a kissing disease.'
quotes.author: Corey Haim

quotes.text: I love doing TV. It's such a breakneck pace, you know. It's kiss and go with your leading man. You meet them in the morning and go right into a clinch. The filming is over before you know their last names.
quotes.author: Paulette Goddard

quotes.text: The trouble with women umpires is that I couldn't argue with one. I'd put my arms around her and give her a little kiss.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.text: A friend is always good to have, but a lover's kiss is better than angels raining down on me.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.text: The sound of a kiss is not so loud as that of a cannon, but its echo lasts a great deal longer.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.text: Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I can imagine myself on my death-bed, spent utterly with lust to touch the next world, like a boy asking for his first kiss from a woman.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.text: KISS has always been outside of the borders of what other bands can do. Not that some of these other bands wouldn't want to do it - the fact that they may snicker or look down their noses at what we do is more out of jealously than anything else.
quotes.author: Paul Stanley

quotes.text: Always kiss your children goodnight, even if they're already asleep.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: Every girl on TV, in real life, sure you want to meet that soul mate and fall in love and have the big thing, but until that happens, you gotta kiss a lot of frogs.
quotes.author: Laura Prepon

quotes.text: I asked my daughter when she was 16, What's the buzz on the street with the kids? She's going, to be honest, Dad, most of my friends aren't into Kiss. But they've all been told that it's the greatest show on Earth.
quotes.author: Ace Frehley

quotes.text: What I tell young couples that are getting married is: you're going to have quarrels, and on some things, you're just going to have to agree to disagree. And when you go to bed at night, kiss each other and tell each other that you love each other. Don't go to bed mad. Life is too short. Keep it simple.
quotes.author: Si Robertson

quotes.text: Golden slumbers kiss your eyes, Smiles awake you when you rise.
quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

quotes.text: I try to do something the audience might not have seen before. Like if I'm gonna kiss a girl I wanna kiss her like a girl has never been kissed. Like maybe I would kick her legs out from under her and catch her right before she hits the ground and then kiss her.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.text: I like Aurora, 'Sleeping Beauty,' because she's just sleeping and looking pretty and waiting for boys to come kiss her. Sounds like a good life - lots of naps and cute boys fighting dragons to come kiss you.
quotes.author: Ariana Grande

quotes.text: Alcohol is like love. The first kiss is magic, the second is intimate, the third is routine. After that you take the girl's clothes off.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.text: To find a prince, you gotta kiss some toads.
quotes.author: Foxy Brown

quotes.text: I don't think you should feel about a film. You should feel about a woman, not a movie. You can't kiss a movie.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Godard

quotes.text: 'Kiss Land' is the story after 'Trilogy'; it's pretty much the second chapter of my life. The narrative takes place after my first flight; it's very foreign, very Asian-inspired. When people ask me, 'Why Japan?' I simply tell them it's the furthest I've ever been from home. It really is a different planet.
quotes.author: The Weeknd

quotes.text: The best part about a first kiss is right before the first kiss.
quotes.author: Brett Davern

quotes.text: A kiss makes the heart young again and wipes out the years.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.text: The first kiss I had was the most disgusting thing in my life. The girl injected about a pound of saliva into my mouth, and when I walked away I had to spit it all out.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.text: I've always been fascinated by Elizabeth Taylor, and I had read that her first kiss happened on a film set, which actually made me a little sad. You need to have normal experiences of your own.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.text: But I think Kiss Kiss, Bang Bang really got that thing where, if a movie reads really funny and then has some dramatic or violent or sinister stuff in it, you can't forget that primarily it has to be even funnier than you read it or that other stuff doesn't work.
quotes.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quotes.text: The thing that I think is the most important is taking moments to express your appreciation to your partner. A thank you or a quick kiss can go a long way toward affirming your relationship and commitment to each other. That's not hard to do even when you're juggling insane careers and three kids.
quotes.author: Michael Ian Black

quotes.text: Just one step. Just one mile. Just one dollar. Just one kiss. Just one person. When we look at life through the lens of 'one,' everything becomes that much more attainable.
quotes.author: Mick Ebeling

quotes.text: How did it happen that their lips came together? How does it happen that birds sing, that snow melts, that the rose unfolds, that the dawn whitens behind the stark shapes of trees on the quivering summit of the hill? A kiss, and all was said.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: A man's kiss is his signature.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Kiss is a Fourth of July fireworks show with a backbeat.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.text: I think it's wonderful when a love story begins with a great deal of romance and affection, passion and excitement, that's how it should be. But I don't necessarily know that it's the wisest thing in the world to expect that it ends there, or that it should, 30 years down the road, still look as it did on the night of your first kiss.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.text: When my time on earth is gone, and my activities here are passed, I want they bury me upside down, and my critics can kiss my ass!
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.text: There's nothing like the first kiss once you've been pronounced husband and wife. It's such a wonderful moment!
quotes.author: Sara Ramirez

quotes.text: I like kisses that aren't too fast or rushed - that's what makes a good kiss.
quotes.author: Louis Tomlinson

quotes.text: A kiss is a secret told to the mouth instead of the ear; kisses are the messengers of love and tenderness.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.text: With a kiss let us set out for an unknown world.
quotes.author: Alfred de Musset

quotes.text: Now a soft kiss - Aye, by that kiss, I vow an endless bliss.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.text: If you kiss on the first date and it's not right, then there will be no second date. Sometimes it's better to hold out and not kiss for a long time. I am a strong believer in kissing being very intimate, and the minute you kiss, the floodgates open for everything else.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.text: How far away the stars seem, and how far is our first kiss, and ah, how old my heart.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: I'd kiss a frog even if there was no promise of a Prince Charming popping out of it. I love frogs.
quotes.author: Cameron Diaz

quotes.text: Expressions of affection, like putting your arm around someone's shoulder, holding hands, or giving a kiss good night, involve the principle of honesty.
quotes.author: John Bytheway

quotes.text: What is a kiss? Why this, as some approve: The sure, sweet cement, glue, and lime of love.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.text: The decision to kiss for the first time is the most crucial in any love story. It changes the relationship of two people much more strongly than even the final surrender; because this kiss already has within it that surrender.
quotes.author: Emil Ludwig

quotes.text: I kiss the soil as if I placed a kiss on the hands of a mother, for the homeland is our earthly mother. I consider it my duty to be with my compatriots in this sublime and difficult moment.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.text: I'd luv to kiss ya, but I just washed my hair.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.text: We are all mortal until the first kiss and the second glass of wine.
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

quotes.text: Some are kissing mothers and some are scolding mothers, but it is love just the same, and most mothers kiss and scold together.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.text: Anywhere I go, there is always an incredible crowd that follows me. In Rome, as I land at the airport, even the men kiss me. I love Rome.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: A couple of years before he died, I kissed my father goodbye. He said, 'Son, you haven't kissed me since you were a little boy.' It went straight to my heart, and I kissed him whenever I saw him after that, and my sons and I always kiss whenever we meet.
quotes.author: Terry Wogan

quotes.text: The happiness of life is made up of minute fractions - the little, soon forgotten charities of a kiss or a smile, a kind look or heartfelt compliment.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.text: Never ask a woman if you may kiss her. Instead, learn to read body language.
quotes.author: Neil Strauss

quotes.text: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Excuse me while I kiss the sky.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: I'm such a private person, and sexuality is such a private thing. A sex scene is much harder than a fight scene. It's one thing to say, 'Kick higher,' but 'Kiss harder' - that's just crazy.
quotes.author: Carrie-Anne Moss

quotes.text: I think KISS has always been about celebrating self-empowerment. Celebrating the idea that anything is possible with determination and hard work.
quotes.author: Paul Stanley

quotes.text: I've dated girls and I always wait for that one right time to kiss. I don't kiss on the first date, so I'll take a girl out to dinners, and we'll go bowling, and I make sure to charm them before I do it.
quotes.author: Kellan Lutz

quotes.text: I was a nursery school teacher, and I worked with youth groups. I loved that job. It was exhausting, but you got a lot back - all their purity and insight and innocence is so on the surface, and they're so unrepressed; they'd really scream at you and then give you a massive kiss.
quotes.author: Bat for Lashes

quotes.text: To throw a shoe at a man in Dundee is the equivalent of a kiss on the cheek and an embrace in London. Dundee is a very different place; they have their own rules.
quotes.author: Calvin Harris

quotes.text: I made a movie when I was 15 years old with all my friends. This is when IMDb was a little more lax with its proceedings, so it's listed as one of my projects. I was 15 years old; it's a terrible movie. I wrote 50 percent of it because I wanted to kiss this one girl, and I wrote a kissing scene for it.
quotes.author: Lin-Manuel Miranda

quotes.text: After I saw Kiss on stage, I wanted my show to look like the fourth of July. The persona of Rick James was wild and crazy, sex, drugs and rock and roll.
quotes.author: Rick James

quotes.text: May I kiss you then? On this miserable paper? I might as well open the window and kiss the night air.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.text: I had a New Year's kiss once. But it was like, 'Let's start the year off together,' and then we wound up breaking up the night after!
quotes.author: Joe Jonas

quotes.text: Women still remember the first kiss after men have forgotten the last.
quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.text: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The best remedy for those who are afraid, lonely or unhappy is to go outside, somewhere where they can be quiet, alone with the heavens, nature and God. Because only then does one feel that all is as it should be.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Your days are short here; this is the last of your springs. And now in the serenity and quiet of this lovely place, touch the depths of truth, feel the hem of Heaven. You will go away with old, good friends. And don't forget when you leave why you came.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.text: Become slower in your journey through life. Practice yoga and meditation if you suffer from 'hurry sickness.' Become more introspective by visiting quiet places such as churches, museums, mountains and lakes. Give yourself permission to read at least one novel a month for pleasure.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: I specialize in murders of quiet, domestic interest.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.text: Femininity is not just lipstick, stylish hairdos, and trendy clothes. It is the divine adornment of humanity. It finds expression in your qualities of your capacity to love, your spirituality, delicacy, radiance, sensitivity, creativity, charm, graciousness, gentleness, dignity, and quiet strength.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.text: Follow effective action with quiet reflection. From the quiet reflection will come even more effective action.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: All men's miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: There are always things I find difficult - being in crowds, remembering faces. I do like routines. I always travel with someone. My life in Avignon is a very quiet one. I have an apartment that looks over the whole city. I can drop into town, but a lot of the time I write from home. In some respects I still live a very quiet, simple life.
quotes.author: Daniel Tammet

quotes.text: With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.text: My father started growing very quiet as Alzheimer's started claiming more of him. The early stages of Alzheimer's are the hardest because that person is aware that they're losing awareness. And I think that that's why my father started growing more and more quiet.
quotes.author: Patti Davis

quotes.text: I like the quiet it takes to pursue an idea the way I pursued 'Hamilton,' but I couldn't write a book, because there's no applause at the end of writing a book.
quotes.author: Lin-Manuel Miranda

quotes.text: Cultivate solitude and quiet and a few sincere friends, rather than mob merriment, noise and thousands of nodding acquaintances.
quotes.author: William Powell

quotes.text: Every time I have some moment on a seashore, or in the mountains, or sometimes in a quiet forest, I think this is why the environment has to be preserved.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.text: Kurt and I weren't the closest of friends, but I knew him well enough to be devastated by his death. For such a quiet person, he was so excited about having a child.
quotes.author: Layne Staley

quotes.text: Touch us gently, Time! Let us glide adown thy stream, Gently, - as we sometimes glide Through a quiet dream!
quotes.author: Bryan Procter

quotes.text: It's the steady, quiet, plodding ones who win in the lifelong race.
quotes.author: Robert W. Service

quotes.text: But I'll tell you what hermits realize. If you go off into a far, far forest and get very quiet, you'll come to understand that you're connected with everything.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: You know when you have a good relationship with someone when you are just perfectly happy to be quiet and just hang out and do nothing.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.text: It was all so far away - there was quiet and an untouched feel to the country and I could work as I pleased.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.text: A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy dare live.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.text: Give us grace and strength to forbear and to persevere. Give us courage and gaiety and the quiet mind, spare to us our friends, soften to us our enemies.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: Musicians want to be the loud voice for so many quiet hearts.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.text: You have to find that place that is very quiet in your head, and anytime I read it, anytime I come across it, my Bible, the first Scripture in there is Psalms 91.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.text: Another world is not only possible, she is on her way. On a quiet day, I can hear her breathing.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.text: There's a lot to love about America - freedom, the melting pot of diversity, individualism - all attractive concepts, especially to an introvert. In fact, the introverts were probably the first to feel crowded in England and to daydream about all the space they would find in the New World. Peace! Quiet!
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.text: Men would live exceedingly quiet if these two words, mine and thine, were taken away.
quotes.author: Anaxagoras

quotes.text: Wise men, when in doubt whether to speak or to keep quiet, give themselves the benefit of the doubt, and remain silent.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: It's one of the worst-kept secrets of family life that all parents have a preferred son or daughter, and the rules for acknowledging it are the same everywhere: The favored kids recognize their status and keep quiet about it - the better to preserve the good thing they've got going and to keep their siblings off their back.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.text: When was the last time you spent a quiet moment just doing nothing - just sitting and looking at the sea, or watching the wind blowing the tree limbs, or waves rippling on a pond, a flickering candle or children playing in the park?
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: It is only imperfection that complains of what is imperfect. The more perfect we are the more gentle and quiet we become towards the defects of others.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: If you're quiet, you're not living. You've got to be noisy and colorful and lively.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.text: When I feel strongly about something, I'm not so quiet.
quotes.author: Ellen Page

quotes.text: I have a real problem with stillness. With just stopping and being quiet.
quotes.author: Gillian Anderson

quotes.text: I was a very quiet, shy child. I grew up in a small town, Louisville, Kentucky, and there weren't too many Hawaiian-Filipino girls, so I stuck out like a sore thumb. I didn't look like everyone else and didn't feel I belonged... But these things only build character and make you stronger. It taught me to grow into the woman I was to become.
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.text: Every publisher or agent I've ever met told me the same thing - that Irish readers don't want to read about the bad old days of the Troubles; neither do the English and Americans - they only want to read about the Ireland of The Quiet Man, when red-haired widows are riding bicycles and everyone else is on a horse.
quotes.author: Adrian McKinty

quotes.text: I'm a spiritual person and a religious person. But for me, it's all a personal thing. I'm not someone who'll say, 'This is what I believe, and you should too!' It's more of an internal, quiet, grounded, fulfilling thing for me.
quotes.author: Mandy Moore

quotes.text: Quiet is better than loud.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams

quotes.text: I got a lot of things that society had promised would make me whole and fulfilled - all the things that the culture tells you from preschool on will quiet the throbbing anxiety inside you - stature, the respect of colleagues, maybe even a kind of low-grade fame.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: I've never had a very quiet voice. I tried in choir to make it smaller, and it just didn't work out. And I listened to a lot of soul music when I was growing up on my own accord. But I was mostly into Mama Cass and Gladys Knight, and they all had big voices too; just different than mine.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: I have recently been able to see the new world - the quiet, the tranquility and the freedom it will bring with it. This is very comforting knowledge for me because I already know that what I envision eventually becomes a reality.
quotes.author: Shari Arison

quotes.text: Quiet is the new loud.
quotes.author: Patrick Stump

quotes.text: There is no corner too quiet, or too far away, for a woman to make sorrow in it.
quotes.author: Amelia Barr

quotes.text: I grew up as an only child. My parents weren't great conversationalists. We had a quiet house. I'm not very verbal.
quotes.author: Matthew Morrison

quotes.text: Quiet minds cannot be perplexed or frightened but go on in fortune or misfortune at their own private pace, like a clock during a thunderstorm.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: The world is never quiet, even its silence eternally resounds with the same notes, in vibrations which escape our ears. As for those that we perceive, they carry sounds to us, occasionally a chord, never a melody.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: It wasn't so long ago that I was a working mom myself. And I know that sometimes, much as we all hate to admit it, it's just easier to park the kids in front of the TV for a few hours, so we can pay the bills or do the laundry or just have some peace and quiet for a change.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: A person whose mind is quiet and satisfied in God is in the pathway to health.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.text: Never, for the sake of peace and quiet, deny your own experience or convictions.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.text: There is a fellowship more quiet even than solitude, and which, rightly understood, is solitude made perfect.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: I like fishing. Not actual fishing - I like the peace and quiet of being at sea. It's different.
quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

quotes.text: My father's family came from Virginia and Philadelphia. He wasn't a brother who talked a lot. He was a workingman, a quiet, blue-collar dude.
quotes.author: Ice T

quotes.text: I'm really an inner spirit that only makes itself known through the music. A lot of people think I'm an introvert, or quiet and moody. I've even heard some people say that there's a certain mystery or darkness about me. I'm not that way. I'm just really into what I do.
quotes.author: Faith Evans

quotes.text: I've learned to try to sustain myself by holding on to the integrity of who I am. I'm not talking big diva. I'm quiet. I'm shy. And I became stronger when I stopped trying to be the person they wanted me to be.
quotes.author: Crystal Waters

quotes.text: Since our society equates happiness with youth, we often assume that sorrow, quiet desperation, and hopelessness go hand in hand with getting older. They don't. Emotional pain or numbness are symptoms of living the wrong life, not a long life.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.text: I was not athletically inclined. I was very quiet, introverted, non-confrontational. My three older brothers were athletes - basketball, football - but I was kind of a momma's boy. Then one day, my brother Roger encouraged me to go to the boxing gym with him. I tried the gloves on, and it just felt so natural.
quotes.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quotes.text: Solitude is very different from a 'time-out' from our busy lives. Solitude is the very ground from which community grows. Whenever we pray alone, study, read, write, or simply spend quiet time away from the places where we interact with each other directly, we are potentially opened for a deeper intimacy with each other.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: I like solitude. I like the anomalous life. I like a quiet life.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.text: I'm just kind of odd. There are dark forces in the world, and if you pay attention to what's going on around you, you end up incorporating it into the storytelling. Maybe it's some aspect of myself that's coming through that people are seeing, that I am in fact a quiet psycho.
quotes.author: Michael Shannon

quotes.text: There are three reasons why I live in Scotland. First, I like silence, and you have to be a millionaire to buy silence in Italy. Second, I like cold weather. Third, in Italy I have too many relatives and know too many people, so I never get a quiet time.
quotes.author: Gian Carlo Menotti

quotes.text: I'm not a phony-friendly guy and I'm usually very quiet and not a big laugher, so some people might take that for rudeness and being mean. If anyone ever got that impression, I apologize. I love all my fans and really appreciate all their support!
quotes.author: Jesse McCartney

quotes.text: I don't know about other writers, but for myself, to write I must be relatively quiet - it's very difficult to write with the telephone and the doorbell ringing and conversation going on; I'm not that good a writer to write through all that!
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.text: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: Happy, happy Christmas, that can win us back to the delusions of our childhood days, recall to the old man the pleasures of his youth, and transport the traveler back to his own fireside and quiet home!
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: My faith is an important part of my life and over the years I've learnt that it takes a proud man to say he doesn't need anything. It has been a quiet strength and a backbone through a lot of difficult times.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.text: I've owned 41 airplanes. A few of them would talk with me. This little seaplane, though, we've had long conversations in flight. There's a spirit in anything, I think, into which we weave our soul. Not many pilots talk about it, but they think about it in the quiet dark of a night flight.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: Faith is salted and peppered through everything at Christmas. And I love at least one night by the Christmas tree to sing and feel the quiet holiness of that time that's set apart to celebrate love, friendship, and God's gift of the Christ child.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.text: Dogs are wise. They crawl away into a quiet corner and lick their wounds and do not rejoin the world until they are whole once more.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.text: I have this idea of myself as this quiet, observant, thoughtful child, which my parents roundly contradict. They claim that I was loud and bossy and dancing all the time.
quotes.author: Carrie Coon

quotes.text: We need quiet time to examine our lives openly and honestly - spending quiet time alone gives your mind an opportunity to renew itself and create order.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.text: Because I'm shy and a bit quiet, I think people assume I'm an elegant person.
quotes.author: Jack Jones

quotes.text: I do believe that most men live lives of quiet desperation. For despair, optimism is the only practical solution. Hope is practical. Because eliminate that and it's pretty scary. Hope at least gives you the option of living.
quotes.author: Harry Nilsson

quotes.text: What should I have known or written had I been a quiet, mercantile politician or a lord in waiting? A man must travel, and turmoil, or there is no existence.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: I am an example of what is possible when girls from the very beginning of their lives are loved and nurtured by people around them. I was surrounded by extraordinary women in my life who taught me about quiet strength and dignity.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: I was quiet, a loner. I was one of those children where, if you put me in a room and gave me some crayons and a pencils, you wouldn't hear from me for nine straight hours. And I was always drawing racing cars and rockets and spaceships and planes, things that were very fast that would take me away.
quotes.author: Gary Oldman

quotes.text: The good and the wise lead quiet lives.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: Censorship is saying: 'I'm the one who says the last sentence. Whatever you say, the conclusion is mine.' But the internet is like a tree that is growing. The people will always have the last word - even if someone has a very weak, quiet voice. Such power will collapse because of a whisper.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.text: Music expresses that which cannot be said and on which it is impossible to be silent.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Painting is silent poetry, and poetry is painting that speaks.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.text: There are nights when the wolves are silent and only the moon howls.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: All tyranny needs to gain a foothold is for people of good conscience to remain silent.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.text: If the freedom of speech is taken away then dumb and silent we may be led, like sheep to the slaughter.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak out and remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: What greater thing is there for two human souls than to feel that they are joined - to strengthen each other - to be at one with each other in silent unspeakable memories.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: I believe there are more instances of the abridgement of freedom of the people by gradual and silent encroachments by those in power than by violent and sudden usurpations.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.text: The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing... not healing, not curing... that is a friend who cares.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: He that has eyes to see and ears to hear may convince himself that no mortal can keep a secret. If his lips are silent, he chatters with his fingertips; betrayal oozes out of him at every pore.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.text: After one has been in prison, it is the small things that one appreciates: being able to take a walk whenever one wants, going into a shop and buying a newspaper, speaking or choosing to remain silent. The simple act of being able to control one's person.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: I try to be as honest about what I see and to speak rather than be silent, especially if it means I can save lives, or serve humanity.
quotes.author: Sandra Cisneros

quotes.text: The moment we begin to fear the opinions of others and hesitate to tell the truth that is in us, and from motives of policy are silent when we should speak, the divine floods of light and life no longer flow into our souls.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.text: Ten people who speak make more noise than ten thousand who are silent.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: We need to ditch the idea that there is any value in the strong and silent man being in any way attractive. Being silent isn't being strong, it's being a victim.
quotes.author: Jane Powell

quotes.text: You see, my brethren, my heart is full; I could almost say it is too big to speak, and yet too big to be silent, without dropping a word to you.
quotes.author: George Whitefield

quotes.text: Use what talents you possess; the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.text: Wise men, when in doubt whether to speak or to keep quiet, give themselves the benefit of the doubt, and remain silent.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: This is a universal, unique movie, it has potential to cross barriers. But we never thought about that on set, when we were doing the film. We knew that in making a silent movie, we were doing something a little bit under the wire, a bit interdit. It's a pastiche, but for the French taste, you would have thought.
quotes.author: Jean Dujardin

quotes.text: The beauty we love is very silent. It smiles softly to itself, but never speaks.
quotes.author: Richard Le Gallienne

quotes.text: Silent pictures show us how we lived and what our attitudes were. And as an art form, they can be wonderfully entertaining and often inspirational.
quotes.author: Kevin Brownlow

quotes.text: I had the right to remain silent... but I didn't have the ability.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.text: The world would be happier if men had the same capacity to be silent that they have to speak.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.text: One learns in life to keep silent and draw one's own confusions.
quotes.author: Cornelia Otis Skinner

quotes.text: As a model, I didn't have an identity; I was a chameleon, a silent actress. I was an amorphous thing. I wasn't full of personality, I was full of solitude and solemnity. I wasn't a cover-girl type.
quotes.author: Carmen Dell'Orefice

quotes.text: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Sometimes one creates a dynamic impression by saying something, and sometimes one creates as significant an impression by remaining silent.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The eyes those silent tongues of love.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.text: A few minutes ago every tree was excited, bowing to the roaring storm, waving, swirling, tossing their branches in glorious enthusiasm like worship. But though to the outer ear these trees are now silent, their songs never cease.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: Whereof one cannot speak, thereof one must be silent.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.text: I always loved silent movies. I was not a specialist, but I loved them. And when I started directing, I became really fascinated by the format - how it works, the device of the silent movie. It's not the same form of expression as a talkie. The lack of sounds makes you participate in the storytelling.
quotes.author: Michel Hazanavicius

quotes.text: The man as he converses is the lover; silent, he is the husband.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: I often regret that I have spoken; never that I have been silent.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.text: When you work you are a flute through whose heart the whispering of the hours turns to music. Which of you would be a reed, dumb and silent, when all else sings together in unison?
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Marching thus at night, a battalion is doubly impressive. The silent monster is full of restrained power; resolute in its onward sweep, impervious to danger, it looks a menacing engine of destruction, steady to its goal, and certain of its mission.
quotes.author: Patrick MacGill

quotes.text: I've often stood silent at a party for hours listening to my movie idols turn into dull and little people.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: As far as I'm concerned, I prefer silent vice to ostentatious virtue.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: 100 years ago, movies were black-and-white, silent, and 16 frames a second. So 100 years from now, what are they going to be?
quotes.author: Peter Jackson

quotes.text: Better remain silent, better not even think, if you are not prepared to act.
quotes.author: Annie Besant

quotes.text: All tyranny, bigotry, aggression, and cruelty are wrong, and whenever we see it, we must never be silent.
quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

quotes.text: It is better wither to be silent, or to say things of more value than silence. Sooner throw a pearl at hazard than an idle or useless word; and do not say a little in many words, but a great deal in a few.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.text: I never have tantrums. If anything makes me mad, I'm silent. If I'm not talking, leave me alone.
quotes.author: Pat Nixon

quotes.text: A woman's place in public is to sit beside her husband, be silent, and be sure her hat is on straight.
quotes.author: Bess Truman

quotes.text: Journalism can never be silent: that is its greatest virtue and its greatest fault. It must speak, and speak immediately, while the echoes of wonder, the claims of triumph and the signs of horror are still in the air.
quotes.author: Henry Anatole Grunwald

quotes.text: Everybody is a political person, whether you say something or you are silent. A political attitude is not whether you go to parliament; it's how you deal with your life, with your surroundings.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: When we tell little white lies, we become progressively color-blind. It is better to remain silent than to mislead.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.text: Men scream and go crazy in the gym. I'm a silent workout partner, but when my adrenaline gets up, I talk trash.
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.text: I was silent as a child, and silenced as a young woman; I am taking my lumps and bumps for being a big mouth, now, but usually from those whose opinion I don't respect.
quotes.author: Sandra Cisneros

quotes.text: Not everyone has been a bully or the victim of bullies, but everyone has seen bullying, and seeing it, has responded to it by joining in or objecting, by laughing or keeping silent, by feeling disgusted or feeling interested.
quotes.author: Octavia E. Butler

quotes.text: Deprived of the opportunity to judge one another by the cars we drive, New Yorkers, thrown together daily on mass transit, form silent opinions based on our choices of subway reading. Just by glimpsing the cover staring back at us, we can reach the pinnacle of carnal desire or the depths of hatred. Soul mate or mortal enemy.
quotes.author: David Rakoff

quotes.text: Thine eyes are springs in whose serene And silent waters heaven is seen. Their lashes are the herbs that look On their young figures in the brook.
quotes.author: William C. Bryant

quotes.text: The deeper the blue becomes, the more strongly it calls man towards the infinite, awakening in him a desire for the pure and, finally, for the supernatural... The brighter it becomes, the more it loses its sound, until it turns into silent stillness and becomes white.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.text: I close my eyes, then I drift away, into the magic night I softly say. A silent prayer, like dreamers do, then I fall asleep to dream my dreams of you.
quotes.author: Roy Orbison

quotes.text: Let us be silent, that we may hear the whispers of the gods.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Since many of you do not belong to the Catholic Church and others are non-believers, from the bottom of my heart I give this silent blessing to each and every one of you, respecting the conscience of each one of you but knowing that each one of you is a child of God.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: Blue, green, grey, white, or black; smooth, ruffled, or mountainous; that ocean is not silent.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.text: This love is silent.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: Be slow to speak, and only after having first listened quietly, so that you may understand the meaning, leanings, and wishes of those who do speak. Thus you will better know when to speak and when to be silent.
quotes.author: Saint Ignatius

quotes.text: A dog barks when his master is attacked. I would be a coward if I saw that God's truth is attacked and yet would remain silent.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.text: Books are the carriers of civilization. Without books, history is silent, literature dumb, science crippled, thought and speculation at a standstill.
quotes.author: Barbara Tuchman

quotes.text: We call that person who has lost his father, an orphan; and a widower that man who has lost his wife. But that man who has known the immense unhappiness of losing a friend, by what name do we call him? Here every language is silent and holds its peace in impotence.
quotes.author: Joseph Roux

quotes.text: I have many times asked myself whether there can be more potent advocates of peace upon earth through the years to come than this massed multitude of silent witnesses to the desolation of war.
quotes.author: King George V

quotes.text: Tears are the silent language of grief.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: When we speak we are afraid our words will not be heard or welcomed. But when we are silent, we are still afraid. So it is better to speak.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.text: The silent killer of all great men and women of achievement - particularly men, I don't know why, maybe it's the testosterone - I think it's narcissism. Even more than hubris. And for women, too. Narcissism is the killer.
quotes.author: James Woods

quotes.text: I like a guy who's sarcastic, serious, sensitive - even just silent. But you have to do it at the right times. That's sexy. To me, it reflects intelligence.
quotes.author: Moran Atias

quotes.text: The career of a sage is of two kinds: He is either honored by all in the world, Like a flower waving its head, Or else he disappears into the silent forest.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Modeling is really silent acting.
quotes.author: Arizona Muse

quotes.text: Some of the greatest battles will be fought within the silent chambers of your own soul.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.text: Listen! Clam up your mouth and be silent like an oyster shell, for that tongue of yours is the enemy of the soul, my friend. When the lips are silent, the heart has a hundred tongues.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The worst thing one can do is not to try, to be aware of what one wants and not give in to it, to spend years in silent hurt wondering if something could have materialized - never knowing.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Use those talents you have. You will make it. You will give joy to the world. Take this tip from nature: The woods would be a very silent place if no birds sang except those who sang best.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.text: Many Christians have so busied themselves with programs and activities that they no longer know how to be silent and meditate on God's word or recognize the mysteries that are in the Person of Christ.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.text: I came to poetry through the urgent need to denounce injustice, exploitation, humiliation. I know that's not enough to change the world. But to remain silent would have been a kind of intolerable complicity.
quotes.author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quotes.text: We have treated our most serious adversaries, such as Iran and North Korea, in the most juvenile manner - by giving them the silent treatment. In so doing, we have weakened, not strengthened, our bargaining position and our leadership.
quotes.author: Theodore C. Sorensen

quotes.text: Biological diversity is messy. It walks, it crawls, it swims, it swoops, it buzzes. But extinction is silent, and it has no voice other than our own.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.text: It would have been more comfortable to remain silent.
quotes.author: Anita Hill

quotes.text: Unless and until our society recognizes cyber bullying for what it is, the suffering of thousands of silent victims will continue.
quotes.author: Anna Maria Chavez

quotes.text: Too often the strong, silent man is silent only because he does not know what to say, and is reputed strong only because he has remained silent.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The woods are lovely, dark and deep. But I have promises to keep, and miles to go before I sleep.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: We are at our very best, and we are happiest, when we are fully engaged in work we enjoy on the journey toward the goal we've established for ourselves. It gives meaning to our time off and comfort to our sleep. It makes everything else in life so wonderful, so worthwhile.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.text: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together.
quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

quotes.text: Sleep is the best meditation.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Life is something to do when you can't get to sleep.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.text: I tremble for my country when I reflect that God is just; that his justice cannot sleep forever.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Great occasions do not make heroes or cowards; they simply unveil them to the eyes of men. Silently and imperceptibly, as we wake or sleep, we grow strong or weak; and at last some crisis shows what we have become.
quotes.author: Brooke Foss Westcott

quotes.text: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.text: Once you wake up and smell the coffee, it's hard to go back to sleep.
quotes.author: Fran Drescher

quotes.text: Sorrow can be alleviated by good sleep, a bath and a glass of wine.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.text: When I am traveling in a carriage, or walking after a good meal, or during the night when I cannot sleep; it is on such occasions that ideas flow best and most abundantly.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.text: I like to embrace natural beauty. I try to get at least 8 hours of sleep, drinking a lot of water and exercising.
quotes.author: Tia Mowry

quotes.text: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: We must never forget why we have, and why we need our military. Our armed forces exist solely to ensure our nation is safe, so that each and every one of us can sleep soundly at night, knowing we have 'guardians at the gate.'
quotes.author: Allen West

quotes.text: Our obsession with speed, with cramming more and more into every minute, means that we race through life instead of actually living it. Our health, diet and relationships suffer. We make mistakes at work. We struggle to relax, to enjoy the moment, even to get a decent night's sleep.
quotes.author: Carl Honore

quotes.text: That we are not much sicker and much madder than we are is due exclusively to that most blessed and blessing of all natural graces, sleep.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: I am accustomed to sleep and in my dreams to imagine the same things that lunatics imagine when awake.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.text: Metaphorically speaking, of course, if I put a problem behind my pillow and fall asleep, very often because my brain went to sleep with that idea or the problem alive, very often in the middle of the night I wake up, and I wake up with a solution or with a direction of solution.
quotes.author: Philippe Petit

quotes.text: If you have difficulty sleeping or are not getting enough sleep or sleep of good quality, you need to learn the basics of sleep hygiene, make appropriate changes, and possibly consult a sleep expert.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.text: From plants that wake when others sleep, from timid jasmine buds that keep their odour to themselves all day, but when the sunlight dies away let the delicious secret out to every breeze that roams about.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.text: I'm going to keep it real gully with you; the first two months, I wanted to give him back. I expected someone to come and save me because after you have the baby, nobody cares about you anymore. Nobody cares if you sleep, nobody cares if you eat. It's just you and this all-consuming thingy!
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.text: The poor have to labour in the face of the majestic equality of the law, which forbids the rich as well as the poor to sleep under bridges, to beg in the streets, and to steal bread.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: Men who are unhappy, like men who sleep badly, are always proud of the fact.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.text: Some struggle with medical issues - like insomnia - that make sleep hard. But for many of us, the quantity and quality of sleep come down to a matter of choice. Still, only a few enterprising economists have looked closely at this, and generally, those have assumed that we choose our hours of sleep optimally.
quotes.author: Sendhil Mullainathan

quotes.text: I believe in a higher power and I believe in good and bad, right and wrong. You sleep in the bed you make.
quotes.author: Leif Garrett

quotes.text: Cats have it all - admiration, an endless sleep, and company only when they want it.
quotes.author: Rod McKuen

quotes.text: I'm going to sleep well tonight knowing that I made the right decision.
quotes.author: George Ryan

quotes.text: Depending upon my activities, I sleep between five and ten hours every night. I sleep in an extra-wide single bed, and I use only one heavy down comforter over me, summer or winter. I have never been able to wear pajamas or creepy nightgowns; they disturb my sleep.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: Yes, I've kissed a lot of guys. I like to kiss, but that's it. I don't go home with anyone. I sleep with my animals, like my baby monkey, Brigitte Bardot.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: If I had a Salvador Dali painting, I would cuddle it to sleep.
quotes.author: Mac Miller

quotes.text: Ali's got a left, Ali's got a right - when he knocks you down, you'll sleep for the night; and when you lie on the floor and the ref counts to ten, hope and pray that you never meet me again.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Now I believe that lovers should be draped in flowers and laid entwined together on a bed of clover and left there to sleep, left there to dream of their happiness.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.text: The lion and the calf shall lie down together but the calf won't get much sleep.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: I used to take Sharpies and draw on my pillowcases, and then go to sleep on them and wake up with red marker from the drool all on my face.
quotes.author: Kid Cudi

quotes.text: The man who says his evening prayer is a captain posting his sentinels. He can sleep.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: I really try to get eight hours of sleep, and I really try not to go out after a Tuesday or Friday night show because I know I have a two-show day the following day.
quotes.author: Kate Levering

quotes.text: One of my modeling bookers told me that the most important thing is to try to be vigilant about taking care of yourself. Get sleep, don't be afraid to trim your hair even if you're trying to grow it out, don't bite your fingernails, and stay in shape. A lot of it is in the little things.
quotes.author: Julia Jones

quotes.text: In my youth, daydreaming nurtured me, provided a safe haven. I'd sleep for twelve hours and even when awake escape to the safe place in my mind.
quotes.author: Sandra Cisneros

quotes.text: I learned to love myself, because I sleep with myself every night and I wake up with myself every morning, and if I don't like myself, there's no reason to even live the life.
quotes.author: Gabourey Sidibe

quotes.text: When my parents were getting divorced, I just said to myself, 'Go to sleep, and tomorrow you can go skiing.' I cried myself to sleep, and in the morning I was up on the mountain, and I was good.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: Honestly, I just try to live right, get enough sleep, and drink a lot of water. I do drink a lot of water; I do live by that. And just eating good clean food... I do love all of it. But I do definitely try to eat better organic food.
quotes.author: Keshia Knight Pulliam

quotes.text: Sleep after toil, port after stormy seas, Ease after war, death after life does greatly please.
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.text: Being a mother gives you an incredible feeling of empowerment, you think if I can go through such pain and that level of sleep and still operate and not be grumpy you can do anything. It can be quite scary, you can't function your brain, forget your vocabulary.
quotes.author: Anna Friel

quotes.text: Beauty, pleasure, freedom and plenty of sleep: these are the hallmarks of a successful idler's break. Travel should not be hard work.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.text: Living is a sickness to which sleep provides relief every sixteen hours. It's a palliative. The remedy is death.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.text: I'd love to hold a koala. They sleep 22 hours a day, eat eucalyptus leaves and just hang out. I want to spend some time with that guy.
quotes.author: Milo Ventimiglia

quotes.text: Science, like art, religion, commerce, warfare, and even sleep, is based on presuppositions.
quotes.author: Gregory Bateson

quotes.text: I have very vivid dreams - almost always action-adventure. I'm often on the run. I've always had dreams. When I was little, I'd go to sleep with my head on my hands, which were in fists like I was looking through a camera. I felt like sleep was the movies - just drifting off to the movies.
quotes.author: Sarah Silverman

quotes.text: I was proud of working 18 hours a day and sleeping three hours a night. It's something now that has turned into a problem for me: not being able to sleep... having insomnia.
quotes.author: Sean Combs

quotes.text: October of 2011, Occupy protestors descended upon McPherson Square, and they decided to stay. Despite the clear language of the law, these protestors camped at McPherson Square with the definition of camping being sleeping or preparing to sleep.
quotes.author: Trey Gowdy

quotes.text: 'The Exorcist' is absolutely my favorite horror film, and I watched it when I was, like, seven years old with my mother for the first time. I don't know why my mom let me watch that. I couldn't go to the bathroom by myself. I couldn't go upstairs by myself. I couldn't sleep.
quotes.author: Odette Annable

quotes.text: Remember, you must not sleep at the Seder. If you do, Elijah the Prophet will come with a bag on his shoulders. On the two first nights of Passover, Elijah the Prophet goes about looking for those who have fallen asleep at the Seder, and takes them away in his bag.
quotes.author: Sholom Aleichem

quotes.text: The repose of sleep refreshes only the body. It rarely sets the soul at rest. The repose of the night does not belong to us. It is not the possession of our being. Sleep opens within us an inn for phantoms. In the morning we must sweep out the shadows.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.text: In bed my real love has always been the sleep that rescued me by allowing me to dream.
quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello

quotes.text: I love ghost stories but I can't really watch them, especially not by myself because then I can't sleep.
quotes.author: Laurie Holden

quotes.text: Space and light and order. Those are the things that men need just as much as they need bread or a place to sleep.
quotes.author: Le Corbusier

quotes.text: A mother's arms are made of tenderness and children sleep soundly in them.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: For sleep, riches and health to be truly enjoyed, they must be interrupted.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.text: I think I'm a narcoleptic. I could sleep on a railway track with a train running over me, in-between the rails.
quotes.author: Dan Aykroyd

quotes.text: Though sleep is called our best friend, it is a friend who often keeps us waiting!
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.text: When I have an argument with someone, even with someone I am not very close with, I can't sleep at night thinking about it. It's terrible. But I still manage speak out frankly because I have also been gifted with the ability to read people. I can sense when they start to get irritated with me, and then, I shift.
quotes.author: Hans Rosling

quotes.text: We are such stuff as dreams are made on; and our little life is rounded with a sleep.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: It is a common experience that a problem difficult at night is resolved in the morning after the committee of sleep has worked on it.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.text: Marriage is an alliance entered into by a man who can't sleep with the window shut, and a woman who can't sleep with the window open.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: He who learns must suffer. And even in our sleep pain that cannot forget falls drop by drop upon the heart, and in our own despair, against our will, comes wisdom to us by the awful grace of God.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.text: It's tough to go to sleep at night, and I wake up after five hours because I feel like I'm wasting time. I just sit up at night and think about what I can do next.
quotes.author: Dave Grohl

quotes.text: Sleep is when all the unsorted stuff comes flying out as from a dustbin upset in a high wind.
quotes.author: William Golding

quotes.text: Those who have compared our life to a dream were right... we were sleeping wake, and waking sleep.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.text: If I was to go to sleep before midnight, I would feel weird about myself, like I wasted a day. My most productive hours are between midnight and five.
quotes.author: J. Cole

quotes.text: I get very little sleep. But I try to stay constantly busy. My fear is that if I stop working I'll, like, die. So throughout my life I've always tried to remain busy, and I sort of know no other way. I think if my heart rate slowed it would affect my constitution, strangely. I've been trained to do that.
quotes.author: Matthew Gray Gubler

quotes.text: I was warmed by the sun, rocked by the winds and sheltered by the trees as other Indian babes. I was living peaceably when people began to speak bad of me. Now I can eat well, sleep well and be glad. I can go everywhere with a good feeling.
quotes.author: Geronimo

quotes.text: I liked comedy as a kid. When I was a kid, I'd go to sleep to, like, Bill Cosby albums every night. I'd listen to 'Bill Cosby Is A Very Funny Fellow... Right!' and 'Wonderfulness,' which are two of his most famous albums. Then the next night, I'd flip them over, 'cause it was the old stackable turntable.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.text: Your body tells you what it needs, and if you sleep past your alarm on a Saturday morning, it's probably because you need the sleep.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.text: A man who is eating or lying with his wife or preparing to go to sleep in humility, thankfulness and temperance, is, by Christian standards, in an infinitely higher state than one who is listening to Bach or reading Plato in a state of pride.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: We engineered activity out of our lives in the name of convenience. We created foods that put fried, fatty, sweet, and salty ahead of fresh, natural, and healthy. We quickly sacrifice sleep to work longer hours in pursuit of the American Dream. Even when we do these things with good intentions, they have life-threatening consequences.
quotes.author: Tom Rath

quotes.text: Humor is the first of the gifts to perish in a foreign tongue.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: I perceived how that it was impossible to establish the lay people in any truth except the Scripture were plainly laid before their eyes in their mother tongue.
quotes.author: William Tyndale

quotes.text: Why does the lizard stick his tongue out? The lizard sticks its tongue out because that's the way its listening and looking and tasting its environment. It's its means of appreciating what's in front of it.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.text: This is courtship all the world over - the man all tongue; the woman all ears.
quotes.author: Emily Murphy

quotes.text: A woodland in full color is awesome as a forest fire, in magnitude at least, but a single tree is like a dancing tongue of flame to warm the heart.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.text: If I hear an interesting turn of phrase on TV, I'll repeat it back - I just like to roll it around on my tongue. The same goes for dialog: I'll either speak it aloud or whisper it. I definitely sit in front of my computer and mutter. People have mentioned it.
quotes.author: Terence Winter

quotes.text: I think English is a fantastic, rich and musical language, but of course your mother tongue is the most important for an actor.
quotes.author: Max von Sydow

quotes.text: I'm forbidden fruit. Once you go to certain households, mommy doesn't want you to see that dirty man who sticks his tongue out and spits out blood and all that stuff.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.text: I was a really bad teenager and I got my tongue pierced. I don't even remember where I did it, but it was under very surreptitious circumstances.
quotes.author: Lucy Alibar

quotes.text: My mother tongue, Mende, is very expressive, very figurative, and when I write, I always struggle to find the English equivalent of things that I really want to say in Mende. For example, in Mende, you wouldn't say 'night came suddenly'; you would say 'the sky rolled over and changed its sides.'
quotes.author: Ishmael Beah

quotes.text: The sweetest noise on earth, a woman's tongue; A string which hath no discord.
quotes.author: Bryan Procter

quotes.text: 'Twas but my tongue, 'twas not my soul that swore.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: I'll keep peace at all cost, even if I choke to death on my tongue.
quotes.author: Paula Deen

quotes.text: This universe can very well be expressed in words and syllables which are not those of one's mother tongue.
quotes.author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quotes.text: I do fear for the generations of people who came of age thinking that pop-punk is what punk is, and that all the rebellion you need is just to stick your tongue out in the mirror every once in a while.
quotes.author: Jello Biafra

quotes.text: For us Indians, I don't think English can ever exude that magic of emotions which our mother tongue can.
quotes.author: Kailash Kher

quotes.text: Let your tongue speak what your heart thinks.
quotes.author: Davy Crockett

quotes.text: Welsh is my mother tongue, and my children speak it. If you come and live in this community you'll work out pretty quickly that it's beneficial to learn the language, because if you're going to the pub or a cafe you need to be a part of the local life.
quotes.author: Bryn Terfel

quotes.text: What could be more lonely than to be enveloped in silence, to be the last of your people to speak your native tongue, to have no way to pass on the wisdom of the elders, to anticipate the promise of the children. This tragic fate is indeed the plight of someone somewhere roughly every two weeks.
quotes.author: Wade Davis

quotes.text: I was going to Miami quite a lot at the time, speaking a lot of Spanish with my friends from Cuba - Lana Del Rey reminded us of the glamour of the seaside. It sounded gorgeous coming off the tip of the tongue.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey
