quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.text: Childhood vaccines are one of the great triumphs of modern medicine. Indeed, parents whose children are vaccinated no longer have to worry about their child's death or disability from whooping cough, polio, diphtheria, hepatitis, or a host of other infections.
quotes.author: Ezekiel Emanuel

quotes.text: Google the name Prometheus, and see how often it has been given to innovations in many different fields, notably science, medicine and space exploration. The fire he stole can be seen, too, as the spark generating all artistic creativity.
quotes.author: Neil MacGregor

quotes.text: For many people, managing pain involves using prescription medicine in combination with complementary techniques like physical therapy, acupuncture, yoga and massage. I appreciate this because I truly believe medical care should address the person as a whole - their mind, body, and spirit.
quotes.author: Naomi Judd

quotes.text: Sometimes your medicine bottle has on it, 'Shake well before using.' That is what God has to do with some of His people. He has to shake them well before they are ever usable.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.text: I done wrestled with an alligator, I done tussled with a whale; handcuffed lightning, thrown thunder in jail; only last week, I murdered a rock, injured a stone, hospitalised a brick; I'm so mean I make medicine sick.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: I should be a postage stamp, because that's the only way I'll ever get licked. I'm beautiful. I'm fast. I'm so mean I make medicine sick. I can't possibly be beat.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.text: I will say that there is an inordinate amount of medicine in my novels, especially the first one. There are a lot of medical things that happen. A hip fracture, three different kinds of lung cancer, pneumonia, blood poisoning, and so on.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.text: We're all moving at such a high rate that we have to grab the frozen dinners and the McDonald's. We can't make it a way of life - we have to get back to real, simple, clean good foods. It will save our lives on so many levels; not just spina bifida, but obesity, diabetes, everything. Food is our medicine.
quotes.author: Nicole Ari Parker

quotes.text: I think we learn from medicine everywhere that it is, at its heart, a human endeavor, requiring good science but also a limitless curiosity and interest in your fellow human being, and that the physician-patient relationship is key; all else follows from it.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.text: Some experts say we are moving back to the pre-antibiotic era. No. This will be a post-antibiotic era. In terms of new replacement antibiotics, the pipeline is virtually dry. A post-antibiotic era means, in effect, an end to modern medicine as we know it. Things as common as strep throat or a child's scratched knee could once again kill.
quotes.author: Margaret Chan

quotes.text: Developments in medical technology have long been confined to procedural or pharmaceutical advances, while neglecting a most basic and essential component of medicine: patient information management.
quotes.author: John Doolittle

quotes.text: A cheerful frame of mind, reinforced by relaxation... is the medicine that puts all ghosts of fear on the run.
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.text: I'm a big believer in what's called personalized medicine, which refers to customizing your health care to your specific needs based on your physiology, genetics, value system and unique conditions.
quotes.author: David Agus

quotes.text: Always laugh when you can. It is cheap medicine.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: The physicians of one class feel the patients and go away, merely prescribing medicine. As they leave the room they simply ask the patient to take the medicine. They are the poorest class of physicians.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.text: Medicine heals doubts as well as diseases.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.text: Lost wealth may be replaced by industry, lost knowledge by study, lost health by temperance or medicine, but lost time is gone forever.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.text: Modern medicine is a negation of health. It isn't organized to serve human health, but only itself, as an institution. It makes more people sick than it heals.
quotes.author: Ivan Illich

quotes.text: The rich man's dog gets more in the way of vaccination, medicine and medical care than do the workers upon whom the rich man's wealth is built.
quotes.author: Samora Machel

quotes.text: We know from our clinical experience in the practice of medicine that in diagnosis, prognosis, and treatment, the individual and his background of heredity are just as important, if not more so, as the disease itself.
quotes.author: Paul Dudley White

quotes.text: Medicine is a science of uncertainty and an art of probability.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.text: For people who don't know me, I practiced medicine in Casper, Wyoming for 25 years as an orthopedic surgeon, taking care of families in Wyoming. I've been chief of staff of the largest hospital in our state. My wife is a breast cancer survivor.
quotes.author: John Barrasso

quotes.text: Just being a Negro doesn't qualify you to understand the race situation any more than being sick makes you an expert on medicine.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.text: What is learned on the athletic field is not forgotten, nor are the lessons of character that are forged there ever lost. Consider the contributions in the field of public life, business, law, medicine, and the military of those who actively participated in athletics.
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.text: The idea would be in my mind - and I know it sounds strange - is that the most important advances in medicine would be made not by new knowledge in molecular biology, because that's exceeding what we can even use. It'll be made by mathematicians, physicists, computer scientists, figuring out a way to get all that information together.
quotes.author: Patrick Soon-Shiong

quotes.text: Genetic modification has many different areas, for example in medicine, and Britain is at the leading edge of this new technology. I don't know, but people tell me, it could indeed by the leading science of the 21st century. All I say to people is: 'Just keep an open mind and let us proceed according to genuine scientific evidence.'
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.text: There are, in truth, no specialties in medicine, since to know fully many of the most important diseases a man must be familiar with their manifestations in many organs.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.text: One of the first duties of the physician is to educate the masses not to take medicine.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.text: The first duties of the physician is to educate the masses not to take medicine.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.text: Medicine rests upon four pillars - philosophy, astronomy, alchemy, and ethics.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.text: Physician-assisted suicide and euthanasia have been profound ethical issues confronting doctors since the birth of Western medicine, more than 2,000 years ago.
quotes.author: Ezekiel Emanuel

quotes.text: The universal medicine for the Soul is the Supreme Reason and Absolute Justice; for the mind, mathematical and practical Truth; for the body, the Quintessence, a combination of light and gold.
quotes.author: Albert Pike

quotes.text: Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: There are very few people who are going to look into the mirror and say, 'That person I see is a savage monster;' instead, they make up some construction that justifies what they do.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: I love horror comedies, and I love horror movies. In particular, I love horror movies from the '80s that have practical monsters in them. They're not just slasher movies with people going to kill people in people's houses. Although I do like 'The Last House on the Left,' and things like that, I do like these ridiculous monster movies.
quotes.author: Ken Marino

quotes.text: To attempt the destruction of our passions is the height of folly. What a noble aim is that of the zealot who tortures himself like a madman in order to desire nothing, love nothing, feel nothing, and who, if he succeeded, would end up a complete monster!
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.text: Man as an individual is a genius. But men in the mass form the headless monster, a great, brutish idiot that goes where prodded.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.text: Hiroshima does not look like a bombed city. It looks as if a monster steamroller had passed over it and squashed it out of existence.
quotes.author: Wilfred Burchett

quotes.text: I've got a Range Rover and a little Mercedes. I normally drive my Range Rover because I feel like a monster in it. Nobody messes with me.
quotes.author: Emma Bunton

quotes.text: Gordon Ramsay, the only chef in London honored with three stars by the 'Guide Michelin,' is not a monster.
quotes.author: Bill Buford

quotes.text: Marriage must incessantly contend with a monster that devours everything: familiarity.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: He who fights with monsters might take care lest he thereby become a monster. Is not life a hundred times too short for us to bore ourselves?
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: 'Alien' is a C film elevated to an A film, honestly, by it being well done and a great monster. If it hadn't had that great monster, even with a wonderful cast, it wouldn't have been as good, I don't think.
quotes.author: Ridley Scott

quotes.text: One thing I would like to see in Vancouver and Canada is something similar to the PayPal mafia. They were all early employees of PayPal. They all had monster exits with PayPal, and they were able to take their winnings and form a syndicate that co-invests.
quotes.author: Ryan Holmes

quotes.text: The first monster you have to scare the audience with is yourself.
quotes.author: Wes Craven

quotes.text: Marching thus at night, a battalion is doubly impressive. The silent monster is full of restrained power; resolute in its onward sweep, impervious to danger, it looks a menacing engine of destruction, steady to its goal, and certain of its mission.
quotes.author: Patrick MacGill

quotes.text: I have never seen a greater monster or miracle in the world than myself.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.text: The piano is a monster that screams when you touch its teeth.
quotes.author: Andres Segovia

quotes.text: You have to fight the green monster with your mind, not your fists.
quotes.author: Matthew Broderick

quotes.text: I think you have to know who you are. Get to know the monster that lives in your soul, dive deep into your soul and explore it.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.text: Obscenity, which is ever blasphemy against the divine beauty in life, is a monster for which the corruption of society forever brings forth new food, which it devours in secret.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.text: Your memory is a monster; you forget - it doesn't. It simply files things away. It keeps things for you, or hides things from you - and summons them to your recall with a will of its own. You think you have a memory; but it has you!
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.text: I'm just a bleeping maniac in straight clothing. There's no reason to dress my monster up.
quotes.author: Glenn Frey

quotes.text: You know honestly I think there's a Dracula, a Wolf Man, and a Frankenstein's Monster in all of us. They are sides of our own character so that's why I think we can relate to them in terms of a 'I know how that feels' kind of thing.
quotes.author: Richard Roxburgh

quotes.text: The monster was the best friend I ever had.
quotes.author: Boris Karloff

quotes.text: We cannot, of course, disprove God, just as we can't disprove Thor, fairies, leprechauns and the Flying Spaghetti Monster.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.text: A lot of life is dealing with your curse, dealing with the cards you were given that aren't so nice. Does it make you into a monster, or can you temper it in some way, or accept it and go in some other direction?
quotes.author: Wes Craven

quotes.text: The artist must bow to the monster of his own imagination.
quotes.author: Richard Wright

quotes.text: I like something where I can really use my imagination and be an active participant in the construction of the monster and usually that's in the world of the supernatural or the world of the fantastic, so that's why those kinds of stories about demons and the supernatural appeal to me or maybe I'm really interested in that subject.
quotes.author: Sam Raimi

quotes.text: I'm glad I brought this course, this monster, to its knees.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.text: It will be the mother of all telescopes, and you can bet it will do for astronomy what genome sequencing is doing for biology. The clumsy, if utilitarian, name of this mirrored monster is Large Synoptic Survey Telescope, or LSST. You can't use it yet, but a peak in the Chilean Andes has been decapitated to provide a level spot for placement.
quotes.author: Seth Shostak

quotes.text: Richard Nixon was a criminally insane Monster - Bill Clinton is a black-hearted Swine of a friend.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: To make Michael Myers frightening, I had him walk like a man, not a monster.
quotes.author: John Carpenter

quotes.text: If you battle monsters, you don't always become a monster. But you aren't entirely human anymore, either.
quotes.author: Jonathan Maberry

quotes.text: My work is therapeutic: 'Monster's Ball,' 'Woodsman' and 'Shadowboxer,' because I don't go to therapy, and I sort of live life through my films.
quotes.author: Lee Daniels

quotes.text: I don't want children. Why should I let some strange little monster into my life to destroy what to me is a perfect set-up?
quotes.author: Wilbur Smith

quotes.text: I also have always liked the monster within idea. I like the zombies being us. Zombies are the blue-collar monsters.
quotes.author: George A. Romero

quotes.text: I think I may have created a monster with my - I won't say act - but with my redneck pose.
quotes.author: Billy Carter

quotes.text: I had this dream, and I really wanted to be a star. And I was almost a monster in the way that I was really fearless with my ambitions.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: A good game gives us meaningful accomplishment - clear achievement that we don't necessarily get from real life. In a game, you've beaten level four, the boss monster is dead, you have a badge, and now you have a super laser sword. Real life isn't like that, right?
quotes.author: Jesse Schell

quotes.text: The ego is a fascinating monster.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.text: When I've written episodes of 'Doctor Who', when it comes to the monster chasing somebody, it's the Doctor and the companion, running down the corridor, being chased by a guy with a stick and a tennis ball on the end. Whereas, when I see the rushes of 'Being Human', we're actually looking at the werewolf, and it just looks real.
quotes.author: Donald Sumpter

quotes.text: When someone asks, 'Does success make you into a monster?' I always say, 'No, it enables you to be a monster.'
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.text: Do we root for Michael Corleone in the 'Godfather' films? I think so, even if he is a monster.
quotes.author: Jacques Audiard

quotes.text: As far as my memory being reliable, at the risk of sounding like some sort of gorgeous two-headed monster with the voices of Dave Barry and Erma Bombeck, I do think that women, like elephants, remember everything and love peanuts.
quotes.author: Julie Klausner

quotes.text: Country music in the mid-'90s was a big influence on my career, and I played all the songs that are referenced in '94' back in my club days. Joe Diffie was rocking a sick mullet, and he was hotter than ever... just putting out monster hit after monster hit. It totally takes me back to those days, and it makes me smile every time I hear it.
quotes.author: Jason Aldean

quotes.text: One of the series I like is D.M. Cornish's 'Monster Blood Tattoo,' in which he creates a whole language. Kids who are reading that are building a language in their heads. There's no real cognitive difference. I think kids are excited by language, and they're not always given credit for that.
quotes.author: Matthew Tobin Anderson

quotes.text: I was a monster, a problem child.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.text: I sometimes have a horrible fear of turning up a canvas of mine. I'm always afraid of finding a monster in place of the precious jewels I thought I had put there!
quotes.author: Camille Pissarro

quotes.text: Some men have a silly theory about beautiful women - that somewhere along the line they'll turn into a monster. That movie gave them a chance to watch it happen.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.text: The jargon of sculptors is beyond me. I do not know precisely why I admire a green granite female, apparently pregnant monster with one eye going around a square corner.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.text: Americans are really obsessed with their teeth being white and straight, aren't they? I saw this little girl the other day with one of those whole head braces. Elastic all the way around! How traumatizing for a child to have to wear one of those! You look like a monster.
quotes.author: Kate Moss

quotes.text: Zombies are apocalyptic in nature. They belong to a class of monster that doesn't just hunt humans, but seeks to obliterate that entire human race.
quotes.author: Max Brooks

quotes.text: To strip a man of all loyalties but those to the state, makes him not only a worm but a monster, without a shred of humanity.
quotes.author: Haniel Long

quotes.text: Women and gay men have something in common after all: in that they are trying to deal with this goofy egotistical monster called a man.
quotes.author: Edmund White

quotes.text: You have to be a brat in order to carve out your parameters, and you have to be a monster to anyone who gets in your way. But sometimes it's difficult to know when that's necessary and when you're just being a baby, throwing your rattle from the cage.
quotes.author: Paul Thomas Anderson

quotes.text: Canada has a passive-aggressive culture, with a lot of sarcasm and righteousness. That went with my weird messianic complex. The ego is a fascinating monster. I was taught from a young age that I had to serve, so that turned into me thinking I had to save the planet.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.text: My father was a monster. A monster! I cut with my family when I was 23 and I never see them again.
quotes.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quotes.text: I don't think that coming from a privileged background makes you this monster who doesn't feel things.
quotes.author: Tamara Ecclestone

quotes.text: It is conventional to call 'monster' any blending of dissonant elements. I call 'monster' every original inexhaustible beauty.
quotes.author: Alfred Jarry

quotes.text: Migration gives a blank cheque to put anything you don't feel like addressing in the memory hold. No neighbours can go against the monster narrative of your family.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.text: My father was a low-budget monster movie maker, so he made classics like 'The Crater Lake Monster.' There were always creatures around. And my dad was a huge fan of Ray Harryhausen. One of our neighbors, who went on to win several Academy Awards, was close friends with my dad. His name is Phil Tippett.
quotes.author: Robert Stromberg

quotes.text: I will always vote what I have promised, and always vote the Constitution, as well as I will not vote for one single penny that isn't paid for, because debt is the monster, debt is what's going to eat us up and that is why our economy is on the brink.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.text: Within one's own family, money is not the measure of things, unless the person is an absolute Scrooge. Only the most extreme kind of monster would put a price on everything.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.text: Zombies, vampires, Frankenstein's monster, robots, Wolfman - all of this stuff was really popular in the '50s. Robots are the only one of those make-believe monsters that have become real. They are really in our lives in a meaningful way. That's pretty fascinating to me.
quotes.author: Daniel H. Wilson

quotes.text: Godzilla's a monster for the '90s. He's been working out.
quotes.author: Hank Azaria

quotes.text: We all pretend, we all hide things, so why not take the concept to an extreme? That is the basic idea for the character of Dexter. Pretend to be human, while quietly and carefully living out the life of a monster on the side.
quotes.author: Jeff Lindsay

quotes.text: The 'Tickle Monster' story literally flew out of my mouth.
quotes.author: Josie Bissett

quotes.text: As a kid, I wanted to be the person running from the monster. I also wanted to be the person saving people from the monster. I wanted to be a superhero.
quotes.author: Ray Santiago

quotes.text: There's only one drummer. We all travel to his beat. Well, I couldn't sing his song. Because for me, it wasn't a truthful statement. Well, Linda sang it, and it was a monster for her.
quotes.author: Barry McGuire

quotes.text: I can see every monster as they come in.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.text: For the finale, I thought the audience deserved to get a close point of view on the monster, and to recognize him the way you recognize the heroes of 'True Detective.'
quotes.author: Nic Pizzolatto

quotes.text: Hopefully I've given something back to darts, which has been brilliant to me. Hopefully I made it a bit popular when I first started; I was part of the breakaway, and I also created a monster, so I think I've done a little bit.
quotes.author: Eric Bristow

quotes.text: Goliath was a champion, a monster who had never been beaten, and then this young guy, David, came forward, a child who believed in God and did it.
quotes.author: Tyson Fury

quotes.text: To me, it's far more efficient to mobilize the imagination. It's far more efficient to hear a creaking step, for example, than to see the face of a monster, which usually looks ridiculous, and where you know that the blood is ketchup.
quotes.author: Michael Haneke

quotes.text: The fanatic is incorruptible: if he kills for an idea, he can just as well get himself killed for one; in either case, tyrant or martyr, he is a monster.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.text: Rave music sounds like an electronic disco version of '30s Universal monster movies.
quotes.author: Mojo Nixon

quotes.text: I haven't turned into some rich monster. I've kept my perspective. But I am a bit spoiled. It's hard not to be a little spoiled by having a lot of money.
quotes.author: Christine McVie

quotes.text: I don't think the Hulk is a superhero. He's the first Marvel character who is a tragic monster. Really an anti-hero.
quotes.author: Ang Lee

quotes.text: Nearly all monster stories depend for their success on Jack killing the Giant, Beowulf or St. George slaying the Dragon, Harry Potter triumphing over the basilisk. That is their inner grammar, and the whole shape of the story leads towards it.
quotes.author: A. N. Wilson

quotes.text: 'Some Kind Of Monster' is such a nightmare for any musician to watch because you're watching a band be honest to each other. Not a good idea, man!
quotes.author: Dave Grohl

quotes.text: No one wants to die. Even people who want to go to heaven don't want to die to get there. And yet death is the destination we all share. No one has ever escaped it. And that is as it should be, because Death is very likely the single best invention of Life. It is Life's change agent. It clears out the old to make way for the new.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The life of the dead is placed in the memory of the living.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: When your time comes to die, be not like those whose hearts are filled with fear of death, so that when their time comes they weep and pray for a little more time to live their lives over again in a different way. Sing your death song, and die like a hero going home.
quotes.author: Tecumseh

quotes.text: Our dead are never dead to us, until we have forgotten them.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Death is nothing, but to live defeated and inglorious is to die daily.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: They tell us that suicide is the greatest piece of cowardice... that suicide is wrong; when it is quite obvious that there is nothing in the world to which every man has a more unassailable title than to his own life and person.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: Don't send me flowers when I'm dead. If you like me, send them while I'm alive.
quotes.author: Brian Clough

quotes.text: We ourselves can die with comfort and even with joy if we know that death is but a passport to blessedness, that this intellect, freed from all material chains, shall rise and shine.
quotes.author: Matthew Simpson

quotes.text: No one can confidently say that he will still be living tomorrow.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: I intend to live forever, or die trying.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: Dying is easy, it's living that scares me to death.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.text: Some people die at 25 and aren't buried until 75.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: And how can man die better than facing fearful odds, for the ashes of his fathers, and the temples of his Gods?
quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quotes.text: I am become death, the destroyer of worlds.
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.text: What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.
quotes.author: Albert Pike

quotes.text: Suicide is man's way of telling God, 'You can't fire me - I quit.'
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.text: I would rather die a meaningful death than to live a meaningless life.
quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

quotes.text: Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste of death but once.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: The idea is to die young as late as possible.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.text: Everything that gets born dies.
quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.text: To be idle is a short road to death and to be diligent is a way of life; foolish people are idle, wise people are diligent.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Those who have the strength and the love to sit with a dying patient in the silence that goes beyond words will know that this moment is neither frightening nor painful, but a peaceful cessation of the functioning of the body.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.text: Death is a delightful hiding place for weary men.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.text: I am prepared to meet my Maker. Whether my Maker is prepared for the great ordeal of meeting me is another matter.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: If you die in an elevator, be sure to push the Up button.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: A man does not die of love or his liver or even of old age; he dies of being a man.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.text: Millions long for immortality who don't know what to do with themselves on a rainy Sunday afternoon.
quotes.author: Susan Ertz

quotes.text: The day which we fear as our last is but the birthday of eternity.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.text: John Candy knew he was going to die. He told me on his 40th birthday. He said, well, Maureen, I'm on borrowed time.
quotes.author: Maureen O'Hara

quotes.text: If you don't know how to die, don't worry; Nature will tell you what to do on the spot, fully and adequately. She will do this job perfectly for you; don't bother your head about it.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.text: Death is no more than passing from one room into another. But there's a difference for me, you know. Because in that other room I shall be able to see.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: From my rotting body, flowers shall grow and I am in them and that is eternity.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.text: Do not fear death so much but rather the inadequate life.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.text: We cannot banish dangers, but we can banish fears. We must not demean life by standing in awe of death.
quotes.author: David Sarnoff

quotes.text: Death is a fearful thing.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: While I thought that I was learning how to live, I have been learning how to die.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Someone has to die in order that the rest of us should value life more.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: It is not the end of the physical body that should worry us. Rather, our concern must be to live while we're alive - to release our inner selves from the spiritual death that comes with living behind a facade designed to conform to external definitions of who and what we are.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.text: If physical death is the price that I must pay to free my white brothers and sisters from a permanent death of the spirit, then nothing can be more redemptive.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Death will be a great relief. No more interviews.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.text: There's something about death that is comforting. The thought that you could die tomorrow frees you to appreciate your life now.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.text: When I die, I hope to go to Heaven, whatever the Hell that is.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: I've looked that old scoundrel death in the eye many times but this time I think he has me on the ropes.
quotes.author: Douglas MacArthur

quotes.text: Those who welcome death have only tried it from the ears up.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.text: The dead cannot cry out for justice. It is a duty of the living to do so for them.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.text: I didn't attend the funeral, but I sent a nice letter saying I approved of it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Death most resembles a prophet who is without honor in his own land or a poet who is a stranger among his people.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Of all the gods only death does not desire gifts.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.text: A friend who dies, it's something of you who dies.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.text: It is possible to provide security against other ills, but as far as death is concerned, we men live in a city without walls.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.text: I detest life-insurance agents: they always argue that I shall some day die, which is not so.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.text: When faith is lost, when honor dies, the man is dead.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.text: If a man has not discovered something that he will die for, he isn't fit to live.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: I decided to devote my life to telling the story because I felt that having survived I owe something to the dead. and anyone who does not remember betrays them again.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.text: I've told my children that when I die, to release balloons in the sky to celebrate that I graduated. For me, death is a graduation.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.text: Someone who is about to die does not mourn the dead.
quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quotes.text: I hope it is true that a man can die and yet not only live in others but give them life, and not only life, but that great consciousness of life.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.text: Life is hard. Then you die. Then they throw dirt in your face. Then the worms eat you. Be grateful it happens in that order.
quotes.author: David Gerrold

quotes.text: Some people are so afraid to die that they never begin to live.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.text: It was a time when only the dead smiled, happy in their peace.
quotes.author: Anna Akhmatova

quotes.text: Love and death are the two great hinges on which all human sympathies turn.
quotes.author: B. R. Hayden

quotes.text: Always read something that will make you look good if you die in the middle of it.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: I had seen birth and death but had thought they were different.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: Because of indifference, one dies before one actually dies.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.text: I'm not afraid to die, I just don't want to be there when it happens.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: I'm gonna live till I die.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: I tell myself that God gave my children many gifts - spirit, beauty, intelligence, the capacity to make friends and to inspire respect. There was only one gift he held back - length of life.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: The fear of death is the most unjustified of all fears, for there's no risk of accident for someone who's dead.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Men fear death as children fear to go in the dark; and as that natural fear in children is increased by tales, so is the other.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: You'll have time to rest when you're dead.
quotes.author: Robert De Niro

quotes.text: Death is the cure for all diseases.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.text: The timing of death, like the ending of a story, gives a changed meaning to what preceded it.
quotes.author: Mary Catherine Bateson

quotes.text: Pale Death beats equally at the poor man's gate and at the palaces of kings.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.text: It's funny how most people love the dead, once you're dead, you're made for life.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: If you don't have any fight in you, you might as well be dead.
quotes.author: Scott Caan

quotes.text: Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.text: Man dies of cold, not of darkness.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.text: I don't want to be stinky poo poo girl, I want to be happy flower child.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: I'm very interested in poo. We don't have a very good relationship with poo, and we should have.
quotes.author: Greg Wise

quotes.text: Bathroom humor, fart, and poo poo humor in movies gets a laugh. It's a pretty easy audience, and that's been around for ages.
quotes.author: Selma Blair

quotes.text: A good fart joke makes me bawl with laughter, so will somebody farting. And the word 'poo.' You can't beat a good poo joke.
quotes.author: Jenny Eclair

quotes.text: You see airbrushed images of me, but I know the person who's walking barefoot, dodging dog poo in the yard.
quotes.author: Carolyn Murphy

quotes.text: I've had many nicknames over the years: V, Nessa, Nessy Poo, Nessy Bear and Van. Only my parents call me Van, though, and I hate it. I get embarrassed.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.text: One thing I've learned, in the face of all kinds of indignities, domestic workers take so much pride in their work and love the children they care for.
quotes.author: Ai-jen Poo

quotes.text: Domestic employees are at the whim of their employers.
quotes.author: Ai-jen Poo

quotes.text: I love a smart, well-written show, and '30 Rock,' well, you can't get any better than that. Tina Fey poos funny. There's nothing that she does that isn't funny. That show is an example of how brilliant she is. It's so smart. They've done some brilliant commentary about the 'Housewives' with 'Queen of Jordan,' their show-within-the-show.
quotes.author: Andy Cohen

quotes.text: You cannot share your life with a dog, as I had done in Bournemouth, or a cat, and not know perfectly well that animals have personalities and minds and feelings.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.text: Being effective at social media, whether for business or personal use, means capturing people who have short attention spans. They're only a click away from a picture of a funny cat, so you have to make your thing more compelling than that cat. And that can be a high bar.
quotes.author: Alexis Ohanian

quotes.text: Curiosity killed the cat, but for a while I was a suspect.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Everything comes to those who wait... except a cat.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.text: When you're special to a cat, you're special indeed, she brings to you the gift of her preference of you, the sight of you, the sound of your voice, the touch of your hand.
quotes.author: Lester B. Pearson

quotes.text: My idea of absolute happiness is to be in bed on a rainy day, with my blankie, my cat, and my dog.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: I am alone a lot, which is good. I need that time to just be alone after a long day, just decompress. So, I go to either my house or the hotel, or my apartment, or whatever - wherever I am, I go home and I watch TV and I sit there, with my cat, and I just watch TV or go online, check my emails.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: I recognize that I have a unique position to be a role model to young girls because I am doing something that they consider glamorous, which is acting, and yet I took a time to really get my education and study mathematics, and I think math is the cat's meow.
quotes.author: Danica McKellar

quotes.text: I have no desire to be a cat, which walks so lightly that it never creates a disturbance.
quotes.author: Andrew Taylor Still

quotes.text: Well, the stuff that I liked growing up was AC/DC, Led Zeppelin, but I also liked the Beatles and guys like Cat Stevens and Elton John.
quotes.author: Dave Mustaine

quotes.text: I am not a cat man, but a dog man, and all felines can tell this at a glance - a sharp, vindictive glance.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.text: This morning I was laughing at my cat who was running up the stairs and slipped, and pretended like it didn't happen.
quotes.author: Jayma Mays

quotes.text: If you try and take a cat apart to see how it works, the first thing you have on your hands is a nonworking cat.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.text: I live myself with my cat Pebbles. She isn't enjoying the attention as much as me - she ran off up the stairs as soon as the film crew for the show came into the house. She didn't come down for hours. But I have the support of all my brothers and sisters and my neighbours and friends - everyone thinks it's just great.
quotes.author: Susan Boyle

quotes.text: Watching a baby being born is a little like watching a wet St. Bernard coming in through the cat door.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.text: In fact, I think I have had a ghost in my house. Although not active lately, unexplainable things would happen and the kitties were particularly sensitive - especially, Marlon Brando... the cat not the man.
quotes.author: Tippi Hedren

quotes.text: I went back over the sketch books I'd filled at Sheffield for ideas and discovered Wallace and Gromit, except Gromit was a cat then. I made them into Plasticene shapes and started 'A Grand Day Out.' It took me longer than I expected.
quotes.author: Nick Park

quotes.text: I don't wake up each morning saying, 'Oh, wow, it's me. I think I'm the cat's meow. I'm the best.'
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.text: I believe cats to be spirits come to earth. A cat, I am sure, could walk on a cloud without coming through.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.text: A black cat crossing your path signifies that the animal is going somewhere.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: The trouble with a kitten is that eventually it becomes a cat.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.text: Anyone who considers protocol unimportant has never dealt with a cat.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.text: The raccoons, foxes, beavers, chinchillas, minks, rabbits, and yes, sometimes even dogs and cats that are killed for fur are not very different from your beloved dog or cat. They all have eyes, ears and hearts. They all experience pain when they are physically maimed. They shake with fear when they experience terror.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.text: The cat could very well be man's best friend but would never stoop to admitting it.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.text: Animals have come to mean so much in our lives. We live in a fragmented and disconnected culture. Politics are ugly, religion is struggling, technology is stressful, and the economy is unfortunate. What's one thing that we have in our lives that we can depend on? A dog or a cat loving us unconditionally, every day, very faithfully.
quotes.author: Jon Katz

quotes.text: I like animals, all animals. I wouldn't hurt a cat or a dog - or a chicken or a cow. And I wouldn't ask someone else to hurt them for me. That's why I'm a vegetarian.
quotes.author: Peter Dinklage

quotes.text: I can remember the first time I ever recorded my vocals on to a beat. Cat Coore from Third World - a legendary Jamaican band - had a little demo set up at his house. I'm very good friends with his eldest son, Shiah, who plays with me now. So we were rhyming over a track by the dancehall artist Peter Metro. I've still got it somewhere.
quotes.author: Damian Marley

quotes.text: The cat is a dilettante in fur.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.text: Life is life - whether in a cat, or dog or man. There is no difference there between a cat or a man. The idea of difference is a human conception for man's own advantage.
quotes.author: Sri Aurobindo

quotes.text: A man who carries a cat by the tail learns something he can learn in no other way.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Cats are very independent animals. They're very sexy, if you want. Dogs are different. They're familiar. They're obedient. You call a cat, you go, 'Cat, come here.' He doesn't come to you unless you have something in your hand that he thinks might be food. They're very free animals, and I like that.
quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

quotes.text: The ideal of calm exists in a sitting cat.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.text: If you are worthy of its affection, a cat will be your friend but never your slave.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.text: It is difficult to obtain the friendship of a cat. It is a philosophical animal... one that does not place its affections thoughtlessly.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.text: One small cat changes coming home to an empty house to coming home.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.text: As anyone who has ever been around a cat for any length of time well knows, cats have enormous patience with the limitations of the human kind.
quotes.author: Cleveland Amory

quotes.text: God is really only another artist. He invented the giraffe, the elephant and the cat. He has no real style, He just goes on trying other things.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: I like cats a lot. I've always liked cats. They're great company. When they eat, they always leave a little bit at the bottom of the bowl. A dog will polish the bowl, but a cat always leaves a little bit. It's like an offering.
quotes.author: Christopher Walken

quotes.text: In nine lifetimes, you'll never know as much about your cat as your cat knows about you.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.text: You know, from my point of view, I'm the luckiest cat on the planet.
quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

quotes.text: It doesn't matter if a cat is black or white, so long as it catches mice.
quotes.author: Deng Xiaoping

quotes.text: I have pets, but they're the really ordinary sort - yellow Labrador, tabby cat, white rabbit, a few goldfish - that kind of stuff. Nothing very... extravagant or unusual or exotic, but I find, in terms of inspiration, Mother Nature is just it.
quotes.author: Graeme Base

quotes.text: I care not much for a man's religion whose dog and cat are not the better for it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: 'But I don't want to go among mad people,' said Alice. 'Oh, you can't help that,' said the cat. 'We're all mad here.'
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.text: Oh, who am I trying to kid? It's a madhouse. The minute those cameras go off, things just explode, everyone is just at each other in one way or another, in closets or cat fights here and there. It's nuts. You know, I can't be a part of it.
quotes.author: Richard Dean Anderson

quotes.text: Cat: a pygmy lion who loves mice, hates dogs, and patronizes human beings.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.text: I wish I could write as mysterious as a cat.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: Give your dog or cat respect, patience, understanding and love. And if you just change to one vegetarian day a week, that's a wonderful step that will save animal lives. It means you have chosen something kind instead of something cruel.
quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

quotes.text: The clever cat eats cheese and breathes down rat holes with baited breath.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: Happiness is like a cat, If you try to coax it or call it, it will avoid you; it will never come. But if you pay not attention to it and go about your business, you'll find it rubbing against your legs and jumping into your lap.
quotes.author: William Bennett

quotes.text: If a dog jumps into your lap, it is because he is fond of you; but if a cat does the same thing, it is because your lap is warmer.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.text: I'm not the kind of cat that's going to cut off an ear if I can't do something.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: I've met many irresponsible people in my life but never an irresponsible cat.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.text: I never married because there was no need. I have three pets at home which answer the same purpose as a husband. I have a dog which growls every morning, a parrot which swears all afternoon, and a cat that comes home late at night.
quotes.author: Marie Corelli

quotes.text: If man could be crossed with the cat it would improve man, but deteriorate the cat.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: If we treated everyone we meet with the same affection we bestow upon our favorite cat, they, too, would purr.
quotes.author: Martin Delany

quotes.text: The main difference between a cat and a lie is that a cat only has nine lives.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I'm not afraid to play ugly - look at 'Adaptation.' I looked like a turd that a cat had coughed up.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.text: Usually, I'm only sad when something sad happens. I am not a melancholic person. I like to live very much in the present. If I was an animal, I'd be a little cat. They like to live life.
quotes.author: Monica Bellucci

quotes.text: Millions of animals are euthanized every year because shelters can't find homes for them. Buying animals from pet stores also tends to support puppy and cat mills, many of which have deplorable conditions for animals, which shouldn't be tolerated.
quotes.author: Laura Mennell

quotes.text: No matter how hard you try to teach your cat general relativity, you're going to fail.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.text: Why not share with the world the way it is and tell them my feelings about my cat, and how I played with my kids, and how addicted to Christmas time I am, and the smell of pine needles and hearing my kids laugh.
quotes.author: Steven Tyler

quotes.text: What do I care about the purring of one who cannot love, like the cat?
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: You have to be very insensitive in order to have a cat, because I think they're very independent. When they're kittens, you think they're going to have a dog temperament in that they're going to run to the door when you get home, lick you on the face and cuddle with you all the time, but cats are not that way.
quotes.author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quotes.text: One of the most striking differences between a cat and a lie is that a cat has only nine lives.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: If you call a cat, he may not come. Which doesn't happen with dogs. They're different types of animals. Cats are very sexy I think too in the way they move.
quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

quotes.text: That's what the cat said to the canary when he swallowed him - 'You'll be all right.'
quotes.author: Alvah Bessie

quotes.text: The cat is such a perfect symbol of beauty and superiority that it seems scarcely possible for any true aesthete and civilised cynic to do other than worship it.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.text: I found many treasures in the woods over the years: shotgun shells, empty Colt 45 bottles, old railroad spikes, orange and black beetles eating a dead mouse, pebbles that looked just like teeth, old stone walls and cellar holes, a rusted out frying pan, the skull of a cat.
quotes.author: Jennifer McMahon

quotes.text: A man is like a cat; chase him and he will run - sit still and ignore him and he'll come purring at your feet.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: There is, indeed, no single quality of the cat that man could not emulate to his advantage.
quotes.author: Carl Van Vechten

quotes.text: Never wear anything that panics the cat.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: A cat's rage is beautiful, burning with pure cat flame, all its hair standing up and crackling blue sparks, eyes blazing and sputtering.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.text: I have a lot of very close girlfriends and sisters - I'm from an all female family. My father often quips that even the cat was neutered!
quotes.author: Shirley Manson

quotes.text: I really love animals. My cat is my little soul mate. He's not just a cat, he's my friend.
quotes.author: Tracey Emin

quotes.text: Theology is never any help; it is searching in a dark cellar at midnight for a black cat that isn't there. Theologians can persuade themselves of anything.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.text: Only very brave mouse makes nest in cat's ear.
quotes.author: Earl Derr Biggers

quotes.text: I have 3 kids and a cat and a busy, noisy house. I get more time to relax when I'm working.
quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

quotes.text: I never wanted to be a statistic. I never wanted to be that cat who tried and never made it.
quotes.author: Young Jeezy

quotes.text: My house is run, essentially, by an adopted, fully clawed cat with a mean nature.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.text: Comedians are the monkeys of acting. When you go to the zoo, everybody loves the monkey exhibit.
quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

quotes.text: Every woman's path is difficult, and many mothers were as equipped to raise children as wire monkey mothers. I say that without judgment: It is, sadly, true. An unhealthy mother's love is withering.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: People go to the zoo and they like the lion because it's scary. And the bear because it's intense, but the monkey makes people laugh.
quotes.author: Lorne Michaels

quotes.text: Yes, I've kissed a lot of guys. I like to kiss, but that's it. I don't go home with anyone. I sleep with my animals, like my baby monkey, Brigitte Bardot.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: The poor monkey, quietly seated on the ground, seemed to be in sore trouble at this display of anger.
quotes.author: Henry Walter Bates

quotes.text: It is not so important to be serious as it is to be serious about the important things. The monkey wears an expression of seriousness which would do credit to any college student, but the monkey is serious because he itches.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hutchins

quotes.text: I have a lot of funny friends, though not everyone's funny all the time. Doon Mackichan's my funniest friend in the pub; Nina Conti's the funniest with a monkey.
quotes.author: Sally Phillips

quotes.text: Postwar America was a very buttoned-up nation. Radio shows were run by censors, Presidents wore hats, ladies wore girdles. We came straight out of the blue - nobody was expecting anything like Martin and Lewis. A sexy guy and a monkey is how some people saw us.
quotes.author: Jerry Lewis

quotes.text: If you could cross a lion and a monkey, that's what I'd be, because monkeys are funny and lions are strong.
quotes.author: Marlon Wayans

quotes.text: I swear by that old expression, 'One monkey don't stop no show!' The reality is, we still have some good men out there, and we should hail those men as the kings they are.
quotes.author: Angie Stone

quotes.text: I started making monkey bridges, like kids do, and climbing and rappelling with ropes. Very naturally, I needed some knots. At the very beginning, I didn't care, I didn't know, and then slowly I started to know, and I started to care. I wanted to know more knots or the right knot for the special action.
quotes.author: Philippe Petit

quotes.text: We're all just bags of bones and muscle and hormones; I'll never understand what makes our minds do the things we do. It's like that statue of the monkey holding a skull. We're trying to use a thing we don't understand to understand ourselves.
quotes.author: Meshell Ndegeocello

quotes.text: The mind is a monkey, hopping around from thought to thought, image to image. Rarely do more than a few seconds go by in which the mind can remain single-pointed, empty.
quotes.author: Dani Shapiro

quotes.text: The show business has all phases and grades of dignity, from the exhibition of a monkey to the exposition of that highest art in music or the drama which secures for the gifted artists a world-wide fame princes well might envy.
quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

quotes.text: If you had a million Shakespeares, could they write like a monkey?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Just cause you got the monkey off your back doesn't mean the circus has left town.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: The problem is to keep the monkey mind from running off into all kinds of thoughts.
quotes.author: Lee Kuan Yew

quotes.text: Too much free time is certainly a monkey's paw in disguise. Most people can't handle a structureless life.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: The surest way to make a monkey of a man is to quote him.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.text: Monkeys are superior to men in this: when a monkey looks into a mirror, he sees a monkey.
quotes.author: Malcolm de Chazal

quotes.text: You can fool some of the people all of the time and all of the people some of the time, but you can only make a monkey out of the voters every four years!
quotes.author: Pat Paulsen

quotes.text: Democracy is the art and science of running the circus from the monkey cage.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: You never monkey with the truth.
quotes.author: Ben Bradlee

quotes.text: A father and two sons run Adelphia. It's a cable company. And they took from that company a billion dollars. A billion. Three people - three people took a billion dollars. What were they gonna do, start their own space program? 'Let's send the monkey to Mars, Dad!'
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.text: The first movie I ever saw was a blaxploitation movie. It was called 'Monkey Hustle.' Like I said, just listen to the name. That's a blaxploitation movie. It had these incredible, bigger-than-life images of people who looked like I did. Or who looked like I wanted to look like.
quotes.author: Michael Jai White

quotes.text: There are domains in which expertise is not possible. Stock picking is a good example. And in long-term political strategic forecasting, it's been shown that experts are just not better than a dice-throwing monkey.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.text: Most films I've worked on have had large casts, but they've been wonderful people. I think the monkey in Pirates of the Caribbean is the most temperamental costar I've had. It would throw tantrums like you wouldn't believe.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Rush

quotes.text: An American monkey, after getting drunk on brandy, would never touch it again, and thus is much wiser than most men.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.text: My boyfriend calls me 'princess', but I think of myself more along the lines of 'monkey' and 'retard'.
quotes.author: Alicia Silverstone

quotes.text: The fountain of youth is like the monkey's paw in the W. W. Jacobs story. It never ends well.
quotes.author: Sarah Monette

quotes.text: I wrote the very first stories in science fiction which dealt with homosexuality, The World Well Lost and Affair With a Green Monkey.
quotes.author: Theodore Sturgeon

quotes.text: 'Friend Monkey' is really my favorite of all my books because the Hindu myth on which it is based is my favorite - the myth of the Monkey Lord who loved so much that he created chaos wherever he went.
quotes.author: P. L. Travers

quotes.text: My dream pet? I like a couple of them, man: monkey, I love dogs. See, tigers, I don't know - I can't be playing with something like that. A monkey, I can handle it. A dog, yeah; I would get a monkey.
quotes.author: French Montana

quotes.text: In all honesty, if somebody asked me the secret of auditioning for Americans, I don't know. Often, I do what's called self-taping for America. I go over there quite a lot to sit in a room and do stuff in front of people. You feel like a performing monkey. It's bizarre.
quotes.author: David Wenham

quotes.text: The newly released movie 'Noah' features a retelling of the creation story that clearly depicts Darwinian evolution transforming a single-cell organism into a monkey. The movie also seems to show magic in scenes more reminiscent of the occult than of the Bible story.
quotes.author: Aaron Klein

quotes.text: A misfit like me getting anywhere in Hollywood as I somehow have, seemed, certainly at the time of 'Spanking The Monkey,' kind of out of reach, or not a very realistic take.
quotes.author: Jeremy Davies

quotes.text: If we could establish a deep abiding relationship with nature, we would never kill an animal for our appetite; we would never harm, vivisect, a monkey, a dog, a guinea pig for our benefit. We would find other ways to heal our wounds, heal our bodies.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.text: People have always called me Schneider Monkey just because of my energy and mass consumption of bananas. Plus, I just love monkeys, so I thought, 'Well, I love monkeys, I love my fans, why not put the two together?'
quotes.author: Max Schneider

quotes.text: And out of a desire essentially to imitate what I was reading, I began to write, like a clever monkey.
quotes.author: Russell Banks

quotes.text: A determined soul will do more with a rusty monkey wrench than a loafer will accomplish with all the tools in a machine shop.
quotes.author: Robert Hughes

quotes.text: I confess freely to you, I could never look long upon a monkey, without very mortifying reflections.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.text: In Africa, you know, if you're poor, at least you can go to the forest and share some mangoes with the gorillas and monkey.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Jal

quotes.text: When I was little, my dad used to call me 'Bandarella,' because I was a mess - a Bandar is a monkey in Hindi. I was not a girly-girl and would always break something and would be running around and didn't really fit in.
quotes.author: Priyanka Chopra

quotes.text: Life is like the monkey bars: you have to let go to move forward. Once you make the decision to leap into entrepreneurship, be sure to loosen your grasp on old concepts so you can swing your way to new ones.
quotes.author: Leah Busque

quotes.text: I've tried to write from my own understanding of identity in all my comics, whether it's about superheroes or historical conflicts or monkey gods.
quotes.author: Gene Luen Yang

quotes.text: 'Monkey Island 2' was a huge game for me. It kind of taught me all about comedy.
quotes.author: Bryan Lee O'Malley

quotes.text: I learned the way a monkey learns - by watching its parents.
quotes.author: Prince Charles

quotes.text: I really like the Caribbean. Anyplace in the Caribbean. I get there, and I feel like a monkey - the perfect state.
quotes.author: Penelope Cruz

quotes.text: The president is here, strong and firm as a monkey's tail.
quotes.author: Jean-Claude Duvalier

quotes.text: Never hold discussions with the monkey when the organ grinder is in the room.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: One of my main problems with music is that the basic formula is always the same: verse, chorus, verse, chorus, bridge, verse, chorus, chorus, chorus, end. One of the bands that changed that was The Beatles. If you listen to 'Everybody's Got Something to Hide Except Me and My Monkey.' It's three verses, bridge, end.
quotes.author: Buzz Osborne

quotes.text: I think life would be so much funnier if every day you saw someone walking down the street getting hit in the head by a monkey, don't you?
quotes.author: Harland Williams

quotes.text: Wearing a monkey suit really lets you know where you stand as an actor.
quotes.author: Kelly Stables

quotes.text: Ideas come from ordinary, everyday life. And from imagination. And from feelings. And from memories. Memories of dust in my sneakers and humming whitewalls down a hill called Monkey.
quotes.author: Jerry Spinelli

quotes.text: My favorite special skill on my resume is 'excellent monkey noises.'
quotes.author: Ciara Renee

quotes.text: The responses of the baby monkey are very similar to those of a human baby.
quotes.author: Harry Harlow

quotes.text: I do not identify as a person with a disability. I'm a disabled person. And I'll be a monkey's disabled uncle if I'm going to apologise for that.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.text: In January of 1995, my family and I moved to Seattle. Pearl Jam did the first of their live radio broadcasts, Monkey Wrench Radio, along with many other Seattle musicians.
quotes.author: Jack Irons

quotes.text: I got a pet monkey called Charlie Chan.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: My most heartfelt thank you goes to Impact Future Media and Cartoon Monkey Studio. Their dedication to the truth is very uncommon in the world we live in today. I am now, and will always be, grateful to their organizations.
quotes.author: John McAfee

quotes.text: As a child I was the best tree climber in our neighbourhood, I was like a little monkey. I've never been afraid of hurting myself or a little physical discomfort.
quotes.author: Rachel Weisz

quotes.text: It does get old to have to always be a monkey in a zoo. I don't know what it's like any more to be anonymous.
quotes.author: Kevin Bacon

quotes.text: God, George Bush makes me want to slash my wrists. He's so embarrassing I have to leave the room when he's on the news. What a monkey.
quotes.author: Margot Kidder

quotes.text: When I would be myself, I was being big-headed. I was being egotistical. I was a megalomaniac, when it really was just having not to be a monkey for a few hours a day. And fulfilling the need to be a man.
quotes.author: Jerry Lewis

quotes.text: The character of the monkey just grew from something out of his face and my granddad's personality. They fused, and that's what I ended up with! The monkey belonged to a friend of mine, and I saw that it had such a little beguiling face and it grew from there.
quotes.author: Nina Conti

quotes.text: Poetry, it is often said and loudly so, is life's true mirror. But a monkey looking into a work of literature looks in vain for Socrates.
quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

quotes.text: I became fascinated with the concept of speak no, see no, hear no evil. And - and the actual depiction of three wise monkeys. And I began collecting it over the years. And I kind of figured that I might be the - the fourth monkey, the feel no evil monkey.
quotes.author: Mackenzie Phillips

quotes.text: Like many actors, I started off as a monkey. My first job ever was as an extra in Tim Burton's 'Planet of the Apes.' I'm the tiny little monkey in the background. I met Rick Baker doing that - then, because of my size and the fact I was older than 18, he figured I could double Daveigh Chase in 'The Ring.'
quotes.author: Kelly Stables

quotes.text: My big break was back in the third grade playing the third monkey in 'Horton Hears a Who.'
quotes.author: Sebastian Arcelus

quotes.text: What I've been doing with my misfit, so-called acting career in film from day one on my first film, 'Spanking The Monkey', is, I've kind of made a concerted effort to hijack my acting career to turn it into film school, because I've always had the blasphemous idea of becoming a reasonably competent filmmaker in my own right some day.
quotes.author: Jeremy Davies

quotes.text: Frank's audience doesn't care if a girl singer, a comic or an organ grinder with a monkey opens the show. They are there to see HIM.
quotes.author: Nancy Sinatra

quotes.text: A monkey is unaware that atoms exist. Likewise, our brainpower may not stretch to the deepest aspects of reality. The bedrock nature of space and time, and the structure of our entire universe, may remain 'open frontiers' beyond human grasp.
quotes.author: Martin Rees

quotes.text: For a while, the world for me was like a set of monkey bars. I swung from one place to the next, sometimes backward, sometimes forward, capitalizing on my own momentum, knowing that at some point my arms... would give out, and I'd fall to the ground.
quotes.author: Amanda Lindhout

quotes.text: I get burned out on standup. But I like acting. I do like it. But sometimes you just feel like a monkey. You just feel like a complete tool. But I like it. I do like it. Stand-up is just more free. A lot more freedom because you just do what you want to do.
quotes.author: Zach Galifianakis

quotes.text: I've been thinking recently about all the qualities you need in order to be an actor. First and foremost, you've got to have a thick skin and give out an 'I don't give a monkey's what you think' kind of vibe, while at the same time really caring what everyone thinks. You've got to be tough and sensitive at the same time.
quotes.author: Jessica Raine

quotes.text: The first book I could call mine, my first book, was a picture book, 'The Magic Monkey' - it was adapted from an old Chinese legend by a thirteen-year-old prodigy named Plato Chan with the help of his sister.
quotes.author: Nick Flynn

quotes.text: I looked into studying psychoanalysis, wrote to the governing body and was about to start the year where they psychoanalyse you, four times a week, before you get to do it yourself. I just thought I'd taken the ventriloquism as far as I could. My act is so deconstructive, and I'd made all the monkey jokes anyone wanted to hear.
quotes.author: Nina Conti

quotes.text: I am a monkey fan.
quotes.author: Jerry Jones

quotes.text: You play with the audience, and they play back with you. They get into it, and then everybody gets into it. I don't want to be like a monkey on stage and just go through the motions because then it wouldn't be fun anymore. I just pay attention to the audience and appreciate the fact that somebody wants to see us. That gets me psyched.
quotes.author: Brittany Howard

quotes.text: Our society spends a lot of money on prison bars. For the sake of our kids, let's invest in monkey bars.
quotes.author: Darell Hammond

quotes.text: No pen, no ink, no table, no room, no time, no quiet, no inclination.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.text: No water, no life. No blue, no green.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.text: Every sale has five basic obstacles: no need, no money, no hurry, no desire, no trust.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: I have no limits, no filter, no class, no poise. No decorum. Just fun.
quotes.author: Kathy Griffin

quotes.text: No pressure, no diamonds.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.text: No fruit. No veggie.
quotes.author: Bea Arthur

quotes.text: No cross no crown.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.text: Embrace good smells. No cost, no calories, no energy, no time - a quick hit of pleasure.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.text: Alone! Alone! No beacon, far or near! No chart, no compass, and no anchor stay!
quotes.author: Ada Cambridge

quotes.text: There are no accounting issues, no trading issues, no reserve issues, no previously unknown problem issues.
quotes.author: Kenneth Lay

quotes.text: There's no drugs, no Tom in a dress, no psychiatrists.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.text: There's no tour plans, no reunion, no new album... nothing.
quotes.author: Dee Snider

quotes.text: No, no, no. Your accent is so beautiful.
quotes.author: Maya Rudolph

quotes.text: There's just no vision. You have no ground, no vision.
quotes.author: Jessi Colter

quotes.text: Love has no age, no limit; and no death.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.text: If there be no enemy there's no fight. If no fight, no victory and if no victory there is no crown.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.text: If no producer, no movie.
quotes.author: Dino De Laurentiis

quotes.text: I'll give you my answer calmly and sensibly, my final answer. My final answer is finally no. The answer is no! Absolutely and finally no! Finally and positively no! No! No! No! N - O!
quotes.author: Abraham Polonsky

quotes.text: I have the world's worst taste in men, so now I simply have wonderful relationships of the friend kind, but trying to settle down with somebody? No, no, no, no, no, no, no. I'm beyond that.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.text: Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.text: Without memory, there is no culture. Without memory, there would be no civilization, no society, no future.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.text: I refuse to be molded into some stereotypical ballplayer that has no interests, really, no life, no depth, no intelligence.
quotes.author: Barry Zito

quotes.text: People should say 'no comment' more often. No comment! I love no comment. Let's have more no comment.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.text: No tears in the writer, no tears in the reader. No surprise in the writer, no surprise in the reader.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: If you take no risks, you will suffer no defeats. But if you take no risks, you win no victories.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: I'm no editor, no artisan, no expert. And certainly no arbiter of what you should buy, wear, or eat.
quotes.author: Blake Lively

quotes.text: Women who have it all should try having nothing: I have no husband, no children, no real estate, no stocks, no bonds, no investments, no 401(k), no CDs, no IRAs, no emergency fund - I don't even have a savings account. It's not that I have not planned for the future; I have not planned for the present.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.text: The secular world looks to the church and to its chagrin, finds no love, no life, no laughter, no hope and no happiness.
quotes.author: Rod Parsley

quotes.text: The Seinfeld motto: No learning, no hugging.
quotes.author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quotes.text: No band is special, no player royalty.
quotes.author: Krist Novoselic

quotes.text: No pay, no Goldblum. That's it.
quotes.author: Jeff Goldblum

quotes.text: I have no nationality, no country.
quotes.author: China Machado

quotes.text: Love, having no geography, knows no boundaries.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.text: It's show business. No show, no business.
quotes.author: Dick Wolf

quotes.text: No, no, the songs write themselves, almost.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.text: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.text: Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: No retreat. No retreat. They must conquer or die who've no retreat.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.text: Democrats have no agenda, no plan for the future, and no sense of leadership.
quotes.author: Jeff Miller

quotes.text: Iowa City is okay as Midwestern cities go, but there's no food, no culture, no ocean.
quotes.author: Elin Hilderbrand

quotes.text: There is no ethnic cleansing in Bahrain, no mass genocide, no policy of killing innocent people.
quotes.author: Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa

quotes.text: Corporations aren't people. They have no brains, no consciences, no capacity for intent or guilt.
quotes.author: Robert Reich

quotes.text: We have no such weapons at all, no chemical weapons, no biological weapons.
quotes.author: Mohammed Aldouri

quotes.text: I have no restrictions, no limits, no musical history to live with.
quotes.author: Bill Wyman

quotes.text: What have I got? No looks, no money, no education. Just talent.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quotes.text: I never saw film stars at home. We had no maid, no cook, no swimming pool.
quotes.author: Natalie Wood

quotes.text: No thieves, no traitors, no interventionists! This time the revolution is for real!
quotes.author: Fidel Castro

quotes.text: There is no consensus, there is no homogeneity, there is no truth.
quotes.author: Ward Churchill

quotes.text: At my age, no one is married, no one has kids, no one has a career.
quotes.author: Lena Dunham

quotes.text: It's good to play 100 per cent live - no tricks, no samples, no messing about.
quotes.author: Adam Ant

quotes.text: I had no support, no opportunity, no sponsors backing me for most of my career.
quotes.author: Mary Kom

quotes.text: It lies in the hearts of men and women; when it dies there, no constitution, no law, no court can save it. While it lies there, it needs no constitution, no law, no court to save it.
quotes.author: Learned Hand

quotes.text: No, no, you're not thinking; you're just being logical.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.text: Death solves all problems - no man, no problem.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.text: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: No winter lasts forever; no spring skips its turn.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.text: Where there is no imagination there is no horror.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.text: Who ever has no fixed opinions has no constant feelings.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.text: Enemies' gifts are no gifts and do no good.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.text: No man bosses me around, and no man ever will.
quotes.author: Cybill Shepherd

quotes.text: Mathematics allows for no hypocrisy and no vagueness.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.text: No man is an island. No man stands alone.
quotes.author: Dennis Brown

quotes.text: If there wasn't no fight, there wasn't no weekend.
quotes.author: O. J. Simpson

quotes.text: We didn't make no mistakes. We didn't make no mistakes.
quotes.author: Joseph Jackson

quotes.text: There are no limits, love, there are no limits.
quotes.author: Graham Kennedy

quotes.text: No God without a world, and no world without God.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schleiermacher

quotes.text: There are no explanations, there are no answers.
quotes.author: Jessica Lange

quotes.text: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.text: No, I'm no enemy to learning; it hurts not me.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.text: No chaos, no creation. Evidence: the kitchen at mealtime.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.text: In God's family, there are no outsiders, no enemies.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: Were there no uniforms, there would probably be no armies.
quotes.author: Benjamin Banneker

quotes.text: Where there is no work, there is no dignity.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: I am a simple Buddhist monk - no more, no less.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: There would be no Christmas if there was no Easter.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: Before me, there was no money, no business with yoga.
quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

quotes.text: A team without hope fizzles: no flameout, no fire.
quotes.author: Rabih Alameddine

quotes.text: I'm no angel, but I'm no monster, either.
quotes.author: R. Kelly

quotes.text: God has no resolve; no karma attaches itself to Him.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.text: Many children, many cares; no children, no felicity.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.text: It takes a long time to become young.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Just imagine becoming the way you used to be as a very young child, before you understood the meaning of any word, before opinions took over your mind. The real you is loving, joyful, and free. The real you is just like a flower, just like the wind, just like the ocean, just like the sun.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.text: The great thing about getting older is that you become more mellow. Things aren't as black and white, and you become much more tolerant. You can see the good in things much more easily rather than getting enraged as you used to do when you were young.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.text: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: It's a struggle for every young Black man. You know how it is, only God can judge us.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.text: The whole art of teaching is only the art of awakening the natural curiosity of young minds for the purpose of satisfying it afterwards.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: There is no sadder sight than a young pessimist.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: There is a part of me that will forever want to be walking under autumn leaves, carrying a briefcase containing the works of Shakespeare and Yeats and a portable chess set. I will pass an old tree under which once on a summer night I lay on the grass with a fragrant young woman and we quoted e.e. cummings back and forth.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.text: My identity was a big issue when I was a teenager, and I had a lot of questions, like: 'Who am I?' 'Who do I belong to?' But when I was still quite young, I decided that belonging is a tough process in life, and I'd better say I belonged to myself and the world rather than belonging to one nationality or another.
quotes.author: Hiam Abbass

quotes.text: The object of education is to prepare the young to educate themselves throughout their lives.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hutchins
