quotes.text: The old believe everything, the middle-aged suspect everything, the young know everything.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: I'm very careful about how I portray violence in my films. I do believe that violence, especially violent video games, are not a good thing for young kids.
quotes.author: Spike Lee

quotes.text: Sometimes, people can be extraordinarily judgmental and closed-minded to anyone different or special, which is why it's so hard for young people in this day and age to be comfortable enough in their own skin to not listen to the people picking on them.
quotes.author: Ariana Grande

quotes.text: I think of myself as a young prince from a long line of royalty.
quotes.author: Wesley Snipes

quotes.text: Awards can give you a tremendous amount of encouragement to keep getting better, no matter how young or old you are.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.text: The cost of college education today is so high that many young people are giving up their dream of going to college, while many others are graduating deeply in debt.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.text: We must restore hope to young people, help the old, be open to the future, spread love. Be poor among the poor. We need to include the excluded and preach peace.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: Young people need to vote. They need to get out there. Every vote counts. Educate yourself too. Don't just vote. Know what you're voting for, and stand by that.
quotes.author: Nikki Reed

quotes.text: This war differs from other wars, in this particular. We are not fighting armies but a hostile people, and must make old and young, rich and poor, feel the hard hand of war.
quotes.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

quotes.text: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life; now that I am old I know that it is.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: You have young men of color in many communities who are more likely to end up in jail or in the criminal justice system than they are in a good job or in college. And, you know, part of my job, that I can do, I think, without any potential conflicts, is to get at those root causes.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: I want young people to know that they can belong - whatever your culture, your religion, your sexuality - that you can live life how you want to live it and feel comfortable how you are.
quotes.author: Jessie J

quotes.text: For a young person, it is almost a sin, or at least a danger, to be too preoccupied with himself; but for the ageing person, it is a duty and a necessity to devote serious attention to himself.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: When you start so young working, you build a hunger for acting, working, and a busy life.
quotes.author: Bonnie Wright

quotes.text: You are as young as your self-confidence, as old as your fears; as young as your hope, as old as your despair.
quotes.author: Samuel Ullman

quotes.text: To be in love is merely to be in a state of perceptual anesthesia - to mistake an ordinary young woman for a goddess.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: Chinese people, young people, they don't go shopping a lot in department stores. All department store guys hate me. They say business is bad because of Jack.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.text: Artists don't talk about art. Artists talk about work. If I have anything to say to young writers, it's stop thinking of writing as art. Think of it as work.
quotes.author: Paddy Chayefsky

quotes.text: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: I enjoy nothing more than spending time with my loved ones, young and old, and at least once a year we get together for a formal family photograph.
quotes.author: Elliott Erwitt

quotes.text: The idea is to die young as late as possible.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.text: Movies can and do have tremendous influence in shaping young lives in the realm of entertainment towards the ideals and objectives of normal adulthood.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong. Because someday in your life you will have been all of these.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.text: I'm happy, and I think being happy keeps you looking young.
quotes.author: Olivia Newton-John

quotes.text: When I am president, I will work to ensure that all of our kids are treated equally and protected equally. Every action I take, I will ask myself, 'Does this make life better for young Americans in Baltimore, Chicago, Detroit, Ferguson, who have as much of a right to live out their dreams as any other child America?'
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: These young guys are playing checkers. I'm out there playing chess.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.text: A young man who isn't a socialist hasn't got a heart; an old man who is a socialist hasn't got a head.
quotes.author: David Lloyd George

quotes.text: A young man is a theory, an old man is a fact.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.text: It is not the young people that degenerate; they are not spoiled till those of mature age are already sunk into corruption.
quotes.author: Charles de Montesquieu

quotes.text: To my young friends out there: Life can be great, but not when you can't see it. So, open your eyes to life: to see it in the vivid colors that God gave us as a precious gift to His children, to enjoy life to the fullest, and to make it count. Say yes to your life.
quotes.author: Nancy Reagan

quotes.text: I wish I could just go tell all the young women I work with, all these fabulous women, 'Believe in yourself and negotiate for yourself. Own your own success.' I wish I could tell that to my daughter. But it's not that simple.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.text: I believe that young people are looking for answers to the big questions just like everyone else, and that they respect intelligent comment to help guide them through tough times.
quotes.author: Bill Kurtis

quotes.text: I had a bad stutter when I was really young. I couldn't get a sentence out. Like, 'D-d-d-d-d-d-d-d-ad.' And that turned into a mumble.
quotes.author: Channing Tatum

quotes.text: The earth has grown old with its burden of care, but at Christmas it always is young, the heart of the jewel burns lustrous and fair, and its soul full of music breaks the air, when the song of angels is sung.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.text: My dad tells me that he took us to a pantomime when I was very, very small - panto being a sort of English phenomenon. There's traditionally a part of the show where they'll invite kids up on the stage to interact with the show. I was too young to remember this, but my dad says that I was running up onstage before they even asked us.
quotes.author: Dan Stevens

quotes.text: I do think it's important for young women to know that magazine covers are retouched. People don't really look like that.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.text: I like playing sport, and I like doing physical stuff. I like hiking and I like climbing and I like playing sport. I do a lot. But I don't like the term 'exercising.' I feel like with sport, you're playing games. But with exercise, you're literally just trying to stop yourself from dying too young. It's weird.
quotes.author: James McAvoy

quotes.text: My goal the whole time has been for people to see me as a stand-alone artist. I came out with Young Money, the biggest hip-hop label in the world at the time. And then it was, 'How do I branch away from Lil Wayne?'
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.text: I found myself in the doldrums in the early Nineties. I was too old to play the dolly bird any longer and I looked too young to play a woman of my real age. No one ever saw me as the aunt, mother or grandmother.
quotes.author: Barbara Windsor

quotes.text: When I was a young prosecutor, I got called to testify against my boss. I could have backed down, but I didn't. I stood up to him. And he fired me for it.
quotes.author: Susana Martinez

quotes.text: It was always my dream to be a director. A lot of it had to do with controlling my own destiny, because as a young actor you feel at everyone's disposal. But I wanted to become a leader in the business.
quotes.author: Ron Howard

quotes.text: I grew up in a small place and left it when I was quite young and entered the bigger world.
quotes.author: V. S. Naipaul

quotes.text: I like my whisky old and my women young.
quotes.author: Errol Flynn

quotes.text: I think young people should have a lot of fun. But I never seem to have any.
quotes.author: Syd Barrett

quotes.text: I thought, If people are going to write about what I'm wearing, then I would wear young British designers who need the publicity.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.text: A young sailor boy came to see me today. It pleases me to have these lads seek me on their return from their first voyage, and tell me how much they have learned about navigation.
quotes.author: Maria Mitchell

quotes.text: Too much money at a young age, it just takes your eye off the ball. And you're not as hungry as players used to be. You think you've made it before you've done anything.
quotes.author: Ryan Giggs

quotes.text: I'm trying to understand cosmology, why the Big Bang had the properties it did. And it's interesting to think that connects directly to our kitchens and how we can make eggs, how we can remember one direction of time, why causes precede effects, why we are born young and grow older. It's all because of entropy increasing.
quotes.author: Sean M. Carroll

quotes.text: Part of being young is you think gaining 6 lbs. is the end of the world.
quotes.author: Melissa McCarthy

quotes.text: But it is equally necessary to consider the implications for a society if there are fewer and fewer young people making music because we are economising on music schools or musical education in schools.
quotes.author: Johannes Rau

quotes.text: Where I am today... I still have my ups and downs, but I take it one day at a time and I just hope that I can be the best that I can possibly be, not only for myself, but also young people that are out there today that need someone to look up to.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.text: I got the travel bug when I was quite young. My parents took me and my sisters out of school and we travelled all over Europe. It was an eye-opening experience and, although I love Norway, I also enjoy visiting new countries. I don't get homesick.
quotes.author: Magnus Carlsen

quotes.text: The clarification of visual forms and their organization in integrated patterns as well as the attribution of such forms to suitable objects is one of the most effective training grounds of the young mind.
quotes.author: Rudolf Arnheim

quotes.text: I have a lot of sympathy for young people because I realize how disturbed I was. How would I deal with life in the future? What would I do for a living?
quotes.author: Clyde Tombaugh

quotes.text: My parents instilled a very strong work ethic in me from a young age, fortunately.
quotes.author: Matthew Gray Gubler

quotes.text: I'm not just offensive, I'm very smart about the way that I do it, and that takes a lot of time. People say that young comics shouldn't be trying these things. That's ridiculous. You should try everything and see what sticks.
quotes.author: Anthony Jeselnik

quotes.text: My mother, who was radiant, young, and beautiful even as she lay dying, heard voices and saw visions, but she always managed to make friends with them and was much too charming to hospitalize even at her craziest.
quotes.author: Mark Vonnegut

quotes.text: Growing up in Niagara Falls, Ontario, I took classes as a young girl and became very serious about ballet, and also performed with a local company, although it wasn't a professional company.
quotes.author: Cathy Marie Buchanan

quotes.text: I have been trying to point out that in our lives chance may have an astonishing influence and, if I may offer advice to the young laboratory worker, it would be this - never to neglect an extraordinary appearance or happening.
quotes.author: Alexander Fleming

quotes.text: Love is too young to know what conscience is.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Mum loves me being famous! She is so excited and proud, as she had me so young and couldn't support me, so I am living her dream, it's sweeter for both of us. It's her 40th birthday soon and I'm going to buy her 40 presents.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.text: You can't tell young people what to do. You can't tell 'em because they'll look at you and say, 'Well, how can you tell me not to do that when you were there doing it yourself?' Or supposedly were doing it yourself. I think you must let everyone live their life the way they have to.
quotes.author: Ronnie James Dio

quotes.text: I was just a young guy who was excited to become a comedian and an actor and I just wanted to get to do what I got to do.
quotes.author: Adam Sandler

quotes.text: I have so much more to go through as a young lady. But oh my God. I feel like I can do anything.
quotes.author: Brandy Norwood

quotes.text: So curiosity, I think, is a really important aspect of staying young or youthful.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.text: It was amazing that a play that seems dated in this world... A man whose best friend is a six-foot white rabbit... But it caught on, especially with young people - they surprised me most of all.
quotes.author: James Stewart

quotes.text: I wonder why it is, that young men are always cautioned against bad girls. Anyone can handle a bad girl. It's the good girls men should be warned against.
quotes.author: David Niven

quotes.text: There are forces all around you who wish to exploit division, rob you of your freedom, and tell you what to think. But young folks can rekindle the weary spirit of a slumbering nation.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.text: The things that I have said when I was young and curious about whatever the subject matter was, I respect those - those are growing pains. Even if you make mistakes, I go back to those things, my not-so-great moments because those are my truest moments; those are my human moments. I'm not even mad at the things I said that were a little dicey.
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.text: I think my grandmother saw my potential first. When I was young, I told her, 'I think I should get a job.' She said, 'No, just keep boxing.'
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quotes.text: I have a ship's bed, which totally plays to my obsession of, if I were not an actress, I would be a pirate.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I went to a strict elementary school with nuns, and uniforms that I'm pretty sure were made out of sandpaper. It was an academic, sports-oriented place. I liked to read, and wanted to act, and didn't try out for volleyball. I was weird. The other girls would dip my hair in ink and stuff.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I think feminism's a bit misinterpreted. It was about casting off all gender roles. There's nothing wrong with a man holding a door open for a girl. But we sort of threw away all the rules, so everybody's confused. And dating becomes a sloppy, uncomfortable, unpleasant thing.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: My dad has always been really helpful. He taught me that talent is a bonus, but persistence is what wins out.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: People idealize or reminisce about their 20s, but nobody tells you beforehand that it's hard and unglamorous and often very unpleasant.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: But my father was also the one who told me I needed to clean up my mouth or I'd never find a man. What's very important to him is manners. Show up on time. Always send thank-you letters. He is one of the more thoughtful humans I've ever met. He's a great man and a very good dad.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I'm a little bit of a weirdo - I'm kind of a loner, I didn't go to college, I spend a lot of my time reading. I've been working since I was 17, so that's sort of been my life.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: A lot of people in line at the grocery store think that they know me, but they don't.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: Comedy arises out of necessity, because some things are so dark that you have to laugh about it.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I am an avid reader! As for writing, I might - someday. But we'll have to wait and see.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: The lighthearted moments of 'Girls' are really not speckled throughout and that to me is just super exciting, to be able to delve into the darkness that you are greeted with in your early 20s and the fear and what that makes you do, the places that you can potentially go with that.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: All the characters on 'Girls' are growing and changing, which is how real people behave, especially when we're young, trying to figure out who we are, doing things that are the polar opposite of our characteristics.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: Give me an 18-hour day on set or in the theater, and I will be the happiest person alive.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I am a private human.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I did 'Mad Men' and I still have people come up to me like, 'Are you actually a lesbian?' Really? Just because I play one on TV? People will think what they're gonna think.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I don't know if I would call myself a religious human.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I don't watch much television. My old TV agent used to always get mad at me because he'd send me out on auditions and I'd be like, 'What's this show?' and he'd be like, 'It's literally the top show on television.' I wasn't allowed to watch TV as a kid.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I grew up backstage and on movie sets, and I thought they were the most magical places on Earth.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I have quite a foul mouth.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I haven't found it to be particularly enjoyable... ninety percent of the time when I go on dates, I'm thinking, 'I could be reading my book instead.'
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I miss my horse. He's in Los Angeles.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I think any actor in their right mind is afraid of getting pigeonholed.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I would have been miserable in college. I always hated school.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: My mom was onstage when she was pregnant with me.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: With 'Girls,' it doesn't really feel like I'm doing TV specifically. It just feels like we're making a really long film.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I have a ship's bed, which totally plays to my obsession of, if I were not an actress, I would be a pirate.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I don't watch much television. My old TV agent used to always get mad at me because he'd send me out on auditions and I'd be like, 'What's this show?' and he'd be like, 'It's literally the top show on television.' I wasn't allowed to watch TV as a kid.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I grew up backstage and on movie sets, and I thought they were the most magical places on Earth.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I have quite a foul mouth.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I haven't found it to be particularly enjoyable... ninety percent of the time when I go on dates, I'm thinking, 'I could be reading my book instead.'
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I have a ship's bed, which totally plays to my obsession of, if I were not an actress, I would be a pirate.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I went to a strict elementary school with nuns, and uniforms that I'm pretty sure were made out of sandpaper. It was an academic, sports-oriented place. I liked to read, and wanted to act, and didn't try out for volleyball. I was weird. The other girls would dip my hair in ink and stuff.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I think feminism's a bit misinterpreted. It was about casting off all gender roles. There's nothing wrong with a man holding a door open for a girl. But we sort of threw away all the rules, so everybody's confused. And dating becomes a sloppy, uncomfortable, unpleasant thing.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: My dad has always been really helpful. He taught me that talent is a bonus, but persistence is what wins out.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: People idealize or reminisce about their 20s, but nobody tells you beforehand that it's hard and unglamorous and often very unpleasant.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: But my father was also the one who told me I needed to clean up my mouth or I'd never find a man. What's very important to him is manners. Show up on time. Always send thank-you letters. He is one of the more thoughtful humans I've ever met. He's a great man and a very good dad.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I'm a little bit of a weirdo - I'm kind of a loner, I didn't go to college, I spend a lot of my time reading. I've been working since I was 17, so that's sort of been my life.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: A lot of people in line at the grocery store think that they know me, but they don't.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: Comedy arises out of necessity, because some things are so dark that you have to laugh about it.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I am an avid reader! As for writing, I might - someday. But we'll have to wait and see.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: The lighthearted moments of 'Girls' are really not speckled throughout and that to me is just super exciting, to be able to delve into the darkness that you are greeted with in your early 20s and the fear and what that makes you do, the places that you can potentially go with that.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: All the characters on 'Girls' are growing and changing, which is how real people behave, especially when we're young, trying to figure out who we are, doing things that are the polar opposite of our characteristics.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: Give me an 18-hour day on set or in the theater, and I will be the happiest person alive.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I am a private human.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I did 'Mad Men' and I still have people come up to me like, 'Are you actually a lesbian?' Really? Just because I play one on TV? People will think what they're gonna think.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I don't know if I would call myself a religious human.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I don't watch much television. My old TV agent used to always get mad at me because he'd send me out on auditions and I'd be like, 'What's this show?' and he'd be like, 'It's literally the top show on television.' I wasn't allowed to watch TV as a kid.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I grew up backstage and on movie sets, and I thought they were the most magical places on Earth.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I have quite a foul mouth.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: I haven't found it to be particularly enjoyable... ninety percent of the time when I go on dates, I'm thinking, 'I could be reading my book instead.'
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
quotes.author: Max Muller

quotes.text: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.text: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.text: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Happy is the man who finds a true friend, and far happier is he who finds that true friend in his wife.
quotes.author: Franz Schubert

quotes.text: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.text: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
quotes.author: Lana Turner

quotes.text: There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.
quotes.author: Charles Morgan

quotes.text: What light is to the eyes - what air is to the lungs - what love is to the heart, liberty is to the soul of man.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.text: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less, but Nature more.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: A fool thinks himself to be wise, but a wise man knows himself to be a fool.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.text: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.text: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.text: No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice blessed indeed.
quotes.author: Godfrey Winn

quotes.text: Change does not roll in on the wheels of inevitability, but comes through continuous struggle. And so we must straighten our backs and work for our freedom. A man can't ride you unless your back is bent.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: I was given such a great gift. It's a miracle that never stops amazing me and reminding me to give thanks, every day. Having a wife and daughter gives me a lot more purpose. I was much more selfish before, but now I think about what kind of role model I'll be. I just want to be a better man.
quotes.author: Jake Owen

quotes.text: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: A smart man makes a mistake, learns from it, and never makes that mistake again. But a wise man finds a smart man and learns from him how to avoid the mistake altogether.
quotes.author: Roy H. Williams

quotes.text: Faith is a living, daring confidence in God's grace, so sure and certain that a man could stake his life on it a thousand times.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: Money has never made man happy, nor will it, there is nothing in its nature to produce happiness. The more of it one has the more one wants.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players: they have their exits and their entrances; and one man in his time plays many parts, his acts being seven ages.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Non-violence is the greatest force at the disposal of mankind. It is mightier than the mightiest weapon of destruction devised by the ingenuity of man.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: One must be a living man and a posthumous artist.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.text: The only man who never makes a mistake is the man who never does anything.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car; but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: I'm a handsome man with a charming personality.
quotes.author: Gabe Newell

quotes.text: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: I firmly believe that any man's finest hour, the greatest fulfillment of all that he holds dear, is that moment when he has worked his heart out in a good cause and lies exhausted on the field of battle - victorious.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: A superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: When power leads man toward arrogance, poetry reminds him of his limitations. When power narrows the area of man's concern, poetry reminds him of the richness and diversity of existence. When power corrupts, poetry cleanses.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man's life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.text: Every man gotta right to decide his own destiny.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: There can be no failure to a man who has not lost his courage, his character, his self respect, or his self-confidence. He is still a King.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.text: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Man is free at the moment he wishes to be.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.text: Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man's desire to understand.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.text: Love him or hate him, Trump is a man who is certain about what he wants and sets out to get it, no holds barred. Women find his power almost as much of a turn-on as his money.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: You know, fame is a funny thing, man, especially, you know, actors, musicians, rappers, rock singers, it's kind of a lifestyle and it's easy to get caught up in it - you go to bars, you go to clubs, everyone's doing a certain thing... It's tough.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.text: Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Plans to protect air and water, wilderness and wildlife are in fact plans to protect man.
quotes.author: Stewart Udall

quotes.text: Fine art is that in which the hand, the head, and the heart of man go together.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: Man is still the most extraordinary computer of all.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: They tell us that suicide is the greatest piece of cowardice... that suicide is wrong; when it is quite obvious that there is nothing in the world to which every man has a more unassailable title than to his own life and person.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: The good man is the friend of all living things.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music which he hears, however measured or far away.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: We all want progress, but if you're on the wrong road, progress means doing an about-turn and walking back to the right road; in that case, the man who turns back soonest is the most progressive.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: If you want something said, ask a man; if you want something done, ask a woman.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: In law a man is guilty when he violates the rights of others. In ethics he is guilty if he only thinks of doing so.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.text: The condition of man... is a condition of war of everyone against everyone.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.text: I declare to you that woman must not depend upon the protection of man, but must be taught to protect herself, and there I take my stand.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.text: The white man's happiness cannot be purchased by the black man's misery.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.text: Every man must decide whether he will walk in the light of creative altruism or in the darkness of destructive selfishness.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Man maintains his balance, poise, and sense of security only as he is moving forward.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.text: There is a sufficiency in the world for man's need but not for man's greed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: I believe in the brotherhood of man, all men, but I don't believe in brotherhood with anybody who doesn't want brotherhood with me. I believe in treating people right, but I'm not going to waste my time trying to treat somebody right who doesn't know how to return the treatment.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: Men ought either to be indulged or utterly destroyed, for if you merely offend them they take vengeance, but if you injure them greatly they are unable to retaliate, so that the injury done to a man ought to be such that vengeance cannot be feared.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.text: Time sometimes flies like a bird, sometimes crawls like a snail; but a man is happiest when he does not even notice whether it passes swiftly or slowly.
quotes.author: Ivan Turgenev

quotes.text: A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.
quotes.author: Saint Basil

quotes.text: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.text: I am an ordinary man who worked hard to develop the talent I was given. I believed in myself, and I believe in the goodness of others.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Each time a man stands up for an ideal, or acts to improve the lot of others, or strikes out against injustice, he sends forth a tiny ripple of hope, and crossing each other from a million different centers of energy and daring, those ripples build a current that can sweep down the mightiest walls of oppression and resistance.
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.text: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.text: He was a wise man who invented beer.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.text: A beautiful woman delights the eye; a wise woman, the understanding; a pure one, the soul.
quotes.author: Minna Antrim

quotes.text: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: My mother was the most beautiful woman I ever saw. All I am I owe to my mother. I attribute all my success in life to the moral, intellectual and physical education I received from her.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: I know who I am. I am not perfect. I'm not the most beautiful woman in the world. But I'm one of them.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.text: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
quotes.author: Lana Turner

quotes.text: The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mode but the true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It is the caring that she lovingly gives the passion that she shows. The beauty of a woman grows with the passing years.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyere

quotes.text: When virtue and modesty enlighten her charms, the lustre of a beautiful woman is brighter than the stars of heaven, and the influence of her power it is in vain to resist.
quotes.author: Akhenaton

quotes.text: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.text: No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice blessed indeed.
quotes.author: Godfrey Winn

quotes.text: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: The highest prize in a world of men is the most beautiful woman available on your arm and living there in her heart loyal to you.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.text: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

quotes.text: When you look at the light bulb above you, you remember Thomas Alva Edison. When the telephone bell rings, you remember Alexander Graham Bell. Marie Curie was the first woman to win the Nobel Prize. When you see the blue sky, you think of Sir C.V. Raman.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: The most important thing is to have a good relationship with the bike... you have to understand what she wants. I think of a motorcycle as a woman, and I know that sounds silly, but it's true.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: If you want something said, ask a man; if you want something done, ask a woman.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: I declare to you that woman must not depend upon the protection of man, but must be taught to protect herself, and there I take my stand.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.text: I hope that my daughter grows up empowered and doesn't define herself by the way she looks but by qualities that make her a intelligent, strong and responsible woman.
quotes.author: Isaiah Mustafa

quotes.text: A beautiful woman must expect to be more accountable for her steps, than one less attractive.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.text: There is only one thing that a man really wants to do, all his life; and that is, to find his way to his God, his Morning Star, salute his fellow man, and enjoy the woman who has come the long way with him.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.text: The true man wants two things: danger and play. For that reason he wants woman, as the most dangerous plaything.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Over the years I have learned that what is important in a dress is the woman who is wearing it.
quotes.author: Yves Saint Laurent

quotes.text: The definition of a beautiful woman is one who loves me.
quotes.author: Sloan Wilson

quotes.text: There is a part of me that will forever want to be walking under autumn leaves, carrying a briefcase containing the works of Shakespeare and Yeats and a portable chess set. I will pass an old tree under which once on a summer night I lay on the grass with a fragrant young woman and we quoted e.e. cummings back and forth.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.text: I like a man who looks like a bad boy but knows how to treat a woman like a queen.
quotes.author: Candice Swanepoel

quotes.text: Bride: A woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: A man never knows how to say goodbye; a woman never knows when to say it.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: Greatness is not measured by what a man or woman accomplishes, but by the opposition he or she has overcome to reach his goals.
quotes.author: Dorothy Height

quotes.text: I feel there is something unexplored about woman that only a woman can explore.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.text: Do you know the difference between a beautiful woman and a charming one? A beauty is a woman you notice, a charmer is one who notices you.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.text: A really strong woman accepts the war she went through and is ennobled by her scars.
quotes.author: Carly Simon

quotes.text: The woman who thinks she is intelligent demands equal rights with men. A woman who is intelligent does not.
quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quotes.text: I'm not a stereotypically beautiful woman, and I'm so happy that I'm not. I've seen those ladies - the need to be attractive at all times is ghastly. Also, in your twenties, if you are beautiful, everything comes to you, so you never need to develop a personality. I never had that problem.
quotes.author: Miranda Hart

quotes.text: I believe marriage is between a man and a woman. I am not in favor of gay marriage. But when you start playing around with constitutions, just to prohibit somebody who cares about another person, it just seems to me that's not what America's about. Usually, our constitutions expand liberties, they don't contract them.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Bananas are great, as I believe them to be the only known cure for existential dread. Also, Mother Teresa said that in India, a woman dying in the street will share her banana with anyone who needs it, whereas in America, people amass and hoard as many bananas as they can to sell for an exorbitant profit. So half of them go bad, anyway.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: Trust me that as I ignore all law to help the slave, so will I ignore it all to protect an enslaved woman.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.text: Man is defined as a human being and a woman as a female - whenever she behaves as a human being she is said to imitate the male.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.text: I do not want a husband who honours me as a queen, if he does not love me as a woman.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.text: Happiness? A good cigar, a good meal, a good cigar and a good woman - or a bad woman; it depends on how much happiness you can handle.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.text: Beauty is also submitted to the taste of time, so a beautiful woman from the Belle Epoch is not exactly the perfect beauty of today, so beauty is something that changes with time.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.text: Let's be clear, I'm a strong woman.
quotes.author: Bethenny Frankel

quotes.text: No man should marry until he has studied anatomy and dissected at least one woman.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: No woman ever hates a man for being in love with her, but many a woman hate a man for being a friend to her.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.text: The world's biggest power is the youth and beauty of a woman.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: I just see myself as just an ordinary chick from Florida, not some beautiful woman.
quotes.author: Jennifer Sky

quotes.text: To be in love is merely to be in a state of perceptual anesthesia - to mistake an ordinary young woman for a goddess.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: A diplomat is a man who always remembers a woman's birthday but never remembers her age.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Character contributes to beauty. It fortifies a woman as her youth fades. A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude, and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Bisset

quotes.text: No man is good enough to govern any woman without her consent.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.text: We have this American president, Obama, born of an African father, who is saying we will not give you aid if you don't embrace homosexuality. We ask, was he born out of homosexuality? We need continuity in our race, and that comes from the woman, and no to homosexuality.
quotes.author: Robert Mugabe

quotes.text: If you look good, you can act in a Bollywood movie, you don't have to be able to act; and Aishwarya Rai is a great example of this. She is a beautiful woman... You look at her, I want to look at her. Damn, she is fine; but stop acting or stop trying to act.
quotes.author: Russell Peters

quotes.text: The day may be approaching when the whole world will recognize woman as the equal of man.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.text: A beautiful woman should break her mirror early.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.text: This society is driven by neurotic speed and force accelerated by greed and frustration of not being able to live up to the image of men and woman we have created for ourselves; the image has nothing to do with the reality of people.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: I think it takes a strong man to be in a relationship with a strong woman. A lot of people hear the word 'diva' and think of it as a negative. I see it as a positive. I want somebody who knows what they want out of life and isn't afraid to show it.
quotes.author: Nick Cannon

quotes.text: I've already told you: the only way to a woman's heart is along the path of torment. I know none other as sure.
quotes.author: Marquis de Sade

quotes.text: Every woman needs to know the facts. And the fact is, when it comes to breast cancer, every woman is at risk.
quotes.author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

quotes.text: The best protection any woman can have... is courage.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.text: A wise woman puts a grain of sugar into everything she says to a man, and takes a grain of salt with everything he says to her.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: If society will not admit of woman's free development, then society must be remodeled.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Blackwell

quotes.text: Enable every woman who can work to take her place on the labour front, under the principle of equal pay for equal work.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.text: A Jewish woman had two chickens. One got sick, so the woman made chicken soup out of the other one to help the sick one get well.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: I was raised to be an independent woman, not the victim of anything.
quotes.author: Kamala Harris

quotes.text: A thinking woman sleeps with monsters.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.text: I will cut off this right arm of mine before I will ask for the ballot for the Negro and not for the woman.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.text: If you want to be a real human being - a real woman, a real man - you cannot tolerate things which put you to indignation, to outrage. You must stand up. I always say to people, 'Look around; look at what makes you unhappy, what makes you furious, and then engage yourself in some action.'
quotes.author: Stephane Hessel

quotes.text: Quite often my narrator or protagonist may be a man, but I'm not sure he's the more interesting character, or if the more complex character isn't the woman.
quotes.author: Ann Beattie

quotes.text: I really think that there was a great advantage in many ways to being a woman. I think we are a lot better at personal relationships, and then have the capability obviously of telling it like it is when it's necessary.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.text: You know, I'm a curvy woman and I just want to be comfortable with that.
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.text: A woman drove me to drink and I didn't even have the decency to thank her.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: Sometimes people are like, 'Do you want to play strong women?' I don't have to play strong women in order to feel like a strong woman myself, but I do feel it's important to play characters that are complex and interesting and believable.
quotes.author: Bryce Dallas Howard

quotes.text: It is a woman's nature to be constant - to love one and one only, blindly, tenderly, and for ever - bless them, dear creatures!
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.text: I really think that it's disgusting that Paris is the only place where it is illegal for paps to follow you around. It actually took someone losing their life - Diana, an inspirational woman - and then it changed, but they still won't change it in London! It's horrible!
quotes.author: Cara Delevingne

quotes.text: No one knows like a woman how to say things which are at once gentle and deep.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: I've always been the guy who doesn't necessarily get it with women. A woman would have to say, 'I like you, I want to go out with you, you can ask me.' And still I would question it. Did she mean it?
quotes.author: Kevin James

quotes.text: Now, if there was one woman in the world who didn't need publicity, who always had too much publicity, it was me.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.text: There isn't a woman player in the world I can't give knights-odds to and still beat.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.text: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.
quotes.author: Abhishek Bachchan

quotes.text: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend - or a meaningful day.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: No one wants to die. Even people who want to go to heaven don't want to die to get there. And yet death is the destination we all share. No one has ever escaped it. And that is as it should be, because Death is very likely the single best invention of Life. It is Life's change agent. It clears out the old to make way for the new.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
quotes.author: Ausonius

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: How old would you be if you didn't know how old you are?
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: To a father growing old nothing is dearer than a daughter.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: To raise new questions, new possibilities, to regard old problems from a new angle, requires creative imagination and marks real advance in science.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Life's tragedy is that we get old too soon and wise too late.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: When marrying, ask yourself this question: Do you believe that you will be able to converse well with this person into your old age? Everything else in marriage is transitory.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: All that is gold does not glitter, not all those who wander are lost; the old that is strong does not wither, deep roots are not reached by the frost.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.text: I never feel lonely if I've got a book - they're like old friends. Even if you're not reading them over and over again, you know they are there. And they're part of your history. They sort of tell a story about your journey through life.
quotes.author: Emilia Fox

quotes.text: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: You don't have to have anything in common with people you've known since you were five. With old friends, you've got your whole life in common.
quotes.author: Lyle Lovett

quotes.text: There is a part of me that will forever want to be walking under autumn leaves, carrying a briefcase containing the works of Shakespeare and Yeats and a portable chess set. I will pass an old tree under which once on a summer night I lay on the grass with a fragrant young woman and we quoted e.e. cummings back and forth.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.text: It is a rare and difficult attainment to grow old gracefully and happily.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.text: I have two homes, like someone who leaves their hometown and/or parents and then establishes a life elsewhere. They might say that they're going home when they return to see old friends or parents, but then they go home as well when they go to where they live now. Sarajevo is home, Chicago is home.
quotes.author: Aleksandar Hemon

quotes.text: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
quotes.author: Al Lopez

quotes.text: The old believe everything, the middle-aged suspect everything, the young know everything.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: You know you're getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.text: It's fine to have social media that connects us with old friends, but we need tools that help us discover new people as well.
quotes.author: Ethan Zuckerman

quotes.text: When granted many years of life, growing old in age is natural, but growing old with grace is a choice. Growing older with grace is possible for all who will set their hearts and minds on the Giver of grace, the Lord Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.text: I really don't think in the past. I sit down with many friends at dinner, and they like to talk about the good old days. I'm respectful of the good old days, but I find myself spending very little time reminiscing. I'm really looking forward.
quotes.author: Donald Bren

quotes.text: In 50 years, I don't think you're gonna look back at 2006 and say, 'The good old days.'
quotes.author: Brandon Flowers

quotes.text: Old friends are best.
quotes.author: John Selden

quotes.text: Make new friends, but keep the old; Those are silver, these are gold.
quotes.author: Joseph Parry

quotes.text: I saw old Autumn in the misty morn stand shadowless like silence, listening to silence.
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.text: I took a deep breath and listened to the old bray of my heart. I am. I am. I am.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.text: Awards can give you a tremendous amount of encouragement to keep getting better, no matter how young or old you are.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.text: Old minds are like old horses; you must exercise them if you wish to keep them in working order.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.text: You're never too old, too wacky, too wild, to pick up a book and read to a child.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: We must restore hope to young people, help the old, be open to the future, spread love. Be poor among the poor. We need to include the excluded and preach peace.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: I believe in God, but not as one thing, not as an old man in the sky. I believe that what people call God is something in all of us. I believe that what Jesus and Mohammed and Buddha and all the rest said was right. It's just that the translations have gone wrong.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Your days are short here; this is the last of your springs. And now in the serenity and quiet of this lovely place, touch the depths of truth, feel the hem of Heaven. You will go away with old, good friends. And don't forget when you leave why you came.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.text: Computers are like Old Testament gods; lots of rules and no mercy.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: This war differs from other wars, in this particular. We are not fighting armies but a hostile people, and must make old and young, rich and poor, feel the hard hand of war.
quotes.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

quotes.text: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life; now that I am old I know that it is.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The best mirror is an old friend.
quotes.author: Peter Nivio Zarlenga

quotes.text: Liberal democracy - as you know, in the old days, we were saying we want socialism with a human face. Today's left effectively offers global capitalism with a human face, more tolerance, more rights and so on. So the question is, is this enough or not? Here I remain a Marxist: I think not.
quotes.author: Slavoj Zizek

quotes.text: Old books that have ceased to be of service should no more be abandoned than should old friends who have ceased to give pleasure.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.text: I'm not the sort to wallow in nostalgia about the good old days.
quotes.author: Kabir Bedi

quotes.text: In the old days, you would have one lawyer to handle everything: speeding tickets, buying a house, contracts, litigation, real estate, copyrights, leasing, entertainment, intellectual property, forensic accounting, criminal offenses... the list goes on. Now, you have to have a separate lawyer for each one of those categories!
quotes.author: James Belushi

quotes.text: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
quotes.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quotes.text: You are as young as your self-confidence, as old as your fears; as young as your hope, as old as your despair.
quotes.author: Samuel Ullman

quotes.text: At 9 years old, I moved in with my father because my mother could no longer care for me. Looking back, I now see so many similarities between my own childhood and that of my sons. My father stepped in when I needed him, and that gave me the chance for a better life. That's what I'm doing for my boys now.
quotes.author: Dwyane Wade

quotes.text: Following the light of the sun, we left the Old World.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.text: To be with old friends is very warming and comforting.
quotes.author: Ian Ziering

quotes.text: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.text: I enjoy nothing more than spending time with my loved ones, young and old, and at least once a year we get together for a formal family photograph.
quotes.author: Elliott Erwitt

quotes.text: I'm not trying to be new school and I'm not old school - I'm classic. There's a lot of new cars and there's a lot of old cars, but I'm just classic in doing what I do.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.text: Looking through the atmosphere is somewhat like looking through a piece of old, stained glass. The glass has defects in it, so the image is blurred from that.
quotes.author: Nancy Roman

quotes.text: Read my letter to the old folks, and give my love to them, and tell my brothers to be always watching unto prayer, and when the good old ship of Zion comes along, to be ready to step aboard.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: To reminisce with my old friends, a chance to share some memories, and play our songs again.
quotes.author: Ricky Nelson

quotes.text: Some say that now that 50 years have passed, we would like another 50 more years to celebrate once again; that means it will be 100 years. After one hundred years, I will be 118 years old.
quotes.author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quotes.text: A young man who isn't a socialist hasn't got a heart; an old man who is a socialist hasn't got a head.
quotes.author: David Lloyd George

quotes.text: I wish they'd had electric guitars in cotton fields back in the good old days. A whole lot of things would've been straightened out.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: A young man is a theory, an old man is a fact.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.text: Canada is like an old cow. The West feeds it. Ontario and Quebec milk it. And you can well imagine what it's doing in the Maritimes.
quotes.author: Tommy Douglas

quotes.text: The Old Testament teaches us that if we humble ourselves and pray, God will hear from heaven and heal our land. And the New Testament assures us that the fervent prayers of righteous men can make a difference.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.text: The past is an old armchair in the attic, the present an ominous ticking sound, and the future is anybody's guess.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.text: When I was 5 years old, we had nothing in the village. One day, in front of my house, some soldiers in a big Cadillac started to do a picnic. I looked at them like they were coming from the moon. I remember they gave me a box of rice pudding - that, for me, was the American Dream.
quotes.author: Renzo Rosso

quotes.text: You must become an old man in good time if you wish to be an old man long.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: And I continued to grow until I was 25 years old.
quotes.author: Julius Erving

quotes.text: Everything that rises sets, and everything that grows, grows old.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.text: No sociologist should think himself too good, even in his old age, to make tens of thousands of quite trivial computations in his head and perhaps for months at a time.
quotes.author: Max Weber

quotes.text: The earth has grown old with its burden of care, but at Christmas it always is young, the heart of the jewel burns lustrous and fair, and its soul full of music breaks the air, when the song of angels is sung.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.text: Changes in the traditional way of building are only permitted if they are an improvement. Otherwise stay with what is traditional, for truth, even if it be hundreds of years old has a stronger inner bond with us than the lie that walks by our side.
quotes.author: Adolf Loos

quotes.text: A man does not die of love or his liver or even of old age; he dies of being a man.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.text: I basically only read books that are over 2,000 years old.
quotes.author: Hans-Georg Gadamer

quotes.text: I have this old '57 Porsche Speedster, and the way the door closes, I'll just sit there and listen to the sound of the latch going, 'cluh-CLICK-click.' That door! I live for that door. Whatever the opposite of planned obsolescence is, that's what I'm into.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: When I was 7, an old lady was driving too fast in my neighborhood and hit me with her car. I was running out of the house, and when I got halfway into the street, my mom saw the car and yelled for me to run back. As I turned around the car hit me, dragged me five houses down the road, and I fractured my collarbone.
quotes.author: Rutina Wesley

quotes.text: I found myself in the doldrums in the early Nineties. I was too old to play the dolly bird any longer and I looked too young to play a woman of my real age. No one ever saw me as the aunt, mother or grandmother.
quotes.author: Barbara Windsor

quotes.text: It is of immense importance for the understanding of the word of God, to read it in course, so that we may read every day a portion of the Old and a portion of the New Testament, going on where we previously left off.
quotes.author: George Muller

quotes.text: I started to like blues, I guess, when I was about 6 or 7 years old. There was something about it, because nobody else played that kind of music.
quotes.author: B. B. King

quotes.text: How did I become a star? I don't know how it happened. When I look at my old pictures, I can't tell how it happened!
quotes.author: Fatty Arbuckle

quotes.text: There's enormous energy required to carry grudges - enormous energy! And I'm getting too old to expend my energy that way, cause I think every person has a limited amount of energy. So I have given up all grudges.
quotes.author: Ed Koch

quotes.text: Understand, our police officers put their lives on the line for us every single day. They've got a tough job to do to maintain public safety and hold accountable those who break the law.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: When you have police officers who abuse citizens, you erode public confidence in law enforcement. That makes the job of good police officers unsafe.
quotes.author: Mary Frances Berry

quotes.text: Let me be clear - no one is above the law. Not a politician, not a priest, not a criminal, not a police officer. We are all accountable for our actions.
quotes.author: Antonio Villaraigosa

quotes.text: The only dead bodies from marijuana are in the prisons and at the hands of the police. This is ridiculous.
quotes.author: Jack Herer

quotes.text: The police are the public and the public are the police; the police being only members of the public who are paid to give full time attention to duties which are incumbent on every citizen in the interests of community welfare and existence.
quotes.author: Robert Peel

quotes.text: Racial profiling punishes innocent individuals for the past actions of those who look and sound like them. It misdirects crucial resources and undercuts the trust needed between law enforcement and the communities they serve. It has no place in our national discourse, and no place in our nation's police departments.
quotes.author: Benjamin Todd Jealous

quotes.text: I realize I will always be the poster child for police brutality, but I can try to use that as a positive force for healing and restraint.
quotes.author: Rodney King

quotes.text: Police departments no longer have to pay overtime or divert resources from other projects to find out where an individual goes - all they have to do is place a tracking device on someone's car or ask a cell phone company for that individual's location history and the technology does the work for them.
quotes.author: Ron Wyden

quotes.text: Where the stakes are the highest, in the war on terror, we cannot possibly succeed without extraordinary international cooperation. Effective international police actions require the highest degree of intelligence sharing, planning and collaborative enforcement.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: I'm in prison. But my heart and mind is free. Gangsta haters on the streets are doing more time than me. They need 30 police escorts with them every time they walk down the street.
quotes.author: Suge Knight

quotes.text: The toilets at a local police station have been stolen. Police say they have nothing to go on.
quotes.author: Ronnie Barker

quotes.text: Police arrested two kids yesterday, one was drinking battery acid, the other was eating fireworks. They charged one and let the other one off.
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.text: Dictators must have enemies. They must have internal enemies to justify their secret police and external enemies to justify their military forces.
quotes.author: Richard Perle

quotes.text: It is poor civic hygiene to install technologies that could someday facilitate a police state.
quotes.author: Bruce Schneier

quotes.text: I was always a drama queen. I remember playing in the kitchen, trying to get my mom to think I was dead and call the police. When she didn't, I would cry. I was always theatrical. I don't think any of my relatives are surprised.
quotes.author: Amy Lee

quotes.text: There's only two people in your life you should lie to... the police and your girlfriend.
quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

quotes.text: How did we win the election in the year 2000? We talked about a humble foreign policy: No nation-building; don't police the world. That's conservative, it's Republican, it's pro-American - it follows the founding fathers. And, besides, it follows the Constitution.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.text: An invitation to a wedding invokes more trouble than a summons to a police court.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.text: I don't mind being identified as any character as long as I'm doing a good job as an actor. I have done all kinds of roles - from an editor, judge, police officer, murderer to a corrupt businessman.
quotes.author: Boman Irani

quotes.text: Communities of color don't understand what it means to be a police officer, the fear that police officers have in just being on the streets.
quotes.author: Eric Holder

quotes.text: In the police force, two, three, five traitors are detected who are really working for someone else. When we cleanse the police of them, the problem will be simplified a lot. Terrorists will have no one to contact - they will be left without informers.
quotes.author: Akhmad Kadyrov

quotes.text: No police department should hire more quickly than they can assimilate the people that they bring in, and we did. I take responsibility for it. It was the first opportunity I had to hire, and I wanted to do it, and I take responsibility.
quotes.author: Daryl Gates

quotes.text: I don't mind payin' for the police and for streets and sanitation, or road work, bridges, trains, food subsidies and welfare. But I don't wanna pay for bombs to fight proxy wars in the middle of nowhere against enemies in the night.
quotes.author: Lupe Fiasco

quotes.text: Popular culture tells you that schools and parents don't know what's going on, the police are dogs, politicians are all liars and scum, and any crime that's not committed by the Mafia is done by the CIA.
quotes.author: Stanley Crouch

quotes.text: It is a lot harder now to be a police officer than what it used to be.
quotes.author: Steven Seagal

quotes.text: To mark the 10-year anniversary of 9/11, I wanted to launch an FDNY shirt that pays tribute to the brave first responders who, like my father, risk their lives in the line of duty on a regular basis. All of the proceeds raised from the sale of the T-shirt benefit the New York Police & Fire Widows' & Children's Benefit Fund.
quotes.author: Mark Sanchez

quotes.text: A 'Globe' examination found that Boston police officers exercise broad discretion when deciding whether to issue a ticket.
quotes.author: Bill Dedman

quotes.text: Where I grew up - I grew up on the north side of Akron, lived in the projects. So those scared and lonely nights - that's every night. You hear a lot of police sirens, you hear a lot of gunfire. Things that you don't want your kids to hear growing up.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: Governments are out of control, irresponsible, never have enough money, never tighten their own belts, and when they are forced to, they always threaten to shut down police departments and teachers and all these things.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.text: The police can't protect consumers. People need to be more aware and educated about identity theft. You need to be a little bit wiser, a little bit smarter and there's nothing wrong with being skeptical. We live in a time when if you make it easy for someone to steal from you, someone will.
quotes.author: Frank Abagnale

quotes.text: In 1995, Russia virtually gave Chechnya de facto statehood and independence even though, de jure, it didn't recognize Chechnya as an independent state. And I would like to emphasize strongly that Russia withdrew all of its troops, we moved the prosecutors, we moved all the police, dismantled all the courts, completely, 100 percent.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.text: You built a factory out there, good for you. But I want to be clear. You moved your goods to market on the roads that the rest of us paid for. You hired workers that the rest of us paid to educate. You were safe in your factory because of police forces and fire forces that the rest of us paid for.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.text: I know when I was here prosecuting homicides in the District of Columbia, one of the most effective units here was the cold case squad, which had on it FBI agents, as well as Metropolitan Police Department homicide detectives working together.
quotes.author: Robert Mueller

quotes.text: Communism in Cuba will collapse sooner or later because you can't control the free flow of information. Communism prevents organizations from developing by stopping the flow of information. The system is based on police and listening devices and triggers the worst characteristics in humans.
quotes.author: Lech Walesa

quotes.text: I love race car drivers, I love gymnastics, I love UFC, I love police officers, I love firefighters. I just try to give them the same enjoyment they give me.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.text: You can't be afraid to put out a fire if you're a fireman. You can't be afraid to be a police officer and carry a gun if you're afraid to get up and go out there. So you've got to put that fear to the side and go out in faith to overcome that.
quotes.author: Duane Chapman

quotes.text: Parties are only bad when a fight breaks out, when men fight over women or vice versa. Someone takes a fall, an ambulance comes, and the police arrive. If you can avoid those things, pretty much all behaviour is acceptable.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.text: I went into journalism to learn the craft of writing and to get close to the world I wanted to write about - police and criminals, the criminal justice system.
quotes.author: Michael Connelly

quotes.text: My literature is much more the result of a paradox than that of an implacable logic, typical of police novels. The paradox is the tension that exists in my soul.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: There are terrible, terrible memories of September 11th, things that I saw, people that I lost, the devastation, the identification of bodies. I mean, all these memories come back to you at different times. And then the other side of it this tremendous response with the firefighters and the police officers saving people, the rescue workers.
quotes.author: Rudy Giuliani

quotes.text: Our people went out every single night trying to stop crime before it happened, trying to take people off the street that they believed were involved in crime. That made us a very aggressive, proactive police department.
quotes.author: Daryl Gates

quotes.text: Police and firefighters are great, but they don't create wealth. They protect it. That's crucial. Teaching is a wonderful profession. Teachers help educate people to become good citizens so that citizens can then go create wealth. But they don't create the wealth themselves.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.text: The Hell's Angels try not to do anything halfway, and anyone who deals in extremes is bound to cause trouble, whether he means to or not. This, along with a belief in total retaliation for any offense or insult, is what makes the Hell's Angels unmanageable for the police and morbidly fascinating to the general public.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: The police must obey the law while enforcing the law.
quotes.author: Earl Warren

quotes.text: If I win and get the money, then the Oakland Police department is going to buy a boys' home, me a house, my family a house, and a Stop Police Brutality Center.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.text: You only lie to two people in your life, your girlfriend and the police.
quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

quotes.text: Anywhere, anytime ordinary people are given the chance to choose, the choice is the same: freedom, not tyranny; democracy, not dictatorship; the rule of law, not the rule of the secret police.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.text: The Marine Corps is the Navy's police force and as long as I am President that is what it will remain. They have a propaganda machine that is almost equal to Stalin's.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: After a shooting spree, they always want to take the guns away from the people who didn't do it. I sure as hell wouldn't want to live in a society where the only people allowed guns are the police and the military.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.text: I've never had a problem with drugs. I've had problems with the police.
quotes.author: Keith Richards

quotes.text: Police in China can do whatever they want; after 81 days in arbitrary detention you clearly realise that they don't have to obey their own laws. In a society like this there is no negotiation, no discussion, except to tell you that power can crush you any time they want - not only you, your whole family and all people like you.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.text: The FBI's Counter-Intelligence Program would work hand-in-hand with police departments, literally planning attacks on Black Panther Party offices throughout the United States of America. They did this over a period of time.
quotes.author: Bobby Seale

quotes.text: I went to Zimbabwe. I know how white people feel in America now; relaxed! Cause when I heard the police car I knew they weren't coming after me!
quotes.author: Richard Pryor
