quotes.text: The war on drugs is not being won, and it continues to threaten stability and democracy not only in the Andes but throughout the Caribbean as well, where tiny police and military forces are outclassed by the sophisticated equipment in the hands of traffickers passing through the region on the way to their market in this country.
quotes.author: Elliott Abrams

quotes.text: There's a rumor that there may be an attempt at organizing a possible script for a series on my life, which, when you look at my police record, you'd have to have more than one hour to tell the story.
quotes.author: Merle Haggard

quotes.text: I always thought if I had a band it would have the energy and feel of early Police, since that's where my roots are, and then the harmonies of the Eagles, and the technique of King Crimson or something like that. Fast, up-tempo, beat-the-hell-out-of-the-drums, because that's my style. Energy, but sophistication, rhythmically and melodically.
quotes.author: Taylor Hawkins

quotes.text: Bathtub falls and police officers kill more Americans than terrorism, yet we've been asked to sacrifice our most sacred rights for fear of falling victim to it.
quotes.author: Edward Snowden

quotes.text: When a young non-white male is stopped and searched at the whim of a police officer, his idea of personal space, privacy and self esteem are shattered, to say nothing of his Fourth and Fourteenth Amendment protections. The damage goes deep quickly and stays. Stop & frisk, as well as a tactic, is also an incitement.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: In West Virginia yesterday, a man was arrested for stealing several blow-up dolls. Reportedly, police didn't have any trouble catching the man because he was completely out of breath.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.text: My epiphany came in that police cell: I realised I was about to lose everything and it didn't bother me, not in the slightest. I'd come to hate cycling because I blamed it for the lie I was living.
quotes.author: David Millar

quotes.text: I read Freud because I find him an excellent writer... a writer of police thrillers that can be followed with great passion.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.text: What impressed me particularly in Vienna was the strict order everywhere. No mob disturbances of any kind, in spite of the greatly increased liberty and relaxation of police regulations.
quotes.author: Fritz Kreisler

quotes.text: I never let anyone pluck, including myself, unless my mom approves. She guards my eyebrows. She's like the eyebrow police!
quotes.author: Isabelle Fuhrman

quotes.text: Let me completely condemn these sickening scenes; scenes of looting, scenes of vandalism, scenes of thieving, scenes of people attacking police, of people even attacking firefighters. This is criminality pure and simple and it has to be confronted.
quotes.author: David Cameron

quotes.text: Notre Dame and Sydney - that was nothing. Notre Dame doesn't have a police station; it is not 1,000 or so feet high. It was a public structure, very easy to access. And Sydney Harbour Bridge was half-and-half: a bridge, in the middle of the night. The World Trade Center was the end of the world. Electronic devices, police dogs.
quotes.author: Philippe Petit

quotes.text: In high school, a teacher's friend in the police department asked me to go into a bar and flash a fake ID saying I was 21 even though I wasn't. They were assuming the bar wasn't carding people. Anyway, she forgot to ask for it back. I used it all freshman year in college.
quotes.author: Betsy Brandt

quotes.text: I haven't reported my missing credit card to the police because whoever stole it is spending less than my wife.
quotes.author: Ilie Nastase

quotes.text: No one knew what Rodney King had done beforehand to be stopped. No one realized that he was a parolee and that he was violating his parole. No one knew any of those things. All they saw was this grainy film and police officers hitting him over the head.
quotes.author: Daryl Gates

quotes.text: Unquestionably, it was going to be highly dangerous. Yet I felt it was quite natural to jump at the task. After all, if you don't like action and excitement, you don't go into police work. And, what the hell, I figured, nobody lives forever!
quotes.author: Eliot Ness

quotes.text: Coming up in the Bay Area and being African American in a city that has a history of complex issues of violent crime, interaction with the police is always intense. That's something you have to learn. My mom taught me at a young age that if ever a cop stops you, you put your hands up and freeze - don't move.
quotes.author: Ryan Coogler

quotes.text: You don't need any indictment in order to arrest someone; probable cause is sufficient to arrest civilians, so it must be enough to arrest police.
quotes.author: Al Sharpton

quotes.text: In China, Internet surveillance has already become a profitable industry. In fact, a growing number of private firms eagerly assist the local police by aggregating this data and presenting it in easy-to-browse formats, allowing humans to pursue more analytical tasks.
quotes.author: Evgeny Morozov

quotes.text: Either we need to redefine what probable cause means and say that police are not subject to it, or we arrest officers right away just as we would with any other person accused of committing a crime. Either we write new laws or enforce existing ones; we cannot have it both ways.
quotes.author: Al Sharpton

quotes.text: On the one hand, the guns were there to help capture the imagination of the people. But more important, since we knew that you couldn't observe the police without guns, we took our guns with us to let the police know that we have an equalizer.
quotes.author: Bobby Seale

quotes.text: As for civil liberties, any one who is not vigilant may one day find himself living, if not in a police state, at least in a police city.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.text: Pray for someone else's child, your pastor, the military, the police officers, the firemen, the teachers, the government. There's no end to the ways that you can intervene on behalf of others through prayer.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.text: Asking questions is an essential part of police investigation. In the ordinary sense a police officer is free to ask a person for identification without implicating the Fourth Amendment.
quotes.author: Anthony Kennedy

quotes.text: The reason I like the criminal justice system is there aren't Republican or Democrat victims or police officers or prosecutors. It's about respect for the rule of law!
quotes.author: Trey Gowdy

quotes.text: We'd all survive if Twitter shut down for a short while during major riots. Social media isn't any more important than a train station, a road or a bus service. We don't worry about police temporarily closing those. Common sense. If riot info and fear is spreading by Facebook and Twitter, shut them off for an hour or two, then restore.
quotes.author: Louise Mensch

quotes.text: There are not enough jails, not enough police, not enough courts to enforce a law not supported by the people.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.text: The role of women has always been undervalued in the spy world, always undermined in terms of recognition. Unfairly so. It's a world that needs women.
quotes.author: Helen Mirren

quotes.text: Ask yourself: if I were a Chinese spy, why wouldn't I have flown directly into Beijing? I could be living in a palace petting a phoenix by now.
quotes.author: Edward Snowden

quotes.text: I am literally the worst person at keeping secrets. I'd be the worst spy of all time.
quotes.author: Keri Russell

quotes.text: The creation of George Smiley, the retired spy recalled to hunt for just such a high-ranking mole in 'Tinker, Tailor,' was extremely personal. I borrowed elements of people I admired and invested them in this mythical character. I'm such a fluent, specious person now, but I was an extremely awkward fellow in those days.
quotes.author: John le Carre

quotes.text: Spy novels are traditionally about lone wolves, but how many people actually live like that?
quotes.author: Alan Furst

quotes.text: Everybody calls everybody a spy, secretly, in Russia, and everybody is under surveillance. You never feel safe.
quotes.author: Agnes Smedley

quotes.text: 'I Spy' represents the absence of the tension of the black man or black woman or anyone of that color walking in, so that the white racist person can become entertaining to a viewer.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.text: What I'm getting at is, you know, if we really want to get serious about helping all the people living in the street and getting people jobs, we could just hire half the people in the country to spy on the other half.
quotes.author: Jello Biafra

quotes.text: My notion of the KGB came from romantic spy stories. I was a pure and utterly successful product of Soviet patriotic education.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.text: The idea of aerial military surveillance dates back to the Civil War, when both the Union and the Confederacy used hot-air balloons to spy on the other side, tracking troop movements and helping to direct artillery fire.
quotes.author: Michael Hastings

quotes.text: I give my grandfather, Dr Harold Young, a forestry Professor at the University of Maine, full credit for my career path. He pioneered the use of aerial photography in forestry in the 1950s, and we think he worked as a spy for the CIA during the Cold War, mapping Russian installations.
quotes.author: Sarah Parcak

quotes.text: It's part of a writer's profession, as it's part of a spy's profession, to prey on the community to which he's attached, to take away information - often in secret - and to translate that into intelligence for his masters, whether it's his readership or his spy masters. And I think that both professions are perhaps rather lonely.
quotes.author: John le Carre

quotes.text: For a spy novelist like me, the Edward J. Snowden story has everything. A man driven by ego and idealism - can anyone ever distinguish the two? - leaves his job and his beautiful girlfriend behind. He must tell the world the Panopticon has arrived. His masters vow to punish him, and he heads for Moscow in a desperate search for refuge.
quotes.author: Alex Berenson

quotes.text: I think 'I Spy,' still when you look at it, speaks volumes in terms of propaganda for equality. It's just magnificent.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.text: When I was growing up, I dreamed about becoming a cowgirl, a detective, a spy, a great actress, or a ballerina. Not a dentist, like my father, or a homemaker, like my mother - and certainly not a writer, although I always loved to read.
quotes.author: Judy Blume

quotes.text: I am on Facebook, but mainly as a way to spy on my children. I find out more about them from their Facebook pages than from what they tell me.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.text: My father was sleepless most of his life. So by the age of five, I was awake with him all night long, watching bad television or we'd lie in the same bed, and I'd read my comic books while he read his latest spy or mystery novel.
quotes.author: Sherman Alexie

quotes.text: I've always written. At the age of six or seven, I would get sheets of A4 paper and fold them in half, cut the edges to make a little eight-page booklet, break it up into squares and put in little stick men with little speech bubbles, and I'd have a spy story, a space story and a football story.
quotes.author: Ian Rankin

quotes.text: I think I would make a good spy. I can sort of be a chameleon. People don't notice me very easily. I never get recognized.
quotes.author: Dana Delany

quotes.text: A spy, like a writer, lives outside the mainstream population. He steals his experience through bribes and reconstructs it.
quotes.author: John le Carre

quotes.text: My favorite movies are the ones that are different the second time, or where you're constantly discovering new things. It's not just genre movies, either, and it's not just about twists. I saw 'Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy' four times in the theater before I realized it's a love story. I love that.
quotes.author: Drew Goddard

quotes.text: I want to play a fireman and a spy. I want to learn special effects.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.text: I've always wanted to play a spy, because it is the ultimate acting exercise. You are never what you seem.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.text: Protestantism has actually put a man in the position of a country governed by secret police. The spy and eavesdropper, 'conscience,' watches over every motion of the mind, and all thought and action is for it a 'matter of conscience,' i.e. police business.
quotes.author: Max Stirner

quotes.text: The Patriot Act is ludicrous. Terrorists have proved that they are interested in total genocide, not subtle little hacks of the U.S. infrastructure, yet the government wants a blank search warrant to spy and snoop on everyone's communications.
quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

quotes.text: I wrote 'The Spy Who Came in from the Cold' at the age of 30 under intense, unshared personal stress and in extreme privacy. As an intelligence officer in the guise of a junior diplomat at the British Embassy in Bonn, I was a secret to my colleagues, and much of the time to myself.
quotes.author: John le Carre

quotes.text: We have learned in recent years to translate almost all of political life in terms of conspiracy. And the spy novel, as never before, really, has come into its own.
quotes.author: John le Carre

quotes.text: They make Spy Kids, they make Scream, they make A Scary Movie. This doesn't do that, so it could be a very bad marriage. I'm trying to keep this potential nightmare quiet because we're just finishing editing.
quotes.author: Terry Gilliam

quotes.text: I know not every mom is a secret KGB spy, but every mom has this whole other life. Every dad and every person has this whole other life.
quotes.author: Keri Russell

quotes.text: It is illegal for the CIA to spy on Americans and an affront to our Republic to spy on the Senate.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.text: The director of the FBI has been visiting Silicon Valley companies asking them to build back doors so that it can spy on what is being said online. The Department of Commerce is going after piracy. At home, the American government wants anything but Internet freedom.
quotes.author: Evgeny Morozov

quotes.text: Right whales, for all their size, are surprisingly athletic. They roll, they slap their flukes, they lift their heads out of the water in a move known as a spy hop. They find playthings and are particularly fond of swimming repeatedly through clumps of seaweed, which slides over them like a feathered boa.
quotes.author: Tim Cahill

quotes.text: Setting people to spy on one another is not the way to protect freedom.
quotes.author: Tommy Douglas

quotes.text: My perception of making a movie before I started making movies was that it would be like 'Spy Kids'.
quotes.author: Katie Chang

quotes.text: In TV, and in particular in commercials, you don't really need to explain very much at all - you just say he's a spy and he's a little bit theatrical and overblown and smug and he's not very good at his job.
quotes.author: Rowan Atkinson

quotes.text: I was never a spy. I was with the OSS organization. We had a number of women, but we were all office help.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.text: The more real I got on 'The Bourne Identity,' the more interesting it got. So 'Fair Game' was the chance to go a few more steps in that direction. In fact, I discovered this whole other world that I had ignored in the 'Bourne' franchise, which is the domestic life of a spy, and how you make the two halves of your life coexist.
quotes.author: Doug Liman

quotes.text: Mr. Snowden did not start out as a spy, and calling him one bends the term past recognition. Spies don't give their secrets to journalists for free.
quotes.author: Alex Berenson

quotes.text: There's an awful lot of corruption in Japanese business and politics, corruption of the sort that can make for great setting for a spy story.
quotes.author: Barry Eisler

quotes.text: Like any good spy novel, the Cox Report alleges that Chinese spies penetrated four U.S. weapons research labs and stole important information on seven nuclear warhead designs.
quotes.author: Charles Bass

quotes.text: Glass is the world's worst spy camera. If you want to surreptitiously take photos, I would not use Glass.
quotes.author: Astro Teller

quotes.text: The great advantage of being a writer is that you can spy on people. You're there, listening to every word, but part of you is observing. Everything is useful to a writer, you see - every scrap, even the longest and most boring of luncheon parties.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.text: With stealth technology, the U.S. could spy on its Cold War adversaries without running the risk of getting caught.
quotes.author: Annie Jacobsen

quotes.text: I am probably not alone in sensing above me the huge corporations and monstrous banks, science, politics and technologies, spy satellites and stock markets, military systems and massive wealth - forces and dynamics I don't understand or can hardly imagine.
quotes.author: Michael Leunig

quotes.text: But I think the real tension lies in the relationship between what you might call the pursuer and his quarry, whether it's the writer or the spy.
quotes.author: John le Carre

quotes.text: In my head, I think I'd make a perfect spy, but in reality, I don't think I'd fare very well.
quotes.author: Matthew Rhys

quotes.text: In a few days an officer came to our camp, under a flag of truce, and informed Hamilton, then a captain of artillery, but afterwards the aid of General Washington, that Captain Hale had been arrested within the British lines condemned as a spy, and executed that morning.
quotes.author: William Hull

quotes.text: What I really found was that the one similarity between 'Covert Affairs' and 'Fair Game' is a deep love and admiration and fascination with the home life of a spy.
quotes.author: Doug Liman

quotes.text: Spy plots are hard, really hard.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: I've been a spy for almost all of my adult life - I don't like being in the spotlight.
quotes.author: Edward Snowden

quotes.text: I'll tell you what I really enjoy. We all go to the movies, we all watch television, we know what they're about, how they work. When the main character is a cop or a spy, it's very exciting, but I also very much enjoy when the main characters are nobodies - a trucker.
quotes.author: Nathan Fillion

quotes.text: I am a spy in the house of me. I report back from the front lines of the battle that is me. I am somewhat nonplused by the event that is my life.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.text: In America, you have the Cyber Intelligence Sharing and Protection Act. You've got drones now being considered for domestic surveillance. You have the National Security Agency building the world's giantest spy center.
quotes.author: Heather Brooke

quotes.text: Slightly embarrassing admission: Even when I was a kid, I used to have these little spy books, and I would, like, see what everybody was doing in my neighborhood and log it down.
quotes.author: Heather Brooke

quotes.text: I wasn't a spy. I'd have been spotted in five seconds. Yes, I was in intelligence, but that covered a multitude of things.
quotes.author: Christopher Lee

quotes.text: Some people think my father was a spy, because of working for that government agency in Vietnam, but he can't find his car keys, much less keep a national secret.
quotes.author: Lauren Graham

quotes.text: I probably read Harriet the Spy about 70,000 times.
quotes.author: Alison Bechdel

quotes.text: The spy boom has been a beautiful windfall for architects, construction companies, IT specialists, and above all defense contractors, enriching thousands of private companies and dozens of local economies hugging the Capital Beltway.
quotes.author: Rachel Maddow

quotes.text: I don't like to go to the movies to see violence or some kind of spy thing with all kinds of information you have to assimilate to understand the plot.
quotes.author: Pia Zadora

quotes.text: It's rather fun writing a female spy, because she has so much more kit. Bond never carried a hair dryer or a makeup bag. And he certainly didn't wear an uplift bra.
quotes.author: Helen Fielding

quotes.text: When I was a kid, I wanted to be a spy detective or a rock star.
quotes.author: Jill Sobule

quotes.text: I was initially recruited while I was in business school back in the late sixties by the National Security Agency, the nation's largest and least understood spy organization; but ultimately I worked for private corporations.
quotes.author: John Perkins

quotes.text: If I could rub a genie and anything could happen? Truthfully, my other love, and this is a complete 180, but I'd love to do a spy or an espionage pic, like a James Bond movie.
quotes.author: Chris Diamantopoulos

quotes.text: I feel really lucky that I grew up pretending to be a spy for my whole childhood.
quotes.author: Daryl Sabara

quotes.text: I had learning problems when I was in elementary school, and didn't really start to read well until high school. I never read any of the middle grade classics that were popular when I was young - 'Harriet the Spy', 'Charlotte's Web', 'The Witch of Blackbird Pond', 'Charlie and the Chocolate Factory'.
quotes.author: Lauren Tarshis

quotes.text: Since knowledge is but sorrow's spy, It is not safe to know.
quotes.author: William Davenant

quotes.text: The spy genre is something which, as a fan of movies, a movie geek myself, I just love that cinematic joy that they bring.
quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.text: When you really study espionage movies, or spy movies, the beginnings are really set up to have, like, an amazing bit of action, but at the moment you're watching it, you have no idea why or what it's about.
quotes.author: John Lasseter

quotes.text: Ghostery lets you spy on the spies in your computer. For each web page you visit, this extension uncloaks some - but not all - of the invisible tracking software that is working behind the scenes.
quotes.author: Barton Gellman

quotes.text: I invented the historical spy novel.
quotes.author: Alan Furst

quotes.text: The merit of 'The Spy Who Came in from the Cold,' then - or its offence, depending where you stood - was not that it was authentic, but that it was credible.
quotes.author: John le Carre

quotes.text: 'The Spy Who Came in from the Cold' was the work of a wayward imagination brought to the end of its tether by political disgust and personal confusion.
quotes.author: John le Carre

quotes.text: Today's difference between Russia and the United States is that in Russia everybody takes everybody else for a spy, and in the United States everybody takes everybody else for a criminal.
quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quotes.text: You could say that all novels are spy novels and all novelists are spy masters.
quotes.author: Ian Mcewan

quotes.text: I don't expect people who've enjoyed 'Spy Kids' will enjoy 'Repo! the Genetic Opera!'
quotes.author: Alexa Vega

quotes.text: I've always wanted to be a spy, and frankly I'm a little surprised that British intelligence has never approached me.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Hurley

quotes.text: I have a long-standing interest in what I like to think of as 'forbidden knowledge:' methods of unarmed killing, lock picking, breaking and entry, spy stuff, and other things that the government wants only a few select individuals to know.
quotes.author: Barry Eisler

quotes.text: Back in the 1950s, there was a top-secret program code-named SUNTAN being conducted at a top-secret facility called Skunk Works. Its objective? To develop a liquid-hydrogen-powered spy plane. Because liquid hydrogen is incredibly volatile, early experiments were conducted inside a bomb shelter with eight-foot-thick walls.
quotes.author: Annie Jacobsen

quotes.text: The U.S. obviously has all the evidence they need to prosecute bankers. They just need to search their own spy database and then there you go - 1,000 bankers in jail, a trillion dollars in fines. But it doesn't happen. Instead, the spy network is being used to fight a copyright case. They used Prism to spy on me.
quotes.author: Kim Dotcom

quotes.text: They were conspiring to desert us in the night and steal some of our horses... we engaged a spy.
quotes.author: Zebulon Pike

quotes.text: In the councils of government, we must guard against the acquisition of unwarranted influence, whether sought or unsought, by the military-industrial complex. The potential for the disastrous rise of misplaced power exists and will persist.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: For me to be here tonight, everything had to be perfect. I had to get drafted by Utah, had to play with a point guard like John Stockton, and had to be coached by Jerry Sloan and Frank Layden.
quotes.author: Karl Malone

quotes.text: Guard against the impostures of pretended patriotism.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: Guard your roving thoughts with a jealous care, for speech is but the dealer of thoughts, and every fool can plainly read in your words what is the hour of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.text: You can play fast but not in a hurry. As a point guard, I can dictate that.
quotes.author: Stephen Curry

quotes.text: To fake it is to stand guard over emptiness.
quotes.author: Arthur Herzog

quotes.text: We must guard against the acquisition of unwarranted influence, whether sought or unsought, by the military-industrial complex.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: Our Founders always wondered about how long it would last. The price of liberty is everlasting vigilance. You've got to be on your guard every minute or you will lose it.
quotes.author: Michael Novak

quotes.text: I'm here today to warn you: I want you to watch out for the adversary. Guard yourself from any spirit of entitlement. Restrain any and all subtle temptation to gain attention or to find ways to promote yourself.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: I always keep my guard up with guys and I guess that can get in the way sometimes. I can make them go through hell.
quotes.author: Rihanna

quotes.text: Because of my own family's service (in the U.S. Army, Navy, and Massachusetts and New York National Guard), I am a strong supporter of the military and do believe that there are just wars.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: Many a sin has sullied me in body and in soul because I did not restrain my thoughts nor guard my lips: nevertheless it is to Thee, O God of majesty and love, that I turn in my extremity, for Thou art the fount of mercy; to Thee, as quickly as I may, I speed: for Thou alone canst heal me; I take refuge under Thy protection.
quotes.author: Saint Ambrose

quotes.text: May He who holds in his hands the destinies of nations, make you worthy of the favors He has bestowed, and enabled you with pure hearts and hands and sleepless vigilance, to guard and defend to the end of time, the great charge He has committed to your keeping.
quotes.author: J. Reuben Clark

quotes.text: The Coast Guard has long been known as the armed service that gets more done for less.
quotes.author: Howard Coble

quotes.text: Experience teaches us to be most on our guard to protect liberty when the government's purposes are beneficent.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.text: I'm a little left of center, for sure, with Angels & Airwaves. But even when I get really weird, it's not that weird. It's not like some obscure Sonic Youth record or something. We don't take it quite that far. But what we do like are crescendos, and we do like when a song catches you off guard and it gives you the chills up and down your arms.
quotes.author: Tom DeLonge

quotes.text: I am a team player - and that is what you need to be an effective point guard. You gotta see the court, you gotta set up the play, and you gotta let others execute for the most part. I don't throw elbows for the sake of throwing elbows, but if somebody throws one at me and it's necessary to respond in kind, I suppose I can if I have to.
quotes.author: Susan Rice

quotes.text: The political lesson of Watergate is this: Never again must America allow an arrogant, elite guard of political adolescents to by-pass the regular party organization and dictate the terms of a national election.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

quotes.text: The great and important duty which is incumbent on Christians, is to guard against all appearance of evil; to watch against the first risings in the heart to evil; and to have a guard upon our actions, that they may not be sinful, or so much as seem to be so.
quotes.author: George Whitefield

quotes.text: I've been fortunate to be short my entire life. There's only one position I've ever had to play, and that's point guard. So I've always had to be that leader. And that was my job: you know, to talk.
quotes.author: Chris Paul

quotes.text: Fortitude is the guard and support of the other virtues.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.text: You have to stand guard over the development and maintenance of Islamic democracy, Islamic social justice and the equality of manhood in your own native soil.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quotes.text: I don't want to let my guard down and feel too comfortable. If you become complacent, you start feeling entitled. I'm ready to go dig ditches if I have to. Whatever I gotta do to provide for my family. Whatever I gotta do to make sure that I do the best possible job at whatever wonderful opportunities I've been handed.
quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg

quotes.text: I would not send a poor girl into the world, ignorant of the snares that beset her path; nor would I watch and guard her, till, deprived of self-respect and self-reliance, she lost the power or the will to watch and guard herself.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.text: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts: therefore, guard accordingly, and take care that you entertain no notions unsuitable to virtue and reasonable nature.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: From protecting our natural resources to providing maritime security and national defense, the Coast Guard's duties are broad in scope, and the performance of those duties has never been more important.
quotes.author: Russ Carnahan

quotes.text: Social democracy... is only the advance guard of the proletariat, a small piece of the total working masses; blood from their blood, and flesh from their flesh.
quotes.author: Rosa Luxemburg

quotes.text: You have to understand the Newark Riots - a lot of people understand that the pain was the initial explosion of anger and alienation, but after that, the response, sending the National Guard troops - a lot of violence was carried out and perpetrated by those who were allegedly coming here to protect residents.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.text: Yes, I remember the barbed wire and the guard towers and the machine guns, but they became part of my normal landscape. What would be abnormal in normal times became my normality in camp.
quotes.author: George Takei

quotes.text: He that would make his own liberty secure, must guard even his enemy from oppression; for if he violates this duty, he establishes a precedent that will reach to himself.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.text: Guard with jealous attention the public liberty. Suspect everyone who approaches that jewel. Unfortunately, nothing will preserve it but downright force. Whenever you give up that force, you are inevitably ruined.
quotes.author: Patrick Henry

quotes.text: Those who served, and those who continue to serve in the Army, Navy, Air Force, Marines, and Coast Guard took an oath to uphold and protect the Constitution against all enemies foreign and domestic, and we can never forget the importance of their commitment to our Nation.
quotes.author: Robin Hayes

quotes.text: Conscious of my own weakness, I can only seek fervently the guidance of the Ruler of the Universe, and, relying on His all-powerful aid, do my best to restore Union and peace to a suffering people, and to establish and guard their liberties and rights.
quotes.author: George B. McClellan

quotes.text: I think all jocks have a sensitive side. It's just, will they show it to anybody? Will they let their guard down and stop being tough and the cool jock guy around their friends, or just relax? I don't know if it's best to say opening up, but just relax and really say what you're actually thinking, and not what you think people want to hear.
quotes.author: Channing Tatum

quotes.text: Guard well within yourself that treasure, kindness. Know how to give without hesitation, how to lose without regret, how to acquire without meanness.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.text: I am a good, strong word giver; I am a jealous guard of my own secrets. Freedom is the rule; I am hungry for one good thing I can do.
quotes.author: Rachel Corrie

quotes.text: I'm basically different things to different people. If it's a guy, I'm-a probably have my guard up because it's a street rule that when men come around that I don't know, I just immediately throw shade on them. But I don't associate with fellas all that much; if it's a girl - a beautiful girl - I be nice.
quotes.author: The Notorious B.I.G.

quotes.text: When you're a 'product' for a lot of people, they're only really after one thing, and so it's hard to completely let down your guard.
quotes.author: Jesse McCartney

quotes.text: For among other evils caused by being disarmed, it renders you contemptible; which is one of those disgraceful things which a prince must guard against.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.text: It is with trifles, and when he is off guard, that a man best reveals his character.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: All dictators, the rich and famous, to the lowest security guard who holds a gun, easily forget that power is transitory.
quotes.author: F. Sionil Jose

quotes.text: During the aftermath of Katrina, National Guard troops were positioned on every block to establish a sense of safety and source of help for the people in need. They did not leave communities until people were safe and sound.
quotes.author: Russel Honore

quotes.text: At every crossroads on the path that leads to the future, tradition has placed 10,000 men to guard the past.
quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.text: There's something about the ukulele that just makes you smile. It makes you let your guard down. It brings out the child in all of us.
quotes.author: Jake Shimabukuro

quotes.text: You can choose not to sit on the fence. You can choose not to criticise. You must stand as guard at the door of your own mind and choose to be positive.
quotes.author: Gail Kelly

quotes.text: I tell people to look at me and understand that everybody first told me that I couldn't be a 6-foot, 9-inch point guard, and I proved them wrong. Then they told me I couldn't be a businessman and make money in urban America, and I proved them wrong. And they thought I couldn't win all these championships, and I proved them wrong there as well.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.text: I was once asked to do my Tarzan yell at Bergdorf Goodman, and a guard burst in with a gun! Now I only do it under controlled circumstances.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.text: Modesty is not only an ornament, but also a guard to virtue.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: Those that I fight I do not hate, those that I guard I do not love.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: On a very personal level, I have fond memories of spending a lot of time in the Library of Congress working on my collection of poems 'Native Guard.' I was there over a summer doing research in the archives and then writing in the reading room at the Jefferson building.
quotes.author: Natasha Trethewey

quotes.text: We must guard against the overreaching hand of big government trying to take away our freedom. And we must always protect the environment in a manner consistent with our values.
quotes.author: Steve Forbes

quotes.text: I talked to General Downer about some of the funding about the National Guard and some of the civil defense workers, the firefighters, the police officers, and the way that FEMA is making them spend that money. We have got a problem there.
quotes.author: Lynn Westmoreland

quotes.text: A British porch is a musty, forbidding non-room in which to fling a sodden umbrella or a muddy pair of boots; a guard against the elements and strangers. By contrast the good ol' American front porch seems to stand for positivity and openness; a platform from which to welcome or wave farewell; a place where things of significance could happen.
quotes.author: Dan Stevens

quotes.text: I said it's a cold universe and I don't mean that metaphorically. If you go out into space, it's cold. It's really cold and we don't know what's up there. We happen to be in this little pocket where there's a sun. What have we got except love and each other to guard against all that isolation and loneliness?
quotes.author: David Chase

quotes.text: Give up pride for good during the holidays. This is where I've been especially stubborn. As I walk more and more in this path of Christianity, I see that letting my guard down and admitting that I don't want to be alone is far better than dealing with me, myself and I, who always seem to want to keep up appearances.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.text: Of all things, guard against neglecting God in the secret place of prayer.
quotes.author: William Wilberforce

quotes.text: Things happen every day. You can't spend your whole life trying to guard against something happening. If you do that, in my opinion, you've wasted your life.
quotes.author: Tony Stewart

quotes.text: I know that I shall meet my fate somewhere among the clouds above; those that I fight I do not hate, those that I guard I do not love.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: Twilight - a time of pause when nature changes her guard. All living things would fade and die from too much light or too much dark, if twilight were not.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.text: All of us should be on guard against beliefs that flatter ourselves. At the very least, we should check such beliefs against facts.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.text: You know how in every heist movie they get past the security cameras that show the hallway leading to the diamonds by jamming the screens with a fake signal of everything looking safe and quiet? Usually a guard coughs so they don't notice the blip from switching to the bogus feed.
quotes.author: Adam McKay

quotes.text: Kabul is a walled city, which sounds romantic except the walls are pre-cast reinforced concrete blast barriers, 10 feet tall and 15 feet long and moved into place with cranes. The walls are topped with sandbags, and the sandbags are topped with guard posts from which gun barrels protrude.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: Anyone who agrees to be interviewed must decide where to draw the line between what is public and what is private. But the line can shift, depending on who is asking the questions. What puts someone on guard isn't necessarily the fear of being 'found out.' It sometimes is just the fear of being misunderstood.
quotes.author: Terry Gross

quotes.text: Google, Microsoft and Yahoo should be developing new technologies to bypass government sensors and barriers to the Internet; but instead, they agreed to guard the gates themselves.
quotes.author: Tom Lantos

quotes.text: Being from New York, everybody's a point guard. Even when you play in the park, you've got to know how to handle the ball. If you can't handle the ball, you can't really play.
quotes.author: Joakim Noah

quotes.text: Yeah, I play a lot of point guard. LeBron plays a lot of point guard. A lot of people are thinking too much on positions.
quotes.author: Dwyane Wade

quotes.text: All our efforts to guard and guide our children may just get in the way of the one thing they need most from us: to be deeply loved yet left alone so they can try a new skill, new slang, new style, new flip-flops. So they can trip a few times, make mistakes, cross them out, try again, with no one keeping score.
quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.text: Become an internationalist and learn to respect all life. Make war on machines. And in particular the sterile machines of corporate death and the robots that guard them.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.text: Innocence always calls mutely for protection when we would be so much wiser to guard ourselves against it: innocence is like a dumb leper who has lost his bell, wandering the world, meaning no harm.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.text: I've always wanted to shoot a good percentage for my team, because I'm the point guard, and I can take fewer shots, still score more, so that I can get my teammates feeling good about themselves. That was always my feeling - that if I shoot a high percentage, I don't have to shoot a ton.
quotes.author: Steve Nash

quotes.text: I've reached a point in life where it would be easy to let down my guard and write simple imagistic poems. But I don't want to write poems that aren't necessary. I want to write poems that matter, that have an interesting point of view.
quotes.author: Maxine Kumin

quotes.text: But I have to say I'm incredibly proud of the Panther Racing National Guard Team, and in my IndyCar career there's not many races where I've honestly left the track feeling that we've executed everything perfectly. And I have to say, I thought they did an absolute phenomenal job. The pit stops were just first class.
quotes.author: Dan Wheldon

quotes.text: They would never let me be a crossing guard when I was a little kid. It would come up, I'd always raise my hand, I would never get picked . They thought I was too wild, but I knew I was responsible enough, if I was given that task.
quotes.author: Mark Ruffalo

quotes.text: One is not exposed to danger who, even when in safety is always on their guard.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.text: Grateful daughters of God guard their bodies carefully, for they know they are the wellsprings of life, and they reverence life. They don't uncover their bodies to find favor with the world. They walk in modesty to be in favor with their Father In Heaven. They know he loves them dearly.
quotes.author: Margaret D. Nadauld

quotes.text: Ed Koch will never 'rest in peace.' That was not his way. He was always nervously squirming, while making others squirm as well. Comfort was not his goal. He understood that to be a proud and assertive Jew meant never being able to leave a sigh of relief and say, 'It's over, we are at peace, we can now put down our guard and relax.'
quotes.author: Alan Dershowitz

quotes.text: I don't want to be called a point guard, but I can't stop it.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: There's nothing wrong with doing comedies, and I'm not against comedies, either, but I always want to do stuff that keeps me off my guard and gets me out of my comfort zone.
quotes.author: Patton Oswalt

quotes.text: It takes a minute for me to let my guard down, but once I do and I get to know someone, I'm very open, very trusting. Some might say too trusting, because considering the amount of money that can be made from selling gossip, I could be very easily taken advantage of.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.text: The present Arab uprising didn't stem from Israel. The old guard is trying to keep down the young chickens. The old guard is better organized. They may win elections, but unless they have a solution to poverty, to corruption, to oppression, they will not last. I am with the young people.
quotes.author: Shimon Peres

quotes.text: At the current $5.15 an hour, the federal minimum wage has become a poverty wage. A full-time worker with one child lives below the official poverty line.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.text: No man ever got very high by pulling other people down. The intelligent merchant does not knock his competitors. The sensible worker does not knock those who work with him. Don't knock your friends. Don't knock your enemies. Don't knock yourself.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.text: The worker of the world has nothing to lose, but their chains, workers of the world unite.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.text: Wage theft, worker rights and workplace discrimination should not be swept under the rug. The United States cannot have a functional economy where all the gains go to the corporate class while all the pain goes to regular workers.
quotes.author: James P. Hoffa

quotes.text: I'm not a superhero - I'm a super worker!
quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

quotes.text: I'm a hard worker. I get my hands dirty.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.text: I have been trying to point out that in our lives chance may have an astonishing influence and, if I may offer advice to the young laboratory worker, it would be this - never to neglect an extraordinary appearance or happening.
quotes.author: Alexander Fleming

quotes.text: As we become purer channels for God's light, we develop an appetite for the sweetness that is possible in this world. A miracle worker is not geared toward fighting the world that is, but toward creating the world that could be.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: As president, I would promote a Fair and Flat Tax plan, known as the 'EZ Tax.' My tax plan would be the largest tax cut in American history, reforming individual, business, and worker taxes.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.text: I am an enthusiast, but not a crank in the sense that I have some pet theories as to the proper construction of a flying machine. I wish to avail myself of all that is already known and then, if possible, add my mite to help on the future worker who will attain final success.
quotes.author: Wilbur Wright

quotes.text: The worker is the slave of capitalist society, the female worker is the slave of that slave.
quotes.author: James Connolly

quotes.text: I'm an actor. And I guess I've done so many movies I've achieved some high visibility. But a star? I guess I still think of myself as kind of a worker ant.
quotes.author: Forest Whitaker

quotes.text: The purpose of work is to make the worker - whether a working stiff or a CEO - feel good about life.
quotes.author: Ricardo Semler

quotes.text: So, if you're doing good longform with talented people than you can step out and you can be the president or a construction worker and people accept that. It's really the roles you give yourself.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.text: I am a poet; I am not a worker. I need to be free.
quotes.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quotes.text: The average American worker has fifty interruptions a day, of which seventy percent have nothing to do with work.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.text: As I, as a worker, came to know them, the aims of German trade unions were political, and there were a number of various trade unions with varied political views.
quotes.author: Fritz Sauckel

quotes.text: I never was a person who wanted a handout. I was a cafeteria worker. I'm not too proud to ask the Best Western manager to give me a job. I have cleaned homes.
quotes.author: Shirley Jackson

quotes.text: The world is moved along, not only by the mighty shoves of its heroes, but also by the aggregate of tiny pushes of each honest worker.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: I've never seen myself as a spokesperson. I've always seen myself as a worker and am very grateful for the trust that my own people have given me over the years.
quotes.author: Alexis Wright

quotes.text: And I think it is the genius of actors to be able to escape whatever people are expecting of them. Otherwise you become like a factory worker.
quotes.author: Olivier Martinez

quotes.text: My wife is the boss at home, and my daughters are the bosses. I am just the worker. We are a very warm family and very happy.
quotes.author: Jet Li

quotes.text: Everyone finds their own version of Charles Dickens. The child-victim, the irrepressibly ambitious young man, the reporter, the demonic worker, the tireless walker. The radical, the protector of orphans, helper of the needy, man of good works, the republican. The hater and the lover of America. The giver of parties, the magician, the traveler.
quotes.author: Claire Tomalin

quotes.text: A reputation as a hard worker is a good reputation to have.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.text: The productivity of work is not the responsibility of the worker but of the manager.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Even though worker capacity and motivation are destroyed when leaders choose power over productivity, it appears that bosses would rather be in control than have the organization work well.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.text: A skilled worker, regardless of the job description, remains a treasure.
quotes.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quotes.text: Married or unmarried, young or old, poet or worker, you are still a dreamer, and will one time know, and feel, that your life is but a dream.
quotes.author: Donald G. Mitchell

quotes.text: I want everybody to think I'm a hard worker as an aunt, a sister, a friend, a daughter, a niece, everything. I want to be great at every role, because every role in my life is as important as being Jessie J.
quotes.author: Jessie J

quotes.text: It is the lone worker who makes the first advance in a subject; the details may be worked out by a team, but the prime idea is due to enterprise, thought, and perception of an individual.
quotes.author: Alexander Fleming

quotes.text: To make flexibility work, it is not only necessary to change our attitude about who is a good worker and who is not, but we have to train managers at all levels to recognize the difference between the number of hours worked and the quality of work produced.
quotes.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quotes.text: I definitely have the eye of the tiger. I've fought my way to where I am and will continue to do so. I'm a hard worker - I get it from my family. We only know work. Nothing was handed to us. When I believe in something, I go after it. It's very hard to tell me 'no.'
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.text: I was raised by a single mother who made a way for me. She used to scrub floors as a domestic worker, put a cleaning rag in her pocketbook and ride the subways in Brooklyn so I would have food on the table. But she taught me as I walked her to the subway that life is about not where you start, but where you're going. That's family values.
quotes.author: Al Sharpton

quotes.text: I am a marathon worker and marathon mother. I'll spend three or four days completely swallowed up by work. And if I make it home in time to say good night, I may have one good hour with the girls, maybe a brief family dinner or a family walk with the dog, and then it is back on the computer to prepare for tomorrow's shows.
quotes.author: Mika Brzezinski

quotes.text: I remember when I was a young social worker, the first time I went to the state capital in Arizona, where I eventually served for seven years, I was so nervous to go and lobby my state legislators. Because I only had a master's degree at the time in social work.
quotes.author: Kyrsten Sinema

quotes.text: Photography suits the temper of this age - of active bodies and minds. It is a perfect medium for one whose mind is teeming with ideas, imagery, for a prolific worker who would be slowed down by painting or sculpting, for one who sees quickly and acts decisively, accurately.
quotes.author: Edward Weston

quotes.text: We are beginning to see a fundamental outrage at the whole interconnected mess of a system: at energy companies who record massive profits, yet allow pensioners to struggle to stay warm in winter; at CEOs who can earn up to a 1,000 times the salary of their average worker; and soon, any day now, at those politicians who allowed this to happen.
quotes.author: Noreena Hertz

quotes.text: A job should bring enough for a worker and family to live on, but after that, self-realization, the exercise of one's gifts and talents, is what truly matters.
quotes.author: Michael Dirda

quotes.text: We should work to guarantee that there is a midwife or health worker by every woman's side during childbirth.
quotes.author: Liya Kebede

quotes.text: What I've learned is you don't have to strive for perfection, but you do have to strive to be a very hard worker.
quotes.author: Lindsay Pearce

quotes.text: Mamata Banerjee is just a casual worker, just like a commoner.
quotes.author: Mamata Banerjee

quotes.text: Actually, I've never thought myself as being a particularly hard worker. I've always worked, and I guess my mind is busy all the time. I've been in a lot of things just because of my own intellectual curiosity.
quotes.author: Sam Wyly

quotes.text: The grandmother, the mother, the worker, the student, the intellectual, the professional, the unemployed, everybody identified with the songs because they were descriptions of life in the city.
quotes.author: Ruben Blades

quotes.text: I'm a hard worker, and everything with me is, if I work hard, I should get paid for it. Everything with me, I try to symbolize something flashy like jewelry or a car. The rubbing hands is a symbol of hustling, so it goes back to the money.
quotes.author: Birdman

quotes.text: My grandparents used to pray five times a day, but they were quiet about their own thing. Completely liberal day by day; my grandmother was a social worker and my grandfather was an engineer, but they never talked about religion. My entire life I couldn't remember one conversation I had with them about religion.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.text: Long-term unemployment can make any worker progressively less employable, even after the economy strengthens.
quotes.author: Janet Yellen

quotes.text: I'm a hard worker and I really give to my fans through my shows.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.text: A worker may be the hammer's master, but the hammer still prevails. A tool knows exactly how it is meant to be handled, while the user of the tool can only have an approximate idea.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.text: In the 1960s, if you were a blue collar worker or uneducated, and you had an injury on the job, the company basically dismissed you.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: I'm a hard worker. I'm a people person.
quotes.author: Bobby Schilling

quotes.text: It is possible for the assembly-line worker consigned to tightening the bolts on the transmission and the office worker who processes medical insurance claims to work with pride and efficiency, but it's not easy to maintain that attitude.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.text: I'm an actor. And I guess I've done so many movies I've achieved some high visibility. But a star? I guess I still think of myself as kind of a worker ant.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.text: I grew up on my dad's sets, but I was never star-struck or desperate to be famous. I grew up being a worker. It took me a long time to realise that my work ended up being seen by people. As far as I was concerned, I was just in the family business.
quotes.author: Katharine Isabelle

quotes.text: I am also a hard worker and people are sometimes surprised to see that as well.
quotes.author: Christina Milian

quotes.text: Many talk about a guest worker program. I think most reasonable people believe that a guest worker program in the farming industry, perhaps in the gardening and landscape industries, is reasonable.
quotes.author: Gary Miller

quotes.text: I couldn't even go to the bathroom alone. My mother or a social worker always went with me.
quotes.author: Natalie Wood

quotes.text: I'd love to be an artist that's multifaceted. At the moment, I am not. But wouldn't that be cool if I was like, 'Yeah, let me pull out my guitar and play you a song.' I would adore that. I am so far not gifted in that way. But I am a very hard worker and a very determined person, so who knows?
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.text: When a system is stable, telling the worker about mistakes is only tampering.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.text: Work is valued by the social value of the worker.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.text: For the blue-collar worker, the driving force behind change was factory automation using programmable machine tools. For the office worker, it's office automation using computer technology: enterprise-resource-planning systems, groupware, intranets, extranets, expert systems, the Web, and e-commerce.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.text: When you print money, the money does not flow evenly into the economic system. It stays essentially in the financial service industry and among people that have access to these funds, mostly well-to-do people. It does not go to the worker.
quotes.author: Marc Faber

quotes.text: I think that among my friends I'm known as being a hard worker; I think if you want to be an actor, there can't be any compromise. You have to work all day, every day. It's not a 9-5 job. There's always something to learn.
quotes.author: Jeremy Irvine

quotes.text: The worker can unionize, go out on strike; mothers are divided from each other in homes, tied to their children by compassionate bonds; our wildcat strikes have most often taken the form of physical or mental breakdown.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.text: When I left home after graduating high school, I left as a migrant agricultural worker with a Modern Library edition of Plato in my duffel bag. It sounds kind of crazy, but I loved it. I loved the stuff. Before I knew there was a subject called philosophy, I loved it.
quotes.author: Dallas Willard

quotes.text: It's physically hard for me to work. I start to break down, physically. My joints start. I get weepy eyes. I don't sleep well. I was never a hard worker, I guess. So the voiceover work ethic is really great for me - couple days a month, two hours a day.
quotes.author: H. Jon Benjamin

quotes.text: I'm always asked, 'What's the secret to success?' But there are no secrets. Be humble. Be hungry. And always be the hardest worker in the room.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.text: I for one believe that we absolutely need an improved guest worker program, one that holds immigrants and employers accountable and yet still enables us to get a crop out of the ground in south Georgia.
quotes.author: John Linder

quotes.text: I was brought up in a very ordinary family, in fact, a worker's family. Both my father and mother were ordinary citizens.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.text: Dear brothers and sisters, after the great Pope John Paul II, the cardinals have elected me - a simple, humble worker in the vineyard of the Lord.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.text: The Safe Drinking Water Act, the safety provisions of the Clean Water Acts, the Clean Air Act, the Superfund Law - the gas industry is exempt from all these basic environmental and worker protections. They don't have to disclose the chemicals they use. They don't have to play by the same rules as anybody else.
quotes.author: Josh Fox

quotes.text: If we are concerned about the exploitation of human workers in countries with low standards of worker protection, we should also be concerned about the treatment of even more defenceless non-human animals.
quotes.author: Peter Singer

quotes.text: Where there is a worker, there lies a nation.
quotes.author: Evita Peron

quotes.text: The problem of chemotherapy of bacterial infections could be solved neither by the experimental medical research worker nor by the chemist alone, but only by the two together working in very close cooperation over many years.
quotes.author: Gerhard Domagk

quotes.text: It is the idle man, not the great worker, who is always complaining that he has no time or opportunity.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.text: And I come here as a daughter, raised on the South Side of Chicago - by a father who was a blue-collar city worker and a mother who stayed at home with my brother and me.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: It makes sense that we came up with our public school system during the Industrial Revolution because it's like everybody is a factory worker, eating their terrible food and going back to the room where you're silent and listening to an idiot. That's an epitomizing idea, getting called 'Nothing' for your whole high school experience.
quotes.author: Ezra Miller

quotes.text: When I first came to NBC, I thought it was going to be swimming with the sharks, all men for themselves, be careful and all that. I have to tell you I learned that you can be kind and a hard worker and move up. You don't have to play dirty or do things that you think happens at big corporations.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.text: Only by strict specialization can the scientific worker become fully conscious, for once and perhaps never again in his lifetime, that he has achieved something that will endure. A really definitive and good accomplishment is today always a specialized act.
quotes.author: Max Weber

quotes.text: The worker must have bread, but she must have roses, too. Help, you women of privilege, give her the ballot to fight with.
quotes.author: Rose Schneiderman

quotes.text: Obscene salaries send the wrong message through a company. The message is that all brilliance emanates from the top; that the worker on the floor of the store or the factory is insignificant.
quotes.author: James Sinegal

quotes.text: And know that I am with you always; yes, to the end of time.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: Christmas is the perfect time to celebrate the love of God and family and to create memories that will last forever. Jesus is God's perfect, indescribable gift. The amazing thing is that not only are we able to receive this gift, but we are able to share it with others on Christmas and every other day of the year.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Christmas isn't a season. It's a feeling.
quotes.author: Edna Ferber

quotes.text: He who has not Christmas in his heart will never find it under a tree.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.text: A lovely thing about Christmas is that it's compulsory, like a thunderstorm, and we all go through it together.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.text: One of the most glorious messes in the world is the mess created in the living room on Christmas day. Don't clean it up too quickly.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.text: Christmas is joy, religious joy, an inner joy of light and peace.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: Christmas is not a time nor a season, but a state of mind. To cherish peace and goodwill, to be plenteous in mercy, is to have the real spirit of Christmas.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.text: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
quotes.author: Dale Evans

quotes.text: At Christmas play and make good cheer, for Christmas comes but once a year.
quotes.author: Thomas Tusser

quotes.text: Christmas is a season for kindling the fire for hospitality in the hall, the genial flame of charity in the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.text: Christmas waves a magic wand over this world, and behold, everything is softer and more beautiful.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: Don't let the past steal your present. This is the message of Christmas: We are never alone.
quotes.author: Taylor Caldwell

quotes.text: Christmas is a season not only of rejoicing but of reflection.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Maybe Christmas, the Grinch thought, doesn't come from a store.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Christmas is the spirit of giving without a thought of getting. It is happiness because we see joy in people. It is forgetting self and finding time for others. It is discarding the meaningless and stressing the true values.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: The Supreme Court has ruled that they cannot have a nativity scene in Washington, D.C. This wasn't for any religious reasons. They couldn't find three wise men and a virgin.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.text: What will you and I give for Christmas this year? Let us in our lives give to our Lord and Savior the gift of gratitude by living His teachings and following in His footsteps.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: I will honor Christmas in my heart, and try to keep it all the year.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: The earth has grown old with its burden of care, but at Christmas it always is young, the heart of the jewel burns lustrous and fair, and its soul full of music breaks the air, when the song of angels is sung.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.text: Nothing says holidays, like a cheese log.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.text: If you haven't got any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.text: Every gift which is given, even though is be small, is in reality great, if it is given with affection.
quotes.author: Pindar

quotes.text: The two most joyous times of the year are Christmas morning and the end of school.
quotes.author: Alice Cooper

quotes.text: Unless we make Christmas an occasion to share our blessings, all the snow in Alaska won't make it 'white'.
quotes.author: Bing Crosby

quotes.text: Moving between the legs of tables and of chairs, rising or falling, grasping at kisses and toys, advancing boldly, sudden to take alarm, retreating to the corner of arm and knee, eager to be reassured, taking pleasure in the fragrant brilliance of the Christmas tree.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: Please to put a nickel, please to put a dime. How petitions trickle in at Christmas time!
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.text: There is no better time than now, this very Christmas season, for all of us to rededicate ourselves to the principles taught by Jesus the Christ. It is the time to love the Lord, our God, with all our heart - and our neighbors as ourselves.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: I don't think Christmas is necessarily about things. It's about being good to one another, it's about the Christian ethic, it's about kindness.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.text: I wrapped my Christmas presents early this year, but I used the wrong paper. See, the paper I used said 'Happy Birthday' on it. I didn't want to waste it so I just wrote 'Jesus' on it.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: Santa is our culture's only mythic figure truly believed in by a large percentage of the population. It's a fact that most of the true believers are under eight years old, and that's a pity.
quotes.author: Chris Van Allsburg

quotes.text: Christmas is taken very seriously in this household. I believe in Father Christmas, and there's no way I'd do anything to undermine that belief.
quotes.author: Carol Ann Duffy

quotes.text: I stopped believing in Santa Claus when I was six. Mother took me to see him in a department store and he asked for my autograph.
quotes.author: Shirley Temple

quotes.text: Santa Claus has the right idea - visit people only once a year.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.text: The thing about Christmas is that it almost doesn't matter what mood you're in or what kind of a year you've had - it's a fresh start.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.text: Coming from Chicago, I like a white Christmas.
quotes.author: Dennis Franz

quotes.text: God never gives someone a gift they are not capable of receiving. If he gives us the gift of Christmas, it is because we all have the ability to understand and receive it.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: My brothers and sisters, may the spirit of love which comes at Christmastime fill our homes and our lives and linger there long after the tree is down and the lights are put away for another year.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: It's true, Christmas can feel like a lot of work, particularly for mothers. But when you look back on all the Christmases in your life, you'll find you've created family traditions and lasting memories. Those memories, good and bad, are really what help to keep a family together over the long haul.
quotes.author: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.text: Christmas is a stocking stuffed with sugary goodness.
quotes.author: Mo Rocca

quotes.text: In our open society, we are inclined to give to the less fortunate for the pure goodness of giving. We open our home to those who are alone on this holiday to spread some warmth into the life of another.
quotes.author: Jeff Miller

quotes.text: Mail your packages early so the post office can lose them in time for Christmas.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.text: Christmas makes me happy no matter what time of year it comes around.
quotes.author: Bryan White

quotes.text: Happy, happy Christmas, that can win us back to the delusions of our childhood days, recall to the old man the pleasures of his youth, and transport the traveler back to his own fireside and quiet home!
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: My brothers and sisters, true love is a reflection of the Savior's love. In December of each year we call it the Christmas spirit. You can hear it. You can see it. You can feel it.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: Faith is salted and peppered through everything at Christmas. And I love at least one night by the Christmas tree to sing and feel the quiet holiness of that time that's set apart to celebrate love, friendship, and God's gift of the Christ child.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.text: Being a traditionalist, I'm a rabid sucker for Christmas. In July, I'm already worried that there are only 146 shopping days left.
quotes.author: John Waters

quotes.text: Once again, we come to the Holiday Season, a deeply religious time that each of us observes, in his own way, by going to the mall of his choice.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: God is in the details.
quotes.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quotes.text: The spirit of Christmas is the spirit of love and of generosity and of goodness. It illuminates the picture window of the soul, and we look out upon the world's busy life and become more interested in people than in things.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: Expectancy is the atmosphere for miracles.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.text: It is a fine seasoning for joy to think of those we love.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.text: I love the excitement, the childlike spirit of innocence and just about everything that goes along with Christmas.
quotes.author: Hillary Scott

quotes.text: Every year we celebrate the holy season of Advent, O God. Every year we pray those beautiful prayers of longing and waiting, and sing those lovely songs of hope and promise.
quotes.author: Karl Rahner

quotes.text: Christmas is, of course, the time to be home - in heart as well as body.
quotes.author: Garry Moore

quotes.text: A good conscience is a continual Christmas.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The main reason Santa is so jolly is because he knows where all the bad girls live.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: Let's be naughty and save Santa the trip.
quotes.author: Gary Allan

quotes.text: Christmas is the day that holds all time together.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.text: We consider Christmas as the encounter, the great encounter, the historical encounter, the decisive encounter, between God and mankind. He who has faith knows this truly; let him rejoice.
quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

quotes.text: Before we took down the tree each year, Dad would always say a prayer that we would be together the next Christmas. I cling to that prayer, which serves as a reminder that it's important to be grateful in the present for the people you love because, well, you never know.
quotes.author: Catherine Hicks

quotes.text: Christmas... is not an external event at all, but a piece of one's home that one carries in one's heart.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.text: Christmas, children, is not a date. It is a state of mind.
quotes.author: Mary Ellen Chase

quotes.text: Christmas in Bethlehem. The ancient dream: a cold, clear night made brilliant by a glorious star, the smell of incense, shepherds and wise men falling to their knees in adoration of the sweet baby, the incarnation of perfect love.
quotes.author: Lucinda Franks

quotes.text: I once wanted to become an atheist, but I gave up - they have no holidays.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: My Christmases have always just been very simple and about family.
quotes.author: Julie Roberts

quotes.text: T'was the night before Christmas, when all through the house, not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse.
quotes.author: Clement Clarke Moore

quotes.text: I love Christmas, not just because of the presents but because of all the decorations and lights and the warmth of the season.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: What I don't like about office Christmas parties is looking for a job the next day.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.text: As dry leaves that before the wild hurricane fly, when they meet with an obstacle, mount to the sky. So up to the house-top the coursers they flew, with the sleigh full of toys, and St. Nicholas too.
quotes.author: Clement Clarke Moore

quotes.text: Christmas is a tonic for our souls. It moves us to think of others rather than of ourselves. It directs our thoughts to giving.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.text: There are some people who want to throw their arms round you simply because it is Christmas; there are other people who want to strangle you simply because it is Christmas.
quotes.author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quotes.text: Now, the essence, the very spirit of Christmas is that we first make believe a thing is so, and lo, it presently turns out to be so.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.text: Always be prepared if someone asks you what you want for Christmas. Give brand names, the store that sells the merchandise, and, if possible, exact model numbers so they can't go wrong. Be the type who's impossible to buy for, so they have to get what you want.
quotes.author: John Waters

quotes.text: The Christian faith can never be separated from the soil of sacred events, from the choice made by God, who wanted to speak to us, to become man, to die and rise again, in a particular place and at a particular time.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.text: Christmas is a time of year that's so romantic.
quotes.author: Katharine McPhee

quotes.text: I love giving gifts and I love receiving them. I really like giving little kids extravagant gifts. You see their little faces light up and they get excited. If it's a really good gift, I love receiving it, like jewels, small islands.

quotes.text: I once bought my kids a set of batteries for Christmas with a note on it saying, toys not included.
quotes.author: Bernard Manning

quotes.text: People say I don't write books, I make Christmas presents.
quotes.author: Bryce Courtenay

quotes.text: The real evidence for Jesus and Christianity is in how Jesus and the Christianity based on him manifest themselves in the lives of practicing Christians.
quotes.author: Lionel Blue

quotes.text: Believe in love. Believe in magic. Hell, believe in Santa Clause. Believe in others. Believe in yourself. Believe in your dreams. If you don't, who will?
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.text: No sane local official who has hung up an empty stocking over the municipal fireplace, is going to shoot Santa Claus just before a hard Christmas.
quotes.author: Al Smith

quotes.text: I don't trust Santa Barbara as far as I can spit. I am afraid that if I went back there, it's possible that I could be run through their system, their judicial system, and wind up in some county jail where I could be killed and I'm not gonna take that chance.
quotes.author: Randy Quaid

quotes.text: We have domesticated God's transcendence. We often learn about God at about the same time as we are learning about Santa Claus; but our ideas about Santa Claus change, mature and become more nuanced, whereas our ideas of God can remain at a rather infantile level.

quotes.text: With big folks, either people think you look mean or it's more of a jolly Santa Claus, 'Oh, he's just a pudgy little teddy bear pillow.'
quotes.author: The Notorious B.I.G.

quotes.text: I don't really care what people tell children - when you believe in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and the Tooth Fairy, one more fib won't hurt. But I am infuriated by the growing notion, posited in some touchy-feely quarters, that all women are, or can be, beautiful.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: I was in the Pritikin Center in Santa Monica once, trying to lose 30 or 40 pounds in a month. I'd work... on a treadmill and with the weights, but it was driving me nuts. So I escaped. Tom Arnold picked me up and we went to Le Dome and had tons of desserts.
quotes.author: Chris Farley

quotes.text: Well I teach in the History of Consciousness Department at the University of California, Santa Cruz. So that's my primary work. I lecture on various campuses and in various communities across the country and other parts of the world.
