quotes.text: Our family was too strange and weird for even Santa Claus to come visit... Santa, who was jolly - but, let's face it, he was also very judgmental.
quotes.author: Julia Sweeney

quotes.text: I usually like to throw on some flip flops and go to a really nice lunch in Venice, or Santa Monica, or stay in and cook dinner.
quotes.author: Ben Savage

quotes.text: The Bermuda Triangle got tired of warm weather. It moved to Alaska. Now Santa Claus is missing.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: There's one Baldessari work I genuinely love and would like to own, maybe because of my Midwestern roots and love of driving alone. 'The backs of all the trucks passed while driving from Los Angeles to Santa Barbara, California, Sunday, 20 January 1963' consists of a grid of 32 small color photographs depicting just what the title says.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: Santa is our culture's only mythic figure truly believed in by a large percentage of the population. It's a fact that most of the true believers are under eight years old, and that's a pity.
quotes.author: Chris Van Allsburg

quotes.text: I stopped believing in Santa Claus when I was six. Mother took me to see him in a department store and he asked for my autograph.
quotes.author: Shirley Temple

quotes.text: Santa Claus has the right idea - visit people only once a year.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.text: At the heart of every really good Christmas movie is the threat, I suppose, to Christmas. Something is wrong with Christmas, in all of these movies. In 'The Polar Express,' there's a kid that doesn't really believe, and that's the threat to Christmas. In 'Santa Claus: The Movie,' jealousy and greed are threatening to overrun his Christmas.
quotes.author: James McAvoy

quotes.text: The redwood is the glory of the Coast Range. It extends along the western slope, in a nearly continuous belt about ten miles wide, from beyond the Oregon boundary to the south of Santa Cruz, a distance of nearly four hundred miles, and in massive, sustained grandeur and closeness of growth surpasses all the other timber woods of the world.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: A good many things go around in the dark besides Santa Claus.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.text: The idea of God as a fatherly figure who looks down on us and worries about how we're doing or takes sides when we have fights - it's more irritating than Santa Claus. The world and the universe are far more wonderful if there's not a puppet master.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.text: The main reason Santa is so jolly is because he knows where all the bad girls live.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: Let's be naughty and save Santa the trip.
quotes.author: Gary Allan

quotes.text: What is the real purpose behind the Tooth Fairy, the Easter Bunny and Santa Claus? They seem like greater steps toward faith and imagination, each with a payoff. Like cognitive training exercises.

quotes.text: Once you become an actor, it's important to take care of yourself. I live in Santa Monica, where I can mountain bike, hike and go running on the beach. I like a nice sunset jog.

quotes.text: I'm going to North Pole to help out Santa this year.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.text: When I was a freshman in high school, I got a letterman jacket, which you'd think would be great stock. The jacket had the big S on it, for Santa Monica. But rather than having a football or a baseball on the S, I had a little nine iron. Girls thought it was a flute.

quotes.text: I think the true test of a pop song, for me, and I've talked to a lot of other writers about this, is you take your demo, you pop it in your car and you drive down Sunset Blvd. to Santa Monica, and that's the Hollywood car test.

quotes.text: 'Santa Sangre' is the picture I love the best, myself, because 'El Topo' and 'The Holy Mountain' I made with my head, and 'Santa Sangre' I made with my feelings, with my heart. It's an emotional picture. And it's more real for me, that picture.

quotes.text: I think we have to believe in things we don't see. That's really important for all of us, whether it's your religion or Santa Claus, or whatever. That's pretty much what it's about.

quotes.text: Democracy is only a dream: it should be put in the same category as Arcadia, Santa Claus, and Heaven.

quotes.text: I wanted to be a marine biologist my whole life until I graduated high school. And even now, I'm still like, 'Maybe I'll just quit the biz and go to Santa Cruz and study marine biology and have my own research center in the Bahamas.' Yeah, I'm sure it would be just that smooth.

quotes.text: I'm concerned about my daughter because she will not believe in Santa Claus. No matter what I say to her, she just doesn't buy it, and she's 2. I refuse to give it up. I say, 'There is a Santa Claus,' and she says, 'Okay, Mommy. In pretend world, right?' She really doesn't believe.

quotes.text: I was a trial lawyer. At the same time, I was a teacher. I taught about the political and social content of film for American University. Then I left and became a teacher at the University of California at Santa Cruz. I taught about the political and social content of film, but I also taught a course in law for undergraduates.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.text: The first sort of big present I remember getting from Santa Claus was quite a small telescope that I remember going into our backyard with my parents and figuring out how to assemble, and staring at the night sky, just for hours, with both of my parents.

quotes.text: I founded Atari in my garage in Santa Clara while at Stanford. When I was in school, I took a lot of business classes. I was really fascinated by economics. You end up having to be a marketeer, finance maven and a little bit of a technologist in order to get a business going.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.text: I had this grand idea that Elvira's kind of the Santa Claus of Halloween - at the malls, you'd have an Elvira there. Girls would dress as Elvira just like guys dress as Santa Claus, and it's not the real thing, but they'll pose for pictures, sign autographs. Of course, I couldn't go around to every mall, so we'd have to get more Elviras.

quotes.text: Growing up in northern California has had a big influence on my love and respect for the outdoors. When I lived in Oakland, we would think nothing of driving to Half Moon Bay and Santa Cruz one day and then driving to the foothills of the Sierras the next day.

quotes.text: When I was 21 years old, I had a job playing Santa Claus in a shopping centre in Sacramento. I was rail thin, so it's not like I was a traditional Santa Claus even then. I had a square stomach; that was the shape of the sofa cushion that I had stuffed into my pants.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.text: Kanan is a big road through the Santa Monica Mountains. Between mid-March and mid-April, when you get over to the western side of the mountains, it's populated by Spanish broom - this beautiful, yellow, flowering weed that smells the way I imagine it smells along the Yellow Brick Road.
quotes.author: John C. McGinley

quotes.text: I studied at UC Santa Cruz before going on to do a grad program at UCLA. Santa Cruz was like an awesome hippie summer camp. I got to take a vacation from reality and hang out on beaches and in forests.
quotes.author: Aaron Koblin

quotes.text: My mom has this ugly Santa ornament, and one year, I took it off the tree and clipped it to her pillow. We've been trading it back and forth ever since - 16 years now. I wore it to the Golden Globes and even put it in her bird feeder. As the birds eat, it's slowly revealed.
quotes.author: Eric Stonestreet

quotes.text: Texas, to be respected must be polite. Santa Anna living, can be of incalculable benefit to Texas; Santa Anna dead, would just be another dead Mexican.
quotes.author: Sam Houston

quotes.text: Christmas is the time when kids tell Santa what they want and adults pay for it. Deficits are when adults tell government what they want and their kids pay for it.
quotes.author: Richard Lamm

quotes.text: If we talk about the environment, for example, we have to talk about environmental racism - about the fact that kids in South Central Los Angeles have a third of the lung capacity of kids in Santa Monica.
quotes.author: Danny Glover

quotes.text: When I was 11 years old, my parents wanted me to do something besides get in trouble. So they enrolled me in sailing classes at the Sea Shell Association in Santa Barbara, Calif. From the moment I climbed into that 8-foot dinghy in 1952, I knew instinctively what to do and sensed I had done it before.
quotes.author: David Crosby

quotes.text: I was born in Santa Monica but brought up abroad so I don't use English much.
quotes.author: Geraldine Chaplin

quotes.text: When I graduated from Santa Monica High in 1927, I was voted the girl most likely to succeed. I didn't realize it would take so long.
quotes.author: Gloria Stuart

quotes.text: I'm not looking for anything more than any other guy. I like a good smile. Pretty eyes. She has to be active, like not play-sports active, but she'll play air hockey, do some pool, go for rides on the Santa Monica Pier. I would much rather have fun with her than do the cool thing.
quotes.author: Mitchel Musso

quotes.text: Having a birthday cake squashed into your face by young kids? Delicious. I always don a Santa suit at Christmas. Remaining childish is a tremendous state of innocence.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.text: I never believed in Santa Claus because I knew no white dude would come into my neighborhood after dark.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.text: Santa Barbara is a paradise; Disneyland is a paradise; the U.S. is a paradise. Paradise is just paradise. Mournful, monotonous, and superficial though it may be, it is paradise. There is no other.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.text: No matter what, I always make it home for Christmas. I love to go to my Tennessee Mountain Home and invite all of my nieces and nephews and their spouses and kids and do what we all like to do - eat, laugh, trade presents and just enjoy each other... and sometimes I even dress up like Santa Claus!
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.text: I see Santa Claus and Joseph Smith and Luke Skywalker as the same person.
quotes.author: Trey Parker

quotes.text: The Grateful Dead were very kind. It was Santa Claus. It did good things. It allowed other people to benefit. The benefits that we played were enormous, and we played free. So you've got a band that loves to play free, and that was a wonderful thing.
quotes.author: Mickey Hart

quotes.text: Christmas is a time when kids tell Santa what they want and adults pay for it. Deficits are when adults tell the government what they want - and their kids pay for it.
quotes.author: Richard Lamm

quotes.text: My own zigzag path through life led me back to Santa Cruz in the early Eighties, and I have revisited regularly since. The place hasn't changed: head in the clouds, backside on the hills and feet in the ocean - one of the most decent and beautiful places on earth.
quotes.author: Clive Sinclair

quotes.text: A group of us started a community center in Santa Monica. We've tried different programs, and three have worked really well. A poetry group. Once a week we visit Venice High and talk to girls at risk.
quotes.author: Lisa Bonet

quotes.text: I have to at least get a couple weekends in where I can just be on Santa Monica beach or Malibu and just ride the waves.
quotes.author: Jake T. Austin

quotes.text: Obama's gonna play Santa Claus with the minimum wage. He's got no successes to brag about. He cannot talk about a robust job market. In fact, the very fact he's talking about the minimum wage is evidence there is no robust job market.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.text: I think we've taken the meaning of Christmas out. People don't stop and think about Jesus or the birth of Jesus. When they think of Christmas, they think of Santa Claus and - for the children, and they think of giving gifts and out-giving the next person of spending their time looking for the right thing for somebody who has everything.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.text: Nobody shoots at Santa Claus.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: I'd go to the farmers' market in Santa Barbara, and I'd put out my guitar case, and I'd test out these little ditty songs that I would write, and I would get a couple of avocados, a bag of pistachios, and, like, fifteen bucks. That was a lot of money for me.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.text: Santa Barbara is my hood. I mean, it's not much of a hood, but it is definitely like my hood. I claim Santa Barbara like I claim my family. I'm going to be married and buried there.

quotes.text: For me growing up, Christmas time was always the most fantastic, exciting time of year, and you'd stay up until three in the morning. You'd hear the parents wrapping in the other room but you knew that also, maybe, they were in collusion with Santa Claus.

quotes.text: When I was 18 at the Santa Ana River Jetty is where I put my first board in the water that I ever got from Joe Quigg. I was just riding the whitewater in, and I was just in heaven.
quotes.author: Dick Dale

quotes.text: I work with a place in Santa Monica called Phase IV. My doctor recommended them to me when I started losing weight. They help people train for things like triathlons or biking and running races. They offer physical therapists, testing, lectures.
quotes.author: Drew Carey

quotes.text: I put on weight like Santa Claus. I just get this belly that kind of extends out.
quotes.author: Christian Bale

quotes.text: I split my time between Santa Barbara and Aspen. I live on a pretty fast horse.
quotes.author: Kevin Costner

quotes.text: I was probably nine or ten the first time I heard there was no Santa Claus.
quotes.author: Joe Nichols

quotes.text: Hot, dry katabatic winds, like the south foehn in Europe, the sharav in the Middle East, and the Santa Ana of Southern California, are all believed to have a decided effect on human behavior and are associated with such health problems as migraines, depression, lethargy, and moodiness. Some scientists say that this is a myth.
quotes.author: Tim Cahill

quotes.text: There are a few YouTube clips of me singing at The King's Head in Santa Monica, so you can see how bad I am.
quotes.author: Vinnie Jones

quotes.text: Ronald has had bicycle safety and safety in the home. Yes, Ronald is McDonald's, second most recognised figure after Santa Claus, and there's an element of obviously benefiting your business.
quotes.author: Jim Cantalupo

quotes.text: I'm the youngest of five kids, and I wanted attention. And in Santa Barbara, there was lots of theater going on, so for that area, it was a little bit like playing Little League baseball. There were dance classes, theater classes, and I just loved it.

quotes.text: I crossed paths with a horse that happened to change my life. That horse is Game On Dude, and what a horse! He's a soldier. Together we traveled the world. We won the Santa Anita Big Cap, Goodwood, almost won the Breeder's Cup Classic; we won the San Antonio, Hollywood Gold Cup and the Californian.
quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

quotes.text: Christmas movies, it's a hard thing to do. The danger is you just end up with a Hollywood star with a Santa beard. You risk it being fake and cheesy and not real.
quotes.author: Peter Baynham

quotes.text: Against expectations I was charmed by Gehry's Edgemar development, which housed the Santa Monica Museum of Art, and positively awed by the Bilbao Guggenheim. That Gehry is a great artist I have no doubt, but talent and determination are no warrant against confusion, nor are they a guaranty to produce great art.
quotes.author: Leon Krier

quotes.text: Surprisingly, the Eisenhower Memorial design contains almost none of the known Gehry-box of tricks. His giant etched chain-link curtain, first applied in 1979 to hide an ungracious parking garage at Santa Monica Place, is resurrected for Eisenhower to screen the equally graceless facade of the Department of Education.
quotes.author: Leon Krier

quotes.text: I actually share her view and understand her frustration when any government attempts to ban secular symbols like Santa Claus or Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer or Christmas lights.
quotes.author: Steve Israel

quotes.text: Every year, dads will dress up as Santa and try to surprise their kids by coming down the chimney, and every year, a dad gets stuck and dies.
quotes.author: Kyle Dunnigan

quotes.text: When I was a kid, I believed in Santa Claus. But it was very tough because in the Dominican... there are not a lot of rich people there.
quotes.author: Alfonso Soriano

quotes.text: I love Santa Monica and Venice because I like the beach. I have a lot of friends in that area.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.text: Bride: A woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: Frankly, 'Bride Wars' got made because movies with women need to be about weddings and love.
quotes.author: Casey Wilson

quotes.text: My father always wanted to be the corpse at every funeral, the bride at every wedding and the baby at every christening.
quotes.author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quotes.text: My biggest goal in life is to not be annoying about being a bride.
quotes.author: Christine Teigen

quotes.text: One tradition I have with my friends is that when one of us gets married, we have a ton of fragrance oils and pretty bottles at the bachelorette party. Everyone puts a drop or two in a bottle for the bride and makes a wish, and the bride wears our creation on her wedding day.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.text: Australians have a fantastic sense of humour and incredible taste. I was there for 'Bend It Like Beckham,' and I had a great time. Aussies loved it, and I think 'Bride & Prejudice' is going to do well, too, because it's all about having a good time.
quotes.author: Gurinder Chadha

quotes.text: 'The Princess Bride' was a movie that I watched all the time.
quotes.author: Charlie Rowe

quotes.text: A wedding dress is both an intimate and personal for a woman - it must reflect the personality and style of the bride.
quotes.author: Carolina Herrera

quotes.text: Some brides stress, some don't. I think I'm a serene bride.
quotes.author: Charlene, Princess of Monaco

quotes.text: Even the most understated ceremony involves a certain respect for ritual and pageantry. No one plays more of a significant role than the bride's attendants.
quotes.author: Vera Wang

quotes.text: When I design a wedding dress with a bustle, it has to be one the bride can dance in. I love the idea that something is practical and still looks great.
quotes.author: Vera Wang

quotes.text: I remember when I was in school, they would ask, 'What are you going to be when you grow up?' and then you'd have to draw a picture of it. I drew a picture of myself as a bride.
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.text: That is ever the way. 'Tis all jealousy to the bride and good wishes to the corpse.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.text: A bride at her second marriage does not wear a veil. She wants to see what she is getting.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: Bride and groom are not just two contracting parties but two loving and beloved companions, joined in establishing a home that will be nothing less than a source of immortality.
quotes.author: Meir Soloveichik

quotes.text: My mom used to make my costumes when I was little; she sews a lot. One year, I was a bride and I had a big wedding dress and a bouquet. Another year I was a medieval princess with a long teal dress and a veil. It was a little extravagant, but it was cute!
quotes.author: Sasha Pieterse

quotes.text: When I got married, the Sun ran the headline: 'Here comes the bride, all fat and wide.' Luckily, it was a few days after the wedding - but it was still hideous to read at a great romantic moment.
quotes.author: Jo Brand

quotes.text: The more traditional bride still prefers white or ivory, but the young girls... seem to like the idea of using colors.
quotes.author: Reem Acra

quotes.text: Most Kikuyu marriages were arranged on the basis of what is described by anthropologists as the bride price.
quotes.author: Louis Leakey

quotes.text: When it's over, I want to say: all my life I was a bride married to amazement. I was the bridegroom, taking the world into my arms.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.text: How cool it is to see a bride walking down the aisle with a beautiful long gown with beautiful layers of tulle and organza, unveiling their mini dress at the party?
quotes.author: Reem Acra

quotes.text: A young bride is like a plucked flower; but a guilty wife is like a flower that had been walked over.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: The first book I wrote was The Bride Price which was a romantic book, but my husband burnt the book when he saw it. I was the typical African woman, I'd done this privately, I wanted him to look at it, approve it and he said he wouldn't read it.
quotes.author: Buchi Emecheta

quotes.text: I don't care how handsome or fabulous or funny the groom is, or how sweet and accommodating the bride, or vice versa. Marriage is hard.
quotes.author: Jenna McCarthy

quotes.text: Next month, I will celebrate my 30th anniversary of marriage with my beautiful bride, Vicki. Our marriage has been a blessing. I have gained even more respect for the institution over the past 3 decades and will defend it against attack.
quotes.author: Todd Tiahrt

quotes.text: You mustn't upstage the bride.
quotes.author: Ian Mckellen

quotes.text: I was sad that Corpse Bride was so short. I would've liked to have had her around for way longer. She doesn't actually have that many scenes.
quotes.author: Helena Bonham Carter

quotes.text: I want to be a simple bride when I get married. I want a beach wedding where I am running around on the sand in a white dress.
quotes.author: Sonakshi Sinha

quotes.text: I did get to keep the wedding dresses from 'Runaway Bride'. They're all boxed up in my garage. I've never opened them. It'll be fun one day when Hazel is taller. She can play dress-up with her friends.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.text: Never tell a secret to a bride or a groom; wait until they have been married longer.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.text: No one has put in harder training to become a royal bride than the glossy-haired Kate Middleton.
quotes.author: Tina Brown

quotes.text: Of course, I do have a slight advantage over the rest of you. It helps in a pinch to be able to remind your bride that you gave up a throne for her.
quotes.author: Edward VIII

quotes.text: Bridesmaids are never going to upstage the bride.
quotes.author: Georgina Chapman

quotes.text: I was like any new bride, who said, 'I'm going to cook for my man.' In fact, once I started a small kitchen fire in a pan. Smoke was pouring from the pan, and I got really scared. Right next to our stove is a small fire extinguisher. You know, easy access.
quotes.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quotes.text: I go out of my way to try not to be too annoying... my biggest goal in life is to not be annoying about being a bride.
quotes.author: Chrissy Teigen

quotes.text: 'The Princess Bride' is one of my favorite movies of all time.
quotes.author: Ivana Milicevic

quotes.text: A young bride can put on makeup at 6 in the morning and look fabulous at midnight. I have about a 15-minute window where I actually look good, and then I have to wash my face and start over.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.text: 'The Princess Bride' is by far the most popular film I've ever done. I don't think I'll ever top it.
quotes.author: Wallace Shawn

quotes.text: I've made movies that nobody saw initially, and then, all the sudden, people over the years pick up on it. Like 'Spinal Tap' and 'Princess Bride.'
quotes.author: Rob Reiner

quotes.text: It was very gray, very dreary. Everything was still rationed when I first saw the United States in 1951. I went over to visit my sister who was a war bride.
quotes.author: John Mahoney

quotes.text: I hadn't seen 'Bride of Frankenstein' until high school or maybe even later than that. It's really one of the great movie experiences where you think you know what it's going to be, but it's so much weirder and so much better than anything you could've imagined. It's so full of these striking, powerful images.
quotes.author: Mike Mignola

quotes.text: It didn't matter what you look like. You don't have to get up at 5:30 in the morning and there's a lot to be said for that. Corpse Bride can just play all my parts from now on and I'll just do the voice.
quotes.author: Helena Bonham Carter

quotes.text: Always a bridesmaid never a bride my foot!
quotes.author: Peter O'Toole

quotes.text: I am recognized a lot for 'Clueless,' but I am recognized a great deal for 'The Princess Bride.' I don't know... maybe everybody who has seen that movie just goes out on the street.
quotes.author: Wallace Shawn

quotes.text: I do not have a bride gene. I haven't been planning a wedding since I was 3. I never put a sheet on my head and pretended that it was a veil.
quotes.author: Niecy Nash

quotes.text: As I grew up and began identifying myself as a feminist, there were plenty of issues that continued to make me question marriage: the father 'giving' the bride away, women taking their husband's last name, the white dress, the vows promising to 'obey' the groom. And that only covers the wedding.
quotes.author: Jessica Valenti

quotes.text: I'm not the perfect bride after all.
quotes.author: Jenna Bush

quotes.text: I kind of love going to weddings - it's a guilty pleasure. I've never been the wedding-y type girl dreaming about the big day, the dress, but I always cry. Always. Even if I don't know the bride that well, I'm verklempt!
quotes.author: Alison Brie

quotes.text: The Pirate is surrealism and so, in a curious way, is Father of the Bride.
quotes.author: Vincente Minnelli

quotes.text: I'm a teen-age bride.
quotes.author: Marta Kristen

quotes.text: It was the noise Of ancient trees falling while all was still Before the storm, in the long interval Between the gathering clouds and that light breeze Which Germans call the Wind's bride.
quotes.author: Charles Godfrey Leland

quotes.text: To be in something as iconic as a Dracula film, and to be playing Jessica van Helsing, who would have been Dracula's choice for a bride, through history and beyond the grave, was a thrill.
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.text: As a kid, I wasn't sure that I would ever get married - I was not the kind of little girl who played at being a bride.
quotes.author: Jessica Valenti

quotes.text: It was post war. It was very gray, very dreary. Everything was still rationed when I first saw the United States in 1951. I went over to visit my sister who was a war bride.
quotes.author: John Mahoney

quotes.text: As far as film goes, I enjoy all Hollywood films and all Horror films like The Bride of Frankenstein, which also might be my favorite. I like 60's and 70's Italian and Spanish Horror films.
quotes.author: Johnny Ramone

quotes.text: I grew up in Middle America and I don't think my family was very funny, but I watched 'The Princess Bride.' I always wanted to be an actor. I didn't know anything about it. I'd never seen any plays or anything and I watched that movie over and over and over again.
quotes.author: Missi Pyle

quotes.text: I came to England in 1962 as a very young bride, in my teens, hoping just to stay two years and go back.
quotes.author: Buchi Emecheta

quotes.text: I wish we'd never got divorced. He and I both wish we'd never got divorced, but we did. I wish I could go back and be the bride again, but I can't.
quotes.author: Sarah Ferguson

quotes.text: For her fifth wedding, the bride wore black and carried a scotch and soda.
quotes.author: Phyllis Battelle

quotes.text: A bride is a bride the first time around. The white dress and the white veil are symbolic. So many people are breaking the rules that people don't know what the rules are.
quotes.author: Letitia Baldrige

quotes.text: What the bride should do is call guests who have young children and say: 'I'd love to have the kids at the wedding, but we won't have room. Would you get a baby sitter, and when we get back from our honeymoon, we'll have you guys over?'
quotes.author: Letitia Baldrige

quotes.text: You know that scene in 'Runaway Bride' when Julia Roberts puts on the amazing wedding dress and looks at herself in the mirror and goes, 'Swish, swish'? I loved that moment so much when I was a little girl.
quotes.author: Lily James

quotes.text: So many people say you have to remember to grab hold of your bride or groom and spend time with them. I think if we had done a traditional wedding, we would have been doing it for everyone else, but this was about the two of us.
quotes.author: Katherine Kelly

quotes.text: I had an audition for Mary Jane Watson in 'Spiderman' and ended up playing Betty Brant in that series. I auditioned for Amy Adams' role in 'Catch Me If You Can' and, you know, ended up playing the bank teller. So there were a lot of times early on where I felt like I was always sort of the bridesmaid, never the bride - never quite right.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Banks

quotes.text: In 'A Few Best Men,' I play a lesbian character. I played the lesbian sister of the bride who ends up kissing a dude at the end, but she was, like, a full-on lesbian in that. And I beat out famous Australian lesbians for the role.
quotes.author: Rebel Wilson

quotes.text: Once I started writing the screenplay of 'Bride & Prejudice,' I was convinced Jane Austen was a Punjabi in her previous birth.
quotes.author: Gurinder Chadha

quotes.text: Heinrich Heine once imagined the exiled Israelite as a dog who regains his stolen manhood only when he embraces the Sabbath bride. I see western swing performing a similar function in hardscrabble Texas, turning dirt-poor hired hands into Dapper Dans with magic feet at the Saturday night hoe-down.
quotes.author: Clive Sinclair

quotes.text: I wanted to be Beetlejuice. I watched nonstop 'Beetlejuice' and 'The Princess Bride' growing up.
quotes.author: Mackenzie Davis

quotes.text: I was fourteen, watching 'The Princess Bride' for the 254321th time, captivated by Wesley and Inigo dueling on the cliff-top. I had never held a sword in my life, but I phoned my mum and said, 'I want to learn to fence!'
quotes.author: V. E. Schwab

quotes.text: The design process usually starts as a fantasy, with ideas that I dream of and visualize. These ideas become a reality by bringing various ingredients together, from the lifestyle of my bride, her age and sex appeal, to the textures of the finest fabrics and embroideries that we produce in my family factories in India.
quotes.author: Naeem Khan

quotes.text: To be a good researcher is to be a good detective, and I enjoy ferreting out tidbits of information. For a diary book like 'A Coal Miner's Bride,' newspapers come in handy for small everyday details such as weather reports.
quotes.author: Susan Campbell Bartoletti

quotes.text: When we anthropomorphize the egg and sperm, when we turn them into a miniature bride and groom complete with personalities, what effect does this have on abortion legislation?
quotes.author: Emily Martin

quotes.text: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: America was not built on fear. America was built on courage, on imagination and an unbeatable determination to do the job at hand.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: When we honestly ask ourselves which person in our lives means the most to us, we often find that it is those who, instead of giving advice, solutions, or cures, have chosen rather to share our pain and touch our wounds with a warm and tender hand.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: I believe that a trusting attitude and a patient attitude go hand in hand. You see, when you let go and learn to trust God, it releases joy in your life. And when you trust God, you're able to be more patient. Patience is not just about waiting for something... it's about how you wait, or your attitude while waiting.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.text: Learning and innovation go hand in hand. The arrogance of success is to think that what you did yesterday will be sufficient for tomorrow.
quotes.author: William Pollard

quotes.text: Fine art is that in which the hand, the head, and the heart of man go together.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: Technology... is a queer thing. It brings you great gifts with one hand, and it stabs you in the back with the other.
quotes.author: Carrie Snow

quotes.text: When you take a flower in your hand and really look at it, it's your world for the moment. I want to give that world to someone else. Most people in the city rush around so, they have no time to look at a flower. I want them to see it whether they want to or not.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.text: In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand. Nobody on earth can give you either the key or the door to open, except yourself.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.text: Every dollar spent on nuclear is one less dollar spent on clean renewable energy and one more dollar spent on making the world a comparatively dirtier and a more dangerous place, because nuclear power and nuclear weapons go hand in hand.
quotes.author: Mark Z. Jacobson

quotes.text: On one hand, we know that everything happens for a reason, and there are no mistakes or coincidences. On the other hand, we learn that we can never give up, knowing that with the right tools and energy, we can reverse any decree or karma. So, which is it? Let the Light decide, or never give up? The answer is: both.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.text: A basketball team is like the five fingers on your hand. If you can get them all together, you have a fist. That's how I want you to play.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.text: Be peaceful, be courteous, obey the law, respect everyone; but if someone puts his hand on you, send him to the cemetery.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand, the sound of music, the smell of a flower, a beautiful sunset, a work of art, love, laughter, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self, and they have physiological consequences as well.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.text: Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, it's at the end of your arm, as you get older, remember you have another hand: The first is to help yourself, the second is to help others.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: There is nothing more difficult to take in hand, more perilous to conduct, or more uncertain in its success, than to take the lead in the introduction of a new order of things.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.text: This war differs from other wars, in this particular. We are not fighting armies but a hostile people, and must make old and young, rich and poor, feel the hard hand of war.
quotes.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

quotes.text: Winners embrace hard work. They love the discipline of it, the trade-off they're making to win. Losers, on the other hand, see it as punishment. And that's the difference.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: If your emotional abilities aren't in hand, if you don't have self-awareness, if you are not able to manage your distressing emotions, if you can't have empathy and have effective relationships, then no matter how smart you are, you are not going to get very far.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.text: What makes most people comfortable is some sort of sense of nostalgia. I grew up in a small town, and I could count my friends on one hand, and I still live that way. I think I'll die in a small town. When I can't move my bones around a stage any more, you'll find me living in a place that's spread out and rural and spacious.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.text: Our main business is not to see what lies dimly at a distance, but to do what lies clearly at hand.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.text: Life is like a game of cards. The hand you are dealt is determinism; the way you play it is free will.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.text: As long as I live, I will never forget that day 21 years ago when I raised my hand and took the oath of citizenship. Do you know how proud I was? I was so proud that I walked around with an American flag around my shoulders all day long.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Put your hand on a hot stove for a minute and it seems like an hour. Sit with a pretty girl for an hour, and it seems like a minute.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: To see a world in a grain of sand and heaven in a wild flower Hold infinity in the palms of your hand and eternity in an hour.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: When you find your definitions in God, you find the very purpose for which you were created. Put your hand into God's hand, know His absolutes, demonstrate His love, present His truth, and the message of redemption and transformation will take hold.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.text: My purpose... to go on with my heart and soul, devoting all my energies to Girl Scouts, and heart and hand with them, we will make our lives and the lives of the future girls happy, healthy and holy.
quotes.author: Juliette Gordon Low

quotes.text: Enthusiasm is the yeast that makes your hopes shine to the stars. Enthusiasm is the sparkle in your eyes, the swing in your gait. The grip of your hand, the irresistible surge of will and energy to execute your ideas.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Faith has to do with things that are not seen and hope with things that are not at hand.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.text: If the Negro in the ghetto must eternally be fed by the hand that pushes him into the ghetto, he will never become strong enough to get out of the ghetto.
quotes.author: Carter G. Woodson

quotes.text: The impersonal hand of government can never replace the helping hand of a neighbor.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.text: I've just concluded - since President Obama endorses the same-sex marriage, advocates homosexual people, and enjoys an attractive countenance - thus if it becomes necessary, I shall travel to Washington, D.C., get down on my knee, and ask his hand.
quotes.author: Robert Mugabe

quotes.text: You sit at the board and suddenly your heart leaps. Your hand trembles to pick up the piece and move it. But what chess teaches you is that you must sit there calmly and think about whether it's really a good idea and whether there are other, better ideas.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.text: I look like the kind of guy who has a bottle of beer in my hand.
quotes.author: Charles Bronson

quotes.text: Where there is devotional music, God is always at hand with His gracious presence.
quotes.author: Johann Sebastian Bach

quotes.text: I shook Obama's hand and I said, 'I want to be your friend.' My hand is still outstretched. I am not Obama's enemy, but it's difficult not see imperialism in Washington. Those who don't see it don't want to see it, like the ostrich.
quotes.author: Hugo Chavez

quotes.text: I don't look like someone who leans on a mantelpiece with a cocktail in my hand, you know.
quotes.author: Charles Bronson

quotes.text: I symbolized doping... My phone rarely rings. I can count on the fingers of one hand the number of riders who call me.
quotes.author: Richard Virenque

quotes.text: For a kid, self-esteem can be as close at hand as a sports victory or a sense of belonging in a peer group. It's a much more complicated and elusive proposition for adults, subject to the responsibilities and vicissitudes of grown-up life.
quotes.author: Meghan Daum

quotes.text: In 20 or 30 years, you'll be able to hold in your hand as much computing knowledge as exists now in the whole city, or even the whole world.
quotes.author: Douglas Engelbart

quotes.text: Putts get real difficult the day they hand out the money.
quotes.author: Lee Trevino

quotes.text: We are able to find everything in our memory, which is like a dispensary or chemical laboratory in which chance steers our hand sometimes to a soothing drug and sometimes to a dangerous poison.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.text: God lends a helping hand to the man who tries hard.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.text: When you're special to a cat, you're special indeed, she brings to you the gift of her preference of you, the sight of you, the sound of your voice, the touch of your hand.
quotes.author: Lester B. Pearson

quotes.text: A mind all logic is like a knife all blade. It makes the hand bleed that uses it.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: Any newspaper, from the first line to the last, is nothing but a web of horrors, I cannot understand how an innocent hand can touch a newspaper without convulsing in disgust.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: Religion is the organization of spirituality into something that became the hand maiden of conquerors. Nearly all religions were brought to people and imposed on people by conquerors, and used as the framework to control their minds.
quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.text: This is the way I think about politics: We want two diametrically opposed things from a politician. On one hand we want them to be bastions of moral integrity, perfect people, saints. And on the other hand, we want them to be effective leaders.
quotes.author: Beau Willimon

quotes.text: A sword never kills anybody; it is a tool in the killer's hand.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.text: I'm competitive with myself, and that goes hand in hand with how I present myself. I'm not only trying to put one foot in front of the other, I'm trying to put my best foot forward.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.text: To have command is to have all the power you will ever need. To have all the power you will ever need, is to have the world in the palm of you hand.
quotes.author: Tiberius

quotes.text: The architect should strive continually to simplify; the ensemble of the rooms should then be carefully considered that comfort and utility may go hand in hand with beauty.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.text: It is well with me only when I have a chisel in my hand.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.text: As a practicing neurologist, I can tell you first hand that working with Parkinson's patients offers clinical challenges. But from an emotional perspective, this disease can border on overwhelming.
quotes.author: David Perlmutter

quotes.text: Economic growth and human development need to go hand in hand. Human values need to be advocated vigorously.
quotes.author: Kailash Satyarthi

quotes.text: Perfection is attained by slow degrees; it requires the hand of time.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Reading and writing, like everything else, improve with practice. And, of course, if there are no young readers and writers, there will shortly be no older ones. Literacy will be dead, and democracy - which many believe goes hand in hand with it - will be dead as well.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.text: I hate going out for lunch during a workday because it slows down my pace and ruins my rhythm. I prefer to eat at my desk. Actually, I wander around the design studio with a plate in my hand as I dine on, for example, salmon sashimi and a salad of tomatoes and mozzarella. I often have a bit of dark chocolate after lunch.
quotes.author: Tom Ford

quotes.text: A lot of the records you buy, there's nothing you can hold in your hand, it's all 1's and 0's, this digital cloud floating in the ether. but with analog albums, you can hold it in your hand.
quotes.author: Dave Grohl

quotes.text: Success in life comes not from holding a good hand, but in playing a poor hand well.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: I definitely think that prescription drugs, like antidepressants, are prescribed so cavalierly, anyone can get anything, but I need it. I do think that it needs to work hand and hand with therapy.
quotes.author: Sarah Silverman

quotes.text: I tell the person I won't take a picture or sign the autograph, but I will shake their hand. That kind of personal touch is all they're really seeking.
quotes.author: Chevy Chase

quotes.text: My senior year of high school, I was voted 'Wittiest.' So, several years later, I decided to try my hand at writing humor to see if I could be witty enough to make some money.
quotes.author: Barbara Park

quotes.text: When I was first introduced to Buddhism in a high school World Studies class, I dismissed it out of hand. This was during the hedonistic days of the late '60s, and this spiritual path seemed so grim with its concern about attachment and, apparently, anti-pleasure.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: No art is any good unless you can feel how it's put together. By and large it's the eye, the hand and if it's any good, you feel the body. Most of the best stuff seems to be a complete gesture, the totality of the artist's body; you can really lean on it.
quotes.author: Frank Stella

quotes.text: We like Batman - we understand him, we suffer with him. On the other hand, we want to be Superman. But they're conflicting philosophies. Let's bring them together in one movie and see how we, as an audience, wrestle with our inner demons.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Petersen

quotes.text: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but of playing a poor hand well.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: He who puts out his hand to stop the wheel of history will have his fingers crushed.
quotes.author: Lech Walesa

quotes.text: We all have that burning question about what happens if we lose somebody we love, especially if we lose them tragically. We wonder what fear was going on, we wonder if we could have reached out and touched them, held their hand, looked in their eyes, been there.
quotes.author: Kevin Costner

quotes.text: America, you're sending girls a mixed message. On one hand, you're saying to have positive body image and love who we are; on the other, we're being marketed makeup and clothing that obviously turns us into someone different.
quotes.author: Adora Svitak

quotes.text: My hand is the extension of the thinking process - the creative process.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.text: To act wisely when the time for action comes, to wait patiently when it is time for repose, put man in accord with the tides. Ignorance of this law results in periods of unreasoning enthusiasm on the one hand, and depression on the other.
quotes.author: Helena Blavatsky

quotes.text: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.text: I can count on one hand how many people I trust.
quotes.author: Frances Bean Cobain

quotes.text: The small businessman is smart; he realizes there's no free lunch. On the other hand, he knows where to go to get a good inexpensive sandwich.
quotes.author: Adam Osborne

quotes.text: Baseball happens to be a game of cumulative tension but football, basketball and hockey are played with hand grenades and machine guns.
quotes.author: John Leonard

quotes.text: I used all diligence to arrive at London and therefore I now gave my crew a certificate under my hand, of my free and willing return, without persuasion or force by any one or more of them.
quotes.author: Henry Hudson

quotes.text: I know I wasn't as handsome as some other guys, but I was OK with that.
quotes.author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quotes.text: We as Americans believe it's OK to kill people. We believe it's OK to invade a country that had nothing to do with 9/11. We think it's OK to invade a country where we think Osama Bin Laden is and he's in the other country. So we just go in and we just kill. And we have the death penalty; we sanction it.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.text: I'm just not into trying to convince people like me. I always say to myself, 'It is what it is.' I walk into a situation knowing that people are either going to love me or they're not, and that's OK. I'm just going to be me. You can't be everything to everyone.
quotes.author: NeNe Leakes

quotes.text: Live and think like a poor man and you'll always be OK.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.text: The writing process, the way I go about it is I do whatever the beat feels like, whatever the beat is telling me to do. Usually when the beat comes on, I think of a hook or the subject I want to rap about almost instantly. Within four, eight bars of it playing I'm just like, 'Oh, OK. This is what I wanna do'.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.text: Its OK to grow up, just as long as you don't grow old. Face it you are young.
quotes.author: Jarvis Cocker

quotes.text: I got rabies shots for biting the head off a bat but that's OK - the bat had to get Ozzy shots.
quotes.author: Ozzy Osbourne

quotes.text: It's OK to do cute little things like kissing a turtle, but you can't kiss another person because he's a different color? Give me a break. And you have to remember, I'm from Dallas, Texas.
quotes.author: Aaron Spelling

quotes.text: It was such a leap in my career when 'Truman Show' came along. It's always been a long process for me insofar as recognition goes, but that's OK because you appreciate it when it comes.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.text: I've made mistakes, I've misspoke, I am sure I will again sometime, but that happens, that's part of being human in my book. I'm OK with that. I've never done it maliciously, ever.
quotes.author: Curt Schilling

quotes.text: I'm a singer, not a politician, and I think you don't want the two to get confused. It's not OK to be on CNN talking about people starving and then tell the interviewer that your new album is coming out in six months.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.text: One out of four people in this country is mentally unbalanced. Think of your three closes friends; if they seem OK, then you're the one.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: Weight gain can happen at any point in time, and it is something that you are dealing with anyway, and it is OK. It is ridiculous to have this dictate your very being because I have always said that it is not the outside that defines who you are.
quotes.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quotes.text: I don't have time to write a mom blog, but I'm not against it. I think it's great when women talk about things. I'm all about female empowerment. There's a lot of lonely, lost moms out there. Moms need to be encouraged to tell the truth. There's a lot of glamour mommy stuff. It's OK to get real.
quotes.author: Kelly Cutrone

quotes.text: I remember seeing 'Aladdin' when I was five or six and loving it. I looked at the big screen and said to my mum, 'Whatever this Genie guy does, I want to do.' Mum said I couldn't be a genie, but that Robin Williams, who did the voice-over in the film, was an actor. So I said, 'OK, then, I want to be an actor.'
quotes.author: Darren Criss

quotes.text: My dad took me for an audition once, to show me, 'OK, you want to be a child actor, this is what it's like.' I sang a folk song about donkeys on this West End stage with this big director, and there was a queue of 200 girls all singing 'Memory.' I was terrible. Terrible.
quotes.author: Emilia Clarke

quotes.text: In the 1990s, it's OK to do comedy about the Chernobyl disaster or the Space Shuttle blowing up. It's acceptable to ridicule the Pope or the President of the United States, but God forbid you do a joke... about gays. The gay community is the last sacred cow in this society.
quotes.author: Sam Kinison

quotes.text: I am half Puerto Rican, a quarter German and a quarter black. That was always a big issue for me - being mixed race - because casting directors tended to be very like, 'OK, are you Hispanic for this role?' 'Or is she going to be African American?'
quotes.author: Naya Rivera

quotes.text: A landlord is showing a couple around an apartment. The husband looks up and says, 'Wait a minute. This apartment doesn't have a ceiling.' The landlord answers, 'That's OK. The people upstairs don't walk around that much.'
quotes.author: Gilbert Gottfried

quotes.text: Because ALS is underfunded, patients have had no option but to fade away and die. That is not OK.
quotes.author: Steve Gleason

quotes.text: I'm not going to get somewhere and say, 'OK, I'm done.' Success is never final; I'll just keep on going. The same way as failure never being fatal. Just keep going. I'm going to the stars and then past them.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: I feel like hair is the number one thing that makes me feel beautiful or not. If I have really bad hair, but my makeup's beautiful and I have a wonderful dress on, I'm still not happy. So if I wake up, and I've got 2 big zits on my face and my hair looks fierce, I feel ok. I have a weird hair obsession.
quotes.author: Amber Stevens

quotes.text: If there's any message to my work, it is ultimately that it's OK to be different, that it's good to be different, that we should question ourselves before we pass judgment on someone who looks different, behaves different, talks different, is a different color.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.text: I am... stubborn, and I admit it, so it's OK.
quotes.author: Mila Kunis

quotes.text: Everything was my fault. I was so dumb. But if I hadn't made the mistakes I made, I wouldn't have met the wonderful woman I've been married to for over 30 years, so I guess that makes the mistakes OK.
quotes.author: Donald Sutherland

quotes.text: Texas is OK if you want to settle down and do your own thing quietly, but it's not for outrageous people, and I was always outrageous.
quotes.author: Janis Joplin

quotes.text: It's so easy to play us guys that I hate to give away secrets to women because I know they'll use them. But OK, if you just simply don't give a guy the time of day, every once in awhile, it just makes us more like 'What do we do?' Men are developed to conquer. When we can't seem to conquer, we stay in it no matter what.
quotes.author: Jamie Foxx

quotes.text: Lionel Richie, love song, OK, thank you very much, good-bye. And all of a sudden I realized that, in my career, what has made my career has always been the surprises.
quotes.author: Lionel Richie

quotes.text: People want to classify and say, 'OK, this is a gangster film.' 'This is a Western.' 'This is a... ' You know? It's easy to classify and it makes people feel comfortable, but it doesn't matter, it doesn't really matter.
quotes.author: Martin Scorsese

quotes.text: Don't let the incidents which take place in life bring you low. And certainly don't whine. You can be brought low, that's OK, but don't be reduced by them. Just say, 'That's life.'
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: OK, so what's the speed of dark?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Who you are as a person is more special than trying to be someone you're not. Don't get me wrong - I have bad days, everyone does, but I know if I'm feeling insecure today, I'll move on tomorrow. I'd tell girls to realise it's OK to have bad days to get to the good ones.
quotes.author: Hayley Hasselhoff

quotes.text: I calculate that I took 20,000 punches, but I earned millions and kept a lot of it. I may talk slow, but my mind is OK.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: If you want to grow a giant redwood, you need to make sure the seeds are ok, nurture the sapling, and work out what might potentially stop it from growing all the way along. Anything that breaks it at any point stops that growth.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: I never smoked. I never drank and I never took drugs. The funny thing is, nothing is more boring, people like this. For me, it's OK. But most of my friends, at least they smoke and drink.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.text: When your hobbies get in the way of your work - that's OK; but when your hobbies get in the way of themselves... well.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.text: Falling in love is awesome, but I'm never drawn to happy songs per se, so whenever you sit down to write a heartbreak song and you're happily in love, it's like, 'OK, now I have to go back to a sad place to get something good.'
quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

quotes.text: Daddy had a farm - cows, pigs, OK, a big garden, OK? We did live off the land, and then we would supplement all that with whatever we could kill or catch. Whether we'd kill squirrels, deer, duck, or caught catfish or brim, that was what went on the table.
quotes.author: Si Robertson

quotes.text: OK, in all seriousness, I would say I couldn't be in a relationship without equality, generosity, integrity, spirit, kindness and humor. And awesomeness.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.text: Maybe my fairy tale has a different ending than I dreamed it would. But that's OK.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: You have got to decide, look, this is who I am; this is my best way to present myself, and I'm going to ride that horse to the finish line. Not everybody will like it, but that's OK.
quotes.author: Phil McGraw

quotes.text: I grew up on the rough side of the tracks. If you looked like you were soft, you would be fodder for the wolves. I came up in my neighbourhood like, 'I'm just gonna be me,' and all the thugs just said, 'It's OK, he's special.' They knew I had the talent with the rhymes, so they kept me around.
quotes.author: Q-Tip

quotes.text: I enjoy jokes, smiling, and making people smile. I may be a little different, but that's OK, who wants to be normal anyway?
quotes.author: Tim Duncan

quotes.text: Life flies by, and it's easy to get lost in the blur. In adolescence, it's 'How do I fit in?' In your 20s, it's 'What do I want to do?' In your 30s, 'Is this what I'm meant to do?' I think the trick is living the questions. Not worrying so much about what's ahead but rather sitting in the grey area - being OK with where you are.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.text: The only good thing about times of adversity is that you realize who your real friends and fans are - and the rest go away - which in my mind is an OK thing.
quotes.author: Pete Wentz

quotes.text: It's OK to argue with your friends. Guys can do it better than girls, usually, but if you ever get into a fight with a true friend or a spouse or a boyfriend, get it out, fight, be angry for five minutes, and then move past it. Don't let it fester; don't hold a grudge. If you do, that's when it will get worse and worse.
quotes.author: Ike Barinholtz

quotes.text: The choices that we make aren't always perfect but it's ok... It's part of the journey.
quotes.author: Hayley Williams

quotes.text: As long as I'm learning something, I figure I'm OK - it's a decent day.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: Everything will probably never be OK. But we have to try for it.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.text: I'm not a sexy person. I'm OK with it. I've never been the sexy girl. Whenever I've had a boyfriend, he's always been like, 'Oh, you're cute.'
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.text: I have a skin disorder that destroys the pigmentation of my skin, it's something that I cannot help, OK?
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.text: When you finally accept that it's OK not to have answers and it's OK not to be perfect, you realize that feeling confused is a normal part of what it is to be a human being.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder

quotes.text: You know, you have a lot of people - I've met a lot of people in the past, I've gone to private schools, you know, encountered different people who think that it's OK to make comments, insensitive comments about your race because they're joking. And think that if they're joking and they say it, you know, good-naturedly, that things will fly.
quotes.author: Issa Rae

quotes.text: It's OK to have a plan, to invest in your future - for your financial security, your love life, your personal fulfillment, and even your happiness. To have personal happiness as a stated goal doesn't detract from it if you get there.
quotes.author: Karen Finerman

quotes.text: At the end of the day, the Golden Rule is called the Golden Rule for a reason - do unto others as you would have done to you. In terms of commandments you could probably just do that one and you would be well off. If everybody could adhere to that one, we'd be OK, as long as a masochist wasn't in charge of people.
quotes.author: Chad Kroeger

quotes.text: I was always respectful of people who were deeply religious because I always felt that if they gave themselves to it, then it had to be important to them. But if you can go through life without it, that's OK, too. It's whatever suits you.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.text: You have to know that as long as you love who you are - your morals, your values, that type of stuff - you're OK.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.text: Yes, e-commerce is a strange situation for an old guy like me. You can buy a TV online, OK, but to buy a dress or shoes? Ugh. The customer has to go back to the store and breathe and smell and have a good time. Because shopping is a good time - like going to a nice restaurant.
quotes.author: Max Azria

quotes.text: I was an OK boxer, I wasn't great, I was OK, but I loved the discipline of getting together every Monday, Wednesday and Friday, usually Saturday afternoons too, with a whole bunch of mates and training, very, very hard for about two-and-half hours.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.text: I'm sort of the comic relief after a hard day at work. My message is that it's OK to relax.
quotes.author: Larry King

quotes.text: I don't look for signs. But when things happen, I say, 'OK, something must be right.' Or 'OK, something must be wrong.'
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.text: But, ancient Greece and ancient Rome - people did not happen to believe that creativity came from human beings back then, OK? People believed that creativity was this divine attendant spirit that came to human beings from some distant and unknowable source, for distant and unknowable reasons.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.text: I'm like, 'Yeah, I could afford braces, but why should I change myself to be what everybody else wants me to be when I'm OK with who I am and I'm happy with who I am?'
quotes.author: Becky G

quotes.text: You have to be OK with your own fears. If you're an honest person, you'll make mistakes, but that's when the most interesting things happen.
quotes.author: Kristen Stewart

quotes.text: I really like playing other people. There is no other feeling like it, to have a different voice come out of you and to have a different life for a couple of hours. I like being myself. But maybe it's like you ride a bike every day and someone says, 'For two hours tonight do you want to ride this Harley?' You'd be like, 'OK yeah!'
quotes.author: Cristin Milioti

quotes.text: It was the Michael Jordan/Nike phenomenon that really let people see that athletes were OK, and black athletes were OK. Defying a previous wisdom - not only that black athletes wouldn't sell in white America, but that the NBA as a predominantly black sport could not sell in white America.
quotes.author: David Stern

quotes.text: I just really want it at some point to be OK for women and young girls to be sexy because I think that's a power, a gift that we were given by God or the universe or whatever.
quotes.author: Megan Fox

quotes.text: It's like that Simpsons joke - they're filming a cow in a movie and they go, 'OK, we'll tape a bunch of cats together to make a cow', and it's like, 'Why don't you just use a cow?'. For some reason that is novel - like, 'Oh, my guitar sounds like a piano and now if I can just get my piano to sound like my guitar'.
quotes.author: Ian Williams

quotes.text: African women in general need to know that it's OK for them to be the way they are - to see the way they are as a strength, and to be liberated from fear and from silence.
quotes.author: Wangari Maathai

quotes.text: We need to change the culture of this topic and make it OK to speak about mental health and suicide.
quotes.author: Luke Richardson

quotes.text: OK, I'm happy. I'm happy. All right? I'm happy.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.text: Fashion is OK for five days, one minute, six months, but style is for the rest of the life.
quotes.author: Stefano Gabbana

quotes.text: The 'OK Plateau' is that place we all get to where we just stop getting better at something. Take typing, for example. You might type and type and type all day long, but once you reach a certain level, you just don't get appreciably faster. That's because it's become automatic. You've moved it to the back of your mind's filing cabinet.
quotes.author: Joshua Foer

quotes.text: With theatre, we all agree to suspend our disbelief about so many things, but not about race. It's totally OK to have one actor playing five roles - people are willing to believe that. But they won't believe it if there's a black or an Asian kid who has white parents. What does that say about us?
quotes.author: David Henry Hwang

quotes.text: There's always the cliche of the choir shouting and clapping. OK, you have to do that, but there's also introspective parts, parts where you just follow someone that's preaching. There's lots of different emotions and moods that a service requires.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.text: A team will take on its manager's personality. If it's a laid back manager, you'll have a laid back personality. The players will see that if it's OK for the Manager to be laid back, then you'll have a laid back team.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.text: For me, it is OK as long as I can breathe, as long as my heart is pumping, as long as I can express myself.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.text: OK, I have a nickname. My family calls me 'Trey' because I'm William the third. My dad has the same name, which is always confusing because my dad is well known, and I'm also known.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: There was only one punch. Tony Blair rang me and he said 'Are you OK?' and I said 'Yes', and he said 'Well, what happened?' and I said 'I was just carrying out your orders. You told us to connect with the electorate, so I did.
quotes.author: John Prescott

quotes.text: I'm not about my breasts; I'm just about good health, OK. I'm not afraid of doing what I need to do to stay here. I really don't understand women who are in denial, who don't want to go for a mammogram. I think it's stupidity. Sorry. I have no patience for that.
quotes.author: Jaclyn Smith

quotes.text: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.
quotes.author: Joyce Giraud

quotes.text: A stiff apology is a second insult... The injured party does not want to be compensated because he has been wronged; he wants to be healed because he has been hurt.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: It is a good rule in life never to apologize. The right sort of people do not want apologies, and the wrong sort take a mean advantage of them.
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.text: I've made apologies to people I needed to, but I can't apologise to people I don't know for things they don't understand.
quotes.author: Sienna Miller

quotes.text: I do not make any apologies for my manner or personality. I come from a long line of very strong, black African-American women who neither bend nor bow. I haven't had very good modeling in submission.
quotes.author: Faye Wattleton

quotes.text: An apology for the devil: it must be remembered that we have heard one side of the case. God has written all the books.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: Conspiracy theorists of the world, believers in the hidden hands of the Rothschilds and the Masons and the Illuminati, we skeptics owe you an apology. You were right. The players may be a little different, but your basic premise is correct: The world is a rigged game.
quotes.author: Matt Taibbi

quotes.text: An apology? Bah! Disgusting! Cowardly! Beneath the dignity of any gentleman, however wrong he might be.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.text: You don't want to have to come into work on Monday already apologizing. I try to save my apologies for what I've done later in the week.
quotes.author: Ike Barinholtz

quotes.text: Apologies are great, but they don't really change anything. You know what does? Action.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.text: Women live lives of continual apology. They are born and raised to take the blame for other people's behavior. If they are treated without respect, they tell themselves that they have failed to earn respect. If their husbands do not fancy them, it is because they are unattractive.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.text: The Apology opened the opportunity for a new relationship based on mutual respect and mutual responsibility between Indigenous and non-Indigenous Australia. Because without mutual respect and mutual responsibility, the truth is we can achieve very little.
quotes.author: Kevin Rudd

quotes.text: More people should apologize, and more people should accept apologies when sincerely made.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.text: The only correct actions are those that demand no explanation and no apology.
quotes.author: Red Auerbach

quotes.text: Maturity is the ability to reap without apology and not complain when things don't go well.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Accept everything about yourself - I mean everything, You are you and that is the beginning and the end - no apologies, no regrets.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.text: I am here today to again apologize for the personal mistakes I have made and the embarrassment I have caused. I make this apology to my neighbors and my constituents, but I make it particularly to my wife, Huma.
quotes.author: Anthony Weiner

quotes.text: My singing voice is somewhere between a drunken apology and a plumbing problem.
quotes.author: Colin Firth

quotes.text: Right actions in the future are the best apologies for bad actions in the past.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.text: Our systems, perhaps, are nothing more than an unconscious apology for our faults, a gigantic scaffolding whose object is to hide from us our favorite sin.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.text: I know some people might think it odd - unworthy even - for me to have written a cookbook, but I make no apologies. The U.S. poet laureate Billy Collins thought I had demeaned myself by writing poetry for Hallmark Cards, but I am the people's poet so I write for the people.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: The Chinese people have been forced to forget the Tiananmen massacre. There has been no public debate about the event, no official apology. The media aren't allowed to mention it. Still today people are being persecuted and imprisoned for disseminating information about it.
quotes.author: Ma Jian

quotes.text: Everyone knows I'm black. I am who I am. This is the person that Lester Sr. and June Holt raised, and I make no apology for it. At the same time, I'm never going to pull a race card to get what I want. You can't have it both ways.
quotes.author: Lester Holt

quotes.text: I serve a higher power, Jesus Christ. I make no apologies in saying that.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.text: The apology, that is constantly put forth for the injustice of government, viz., that a man must consent to give up some of his rights, in order to have his other rights protected - involves a palpable absurdity, both legally and politically.
quotes.author: Lysander Spooner

quotes.text: I believe that things should be let go once they are discussed. Apology accepted. End of story.
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.text: Decades later I would look into my father's eyes and try to reach past the murkiness of Alzheimer's with my words, my apology, hoping that in his heart he heard me and understood.
quotes.author: Patti Davis

quotes.text: Cheyenne Autumn was received not too successfully. I still think it was a very good movie. It was kinda Ford's apology for the way he had treated Indians in his past pictures.
quotes.author: Richard Widmark

quotes.text: I will begin my presidency with a jobs tour. President Obama began with an apology tour. America, he said, had dictated to other nations. No Mr. President, America has freed other nations from dictators.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: Nobody wants an apology letter 14 years later.
quotes.author: Lennon Parham

quotes.text: I make no apologies.
quotes.author: Cathy Freeman

quotes.text: It will never do to plead sin as an excuse for sin, or to attempt to justify sinful acts by pleading that we have an evil heart. This instead of being a valid apology, is the very ground of our condemnation.
quotes.author: Archibald Alexander

quotes.text: I'd love to be a diva. But I'd then have to send so many apology notes for my abhorrent behaviour.
quotes.author: Amy Adams

quotes.text: When I look at my body of work, I've played a lot of characters who are morally conflicted - 'I'm right, no I'm wrong, I don't know what to do!' I want to play more characters who don't care as much, and who aren't as measured. They are what they are, no apologies.
quotes.author: Idris Elba

quotes.text: I have a no-apology policy. No apologies for jokes. I apologize in my real life all the time. I say ridiculous things, I make mistakes constantly. But when I'm on stage, I'm at a microphone... it's a joke!
quotes.author: Kathy Griffin

quotes.text: I am deeply committed to the cause of Indigenous Australians, and not just because of the Apology, but the big challenges which lie ahead in closing the gap.
quotes.author: Kevin Rudd

quotes.text: I have no apologies.
quotes.author: Jai Rodriguez

quotes.text: As nations we should also commit afresh to righting past wrongs. In Australia we began this recently with the first Australians - the oldest continuing culture in human history. On behalf of the Australian Parliament, this year I offered an apology to indigenous Australians for the wrongs they had suffered in the past.
quotes.author: Kevin Rudd

quotes.text: I have made the most profound apology in front of the Truth Commission and on other occasions about the injustices which were wrought by apartheid.
quotes.author: F. W. de Klerk

quotes.text: Even now, we make no apologies for the choice we made. The sacrifices we made were selfless. The options we offered were patriotic while the paths we chose were well thought out.
quotes.author: Ibrahim Babangida

quotes.text: But it was also the best mistake I've ever made, because what it did was hopefully allow a whole new generation to make up their own minds about Scientology and for that I make no apology.
quotes.author: John Sweeney

quotes.text: We as Democrats have no apologies to make to anyone.
quotes.author: Richard J. Daley

quotes.text: I got bad calls every match, and I never got an apology. So I thought it was rather strange.
quotes.author: Ivan Lendl

quotes.text: We make no apology for people who should be in prison being in prison.
quotes.author: Denis Napthine

quotes.text: Apology is only egotism wrong side out.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.text: I think secretly I've realized after my time on the planet that I have no control over what people feel about me or need from me, so I just have a more laid-back approach in my apologies.
quotes.author: Meshell Ndegeocello

quotes.text: An apology might help, but you can change your life without one.
quotes.author: Robin Quivers

quotes.text: I want you to answer this question: Why should you settle for anything less than an authentic conservative who will fight for your views and values without an apology? Think about that.
quotes.author: Rick Perry

quotes.text: On banks, I make no apology for attacking spivs and gamblers who did more harm to the British economy than Bob Crow could achieve in his wildest Trotskyite fantasies, while paying themselves outrageous bonuses underwritten by the taxpayer. There is much public anger about banks and it is well deserved.
quotes.author: Vince Cable

quotes.text: Every nation, like every individual, would like to believe it owes 'no apology' to anyone. Adults realise, however, that few among us are purely innocent or utterly blameless.
quotes.author: Stephen Kinzer

quotes.text: I'm not a Hollywood basher because enough good movies come out of the Hollywood system every year to justify its existence, without any apologies.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.text: My M.O. is just do what you do and don't feel like you have to make apologies for it. I'm sure there will come a point when I have to apologize for something, but not yet.
quotes.author: Adam Lambert

quotes.text: When we talk about feminism - equality without apology for all - we can't be talking about for all white women or all highly educated women but all women, regardless of color, class, creed, sexual orientation or identity.
quotes.author: Christine Pelosi

quotes.text: We inadvertently bombed the Chinese Embassy. But Clinton now is working very hard. He has sent a letter of apology to the Chinese. And, he's also given them a gift certificate for future nuclear secrets.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.text: A hero is someone we can admire without apology.
quotes.author: Kitty Kelley

quotes.text: I have some girls who I look back on and I think, 'Wow, they were really horrible to me.' I would love an apology from a few girls, but whatever. I'm not holding any grudges. I'm over it.
quotes.author: Odette Annable

quotes.text: And I know I'm supposed to feel guilty for wanting people to buy my books... and books in general? Novels and poetry, they belong to the realm of art. How dirty of us to try to hawk art! But, after a decade of hand-wringing and apologies, I can't quite muster the guilt anymore.
quotes.author: Julianna Baggott

quotes.text: Sincere apologies are for those that make them, not for those to whom they are made. Sincere apologies are for those that make them, not for those to whom they are made.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.text: I rise today to offer a formal and heartfelt apology to all the victims of lynching in our history, and for the failure of the United States Senate to take action when action was most needed.
quotes.author: George Allen
