I know a lot of English footballers play, but I know that if I go with the club to play, sooner or later I will end up trying to smash the ball with my foot.
quotes.author: Thierry Henry

quotes.text: I know I am getting better at golf because I am hitting fewer spectators.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

quotes.text: No other game combines the wonder of nature with the discipline of sport in such carefully planned ways. A great golf course both frees and challenges a golfer's mind.
quotes.author: Tom Watson

quotes.text: I am what I am. I love golf, I love my life, I love my family and friends.
quotes.author: Sergio Garcia

quotes.text: Reverse every natural instinct and do the opposite of what you are inclined to do, and you will probably come very close to having a perfect golf swing.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.text: Only the guy who isn't rowing has time to rock the boat.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.text: Something I like to do a lot is just sit by water when there's a current and just stare into the water. I don't fish, I don't hunt, I don't scuba, I don't spear, don't boat, don't play basketball or football - I excel at staring into space. I'm really good at that.
quotes.author: Iggy Pop

quotes.text: We may have all come on different ships, but we're in the same boat now.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: There's a lot of people out there who go through hard times, and they feel alone. They feel like nobody is there. But I'm in the same boat.
quotes.author: Brandy Norwood

quotes.text: My father was a golden boy from a very small town. He won a very prestigious law scholarship to NYU Law School, and there in Greenwich Village, he met my mother, who was very young, fresh off the boat from Germany.
quotes.author: Blake Bailey

quotes.text: I used to own an island in the Seychelles and had a big boat there and one day I came across some Somali pirates who were passing by on their way to re-provision their boat. They didn't even acknowledge me - which is unheard of among sailors - and it was like looking into the eyes of a black mamba.
quotes.author: Wilbur Smith

quotes.text: On my tombstone, I want written: 'He never did 'Love Boat!'
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: I must have read every issue of 'Punch' published in the 20th century, and I think in the process I picked up the true voice of English humour - that amiable, fairly liberal, laconic voice which you find in something like 'Three Men in a Boat.'
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: I thought to live on an island was like living on a boat. Islands intrigue me. You can see the perimeters of your world. It's a microcosm.
quotes.author: Jamie Wyeth

quotes.text: I want to conquer the unknown. I really, really want to live on the water and captain my own boat. I have dreamed of going around the world on a boat.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.text: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.'
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.text: My escape is to just get in a boat and disappear on the water.
quotes.author: Carl Hiaasen

quotes.text: Should you find yourself in a chronically leaking boat, energy devoted to changing vessels is likely to be more productive than energy devoted to patching leaks.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: The man who rows the boat seldom has time to rock it.
quotes.author: Bill Copeland

quotes.text: The person who goes farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare. The sure-thing boat never gets far from shore.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: I bear solemn witness to the fact that NATO heads of state and of government meet only to go through the tedious motions of reading speeches, drafted by others, with the principal objective of not rocking the boat.
quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.text: Slow travel now rivals the fly-to-Barcelona-for-lunch culture. Advocates savour the journey, travelling by train or boat or bicycle, or even on foot, rather than crammed into an airplane. They take time to plug into the local culture instead of racing through a list of tourist traps.
quotes.author: Carl Honore

quotes.text: I've taken a mail packet boat along the southern Newfoundland coast and spent some time on St. Pierre and Miquelon watching the seal colonies. I like pine trees. I like cold rivers.
quotes.author: Joseph Monninger

quotes.text: I'm so lucky that 'The Vampire Diaries' happened. I'm so lucky that Warner Bros. pays me money. You have no idea. I should be on a fishing boat with my dad.
quotes.author: Kevin Williamson

quotes.text: I use filming as an excuse to take classes. I got my certification in sailing for 'Wedding Crashers,' and now I can handle a 26-foot boat. I played a seamstress once, so I took sewing classes. I love dipping into these other lives.
quotes.author: Rachel McAdams

quotes.text: Every man should pull a boat over a mountain once in his life.
quotes.author: Werner Herzog

quotes.text: It's easier in some ways being on the life raft and the other guy's in the boat and you can row alongside and be supportive. In some ways, that's an easier role.
quotes.author: Kyra Sedgwick

quotes.text: These are stories you hear... of people sitting in a mall and being spotted, and you think it will happen to you. And when you're fresh off the boat, and new in Bombay, you want those kind of things! They are magical fables. You want to, somewhere, be a part of it, something people will read about. But reality is different.
quotes.author: Nimrat Kaur

quotes.text: I keep sailing on in this middle passage. I am sailing into the wind and the dark. But I am doing my best to keep my boat steady and my sails full.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: Yeah, because what it all boils down to is at the end of the day, we are all riding on the same boat and we have to learn how to deal with each other. I think that the music and what we do in our actions is what can kind of bring us together, hopefully.
quotes.author: Bootsy Collins

quotes.text: Journalists are in the same madly rocking boat as diplomats and statesmen. Like them, when the Cold War ended, they looked for a new world order and found a new world disorder. If making and conducting foreign policy in today's turbulent environment is difficult, so is practicing journalism.
quotes.author: Henry Grunwald

quotes.text: To put meaning in one's life may end in madness, But life without meaning is the torture Of restlessness and vague desire-It is a boat longing for the sea and yet afraid.
quotes.author: Edgar Lee Masters

quotes.text: I like to windsurf and ski, and most of all I love to ride horses. The wilder and faster the better! If I'm presented with a fast horse or a fast boat, I still get that shiver of excitement and I cannot resist. Luckily I never seem to have any accidents, and thank God for that.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.text: When I get a chance to play golf or go on a boat with good people, take the boat out and put some lobsters on the grill, get the ice-cold beer and the cigars - that's heaven here on earth.
quotes.author: Bernie Mac

quotes.text: The sea, the great unifier, is man's only hope. Now, as never before, the old phrase has a literal meaning: we are all in the same boat.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.text: Someone asked me, if I were stranded on a desert island what book would I bring... 'How to Build a Boat.'
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Being on a boat that's moving through the water, it's so clear. Everything falls into place in terms of what's important and what's not.
quotes.author: James Taylor

quotes.text: I love boats. I can be on a boat for days.
quotes.author: Olga Kurylenko

quotes.text: We are imprisoned in the realm of life, like a sailor on his tiny boat, on an infinite ocean.
quotes.author: Anna Freud

quotes.text: Sailing a boat calls for quick action, a blending of feeling with the wind and water as well as with the very heart and soul of the boat itself. Sailing teaches alertness and courage, and gives in return a joyousness and peace that but few sports afford.
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.text: We did not all come over on the same ship, but we are all in the same boat.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.text: If I were mayor, I'd invite everyone to have free boat trips on the river and free balloon rides over the city. I'd let the elderly in residential homes wander free.
quotes.author: Jane Birkin

quotes.text: We have one of the highest interest rates in the world, and we owe more money per capita than any other country. All we need is a nail hole in the bottom of the boat and we're sunk.
quotes.author: Pauline Hanson

quotes.text: Reaction - a boat which is going against the current but which does not prevent the river from flowing on.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Thoughts will change and shift just like the wind and the water when you're on the boat; thoughts are no different than anything else.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.text: God made man to go by motives, and he will not go without them, any more than a boat without steam or a balloon without gas.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: I would like a man now who is rich, and who can give me a boat - a sailboat. I want to own it and let him pay for it. My first love is the sea and water, not music. Music is second.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.text: I think I've always been drawn to the second person. When I was growing up and playing with my friends, the usual way we interacted with imaginary worlds was as characters: a bench was 'your' boat, leaves on a lawn were the fins of sharks out to get 'you.'
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.text: Forty-five years ago, when I was 18, I came to San Francisco by boat and took two weeks to get here. I had a great impression. I think San Francisco is the welcoming gate for people from Asia.
quotes.author: Tadashi Yanai

quotes.text: Most people are rowing against the current of life. Instead of turning the boat around, all they need to do is let go of the oars.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.text: I get out in my boat and go fishing inshore and offshore.
quotes.author: Rickie Fowler

quotes.text: I've met the most interesting people while flying or on a boat. These methods of travel seem to attract the kind of people I want to be with.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.text: Anything that's different from your own realm of experience as a human being, whether it's driving a car or a boat, or using guns, anything that separates you from yourself and leads you more towards this character's existence is a big help.
quotes.author: Colin Farrell

quotes.text: My Mom said she learned how to swim when someone took her out in the lake and threw her off the boat. I said, 'Mom, they weren't trying to teach you how to swim.'
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.text: My father was a sailor and our summer vacations were always on a sailboat. I had a little boat before I had a moped.
quotes.author: Ernesto Bertarelli

quotes.text: I'm a trader. Under the right circumstances, I'd consider a new boat. I'm not ruling it out.
quotes.author: Jeff Greene

quotes.text: We need to stop saying we can't rock this boat when it needs to be rocked.
quotes.author: Sibel Edmonds

quotes.text: Through F1, I bought my own boat. I learned to fly my own plane and helicopter. And my job with my company is a reflection of everything motor racing taught me.
quotes.author: Nelson Piquet

quotes.text: I wrote 'Snowy' as a result of spending a week on a narrow boat with daily classes of children, helping them to write about canal life, the work of barges, the simple pleasure of watching the water creatures. There was no doubt that the star of their week was Snowy, the working barge horse who pulled us daily along the towpath.
quotes.author: Berlie Doherty

quotes.text: Like Andy Warhol and unlike God Almighty, Larry King does not presume to judge; all celebrities are equal in his eyes, saints and sinners alike sharing the same 'Love Boat' voyage into the dark beyond, a former sitcom star as deserving of pious send-off as Princess Diana.
quotes.author: James Wolcott

quotes.text: When I was a kid, I was obsessed with this idea of opening a restaurant back in Indiana on a little pond. The guests would order their dinner and then take a little boat out with a colored flag on the front of it. When the matching color of the flag on their boat went up on a flag pole, their dinner was ready!
quotes.author: Greg Kinnear

quotes.text: I was the first journalist allowed on a hunting boat during harp seal season in almost 15 years. Around the late 1970s, white coat pups became the poster child for the anti-fur movement, and by the '80s, the media was lambasting the hunters for killing them.
quotes.author: Brian Skerry

quotes.text: I have a pathological terror of falling through ice. I nearly drowned once. I fell off a boat and got a cramp, and was rescued by an oil-rig diver, a great bear of a man who simply leant into the water and scooped me out with one finger.
quotes.author: Jeremy Clarkson

quotes.text: The best meal I've had was in Tavarua, an island in Fiji. It was just before sunset. A bunch of guys had just caught all this yellow fin tuna; they literally brought this huge wooden table down to the sand, pulled the tuna from the boat, dropped it on top of the table, pulled the skin off and sliced the tuna up.
quotes.author: Rob Machado

quotes.text: The day you hear someone call me captain will be the day I buy a boat.
quotes.author: Guy Lafleur

quotes.text: As soon as I get on my boat, something inside me changes. Then I really feel what living is.
quotes.author: Laura Dekker

quotes.text: Loki in 'Thor' is the most incredible springboard into a sort of excavation of the darker aspects of human nature. So that was thrilling, coming back knowing that I'd built the boat and now I could set sail into choppier waters.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.text: No one will do for you what you need to do for yourself. We cannot afford to be separate. We have to see that all of us are in the same boat.
quotes.author: Dorothy Height

quotes.text: I'd love to have a proper sailing boat and go around the world.
quotes.author: Jonathan Powell

quotes.text: We also own a little boat and I'm like a kid with it. I take off early in the morning, fishing rod in tow, and just drift about the ocean all day.
quotes.author: Perry Como

quotes.text: 'Red Knot' is a film that I shot in Antarctica almost three years ago on a boat. It was a film that was improvised and it had very interesting circumstances while making the film, obviously. We were on a small boat bobbing around in Antarctica. It was a really remarkable experience.
quotes.author: Olivia Thirlby

quotes.text: Having made the trip from St. Louis to the Pacific Ocean myself going up up up against twenty-five hundred miles of the Missouri River, I can testify that it's one of the most arduous trips that anyone can make on this continent and yet I had a power boat to do it in.
quotes.author: William Least Heat-Moon

quotes.text: Stand-up is like a row boat: it's fun and romantic when you're choosing to do it. But if you have no other choice than to be in a row boat it's not as enjoyable; that's survival.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: I live a fairly simple life, and that didn't change much after I sold TechCrunch in 2010. I didn't buy a new house or even a new car. The one thing I did splurge on was a boat. Nothing too fancy or large.
quotes.author: Michael Arrington

quotes.text: I think our Western society is very much about, 'Tuck your head in; make sure you're safe. Don't rock the boat.'
quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

quotes.text: If the boat started shaking, we stayed on course and didn't lose focus. That made the difference.
quotes.author: Sebastian Vettel

quotes.text: I have very long legs and I hate driving anything unless it's a boat or an ATV in the jungle. I like to sit in the back of a car, where I can look out the window, answer my emails on my iPad, or hold hands with a pretty girl.
quotes.author: Jean Pigozzi

quotes.text: I had my own motor boat which we would take to Khadakvasla, but that was 40 years ago.
quotes.author: Baba Kalyani

quotes.text: The Washington establishment think Republicans win elections by you don't stand for anything, you keep your head down, you don't rock the boat. You know what? Every time we do that, we get clobbered in the polls.
quotes.author: Ted Cruz

quotes.text: Most of the people who are coming to Australia by boat have passed through several countries on the way, and if they simply wanted asylum they could have claimed that in any of the countries through which they'd passed.
quotes.author: Tony Abbott

quotes.text: I'm not big on Champagne, but I'd take along a bottle of Cristal to pop for when the boat comes to the rescue.
quotes.author: Sam Neill

quotes.text: In the German football team players from different clubs need to get on with each other both on and off the pitch. In the grand coalition Christian Democrats and Social Democrats sit in the same boat and need to pull in the same direction.
quotes.author: Angela Merkel

quotes.text: Usually, if I'm coming to Europe, I'm on a boat for seven days, so I spend the seven days doing a bunch of things. I'll do cardio for an hour or an hour-and-a-half and weights, just light weights.
quotes.author: Travis Barker

quotes.text: Alligators and crocodiles are some of the most aggressive creatures on the planet - they'll take down a boat if you come up to their nest.
quotes.author: Jack Hanna

quotes.text: I really enjoy writing novels. It's like the ocean. You can just build a boat and take off.
quotes.author: Denis Johnson

quotes.text: To have faith is to trust yourself to the water. When you swim you don't grab hold of the water, because if you do you will sink and drown. Instead you relax, and float.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: One of my lungs is half gone, and the other half, because I smoked for years, has a lesion. So I can't swim anymore and had the swimming pool covered over. Now it's what I call the dance pavilion, and so I and my friends sit out and put music on and watch people dance.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: If I were dropped out of a plane into the ocean and told the nearest land was a thousand miles away, I'd still swim. And I'd despise the one who gave up.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: All things being equal, if we could simulate the same scenario, he has a lot more difficult task. He's elected to swim six individual events, as opposed to what I elected to do, which was four.
quotes.author: Mark Spitz

quotes.text: The swim at Deception Island was by far the hardest swim I've ever done. Antarctica is a very unforgiving environment. If you don't train properly, you'll die.
quotes.author: Lewis Gordon Pugh

quotes.text: To get rid of depression, I swim with dolphins.
quotes.author: Patti Stanger

quotes.text: If my critics saw me walking over the Thames they would say it was because I couldn't swim.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: When you have to cope with a lot of problems, you're either going to sink or you're going to swim.
quotes.author: Tom Cruise

quotes.text: There are times when a falsehood well told bridges over quite a difficulty, but in the long run, you had better tell the truth, even if you swim the creek.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.text: When I'm preparing for a swim, I imagine absolutely everything about it: the color of the water, how cold it is, the taste of salt in my mouth. I visualize each and every stroke.
quotes.author: Lewis Gordon Pugh

quotes.text: I can't swim and I'm terrified of drowning, but I still love being by water - just not in it.
quotes.author: Sherri Shepherd

quotes.text: I lead a very active lifestyle. When I am not working, I enjoy snowboarding in winter. I golf and swim in the summer months. However, trying to find the time to exercise when I am traveling is quite a challenge. I find myself working out at hotel gyms quite regularly - just so that I can keep up with my training.
quotes.author: Lee Byung-hun

quotes.text: I think we're going to the moon because it's in the nature of the human being to face challenges. It's by the nature of his deep inner soul... we're required to do these things just as salmon swim upstream.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.text: Agnes Darling, if such should be we never meet again, while firing my last shot, I will gently breathe the name of my wife - Agnes - and with wishes even for my enemies I will make the plunge and try to swim to the other shore.
quotes.author: Wild Bill Hickok

quotes.text: 'Changes in Latitudes' began when I was looking at a photograph of a sea turtle swimming underwater. I had such a strong feeling for the beauty of this ancient creature, at home in the sea. On the spot, I wanted to swim with that turtle. I began to imagine a character who would do just that.
quotes.author: Will Hobbs

quotes.text: Bliss is the ocean, a towel on the sand, the sun out, the chance to swim in waves or walk dragging a stick behind you, a good book, a cold drink.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.text: If one morning I walked on top of the water across the Potomac River, the headline that afternoon would read: 'President Can't Swim.'
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.text: I'm not saying that everyone should swim with sharks, but sometimes you have to jump over your own shadow in order to learn something that you will never forget for the rest of your life. Then you know you can conquer your fears.
quotes.author: Heidi Klum

quotes.text: Irish fathers still have certain responsibilities, and by the time my two daughters turned seven, they could swim, ride a bike, sing at least one part of a Woody Guthrie song, and recite all of W. B. Yeats's 'The Song of Wandering Aengus.'
quotes.author: Adrian McKinty

quotes.text: Don't be a fish; be a frog. Swim in the water and jump when you hit ground.
quotes.author: Kim Young-ha

quotes.text: We write for the same reason that we walk, talk, climb mountains or swim the oceans - because we can. We have some impulse within us that makes us want to explain ourselves to other human beings. That's why we paint, that's why we dare to love someone - because we have the impulse to explain who we are.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: I tried to drown my sorrows, but the bastards learned how to swim, and now I am overwhelmed by this decent and good feeling.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.text: Swim upstream. Go the other way. Ignore the conventional wisdom.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: If we choose to walk into a forest where a tiger lives, we are taking a chance. If we swim in a river where crocodiles live, we are taking a chance. If we visit the desert or climb a mountain or enter a swamp where snakes have managed to survive, we are taking a chance.
quotes.author: Peter Benchley

quotes.text: I try to swim every damn day I can, and I've learned to scuba dive and snorkel.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.text: Many people cycle or swim to keep trim. But if swimming is so good for the figure, how do you explain whales?
quotes.author: Charles Saatchi

quotes.text: The most important factors for a long life, I think, are partly in the genes; number two is lifestyle, which includes healthy diet and regular exercise. I walk, run and swim every day. However, I think too much exercise is also unhealthy because of over-stress; sometimes people who exercise too many hours per day die early.
quotes.author: John Gokongwei

quotes.text: Man can now fly in the air like a bird, swim under the ocean like a fish, he can burrow into the ground like a mole. Now if only he could walk the earth like a man, this would be paradise.
quotes.author: Tommy Douglas

quotes.text: Remember, a dead fish can float downstream, but it takes a live one to swim upstream.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: Swimming is probably the ultimate of burnout sports. It's ironic because millions of people who swim as their regular exercise love the meditation aspect of it; you don't wind up with any orthopedic injuries. But when you swim at a world class level for hours and hours - the loneness of the long distance runner.
quotes.author: Diana Nyad

quotes.text: I'm in two modes when I'm on Lanai: In engineering mode, I'm trying to find the right place for the reservoir and the desalination plant, and looking at designs for new hotel rooms. The rest of the time, I'm in decompression mode. I'm on Hulopoe Beach, going for a swim, or on my paddleboard surrounded by 100 spinner dolphins.
quotes.author: Larry Ellison

quotes.text: There were times, especially when I was traveling for 'Eat, Pray, Love,' when, I swear to God, I would feel this weight of my female ancestors, all those Swedish farmwives from beyond the grave who were like, 'Go! Go to Naples! Eat more pizza! Go to India, ride an elephant! Do it! Swim in the Indian Ocean. Read those books. Learn a language.'
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.text: So this is how you swim inward. So this is how you flow outwards. So this is how you pray.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.text: This is my 20th year in the sport. I've known swimming and that's it. I don't want to swim past age 30; if I continue after this Olympics, and come back in 2016, I'll be 31. I'm looking forward to being able to see the other side of the fence.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.text: Dead fish don't swim around in jealous tides.
quotes.author: Scott Weiland

quotes.text: People who drink to drown their sorrow should be told that sorrow knows how to swim.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: I think that beauty can injure you to death. It can cause an injury that can never be cured. Or it can so traumatise you, your life changes direction. The beauty of the harmony of nature that is forever lost, or a daily rite that you perform, or diving into the sea for a swim. Those experiences are going to mark you.
quotes.author: Toni Servillo

quotes.text: People wish to learn to swim and at the same time to keep one foot on the ground.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.text: Take it from a guy: If you're in love with somebody, you will swim the stream, you will climb the mountain, you will slay the dragon. You're going to get to her somehow, some way.
quotes.author: Phil McGraw

quotes.text: I don't want to be the crazy woman who does it for years and years and years, and tries and fails and tries and fails and tries and fails, but I can swim from Cuba to Florida, and I will swim from Cuba to Florida.
quotes.author: Diana Nyad

quotes.text: For drink, there was beer which was very strong when not mingled with water, but was agreeable to those who were used to it. They drank this with a reed, out of the vessel that held the beer, upon which they saw the barley swim.
quotes.author: Xenophon

quotes.text: 'You are no saint,' says the devil. Well, if I am not, I am a sinner, and Jesus Christ came into the world to save sinners. Sink or swim, I go to Him; other hope, I have none.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: All Norwegian children learn to swim when they are very young because if you can't swim it is difficult to find a place to bathe.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.text: My Mom said she learned how to swim when someone took her out in the lake and threw her off the boat. I said, 'Mom, they weren't trying to teach you how to swim.'
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.text: I am one of those who would rather sink with faith than swim without it.
quotes.author: Stanley Baldwin

quotes.text: Growing up in Alaska, they don't really teach you to swim there. I learned to swim just a few summers ago with Olympic gold medalist Amanda Beard. She did great, and right after that I went to get scuba certified. I had fun with it. I didn't really get scared, but some people thought that was a risk.
quotes.author: Holly Madison

quotes.text: If your ship doesn't come in, swim out to it.
quotes.author: Jonathan Winters

quotes.text: Michael Phelps wouldn't have been on the Wheaties box if I stuck with swimming. I've been swimming since I was a little kid. I still swim. I'm the best.
quotes.author: Marshawn Lynch

quotes.text: Like most people I can be lazy, so it's nice to have a goal or deadline or reason to work out. I feel better when I get to exercise, or when I'm outdoors. I like to hike, swim and run, and I love to play soccer.
quotes.author: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.text: I'll paddle board, swim in the ocean, roll in the sand, soak up the sun, eat good food, be with friends and family and go fishing with my dad.
quotes.author: Behati Prinsloo

quotes.text: I've never understood the 'things to do before you die' idea. If I was ill, I'd be in no mood to have a swim with a dolphin.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.text: I'm surrounded by the beach, so I love to fish and to dive and to swim. I walk a lot, and I bike around. I hang out at the beach, really, and muck around.
quotes.author: Lorde

quotes.text: Daily repetition matters when a kid is learning to swim. It can be 20 minutes in a lesson or an hour practicing for a couple of weeks.
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.text: The question of whether a computer can think is no more interesting than the question of whether a submarine can swim.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.text: Obviously, losing a parent is very difficult. I miss my dad every day, but I know he would be proud to see me continuing to swim and going for another shot at the Olympics.
quotes.author: Eric Shanteau

quotes.text: There is no life for girls in team sports past Little League. I got into tennis when I realized this, and because I thought golf would be too slow for me, and I was too scared to swim.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.text: I simply would like to live comfortably day by day, fish, swim, enjoy my declining years.
quotes.author: John McAfee

quotes.text: To get ready to climb Everest, I did a lot of hill running with a daypack on and a lot of underwater swimming. I would swim a couple of lengths underwater and then a couple above. It gets your body going with limited oxygen.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.text: If you believe in your heart that you are right, you must fight with all your might to do it your way. Only dead fish swim with the stream all the time.
quotes.author: Linda Ellerbee

quotes.text: Poverty is uncomfortable; but nine times out of ten the best thing that can happen to a young man is to be tossed overboard and compelled to sink or swim.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.text: I was a redhead and a middle child; both can make you feel excluded. It's like fighting to be included, in the swim of things. After a while you start to develop a bit of a victim mentality, which isn't great for a happy life.
quotes.author: Shirley Manson

quotes.text: I run, but boxing conditioning is different, so you have to get used to running in the ring. Boxing movements are very different. Swimming is one of the best because every single muscle is working. I swim a lot. I train very hard at things that mimic boxing. I have to do mostly sport-specific training, such as lots of sparring.
quotes.author: Wladimir Klitschko

quotes.text: I can't swim at the level I used to. I had to retire because of an injury to my shoulder.
quotes.author: Scott Speedman

quotes.text: Our pool is outdoors, but it's heated, and I've got one of those machines that produces waves you have to swim against; like a jogging treadmill, really, only it's in water. Basically, it means you can have a small pool, swim for miles, and get nowhere.
quotes.author: Rupert Penry-Jones

quotes.text: In the divine Scriptures, there are shallows and there are deeps; shallows where the lamb may wade, and deeps where the elephant may swim.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: As a young child, I suffered from poor health. My parents encouraged me to swim, which really improved my condition.
quotes.author: Sui He

quotes.text: I used to swim with these beavers in a beaver pond when I was 10. I went back when I was 11 and found there were no more beavers. I found that trappers had taken them all, so I became quite angry, and that winter I began to walk the trap lines and free animals from the traps and destroy the traps.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: I have very fond memories of swimming in Walden Pond when we lived in Boston. You'd swim past a log and see all these turtles sunning themselves. Slightly disturbing if you thought about how many more were swimming around your toes, but also rather wonderful.
quotes.author: Mark Haddon

quotes.text: Many politicians are in the habit of laying it down as a self-evident proposition that no people ought to be free till they are fit to use their freedom. The maxim is worthy of the fool in the old story who resolved not to go into the water till he had learned to swim.
quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quotes.text: I love figure skating, so I do that as often as I can. Other than that I just go to the gym or swim. I love swimming.
quotes.author: Jennette McCurdy

quotes.text: If I'm on holiday, I'm active on the beach, I play tennis, I run, I swim a lot. It's just about making the workouts fun, I think, and then it doesn't really feel that bad.
quotes.author: Candice Swanepoel

quotes.text: It was really cool going to Sea World. We had an amazing time. They were amazing to us. We got to swim with the dolphins, and it was really special.
quotes.author: Sarah Chalke

quotes.text: I didn't go to high school. I think that after you learn to read and write and do your numbers and flush the toilet behind yourself, you don't need no more schoolin'. You need to get out in the water and swim.
quotes.author: Wilford Brimley

quotes.text: Every summer my husband and I pack our suitcases, load our kids into the car, and drive from tense, crowded New York City to my family's cottage in Maine. It's on an island, with stretches of sea and sandy beaches, rocky coasts, and pine trees. We barbecue, swim, lie around, and try to do nothing.
quotes.author: Hope Davis

quotes.text: Our natures are a lot like oil, mix us with anything else, and we strive to swim on top.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.text: Confining marine animals to tanks and separating them from their families and their natural surroundings, just so people can watch them swim in endless circles, teaches us far more about humans than it does about animals - and the lesson is not a flattering one.
quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

quotes.text: Running is bad for your knees, and I like to do things I actually enjoy, like going for a swim.
quotes.author: Emma Stone

quotes.text: I love improvisation. You can't blame it on the writers. You can't blame it on direction. You can't blame it on the camera guy... It's you. You're on. You've got to do it, and you either sink or swim with what you've got.
quotes.author: Jonathan Winters

quotes.text: I love to swim for miles; I could just go back and forth.
quotes.author: Jill Clayburgh

quotes.text: Have fun, be active. Ride a bike instead of driving, for example.
quotes.author: Dan Buettner

quotes.text: The most important thing is to have a good relationship with the bike... you have to understand what she wants. I think of a motorcycle as a woman, and I know that sounds silly, but it's true.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: Riding a race bike is an art - a thing that you do because you feel something inside.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: Maybe the bike is more dangerous, but the passion for the car for me is second to the bike.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: Exercise is really important to me - it's therapeutic. So if I'm ever feeling tense or stressed or like I'm about to have a meltdown, I'll put on my iPod and head to the gym or out on a bike ride along Lake Michigan with the girls.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: To be a great motorbike racer, the most important thing is passion for the bike.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: If you worried about falling off the bike, you'd never get on.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.text: It's quite easy to start Trials riding. You just need a bike and you're set.
quotes.author: Sete Gibernau

quotes.text: At weekends, I've been going on long but steady-paced four-and-a-half-hour bike rides.
quotes.author: Denise Van Outen

quotes.text: Portland, Oregon won't build a mile of road without a mile of bike path. You can commute there, even with that weather, all the time.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.text: Also, when I started racing he knew a lot of people and it was more easy for me to find the first bike, so I have a good chance for sure.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: My father was a motorsports journalist and a motorbike fan. He gave me my motocross bike.
quotes.author: Jacky Ickx

quotes.text: Well, you go to Holland and everybody's on a bike - nobody would think to have a car.
quotes.author: Stone Gossard

quotes.text: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.'
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.text: I love kite surfing and mountain bike riding. It's kind of interesting; my kite surfing ability has probably deteriorated with the rate of Kaggle's success.
quotes.author: Anthony Goldbloom

quotes.text: Caution is the key to safe cycling. I'm aware that cars are bigger than me, but I feel quite safe. I'm in control, liberated and free, when I'm on my bike.
quotes.author: Erin O'Connor

quotes.text: I rode my bike to school every day from age five to age fourteen. It was a small town - you could go anywhere.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.text: I do doubles on Monday and Thursday, take Wednesday off or do easy cardio, do doubles on Thursday and Friday, and the weekend I just get outside and get active - jog or bike ride, or play tennis with my mom.
quotes.author: Mikaela Shiffrin

quotes.text: I take cabs if I need to get somewhere or I take car service. I don't drive, I wouldn't mind riding a bike... People think that because you become an entertainer you gotta have this rock star thug image. I'm an artist, man. I'm going to live like an artist.
quotes.author: ASAP Rocky

quotes.text: I race to win. If I am on the bike or in a car it will always be the same.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: I was hit by a car once on my bike, but I still rode home.
quotes.author: Amy Winehouse

quotes.text: I hate going to the gym, so sweating outdoors sure beats sitting on a stationary bike staring at my navel.
quotes.author: Tom Selleck

quotes.text: Irish fathers still have certain responsibilities, and by the time my two daughters turned seven, they could swim, ride a bike, sing at least one part of a Woody Guthrie song, and recite all of W. B. Yeats's 'The Song of Wandering Aengus.'
quotes.author: Adrian McKinty

quotes.text: I love to be outdoors, so I like to hike, bike and go to the beach.
quotes.author: Jillian Rose Reed

quotes.text: I worry about kids today not having time to build a tree house or ride a bike or go fishing. I worry that life is getting faster and faster.
quotes.author: John Lasseter

quotes.text: Man, when I'm riding with the helmet on, I'm invisible. And people just deal with me as the guy on the bike... it gives you a chance to read 'em.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.text: When I'm in New York, I bike everywhere. I have a couple of bikes stored over at Ed Norton's. It's the only way to go. But in Hawaii, I drive. I have a little Volkswagen Bug, from the 'Drive it? Hug it?' phase. I run it on biodiesel.
quotes.author: Woody Harrelson

quotes.text: A woman is supposed to have curves like an old Bentley, not like some old bike.
quotes.author: Sebastian Horsley

quotes.text: When I hit 16, I got a scooter to ride to school. It was bright pink, and I saw on the ownership papers that Jonathan Ross once owned it. My friends slated me for it because of the colour, but it was cool. My father used to ride, and my mother's boyfriend has a bike, so we're a bit of a biker family.
quotes.author: Thomas Sangster

quotes.text: Just as we teach our children how to ride a bike, we need to teach them how to navigate social media and make the right moves that will help them. The physical world is similar to the virtual world in many cases. It's about being aware. We can prevent many debacles if we're educated.
quotes.author: Amy Jo Martin

quotes.text: You don't suffer, kill yourself and take the risks I take just for money. I love bike racing.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.text: An intellectual is a man who doesn't know how to park a bike.
quotes.author: Spiro T. Agnew

quotes.text: I'm simple. I love hiking, going to the gym, doing some simple stuff. I love being outdoors, I love bike riding. Just stuff that's fun!
quotes.author: Lea Michele

quotes.text: Dancing is like riding a bike.
quotes.author: Jamie Bell

quotes.text: My dad gave me my first bike at 16. I soon fell off and was in a wheelchair for weeks. I haven't fallen since.
quotes.author: Hugh Laurie

quotes.text: Perhaps people, and kids especially, are spoiled today, because all the kids today have cars, it seems. When I was young you were lucky to have a bike.
quotes.author: James Cagney

quotes.text: Once you become an actor, it's important to take care of yourself. I live in Santa Monica, where I can mountain bike, hike and go running on the beach. I like a nice sunset jog.
quotes.author: Mark Feuerstein

quotes.text: I remember Detroit feeling really unsafe, feeling scared a lot. Our house was broken into, our car was stolen, we had to get a watchdog, we would get beat up in the street, I had my bike stolen. There was just a lot of real anarchy on the streets and sidewalks.
quotes.author: Sufjan Stevens

quotes.text: It was a weird mix of emotions. One day, your best friend could be killed. The day before, you could be celebrating him getting a brand-new bike.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.text: I try to get seven hours of sleep every night; I always walk or bike to work; I make a point to eat well and take my vitamins; I drink tons of water; and I always spend a portion of my day at a standing desk.
quotes.author: Jessica Scorpio

quotes.text: I really like playing other people. There is no other feeling like it, to have a different voice come out of you and to have a different life for a couple of hours. I like being myself. But maybe it's like you ride a bike every day and someone says, 'For two hours tonight do you want to ride this Harley?' You'd be like, 'OK yeah!'
quotes.author: Cristin Milioti

quotes.text: Most people treat the news media like the exercise bike they have in their basement. They're glad it's there but they never use it.
quotes.author: Drew Curtis

quotes.text: I believe there are two periods in life, one for the bike, the other for becoming active on one's work.
quotes.author: Bernard Hinault

quotes.text: The Marianne Vos Route goes through the seven villages of Aalburg, where I grew up, and celebrates my World and Olympic titles with a number of benches along the route, where you can stop and rest your legs. You'll see the white windmill in Meeuwen and, in Babylonienbroek, a statue of the silver bike I rode to celebrate my Olympic track win.
quotes.author: Marianne Vos

quotes.text: On a bike, being just slightly above pedestrian and car eye level, one gets a perfect view of the goings-on in one's own town.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.text: For me, riding a two-wheeler bike was very risky. Counting the pedal strokes before turning a corner and learning to hear the sounds coming from buildings, grass and the climbing frame made all the difference to basic survival and ensured that I didn't end up head-first in the sandpit.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.text: One time I got dressed in all black, Rambo-style, and took a massive pair of bolt-cutters and nicked a military bike.
quotes.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quotes.text: My father raced bikes. He gave me the passion very early. I had my first bike when I was three or four years old.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: Get up, groan, write a bit, moan, eat breakfast, write some more, cycle my bike through the Sligo hills, make up country songs as I pedal along, sing them, have lunch, have a nap, groan, moan, write a small bit more, cook dinner, feed wifey, open a bottle, or several, slump, sleep.
quotes.author: Kevin Barry

quotes.text: I always travel with my bike and it has become a little more difficult to do it nowadays, but I stick it in 3,5 by 6-foot case and wheel that thing in.
quotes.author: Donny Robinson

quotes.text: When you're a kid, all you really care about are Slurpees and Slip N Slide and riding your bike, and that's what I did.
quotes.author: Pauly Shore

quotes.text: I ride my bike for transportation a great deal - occasionally I ride it for fun. But I also have a generator bike that's hooked up to my solar battery pack, so if I ride 15 minutes hard on my bike, that's enough energy to toast toast, or power my computer.
quotes.author: Ed Begley, Jr.

quotes.text: Every weekend, I'm on the highway to Antwerp. I need to be there, to have the calm. It's a whole different life: I jump on my bike, and it's so small, I can be anywhere in a minute. I like to be at home when there's free time because when you're at a big company, you're constantly surrounded by 30 people.
quotes.author: Raf Simons

quotes.text: Inconvenience yourself: ditch the remote, the garage door opener, the leaf-blower; buy a bike, broom, rake, and snow shovel.
quotes.author: Dan Buettner

quotes.text: I never lifted a weight in my life. Why am I going to do steroids? That's not going to do me any good. We didn't have any weights in our clubhouse. We had one exercise bike and that was for the guy who tweaked his hamstring. And that thing didn't even work half the time.
quotes.author: George Brett

quotes.text: Once you're a mom, always a mom. It's like riding a bike, you never forget.
quotes.author: Taraji P. Henson

quotes.text: Walk to work, even if it's four miles. Ride a bike to work. Drive a different way. On your way there, try to find beauty. You'd be surprised how much more of the neighborhood you can perceive and experience when you're looking for unique spots of beauty.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.text: I am able to ride the bike and think clearly about strategy and tyres. I also have positive thinking. I am very constructively critical.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: I lead by example. My kids know what sweat is. They've seen me come home from so many runs and asked, 'What's on your skin? How did you get it?' And I tell them, 'It's from exercise!' So now my son will come home from a bike ride, take off his helmet and say, 'Look, Mom. I'm sweating! I just worked out!'
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.text: I can think. I can sleep. I can move. I can ride my bike. I can dream.
quotes.author: Bill Walton

quotes.text: I'm surrounded by the beach, so I love to fish and to dive and to swim. I walk a lot, and I bike around. I hang out at the beach, really, and muck around.
quotes.author: Lorde

quotes.text: I like being active and riding a bike around my neighborhood and exercising when I can.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.text: I ride a recumbent bike for half an hour every day.
quotes.author: Don Rickles

quotes.text: I'm kind of a jock. I sail, I ride a bike, I hike, I pump iron. I just love to be active.
quotes.author: Laura Schlessinger

quotes.text: In the old days they, the promoters, wanted more and more from me. They wanted me to jump or spill my blood and break my bones. Every time they wanted me to jump further, and further, and further. Hell, they thought my bike had wings.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.text: I am a bike enthusiast; there's a certain amount of romance to bikes. They're both beautiful and utilitarian.
quotes.author: Dave Eggers

quotes.text: A lot of fun stuff happens when you go out on a bike compared to when you're in a car. You're more in the environment. It's enjoyable. Even when It's raining It's still fun.
quotes.author: Stone Gossard

quotes.text: But I was very, very lucky, and it was a wake up call as far as motorbikes are concerned. I never flirted with death on the bike, but now I'm totally convinced they're death machines.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.text: I'm going to do as much as I can with this life, and then I'm going to make sure to take some time off and be simple and ride my bike and hang out with friends.
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.text: I'm no Lance Armstrong, but I do use a bike to get from place to place in Manhattan, a little bit of Brooklyn.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.text: I had a friend whose family had dinner together. The mother would tuck you in at night and make breakfast in the morning. They even had a spare bike for a friend. It just seemed so amazing to me.
quotes.author: Moon Unit Zappa

quotes.text: I remember riding my bike down the boardwalk with nowhere to go and looking at the girls. It was really innocent.
quotes.author: Mark Ruffalo

quotes.text: Bike lanes - I put that now in the category of things you shouldn't discuss at dinner parties, right? It used to be money and politics and religion. Now, in New York, you should add bike lanes.
quotes.author: Christine Quinn

quotes.text: I started mountain-bike riding two years ago, which is much better than riding a stationary bike in the gym. Mountain biking is a total body workout.
quotes.author: Samantha Stosur

quotes.text: I bring my bike to work, and I make laps around our parking lot on my lunch break.
quotes.author: Angela Kinsey

quotes.text: I'm not a huge gym person, so I try to stay away from the gym. But I love to run on the beach or go for a walk. It's better than riding a stationary bike.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.text: When I was a kid, I would do stupid things on my bike. I'd jump any ramp, I'd jump over people, I'd jump over things - always crashing, never hurting myself badly but always wanting to take physical risks.
quotes.author: Eric Bana

quotes.text: I like being able to walk or ride my bike to restaurants and do different things.
quotes.author: Andrew Luck

quotes.text: I bicycle 12,000-foot mountain passes, run, cross train, skate-ski, hike and mountain bike.
quotes.author: Carre Otis

quotes.text: I was lucky. My father raced bikes. He gave me the passion very early. I had my first bike when I was three or four years old.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.text: Keep close to Nature's heart... and break clear away, once in awhile, and climb a mountain or spend a week in the woods. Wash your spirit clean.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.text: You don't climb mountains without a team, you don't climb mountains without being fit, you don't climb mountains without being prepared and you don't climb mountains without balancing the risks and rewards. And you never climb a mountain on accident - it has to be intentional.
quotes.author: Mark Udall

quotes.text: The choices we make lead up to actual experiences. It is one thing to decide to climb a mountain. It is quite another to be on top of it.
quotes.author: Herbert A. Simon

quotes.text: Never measure the height of a mountain until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.text: The only mountain that I would still like to climb: I'd like to break 85.
quotes.author: Peter Falk

quotes.text: Often the best guys are just those that can suffer longer, who don't give up. And it's so easy to give up, when you're on a mountain and it's really hurting. We go through a lot physically.
quotes.author: David Millar

quotes.text: Come live with me and be my love, And we will all the pleasures prove, That valleys, groves, hills, and fields, Woods, or steepy mountain yields.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.text: Once I climbed into a mountain lion's cage and she bounded at me and put her paw on my face, but she kept her claws withdrawn.
quotes.author: Edward Hoagland

quotes.text: I could see myself in a relationship with a girl; Olivia Wilde is so sexy she makes me want to strangle a mountain ox with my bare hands. She's mesmerizing.
quotes.author: Megan Fox

quotes.text: My idea of a real treat is Magic Mountain without standing in line.
quotes.author: Alan Rickman

quotes.text: The San Gabriel Mountains rise like a rampart at the edge of the city, safeguarding more than 500,000 acres of mature forests, mountain streams, dramatic waterfalls, and towering peaks that reach over 9,000 feet. These untamed places attract bighorn sheep, mountain lions, and other threatened or endangered species.
quotes.author: Frances Beinecke

quotes.text: One may walk over the highest mountain one step at a time.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.text: A mountain is composed of tiny grains of earth. The ocean is made up of tiny drops of water. Even so, life is but an endless series of little details, actions, speeches, and thoughts. And the consequences whether good or bad of even the least of them are far-reaching.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.text: The top of one mountain is always the bottom of another.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: If you cannot understand that there is something in man which responds to the challenge of this mountain and goes out to meet it, that the struggle is the struggle of life itself upward and forever upward, then you won't see why we go.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.text: When my parents were getting divorced, I just said to myself, 'Go to sleep, and tomorrow you can go skiing.' I cried myself to sleep, and in the morning I was up on the mountain, and I was good.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: As a child growing up in a grey-skied Yorkshire village, I would occasionally happen upon a Bollywood movie on the television. After a few minutes watching a bunch of sari-clad dancers cavorting on a Swiss mountain to tuneless music, I would switch over to some proper drama about housing estates and single mothers.
quotes.author: Simon Beaufoy

quotes.text: Human life is far more important than just getting to the top of a mountain.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.text: Martin Luther King took us to the mountain top: I want to take us to the bank.
quotes.author: Don King

quotes.text: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.text: Only if you have been in the deepest valley, can you ever know how magnificent it is to be on the highest mountain.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: Oh, these vast, calm, measureless mountain days, days in whose light everything seems equally divine, opening a thousand windows to show us God.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: I love kite surfing and mountain bike riding. It's kind of interesting; my kite surfing ability has probably deteriorated with the rate of Kaggle's success.
quotes.author: Anthony Goldbloom

quotes.text: I saw 'Brokeback Mountain' in a packed house in Chelsea, New York, when I was filming a Bollywood film there. Chelsea, being a predominately gay neighbourhood, had the most euphoric reaction. I saw couples holding hands and crying at the end. It was the most heartening viewing I have ever been to.
quotes.author: Karan Johar

quotes.text: A friend who is far away is sometimes much nearer than one who is at hand. Is not the mountain far more awe-inspiring and more clearly visible to one passing through the valley than to those who inhabit the mountain?
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Maitake mushrooms are known in Japan as 'the dancing mushroom.' According to a Japanese legend, a group of Buddhist nuns and woodcutters met on a mountain trail, where they discovered a fruiting of maitake mushrooms emerging from the forest floor. Rejoicing at their discovery of this delicious mushroom, they danced to celebrate.
quotes.author: Paul Stamets

quotes.text: Success comes to those who have an entire mountain of gold that they continually mine, not those who find one nugget and try to live on it for fifty years.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: There are so many steps you have to go through to reach a high level, so you're kind of building your own, I would say, mountain. You have to go piece by piece by piece. When you're young and really ambitious, you want to jump right up. It kind of teaches you a lesson, I would say.
quotes.author: Victoria Azarenka

quotes.text: The atomic bomb made the prospect of future war unendurable. It has led us up those last few steps to the mountain pass; and beyond there is a different country.
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.text: Occasionally I have come across a last patch of snow on top of a mountain in late May or June. There's something very powerful about finding snow in summer.
quotes.author: Andy Goldsworthy

quotes.text: Every man should pull a boat over a mountain once in his life.
quotes.author: Werner Herzog

quotes.text: Space Mountain may be the oldest ride in the park, but it has the longest line.
quotes.author: Ric Flair

quotes.text: Vegetarians are cool. All I eat are vegetarians - except for the occasional mountain lion steak.
quotes.author: Ted Nugent

quotes.text: Etiquette is all human social behavior. If you're a hermit on a mountain, you don't have to worry about etiquette; if somebody comes up the mountain, then you've got a problem. It matters because we want to live in reasonably harmonious communities.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.text: When we tire of well-worn ways, we seek for new. This restless craving in the souls of men spurs them to climb, and to seek the mountain view.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.text: I had daydreams and fantasies when I was growing up. I always wanted to live in a log cabin at the foot of a mountain. I would ride my horse to town and pick up provisions. Then return to the cabin, with a big open fire, a record player and peace.
quotes.author: Linda McCartney

quotes.text: The destruction of the natural beauty, the ecosystems, and the majesty of mountains affect us in ways we're not even aware of. Every time a mountain is beheaded, we chop off a little part of our souls.
quotes.author: Gloria Reuben

quotes.text: I have a dream that one day every valley shall be exalted, every hill and mountain shall be made low, the rough places will be made straight and the glory of the Lord shall be revealed and all flesh shall see it together.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: The gods had condemned Sisyphus to ceaselessly rolling a rock to the top of a mountain, whence the stone would fall back of its own weight. They had thought with some reason that there is no more dreadful punishment than futile and hopeless labor.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: I'll love you, dear, I'll love you till China and Africa meet and the river jumps over the mountain and the salmon sing in the street.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.text: I've had some wins. And been knocked down with defeats. Glimpsed views from the top of the mountain. And walked through the darkest of valleys. But through this entire ride called 'a life' - I've refused to give up.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.text: To live for some future goal is shallow. It's the sides of the mountain that sustain life, not the top.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.text: If we choose to walk into a forest where a tiger lives, we are taking a chance. If we swim in a river where crocodiles live, we are taking a chance. If we visit the desert or climb a mountain or enter a swamp where snakes have managed to survive, we are taking a chance.
quotes.author: Peter Benchley

quotes.text: Creative people who can't help but explore other mental territories are at greater risk, just as someone who climbs a mountain is more at risk than someone who just walks along a village lane.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.text: Earth and sky, woods and fields, lakes and rivers, the mountain and the sea, are excellent schoolmasters, and teach some of us more than we can ever learn from books.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.text: It isn't the mountain ahead that wears you out; it's the grain of sand in your shoe.
quotes.author: Robert W. Service

quotes.text: Only when you drink from the river of silence shall you indeed sing. And when you have reached the mountain top, then you shall begin to climb. And when the earth shall claim your limbs, then shall you truly dance.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: I have great people, smart people that are around me and we love the challenge. I guess it's like climbing a mountain or building a building. It's a challenge but you love every challenge that it brings or presents itself.
quotes.author: Ice Cube

quotes.text: I am here for a purpose and that purpose is to grow into a mountain, not to shrink to a grain of sand. Henceforth will I apply ALL my efforts to become the highest mountain of all and I will strain my potential until it cries for mercy.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: I love to sit on a mountain top and gaze. I don't think of anything but the people I care about and the view.
quotes.author: Julian Lennon

quotes.text: Cycling keeps me lean and I need to stay in shape, especially as I still like eating chocolate and ice-cream! I like to go mountain biking too. Running is also good; it's what we were designed to do as humans, so it comes naturally.
quotes.author: Mark Webber

quotes.text: I've walked a lot in the mountains in Iceland. And as you come to a new valley, as you come to a new landscape, you have a certain view. If you stand still, the landscape doesn't necessarily tell you how big it is. It doesn't really tell you what you're looking at. The moment you start to move the mountain starts to move.
quotes.author: Olafur Eliasson

quotes.text: What would be ugly in a garden constitutes beauty in a mountain.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: If you don't have a mountain, build one and then climb it. And after you climb it, build another one; otherwise you start to flatline in your life.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.text: If I were running a campaign, I'd urge taking the mountain of money reportedly squandered on pizza, coffee and bagels and spending it more wisely - on a talented young comedy writer.
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.text: Mountains were once my big adventure but is is over since a long time; I still dream from the wonderful days sometimes, read also a few pages from a mountain book. But the thought of doing again active mountain climbing has faded.
quotes.author: Fritz Zwicky

quotes.text: I just want to do God's will. And he's allowed me to go to the mountain. And I've looked over, and I've seen the promised land! I may not get there with you, but I want you to know tonight that we as a people will get to the promised land.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: There is a sacred horror about everything grand. It is easy to admire mediocrity and hills; but whatever is too lofty, a genius as well as a mountain, an assembly as well as a masterpiece, seen too near, is appalling.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: My first book was called, 'Mountain, Get Out of My Way,' where I did an autobiographical sketch, if you will, looking back at myself and looking back at things in my life, and juxtaposing them against things that are happening in other people's lives and trying to be motivational.
quotes.author: Montel Williams

quotes.text: I think when you begin to think of yourself as having achieved something, then there's nothing left for you to work towards. I want to believe that there is a mountain so high that I will spend my entire life striving to reach the top of it.
quotes.author: Cicely Tyson

quotes.text: I asked him with my eyes to ask again yes and then he asked me would I yes to say yes my mountain flower and first I put my arms around him yes and drew him down to me so he could feel my breasts all perfume yes and his heart was going like mad and yes I said yes I will Yes.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.text: Manchester United and Liverpool have been bought with huge leverage, and we've got Roman Abramovich at Chelsea who can turn his loans into shares. It is really important for the Premier League to ask itself: if a club is being bought on such a mountain of debt, isn't that a possible recipe for disaster for the future?
quotes.author: Gordon Taylor

quotes.text: Once you become an actor, it's important to take care of yourself. I live in Santa Monica, where I can mountain bike, hike and go running on the beach. I like a nice sunset jog.
quotes.author: Mark Feuerstein

quotes.text: We have a lion, tiger, liger, which is the father is a lion and the mother is a tiger, black and spotted leopard, mountain lion, Asian leopard cats. Weve got a tremendous number of the exotic feline.
quotes.author: Tippi Hedren

quotes.text: The truth is, I can never die. For I will be in everything and see you in everything and watch over you. I am your reaction in the water of a mountain lake.
quotes.author: Klaus Kinski

quotes.text: What I mean by photographing as a participant rather than observer is that I'm not only involved directly with some of the activities that I photograph, such as mountain climbing, but even when I'm not I have the philosophy that my mind and body are part of the natural world.
quotes.author: Galen Rowell

quotes.text: We as children went up the mountain to find feed for livestock, like goats, cows and horses, and because in the winter time we would light the fire in the house, we would climb the mountain to collect firewood as well. Because of that, I suppose I became used to climbing mountains.
quotes.author: Tamae Watanabe

quotes.text: Take it from a guy: If you're in love with somebody, you will swim the stream, you will climb the mountain, you will slay the dragon. You're going to get to her somehow, some way.
quotes.author: Phil McGraw

quotes.text: There's a world out there, and you've got to look at both sides of the mountain in your lifetime.
quotes.author: Bill Janklow

quotes.text: When people ask about inspirations, and you're like 'oh, it was a flower or a mountain or a pony', some people just think you're insane. I'm worried to come across that way.
quotes.author: Phillip Lim

quotes.text: Being positive is like going up a mountain. Being negative is like sliding down a hill. A lot of times, people want to take the easy way out, because it's basically what they've understood throughout their lives.
quotes.author: Chuck D

quotes.text: As an actor there's a lot of scrutiny and, even when you've had success, it becomes about sustaining that success. A friend of mine described it as a peakless mountain. Even for De Niro there's Pacino and for Pacino there's De Niro.
quotes.author: Eddie Redmayne

quotes.text: My hobbies are mountain biking, horseback riding and packing, canoeing and kayaking, hiking, camping, cooking, and skiing.
quotes.author: Douglas Preston

quotes.text: All I can say is that you only realize how big your mountain is once you're laying motionless, helpless, and hopeless in the valley below. No one goes there on purpose, if you get what I'm saying, because the only way to find your personal low is to slip and roll down that mountain of yours, straight through to the bottom, no holds barred.
quotes.author: Artie Lange

quotes.text: Bald as the bare mountain tops are bald, with a baldness full of grandeur.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.text: 'Santa Sangre' is the picture I love the best, myself, because 'El Topo' and 'The Holy Mountain' I made with my head, and 'Santa Sangre' I made with my feelings, with my heart. It's an emotional picture. And it's more real for me, that picture.
quotes.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quotes.text: Sometimes you come up against a mountain and you end up making the mountain seem bigger than God.
quotes.author: Jeremy Lin

quotes.text: The great thing about rock-n-roll is you realize the top of the mountain is big enough for more than one band.
quotes.author: Paul Stanley

quotes.text: Cars and cameras are the two things I let myself be materialistic about. I don't care about other stuff.
quotes.author: Louis C. K.

quotes.text: Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.text: It's a never ending battle of making your cars better and also trying to be better yourself.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.text: I love fast cars... and to go too fast in them.
quotes.author: Lara Flynn Boyle

quotes.text: The cars we drive say a lot about us.
quotes.author: Alexandra Paul

quotes.text: To attract men, I wear a perfume called 'New Car Interior.'
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.text: When you are fitted in a racing car and you race to win, second or third place is not enough.
quotes.author: Ayrton Senna

quotes.text: Family trips to Yellowstone and to what are now national parks in Southern Utah, driving the primitive roads and cars of that day, were real adventures.
quotes.author: Paul D. Boyer

quotes.text: The automobile engine will come, and then I will consider my life's work complete.
quotes.author: Rudolf Diesel

quotes.text: My dad was very successful running midgets in Texas. Then, his two drivers ran into some bad luck. People started saying that Daddy had lost his touch. That it was the cars and not the drivers. I wanted to race just to prove all those people wrong.
quotes.author: A. J. Foyt

quotes.text: I just feel rejuvenated in such a big way because of these race cars I get to drive.
quotes.author: Jeff Gordon

quotes.text: We aren't addicted to oil, but our cars are.
quotes.author: James Woolsey

quotes.text: I love driving cars, looking at them, cleaning and washing and shining them. I clean 'em inside and outside. I'm very touchy about cars. I don't want anybody leaning on them or closing the door too hard, know what I mean?
quotes.author: Scott Baio

quotes.text: I've actually made a prediction that within 30 years a majority of new cars made in the United States will be electric. And I don't mean hybrid, I mean fully electric.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: It's like driving a car at night. You never see further than your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.text: When I was four, I just wanted to drive, I collected toy cars. Where does that sort of thing come from? In hindsight you go, 'Oh, liked it because of this.' Maybe it's just the wheel.
quotes.author: Michael Fassbender

quotes.text: I hooked up my accelerator pedal in my car to my brake lights. I hit the gas, people behind me stop, and I'm gone.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: If you own a home with wheels on it and several cars without, you just might be a redneck.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.text: Fast cars are my only vice.
quotes.author: Michael Bay

quotes.text: I love vintage cars because you can do so much more to them.
quotes.author: T-Pain

quotes.text: If all the cars in the United States were placed end to end, it would probably be Labor Day Weekend.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.text: People spend so much time in their cars, and it's a legal way to have fun by speeding a little bit or testing yourself a little bit, and you get to invest in your car. For some people, it becomes their baby.
quotes.author: Jordana Brewster

quotes.text: The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
quotes.author: Dudley Moore

quotes.text: I was quiet, a loner. I was one of those children where, if you put me in a room and gave me some crayons and a pencils, you wouldn't hear from me for nine straight hours. And I was always drawing racing cars and rockets and spaceships and planes, things that were very fast that would take me away.
quotes.author: Gary Oldman

quotes.text: But my passion is racing cars. It's what I like to do in my off time.
quotes.author: Mark-Paul Gosselaar

quotes.text: I spent a lot of money on booze, birds and fast cars. The rest I just squandered.
quotes.author: George Best

quotes.text: You talk about German technocracy and you get automobiles.
quotes.author: Gordon Sinclair

quotes.text: If GM had kept up with technology like the computer industry has, we would all be driving $25 cars that got 1,000 MPG.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Here comes 40. I'm feeling my age and I've ordered the Ferrari. I'm going to get the whole mid-life crisis package.
quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

quotes.text: I love everything from old-school cars to whatever the latest muscle or luxury vehicles are.
quotes.author: Ludacris

quotes.text: We often attribute 'understanding' and other cognitive predicates by metaphor and analogy to cars, adding machines, and other artifacts, but nothing is proved by such attributions.
quotes.author: John Searle

quotes.text: The years I raced in were fantastic. There was so much change in the cars. We went from treaded tyres to no wings right through to slicks to enormous wings.
quotes.author: Jackie Stewart

quotes.text: I know a lot about cars, man. I can look at any car's headlights and tell you exactly which way it's coming.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.text: I'm starting to think about things that I want to do, things that are fun. One of them is driving a car like a Porsche. I've driven a lot of cars - sedans, trucks and big family vehicles all year long. But there's nothing like a four-wheel-drive Porsche.
quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.text: There's three things men always talk about - women, sports, and cars.
quotes.author: Mario Lopez

quotes.text: Perhaps people, and kids especially, are spoiled today, because all the kids today have cars, it seems. When I was young you were lucky to have a bike.
quotes.author: James Cagney

quotes.text: You're safer in the race car than you are in cars going to and from the track.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.text: You have to wait six months to purchase a fuel efficient automobile made from overseas.
quotes.author: Ed Markey

quotes.text: I don't like new cars; I'm into vintage cars - there's a Jaguar E-Type in the 'Goldie' video.
quotes.author: ASAP Rocky

quotes.text: It's not just the kid who's spent every penny from his job to upgrade his car to tell the world he cares about sports cars, it's also the person driving around in a fuel-conscious hybrid electric car, because it's more a message to the world than an effective means of saving fuel, to be quite honest.
quotes.author: Richard Hammond

quotes.text: I replaced the headlights in my car with strobe lights, so it looks like I'm the only one moving.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Societies need rules that make no sense for individuals. For example, it makes no difference whether a single car drives on the left or on the right. But it makes all the difference when there are many cars!
quotes.author: Marvin Minsky

quotes.text: I admit to wasting my life messing around with fast cars and motorcycles.
quotes.author: Brock Yates

quotes.text: I'm glad to see that BMW is bringing an electric car to market. That's cool.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: My opinion is it's a bridge too far to go to fully autonomous cars.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: Tesla is here to stay and keep fighting for the electric car revolution.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: In the last three years of racing I've met as many women fans as men fans, and in NASCAR it's the same thing. My wife loves cars, but the difference is she doesn't have 20 years of understanding the background of them. She basically drives them and uses her gut feelings as to which is best.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.text: I think all males from Detroit have an obsession with cars.
quotes.author: Dax Shepard

quotes.text: In less enlightened times, the best way to impress women was to own a hot car. But women wised up and realized it was better to buy their own hot cars so they wouldn't have to ride around with jerks.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.text: See, what you're meant to do when you have a mid-life crisis is buy a fast car, aren't you? Well, I've always had fast cars. It's not that. It's the fear that you're past your best. It's the fear that the stuff you've done in the past is your best work.
quotes.author: Robbie Coltraine

quotes.text: When it comes to cars, only two varieties of people are possible - cowards and fools.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.text: I would have probably stolen cars - it would have given me the same adrenaline rush as racing.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: In the history of the world, no one has ever washed a rented car.
quotes.author: Lawrence Summers

quotes.text: No action hero is more closely associated with cars than James Bond.
quotes.author: Richard Hammond

quotes.text: We approach people the same way we approach our cars. We take the poor kid to a doctor and ask, What's wrong with him, how much will it cost, and when can I pick him up?
quotes.author: James Hillman

quotes.text: I had more clothes than I had closets, more cars than garage space, but no money.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quotes.text: The only big things I've purchased are my dad's heart valve and a Rolls-Royce for my parents, for their anniversary. And that was only because my dad had a Lady Gaga license plate on our old car and it was making me crazy because he was getting followed everywhere, so I bought him a new car.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: Richard Childress and myself have made some important innovations on our cars.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.text: I liken myself to Henry Ford and the auto industry, I give you 90 percent of what most people need.
quotes.author: Adam Osborne

quotes.text: People are so bad at driving cars that computers don't have to be that good to be much better. Any time you stand in line at the D.M.V. and look around, you're like, Oh, my God, I wish all these people were replaced by computer drivers.
quotes.author: Marc Andreessen

quotes.text: I don't run a car, have never run a car. I could say that this is because I have this extremely tender environmentalist conscience, but the fact is I hate driving.
quotes.author: David Attenborough

quotes.text: Back in the mid-1970s, we adopted some fairly ambitious goals to improve efficiency of our cars. What did we get? We got a tremendous boost in efficiency.
quotes.author: Jay Inslee
