quotes.text: Buyers of powerful cars place a high premium on the exhaust note, and manufacturers spend a lot of money getting it right. At the same time, high-end cars are expected to filter out the sounds of the mundane world.
quotes.author: Serge Schmemann

quotes.text: Parisians overwhelmingly buy small cars. And it's not because people are petite, but because fuel is drop-dead expensive. Gasoline costs more than twice as much in Paris as in New York.
quotes.author: Serge Schmemann

quotes.text: Your car should drive itself. It's amazing to me that we let humans drive cars... It's a bug that cars were invented before computers.
quotes.author: Eric Schmidt

quotes.text: In Japan, they have TV sets in cars right now, where you can punch up traffic routes, weather, everything! You can get Internet access already in cars in Japan, so within the next 2 to 3 years it's gonna be so crazy!
quotes.author: Glenn Danzig

quotes.text: Self-driving cars are the natural extension of active safety and obviously something we should do.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: Americans are the only people in the world known to me whose status anxiety prompts them to advertise their college and university affiliations in the rear window of their automobiles.
quotes.author: Paul Fussell

quotes.text: A car for every purse and purpose.
quotes.author: Alfred P. Sloan

quotes.text: Car designers are just going to have to come up with an automobile that outlasts the payments.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: See, what you're meant to do when you have a mid-life crisis is buy a fast car, aren't you? Well, I've always had fast cars. It's not that. It's the fear that you're past your best. It's the fear that the stuff you've done in the past is your best work.
quotes.author: Robbie Coltrane

quotes.text: I've always been attracted to cars, and driving is a completely measurable experience: if you qualify last on the grid, you're the slowest, and if you qualify first on the grid, you're the fastest. So no one can say you're slow if you're fast and no one can say you're fast if you're slow.
quotes.author: Eric Bana

quotes.text: Auto racing is boring except when a car is going at least 172 miles per hour upside down.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: My boyfriend keeps telling me I've got to own things. So, first I bought this car. And then he told me I oughta get a house. 'Why a house?' 'Well, you gotta have a place to park the car.'
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.text: I wish people would spend their money on hybrid cars.
quotes.author: Ryan Tedder

quotes.text: Driving race cars was an avenue for me to learn how to build my own car, and that was my ambition all along.
quotes.author: Carroll Shelby

quotes.text: Germans make nice cars.
quotes.author: Jason Behr

quotes.text: No illusion is more crucial than the illusion that great success and huge money buy you immunity from the common ills of mankind, such as cars that won't start.
quotes.author: Larry McMurtry

quotes.text: The automobile, both a cause and an effect of this decentralization, is ideally suited for our vast landscape and our generally confused and contrary commuting patterns.
quotes.author: Brock Yates

quotes.text: Well, I always had a chauffer, because I have never driven a car in my life. I still can't drive.
quotes.author: Bud Abbott

quotes.text: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.text: Saving our planet, lifting people out of poverty, advancing economic growth... these are one and the same fight. We must connect the dots between climate change, water scarcity, energy shortages, global health, food security and women's empowerment. Solutions to one problem must be solutions for all.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.text: Thousands have lived without love, not one without water.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.text: The sky broke like an egg into full sunset and the water caught fire.
quotes.author: Pamela Hansford Johnson

quotes.text: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.text: This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is.
quotes.author: Dennis Rodman

quotes.text: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man's life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.text: To have faith is to trust yourself to the water. When you swim you don't grab hold of the water, because if you do you will sink and drown. Instead you relax, and float.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: I was born with music inside me. Music was one of my parts. Like my ribs, my kidneys, my liver, my heart. Like my blood. It was a force already within me when I arrived on the scene. It was a necessity for me - like food or water.

quotes.text: Plans to protect air and water, wilderness and wildlife are in fact plans to protect man.
quotes.author: Stewart Udall

quotes.text: The four building blocks of the universe are fire, water, gravel and vinyl.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: The cure for anything is salt water: sweat, tears or the sea.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.text: Water and air, the two essential fluids on which all life depends, have become global garbage cans.

quotes.text: Rivers, ponds, lakes and streams - they all have different names, but they all contain water. Just as religions do - they all contain truths.

quotes.text: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: The mind is like an iceberg, it floats with one-seventh of its bulk above water.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.text: My friends and family are my support system. They tell me what I need to hear, not what I want to hear and they are there for me in the good and bad times. Without them I have no idea where I would be and I know that their love for me is what's keeping my head above the water.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.text: If we pollute the air, water and soil that keep us alive and well, and destroy the biodiversity that allows natural systems to function, no amount of money will save us.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.text: Owners of dogs will have noticed that, if you provide them with food and water and shelter and affection, they will think you are God. Whereas owners of cats are compelled to realize that, if you provide them with food and water and affection, they draw the conclusion that they are God.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.text: O wise man! Give your wealth only to the worthy and never to others. The water of the sea received by the clouds is always sweet.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: I actually love swimming but I just hate jumping in the water.
quotes.author: Natalie Coughlin

quotes.text: I believe we are still so innocent. The species are still so innocent that a person who is apt to be murdered believes that the murderer, just before he puts the final wrench on his throat, will have enough compassion to give him one sweet cup of water.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: In celebration of this Earth Day, I encourage all Members of the House to support legislation aimed at investing in the improvement of water quality in our Nation's lakes, rivers, streams and estuaries.
quotes.author: Jerry Costello

quotes.text: The elements and majestic forces in nature, Lightning, Wind, Water, Fire, and Frost, were regarded with awe as spiritual powers, but always secondary and intermediate in character.
quotes.author: Charles Eastman

quotes.text: Jazz is smooth and cool. Jazz is rage. Jazz flows like water. Jazz never seems to begin or end. Jazz isn't methodical, but jazz isn't messy either. Jazz is a conversation, a give and take. Jazz is the connection and communication between musicians. Jazz is abandon.
quotes.author: Nat Wolff

quotes.text: I can't imagine anything more important than air, water, soil, energy and biodiversity. These are the things that keep us alive.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.text: We forget that the water cycle and the life cycle are one.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.text: Something I like to do a lot is just sit by water when there's a current and just stare into the water. I don't fish, I don't hunt, I don't scuba, I don't spear, don't boat, don't play basketball or football - I excel at staring into space. I'm really good at that.
quotes.author: Iggy Pop

quotes.text: I like to embrace natural beauty. I try to get at least 8 hours of sleep, drinking a lot of water and exercising.

quotes.text: The problem is that everywhere the gas drilling industry goes, a trail of water contamination, air pollution, health concerns and betrayal of basic American civic and community values follows.
quotes.author: Josh Fox

quotes.text: I love the sounds and the power of pounding water, whether it is the waves or a waterfall.
quotes.author: Mike May

quotes.text: I'll do whatever it takes to win games, whether it's sitting on a bench waving a towel, handing a cup of water to a teammate, or hitting the game-winning shot.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.text: A sincere diplomat is like dry water or wooden iron.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.text: It's a strange world of language in which skating on thin ice can get you into hot water.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.text: I have dreamed in my life, dreams that have stayed with me ever after, and changed my ideas; they have gone through and through me, like wine through water, and altered the color of my mind.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.text: The teapot takes in water and gives out tea. So the human individual takes in anything you give him and promptly transforms it; he is ready to give you out again his own reactions - first, in thought and emotion, then in voice or action.
quotes.author: Louis MacNeice

quotes.text: Diarrhea, 90 percent of which is caused by food and water contaminated by excrement, kills a child every fifteen seconds. That's more than AIDS, malaria, or measles, combined. Human feces are an impressive weapon of mass destruction.
quotes.author: Rose George

quotes.text: The 6th of August in the morning we saw an opening in the land and we ran into it, and anchored in 7 and a half fathom water, 2 miles from the shore, clean sand.
quotes.author: William Dampier

quotes.text: There's high, and there's high, and to get really high - I mean so high that you can walk on the water, that high-that's where I'm going.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.text: The choking humidity makes amphibians of us all, in Bombay, breathing water in air; you learn to live with it, and you learn to like it, or you leave.
quotes.author: Gregory David Roberts

quotes.text: Music comes from an icicle as it melts, to live again as spring water.
quotes.author: Henry Williamson

quotes.text: When you take a shower in space, you have to press the water onto your body to clean yourself, and then you gotta vacuum it off.
quotes.author: Ace Frehley

quotes.text: The most efficient water power in the world - women's tears.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.text: Everything we do, even the slightest thing we do, can have a ripple effect and repercussions that emanate. If you throw a pebble into the water on one side of the ocean, it can create a tidal wave on the other side.
quotes.author: Victor Webster

quotes.text: All water has a perfect memory and is forever trying to get back to where it was.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.text: God is dead. God remains dead. And we have killed him. Yet his shadow still looms. How shall we comfort ourselves, the murderers of all murderers? What was holiest and mightiest of all that the world has yet owned has bled to death under our knives; who will wipe this blood off us? What water is there for us to clean ourselves?
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Venice never quite seems real, but rather an ornate film set suspended on the water.
quotes.author: Frida Giannini

quotes.text: Soap and water and common sense are the best disinfectants.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.text: Once, during Prohibition, I was forced to live for days on nothing but food and water.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: My movie is born first in my head, dies on paper; is resuscitated by the living persons and real objects I use, which are killed on film but, placed in a certain order and projected on to a screen, come to life again like flowers in water.
quotes.author: Robert Bresson

quotes.text: Destiny is the prison and chain of the ignorant. Understand that destiny like the water of the Nile: Water before the faithful, blood before the unbeliever.
quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.text: Do you think that revolutions are made with rose water?
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.text: If a writer knows enough about what he is writing about, he may omit things that he knows. The dignity of movement of an iceberg is due to only one ninth of it being above water.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: For many of us, clean water is so plentiful and readily available that we rarely, if ever, pause to consider what life would be like without it.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.text: You can't trust water: Even a straight stick turns crooked in it.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: In my head, I consider 'No Turning Back' my 'dipping the toe in the water' album. It was mostly covers of favorite songs, and there were three originals in there. So, it feels like it was just my album to see what the temperature of the water was.
quotes.author: Imelda May

quotes.text: Have you seen a duck gliding smoothly on water? Does it ever look like it is paddling furiously underneath the surface? I don't have to show that I am working very hard.
quotes.author: Salman Khan

quotes.text: Life and death matters, yes. And the question of how to behave in this world, how to go in the face of everything. Time is short and the water is rising.
quotes.author: Raymond Carver

quotes.text: When the water starts boiling it is foolish to turn off the heat.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: I am not one to turn down macaroni and cheese, even late at night. I love Italian food. I love pasta... A refrigerator full of water and Gatorade? Honey, that's just not gonna happen.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: By polluting clear water with slime you will never find good drinking water.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.text: A century ago, petroleum - what we call oil - was just an obscure commodity; today it is almost as vital to human existence as water.
quotes.author: James Buchan

quotes.text: I just believe that sometimes in life you're like a shark - you have to keep moving through water; otherwise, you'll die.
quotes.author: Michelle Ryan

quotes.text: Gold, on the contrary, though of little use compared with air or water, will exchange for a great quantity of other goods.
quotes.author: David Ricardo

quotes.text: The city is as large as Seville or Cordova; its streets, I speak of the principal ones, are very wide and straight; some of these, and all the inferior ones, are half land and half water, and are navigated by canoes.
quotes.author: Hernan Cortes

quotes.text: I bought some instant water one time but I didn't know what to add to it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: It's a relief to hear the rain. It's the sound of billions of drops, all equal, all equally committed to falling, like a sudden outbreak of democracy. Water, when it hits the ground, instantly becomes a puddle or rivulet or flood.
quotes.author: Alice Oswald

quotes.text: It's all about creation and surprise. It just needs to be appreciated and watered like flowers. You have to water flowers. These peaks will come again.
quotes.author: Sonny Rollins

quotes.text: One of my earliest memories is of seeing my mother in her beach chair, reading a book under an umbrella by the water's edge while my sisters and I played beside her. Of all the life lessons she taught me, that is one of my favorites: to take time at a place I love, restore my spirit with books and the beach.
quotes.author: Luanne Rice

quotes.text: All communities have a right to clean water. The taxpayers of Pueblo should not have to carry the burden of the clean up cost simply because they live downstream.
quotes.author: John Salazar

quotes.text: President Obama has expressed his commitment to responsible stewardship of our land, water, and other natural resources. And one way of restoring the land to its natural condition is what we are doing here today - breaking pavement for the People's Garden.
quotes.author: Tom Vilsack

quotes.text: A mountain is composed of tiny grains of earth. The ocean is made up of tiny drops of water. Even so, life is but an endless series of little details, actions, speeches, and thoughts. And the consequences whether good or bad of even the least of them are far-reaching.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.text: You must be a lotus, unfolding its petals when the sun rises in the sky, unaffected by the slush where it is born or even the water which sustains it!
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.text: Clean water and access to food are some of the simplest things that we can take for granted each and every day. In places like Africa, these can be some of the hardest resources to attain if you live in a rural area.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.text: I drank some boiling water because I wanted to whistle.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.text: Drinking lemon water as soon as you wake up spikes your energy levels physically and mentally. Lemon water gives you steady, natural energy that lasts the length of the day by improving nutrient absorption in your stomach.
quotes.author: Travis Bradberry

quotes.text: If the world was ending, I think I would grab some Cinnamon Toast Crunch, a bunch of water, and I'd probably just... I'd probably go crazy.
quotes.author: Tyler, The Creator

quotes.text: There is no question that global warming will have a significant impact on already existing problems such as malaria, malnutrition, and water shortages. But this doesn't mean the best way to solve them is to cut carbon emissions.
quotes.author: Bjorn Lomborg

quotes.text: I think recharging is important, absolutely. Every now and then, you need maybe a couple of weeks to just chill out and let your emotions balance themselves out a little bit.
quotes.author: Malin Akerman

quotes.text: Ideas are like rabbits. You get a couple and learn how to handle them, and pretty soon you have a dozen.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.text: And, so, when I picked up the guitar, suddenly, just playing a couple of notes really, really spoke to me. It was almost like I should have been doing it prior to that. You know, it was something that just felt really natural.
quotes.author: Slash

quotes.text: There are a couple of carp fishing books I've been reading. I'm very interested in that line of books, because I think they write very well, carp anglers, about the general environment.
quotes.author: Tom Felton

quotes.text: Hip-hop is the streets. Hip-hop is a couple of elements that it comes from back in the days... that feel of music with urgency that speaks to you. It speaks to your livelihood and it's not compromised. It's blunt. It's raw, straight off the street - from the beat to the voice to the words.
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.text: I did a couple of movies in Brazil, and the actors were incredibly congenial and hung out together a lot. Even the biggest stars would do radio commercials - they're not put on a pedestal like they are in the United States.
quotes.author: Alan Arkin

quotes.text: I grew up babysitting and always enjoyed it. I love family. A couple of my closest friends have kids, and I'm their godfather, and that's one of my greatest pleasures in life, just picking them up from school and hanging out with them.
quotes.author: Matthew Perry

quotes.text: Relationships are eternal. The 'separation' is another chapter in the relationship. Often, letting go of the old form of the relationship becomes a lesson in pure love much deeper than any would have learned had the couple stayed together.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: What is wrong in getting divorced? If a couple is incompatible and just cannot stay married anymore, should they put on a show of togetherness just for the sake of society, or, for that matter, any extended family?
quotes.author: Duniya Vijay

quotes.text: I can't see myself without pink lipstick. I can go without it for a couple days, but if there was no more pink lipstick in the world, I'd be useless. Seriously.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.text: I think getting drunk is the key to flying comfortably. A couple of bloody marys or several glasses of champagne, and suddenly it's like you're on a roller coaster.
quotes.author: Amanda Peet

quotes.text: I left acting for a couple of years to found my company, Wayfarer, and the first project I did was this documentary series I created called 'My Last Days' to remind us that our time is limited and to inspire us to do more and to be the best selves that we can be.
quotes.author: Justin Baldoni

quotes.text: I got really, really sick with a spinal infection that put me in a hospital for a couple of months, and it was touch and go. I had my guitar with me, and as soon as I got well enough to play, there was nothing else to do in that hospital. The nurses would come in and request songs.
quotes.author: Robert Hunter

quotes.text: John Wells let me write a couple of West Wings, which was an incredible gift. I loved it once I got past the brain injury part of it, and so I'm working on a couple of things that are far from fruition, but what I want to pursue.
quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

quotes.text: I grew up in Beaufort, South Carolina, in a six-room farmhouse with a couple of leaning posts to keep it from fallin'. I came up in a time when men were men.
quotes.author: Joe Frazier

quotes.text: Restless, and in desperate need of adventure, I quit my job at an insurance company to travel west with a couple of guys I smoked pot with, scandalizing my family.
quotes.author: Mink Stole

quotes.text: There was a time that I was only known for being a plagiarist. It used to hurt at times because there was so much effort I was putting into music. And instead of that, it was a couple tunes that I had reproduced from folk songs to remake as film songs, which were being written about.
quotes.author: Pritam Chakraborty

quotes.text: I deliberate over the lyrics; I really do. I'll come up with one line in a day, and then it might be a couple of days before I come up with the rhyming line. It's never been easy for me.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.text: We have sectors of the economy, aerospace is a good example, where Britain's probably the second country in the world, the automobile sector, where we've done extraordinarily well, an enormous amount of investment over the last couple of years, life sciences is another.
quotes.author: Vince Cable

quotes.text: There was a Japantown in San Francisco, but after the internment camps that locked up all the Japanese, Japantown shrunk down to just a couple tourist blocks.
quotes.author: Ann Nocenti

quotes.text: Three times a year, there's Strategicon convention, and I go for the board games. It happens Presidents Day, Labor Day, and Memorial Day weekends. You go and take a look at the new board games and meet a couple of board game designers, and you can check out games you don't own from the library and then return them.
quotes.author: Rich Sommer

quotes.text: At the time of Polaroid - and I did a couple of other commercials just before I stopped doing that stuff - at that point I was at the level where they respect you and your opinion and all that sort of thing.
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.text: It was cool for a couple of weeks, but how much bad golf can you play?
quotes.author: John Goodman

quotes.text: I've decided to take advantage of outsourcing. My next novel will be written by a couple of guys in Bangalore, India.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.text: A landlord is showing a couple around an apartment. The husband looks up and says, 'Wait a minute. This apartment doesn't have a ceiling.' The landlord answers, 'That's OK. The people upstairs don't walk around that much.'
quotes.author: Gilbert Gottfried

quotes.text: I have a couple of best friends, and I don't think I would live with them. It definitely... certain people can't live together, and I think that it could potentially put a lot of strain on the relationship or friendship.
quotes.author: Alexandra Chando

quotes.text: The last couple relationships I had were long distance. It's not like I can make much of an effort to travel and see anybody. The guy had to do all the work, unfortunately.
quotes.author: Holly Madison

quotes.text: He's a couple sandwiches short of a picnic.
quotes.author: Lance Bass

quotes.text: I don't actually go to that many conferences. I do that a couple of times a year. Normally, I am not recognized; people don't throw their panties at me. I'm a perfectly normal person sitting in my den just doing my job.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.text: I've begun to look at the world through apocalypse eyes. Our society, which seems so sturdily built out of concrete and custom, is just a temporary resting place, a hotel our civilization checked into a couple hundred years ago and must one day check out of.
quotes.author: Neil Strauss

quotes.text: I believe more in precision, when you have the capability, like when you see a mosquito fly and you're able to hit it, you're able to hit it with a couple of short sharp shots... it's a beautiful thing.
quotes.author: Alexis Arguello

quotes.text: Mom and Pop were just a couple of kids when they got married. He was eighteen, she was sixteen and I was three.
quotes.author: Billie Holiday

quotes.text: A couple years ago I was going to back off and actually thought about retiring, but it keeps calling me back, and I'm going to keep going back as long as it calls me. I really think it has something to do with the good vibes that I feel I've spread through my performance and through the time that I've spent with fans.
quotes.author: Jason Newsted

quotes.text: Give me a couple of years, and I'll make that actress an overnight success.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.text: Who can I trust? You have to invest in somebody and chances are you're probably going to invest in somebody who's going to deceive you. I've been conned a couple of times, but now I'm a little more savvy.
quotes.author: Maggie Gyllenhaal

quotes.text: I am a pretty emotional person. Any act of kindness or unkindness moves me. When I see a romantic couple sitting by the beach, it moves me. I don't break down or crack under pressure, but I am just sensitive.
quotes.author: Nimrat Kaur

quotes.text: I had a couple friends from all the different cliques in school, but my true friends were my gymnastics teammates. I grew up competing with them for ten years.
quotes.author: Nicole Anderson

quotes.text: If you force yourself to smile, within a couple minutes, you feel happy.
quotes.author: Dean Norris

quotes.text: One product that you can never go wrong with is sunglasses because they are easy to misplace. I always get a couple of pairs every year.
quotes.author: Jessica Szohr

quotes.text: I've been sober now for a couple of years and I'm taking my sobriety very seriously - one day at a time and I am moving forward in my career.
quotes.author: Daniel Baldwin

quotes.text: More and more these days what I find myself doing in my stories is making a representation of goodness and a representation of evil and then having those two run at each other full-speed, like a couple of PeeWee football players, to see what happens. Who stays standing? Whose helmet goes flying off?
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.text: Well I'm still working on The Incredibles. So I'm going to take a little time off. I've got a couple of tricks up my sleeve. I'm not ready to talk about them yet, but expect the unexpected.
quotes.author: Brad Bird

quotes.text: Sonnymoon and Quadrants are a couple of bands that really inspire me in terms of the melodics of things and certain tones and just what feels good. It takes me back to the type of music that I grew up on in my household. We played a lot of gangsta rap, but we also played a lot of oldies, and I think that mix is part of what inspires my sound.
quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.text: Bra-burning never happened. It was completely made up by the media. A couple of women protesting a Miss America pageant threw some bras into a garbage can, and somehow that became this longstanding idea of feminists as bra-burners.
quotes.author: Jessica Valenti

quotes.text: Lordy, lordy, lordy do I love money. It is a character flaw, no doubt, one that springs from a panicked childhood in which I always felt as if our family was only a couple missed child support payments from being tossed onto the pitiless streets of our suburban New Jersey town.
quotes.author: Michael Ian Black

quotes.text: I think I'm alright as a lyricist, you know? But then what will happen every couple of months or so is that I'll hear a song I've never heard before and feel I've gone right back to square one.
quotes.author: Alex Turner

quotes.text: I personally think that a couple of pounds a week - maybe rising to almost £3 a week - is a reasonable price for Britain to achieve a degree of energy security to reduce its total dependence on fossil fuels and to honour its commitments to cut green house gases.
quotes.author: Tim Yeo

quotes.text: My room is like an antique shop, full of junk, and weird stuff. There's a big sword in there. And a taxidermy bird, and a couple of birdcages. And a lot of newspaper cuttings. I used to have a weird thing about cutting out morbid headlines from newspapers, and collecting them. I was fascinated with drowning, which is kind of strange.
quotes.author: Florence Welch

quotes.text: There's only a couple times when fame is ever helpful. Sometimes you can get into a restaurant where the kitchen is just closing. Sometimes you can avoid a traffic violation. But the only time it really matters is in the emergency room with your kids. That's when you want to be noticed, because it's very easy to get forgotten in an ER.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.text: Now that I'm a grandfather myself, I realize that the best thing about having grandkids is that you get the kid for the best part of the ride - kind of like owning a car for only the first 10,000 miles. You can have your grandchildren for a couple of days and then turn them back over to the parents.
quotes.author: Willard Scott

quotes.text: To learn to do backflips and front flips, you had to fall and bump your head a couple times. I've been doing them since I was a little one, though. Just something I've enjoyed doing, just flip.
quotes.author: Marshawn Lynch

quotes.text: When the Haiti earthquake happened, I registered with UNICEF to set up an account, and posted to Twitter for people to donate to it. In a matter of a couple of hours, $30,000 had been donated. That, to me, was eye-opening.
quotes.author: Misha Collins

quotes.text: I don't deal with death very well. My brother, John Candy, my dad, my mom, Brandon Tartikoff just a couple of weeks ago. I mean, you lose a lot of people in your life, and that's one thing I am constantly working on - pain management.
quotes.author: James Belushi

quotes.text: I was first imprisoned in Pretoria, and then, thereafter, I was taken to Robben Island. I stayed there for a couple of weeks. I was taken back to Pretoria when I was charged in the Rivonia trial, when I was then sent to Robben Island for life.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: My love of maple syrup. I've been known to knock back a can over a couple days: A swig here, a swig there, and next thing you know it's gone. It's a habit I have to stave off. I don't want to lose all my teeth.
quotes.author: Rufus Wainwright

quotes.text: Believe it or not, lots of people change their majors and abandon their dreams just to avoid a couple of math classes in college.
quotes.author: Danica McKellar

quotes.text: Christmas carols always brought tears to my eyes. I also cry at weddings. I should have cried at a couple of my own.
quotes.author: Ethel Merman

quotes.text: I think I could walk into any music shop anywhere and with a guitar off the rack, a couple of basic pedals and an amp I could sound just like me. There's no devices, customized or otherwise, that give me my sound.
quotes.author: David Gilmour

quotes.text: I've been saying for a couple of years now that people need to let God out of the Sunday morning box, that He doesn't want to just be with you for an hour or two on Sunday morning and then put back in His box to sit there until you have an emergency, but He wants to invade your Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: A national political campaign is better than the best circus ever heard of, with a mass baptism and a couple of hangings thrown in.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: I first thought maybe I'd do a banjo presentation record, where I'd play a couple of songs and get a bunch of other players to do the rest. Then I realized I had enough of my own songs to do an album of them.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.text: I had a couple of really cool friends when I was a kid, and we'd find cool music and movies and show them to each other. My friend Dennis had a copy of 'A Clockwork Orange' and he'd already seen it once, and he was like, 'We need to watch this.' I was sleeping over his house - and I think we were literally 15 - and we watched it.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.text: I am not that attached to material things. And the good thing is I can make choices. I have very few possessions. Luckily, as a man you don't need much... a few papers, a couple of books, and a few shirts, jackets, sweaters. It fits in a little thing, in a paper bag, so it's very easy.
quotes.author: Nicolas Berggruen

quotes.text: If you look at the history of technology over a couple hundred years, it's all about time compression and making the globe smaller. It's had positive effects, all the ones that we know. So we're much less likely to have the kind of terrible misunderstandings that led to World War I, for example.
quotes.author: Eric Schmidt

quotes.text: You gotta remember: we're musicians... we're just crazy people who can't get along sometimes. I've definitely come to the table with my knife in my pocket a couple of times; you know how it is. It's part of being human. Now add fame and money and all that rock and roll craziness to it - we're lucky we don't eat each other in this industry!
quotes.author: Corey Taylor

quotes.text: I've never been a huge sweets eater, and I've always loved a Mediterranean diet. We eat a lot of dark leafy greens, and a couple meals each week are meat-free. We enjoy eating a balanced diet.
quotes.author: Rachael Ray

quotes.text: Who knows who will be on board? A couple of spies, for sure. At least one grand duke; a few beautiful woman, no doubt very rich and very troubled. Anything can happen and usually does on the Orient Express.
quotes.author: Morley Safer

quotes.text: I'm lucky because I have a job I love. I really miss being away from home, being in my own bed, seeing my animals and siblings, having my moms cookies. I have a couple cats. I got a kitten about a year ago and now Im going on the road so I wont see him for a while. I feel bad.
quotes.author: Michelle Branch

quotes.text: If you think nobody cares about you, try missing a couple of payments.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: I lost relatives to AIDS. A couple of my closest cousins, favorite cousins. I lost friends to AIDS, high school friends who never even made it to their 21st birthdays in the '80s. When it's that close to you, you can't - you know, you can't really deny it, and you can't run from it.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: When I go on holiday and people ask me what I do, I tell them I do some internet stuff and I've done a couple of books and I hope they just leave it at that.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.text: When I'm in New York, I bike everywhere. I have a couple of bikes stored over at Ed Norton's. It's the only way to go. But in Hawaii, I drive. I have a little Volkswagen Bug, from the 'Drive it? Hug it?' phase. I run it on biodiesel.
quotes.author: Woody Harrelson

quotes.text: The Civil Rights Movement, it wasn't just a couple of, you know, superstars like Martin Luther King. It was thousands and thousands - millions, I should say - of people taking risks, becoming leaders in their community.
quotes.author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.text: When you see a merger between two giants in a declining industry, it can look like the financial version of a couple having a baby to save a marriage.
quotes.author: Adam Davidson

quotes.text: My childhood memories of my grandparents are of a wonderful, complementary couple. While my grandfather had a spirited, humorous personality, my grandmother is gentle and poised.
quotes.author: Kristina McMorris

quotes.text: I was drafted during the Korean War. None of us wanted to go... It was only a couple of years after World War II had ended. We said, 'Wait a second? Didn't we just get through with that?'
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.text: A couple of years before he died, I kissed my father goodbye. He said, 'Son, you haven't kissed me since you were a little boy.' It went straight to my heart, and I kissed him whenever I saw him after that, and my sons and I always kiss whenever we meet.
quotes.author: Terry Wogan

quotes.text: If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.text: On rare occasions one does hear of a miraculous case of a married couple falling in love after marriage, but on close examination it will be found that it is a mere adjustment to the inevitable.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.text: Well, I do feel that I carry the responsibility of representing my country wherever I am, and this responsibility came with the success that I had in last couple of years, not just myself but the whole group of tennis players that comes from Serbia. And athletes in general are, in this moment, the biggest ambassadors that our country has.
quotes.author: Novak Djokovic

quotes.text: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.text: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.text: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: If a country is to be corruption free and become a nation of beautiful minds, I strongly feel there are three key societal members who can make a difference. They are the father, the mother and the teacher.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
quotes.author: David Ogden Stiers

quotes.text: I'll never stop dreaming that one day we can be a real family, together, all of us laughing and talking, loving and understanding, not looking at the past but only to the future.
quotes.author: LaToya Jackson

quotes.text: For there is no friend like a sister in calm or stormy weather; To cheer one on the tedious way, to fetch one if one goes astray, to lift one if one totters down, to strengthen whilst one stands.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.text: My family is my strength and my weakness.
quotes.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quotes.text: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.text: I'm thankful to God for having a family that's been there for me. He's been there from the time I was a child to even now with my family helping with my little boy. It's worth more than words could ever describe. That's one of the ways I've been able to stay grounded is thanks to family and God.
quotes.author: Ashton Shepherd

quotes.text: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.text: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.text: Sister is probably the most competitive relationship within the family, but once the sisters are grown, it becomes the strongest relationship.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.text: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.text: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: The great danger for family life, in the midst of any society whose idols are pleasure, comfort and independence, lies in the fact that people close their hearts and become selfish.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.text: There's nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
quotes.author: Willie Stargell

quotes.text: I've always put my family first and that's just the way it is.
quotes.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

quotes.text: A home with a loving and loyal husband and wife is the supreme setting in which children can be reared in love and righteousness and in which the spiritual and physical needs of children can be met.
quotes.author: David A. Bednar

quotes.text: Your children are not your children. They are the sons and daughters of Life's longing for itself. They came through you but not from you and though they are with you yet they belong not to you.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: A man should never neglect his family for business.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Family is the most important thing in the world.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.text: Feelings of worth can flourish only in an atmosphere where individual differences are appreciated, mistakes are tolerated, communication is open, and rules are flexible - the kind of atmosphere that is found in a nurturing family.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.text: Family quarrels are bitter things. They don't go according to any rules. They're not like aches or wounds, they're more like splits in the skin that won't heal because there's not enough material.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: I have a great family, I live an amazing life.
quotes.author: John Oates

quotes.text: I woke up one morning thinking about wolves and realized that wolf packs function as families. Everyone has a role, and if you act within the parameters of your role, the whole pack succeeds, and when that falls apart, so does the pack.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.text: I have a family to support. And I'm not always going to be doing exactly what I want to do.
quotes.author: Patrick Warburton

quotes.text: We love to be with our family and friends and I can tell you that lots of eating will be involved.
quotes.author: Julia Barr

quotes.text: We'll sort of get over the marriage first and then maybe look at the kids. But obviously we want a family so we'll have to start thinking about that.
quotes.author: Prince William

quotes.text: Both within the family and without, our sisters hold up our mirrors: our images of who we are and of who we can dare to be.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fishel

quotes.text: People are pretty forgiving when it comes to other people's families. The only family that ever horrifies you is your own.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: Little children are still the symbol of the eternal marriage between love and duty.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: The one thing that kept our family together was the music. The only thing that our family would share emotionally was to have our dad cry over something the kids did with music.
quotes.author: Dennis Wilson

quotes.text: I believe the world is one big family, and we need to help each other.
quotes.author: Jet Li

quotes.text: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: I love children and I get along with them great. It's just that I believe if you're going to be a parent, there has to be something inside you that says, 'I want a family.' I don't feel that sense of urgency.
quotes.author: George Clooney

quotes.text: I have frequently been questioned, especially by women, of how I could reconcile family life with a scientific career. Well, it has not been easy.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.text: Cherish your human connections - your relationships with friends and family.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.text: Children are the keys of paradise.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.text: The family is the nucleus of civilization.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.text: When you have a godly husband, a godly wife, children who respect their parents and who are loved by their parents, who provide for those children their physical and spiritual and material needs, lovingly, you have the ideal unit.
quotes.author: Jerry Falwell

quotes.text: Pray in your family daily, that yours may be in the number of the families who call upon God.
quotes.author: Christopher Love

quotes.text: The family is the test of freedom; because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: Spend some time this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.text: When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.
quotes.author: Guy Lafleur

quotes.text: For me, nothing has ever taken precedence over being a mother and having a family and a home.
quotes.author: Jessica Lange

quotes.text: There is no such thing as fun for the whole family.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: My life comes down to three moments: the death of my father, meeting my husband, and the birth of my daughter. Everything I did previous to that just doesn't seem to add up to very much.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.text: I would rather start a family than finish one.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.text: Women's natural role is to be a pillar of the family.
quotes.author: Grace Kelly

quotes.text: Happy or unhappy, families are all mysterious. We have only to imagine how differently we would be described - and will be, after our deaths - by each of the family members who believe they know us.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.text: You don't have to give birth to someone to have a family.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.text: A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: When I was younger, my family would go camping and fishing on our ranches. My dad loves being around all kinds of animals. He's the one who got me to be a really big animal lover.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: The attempt to redefine the family as a purely voluntary arrangement grows out of the modern delusion that people can keep all their options open all the time.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.text: What must it be like for a little boy to read that daddy never loved mummy?
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.text: The children have been a wonderful gift to me, and I'm thankful to have once again seen our world through their eyes. They restore my faith in the family's future.
quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.text: One's family is the most important thing in life. I look at it this way: One of these days I'll be over in a hospital somewhere with four walls around me. And the only people who'll be with me will be my family.
quotes.author: Robert Byrd

quotes.text: My family was my guide to my reality.
quotes.author: Haywood Nelson

quotes.text: Maybe there is no actual place called hell. Maybe hell is just having to listen to our grandparents breathe through their noses when they're eating sandwiches.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.text: I love cooking for myself and cooking for my family.
quotes.author: Al Roker

quotes.text: I've given it my all. I've done my best. Now, I'm ready with my family to begin the next phase of our lives.
quotes.author: Richard M. Daley

quotes.text: All of us grow up in particular realities - a home, family, a clan, a small town, a neighborhood. Depending upon how we're brought up, we are either deeply aware of the particular reading of reality into which we are born, or we are peripherally aware of it.
quotes.author: Chaim Potok

quotes.text: Like all my family and class, I considered it a sign of weakness to show affection; to have been caught kissing my mother would have been a disgrace, and to have shown affection for my father would have been a disaster.
quotes.author: Agnes Smedley

quotes.text: I come from that society and there is a common thread, specifically family values - the idea that you do anything for your family, and the unconditional love for one's children.
quotes.author: Ednita Nazario

quotes.text: The family you come from isn't as important as the family you're going to have.
quotes.author: Ring Lardner

quotes.text: I love my family.
quotes.author: Manute Bol

quotes.text: Dignity is not negotiable. Dignity is the honor of the family.
quotes.author: Vartan Gregorian

quotes.text: The other night I ate at a real nice family restaurant. Every table had an argument going.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: Tennis just a game, family is forever.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.text: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.
quotes.author: Ralph Fiennes

quotes.text: He who is overly attached to his family members experiences fear and sorrow, for the root of all grief is attachment. Thus one should discard attachment to be happy.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: Some of the most important conversations I've ever had occurred at my family's dinner table.
quotes.author: Bob Ehrlich

quotes.text: I stay in tune with my family and God.
quotes.author: Regina King

quotes.text: The greatest thing in family life is to take a hint when a hint is intended-and not to take a hint when a hint isn't intended.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: A family can develop only with a loving woman as its center.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.text: The foundation of family - that's where it all begins for me.
quotes.author: Faith Hill

quotes.text: Also, my mom and family are very important to me and I know that this is not expected.
quotes.author: Christina Milian

quotes.text: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.text: I love women, but I feel like you can't trust some of them. Some of them are liars, you know? Like I was in the park and I met this girl, she was cute and she had a dog. And I went up to her, we started talking. She told me her dog's name. Then I said, 'Does he bite?' She said, 'No.' And I said, 'Oh yeah? Then how does he eat?' Liar.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: When other little girls wanted to be ballet dancers I kind of wanted to be a vampire.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.text: I'm not a pretty princess, and I'm aware of that, so I like music that is really intense, really bold, and characters that in a way almost have a dark side and are kind of evil because, for me, that's when I feel my strongest and fiercest, when I'm not necessarily the good girl.
quotes.author: Ashley Wagner

quotes.text: My best friend is the most important girl, outside of family, to me. I met her when I went to college and we bonded immediately. I'd do anything for her at any time. We phone each other every day.
quotes.author: Dawn French

quotes.text: I believe that the rights of women and girls is the unfinished business of the 21st century.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: Courage, sacrifice, determination, commitment, toughness, heart, talent, guts. That's what little girls are made of.
quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

quotes.text: I never said I was a 'good girl.' I'm not a bad girl.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.text: When you're a teenager, you want to meet a lot of girls - you want to get the most girls. You don't know anything about respect; you don't know anything about being faithful and loyal to your girlfriend.
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.text: I'm getting married because I'm in love with a girl and want to spend my life with her. You can't live your life doing what other people want you to or you'll be miserable. At some point you just have to be yourself.
quotes.author: Dan Marino

quotes.text: Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: A great social success is a pretty girl who plays her cards as carefully as if she were plain.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: We were a family that made our Halloween costumes. Or, more accurately, my mother made them. She took no suggestions or advice. Halloween costumes were her territory. She was the brain behind my brother's winning girl costume, stuffing her own bra with newspapers for him to wear under a cashmere sweater and smearing red lipstick on his lips.
quotes.author: Ann Hood

quotes.text: Exercise is really important to me - it's therapeutic. So if I'm ever feeling tense or stressed or like I'm about to have a meltdown, I'll put on my iPod and head to the gym or out on a bike ride along Lake Michigan with the girls.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: I believe in manicures. I believe in overdressing. I believe in primping at leisure and wearing lipstick. I believe in pink. I believe happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day, and... I believe in miracles.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: I think the girl who is able to earn her own living and pay her own way should be as happy as anybody on earth. The sense of independence and security is very sweet.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.text: Put your hand on a hot stove for a minute and it seems like an hour. Sit with a pretty girl for an hour, and it seems like a minute.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: My purpose... to go on with my heart and soul, devoting all my energies to Girl Scouts, and heart and hand with them, we will make our lives and the lives of the future girls happy, healthy and holy.
quotes.author: Juliette Gordon Low

quotes.text: The emotional, sexual, and psychological stereotyping of females begins when the doctor says: It's a girl.
quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm

quotes.text: Nothing is worse than a beautiful girl fishing for compliments by saying how gross she is. On the flip side, I find genuine humility and modesty attractive.
quotes.author: Chris Evans

quotes.text: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.text: Female genital mutilation targets little girls, baby girls - fragile angels who are helpless, who cannot fight back. It's a crime against a child, a crime against humanity. It's abuse. It's absolutely criminal and we have to stop it.
quotes.author: Waris Dirie

quotes.text: I was sort of traumatized by girls in the third grade. Because there was a girl in my third grade class I had a crush on. I bought her a box of Valentine's Day chocolate. And I put it in her cubby with a note that said something like, 'I am deeply in love with you, Your Secret Admirer.' And I didn't sign my name.
quotes.author: Steve Carell

quotes.text: Well, because I'm naturally a tomboy, when I have sleepovers with girls, they end up going home and crying.
quotes.author: Alexa Vega

quotes.text: I am a strong Ukrainian girl, that is why I work a lot.
quotes.author: Milla Jovovich

quotes.text: I want to show that the underdog can win. I believe we're all the same: you, a slum girl, my mother.
quotes.author: Vikas Swarup

quotes.text: I get noticed for different things I've done in different areas of town. If I'm in a rock club, it'll be Skid Row, if I'm in a mall it's the 'Gilmore Girls.'
quotes.author: Sebastian Bach

quotes.text: My mother's from Thailand, and they're very strict about girls in bikinis, but I would love to do a shoot in the floating market in Thailand.
quotes.author: Christine Teigen

quotes.text: Every woman needs a girls' night out.
quotes.author: Genesis Rodriguez

quotes.text: Men and girls, men and girls: Artificial swine and pearls.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.text: I give myself a cheat day where I annihilate my diet. I'm an all-American girl, so I go for a burger and fries and a shake.
quotes.author: Ashley Wagner

quotes.text: Flirting all starts with eye contact! You can tell a girl is into you if she's across the room and still making eye contact with you.
quotes.author: Chandler Parsons

quotes.text: I do think anger is so difficult for women. Girls think it undermines their femininity; it's not very ladylike.
quotes.author: Koren Zailckas

quotes.text: If you have twenty guys in the room and you just bring in one girl, you change the entire mood and everyone plays different.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.text: Girls are always running through my mind. They don't dare walk.
quotes.author: Andy Gibb

quotes.text: I went into a McDonald's yesterday and said, 'I'd like some fries.' The girl at the counter said, 'Would you like some fries with that?'
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.text: Well, I love what you would call boys' music, you know, the prodigy, banging techno, music that girls generally don't like.
quotes.author: Chris Lowe

quotes.text: There's no better feeling than making your little girls laugh.
quotes.author: Jerry O'Connell

quotes.text: I have my team. Like if you see everyone around me - I have my hair and makeup girl, my assistant. They're very calm, they're all about positive energy. There're no drama queens. Everyone wants everyone else to have a positive experience. There are no agendas. I think it creates a healthy environment and there are no boundaries to cross.
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.text: Writing is powerful. Whether it's a little girl hiding from the Nazis in an attic, or Amnesty International writing letters on behalf of political prisoners, the power of telling stories is usually what causes change.
quotes.author: Erin Gruwell

quotes.text: I do recommend it for all girls, and boys, out there: put on a pair of fishnet stockings and find your inner sexiness!
quotes.author: Nia Vardalos

quotes.text: I was never the pretty girl at school. I'm tiny and mixed-race. I grew up in a white area. I was always the loner.
quotes.author: FKA twigs

quotes.text: Friendship is the complete explanation of what a Cheetah Girl is - if you have that true friendship, you can conquer anything you want.
quotes.author: Sabrina Bryan

quotes.text: Girls' inner critics are starting to reveal themselves at a younger and younger age. And body image issues are an aspect of their lives which is causing them low self esteem and day-to-day suffering.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berkley

quotes.text: The only way I can lose is if I'm caught in bed with either a dead girl or a live boy.
quotes.author: Edwin Edwards

quotes.text: Many a man in love with a dimple makes the mistake of marrying the whole girl.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.text: Growing up in Niagara Falls, Ontario, I took classes as a young girl and became very serious about ballet, and also performed with a local company, although it wasn't a professional company.
quotes.author: Cathy Marie Buchanan

quotes.text: There was the time I bought three cars in the span of three or four weeks. It was crazy; it wasn't greedy. It was mine, my girl's, my mom's. I got Benzes for my ladies. But I felt crazy. You have to understand I come from a world where we're very modest. But that's not greedy. That's nice, right?
quotes.author: J. Cole

quotes.text: I've realized skinny isn't necessarily attractive. Guys like girls with curves.
quotes.author: Nina Dobrev

quotes.text: My grandmother always used to wear this English perfume called Tuberose and then she died and then I dated this girl who wore the same thing. Every time I hung out with her, I could only think of my recently deceased grandmother. So sometimes a signature scent can be good and sometimes it can be bad.
quotes.author: Mark Ronson

quotes.text: I was in preschool and a girl actually kissed me on the cheek. I didn't know what to do. I didn't know what it meant, so I instantly grabbed her face and kissed her on the lips. And, then I got suspended.
quotes.author: Jensen Ackles

quotes.text: When I wake up in the morning, I feel just like any other insecure 24-year-old girl.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: After so long being thin, it was terrifying being heavier. But I am a naturally curvy Hispanic girl. I don't deprive myself.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.text: Today, I see thousands of Mahatma Gandhis, Martin Luther Kings, and Nelson Mandelas marching forward and calling on us. The boys and girls have joined. I have joined in. We ask you to join, too.
quotes.author: Kailash Satyarthi

quotes.text: Girls are losing their virginity at 15, 16. I'm not promoting that. But my songs are talking... about me becoming a man.
quotes.author: Chris Brown

quotes.text: The good guy only gets the girl in a soppy way.
quotes.author: James D'arcy

quotes.text: I wonder why it is, that young men are always cautioned against bad girls. Anyone can handle a bad girl. It's the good girls men should be warned against.
quotes.author: David Niven

quotes.text: Every girl should use what Mother Nature gave her before Father Time takes it away.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.text: You know the passage where Scarlett voices her happiness that her mother is dead, so that she can't see what a bad girl Scarlett has become? Well, that's me.
quotes.author: Vivien Leigh

quotes.text: Rey is so strong. She's cool and smart and she can look after herself. Young girls can look at her and know that they can wear trousers if they want to. That they don't have to show off their bodies.
quotes.author: Daisy Ridley

quotes.text: I enjoyed 'Gossip Girl' so much. I cannot tell you how impressed I am with the cast of that show. I was so intimidated doing that show because I thought, 'Oh my gosh, those people are so young and gorgeous, and I'm a million years old, and I need a spray tan, and I'm going to be wearing all these fabulous clothes.'
quotes.author: Joanna Garcia

quotes.text: There are certain shades of limelight that can wreck a girl's complexion.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: I could see myself in a relationship with a girl; Olivia Wilde is so sexy she makes me want to strangle a mountain ox with my bare hands. She's mesmerizing.
quotes.author: Megan Fox

quotes.text: I bought a piano once because I had the dream of playing As Time Goes By as some girl's leaning on it drinking a martini. Great image. But none of it worked out. I can't even play Chopsticks. But I've got a nice piano at my house!
quotes.author: George Clooney

quotes.text: I was not a good-lookin' girl. I was extremely skinny. I wasn't pretty. I wasn't cool.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.text: The Beliebers have done some pretty crazy stuff. Last week, the night before I was due to do a show in Germany, four girls went into a dumpster so they could sneak into the building. They climbed in and hid. When the guys working on the truck started getting the garbage they found them straight away. It was crazy.
quotes.author: Justin Bieber

quotes.text: I went to a boys' school, and I didn't realize that most guys join bands because they wanted to get girls. I was not really focused on that the way everybody else was.
quotes.author: Thom Yorke

quotes.text: I noticed that no matter where I went in the country, there was this group of questions that got asked. I would track them and keep them in categories. Like body image, school, family, friendship, you name it, the emotional life of a teenage girl.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berkley

quotes.text: You never see girls running after engineers.
quotes.author: Anthony Mackie

quotes.text: Once upon a time, growing up male gave little boys a sense of certainty about the natural order of things. We had short hair, wore pants, and played baseball. Girls had long hair, wore skirts, and, no matter how hard they tried, always threw a baseball just like a girl.
quotes.author: Kenneth R. Miller

quotes.text: It's an image that the media has given me as a bad girl, and the only reason they gave me that image is just because of the few things that have gone wrong in my life, and also because I grew up living in a trailer.
quotes.author: Tonya Harding

quotes.text: I think every girl's dream is to find a bad boy at the right time, when he wants to not be bad anymore.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: I don't think I could live without hair, makeup and styling, let alone be the performer I am. I am a glamour girl through and through. I believe in the glamorous life and I live one.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: The leading cause of death for girls 15 to 19 worldwide is not accident or violence or disease; it is complications from pregnancy. Girls under 15 are up to five times as likely to die while having children than are women in their 20s, and their babies are more likely to die as well.
quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.text: The ideal girl is driven, working on something other than modeling or being a singer.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.text: My little girls are the most beautiful women in the world. I am a lucky, lucky man. I will spend every day making sure that they know this.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.text: America, you're sending girls a mixed message. On one hand, you're saying to have positive body image and love who we are; on the other, we're being marketed makeup and clothing that obviously turns us into someone different.
quotes.author: Adora Svitak

quotes.text: I think self-discipline is something, it's like a muscle. The more you exercise it, the stronger it gets.
quotes.author: Daniel Goldstein

quotes.text: It is not by muscle, speed, or physical dexterity that great things are achieved, but by reflection, force of character, and judgment.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: Truthfully, this is how I approach my workout: I want to be the best athlete I can possibly be. If I can out-perform some of the better athletes then I'm happy. When I look at the NFL or the NBA, these guys look how I want to look - it's useable, functional muscle.
quotes.author: Channing Tatum

quotes.text: Mind is everything. Muscle - pieces of rubber. All that I am, I am because of my mind.
quotes.author: Paavo Nurmi

quotes.text: There's not as much oxygen in that hot gym and I think it's great for conditioning. I believe in a lot of boxing. You can train and work on the speed bag and heavy bag, but when you get in the ring with another fighter, it's a different story. Punches are coming at you, there's physical contact, muscle against muscle.
quotes.author: Emanuel Steward

quotes.text: Indeed, the best way to think of willpower is not as some shapeless behavioral trait but as a sort of psychic muscle, one that can atrophy or grow stronger depending on how it's used.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.text: I try to keep it real simple. I try not to add a lot of frosting on what I'm doing. Just take the swing and don't muscle the swing, because if you get in the hitting position and you take the swing, I generate a lot more bat speed, and that works for me.
quotes.author: Tony Gwynn

quotes.text: Flexibility is crucial to my fitness. Incorporating a good warm-up and cool-down into every session decreases my chances of injury. I use both dynamic and static stretching in my training. I've starting doing a few yoga sessions which incorporates muscle strength and flexibility.
quotes.author: Samantha Stosur

quotes.text: What happens when you have great grief in your life is the arteries of that heart begins to spasms down, just literally squeezes down like this because you're feeling the tension of your life and then the heart muscle itself will also begin - to get stressed out.
quotes.author: Mehmet Oz

quotes.text: Practicing is not only playing your instrument, either by yourself or rehearsing with others - it also includes imagining yourself practicing. Your brain forms the same neural connections and muscle memory whether you are imagining the task or actually doing it.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.text: We're all just bags of bones and muscle and hormones; I'll never understand what makes our minds do the things we do. It's like that statue of the monkey holding a skull. We're trying to use a thing we don't understand to understand ourselves.
quotes.author: Meshell Ndegeocello

quotes.text: I served in all commissioned ranks from a second Lieutenant to a Major General. And during that time, I spent most of my time being a high-class muscle man for Big Business, for Wall Street, and for the bankers. In short, I was a racketeer for capitalism.
quotes.author: Smedley Butler

quotes.text: It's now possible to have your body 3D-imaged from head to toe at a sub-millimeter accuracy, showing every ripple of muscle or cellulite, to allow the perfect-fitting jeans or shoes.
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.text: The imagination is a muscle. If it is not exercised, it atrophies.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone else who is not a champion. That's what most people lack, having the guts to go on and just say they'll go through the pain no matter what happens.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.text: Nothing stops the man who desires to achieve. Every obstacle is simply a course to develop his achievement muscle. It's a strengthening of his powers of accomplishment.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.text: It's not about weight, it's about fitness, and one component of being fit is to have relatively low body fat, because fat is not very efficient, whereas muscle is.
quotes.author: Deborah Bull

quotes.text: We've forgotten how to remember, and just as importantly, we've forgotten how to pay attention. So, instead of using your smartphone to jot down crucial notes, or Googling an elusive fact, use every opportunity to practice your memory skills. Memory is a muscle, to be exercised and improved.
quotes.author: Joshua Foer

quotes.text: I love everything from old-school cars to whatever the latest muscle or luxury vehicles are.
quotes.author: Ludacris

quotes.text: The brain is like a muscle. When it is in use we feel very good. Understanding is joyous.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: Gymnastics uses every single part of your body, every little tiny muscle that you never even knew.
quotes.author: Shannon Miller

quotes.text: With every year of playing, you want to relax one more muscle. Why? Because the more tense you are, the less you can hear.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.text: I think men know to seduce women though words and conversation and nice gestures. That's much sexier than when a man uses muscle.
quotes.author: Donatella Versace

quotes.text: People who care about animals tend to care about people. They don't care about animals to the exclusion of people. Caring is not a finite resource and, even more than that, it's like a muscle: the more you exercise it, the stronger it gets.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.text: I was a weed. Such a skinny little weed. I just couldn't put on weight; I couldn't put on muscle. I was the oddest shape. And I thought that was it: that's how I'd look for the rest of my life. And I'd beat myself up about it so much. But you change an awful lot. You're 16. Your body's not even halfway to what it'll end up being.
quotes.author: Luke Evans

quotes.text: The point of the feminist movement wasn't simply to set our underwear on fire and muscle into small spaces in the male-dominated workplace, but to create a world where the contribution of both sexes was equally valued and no one's worth was judged on their take-home salary.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.text: But I work harder now because I have so much more exposure. And actually the harder you work as a writer, the better you get at it. It's like anything else. It's a muscle you have to exercise. I write more now than ever.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.text: Fearlessness is like a muscle. I know from my own life that the more I exercise it the more natural it becomes to not let my fears run me.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.text: I think it is easier for thinner people to build on a frame once you get lean muscle. I get bored lifting weights at the gym, and it isn't enough as your body becomes stiff. So I train in different ways such as core training, cardio with weights, playing sports such as tennis, cycling, swimming and running 10 km once a week.
quotes.author: Arjun Rampal

quotes.text: You have a right to say no. Most of us have very weak and flaccid 'no' muscles. We feel guilty for saying no. We get ostracized and challenged for saying no, so we forget it's our choice. Your 'no' muscle has to be built up to get to a place where you can say, 'I don't care if that's what you want. I don't want that. No.'
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.text: I could feel his muscle tissues collapse under my force. It's ludicrous these mortals even attempt to enter my realm.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: 'Meat' is a vague term and can be used to refer to many parts of an animal, including internal organs and skin. For the most part, the meat we eat consists of muscle tissue taken from farm animals, whether it's a sirloin steak, which is cut from the rear of a cow, or a pork chop, taken from flesh near the spine of a pig.
quotes.author: Michael Specter

quotes.text: I can bulk up very fast. I can lift heavy weights because, like most people, I started off with heavy workouts. That's stayed in my muscle memory. I feel horrible when I feel my jeans are getting tight. Workouts peace me out.
quotes.author: Arjun Rampal

quotes.text: I had just 15 days to work on my body for the climactic fight of 'Bodyguard.' And I would work on every muscle of my body two/three times a week. I would have developed a superb body if I had three months, but squeezing it into 15 days can be harmful. Also, as you grow older, your metabolic rate slows down.
quotes.author: Salman Khan

quotes.text: You really have to have some muscle to be on the stage in front of the world.
quotes.author: Billy Crystal

quotes.text: I don't bench press, but I use machines to work 10-12 muscle groups. Biceps, triceps, a few things for the back, calves, shoulders and so on - and then I'll go on the running machine, cross-trainer or mountain climber.
quotes.author: Viswanathan Anand

quotes.text: We choose forward. We choose inclusion. We choose growing together. We choose American economic might and muscle, standing strong on the bedrock of the American ideal: a strong, empowered and ever-growing middle class.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.text: Television, for me, is great because I love to act, every day. I love to work that muscle. I love to learn, and I love to be able to just do what I love. It's when I'm at my best. So, I love TV for that reason because it's every day.
quotes.author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quotes.text: I always wanted to entertain. When I was six, a scrawny, scrawny kid, I'd get in my red speedo and do muscle moves. I actually thought I was muscular. I didn't know everyone was laughing at me.
quotes.author: Ryan Gosling

quotes.text: I enjoy getting to work on 'Saturday Night Live', where I get to do people like David Paterson. And then, its like a different muscle to do someone like a bicycle guy on' Portlandia'.
quotes.author: Fred Armisen

quotes.text: I run, but boxing conditioning is different, so you have to get used to running in the ring. Boxing movements are very different. Swimming is one of the best because every single muscle is working. I swim a lot. I train very hard at things that mimic boxing. I have to do mostly sport-specific training, such as lots of sparring.
quotes.author: Wladimir Klitschko

quotes.text: My dream was to become a ballet dancer, but after a year in bed with rheumatic fever at 13, I had grown too tall, and had no muscle tone left. I tried a ballet class and couldn't even do a plie without falling over. It was my first death.
quotes.author: Carmen Dell'Orefice

quotes.text: It's amazing what a bit of soot and shaving can do for muscle definition, honestly.
quotes.author: Joe Dempsie

quotes.text: Vin Diesel is the best kisser in the world, better than anyone else I've ever had. The most attractive thing about Vin is his brain. That's his most attractive muscle.
quotes.author: Asia Argento

quotes.text: If the javelin had hit me 10cm to the left, it would have punctured my lung, 20cm higher the throat, which would have been the worst-case scenario. Just 1cm higher and it would have hit bone, muscle and tendon and that would have been the end of my sporting career.
quotes.author: Roman Sebrle

quotes.text: By the time I sat down to write 'Family Pictures,' I hadn't written anything in almost two years, and writing, I have discovered, is a muscle: if it isn't exercised, it will atrophy.
quotes.author: Jane Green

quotes.text: The mind is just another muscle.
quotes.author: Ted Turner
