quotes.author: Jensen Ackles

quotes.text: She felt like a chess player who, by the clever handling of his pieces, sees the game taking the course intended. Her eyes were bright and tender with a smile as they glanced up into his; and her lips looked hungry for the kiss which they invited.
quotes.author: Kate Chopin

quotes.text: You know, as long as you do everything in moderation, you don't go overboard, you don't, you know, turn your lips into guppy lips - I mean, a little zip or a little zap, that is not a big deal.
quotes.author: Suzanne Somers

quotes.text: Red lips and fragrance always top off an outfit for me.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.text: Many a sin has sullied me in body and in soul because I did not restrain my thoughts nor guard my lips: nevertheless it is to Thee, O God of majesty and love, that I turn in my extremity, for Thou art the fount of mercy; to Thee, as quickly as I may, I speed: for Thou alone canst heal me; I take refuge under Thy protection.
quotes.author: Saint Ambrose

quotes.text: I have a great body, I really do. But I want to be taken seriously as an artist, and wearing anything that shows it off will be a distraction from the music. That's how my signature uniform, my tuxedo, came about. It's classic and timeless. You'll see me in black, white, and a pop of color on my lips. That pop adds a little magic.
quotes.author: Janelle Monae

quotes.text: I have always believed that national character... depends more on the female part of society than is generally imagined. Precepts from the lips of a beloved mother... sink deep in the heart, and make an impression which is seldom entirely effaced.
quotes.author: John Marshall

quotes.text: If you want to get rich from writing, write the sort of thing that's read by persons who move their lips when they're reading to themselves.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.text: Well, I met Frank Sinatra and Bob Dylan in the space of 15 minutes. Frank Sinatra kissed me on the lips. He kissed me on the lips. And then he gave me a filterless cigarette. And then I met Bob Dylan. I came off all lightheaded and had to go sit on his dressing-room steps.
quotes.author: Kate Moss

quotes.text: Even when someone gets to looking like she should be so proud of herself, instead she's like, 'I could be another three pounds less; I could be a little taller and have bigger lips.'
quotes.author: Melissa McCarthy

quotes.text: Both sides of my family had come from Ireland in the 19th century for the same reason: There was nothing to eat over there. Since then, I've tried to make up for the potato famine by making the potato the only vegetable that passes these lips.
quotes.author: Art Donovan

quotes.text: The greatest single cause of atheism in the world today is Christians who acknowledge Jesus with their lips and walk out the door and deny Him by their lifestyle. That is what an unbelieving world simply finds unbelievable.
quotes.author: Brennan Manning

quotes.text: Flames from the lips may be produced by holding in the mouth a sponge saturated with the purest gasoline.
quotes.author: Harry Houdini

quotes.text: We've got 400,000 girls with beach-y blonde hair, the same nose, gigantic lips, implants in their cheeks, and little Chicklets for teeth. Are they really prettier?
quotes.author: Sharon Stone

quotes.text: I got a Valentine's Day card from my girl. It said, 'Take my heart! Take my arms! Take my lips!' Which is just like her. Keeping the best part for herself.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.text: What a mysterious thing madness is. I have watched patients whose lips are forever sealed in a perpetual silence. They live, breathe, eat; the human form is there, but that something, which the body can live without, but which cannot exist without the body, was missing.
quotes.author: Nellie Bly

quotes.text: I think the quality of sexiness comes from within. It is something that is in you or it isn't and it really doesn't have much to do with breasts or thighs or the pout of your lips.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.text: Topsoil is a place of digestion. It sucks and chews things into smaller pieces. When it's hungry, it turns grey and stony; when it's thirsty, it opens thousands of cracked lips. Subsoil is more skeletal: it doesn't digest.
quotes.author: Alice Oswald

quotes.text: Although skin color is undoubtedly the most salient signal of racial identity in America, other actual or imagined bodily features have also been seen as distinctive markers of Negritude. These include the shapes of heads, feet, lips, and noses as well as the texture of hair.
quotes.author: Randall Kennedy

quotes.text: There comes a moment on a journey when something sweet, something irresistible and charming as wine raised to thirsty lips, wells up in the traveller's being.
quotes.author: Patrick MacGill

quotes.text: How did it happen that their lips came together? How does it happen that birds sing, that snow melts, that the rose unfolds, that the dawn whitens behind the stark shapes of trees on the quivering summit of the hill? A kiss, and all was said.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Don't save bold lashes and red lips for nighttime - do it in the day!
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.text: Language is wine upon the lips.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: Our eyes reflect light. Better that the lips are more like a rose petal.
quotes.author: Olivier Theyskens

quotes.text: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.text: Mother is the name for God in the lips and hearts of little children.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.text: What is a poet? An unhappy person who conceals profound anguish in his heart but whose lips are so formed that as sighs and cries pass over them they sound like beautiful music.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.text: I just kind of opened up and said, 'I feel like a rag doll. I have hair and makeup people coming to my house every day and putting me in new, uncomfortable, weird dresses and expensive shoes, and I just shut down and raise my arms up for them to get the dress on, and pout my lips when they need to put the lipstick on.'
quotes.author: Jennifer Lawrence

quotes.text: I believe in running through the rain and crashing into the person you love and having your lips bleed on each other.
quotes.author: Billy Bob Thornton

quotes.text: To conceal anything from those to whom I am attached, is not in my nature. I can never close my lips where I have opened my heart.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: I've had these lips all my life, and I love them.
quotes.author: Trinny Woodall

quotes.text: I question the political judgement of those who would have the nerve to paint Christ white with his obvious African nose, lips and wooly hair.
quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.text: Listen! Clam up your mouth and be silent like an oyster shell, for that tongue of yours is the enemy of the soul, my friend. When the lips are silent, the heart has a hundred tongues.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: It seems that it had been destined before that I should occupy myself so thoroughly with the vulture, for it comes to my mind as a very early memory, when I was still in the cradle, a vulture came down to me, he opened my mouth with his tail and struck me a few times with his tail against my lips.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Be sure that you speak with unfeigned lips.
quotes.author: Marie de France

quotes.text: I was once kissed on the lips by a giraffe, and I don't think I've ever got over it.
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.text: I have a nice smile, pretty lips, and big round cheeks. They help me look like a teenager.
quotes.author: Gabourey Sidibe

quotes.text: You know, I do not think it is necessarily looks, I do not think I am the prettiest girl... Everyone has something that is their asset, some have the hair, some have the cheekbones, others have the lips. But once you know what is your asset, then you should capitalize on it.
quotes.author: Blu Cantrell

quotes.text: The moment eternal - just that and no more - When ecstasy's utmost we clutch at the core While cheeks burn, arms open, eyes shut, and lips meet!
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.text: There are accents in the eye which are not on the tongue, and more tales come from pale lips than can enter an ear. It is both the grandeur and the pain of the remoter moods that they avoid the pathway of sound.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.text: Papa, potatoes, poultry, prunes and prism, are all very good words for the lips.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: To play the trumpet, you must train your lips for a long time. When I was twelve or thirteen I was a good player, but I lost the skill and now I play very badly. I do it every day even so. The reason is that I want to return to my childhood. For me, the trumpet is evidence of the sort of young man I was.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.text: Political correctness is as exploitable as any other progressive ideal, but its aim is to stifle the incessant noise of those who flap their careless lips without a thought about those they might offend and why that might be important.
quotes.author: Marcus Brigstocke

quotes.text: The brutalities of a fight with bare hands, the crushed nasal bones, maimed lips, and other disfigurements, which call for the utter abolition of boxing in the interests of humanity, at once disappear when the contestants cover their hands with large, soft-leather gloves.
quotes.author: John Boyle O'Reilly

quotes.text: The time comes upon every public man when it is best for him to keep his lips closed.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Read my lips: no new taxes.
quotes.author: George H. W. Bush

quotes.text: The lips of the wise are as the doors of a cabinet; no sooner are they opened, but treasures are poured out before thee.
quotes.author: Akhenaton

quotes.text: Corbin Bleu was my first kiss in life. I was 12, and he was, like, my first kiss for TV... It was on the lips!
quotes.author: Keke Palmer

quotes.text: I like Chanel mascara because it has the darkest black. For my eyebrows, I brush them through to keep them groomed and in place. And for my lips, I wear lip balm. I use Kiehl's Lip Balm #1. It's really helpful during fashion week. If I keep up with these three things, I feel like I look very fresh, young, and natural.
quotes.author: Fei Fei Sun

quotes.text: I have my father to thank for my build and height, and my mother to thank for my lips and eyes.
quotes.author: Jasmine Guinness

quotes.text: How sweet the words of Truth, breathed from the lips of Love.
quotes.author: James Beattie

quotes.text: Wear some mascara, give attention to your eyebrows, and also take care of your lips.
quotes.author: Fei Fei Sun

quotes.text: It's tough to stay married. My wife kisses the dog on the lips, yet she won't drink from my glass.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: My lips are big, but my talent is bigger.
quotes.author: Fantasia Barrino

quotes.text: I don't do nostalgia. The phrase 'the good old days' never passes my lips.
quotes.author: Nicholas Haslam

quotes.text: Where lipstick is concerned, the important thing is not color, but to accept God's final word on where your lips end.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: One thing that annoys me is when you see women in these terrible and incredible situations with perfectly glossed lips. You're not going to look good in the apocalypse.
quotes.author: Sarah Wayne Callies

quotes.text: The big question is always, 'Eyes or lips?' I tend to go with the eyes because I've got a lot more material to work with now - and it saves me from reapplying lipstick! I'm a pretty low-maintenance person and it's too excessive to exaggerate both the eyes and lips.
quotes.author: Claire Danes

quotes.text: My advice is keep your lips away from the spinning things.
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.text: It's Toby Jones playing Alfred Hitchcock, not Alfred Hitchcock. We all felt that his silhouette was crucial, so his nose and lips were crucial as well. We had to build it out a bit to get the silhouette. But, with my nose being so small within the proportion of my face, the first nose was too big. I felt like a nose on parade.
quotes.author: Toby Jones

quotes.text: I would like to spare the time and effort of hack reviewers and, generally, persons who move their lips when reading.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.text: At the age of ten, I thought if a boy kissed you on the lips, you would have a baby, and I surely wasn't the only youngster who believed that!
quotes.author: Ginger Rogers

quotes.text: I still do Juvederm for my lips. I go to Dr. Ourian in Beverly Hills. He's the best, and he's super natural about it.
quotes.author: Kylie Jenner

quotes.text: To me, it's really easy to feel glamorous and beautiful with red lips. It's great because you don't have to do anything else. I don't have to do anything to my face. I can have cleanly washed hair and if I just put on like a matte red lip, it just makes everything seem special.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: Democrats couldn't care less if people in Indiana hate them. But if Europeans curl their lips, liberals can't look at themselves in the mirror.
quotes.author: Ann Coulter

quotes.text: I have my father's lopsided mouth. When I smile, my lips slope to one side. My doctor sister calls it my cerebral palsy mouth. I am very much a daddy's girl, and even though I would rather my smile wasn't crooked, there is something moving for me about having a mouth exactly like my father's.
quotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.text: Truth sits upon the lips of dying men.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.text: Let us consider the glorious Saint Paul: it seems that no other name fell from his lips than that of Jesus, because the name of Jesus was fixed and embedded in his heart.
quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quotes.text: 'Morsel' is a perfect word. Forming those six letters on the lips and tongue prompts an instantaneous physiological reaction. The mouth waters. The lips purse.
quotes.author: Shawn Amos

quotes.text: Lips are kind of like my thing, and I've always been obsessed with lipstick and lip liner. I just always went to lip liner to overline my lips, and I feel like I was really known for that. I can't walk out of my house without my lipstick!
quotes.author: Kylie Jenner

quotes.text: People who keep stiff upper lips find that it's damn hard to smile.
quotes.author: Judith Guest

quotes.text: You can preach a better sermon with your life than with your lips.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.text: The particular aspect of time that I'm interested in is the arrow of time: the fact that the past is different from the future. We remember the past but we don't remember the future. There are irreversible processes. There are things that happen, like you turn an egg into an omelet, but you can't turn an omelet into an egg.
quotes.author: Sean M. Carroll

quotes.text: The name 'Seventh-day Adventist' carries the true features of our faith in front and will convict the inquiring mind. Like an arrow from the Lord's quiver, it will wound the transgressors of God's law, and will lead to repentance toward God, and faith in our Lord Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.text: You have to relax when you're shooting an arrow. You can't be tense. And that just helps, in your day-to-day life.
quotes.author: Stephen Amell

quotes.text: Time flies like an arrow - but fruit flies like a banana.
quotes.author: Terry Wogan

quotes.text: Every aspect of human technology has a dark side, including the bow and arrow.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.text: I started to book good television jobs in 2010. I started to get really close to exceptional jobs in 2011, and then I got 'Arrow' in 2012. I know how lucky I am because just getting the lead in a pilot doesn't guarantee that that pilot is going to turn into something great.
quotes.author: Stephen Amell

quotes.text: Always grow flowers, as that will make your way full of flowers. Never grow thorns, as that will make your way thorny. Never want to target someone on an arrow. You may become the target of that arrow. Never make a well in the way of someone. As you may pass by that way sometime.
quotes.author: Rahman Baba

quotes.text: As the eagle was killed by the arrow winged with his own feather, so the hand of the world is wounded by its own skill.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: I have been called many things in my life, but if there has been but one constant, one barb, one arrow flung my way time after time, it is the accusation that I am, in essence, nothing more than an escapist. Apparently this is bad, suspect, possibly even un-American.
quotes.author: J. Maarten Troost

quotes.text: I have been practicing archery for a long time; a bow and arrow helps me to unwind.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: An arrow may fly through the air and leave no trace; but an ill thought leaves a trail like a serpent.
quotes.author: Charles Mackay

quotes.text: I do love archery in my day-to-day life because I find it very therapeutic, and I've trained every season with the bow and arrow.
quotes.author: Rose Leslie

quotes.text: Death is like an arrow that is already in flight, and your life lasts only until it reaches you.
quotes.author: Georg Hermes

quotes.text: The gigantic tension before the shooting of an arrow, and the total relaxation seconds later, is my way of connecting to the universe.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: What a man is is an arrow into the future, and what a woman is is the place the arrow shoots off from.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.text: I think what's so great about 'Arrow' is that they really ground everything in reality.
quotes.author: Seth Gabel

quotes.text: I'm about as straight an arrow as you'll find out there.
quotes.author: Deborah Norville

quotes.text: I shoot an arrow into the air, where it lands I do not care: I get my arrows wholesale!
quotes.author: Curly Howard

quotes.text: I wouldn't ever do a radio edit because I feel like it would totally go against the point of 'Follow Your Arrow.' I just think you're going to like it or not like it.
quotes.author: Kacey Musgraves

quotes.text: Certainly I feel like I'm the tip of the arrow at times because certainly the national media wants to talk about the fact that I'm a black Republican and some people think of that as zany that a black person would be a conservative but to me what is zany is any person black, white, red, brown or yellow not being a conservative.
quotes.author: Tim Scott

quotes.text: I have a black pair of suede Jimmy Choos. I've only worn them once to a Sony event. The heels have these arrow plates in a pattern. There's gold, black and white and they're amazing!
quotes.author: Jessica Mauboy

quotes.text: The more obstinately you try to learn how to shoot the arrow for the sake of hitting the goal, the less you will succeed in the one and the further the other will recede.
quotes.author: Eugen Herrigel

quotes.text: A longbow takes a massive draw for the arrow to go anywhere.
quotes.author: Luke Evans

quotes.text: My wife could give a rip about comic books, but she loves 'Arrow,' and she loves 'The Flash,' and she likes them because of the characters.
quotes.author: Andrew Kreisberg

quotes.text: To me, Green Arrow in the past, what people loved about Oliver Queen pre-New 52 was his relationships with other heroes. Like his friendship with Green Lantern, his animosity with Hawkman, his romance with Black Canary - these are all the things that sort of defined him.
quotes.author: Jeff Lemire

quotes.text: I got to dress up in funny clothes and run around New Zealand with a bow and arrow for 18 months, how bad could that be?
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.text: There's a famous tension between Green Lantern and Green Arrow in the comic books. Those guys have always been friends. They started off as not on the same page, and then they quickly became best friends.
quotes.author: Geoff Johns

quotes.text: I'm actually a pretty decent human being, and when I'm home I'm straight as an arrow.
quotes.author: Kid Rock

quotes.text: We should be exploring consciousness at the neural level and higher, where the arrow of causal analysis points up toward such principles as emergence and self-organization.
quotes.author: Michael Shermer

quotes.text: My scar is beautiful. It looks like an arrow.
quotes.author: Carly Simon

quotes.text: I keep one simple rule that I only move in one direction - I write the book straight through from beginning to end. By following time's arrow, I keep myself sane.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lethem

quotes.text: I did archery when I was in high school. In our gym class we had two weeks of archery, and I remember taking the bow and arrow and firing it up and across the street into a car parking lot.
quotes.author: John Barrowman

quotes.text: When 'Hung' got canceled, I was available for pilot season, and 'Arrow' was the first thing I auditioned for. It wasn't the first script that came to me, but it was my first audition.
quotes.author: Stephen Amell

quotes.text: Attending ComicCon for 'Arrow' was so much fun! Seeing the fans excited gets me excited and feels really good.
quotes.author: Katie Cassidy

quotes.text: I confess I didn't read the 'Green Arrow' comics before coming to play Shado. The comic books are not as easily accessible in Hong Kong as they are in the States. I do enjoy superhero fiction, though.
quotes.author: Celina Jade

quotes.text: Oh yeah, I mean, it wasn't a very good guitar, most good guitars have got thrust rods in the necks that you can adjust or that'll keep them in shape, you know keep them straight. This one just, well it turned into a bow and arrow after a couple of months.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.text: Legolas is that kind of action elf who pouts a bit, stares off to the distance, and has a couple hero moments, killing with a lethal bow and arrow along the way.
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.text: I remember how, in the corporate world, I always knew there was some higher position I could attain, which meant that, like Zeno's arrow, I was guaranteed never to arrive and always to remain dissatisfied.
quotes.author: Pico Iyer

quotes.text: I was just 20 years old when I wrote Broken Arrow.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.text: Positive psychology is not remotely intended to replace therapy or pharmacology. So when depressed, anxious or in panic or post-traumatic stress disorder, I am all for therapies that will work. Positive psychology is another arrow in the quiver of public policy and psychology through which we can raise wellbeing above zero.
quotes.author: Martin Seligman

quotes.text: I wasn't aware of Green Arrow as a kid. My thing growing up was wrestling.
quotes.author: Stephen Amell

quotes.text: When I jerked it out the head remained in my leg, where it remains still. There were a couple of inches of blood on the shaft of the arrow when I pulled it out.
quotes.author: George Crook

quotes.text: I used to come down from New Rochelle and go to Radio City. They'd have a floor show and a movie. I'm showing my age, but I saw 'Cat on a Hot Tin Roof' and 'Broken Arrow' with Jimmy Stewart. It was a great way for a kid to see a movie.
quotes.author: Vincent Pastore

quotes.text: I think being an archer is much more integral to Green Arrow and his mythos than it is to Hawkeye.
quotes.author: Jeff Lemire

quotes.text: Oliver Queen/Green Arrow is a character whose core is about legacy and responsibility. And that all comes from his father and the responsibilities of living up to his legacy.
quotes.author: Jeff Lemire

quotes.text: The Green Arrow stuff that I've responded to from the past is the Mike Grell stuff. I've liked a lot of other stuff, but I think for me, the direction and the mood and the tone that I really want is something much darker and more aggressive and really fast-paced action.
quotes.author: Jeff Lemire

quotes.text: You spend so much time writing a character the way I did with Buddy Baker and then Green Arrow that you start to care about them. And you almost think of them as people, you know?
quotes.author: Jeff Lemire

quotes.text: I think that I must be the only person who left California and headed to Dublin in pursuit of a career in film. The arrow is pointing in the other direction in most people's minds.
quotes.author: Lenny Abrahamson

quotes.text: I was a straight arrow, a control freak. I didn't do drugs or drink, and this was the '70s. I didn't like the loss of control. Which isn't exactly right, because I didn't know what happened when you did drugs.
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.text: Why do so many children love the idea of being snowed in or shipwrecked, of having to survive on one's own? When I was a child, I was no exception. I wanted to hunt with a bow and arrow like the Stone Age people: to skin deer and build my own shelter. And I desperately wanted a wolf. As we lived in London, my options were limited.
quotes.author: Michelle Paver

quotes.text: As always, things happen sooner rather than later on 'Arrow.'
quotes.author: Marc Guggenheim

quotes.text: Everything is always on the table. I think it's one of the things that's made 'Arrow' special. But we also all collectively feel like 'The Flash' needs to stand on its own two feet, now that it's gotten its launch from 'Arrow.'
quotes.author: Marc Guggenheim

quotes.text: I happen to like dark, and I like the fact that 'Arrow' is a pretty dark show, particularly for a network show.
quotes.author: Marc Guggenheim

quotes.text: On 'Arrow,' we have Ray Palmer and Roy Harper, and if you call Roy 'Ray' and Ray 'Roy,' you have to put money into the jar.
quotes.author: Marc Guggenheim

quotes.text: One of the great things about the 'Arrow' crew is that no one is settling for what they did yesterday. They're always thinking about what they can do tomorrow.
quotes.author: Marc Guggenheim

quotes.text: One of things we say on 'Arrow' is, 'The only constant is evolution.'
quotes.author: Marc Guggenheim

quotes.text: The nice thing about 'Arrow' is we never say never on the show. Hopefully the show will have a nice long life, and all manner of things can potentially happen.
quotes.author: Marc Guggenheim

quotes.text: The one thing that's always very safe to say with 'Arrow' is never make assumptions.
quotes.author: Marc Guggenheim

quotes.text: We're huge fans of 'Game of Thrones' for example, 'Orphan Black.' And even though those shows don't necessarily correlate directly with 'Arrow,' I'm a very big believer that writers are the product of their inspirations.
quotes.author: Marc Guggenheim

quotes.text: With 'The Flash' in existence, there's no real compelling reason for us to do superpowers on 'Arrow.'
quotes.author: Marc Guggenheim

quotes.text: Green Arrow has gone through so many changes; he's been right-wing, he's been left-wing, he's been rich, he's been poor, he's been a social justice guy, then when I got him, he was a rich playboy guy. So it was a lot harder to get into a character that has so many personas in the past, and I just looked at his anger.
quotes.author: Ann Nocenti

quotes.text: Green Arrow was a very complicated character to take on because he has archaic weaponry. Catwoman, I think is more of a simple archetype to grasp, so it will be about nuance. But I think you need three or four issues before you say, 'Ah ha! Now I really know how to write this character!' You're carrying them around with you.
quotes.author: Ann Nocenti

quotes.text: I know my predecessors have written a Green Arrow who has a lot of thoughts about social justice, but that was a more evolved, older, wiser Green Arrow.
quotes.author: Ann Nocenti

quotes.text: I want Green Arrow to have fun. I don't want him to be a tortured hero. I mean, I've written plenty of tortured heroes, like Daredevil. But it's all there in Daredevil's origin as to why he'd be a tortured adult. Green Arrow doesn't have that kind of origin. In fact, he's such a clean slate that he doesn't even have an origin anymore.
quotes.author: Ann Nocenti

quotes.text: I wanted the new Green Arrow to somehow sense his long, brutal past. It's like someone who has past lives they can't remember but feels occasional flashes of.
quotes.author: Ann Nocenti

quotes.text: I'm thrilled to be taking over Green Arrow. What I adore about the Arrow is his recklessness. He'll shoot off on an impulse, dispatch someone if they deserve it; his heroism is instinctive.
quotes.author: Ann Nocenti

quotes.text: I've never written a character that wasn't burdened by years of pain and trauma. Let's face it: Most comic-book heroes have some serious baggage. Not Green Arrow. He's a healthy guy - imagine that? Carrying your hero around in your head, imagining the world through his eyes, is just a hoot.
quotes.author: Ann Nocenti

quotes.text: The things that churned inside Daredevil were deeply religious, somewhat guilt-driven traces of the messianic, with his powers being a compensation for and driven by the vulnerability of being blind. Green Arrow is not driven by dark forces.
quotes.author: Ann Nocenti

quotes.text: When you choose the sword over a gun, just like Green Arrow chooses an arrow over a gun and Catwoman chooses a whip over a gun, you have to be highly skilled and highly trained. I can grab Green Arrow's bow, but I'm not strong enough to shoot it. I can grab Catwoman's whip, but have you ever tried to whip a whip? It's not easy.
quotes.author: Ann Nocenti

quotes.text: I love creating characters that people may or may have not ever seen before. But I enjoy the opportunity to try to make something new, and that's when I really come alive as an actor, so I really enjoyed working on 'Arrow.'
quotes.author: J. August Richards

quotes.text: Their crew for 'Arrow' is just one of the most wonderful crews that I've worked with. I know that actors say that all the time, and it sounds like trash coming out of my own mouth, but it's so true.
quotes.author: J. August Richards

quotes.text: My dad was a very straight arrow, prayed-at-every-meal kind of guy.
quotes.author: Chris Stapleton

quotes.text: Naturally, it was easier for me to envision becoming a novelist than it is for most people. I had two great in-house teachers; I had parents who considered a career in the arts a real possibility rather than a dreamy arrow shot into the sky.
quotes.author: Jesse Kellerman

quotes.text: My dad was an FBI agent. My mom and dad were straight arrow types, and I had a conservative, suburban Orange County upbringing.
quotes.author: Steve Breen

quotes.text: The sun doesn't shine at night, and wind power is highly variable. To meet our emissions goals, we're going to have to grasp every arrow in the quiver, and nuclear is one of those arrows.
quotes.author: Burton Richter

quotes.text: The Loden in Vancouver, where I stayed when I was filming 'The Arrow,' is a family-run hotel with a fantastic restaurant, great facilities, and brilliant people.
quotes.author: Colin Salmon

quotes.text: My university teacher and mentor Kenneth Arrow remembers me as a student who asked good questions. Although I had not previously thought of myself in that way, on reflection I think that Arrow was right.
quotes.author: Oliver E. Williamson

quotes.text: I think one of the great strengths of 'The Flash' is just how close everyone is on the show. They tend not to have these raging conflicts, like what we keep giving everybody on 'Arrow.' That show is more of a soap opera, and I don't say that derogatorily.
quotes.author: Andrew Kreisberg

quotes.text: One of the best decisions we made on the 'Arrow' pilot was to have the Deathstroke mask. Within 30 seconds, you knew you were watching a DC comics show.
quotes.author: Andrew Kreisberg

quotes.text: To get to play a bad person and do bad things in a safe environment like 'Arrow' was pretty amazing.
quotes.author: Seth Gabel

quotes.text: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.text: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.text: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Love myself I do. Not everything, but I love the good as well as the bad. I love my crazy lifestyle, and I love my hard discipline. I love my freedom of speech and the way my eyes get dark when I'm tired. I love that I have learned to trust people with my heart, even if it will get broken. I am proud of everything that I am and will become.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: What light is to the eyes - what air is to the lungs - what love is to the heart, liberty is to the soul of man.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.text: The face is the mirror of the mind, and eyes without speaking confess the secrets of the heart.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.text: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: I believe that two people are connected at the heart, and it doesn't matter what you do, or who you are or where you live; there are no boundaries or barriers if two people are destined to be together.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.text: A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.text: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.text: When people rely on surface appearances and false racial stereotypes, rather than in-depth knowledge of others at the level of the heart, mind and spirit, their ability to assess and understand people accurately is compromised.
quotes.author: James A. Forbes

quotes.text: A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: He who has not Christmas in his heart will never find it under a tree.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.text: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.text: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: I firmly believe that any man's finest hour, the greatest fulfillment of all that he holds dear, is that moment when he has worked his heart out in a good cause and lies exhausted on the field of battle - victorious.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Life is all about evolution. What looks like a mistake to others has been a milestone in my life. Even if people have betrayed me, even if my heart was broken, even if people misunderstood or judged me, I have learned from these incidents. We are human and we make mistakes, but learning from them is what makes the difference.
quotes.author: Amisha Patel

quotes.text: The highest prize in a world of men is the most beautiful woman available on your arm and living there in her heart loyal to you.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.text: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Keep close to Nature's heart... and break clear away, once in awhile, and climb a mountain or spend a week in the woods. Wash your spirit clean.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: My heart is like a singing bird.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.text: Until you have a son of your own... you will never know the joy, the love beyond feeling that resonates in the heart of a father as he looks upon his son.
quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

quotes.text: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.text: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.text: I was born with music inside me. Music was one of my parts. Like my ribs, my kidneys, my liver, my heart. Like my blood. It was a force already within me when I arrived on the scene. It was a necessity for me - like food or water.
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.text: On some great and glorious day the plain folks of the land will reach their heart's desire at last, and the White House will be adorned by a downright moron.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.text: Whatever we are waiting for - peace of mind, contentment, grace, the inner awareness of simple abundance - it will surely come to us, but only when we are ready to receive it with an open and grateful heart.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.text: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make - not just on your wedding day, but over and over again - and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.text: Fine art is that in which the hand, the head, and the heart of man go together.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: I love horror. I love 'The Shining,' 'Friday the 13th,' 'Halloween,' all those kinds of things. I love zombies, especially '28 Days Later' and '28 Weeks Later,' where the zombies are going faster than the George Romero ones. I love being scared; there's something that's awesome about your heart rate going up like that.
quotes.author: Ricky Schroder

quotes.text: If your heart is a volcano, how shall you expect flowers to bloom?
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.text: To be successful, you have to have your heart in your business and your business in your heart.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.text: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed - there's so little competition.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: If you find it in your heart to care for somebody else, you will have succeeded.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.text: Prayer is not asking. It is a longing of the soul. It is daily admission of one's weakness. It is better in prayer to have a heart without words than words without a heart.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Love means that everything is right with the world. Love and only love. Love means that you are content within your own heart and in the presence of the person that you love, who fills your day and makes you stronger and wiser, and gives you the confidence to go out into the world. Love is just the most beautiful, joyous feeling.
quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.text: The heart of a mother is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: Faith is an oasis in the heart which will never be reached by the caravan of thinking.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: A sense of humor... is needed armor. Joy in one's heart and some laughter on one's lips is a sign that the person down deep has a pretty good grasp of life.
quotes.author: Hugh Sidey

quotes.text: Despite everything, I believe that people are really good at heart.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: But people who really know me, know that I am not a bad boy at heart... I am a big teddy bear.
quotes.author: A. J. McLean

quotes.text: Survival can be summed up in three words - never give up. That's the heart of it really. Just keep trying.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.text: So long as the memory of certain beloved friends lives in my heart, I shall say that life is good.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Home is where the heart is.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.text: Courage, sacrifice, determination, commitment, toughness, heart, talent, guts. That's what little girls are made of.
quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

quotes.text: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.text: Empathy is about standing in someone else's shoes, feeling with his or her heart, seeing with his or her eyes. Not only is empathy hard to outsource and automate, but it makes the world a better place.
quotes.author: Daniel H. Pink

quotes.text: He who is cruel to animals becomes hard also in his dealings with men. We can judge the heart of a man by his treatment of animals.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.text: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: It is not the body's posture, but the heart's attitude that counts when we pray.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.text: The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: While you are proclaiming peace with your lips, be careful to have it even more fully in your heart.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.text: Faith means living with uncertainty - feeling your way through life, letting your heart guide you like a lantern in the dark.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.text: As you keep your mind and heart focused in the right direction, approaching each day with faith and gratitude, I believe you will be empowered to live life to the fullest and enjoy the abundant life He has promised you!
quotes.author: Victoria Osteen

quotes.text: Grief can be the garden of compassion. If you keep your heart open through everything, your pain can become your greatest ally in your life's search for love and wisdom.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: I took a deep breath and listened to the old bray of my heart. I am. I am. I am.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.text: If I create from the heart, nearly everything works; if from the head, almost nothing.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.text: The 'kingdom of Heaven' is a condition of the heart - not something that comes 'upon the earth' or 'after death.'
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Christmas is a season for kindling the fire for hospitality in the hall, the genial flame of charity in the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.text: If by chance some day you're not feeling well and you should remember some silly thing I've said or done and it brings back a smile to your face or a chuckle to your heart, then my purpose as your clown has been fulfilled.
quotes.author: Red Skelton

quotes.text: A lot of times I find that people who are blessed with the most talent don't ever develop that attitude, and the ones who aren't blessed in that way are the most competitive and have the biggest heart.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.text: At the heart of personality is the need to feel a sense of being lovable without having to qualify for that acceptance.
quotes.author: Paul Tournier

quotes.text: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.text: Enthusiasm is the yeast that makes your hopes shine to the stars. Enthusiasm is the sparkle in your eyes, the swing in your gait. The grip of your hand, the irresistible surge of will and energy to execute your ideas.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: My daughter loves to do art stuff. As a father, I like to play with her. We break out the big pads of paper and the glitter and all the stuff. She likes to do what she likes to do. I want to do something, too. So I've just started using her same materials - a lot of crayons, a lot of sparkle, charcoal, pencils, markers and glue.
quotes.author: Stone Gossard

quotes.text: There are a lot of parallels to the 'Sparkle' story and my story.
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: One of my most sentimental items is my grandmother's engagement ring that my mom gave me a few years ago. It's a Victorian-style setting that's closed in the back, so it doesn't sparkle the way diamonds do now. I wear it as a pendant.
quotes.author: Georgina Chapman

quotes.text: When I got sober, I thought giving up was saying goodbye to all the fun and all the sparkle, and it turned out to be just the opposite. That's when the sparkle started for me.
quotes.author: Mary Karr

quotes.text: On April 3, 2014, Jane Goodall turned 80. The iconic blond ponytail has gone gray, but the sparkle of intelligence, sly humor, and fierce dedication still shines from her hazel eyes.
quotes.author: David Quammen

quotes.text: The world is full of poetry. The air is living with its spirit; and the waves dance to the music of its melodies, and sparkle in its brightness.
quotes.author: James Gates Percival

quotes.text: Everybody loves things that sparkle.
quotes.author: Philip Treacy

quotes.text: I've never been interested in things that sparkle and shine; I'm more interested in people.
quotes.author: Ali Hewson

quotes.text: Any star can be devoured by human adoration, sparkle by sparkle.
quotes.author: Shirley Temple

quotes.text: If we do not own the freshness of the air and the sparkle of the water, how can you buy them?
quotes.author: Chief Seattle

quotes.text: Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.
quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

quotes.text: I still sing, but completely for my own pleasure. I play a nightclub singer in 'Sparkle,' but I'd like to pursue it a bit more. I sang at a friend's 60th at Claridge's the other month; I did 'Baby It's Cold Outside' with the actor Hilton McRae, and 'Somewhere Over the Rainbow.'
quotes.author: Lesley Manville

quotes.text: I'm such a believer in 'if you're beautiful on the inside it really shows on the outside.' I know a lot of people who are physically very beautiful, but their inside doesn't represent that. So to me, it just doesn't come across as having a sparkle to them or an energy that just radiates.
quotes.author: Megan Park

quotes.text: For a long time, because I'm pretty tall, I was scared to wear heels, but now I wear them all the time. I feel like I'm still discovering my stage style, but I love - well, I'm not a huge color person onstage, but I am in real life. I like short stuff, big heels, fringe, lots of fringe, sometimes sparkle, yeah!
quotes.author: Kelsea Ballerini

quotes.text: I wanted to do Dreamgirls. If they're doing a stage production of Sparkle, I think that would be hot.
quotes.author: Deborah Cox

quotes.text: I don't mind the sparkle - I think it's kind of a tradition in skating. I don't think the men really need sparkles, but for the women it's part of the glamour of our sport.
quotes.author: Kristi Yamaguchi

quotes.text: People adored Element 13's color and luster, which reminded them of the sparkle of gold and silver - a brand-new precious metal. In fact, aluminum became more precious than gold and silver in the 19th century because it was harder to obtain.
quotes.author: Sam Kean

quotes.text: It's funny. When I saw the script in my inbox and it said 'Sparkle,' I thought, 'For real? It's really called 'Sparkle?' I was wondering, too, how does 'Jordin Sparks as Sparkle' sound?
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: I'm obsessed with sparkle for men. It's so funny watching people's reaction to a disco-ball shoe!
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.text: Kingsley Amis was one of a trio of brilliant comic novelists who made English literature sparkle in the twentieth century.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.text: I like the sparkle of the vibraphone.
quotes.author: Evelyn Glennie

quotes.text: I don't know Laura Bush. But she seems to be calm, and she has a sparkle in her eye, which is good.
quotes.author: Teresa Heinz

quotes.text: I don't know Laura Bush. But she seems to be calm, and she has a sparkle in her eye, which is good. But I don't know that she's ever had a real job - I mean, since she's been grown up.
quotes.author: Teresa Heinz

quotes.text: When you first start singing something after you've written it, it has this sort of sparkle to it. And if you capture that, that's luck.
quotes.author: Jesse Harris

quotes.text: I believe everyone should have a pair of 'party pumps,' something with a little bit of sparkle that is attention grabbing and makes you happy.
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.text: With the R&B, gospel feel that 'Sparkle' has, that opens the door for my fans to be more accepting of that sound and also for me to try it.
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: 'Sparkle' fell into my lap. I had heard a little bit about it, that it was being redone in early 2011. I was just kind of like, 'Oh, that would be really cool,' and not really thinking too much about it, and then it came through my agency. I read it, I fell in love with the script and I went in to audition.
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: I was on a beach in Hawaii for a video shoot once, and it was incredibly beautiful. It had very fine black sand with a silver sparkle running through it.
quotes.author: Louise Nurding

quotes.text: You sparkle with larceny.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.text: I won't be attempting to write Jane Austen-style prose - that would be suicidal. But I will attempt to bring the highest level of my own prose, and to make it sparkle.
quotes.author: Val McDermid

quotes.text: I get a sparkle in my eye when we talk about redoing a property soup-to-nuts.
quotes.author: Eric Trump

quotes.text: I went to elementary like any other kid, but I was just always a little different. I had that sparkle, and everyone told my mom, 'She needs to be on TV, acting.'
quotes.author: Raven Goodwin

quotes.text: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.text: Enthusiasm is the yeast that makes your hopes shine to the stars. Enthusiasm is the sparkle in your eyes, the swing in your gait. The grip of your hand, the irresistible surge of will and energy to execute your ideas.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: My daughter loves to do art stuff. As a father, I like to play with her. We break out the big pads of paper and the glitter and all the stuff. She likes to do what she likes to do. I want to do something, too. So I've just started using her same materials - a lot of crayons, a lot of sparkle, charcoal, pencils, markers and glue.
quotes.author: Stone Gossard

quotes.text: There are a lot of parallels to the 'Sparkle' story and my story.
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: One of my most sentimental items is my grandmother's engagement ring that my mom gave me a few years ago. It's a Victorian-style setting that's closed in the back, so it doesn't sparkle the way diamonds do now. I wear it as a pendant.
quotes.author: Georgina Chapman

quotes.text: When I got sober, I thought giving up was saying goodbye to all the fun and all the sparkle, and it turned out to be just the opposite. That's when the sparkle started for me.
quotes.author: Mary Karr

quotes.text: On April 3, 2014, Jane Goodall turned 80. The iconic blond ponytail has gone gray, but the sparkle of intelligence, sly humor, and fierce dedication still shines from her hazel eyes.
quotes.author: David Quammen

quotes.text: The world is full of poetry. The air is living with its spirit; and the waves dance to the music of its melodies, and sparkle in its brightness.
quotes.author: James Gates Percival

quotes.text: Everybody loves things that sparkle.
quotes.author: Philip Treacy

quotes.text: I've never been interested in things that sparkle and shine; I'm more interested in people.
quotes.author: Ali Hewson

quotes.text: Any star can be devoured by human adoration, sparkle by sparkle.
quotes.author: Shirley Temple

quotes.text: If we do not own the freshness of the air and the sparkle of the water, how can you buy them?
quotes.author: Chief Seattle

quotes.text: Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.
quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

quotes.text: I still sing, but completely for my own pleasure. I play a nightclub singer in 'Sparkle,' but I'd like to pursue it a bit more. I sang at a friend's 60th at Claridge's the other month; I did 'Baby It's Cold Outside' with the actor Hilton McRae, and 'Somewhere Over the Rainbow.'
quotes.author: Lesley Manville

quotes.text: I'm such a believer in 'if you're beautiful on the inside it really shows on the outside.' I know a lot of people who are physically very beautiful, but their inside doesn't represent that. So to me, it just doesn't come across as having a sparkle to them or an energy that just radiates.
quotes.author: Megan Park

quotes.text: For a long time, because I'm pretty tall, I was scared to wear heels, but now I wear them all the time. I feel like I'm still discovering my stage style, but I love - well, I'm not a huge color person onstage, but I am in real life. I like short stuff, big heels, fringe, lots of fringe, sometimes sparkle, yeah!
quotes.author: Kelsea Ballerini

quotes.text: I wanted to do Dreamgirls. If they're doing a stage production of Sparkle, I think that would be hot.
quotes.author: Deborah Cox

quotes.text: I don't mind the sparkle - I think it's kind of a tradition in skating. I don't think the men really need sparkles, but for the women it's part of the glamour of our sport.
quotes.author: Kristi Yamaguchi

quotes.text: People adored Element 13's color and luster, which reminded them of the sparkle of gold and silver - a brand-new precious metal. In fact, aluminum became more precious than gold and silver in the 19th century because it was harder to obtain.
quotes.author: Sam Kean

quotes.text: It's funny. When I saw the script in my inbox and it said 'Sparkle,' I thought, 'For real? It's really called 'Sparkle?' I was wondering, too, how does 'Jordin Sparks as Sparkle' sound?
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.text: Enthusiasm is the yeast that makes your hopes shine to the stars. Enthusiasm is the sparkle in your eyes, the swing in your gait. The grip of your hand, the irresistible surge of will and energy to execute your ideas.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: My daughter loves to do art stuff. As a father, I like to play with her. We break out the big pads of paper and the glitter and all the stuff. She likes to do what she likes to do. I want to do something, too. So I've just started using her same materials - a lot of crayons, a lot of sparkle, charcoal, pencils, markers and glue.
quotes.author: Stone Gossard

quotes.text: There are a lot of parallels to the 'Sparkle' story and my story.
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: One of my most sentimental items is my grandmother's engagement ring that my mom gave me a few years ago. It's a Victorian-style setting that's closed in the back, so it doesn't sparkle the way diamonds do now. I wear it as a pendant.
quotes.author: Georgina Chapman

quotes.author: Mary Karr

quotes.author: David Quammen

quotes.author: James Gates Percival

quotes.author: Philip Treacy

quotes.author: Ali Hewson

quotes.text: Any star can be devoured by human adoration, sparkle by sparkle.
quotes.author: Shirley Temple

quotes.author: Chief Seattle

quotes.text: Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.
quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

I know a lot of people who are physically very beautiful, but their inside doesn't represent that. So to me, it just doesn't come across as having a sparkle to them or an energy that just radiates.

I feel like I'm still discovering my stage style, but I love - well, I'm not a huge color person onstage, but I am in real life. I like short stuff, big heels, fringe, lots of fringe, sometimes sparkle, yeah!
quotes.author: Kelsea Ballerini

quotes.author: Deborah Cox

quotes.text: I don't mind the sparkle - I think it's kind of a tradition in skating. I don't think the men really need sparkles, but for the women it's part of the glamour of our sport.
quotes.author: Kristi Yamaguchi

quotes.text: People adored Element 13's color and luster, which reminded them of the sparkle of gold and silver - a brand-new precious metal. In fact, aluminum became more precious than gold and silver in the 19th century because it was harder to obtain.
quotes.author: Sam Kean

quotes.text: It's funny. When I saw the script in my inbox and it said 'Sparkle,' I thought, 'For real? It's really called 'Sparkle?' I was wondering, too, how does 'Jordin Sparks as Sparkle' sound?
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.text: If you're white and you're wrong, then you're wrong; if you're black and you're wrong, you're wrong. People are people. Black, blue, pink, green - God make no rules about color; only society make rules where my people suffer, and that why we must have redemption and redemption now.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: The future is green energy, sustainability, renewable energy.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: He could not die when trees were green, for he loved the time too well.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.text: For in the true nature of things, if we rightly consider, every green tree is far more glorious than if it were made of gold and silver.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: Teamwork is what the Green Bay Packers were all about. They didn't do it for individual glory. They did it because they loved one another.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Despite all the hype about local or green food, the single biggest impediment to wider adoption is not research, programs, organizations, or networking. It is the demonizing and criminalizing of virtually all indigenous and heritage-based food practices.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.text: Some argue that now isn't the time to push the green agenda - that all efforts should be on preventing a serious recession. That is a false choice. It fails to recognise that climate change and our carbon reliance is part of problem - high fuel prices and food shortages due to poor crop yields compound today's financial difficulties.
quotes.author: Lucy Powell

quotes.text: Rio is an energetic, vibrant place, full of beauty and nature. But we face the kinds of problems any developing metropolis does - with pollution, traffic congestion, poverty. Distribution of green areas, for example, is not uniform. Madureira, the heart of the suburb in Rio, is a concrete jungle.
quotes.author: Eduardo Paes

quotes.text: If you have a kid who goes to kindergarten and doesn't know what a circle is, doesn't know what red and green are, and doesn't know what right and left are, by the time he learns those things, the rest of the class is far ahead of him.
quotes.author: C. Everett Koop

quotes.text: When the green woods laugh with the voice of joy, And the dimpling stream runs laughing by; When the air does laugh with our merry wit, And the green hill laughs with the noise of it.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: I'm trying to cut down a little on eating, on sodium, keep my blood pressure down, which is tough. Because I love food! I do, but it's unfair how everything that's bad for you tastes so good, and all the good stuff, veggies and green things, doesn't match up.
quotes.author: Ice Cube

quotes.text: Do not call for black power or green power. Call for brain power.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.text: I looked along the San Juan Islands and the coast of California, but I couldn't find the palette of green, granite, and dark blue that you can only find in Maine.
quotes.author: Parker Stevenson

quotes.text: Out in the lonely woods the jasmine burns Its fragrant lamps, and turns Into a royal court with green festoons The banks of dark lagoons.
quotes.author: Henry Timrod

quotes.text: I never liked apples. In fact, when I was a little girl, my mom wanted to give me apples in my lunch box and I would ask for green peppers. So bizarre... It's funny - I don't have an apple a day, but I can say that I have a few a week.
quotes.author: Lana Parrilla

quotes.text: I think if you're president, color goes away completely: you're president and it doesn't matter if you're white, green or purple.
quotes.author: Kathryn Stockett

quotes.text: The memory of that scene for me is like a frame of film forever frozen at that moment: the red carpet, the green lawn, the white house, the leaden sky. The new president and his first lady.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: I'm not a crazy granola person. I like to wear beautiful clothes, and I like having a glass of wine, but it doesn't mean I don't work out every day and drink green juices.
quotes.author: Phoebe Tonkin

quotes.text: When you have a Green Lantern mixing with a foil like Batman, you get scenes that are comic-book history. There's the epicness of it all.
quotes.author: Jim Lee

quotes.text: I learned one thing from jumping motorcycles that was of great value on the golf course, the putting green especially: Whatever you do, don't come up short.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.text: On April 16, 2010, 34 Chinese environmental organizations, including Friends of Nature, the Institute of Public and Environmental Affairs, and Green Beagle, questioned heavy metal pollution in a letter sent to CEO Steve Jobs.
quotes.author: Ma Jun

quotes.text: My passport's green.
quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

quotes.text: I made the big turnaround in the early Nineties when I started hearing all the tenth generation punk bands like Green Day and Offspring and all those people. It just made me fall in love with punk again and remember my roots, and since that time I've always wanted to do more of that kind of music again.
quotes.author: Jane Wiedlin

quotes.text: A man that studieth revenge keeps his own wounds green.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: The viral power of online media has proven how fast creative ideas can be spread and adopted, using tools like cellphones, digital cameras, micro-credit, mobile banking, Facebook, and Twitter. A perfect example? The way the Green Movement in Iran caught fire thanks to social media.
quotes.author: Tina Brown

quotes.text: The tree which moves some to tears of joy is in the eyes of others only a green thing that stands in the way. Some see nature all ridicule and deformity... and some scarce see nature at all. But to the eyes of the man of imagination, nature is imagination itself.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: Really, the proper study of economics is fulfilment, not consumption... It doesn't even matter if it's a green product or a green house... It's still consumption. What matters in this world is the fulfilment of people's needs and the fulfilment of their aspirations.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.text: I have an affinity for the old Seattle coffee shops, places like the Green Onion and the Copper Kettle, the classic kind of coffee bar - little places that served breakfast, lunch and dinner and have pretty much disappeared.
quotes.author: Tom Douglas

quotes.text: When you're green, your growing. When you're ripe, you rot.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.text: I like light green, sometimes red is fun to look at, not a fan of yellow, unless it's in a rainbow or on a coffee mug or on a happy face.
quotes.author: Chris Kattan

quotes.text: I personally think that a couple of pounds a week - maybe rising to almost £3 a week - is a reasonable price for Britain to achieve a degree of energy security to reduce its total dependence on fossil fuels and to honour its commitments to cut green house gases.
quotes.author: Tim Yeo

quotes.text: At first, my bedroom had flowers and yellow walls and huge furniture in plastic that was orange and green - and furry green bed cover and everything. Then, I think the day I turned 13, I painted the walls black and put Kurt Cobain on the wall and just changed everything into a dark theme.
quotes.author: Tove Lo

quotes.text: Relationships are like traffic lights. And I just have this theory that I can only exist in a relationship if it's a green light.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: You have to fight the green monster with your mind, not your fists.
quotes.author: Matthew Broderick

quotes.text: Sheep farming is heavily subsidized in Great Britain. Without the subsidies, the green grazing in the valley of the River Exe would be gone. The handsome agricultural landscape of which the British are so proud, carefully husbanded since Boudicca's day, would be replaced by natural growth. The most likely growth is real-estate developments.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: A bland smile is like a green light at an intersection, it feels good when you get one, but you forget it the moment you're past it.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: It's been proven by quite a few studies that plants are good for our psychological development. If you green an area, the rate of crime goes down. Torture victims begin to recover when they spend time outside in a garden with flowers. So we need them, in some deep psychological sense, which I don't suppose anybody really understands yet.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.text: At the Summer Solstice, all is green and growing, potential coming into being, the miracle of manifestation painted large on the canvas of awareness. At the Winter Solstice, the wind is cold, trees are bare and all lies in stillness beneath blankets of snow.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.text: I really explored self-awareness and emotions through 'Green Lantern.' It might sound goofy, but I do believe that emotions have power. We're all driven by something, and most of that is emotional reaction. For me, it was about recognizing my self-awareness.
quotes.author: Geoff Johns

quotes.text: Designs are increasingly winning competitions because they are literally green, and because somewhere they feature a small windmill.
quotes.author: Rem Koolhaas

quotes.text: I normally don't love green juices, but Body & Eden makes theirs tasty by blending ingredients like avocado and banana with the usual suspects like kale and spinach. Delicious as they are, they're low calorie, and the drink names are catchy: I Have Balance, I Have Energy, and my favorite, I Have Calm.
quotes.author: Gayle King

quotes.text: We don't need a melting pot in this country, folks. We need a salad bowl. In a salad bowl, you put in the different things. You want the vegetables - the lettuce, the cucumbers, the onions, the green peppers - to maintain their identity. You appreciate differences.
quotes.author: Jane Elliot

quotes.text: The pine stays green in winter... wisdom in hardship.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.text: Beauty, sweet love, is like the morning dew, Whose short refresh upon tender green, Cheers for a time, but till the sun doth show And straight is gone, as it had never been.
quotes.author: Samuel Daniel

quotes.text: Colorless green ideas sleep furiously.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: They say it's better to bury your sadness in a graveyard or garden that waits for the spring to wake from its sleep and burst into green.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.text: In order to lead a country or a company, you've got to get everybody on the same page and you've got to be able to have a vision of where you're going. America can't have a vision of health care for everybody, green economy, regulations - can't have a bunch of piece-meal activities. It's got to have a vision.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: You've always got to have the right blend of colour. You'd be silly to match a yellow t-shirt with a light green pair of trousers, you know? You can wear different colours at the same time, and as long as they blend with each other then it works. That's what I like.
quotes.author: Olly Murs

quotes.text: If your knees aren't green by the end of the day, you ought to seriously re-examine your life.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: In my dreams and visions, I seemed to see a line, and on the other side of that line were green fields, and lovely flowers, and beautiful white ladies, who stretched out their arms to me over the line, but I couldn't reach them no-how. I always fell before I got to the line.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: My mom makes something called green pie, which I thought was a delicacy that many people only had at Thanksgiving, but it turns out it was just Jell-O with whipped cream on it. And it's delicious.
quotes.author: Bobby Moynihan

quotes.text: So they all went away from the little log house. The shutters were over the windows, so the little house could not see them go. It stayed there inside the log fence, behind the two big oak trees that in the summertime had made green roofs for Mary and Laura to play under.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.text: All through my life, I didn't really consider my eyes at all, and then I became an actress. It's great, I guess. They're just in my face, and one is green and one is blue. It's different, and I'm definitely a proponent of being different in any way you can in life, so I guess if you're born a bit different that's a good thing.
quotes.author: Alice Eve

quotes.text: The garden of love is green without limit and yields many fruits other than sorrow or joy. Love is beyond either condition: without spring, without autumn, it is always fresh.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Blue, green, grey, white, or black; smooth, ruffled, or mountainous; that ocean is not silent.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.text: No water, no life. No blue, no green.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.text: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.text: I have an African gray parrot; her name is Eli. We thought she was a boy. And a blue-streaked lory named Marco. He's 10. And a yellow and green parakeet, Petey. He's very cute, but he's getting old.
quotes.author: Roz Chast

quotes.text: The only good thing about going to the fights is you can go into the green room and you can see some of your old friends that you haven't seen in a long time.
quotes.author: Robert Goulet

quotes.text: If you have forest, if you have green forest, the water table goes up. What happens with deforestation is the water level goes down and we all know how much importance drinking water has.
quotes.author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

quotes.text: The work an unknown good man has done is like a vein of water flowing hidden underground, secretly making the ground green.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.text: My coming to faith did not start with a leap but rather a series of staggers from what seemed like one safe place to another. Like lily pads, round and green, these places summoned and then held me up while I grew. Each prepared me for the next leaf on which I would land, and in this way I moved across the swamp of doubt and fear.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: Golf has an ambivalent relationship with the environment. On one hand, it's a great preserver of open spaces. Golf doesn't pave the world - it helps to green the world. But the downside is, it uses a lot of fertilizer, pesticides and water.
quotes.author: Thomas Friedman

quotes.text: I used to drink tons of caffeine. Now I make smoothies with frozen berries and Green Vibrance health powder.
quotes.author: Leighton Meester

quotes.text: I just need green. I need to wake up and see grass and squirrels. I don't want to see skyscrapers.
quotes.author: Andre Leon Talley

quotes.text: Yosemite Valley, to me, is always a sunrise, a glitter of green and golden wonder in a vast edifice of stone and space.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.text: I had to live in the desert before I could understand the full value of grass in a green ditch.
quotes.author: Ella Maillart

quotes.text: So many heroes are driven by destiny. Superman, Wonder Woman, Green Lantern, they were all chosen and born to heroism. Even with Batman, it doesn't feel like Bruce could do anything else. His whole life was leading him to become the Dark Knight.
quotes.author: Andrew Kreisberg

quotes.text: Never stay up on the barren heights of cleverness, but come down into the green valleys of silliness.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.text: I was always shocked when I went to the doctor's office and they did my X-ray and didn't find that I had eight more ribs than I should have or that my blood was the color green.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.text: For some young people, their first experience ever hearing punk rock music was playing the Green Bay Packers on 'Madden'.
quotes.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quotes.text: The irony is that the more we fight age, the more it shows. Paint on a 50-year-old face brings to mind a Gilbert and Sullivan comic figure. Smooth the cheeks, and suddenly the ear lobes and hands look out of place. Do we run around in October, painting the gold leaves green?
quotes.author: Karen DeCrow

quotes.text: I have a great time cooking and eating Thai green chicken curry.
quotes.author: Akshay Kumar

quotes.text: I was a Green Day guy because the first DVD I bought was Green Day's 'Bullet In A Bible,' the live album. That really empowered me to be not just a drummer but a performer. It's a really crucial part of why I wanted to be in a band.
quotes.author: Ashton Irwin

quotes.text: Green Day was more of the influence than Blink.
quotes.author: Deryck Whibley

quotes.text: Like many other banks and finance companies, Green Tree used a process called securitization to resell its home loans to outside investors. Green Tree grouped thousands of these small loans into a pool worth hundreds of millions of dollars.
quotes.author: Alex Berenson

quotes.text: I'm a green tea addict, though the occasional glass of red wine is nice, too.
quotes.author: Shilpa Shetty

quotes.text: I flipped through a book on harp seals in the late 1970s and saw images of them swimming in emerald green pools of water surrounded by huge sheets of ice. Right then I was hooked, and I knew this was a story I wanted to do.
quotes.author: Brian Skerry

quotes.text: Okra is the closest thing to nylon I've ever eaten. It's like they bred cotton with a green bean. Okra, tastes like snot. The more you cook it, the more it turns into string.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.text: I'm certainly getting a lot more mail... that's basically it.
quotes.author: Sam Mendes

quotes.text: Any beings advanced enough to traverse interstellar distances are at least a thousand years beyond our technical level. Spending gobs of time examining our missiles is equivalent to sending the Air Force back to the Middle Ages and insisting they examine the chain mail factories.
quotes.author: Seth Shostak

quotes.text: Learning music by reading about it is like making love by mail.
quotes.author: Luciano Pavarotti

quotes.text: At least for the people who send me mail about a new language that they're designing, the general advice is: do it to learn about how to write a compiler.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

quotes.text: I like fruit baskets because it gives you the ability to mail someone a piece of fruit without appearing insane. Like, if someone just mailed you an apple you'd be like, 'huh? What the hell is this?' But if it's in a fruit basket you're like, 'this is nice!'
quotes.author: Demetri Martin
