quotes.text: I think that hope, that ability to envision, to imagine a better way, and then to apply yourself to it, is the way to climb out of a hole, is the way to build a better life, is the way to build a better community and a better country.
quotes.author: Deval Patrick

quotes.text: Black holes provide theoreticians with an important theoretical laboratory to test ideas. Conditions within a black hole are so extreme, that by analyzing aspects of black holes we see space and time in an exotic environment, one that has shed important, and sometimes perplexing, new light on their fundamental nature.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.text: A mouse does not rely on just one hole.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.text: Politics is like football; if you see daylight, go through the hole.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Although almost every theoretical physicist agrees with my prediction that a black hole should glow like a hot body, it would be very difficult to verify experimentally because the temperature of a macroscopic black hole is so low.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: The Holocaust, taken by itself, is a black hole. To look at it directly is to be swallowed up by it.
quotes.author: David Novak

quotes.text: The artist one day falls through a hole in the brambles, and from that moment he is following the dark rapids of an underground river which may sometimes flow so near to the surface that the laughing picnic parties are heard above.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.text: Where you used to be, there is a hole in the world, which I find myself constantly walking around in the daytime, and falling in at night. I miss you like hell.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.text: I don't want to spend my life not having good food going into my pie hole. That hole was made for pies.
quotes.author: Paula Deen

quotes.text: I think the end is endless. It's either a big black hole or a big white light or both together. But it's totally meaningless, because even if someone would explain it, I wouldn't understand it.
quotes.author: Yehuda Amichai

quotes.text: I've had broken bones and cuts and dashes and tears from movies, but when I was five, my mom put the biscuits up high so we wouldn't be helping ourselves. So, one day I asked to stand up on a chair to get a biscuit, and it fell, and the corner of the chair went right into the side of my eye, and it made a big hole in there.
quotes.author: Gerard Butler

quotes.text: A good way I know to find happiness, is to not bore a hole to fit the plug.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: One of the things that I share with Bryan Becket is this hole in my childhood memory. There's about five years of my life that's virtually gone. I've thought about it a lot, and I've come to the conclusion that it might be for my own protection that those memories are gone, and maybe I don't want to dredge up those things.
quotes.author: Tim Daly

quotes.text: I know many married men, I even know a few happily married men, but I don't know one who wouldn't fall down the first open coal hole running after the first pretty girl who gave him a wink.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.text: I took the state of Ohio from an $8 billion hole and a 350,000 job loss to a $2 billion surplus and a gain of 350,000 jobs.
quotes.author: John Kasich

quotes.text: I have one good characteristic: I'm a pessimist, so I always imagine the worst - always. To me, the future is a black hole.
quotes.author: Krzysztof Kieslowski

quotes.text: My inners are not organs. They're actually mechanics, so I have a hole in my back, wind me up like the movie 'Hugo,' and then just say, 'Act,' you know?
quotes.author: Gillian Jacobs

quotes.text: Since I'm a fan of collections and anthologies, believe that the best writing often shines in shards and galloping stretches, I never find myself lobbying for a writer I enjoy reading regularly to hole up in Heidegger's hut for four or five years to bring forth a mountain.
quotes.author: James Wolcott

quotes.text: As an astronomer, I get to ignore the details of the things that we don't understand. There's a lot of work that we can do on scales that we do understand, and there is actually a finite size that I can associate with a super massive black hole.
quotes.author: Andrea M. Ghez

quotes.text: I advise all of the entrepreneurs that I know to attend at least one entrepreneurship event every week. The worst thing an entrepreneur can do is to confine his or herself to a cubby hole.
quotes.author: Vivek Wadhwa

quotes.text: Pressure is when you play for five dollars a hole with only two in your pocket.
quotes.author: Lee Trevino

quotes.text: Since I was growing up in New Zealand where there's a hole in the ozone layer above us, we get so much sun damage to our skin, and the thing we can do to look after ourselves is use sunscreen during the day, but making sure your skin is well hydrated while you sleep.
quotes.author: Rose McIver

quotes.text: Always the danger for me in life and in art is not to be brave. I am not a naturally brave person. I have to will myself not to hole up in my house and read my life away.
quotes.author: Jenny Offill

quotes.text: I've always had a longstanding dream, ever since I was a kid, where I was running on a big lake of ice and I kept running and kept running, just about to where I was trying to get to, and I fell through the ice, and then I couldn't find the hole where I fell through to get back out again.
quotes.author: Garrett Hedlund

quotes.text: What happens to the hole when the cheese is gone?
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.text: I don't believe in luck. Not in golf, anyway. There are good bounces and bad bounces, sure, but the ball is round and so is the hole. If you find yourself in a position where you hope for luck to pull you through, you're in serious trouble.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.text: When a car's ahead of you, as long as you can see it, you get a tow, just like the draft in NASCAR. Even if it's a long ways down the track, it punches a hole in the air that has to help. When you're running alone, you can feel the difference, and it shows on the clock, too.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.text: The daily calendar seemed, to me, like a kind of cartoon black hole, and you didn't have to be a rocket scientist to know that that couldn't be sustained indefinitely. That's why I pulled the plug on that one after the '02 edition. Kind of a preemptive strike.
quotes.author: Gary Larson

quotes.text: I like science fiction and physics, things like that. Planets being sucked into black holes, and the various vortexes that create possibility, and what happens on the other side of the black hole. To me it's the microcosmic study of the macrocosmic universe in man, and that's why I'm attracted to it.
quotes.author: Wesley Snipes

quotes.text: If I let a blue mood run rampant, before I know it I'm obsessing about the color of the satin lining in my coffin - will it match my dress? That's when I feel like Alice in Cancerland falling down the rabbit hole and just have to stop.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.text: It's a pity that nobody has found an exploding black hole. If they had, I would have won a Nobel prize.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: I cannot save the world; that's not what I'm trying to do. I guess I'm just trying to walk the walk and be an example to those that want it. Not everybody does, but if Mary J. Blige can come out of that same hole you were in, then you can do it, too - that's my goal: to do that without saying it, but actually live it.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.text: My healthiest habit is eating a healthy breakfast every morning. I never miss breakfast. As a busy mom, there will be days when I'm cruisin' along and I'll look at the clock and I haven't eaten lunch. And I'll run downstairs, and I'll start shovelin' stuff down the pie hole, and I'll think, 'That was no lunch at all.'
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.text: President Obama is closing the prescription drug doughnut hole. He strengthened Medicare! He extended the life of the program by eight years. And what Governor Romney and Congressman Ryan won't admit is that their plan would require current seniors to pay, on average, $600 more each year for prescription drugs.
quotes.author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

quotes.text: I would hope that understanding and reconciliation are not limited to the 19th hole alone.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

quotes.text: Our galaxy's pretty ordinary, garden-variety. So if we believe our galaxy has a super massive black hole, that tells us that most, if not all, galaxies host such a black hole at their centers.
quotes.author: Andrea M. Ghez

quotes.text: I have this desire to just while away weeks, months and years. It took me two years to make this record but that was with me trying to condense my process and not disappear down the rabbit hole with all the cool things I've collected. I could take 10 years and not explore everything I want to with these instruments.
quotes.author: Gotye

quotes.text: Now, our Sun will not collapse to a black hole. It's actually not massive enough.
quotes.author: Janna Levin

quotes.text: There used to be a huge hole in my life that I wrote many albums about. I didn't realise it was a wife-and-daughter-shaped hole. They've plugged that gap. Everything I do, I do for them now. When daddy goes to work, it's daddy going to work, not Rob going to work. I feel like there's a purpose to everything.
quotes.author: Robbie Williams

quotes.text: When you come off that last hole and you've just finished a good round of golf, life is good. When you come off that last hole and you messed it up through four or five holes and just played a lousy round of golf, it's just not a very good day. It just isn't.
quotes.author: Tom Watson

quotes.text: The thing that has always struck me is that there has always been a bit of a hole at YouTube when it comes to authenticity, human emotion, fun and play.
quotes.author: Ze Frank

quotes.text: The arms race is worse than it ever was, the dumping of creation down a military rat hole is worse than it ever was, the wars across the earth are worse than they ever were.
quotes.author: Daniel Berrigan

quotes.text: I didn't have any vices before the Internet. There are a lot of cracks in the day, moments where you don't know what to do next, so you have a little hole where you look at your phone. You want something that will mean you're not alone in that moment.
quotes.author: Miranda July

quotes.text: Mitt Romney has a history of being a great job creator. Secondly, he was a great governor. He went from billions of dollars in the hole when he became governor to billions of dollars in surplus when he left. And he went from the loss of tens of thousands jobs when he became governor to the creation of 40,000 new jobs when he left office.
quotes.author: John Kasich

quotes.text: We've demonstrated a strong track record of being very disciplined with the use of our cash. We don't let it burn a hole in our pocket, we don't allow it to motivate us to do stupid acquisitions. And so I think that we'd like to continue to keep our powder dry, because we do feel that there are one or more strategic opportunities in the future.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: A ball had passed between my body and the right arm which supported him, cutting through the sleeve and passing through his chest from shoulder to shoulder. There was no more to be done for him and I left him to his rest. I have never mended that hole in my sleeve.
quotes.author: Clara Barton

quotes.text: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
quotes.author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quotes.text: Things are not quite so simple always as black and white.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.text: Black and white are the colors of photography. To me they symbolize the alternatives of hope and despair to which mankind is forever subjected.
quotes.author: Robert Frank

quotes.text: My style is definitely schizophrenic; it does change from day to day a lot. It depends on my mood: sometimes I'll be going through a girly, childlike stage and wear a pretty lace dress with a bow in my hair. Then sometimes I'll be moody and just wear black.
quotes.author: Amber Le Bon

quotes.text: I don't see the world completely in black and white. Sometimes I do.
quotes.author: Benicio Del Toro

quotes.text: Light is meaningful only in relation to darkness, and truth presupposes error. It is these mingled opposites which people our life, which make it pungent, intoxicating. We only exist in terms of this conflict, in the zone where black and white clash.
quotes.author: Louis Aragon

quotes.text: The great thing about getting older is that you become more mellow. Things aren't as black and white, and you become much more tolerant. You can see the good in things much more easily rather than getting enraged as you used to do when you were young.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.text: Black and white is abstract; color is not. Looking at a black and white photograph, you are already looking at a strange world.
quotes.author: Joel Sternfeld

quotes.text: The white man's happiness cannot be purchased by the black man's misery.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.text: There are so many things to talk about between black people, Hispanic people, white people, gay people, men, women, it's all based on fear. We all have fears, this thing that stops us from embracing as we are one. We are never going to be one. People are messed up, but humor lets us see how ignorant we can be.
quotes.author: Marlon Wayans

quotes.text: If you're white and you're wrong, then you're wrong; if you're black and you're wrong, you're wrong. People are people. Black, blue, pink, green - God make no rules about color; only society make rules where my people suffer, and that why we must have redemption and redemption now.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: In the beginning it was all black and white.
quotes.author: Maureen O'Hara

quotes.text: You may have heard of Black Friday and Cyber Monday. There's another day you might want to know about: Giving Tuesday. The idea is pretty straightforward. On the Tuesday after Thanksgiving, shoppers take a break from their gift-buying and donate what they can to charity.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Do you realize that if you fall into a black hole, you will see the entire future of the Universe unfold in front of you in a matter of moments and you will emerge into another space-time created by the singularity of the black hole you just fell into?
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: It's a struggle for every young Black man. You know how it is, only God can judge us.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.text: Being glamorous is about strength and confidence. It's black and white - dramatic. You have to be strong.
quotes.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quotes.text: I look most like myself... when I'm wearing my black, nerdy engineering glasses.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.text: The Black skin is not a badge of shame, but rather a glorious symbol of national greatness.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.text: Life isn't black and white. It's a million gray areas, don't you find?
quotes.author: Ridley Scott

quotes.text: I never saw music in terms of men and women or black and white. There was just cool and uncool.
quotes.author: Bonnie Raitt

quotes.text: There's so much grey to every story - nothing is so black and white.
quotes.author: Lisa Ling

quotes.text: Freedom would be not to choose between black and white but to abjure such prescribed choices.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.text: I've read quite a few readers' reviews of my book on Amazon, saying, 'Ah, he criticises the free market, he advocates central planning.' I don't do that for a minute! But this is our black and white, dichotomous way of thinking - which has really been harmful.
quotes.author: Ha-Joon Chang

quotes.text: Some white people hate black people, and some white people love black people, some black people hate white people, and some black people love white people. So you see it's not an issue of black and white, it's an issue of Lovers and Haters.
quotes.author: Eden Ahbez

quotes.text: I am a bit sickie happy. I am prone to black clouds too, but... I am embarrassed about them. It's like: 'My diamond shoes are too tight. My money clip doesn't fit all my fifties.' I mean - really. Shut up.
quotes.author: Olivia Colman

quotes.text: If it's lawful to have a rifle club to kill pheasants, it should be just as lawful to have one to kill wolves or dogs that are being sicked on little black babies. In fact, it's constitutional. Article Number Two of the constitution guarantees the right of every citizen to own a rifle or a shot gun.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: I spent a lot of years trying to outrun or outsmart vulnerability by making things certain and definite, black and white, good and bad. My inability to lean into the discomfort of vulnerability limited the fullness of those important experiences that are wrought with uncertainty: Love, belonging, trust, joy, and creativity to name a few.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.text: Actually I don't remember being born, it must have happened during one of my black outs.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.text: The injustices endured by black Americans at the hands of their own government have no parallel in our history, not only during the period of slavery but also in the Jim Crow era that followed.
quotes.author: Jim Webb

quotes.text: We must always embrace individual liberty and enforce the constitutional rights of all Americans-rich and poor, immigrant and native, black and white.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.text: When black women are down with you and in your corner, you have an ally that will move Heaven and Earth.
quotes.author: Tyler Perry

quotes.text: Any style that Nike makes in all black, shoe, sweatshirt, onesie, doesn't matter, I pretty much need to have.
quotes.author: Alexander Wang

quotes.text: I rolled the second car that I ever owned, a Toyota 4 Runner. This was winter in Colorado, two weeks before the 2002 Olympic trials. I was driving in the outside lane, and my rear tire caught some black ice, and we totally turned sideways to the point where we were heading right toward the median.
quotes.author: Apolo Ohno

quotes.text: Black holes can bang against space-time as mallets on a drum and have a very characteristic song.
quotes.author: Janna Levin

quotes.text: Rebecca Black might sing like a robot, but that's just proof she has evolved beyond us. Her vocal is just a slightly exaggerated version of the robot glitch-twitch stutter that's been mainstream pop vocalese for the past 10 years or so.
quotes.author: Rob Sheffield

quotes.text: I always wanted to scuba dive. I used to scuba dive undercover like black Aquaman.
quotes.author: Bernie Mac

quotes.text: Six is the hardest number for me to experience, the smallest. It's the absence of something - it's cold, dark, almost like a black hole. If someone tells me they are depressed, I might imagine myself in the hole of a six to help me empathise.
quotes.author: Daniel Tammet

quotes.text: My dream part would be to play Mitt Romney's sarcastic black maid. We could call it 'Mammy & Me.'
quotes.author: Natasha Leggero

quotes.text: I'm jamming 'Black Sabbath Vol. 4' all the time. Zappa's 'Cruising With Ruben & The Jets.' A lot of Gong lately. Some Hawkwind. The Residents' 'Duck Stab' is amazing. Some Fugs. Lots of stuff, man. I'm pretty schizophrenic with records.
quotes.author: Ty Segall

quotes.text: I have found people on both sides of the aisle, white and black, that'll give you the shirt off their back. And I've also found people that won't give you a piece of bread if you're starving to death.
quotes.author: Al Green

quotes.text: General relativity predicts that time ends inside black holes because the gravitational collapse squeezes matter to infinite density.
quotes.author: Lee Smolin

quotes.text: I don't understand people who dream in black and white. I just don't get it. My dreams have always been vivid color.
quotes.author: Gary Ross

quotes.text: When donors visited the Black Panther Party, they came and saw our real programs, a real clinic, with real doctors and medics, giving service to people.
quotes.author: Bobby Seale

quotes.text: Personality is the glitter that sends your little gleam across the footlights and the orchestra pit into that big black space where the audience is.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: There was a manifesto in the late '60s/early '70s, and it basically laid out what 'black art' was and that it should embrace black history and black culture. There were all these rules - I was shocked, when I found it in a book, that it even existed, that it would demarcate these artists.
quotes.author: Kara Walker

quotes.text: The black market was a way of getting around government controls. It was a way of enabling the free market to work. It was a way of opening up, enabling people.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.text: When I get 13 or 14 years old, I get crazy with rock music, like, like, deeply crazy. And one of my favorite bands at that moment was, for example, like - bands like Metallica or Led Zeppelin, Black Sabbath, Pink Floyd and Santana, you know? And then I start to play metal, actually, when I was - at the age of 15.
quotes.author: Juanes

quotes.text: Won't it be wonderful when black history and native American history and Jewish history and all of U.S. history is taught from one book. Just U.S. history.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: I wear black because I'm comfortable in it. But then in the summertime when it's hot I'm comfortable in light blue.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.text: In my work and in myself I reflect black people, women and men, as I reflect others. One day even the most self-protective ones will look into the mirror I provide and not be afraid.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.text: I am not a black artist, I am an artist.
quotes.author: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quotes.text: I want to be the voice of the people; black, white, everyday, oppressed people. A person trying to make it and to do it right.
quotes.author: Common

quotes.text: I really can't break away from wearing black and leather!
quotes.author: Natalia Kills

quotes.text: I do not make any apologies for my manner or personality. I come from a long line of very strong, black African-American women who neither bend nor bow. I haven't had very good modeling in submission.
quotes.author: Faye Wattleton

quotes.text: Like myself, President Obama is the father of two daughters. He understands the obstacles that they face as women, but he also understands the emergency of the state of young black men in America.
quotes.author: Al Sharpton

quotes.text: Do not call for black power or green power. Call for brain power.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.text: Reggae music don't really focus on one thing, you know. If reggae music is speaking about the struggle of people, and the suffering, it don't mean black people. It mean people in general.
quotes.author: Burning Spear

quotes.text: Half of the modern world goes back as far as Pearl Jam. The real historians go back to U2. But they need to go back further. They have to go back to the '50s and '60s, where things started. That's how you get to be your own personality, by studying the masters. Rock and roll was white kids trying to make black music and failing, gloriously!
quotes.author: Steven Van Zandt

quotes.text: Black men struggle with masculinity so much. The idea that we must always be strong really presses us all down - it keeps us from growing.
quotes.author: Donald Glover

quotes.text: Me don't dip on nobody's side. Me don't dip on the black man's side, not the white man's side. Me dip on God's side, the one who create me and cause me to come from black and white.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: The process of delving into the black abyss is to me the keenest form of fascination.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.text: Governmental intervention and personal responsibility are not mutually exclusive issues, but they do frame a 'do it ourselves' vs. 'what are you doing for us' debate. For the black community, that's a debate that's been raging at least as far back as the W.E.B. Du Bois, Booker T. Washington philosophical grudge matches.
quotes.author: John Ridley

quotes.text: It's not hard to get your way when it's your way or the highway. People either follow suit or they're not around. I don't really like the sound of that, 'cause that sounds like a temper tantrum. I'm just very black and white when it comes to my business. There's really no gray area.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.text: It is no good getting furious if you get stuck. What I do is keep thinking about the problem but work on something else. Sometimes it is years before I see the way forward. In the case of information loss and black holes, it was 29 years.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: And when I was angry, when I was younger, I was in a cocoon. Now I'm a beautiful, black butterfly.
quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

quotes.text: Black magic operates most effectively in preconscious, marginal areas. Casual curses are the most effective.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.text: In a sense the quest for the emancipation of black people in the U.S. has always been a quest for economic liberation which means to a certain extent that the rise of black middle class would be inevitable.
quotes.author: Angela Davis

quotes.text: I had great admiration for the election of President Obama. I believe that the U.S. at that moment showed tremendous capacity to show that it is a great nation, and it surprised the world. It may be very difficult to be able to elect a black president in the U.S. - as it was very difficult to elect a woman president in Brazil.
quotes.author: Dilma Rousseff

quotes.text: But suppose God is black? What if we go to Heaven and we, all our lives, have treated the Negro as an inferior, and God is there, and we look up and He is not white? What then is our response?
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.text: I am a picky eater. By that I mean, I love to pick the raisins out of oatmeal raisin cookies, the chips out of chocolate chip cookies, the white side off of black and white cookies, and the vanilla center out of Oreos.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.text: There is an entire generation of young people who know nothing about how viciously the FBI attacked The Black Panther Party, and why.
quotes.author: Bobby Seale

quotes.text: I'm here because I stand on many, many shoulders, and that's true of every black person I know who has achieved.
quotes.author: Vernon Jordan

quotes.text: Living is strife and torment, disappointment and love and sacrifice, golden sunsets and black storms. I said that some time ago, and today I do not think I would add one word.
quotes.author: Laurence Olivier

quotes.text: I decorated my house like a medieval gothic castle, European-style. Chandeliers and red velvet curtains. My bedroom is pink and black, my bathroom is totally Hello Kitty, I have a massive pink couch and a big antique gold cross.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.text: Funny is not a color. Being black is only good from the time you get from the curtain to the microphone.
quotes.author: Flip Wilson

quotes.text: Newman's second law: Just when things look darkest, they go black.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.text: When I was a kid, I knew the black and white version of 'Jane Eyre,' and I guess I became interested in the idea of romantic love - of unrequited love and the tragedies of that; of what are the important things in life; what should one value over other materials.
quotes.author: Cary Fukunaga

quotes.text: Religion looms as large as an elephant in the United States, to the point that being nonreligious is about the biggest handicap a politician running for office can have, bigger than being gay, unmarried, thrice married, or black.
quotes.author: Frans de Waal

quotes.text: Hillary Clinton could say she was a woman and running for president. And Sarah Palin could say she was a woman and running for vice-president. But Obama couldn't say, 'I'm black and I'm running for president.' It couldn't come out of his mouth. He couldn't say that because, if he did, he'd lose votes.
quotes.author: Paul Mooney

quotes.text: I have a great body, I really do. But I want to be taken seriously as an artist, and wearing anything that shows it off will be a distraction from the music. That's how my signature uniform, my tuxedo, came about. It's classic and timeless. You'll see me in black, white, and a pop of color on my lips. That pop adds a little magic.
quotes.author: Janelle Monae

quotes.text: Remember the first time you went to a show and saw your favorite band. You wore their shirt, and sang every word. You didn't know anything about scene politics, haircuts, or what was cool. All you knew was that this music made you feel different from anyone you shared a locker with. Someone finally understood you. This is what music is about.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.text: You go to Brooklyn, everybody's got a beard and plaid shirt. They may be able to tell each other apart, but they all look alike to me.
quotes.author: Don Lemon

quotes.text: I have found people on both sides of the aisle, white and black, that'll give you the shirt off their back. And I've also found people that won't give you a piece of bread if you're starving to death.
quotes.author: Al Green

quotes.text: I went to a Catholic School, and underneath my school uniform, I wore a metal shirt.
quotes.author: George Stroumboulopoulos

quotes.text: The high point of my career was winning the Champions League. No one will ever erase that from my memory, in the same way that no one will ever erase the fact that I did it in a Manchester United shirt.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.text: To mark the 10-year anniversary of 9/11, I wanted to launch an FDNY shirt that pays tribute to the brave first responders who, like my father, risk their lives in the line of duty on a regular basis. All of the proceeds raised from the sale of the T-shirt benefit the New York Police & Fire Widows' & Children's Benefit Fund.
quotes.author: Mark Sanchez

quotes.text: I find it hard to relax around any man who's got the second button on his shirt undone.
quotes.author: Bill Nighy

quotes.text: I am inspired by anything beautiful. Sometime it's a pair of eyes or flowing gorgeous hair, other times it's the sky or a sunset. I've been inspired by supple skin or the texture of a soft shirt.
quotes.author: Nadine Velazquez

quotes.text: Many thanks for all of the love and good wishes sent our way from my friends out there in cartoon land... the only place where a nine month pregnant woman can still play a hot goth chick in a belly shirt!
quotes.author: Grey DeLisle

quotes.text: If commercialization is putting my art on a shirt so that a kid who can't afford a $30,000 painting can buy one, then I'm all for it.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.text: You can be 24 and continue to live like you're at college, or even continue to live like you're in high school. Or you can put on a shirt and tie and pretend to be an adult.
quotes.author: Ezra Koenig

quotes.text: The suit does not represent the businessman anymore. Nor does the loud shirt represent the rock star. The same man can now wear both.
quotes.author: Donatella Versace

quotes.text: Beware of the naked man who offers you his shirt.
quotes.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quotes.text: I know when I wear a Led Zeppelin shirt, I am happy to put that Led Zeppelin shirt on. It's not, 'Well, they kind of suck.'
quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

quotes.text: If you want to have clean ideas, change them as often as your shirt.
quotes.author: Francis Picabia

quotes.text: I met this homeless man who had never owned a shirt in his life. He had taken his pants and worn them as a shirt and I thought it was so creative. He was liberated from the conventions of fashion.
quotes.author: Julia Stiles

quotes.text: Since I was a child, I hated having to deal with my hair. I hated having to change my clothes. As a kid, I had a sailor shirt and the same old corduroy pants, and that's what I wanted to wear everyday.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.text: Surface R&B doesn't work any more. The whole heartthrob thing, songs about unrealistic love and tearing your shirt off every show - that's not really where it's at any more. It's becoming harder for those guys to sell records, and harder for them to succeed.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.text: I grew up in the 90s in the time of grunge when if you didn't go on stage in jeans and a T shirt you weren't 'real.' That seemed ridiculous to me.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.text: I feel a bit awkward playing in a red shirt out at Wimbledon. But I don't dislike it.
quotes.author: Roger Federer

quotes.text: It's just an ice bucket with a bottle in it. The two flute glasses are little tray. I got to shut the curtains. I'm in my boxer shorts and shirt. I'm going to take a bath and go to bed. But I want to shut the blinds so it's really dark in the room.
quotes.author: Danny DeVito

quotes.text: I think a fragrance is more of a signature than even what you wear - something you'll remember more down the road than a shirt.
quotes.author: Ryan Reynolds

quotes.text: You start out giving your hat, then you give your coat, then your shirt, then your skin and finally your soul.
quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

quotes.text: Nothing impresses the ladies like a clean, pressed pair of khakis and a large pattern shirt featuring either classic cars, mojitos or men playing golf.
quotes.author: Tim Heidecker

quotes.text: I still have the shirt I wore my first time on Johnny Carson's show. Only now I use it as a tablecloth at dinner parties. It was very blousy.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.text: Just wearing all black comes from Johnny Cash. I'm on the road so much that if I wear all black, my clothes never get dirty. You can't tell if I've worn the same shirt twice.
quotes.author: G-Eazy

quotes.text: This shirt is dry clean only. Which means... it's dirty.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.text: I like What Goes Around Comes Around for old concert tees. Oh man, I got this 'Sgt. Pepper' cartoon Beatles shirt there; it was, like, $300. I didn't even know how much it cost - I thought it was gonna be, like, $80 at most - till I got to the register and was like, 'Oh mah gawd!' Good Lord. But it's classic vintage rock, you know?
quotes.author: Kid Cudi

quotes.text: How do you know someone is a grandparent? They've got milk stains on every shirt from burping babies. Their pants are worn out at the knees from crawling around giving pony rides. They have 2,842 pictures of the grandkids on their smart phone and not one photo of their spouse.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: When you start your career, you have to figure out a way to separate yourself from the pack. So I went for a kind of preppy, psycho-killer look: I had short hair, grey flannel pants, and a button-down shirt. I think it worked, because nobody else was looking that way at that time.
quotes.author: Loudon Wainwright III

quotes.text: I am a huge, huge fan of the plain white tee. A good-fitting, vintage plain white t-shirt, like the 'boyfriend shirt', is the sexiest thing a girl can wear. It goes with anything, fancy or casual.
quotes.author: Zoe Kravitz

quotes.text: Shoes make an outfit. You can throw on a crazy shirt and crazy pants but you add those shoes - done.
quotes.author: Russell Westbrook

quotes.text: Getting away from a white or light colored tuxedo shirt is always a little dangerous. Certain staples shouldn't be mixed with. Light pink or blue is not bad, but again, you're just breaking from a classic.
quotes.author: Paul Feig

quotes.text: When I took my shirt off against Caen, everybody asked what these new tattoos were. I had 15 removable tattoos on my body; they are the names of real people who are suffering from hunger in the world.
quotes.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quotes.text: In terms of having a business, I wanted to let it go beyond what my personal taste is. Basically, I'm in a kilt and a white shirt every day. So, you know, I don't have a lot of scope, and I'm really picky about what I wear.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.text: Religion is not changed as easily as a shirt.
quotes.author: Henry IV

quotes.text: In junior high P.E., I was way too shy to take a shower in front of the other kids. It was a horribly awkward time - body hair, odors... So I'd go from my sweaty shirt back into my regular clothes and have to continue the day.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.text: One name always stands out when it comes to actors taking on the monsters of our nightmares - Robert Englund. In the 'Nightmare on Elm Street' series, Englund kept us awake as night with a striped shirt and his special glove.
quotes.author: Rob Manuel

quotes.text: I got live tweeted once by someone who was opposite my home in some rented accommodation. He was actually describing on twitter what I was doing. 'I took a shirt off, I went to the window, I put a shirt back on... ' And I've got blinds in my flat!
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.text: Honestly, if a girl's wearing, like, a Gucci shirt with a Gucci belt and a purse and a visor, that's not cute at all. You can't get away with that - with me - but you can always sprinkle it in there with your own stuff, and it's all good.
quotes.author: Kreayshawn

quotes.text: To be on television and have my nieces and nephews see me, and seeing them wear my shirt to the games and be proud, it's so sweet. Sometimes it feels like it's just a dream.
quotes.author: Sue Wicks

quotes.text: I am always looking for a cool tee shirt; maybe one with a rock band or an old advertisement.
quotes.author: Bridget Hall

quotes.text: In a big Bollywood romantic film, taking my shirt off and spreading the hand towards the mountain with dancers behind me are not my cup of tea.
quotes.author: Vir Das

quotes.text: I'm a jacket man. And if I'm without one, I am kind of seriously disabled. I don't know how to operate in shirt sleeves.
quotes.author: Bill Nighy

quotes.text: My shirt and my hat always say 'World Champion' in some language. English, Spanish, Chinese, 'Star Wars' language, which is also known as Aurebesh, mermaid language.
quotes.author: Judah Friedlander

quotes.text: I'm not a model; hence I don't see the reason to have a six-pack abs. I can pull off a tough and rugged look of a cop in 'Dhoom' series without taking my shirt off. Cops don't have to move around without a shirt to flaunt their machismo. What makes the character of a cop stand out is his attitude and not his six-pack abs.
quotes.author: Abhishek Bachchan

quotes.text: It's not a bad day at work when you just have to take your shirt off for a big franchise movie. There are worse jobs out there!
quotes.author: Chaske Spencer

quotes.text: Actors want to act; actors want to emote. It's like the emotional equivalent of tearing your shirt off and screaming to the heavens: you want to express, and you want to be seen to be expressing.
quotes.author: Joel Edgerton

quotes.text: When my dad was badly weakened by the flu and my mom wanted to call an ambulance to take him to the emergency room, he wouldn't go unless he could shave first and change into a nice shirt and a pair of slacks.
quotes.author: Rich Lowry

quotes.text: When I wear the national team shirt, its sole contact with my skin makes it stand on an end.
quotes.author: Diego Maradona

quotes.text: Mainly it's the parents who remember me. But the kids today, what they do is go and Google you. A lot of them turn up and they know everything about me. They say: 'You scored 346 goals' or 'You wore the No9 shirt for Liverpool.'
quotes.author: Ian Rush

quotes.text: I have this complex that if I walk into a place wearing a colorful shirt someone will stop me and say, 'I'm sorry, but the Latin band comes through the other door.'
quotes.author: Oscar de la Renta

quotes.text: Everybody who is anyone wanted to meet a real life gangster, and here's Joey Gallo hitting the scene. What more could you want with a gangster? He looked the part. They call it gangster chic. He dressed like the 'Reservoir Dogs' - black suit, white shirt, skinny black tie. You know, he had the whole look down. And the big shades, of course.
quotes.author: Tom Folsom

quotes.text: I am very much a person who appreciates perennial things. Things like a Lacoste shirt, a Clarks desert boot, Persol sunglasses and Vans shoes that have been the same forever. There are certain things that once you find it, you like it and it's done. I like Italian clothing, like suits from Battistoni and I have a shirt by Piero Albertelli.
quotes.author: Roman Coppola

quotes.text: The most difficult thing for me is a portrait. You have to try and put your camera between the skin of a person and his shirt.
quotes.author: Henri Cartier-Bresson

quotes.text: A healthy body means a healthy mind. You get your heart rate up, and you get the blood flowing through your body to your brain. Look at Albert Einstein. He rode a bicycle. He was also an early student of Jazzercise. You never saw Einstein lift his shirt, but he had a six-pack under there.
quotes.author: Steve Carell

quotes.text: When I was a young boy I wanted to play for Newcastle United, I wanted to wear the number nine shirt and I wanted to score goals at St James' Park. I've lived my dream and I realise how lucky I've been to have done that.
quotes.author: Alan Shearer

quotes.text: Maybe I should drive a hybrid. I do have a shirt that says, 'Go Green.'
quotes.author: Amanda Seyfried

quotes.text: For me, it's important that a fan can buy something that is related to me. Like in soccer, you buy a shirt and it's got somebody's name on the back. That's kind of a cool thing.
quotes.author: Roger Federer

quotes.text: I have a really basic uniform: in winter, black tights and any old dress that I can throw on. In summer, high-waisted jeans and this shirt, or that shirt, and a cashmere cardigan just in case.
quotes.author: Claudia Schiffer

quotes.text: The thing about the basics is they don't really change - it's the details and the proportions that change. The shirt may be cut slimmer or looser, the suit might be darker or lighter, the sneakers might not have laces, but you're still talking about shirts and suits and sneakers.
quotes.author: John Varvatos

quotes.text: When lifting, I'm always with a trainer because the thing that makes a difference is that last 20% in your training, and he very scientifically looks after my food as well, because when I'm going for a 'shirt off' shot, everything changes the month before, and I'm timed down to the day.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.text: I hate watching me. I hate watching me. It just makes me feel awful. I think, 'I look stupid from that angle. I wish I didn't let them put that shirt on me.'
quotes.author: Jesse Eisenberg

quotes.text: I'm not going to take my shirt off in every movie.
quotes.author: Morris Chestnut

quotes.text: An income tax form is like a laundry list - either way you lose your shirt.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.text: I prefer 100 per cent cotton Ts. They are kinder to lumps and bumps than figure-hugging stretchy Lycra ones and feel nicer against the skin. Extra-long-sleeved T-shirts are a lifesaver for me. I wear them either underneath a shirt with the sleeve pulled out of the cuff, or underneath gypsy tops, tunic tops and waistcoats.
quotes.author: Twiggy

quotes.text: I need to have a quick wardrobe. Two or three blazers with dark gray pants, two pairs of jeans, two light blue shirts, a casual shirt, two pairs of shoes, one formal one not. Small accessories like Tod's Greca belt and our woven bracelets for a wild touch.
quotes.author: Diego Della Valle

quotes.text: I'm really not a fascist. Everyone wears what they feel great in, or comfortable with. It's a beautiful day, you have an armless shirt: it goes with flip-flops.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: When I go out or to an event, I'll wear blue jeans and a shirt. And sometimes when I go to an event I'll wear camouflage. It depends what kind of mood I'm in.
quotes.author: Si Robertson

quotes.text: I've always looked the same. Since I was a child, I hated having to deal with my hair. I hated having to change my clothes. As a kid, I had a sailor shirt and the same old corduroy pants, and that's what I wanted to wear everyday.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.text: And I was victim to that very early in my career, where I would go into auditions, and I'd be wearing a big T shirt, a big baggy T shirt and loose jeans. You know, to try and show people that there was more to me than just that.
quotes.author: Charlize Theron

quotes.text: When I was in high school in the '50s you were supposed to be an Elvis Presley, a James Dean, a Marlon Brando or a Kingston Trio type in a button-down shirt headed for the fraternities at Stanford or Cal.
quotes.author: Robert Hass

quotes.text: Well, you know, it's been interesting because an album is just a snapshot of where you are at that time. Not all pictures of everybody are just in jeans and a 'T' shirt, or a ball gown. You have many different sides and this is a snapshot of where you are at that time.
quotes.author: Diana Krall

quotes.text: I have always found it an honor that people have wanted to buy my shirt and an honor that fans turn up to watch the team I am playing in. I have always found that a huge honor.
quotes.author: David Beckham

quotes.text: My biggest style inspirations come from the '90s. I'm really inspired by TLC, Janet Jackson, and designers like Jeremy Scott. I'm hugely inspired by Club Kids from New York back in the '90s. I'm inspired by the drag queen scene. Combat boots and the torn off jeans and a baggy shirt - I love that look.
quotes.author: Kat Graham

quotes.text: I find my dress sense tends to be a bit of a mixture between high fashion and unique vintage pieces with a little bit of street trends. For example, I might find a really nice, suede dinner jacket that I'd wear with a basic plain white shirt and some chinos and a pair of Nike trainers.
quotes.author: Tinie Tempah

quotes.text: To wear a floral shirt is an experience.
quotes.author: Brian Wilson

quotes.text: I've never got on with the British press because they've always given me such a hard time. Once they build a band up they just want to do people down. They shouldn't concentrate on the colour of someone's shirt they should listen to the music.
quotes.author: Andrew Eldritch

quotes.text: Whether it's as the hero of an adventure story, as teacher and friend, as icon on watch, shirt or hat - everyone knows Mickey Mouse.
quotes.author: Warren Spector

quotes.text: After assessing what's in your closet, make a list of what you need. Not want, but need. Write down the basics missing from your wardrobe. It could be a classic white shirt, a trenchcoat, or the perfect little black dress. Whatever the blank spots, write them down. This will be your reference for shopping.
quotes.author: Nina Garcia

quotes.text: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Own only what you can always carry with you: know languages, know countries, know people. Let your memory be your travel bag.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.text: I had done a fair bit of traveling during the holidays in my school days with my guitar and discovered that I could live on it. Admittedly, I traveled with a sleeping bag but I could always find somewhere to lay my head.
quotes.author: Jeremy Irons

quotes.text: The only way to see a movie is in a big theater, on a big screen, with a big bag of popcorn.
quotes.author: Dan Glickman

quotes.text: If I'm traveling, I'll pack socks in my bag - really cute furry ones.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.text: One day Mum saved up for this exciting new thing - a frozen chicken. She cooked it on the Sunday and we all sat around waiting for it, but there was a terrible smell from the kitchen. She didn't realise that the giblets were in a plastic bag inside it. We just ate vegetables and she cried and cried.
quotes.author: Carol Vorderman

quotes.text: I shall take all the troubles of the past, all the disappointments, all the headaches, and I shall pack them in a bag and throw them in the East River.
quotes.author: Trygve Lie

quotes.text: There's not as much oxygen in that hot gym and I think it's great for conditioning. I believe in a lot of boxing. You can train and work on the speed bag and heavy bag, but when you get in the ring with another fighter, it's a different story. Punches are coming at you, there's physical contact, muscle against muscle.
quotes.author: Emanuel Steward

quotes.text: I was teased if I brought my books home. I would take a paper bag to the library and put the books in the bag and bring them home. Not that I was that concerned about them teasing me - because I would hit them in a heartbeat. But I felt a little ashamed, having books.
quotes.author: Walter Dean Myers

quotes.text: Actually, because of new technologies, my full studio is on my laptop. And I have a little keyboard in my bag. I can make everything I do come from my laptop. Even when I go to a big studio, all I do is to plug in my laptops. That's they way I do it.
quotes.author: David Guetta

quotes.text: Remember, you must not sleep at the Seder. If you do, Elijah the Prophet will come with a bag on his shoulders. On the two first nights of Passover, Elijah the Prophet goes about looking for those who have fallen asleep at the Seder, and takes them away in his bag.
quotes.author: Sholom Aleichem

quotes.text: The base paths belonged to me, the runner. The rules gave me the right. I always went into a bag full speed, feet first. I had sharp spikes on my shoes. If the baseman stood where he had no business to be and got hurt, that was his fault.
quotes.author: Ty Cobb

quotes.text: I've never changed my life since I was 4 and went to the YMCA with a gym bag. I still have that philosophy. In fact, I still have that gym bag.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.text: Some people are drawn naturally - there are natural guitarists, and there are natural piano players, and I think guitar implies travel, a sort of footloose gypsy existence. You grab your bag and you go to the next town.
quotes.author: Hugh Laurie

quotes.text: You punch me, I punch back. I do not believe it's good for one's self-respect to be a punching bag.
quotes.author: Ed Koch

quotes.text: I make some of my best recipes with a simple homemade stock. Keep shrimp shells stored in a plastic bag in the freezer. When you have almost a gallon-bag full, you can make a stock in 30 minutes that you can use in soups and sauces. You can then freeze the stock in ice-cube trays.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.text: I'm thankful for the three ounce Ziploc bag, so that I have somewhere to put my savings.
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.text: Just get a bag and drop a dream in it, and you'll be surprised what happens.
quotes.author: Charles Nelson Reilly

quotes.text: I want my handbags and my shoes to be stylish but I want to make sure that they're versatile. I travel and I have to make sure the pieces I put into my bag can go with a dress or with shorts or jeans.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.text: In baseball, democracy shines its clearest. The only race that matters is the race to the bag. The creed is the rule book. And color, merely something to distinguish one team's uniform from another's.
quotes.author: Ernie Harwell

quotes.text: I am not that attached to material things. And the good thing is I can make choices. I have very few possessions. Luckily, as a man you don't need much... a few papers, a couple of books, and a few shirts, jackets, sweaters. It fits in a little thing, in a paper bag, so it's very easy.
quotes.author: Nicolas Berggruen

quotes.text: Take, if you must, this little bag of dreams, Unloose the cord, and they will wrap you round.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: I hate the hand that comes out of a car and just drops litter in the street. I hate that! For some reason, it just fills me with fury! It's just utter laziness, lack of interest in other people, lack of interest in the planet, in the hedgehog who might eat the plastic bag, it's a lack of concern.
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.text: Matching your hat to your shoe to your bag, or your necklace to your earrings, has a tendency to look dated. Mixing up your accessories adds interest to an outfit, and can make you look much more modern and polished.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.text: I am a gypsy. I havent' had a home for a long time. Call me a homeless person - I just throw everything in a bag and I'm good to go.
quotes.author: Taylor Kinney

quotes.text: You don't have to carry a designer bag that costs more than a car to look cool.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.text: If you go out on the Appalachian Trail, you have to bring so much more equipment - a tent, sleeping bag - but if you go hiking in England, or Europe, generally, towns and villages are near enough together at the end of the day you can always go to a nice little inn and have a hot bath and something to drink.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.text: What a blessing that God allows a life to come through your body, and then allows you to place that body in a body bag and take it out. I had to say that there's a magnificent something that God has for me to do, to give me that level of completion. That level of experience. It's unspeakable.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.text: Sci-fi has never really been my bag. But I do believe in a lot of weird things these days, such as synchronicity. Quantum physics suggests it's possible, so why not?
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.text: It's about the characters, it's about the film, it's about the process of making stunning visuals and a huge, epic movie. It doesn't matter if my head was covered in a black plastic bag and I was bouncing around in a space hopper: That's the villain of Chris Nolan's 'Batman!'
quotes.author: Tom Hardy

quotes.text: I am a collection of thoughts and memories and likes and dislikes. I am the things that have happened to me and the sum of everything I've ever done. I am the clothes I wear on my back. I am every place and every person and every object I have ever come across. I am a bag of bones stuck to a very large rock spinning a thousand miles an hour.
quotes.author: Macaulay Culkin

quotes.text: To the eyes of a miser a guinea is more beautiful than the sun, and a bag worn with the use of money has more beautiful proportions than a vine filled with grapes.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: After getting recognized in public from my picture on our pretzel bag, I can understand not wanting to be in the public eye. It has given me a public persona I had always avoided as a child. I do it because it's for a good cause.
quotes.author: Nell Newman

quotes.text: If a leaf fell from a tree, I'd stop juggling and play with the leaf. I went to my prop bag and got a little bandage and stuck the leaf back on the tree. People loved it.
quotes.author: Philippe Petit

quotes.text: I'm the breadwinner. I kill the spiders. Actually I don't kill them. I put them in a plastic bag and take them outside. I take out the trash cans. I change the light bulbs. I lug the 50 lbs. suitcases down the stairs.
quotes.author: Teri Hatcher

quotes.text: Preachers at black churches are the last people left in the English-speaking world who know the schemes and tropes of classical rhetoric: parallelism, antithesis, epistrophe, synecdoche, metonymy, periphrasis, litotes - the whole bag of tricks.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: I pay attention to the sun. I've worn sunglasses while I play, for years, and apply sunscreen. No matter where I'm playing, there's a rain suit in my bag, too.
quotes.author: Louis Oosthuizen

quotes.text: Is that weird, taking my Louis Vuitton bag camping?
quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

quotes.text: I look like a real bag lady when I go to Starbucks with my dog and get my chai.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.text: Marriage is like putting your hand into a bag of snakes in the hope of pulling out an eel.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: In actual life I am a grumpy old bag.
quotes.author: Dawn French

quotes.text: I am interested in shows that are not out-and-out gag fests: you see the truth of a broken heart behind them. That is what life is like: it's really funny, you see funny things as soon as you step out of the room, but underneath that is a whole bag of broken hearts. It's that real pain and that real hilarity that makes life so intriguing.
quotes.author: Tamsin Greig

quotes.text: My left eye went when I was young. I was working the speed bag, and some steel went in the eye and scratched it to pieces. I was kinda blind in that eye.
quotes.author: Joe Frazier

quotes.text: I eat bags and bags of cashews. I've got them in the kitchen, and about ten feet away I've got another bowl on the kitchen table. In my backpack, I've always got a bag of cashews. I started eating them in the airports because that's the one food that you can find in every airport that's actually nutritious.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.text: Once, in a magazine interview, I said the difference between shoe ladies and bag ladies is that shoe ladies are just a bit classier. Finished! That started World War III among all the women I knew. I only meant that shoes do more for your look and body than bags do!
quotes.author: Kareena Kapoor Khan

quotes.text: I don't understand why people whose entire lives or their corporate success depends on communication, and yet they are led on occasion by CEOs who cannot talk their way out of a paper bag and don't care to.
quotes.author: Frank Luntz

quotes.text: Money doesn't buy elegance. You can take an inexpensive sheath, add a pretty scarf, gray shoes, and a wonderful bag, and it will always be elegant.
quotes.author: Carolina Herrera

quotes.text: I would run into the corner store, the bodega, and just grab a paper bag or buy juice - anything just to get a paper bag. And I'd write the words on the paper bag and stuff these ideas in my pocket until I got back. Then I would transfer them into the notebook.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.text: One of my passions is photography. I always carry a camera in my bag whenever I travel. I always take pictures wherever I go, and some of them end up being really crazy ones.
quotes.author: Sunidhi Chauhan

quotes.text: Actors know, with me they aren't going to be allowed to rehearse a scene for a couple of hours and then get away with doing 25 takes before we get it right. So they come with their full bag of tricks.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.text: The older I get, the less I need. I wear the same jean shorts for the whole week. I'm not running to the store to get the latest bag.
quotes.author: Daria Werbowy

quotes.text: I was very influenced by The Magic Mountain. It's a book that had a huge impact on me. I loved that as a shape for a novel: put a bunch of people in a beautiful place, give them all tuberculosis, make them all stay in a fur sleeping bag for several years and see what happens.
quotes.author: Ann Patchett

quotes.text: One thing to avoid is trendy stuff, though - you gotta go timeless. Even if you want a little luxury in your life and you want to splurge on a Gucci bag, pick a great black one you can wear all the time.
quotes.author: NeNe Leakes

quotes.text: I hump the wild to take it all in, there is no bag limit on happiness.
quotes.author: Ted Nugent

quotes.text: I've been to parties in L.A. that are mind-blowing. I mean, quite literally mind-blowing. People get cellphones in the party bag, that sort of thing. Fabulous, fabulous parties.
quotes.author: Victoria Beckham

quotes.text: I use Ole Henriksen eye gel when I think of it, and go for facials when spa gift certificates appear as a professional thank-you or in a gift bag. Once ensconced in a facialist's chair, I let myself be coaxed into all sorts of treatments, because I'm there already, so why not?
quotes.author: Sloane Crosley

quotes.text: The way I pack is I look at how long I'll be gone and I pack day for day. If I'm going on a three-day fishing trip, I plot each day. I put most of that in a little bag. If I'm going from there to work on golf courses for a few days, I plot that trip.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.text: I once went into a meeting, and every woman put her a million-pound bag on the table. Then I'm there with my tote bag and anorak. And I'm like, well, I'm still the most important person in the room right now.
quotes.author: Caitlin Moran

quotes.text: I feel so lucky that I met the love of my life. You know somebody's in it to win it when they're changing your IV bag or you're having a seizure and they're holding you. And helping you to the bathroom. You know that they love you.
quotes.author: Kathleen Hanna

quotes.text: I think I'm right-brained, incapable of managing my way out of a brown paper bag.
quotes.author: Jeremy Grantham

quotes.text: I don't know what that gas is made of, but it can't smell any worse than Ernie Johnson 's gym bag.
quotes.author: Charles Barkley

quotes.text: 'Five, Six, Seven, Nate!' opens on my 13-year-old protagonist packing up a duffel bag and bidding his Midwestern town goodbye, heading off to start rehearsals for his New York City debut in 'E.T.: The Musical.'
quotes.author: Tim Federle

quotes.text: Whatever moisture is left in the popcorn when it gets from harvest to bag to your popper is what's going to determine how well the corn pops.
quotes.author: Ken Kercheval

quotes.text: If any of us were faced with a huge bag of free money and very little accountability, it would be human nature that you would make the most of it.
quotes.author: Heather Brooke

quotes.text: It's into the same bag as E.T. and Yoda, wherein you're trying to create something that people will actually believe, but it's not so much a symbol of the thing, but you're trying to do the thing itself.
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.text: The prisoners for better security against conversation shall have a canvas bag put over the head of each and tied around the neck, with a holes for proper breathing and eating, but not seeing.
quotes.author: Edwin M. Stanton

quotes.text: It was always sort of my dream to make handbags and I wanted a handbag that was very sharp, very structured, very tailored... I wanted a bag you could put all of your things in it, you can open it, you could close it, you could hid all your tricks, but it's not all lumpy.
quotes.author: L'Wren Scott

quotes.text: A check or credit card, a Gucci bag strap, anything of value will do. Give as you live.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.text: When I get a brand new bag, I wear it for months and months.
quotes.author: Rebecca Gayheart

quotes.text: It's not what you spend but how you wear it that counts. The key is often to dress up inexpensive basics with accessories. Something like a beautiful designer bag or belt can make everything else look richer and more luxurious.
quotes.author: Chloe Sevigny

quotes.text: Lettin' the cat outta the bag is a whole lot easier 'n puttin' it back in.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: 'Escargot' is French for 'fat crawling bag of phlegm'.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: Sunsets are great. Sunrises are a mixed bag. You either got up way too early or went to bed way too late.
quotes.author: Matt Dillon

quotes.text: There used to be an old thing where every team had a heavy bag in their locker room for people to punch, but again, it was more about conditioning because if you hit a heavy bag for a minute, it feels like your arms are about to fall off.
quotes.author: Steve Yzerman

quotes.text: When I left home after graduating high school, I left as a migrant agricultural worker with a Modern Library edition of Plato in my duffel bag. It sounds kind of crazy, but I loved it. I loved the stuff. Before I knew there was a subject called philosophy, I loved it.
quotes.author: Dallas Willard

quotes.text: The brain is not a bag of traits. It's startlingly complex. There are few or no single genes with a consistent effect on the mind.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.text: I never have more than one bag at a time. I think one is already quite enough. Also, I hate changing bags, so I never have the thing of having ten bags. Any bag that's with me will take the same course as I will. It will take the same airplanes and will be squashed in the same way and will be used as a cushion in the airports.
quotes.author: Jane Birkin

quotes.text: There's no fun in a bag if it's not kicked around so that it looks as if the cat's been sitting on it - and it usually has. The cat may even be in it! I always put on stickers and beads and worry beads. You can get them from Greece, Israel, Palestine - from anywhere in the world.
quotes.author: Jane Birkin

quotes.text: My mom is the recycling Nazi, and I always bring a bag to the grocery store.
quotes.author: Jane Levy

quotes.text: There was a massive poster of me down my road, right outside the chip shop. I was about to go in, but then I saw it and changed my mind. Me coming out with a bag of chips, while I'm up there doing crunches on the poster... well, it would not look good.
quotes.author: Jessica Ennis

quotes.text: If the shoe fits, it is probably worn out.
quotes.author: Craig Bruce

quotes.text: The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Any style that Nike makes in all black, shoe, sweatshirt, onesie, doesn't matter, I pretty much need to have.
quotes.author: Alexander Wang

quotes.text: Today's average American is more apt to rebel against a tennis shoe not coming in the right color than against the slow erosion of our democratic freedom.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: Wearing a great shoe is essential for me.
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.text: The thing I always try to remember is that feet are attached to the leg, and that you must prolong the silhouette. The shoe elongates the leg and does it discreetly. The goal is to get people to look at a woman's legs. It's all about the leg. No, it's not about the leg. It's about the woman.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: I believe every woman should have a flat, a really good wedge, and then the showstopper shoe.
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.text: I mean, the shoe - there is a music to it, there is attitude, there is sound, it's a movement. Clothes - it's a different story. There are a million things I'd rather do before designing clothes: directing, landscaping.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: You cannot put the same shoe on every foot.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.text: I have no problem with the idea of comfort, but it is not an important thing aesthetically. If you look at a shoe and immediately say it looks very comfortable, in terms of design, it is not going to excite me. Of course, I am not putting nails in my shoes to ensure everybody is in pain, but a heel is not a pair of slippers and never will be.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: When you sketch a shoe but don't have the intention to do a proper shoe, it remains a curvy sketch with no detail. The shoe completely morphs to the body.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: If there are kids who want to follow in my footsteps, I'd say that my shoes are too big for them to fill! But their shoe size is just perfect.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: I would say that a good shoe is exactly like a good wine. These shoes are going to stay and last for a long time.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: It isn't the mountains ahead to climb that wear you out; it's the pebble in your shoe.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: I love and admire the American culture and the American dream. I learnt so many things about the American shoe industry and marketing strategies. I caught the secrets of American casual wear, that is elegant and wearable, retro and modern, and mixed it with an Italian touch, luxurious and handmade.
quotes.author: Diego Della Valle

quotes.text: I like Cinderella, I really do. She has a good work ethic. I appreciate a good, hard-working gal. And she likes shoes. The fairy tale is all about the shoe at the end, and I'm a big shoe girl.
quotes.author: Amy Adams

quotes.text: What spirit is so empty and blind, that it cannot recognize the fact that the foot is more noble than the shoe, and skin more beautiful than the garment with which it is clothed?
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.text: If you hit a Talib with your shoe, then there would be no difference between you and the Talib. You must not treat others with cruelty and that much harshly, you must fight others but through peace and through dialogue and through education.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: I have always loved fashion because it's a great way to express your mood. And I'm definitely a shoe lover. The right pair of shoes can change the feel of an outfit, and even change how a woman feels about herself. A woman can wear confidence on her feet with a high stiletto, or slip into weekend comfort with a soft ballet flat.
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.text: It isn't the mountain ahead that wears you out; it's the grain of sand in your shoe.
quotes.author: Robert W. Service

quotes.text: Matching your hat to your shoe to your bag, or your necklace to your earrings, has a tendency to look dated. Mixing up your accessories adds interest to an outfit, and can make you look much more modern and polished.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.text: My happiest memory of childhood was my first birthday in reform school. This teacher took an interest in me. In fact, he gave me the first birthday presents I ever got: a box of Cracker Jacks and a can of ABC shoe polish.
quotes.author: Flip Wilson

quotes.text: One thing I detest, I have to say, is when a shoe is too soft, and it's molding to the foot. This is quite disgusting. And I really, really hate incredibly long shoes, where the last is very pointy, almost like Aladdin.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: There are two industry secrets to surviving a long day on camera on the red carpet: First, no drinking the night before - ever. You can celebrate after with some bubbly. Second is make sure to use shoe insoles. I don't care if you are a guy or a girl, dress shoes are painful. Worth it, but painful.
quotes.author: Ross Mathews

quotes.text: I've never owned an actual trail-running shoe myself, but maybe I should. My favorite paths are fraught with peril, much of it skulking at shoelace level. A rock, a root, an errant pine cone. Wham, and you're down, choking in dust and picking pebbles from wounds in your forearms and knees.
quotes.author: Don Kardong

quotes.text: You want to fall in love with a shoe, go ahead. A shoe can't love you back, but, on the other hand, a shoe can't hurt you too deeply either. And there are so many nice-looking shoes.
quotes.author: Allan Sherman

quotes.text: To throw a shoe at a man in Dundee is the equivalent of a kiss on the cheek and an embrace in London. Dundee is a very different place; they have their own rules.
quotes.author: Calvin Harris

quotes.text: I just think it's great to show a gown that's $8,000 and a shoe that's, like, $25 - but still look fabulous together.
quotes.author: Christian Siriano

quotes.text: In the dressing room, I always put on my right shoe first. Same thing for my right wristband.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.text: I really had no great love for shoes. I was a working First Lady; I was always in canvas shoes. I did nurture the shoes industry of the Philippines, and so every time there was a shoe fair, I would receive a pair of shoes as a token of gratitude.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.text: A shoe that is too large is apt to trip one, and when too small, to pinch the feet. So it is with those whose fortune does not suit them.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.text: I thank Marc Jacobs so much for giving me the opportunity to design a shoe for Louis Vuitton, but the thing that broke my heart most was when they said, 'You're finished. The shoe's finished.'
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.text: If the shoe doesn't fit, must we change the foot?
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.text: I have the idea that running shoes are based on a kind of cult idea - that our feet are flawed and we need shoes to correct those flaws. The shoe companies are in the business of selling shoes. But there's no evidence from running shoe manufacturers that they're right. There's no scientific data that running shoes reduce injury.
quotes.author: Christopher McDougall

quotes.text: Spring is when you feel like whistling even with a shoe full of slush.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.text: Once, in a magazine interview, I said the difference between shoe ladies and bag ladies is that shoe ladies are just a bit classier. Finished! That started World War III among all the women I knew. I only meant that shoes do more for your look and body than bags do!
quotes.author: Kareena Kapoor Khan

quotes.text: I wanted to make the lightest shoe possible, but still be able to perform at the same time.

quotes.text: A woman carries her clothes. But the shoe carries the woman.

quotes.text: I bought a company in the mid-'90s called Dexter Shoe and paid $400 million for it. And it went to zero. And I gave about $400 million worth of Berkshire stock, which is probably now worth $400 billion. But I've made lots of dumb decisions. That's part of the game.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: I wouldn't take it as a compliment if someone looked at one of my shoes and said, 'Oh, that looks like a comfortable shoe.' There is a heel that is too high to walk in, certainly. But who cares? You don't have to walk in high heels.

quotes.text: I ignore the jealous, I ignore the malicious, I ignore the ignorant, and I ignore the paranoid. If the shoe fits anyone, wear it.

quotes.text: No one knows whom the shoe pinches - no one.

quotes.text: I have huge hands and feet. I'm 5'6" and wear a size 10 shoe.
quotes.author: Ellen Barkin

quotes.text: I spent thirty-two years in a paper mill in southern Ohio, and before that, I worked in a meatpacking plant and a shoe factory.
quotes.author: Donald Ray Pollock

quotes.text: Uggs are comfort shoes, and it's important to have a shoe that gives you a sense of comfort. I have about 15 pair of Uggs - the same shoe, the same color. And I also have the bedroom slippers.

quotes.text: I would not invest in any shoe that is too trendy.
quotes.author: Rachel Roy

quotes.text: I'm really into laces; I always accessorize with shoe laces whether I wear them as a belt, or attached to my shorts or in my hair or as a bracelet.

quotes.author: Steve Madden

quotes.text: Stiletto, I look at it more as an attitude as opposed to a high-heeled shoe.
quotes.author: Lita Ford

quotes.text: The sports apparel industry was dominated by the big shoe companies. But there was a void in apparel and I decided to fill it.
quotes.author: Kevin Plank

quotes.text: To be slapped with a shoe is a dirty insult in the Muslim world.
quotes.author: Richard Engel

quotes.text: Don't reject a shoe because you can't run in it. It's OK not to run.

quotes.text: The most outrageous shoe that I had to do was a shoe where the person gave me stones - precious stones - and say that I could do anything with precious stones.

quotes.text: I rarely buy a shoe that is completely specific to a time and outfit. I generally tend to spend money on good shoes that can go with everything.

quotes.text: I always have shoe trouble.

quotes.text: I don't fret much about the natural life spans of shoe companies. If stores don't do the right things, they cease to exist, and that doesn't trouble me at all.

quotes.text: Some of the most inspiring moments in sports have come from players with physical defects. Tom Dempsey, born without toes on his right foot, kicked a 63-yard field goal in 1970, using a straighter, wider shoe.
quotes.author: George Vecsey

quotes.text: A vigorous temper is not altogether an evil. Men who are easy as an old shoe are generally of little worth.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: I wanted to be a shoe designer, but I never thought it could be a profession. But what was the alternative? Doctor? Too dirty! Air-hostess? Maybe not! Then someone gave me a book on Roger Vivier, and, cheri, instantly I knew that was it!
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: The shoe is very much an X-ray of social comportment.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: I'm obsessed with sparkle for men. It's so funny watching people's reaction to a disco-ball shoe!

quotes.text: I didn't go to school for a full year until I was 12. In the summer I was a wild child in the woods, with no shoes, and in the fall it was back to the city, shoe shops and school.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.text: When I left school, I got a job in a shoe shop and I used to save 15 quid a week and pay for my own singing and acting lessons.
quotes.author: Luke Evans

quotes.text: My grandfather worked in a shoe factory - he was an Italian immigrant. My father was the first to go to college in the family.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: If a man's fortune does not fit him, it is like the shoe in the story; if too large it trips him up, if too small it pinches him.

quotes.text: I became the storyteller of South Side Chicago. I used an old Kiwi liquid shoe polish as a microphone. I'd go around the house interviewing everybody, telling stupid jokes, doing voices. I mimicked Sidney Poitier, Sammy Davis Jr., people on 'Laugh-In,' Flip Wilson.
quotes.author: Bernie Mac

quotes.text: Before I was married, I didn't consider my failure to manage even basic hand tools a feminist inadequacy. I thought it had more to do with being Jewish. The Jews I knew growing up didn't do 'do-it-yourself.' When my father needed to hammer something he generally used his shoe, and the only real tool he owned was a pair of needle-nose pliers.
quotes.author: Ayelet Waldman

quotes.text: There are occasions that I love to be fashionable and enjoy, you know? But the work day of a mother doesn't include a hair making team or any consideration of your shoe.

quotes.text: The reality of our business is that for every actor who's rolled up his tent and given up and gone home, the next day you hear about some shoe salesman at Macy's who had this audition and now he's Harrison Ford. There's always that carrot out there in our business.
