quotes.text: Bret Michaels and Dee Snider and I know how to step on a stage and front a band, and we're not ashamed to. We're not shoe gazers.
quotes.author: Sebastian Bach

quotes.text: I had a great shoe contract and glove contract with a company who paid me a lot of money never to be seen using their stuff.
quotes.author: Bob Uecker

quotes.text: I'm very painful to deal with when I create a shoe.
quotes.author: Manolo Blahnik

quotes.text: So now I'm left with cigarettes, and I'm trying to scrape that off my shoe and then I'll be done.
quotes.author: Diane Lane

quotes.text: Christian Louboutin - his shoes are classic and can be worn for any occasion. I love the feel of Prada shoes and the comfort of Fendi. I like Miu Miu and Nicholas Kirkwood. A shoe can decide how stylish you are.
quotes.author: Shilpa Shetty

quotes.text: Shopping is a lot of fun, but I hate trying on clothes because I think I've done too many costume fittings and trials. I hate trying on clothes. Shoes I love. I mean, I love shoes. Anywhere, any place, any time, you take me to a shoe store.
quotes.author: Preity Zinta

quotes.text: I'm a big shoe guy, too. I have far too many pairs. Whenever there's a new style out, I'll text my stylist: 'Can we get a pair of those?'
quotes.author: Joe Jonas

quotes.text: There can be no failure to a man who has not lost his courage, his character, his self respect, or his self-confidence. He is still a King.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.text: I am, indeed, a king, because I know how to rule myself.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.text: I'm hungry for knowledge. The whole thing is to learn every day, to get brighter and brighter. That's what this world is about. You look at someone like Gandhi, and he glowed. Martin Luther King glowed. Muhammad Ali glows. I think that's from being bright all the time, and trying to be brighter.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.text: Bring ideas in and entertain them royally, for one of them may be the king.
quotes.author: Mark Van Doren

quotes.text: Martin Luther King, Jr. didn't carry just a piece of cloth to symbolize his belief in racial equality; he carried the American flag.

quotes.text: I took an interest in the Civil Rights Movement. I listened to Martin Luther King. The Vietnam War was raging. When I was 18, I was eligible for the draft, but when I went to be tested, I didn't qualify.
quotes.author: Radhanath Swami

quotes.text: A lion is called a 'king of beasts' obviously for a reason.
quotes.author: Jack Hanna

quotes.text: King of England, and you, duke of Bedford, who call yourself regent of the kingdom of France... settle your debt to the king of Heaven; return to the Maiden, who is envoy of the king of Heaven, the keys to all the good towns you took and violated in France.
quotes.author: Joan of Arc

quotes.text: What, nephew, said the king, is the wind in that door?
quotes.author: Thomas Malory

quotes.text: Let me tell you quite bluntly that this king business has given me personally nothing but headaches.
quotes.author: Mohammed Reza Pahlavi

quotes.text: I used to think 'King Lear' was an analysis of insanity, but I don't really think it is. When Lear is supposed to be at his most insane, he is actually understanding the world for the first time.
quotes.author: Ian Mckellen

quotes.text: Ah, if I were not king, I should lose my temper.
quotes.author: Louis XIV

quotes.text: When I have bad days, I just eat lots of chocolate ice cream and dance to the 'Lion King' soundtrack. It's really odd, but it's true.

quotes.text: Martin Luther King Jr. is remembered as our prince of peace, of civil rights. We owe him something major that will keep his memory alive.

quotes.text: After a hundred years the son of the King then reigning, who was of another family from that of the sleeping Princess, was a-hunting on that side of the country, and he asked what those towers were which he saw in the middle of a great thick wood.
quotes.author: Charles Perrault

quotes.text: Every color I can think of and nationality, we were all touched by Dr. King because he made us like each other and respect each other.
quotes.author: Lena Horne

quotes.text: Indeed it is very hard, when we have let the King's subjects have so much of our lands for so little value.
quotes.author: Joseph Brant

quotes.text: Listen, man: I am not the industrial godfather, king, whatever. I don't relish that title. I don't like it. I think it's limiting. I do country, I do blues. I don't just go straight.

quotes.text: We wouldn't be as far along as a country if we didn't take on some of Martin Luther King's ways that he instilled in us.

quotes.text: I would rather live and love where death is king than have eternal life where love is not.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.text: All we have to do is to peel the shrines like an onion, and we will be with the king himself.

quotes.text: Jean Shrimpton was the most beautiful of all the models I have known. To walk down the King's Road, Chelsea, with Shrimpton was like walking through the rye. Strong men just keeled over right and left as she strode up the street.

quotes.text: I am really enjoying the new Martin Luther King Jr stamp - just think about all those white bigots, licking the backside of a black man.

quotes.text: Martin Luther King's 'I Have a Dream' speech always sends me down some path, some trajectory of some creative idea.

quotes.text: After the French Revolution, it was not the treason of the king that was in question; it was the existence of the king. You have to be very careful when you judge and execute somebody for being a symbol.

quotes.text: The assassinations of Martin Luther King, Jr., and Robert F. Kennedy led directly to the passage of a historic law, the Gun Control Act of 1968.

quotes.text: I don't really care where I work, actually, because you know making a movie is like living in movie world. There's such a secluded world, and the director is the king ruling the country, and everybody's building this little town to speak in symbolism.

quotes.text: The king must die so that the country can live.

quotes.text: Whether you're president or speaker, if you're wrong, we need to stand up and point it out. So some of us pounded away on some of the ridiculous policies of Pelosi - and lo and behold, over time, the public began to see.

quotes.text: Martin Luther King took us to the mountain top: I want to take us to the bank.

quotes.text: Mama and Daddy King represent the best in manhood and womanhood, the best in a marriage, the kind of people we are trying to become.

quotes.text: A king should die on his feet.

quotes.text: I'm the king of brownie sundaes!

quotes.text: To be a king and wear a crown is a thing more glorious to them that see it than it is pleasant to them that bear it.

quotes.text: Firstly you must always implicitly obey orders, without attempting to form any opinion of your own regarding their propriety. Secondly, you must consider every man your enemy who speaks ill of your king; and thirdly you must hate a Frenchman as you hate the devil.

quotes.text: I grew up poor in crappy situations... various crappy situations. What kept me sane was reading and music. I had so many different literary tastes growing up, be it fiction like Stephen King or Piers Anthony or non-fiction like reading Hunter S. Thompson essays or reading the Beats. I was a huge fan of the Beat movement.

quotes.text: If you're the cashier at Burger King, of course you make less than the manager or even the CEO. The issue is whether you're stuck being a cashier for the rest of your life.

quotes.text: Who to himself is law, no law doth need, offends no law, and is a king indeed.

quotes.text: I never needed much, and I never thought I'd get more than what I had. A trip to Burger King was the biggest thing in the world to me. Heaven.

quotes.text: In the kingdom of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.

quotes.text: The year 1999, seventh month, from the sky will come a great King of Terror. To bring back to life the great King of the Mongols, before and after Mars to reign by good luck.

quotes.text: Because homecoming came first, and there was the homecoming court. The five guys on homecoming court were disqualified from being in the prom court. So being prom king was being sixth most popular.

quotes.text: After 'The Wonder Years,' I ended up having a voiceover career, which was something I never even knew was possible. But after the character I was playing on 'The Wonder Years,' people said, 'Oh, would you like to do a Burger King thing? And there's a 7 Up thing...' And then I got to do 'Dilbert.' I think my voice kind of fit for that.

quotes.text: There, I guess King George will be able to read that without his spectacles!

quotes.text: He who reigns within himself and rules passions, desires, and fears is more than a king.

quotes.text: He that is kind is free, though he is a slave; he that is evil is a slave, though he be a king.

quotes.text: People say I am the king of painful shoes. I don't want to create painful shoes, but it is not my job to create something comfortable. quotes.text: Number one, cash is king... number two, communicate... number three, buy or bury the competition.

quotes.text: Since God had commanded it, it was necessary that I do it. Since God commanded it, even if I had a hundred fathers and mothers, even if I had been a King's daughter, I would have gone nevertheless.

quotes.text: Create like a god, command like a king, work like a slave.
quotes.author: Constantin Brancusi

quotes.text: I have seen the king with a face of Glory, He who is the eye and the sun of heaven, He who is the companion and healer of all beings, He who is the soul and the universe that births souls.

quotes.text: A true king is neither husband nor father; he considers his throne and nothing else.

quotes.text: The serpent, the king, the tiger, the stinging wasp, the small child, the dog owned by other people, and the fool: these seven ought not to be awakened from sleep.

quotes.text: I love watching the Serengeti, the way lions live. The only way the king lion loses his crown is by somebody physically defeating him.

quotes.text: Time is the king of all men, he is their parent and their grave, and gives them what he will and not what they crave.

quotes.text: I was born into the world as the king of truth for the salvation of the world.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: King Louis Philippe once said to me that he attributed the great success of the British nation in political life to their talking politics after dinner.

quotes.text: Having listened to great songwriters like James Taylor and Carole King, I felt there was nothing new that was coming out that really represented me and the way I felt. So I started writing my own stuff.

quotes.text: The wing of the Falcon brings to the king, the wing if the crow brings him to the cemetery.
quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.text: He is happiest, be he king or peasant, who finds peace in his home.

quotes.text: The Stamp Act was a direct tax imposed on the colonies by King George III. This act inevitably led to the American Revolution. Just as the Stamp Act did in 1765, Obamacare should act as a wake-up call. Chief Justice Roberts provides us with a similar call to action.

quotes.text: The Civil Rights Movement, it wasn't just a couple of, you know, superstars like Martin Luther King. It was thousands and thousands - millions, I should say - of people taking risks, becoming leaders in their community.

quotes.text: Look to Africa, for there a king will be crowned.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.text: Man will never be free until the last king is strangled with the entrails of the last priest.

quotes.text: One's only rival is one's own potentialities. One's only failure is failing to live up to one's own possibilities. In this sense, every man can be a king, and must therefore be treated like a king.

quotes.text: In the land of the skunks he who has half a nose is king.
quotes.author: Chris Farley

quotes.text: A teardrop on earth summons the King of heaven.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: The library of my elementary school had this great biography section, and I read all of these paperback biographies until they were dog-eared. The story of Eleanor Roosevelt and Madame Curie and Martin Luther King and George Washington Carver and on and on and on.

quotes.text: My very first job was a cashier at Burger King in Tucson, Arizona. And I occasionally worked the drive-thru. I'd go wherever I was needed! My second job was at Dairy Queen. I stayed in the fast food royalty.

quotes.text: I always thought if I had a band it would have the energy and feel of early Police, since that's where my roots are, and then the harmonies of the Eagles, and the technique of King Crimson or something like that. Fast, up-tempo, beat-the-hell-out-of-the-drums, because that's my style. Energy, but sophistication, rhythmically and melodically.
quotes.author: Taylor Hawkins

quotes.text: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: When the whole point of Queen was to be original.
quotes.author: Freddie Mercury

quotes.text: I like a man who looks like a bad boy but knows how to treat a woman like a queen.
quotes.author: Candice Swanepoel

quotes.text: I was a queen, and you took away my crown; a wife, and you killed my husband; a mother, and you deprived me of my children. My blood alone remains: take it, but do not make me suffer long.
quotes.author: Marie Antoinette

quotes.text: I do not want a husband who honours me as a queen, if he does not love me as a woman.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.text: I'm not a culture snob. So while, of course, I think the Mozart 'Requiem' or, say, Beethoven's 'Ninth' are some of the greatest works of art in the history of humankind, that's not to say the Beatles or Queen or Simon and Garfunkel aren't brilliant, beautiful, important works of art that should be sung without a sense of irony.
quotes.author: Eric Whitacre

quotes.text: If I hadn't been a woman, I'd be a drag queen for sure. I like all that flair and I'd be dressing up in them high heels and putting on the big hair. I'd be like Ru Paul.

quotes.text: I woke up one morning to find I was famous. I bought a white Rolls-Royce and drove down Sunset Boulevard, wearing dark specs and a white suit, waving like the Queen Mum.
quotes.author: Peter O'Toole

quotes.text: I was always a drama queen. I remember playing in the kitchen, trying to get my mom to think I was dead and call the police. When she didn't, I would cry. I was always theatrical. I don't think any of my relatives are surprised.

quotes.text: If Queen Elizabeth knighthooded me and I would get the title Sir Usain Bolt. That sounds very nice.
quotes.author: Usain Bolt

quotes.text: Being the Queen is not all about singing, and being a diva is not all about singing. It has much to do with your service to people. And your social contributions to your community and your civic contributions as well.
quotes.author: Aretha Franklin

quotes.text: Her friends say she is very funny. At a family dinner, she stood to go, and the footman very properly pulled her chair away. At that moment I asked her a question and she sat down again, except there was no chair. Everyone, including the Queen, laughed and laughed.
quotes.author: Prince Andrew

quotes.text: Though I am not imperial, and though Elizabeth may not deserve it, the Queen of England will easily deserve to have an emperor's son to marry.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.text: Every woman is a queen, and we all have different things to offer.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: There are a lot of people who helped make Queen Latifah who she is today. I don't forget, but a lot of people do and get big heads. My mom will make me walk the dogs or take out the trash when I go home. I'm not allowed to get a big head; I've still got to do the simple things in life.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: I think that Vegas is one of the wildest places I've ever been to. You can look to your left and there's a drag queen getting married by Elvis, to the right there is some old bird sticking quarters into a slot machine for hours.
quotes.author: Marsha Thomason

quotes.text: I'd like to be a queen in people's hearts but I don't see myself being queen of this country.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.text: I would rather be a beggar and single than a queen and married.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.text: I grew up when one of America's greatest black playwrights, August Wilson, was writing about life in Pittsburgh, but I never saw myself in any of his straight-male plays. And then I see 'Angels,' which was so honest and painful, and it had this black drag queen in it, Belize, with a big heart. I finally had a character to relate to.
quotes.author: Billy Porter

quotes.text: The Queen of Crafts herself, Martha Stewart, and I have the same birthday. I prefer to think it's the glue-gun wielding, perfect-tart-producing Martha and not the copper pan-throwing, jail-going Martha. But I suppose if I am going to share a calendar square with some of Martha, I have to share it with all of Martha.
quotes.author: Sloane Crosley

quotes.text: When Ke$ha tries to rap like L'Trimm, she sounds like any ordinary lonely teenage girl stuck in a nowhere town, singing along to her radio and dreaming of a party where she's the star. Ke$ha's greatness is that in her voice, you can hear both the loser girl and the star. All hail the Queen of Noi$e!
quotes.author: Rob Sheffield

quotes.text: The Queen is most anxious to enlist everyone in checking this mad, wicked folly of 'Women's Rights'. It is a subject which makes the Queen so furious that she cannot contain herself.
quotes.author: Queen Victoria

quotes.text: I just get so fed up with seeing the same things written about me. If I see the words 'ice queen' attached to me, I feel like banging my head against the wall. There's this perception that I can only be in a film if I have a glass of champagne in my hand and a stately home in the background.
quotes.author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quotes.text: There's gonna be a lot of great songs, but there ain't going to be another 'Trap Queen.'
quotes.author: Fetty Wap

quotes.text: I wasn't the typical pageant girl - I was a little more nerdy, and they gave me a voice. I created the Queen of the Universe pageant, which is charity-based, to benefit UNESCO. For me, the most important thing is that contestants have a charity-based platform or charity ambition.
quotes.author: Joyce Giraud

quotes.text: Every third person in the world is a drama queen. And crying 'victim,' especially when you're not really a victim in any real way, feels good. It feels good to cry victim if you're not one.
quotes.author: John McWhorter

quotes.text: I'm a carb queen. I'll always order macaroni and cheese, but I don't want it to be fancy. I want it to be as close to Kraft Services as it can possibly get!
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: You know, I designed the Queen crest. I simply combined all the creatures that represent our star signs-and I don't even believe in astrology.
quotes.author: Freddie Mercury

quotes.text: I am a queen, and I demand to be treated like a queen.
quotes.author: Sheila Jackson Lee

quotes.text: Say 'Toronto' or 'Ontario,' and the immediate thought associations are with a somewhat blander version of North America: a United States with a welfare regime and a more polite street etiquette, and the additionally reassuring visage of Queen Elizabeth on the currency.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.text: Rosa Parks was the queen mother of a movement whose single act of heroism sparked the movement for freedom, justice and equality. Her greatest contribution is that she told us a regular person can make a difference.
quotes.author: Marc Morial

quotes.text: I think baking cookies is equal to Queen Victoria running an empire. There's no difference in how seriously you take the job, how seriously you approach your whole life.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.text: Therefore I am sure that this, my Coronation, is not the symbol of a power and a splendor that are gone but a declaration of our hopes for the future, and for the years I may, by God's Grace and Mercy, be given to reign and serve you as your Queen.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.text: When people think of hats, they think of her majesty the queen.
quotes.author: Philip Treacy

quotes.text: You know, not even your British Queen is called just Elizabeth - she's Elizabeth the Second. There's only one Imelda.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.text: The queen of aggregation is, of course, Arianna Huffington, who has discovered that if you take celebrity gossip, adorable kitten videos, posts from unpaid bloggers and news reports from other publications, array them on your Web site and add a left-wing soundtrack, millions of people will come.
quotes.author: Bill Keller

quotes.text: My very first job was a cashier at Burger King in Tucson, Arizona. And I occasionally worked the drive-thru. I'd go wherever I was needed! My second job was at Dairy Queen. I stayed in the fast food royalty.
quotes.author: Kate Walsh

quotes.text: I'm into 'The Walking Dead,' 'Shaun of the Dead,' obviously, and I've seen all the Romero movies. I am a classic zombie queen. And I love the White Walkers on 'Game of Thrones.' Weirdly, it wasn't until pretty late in life that I found my entry point into horror films.
quotes.author: Anna Kendrick

quotes.text: I found myself at dusk in the bewitching Roman city of Jerash with H.M. Queen Rania of Jordan one year, and scrambling with hardened paparazzi to get an image of the Princess of Wales in a tiny Nepalese clinic in the foothills of the Himalayas another.
quotes.author: Hamish Bowles

quotes.text: I actually don't want a throne at all, because I don't view myself as a queen; I view myself as one of my fans.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: Jews have deep respect for the Queen and the royal family. We say a prayer for them every Sabbath in synagogue. We recite a special blessing on seeing the Queen.
quotes.author: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.text: Anyone who tries to diss me in comparison to Queen, it just renders all their criticisms completely futile. That's quite pleasurable.
quotes.author: Mika

quotes.text: To be a queen of a household is a powerful thing.
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.text: Tatiana Alvarez, who also became a queen of the wheels of steel in L.A., has now sold her incredible cross-dressing, reverse 'Tootsie' story to Warner Bros. in Hollywood, and hotshot producers Mike Medavoy, Brian Medavoy and Erwin More have reunited to turn it into a movie.
quotes.author: Robin Leach

quotes.text: I wouldn't say I was a queen. Maybe a little elf.
quotes.author: Parker Posey

quotes.text: As a child, I was as intrigued by the Evil Queen as I was charmed by Snow White.
quotes.author: Stephane Rolland

quotes.text: I always wanted to act. I guess I've always been a bit of a drama queen.
quotes.author: Samantha Isler

quotes.text: I was homecoming queen. I was star of my basketball team.
quotes.author: Marla Maples

quotes.text: My children are not royal; they just happen to have the Queen for their aunt.
quotes.author: Princess Margaret

quotes.text: Years ago, I thought up the name Queen. It's just a name. But it's regal, obviously, and -sounds splendid.
quotes.author: Freddie Mercury

quotes.text: There's nothing secret about it. Everyone knows that I am waiting for my real parents, the king and queen, to come restore me to my rightful throne.
quotes.author: Meg Cabot

quotes.text: There's only one Elizabeth like me and that's the Queen.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Arden

quotes.text: She is the rock 'n' roll queen. Weirdly enough, that is one of the things her reign will be remembered for. Queen Elizabeth I, we remember Raleigh; Queen Elizabeth II it's gonna be the Beatles.
quotes.author: Paul McCartney

quotes.text: Would Jove appoint some flower to reign, in matchless beauty on the plain, the Rose (mankind will all agree). The Rose the queen of flowers should be.
quotes.author: Sappho

quotes.text: If you were the President of the United States or the Queen of England - you couldn't have a person who would be more protective than my mother was for me. Which meant really that I could dare to do all sorts of things.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Rhyme, that enslaved queen, that supreme charm of our poetry, that creator of our meter.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: 2012 has been an extraordinary year for our country. We cheered our Queen to the rafters with the Jubilee, showed the world what we're made of by staging the most spectacular Olympic and Paralympic Games ever and - let's not forget - punched way above our weight in the medals table.
quotes.author: David Cameron

quotes.text: There is a fun, flippant side to me, of course. But I would much rather be known as the Ice Queen.
quotes.author: Siouxsie Sioux

quotes.text: I went to Queen's - a fine university with the proudly stupidest frosh week in the country. This was, when I was there, supposed to be somehow evidence of a higher social class.
quotes.author: Russell Smith

quotes.text: I cannot wait to come back to Glasgow. I know the place like the back of my hand. In fact, one of the jobs I had as a student was in Cineworld. And I was always at gigs in King Tut's, Nice 'n' Sleazy's and the Barras. I played Ultimate Frisbee down on Glasgow Green and pulled pints in O'Neill's on Queen Street.
quotes.author: Colin Morgan

quotes.text: Spying is a like a game of chess: Sometimes you have to withdraw, sometimes you have to sacrifice one of your pieces to win - preferably a knight rather than a king or queen.
quotes.author: John Rhys-Davies

quotes.text: Once you're in the military, she means a lot more to you than just a grandmother. She is the queen. And then you suddenly, it's like start realizing, you know, wow, this is quite a big deal. And then you get goose bumps and then the rest of it.
quotes.author: Prince Harry

quotes.text: I can't be the candy queen forever.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.text: Elvis may be the King of Rock and Roll, but I am the Queen.
quotes.author: Little Richard

quotes.text: When the Queen says 'well done,' it means so much.
quotes.author: Prince William

quotes.text: A beautiful woman can be painted as a totem only; not as a woman, but as a Madonna, a queen, a sphinx.
quotes.author: Saul Steinberg

quotes.text: To even be called the 'teen queen' is crazy.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.text: I stay in France. Better to be the queen of a village than a servant in a kingdom.
quotes.author: Emmanuelle Beart

quotes.text: And much more am I sorrier for my good knights' loss than for the loss of my fair queen; for queens I might have enough, but such a fellowship of good knights shall never be together in no company.
quotes.author: Thomas Malory

quotes.text: I regard the rights of men and women equal. In Love's fair realm, husband and wife are king and queen, sceptered and crowned alike, and seated on the self-same throne.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.text: I love the Sex Pistols. I'm a big Beach Boys fan and a huge Zeppelin and Queen fan.
quotes.author: Bruno Mars

quotes.text: I guess you can tease me about being a drama queen, because that did heighten the drama.
quotes.author: Greg Louganis

quotes.text: Especially as a title-holder, you can do great things with charities, because people suddenly care about what you have to say. I wanted to make a difference, which is why I created the Queen of the Universe pageant. I want to change all of those stigmas in the beauty pageant world.
quotes.author: Joyce Giraud

quotes.text: I don't apologize for my diamonds, Rolls-Royce, Range Rover, or anything. Look, Queen Elizabeth has more diamonds than me. Why don't people attack her for it?
quotes.author: Kimora Lee Simmons

quotes.text: In my opinion, the form of Government may be different in different countries, according to their circumstances, their wishes, their wants. England loves her Queen, and has full motive to do so.
quotes.author: Lajos Kossuth

quotes.text: I think I was always a drama queen. I really, really, really loved playing pretend.
quotes.author: Kathryn Hahn

quotes.text: The queen and I always got on well, still do; I uphold everything Her Majesty represents, has given up her life for. It's her duty. For her country, she's selfless to the grave.
quotes.author: Sarah Ferguson

quotes.text: People don't really call me a rapper. They call me Mr. 'Trap Queen'. The 'Trap Queen' Guy.
quotes.author: Fetty Wap

quotes.text: It's a good thing I was born a girl, otherwise I'd be a drag queen.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.text: Being queen is overrated.
quotes.author: Queen Rania of Jordan

quotes.text: The choices we make lead up to actual experiences. It is one thing to decide to climb a mountain. It is quite another to be on top of it.
quotes.author: Herbert A. Simon

quotes.text: It's easier to go down a hill than up it but the view is much better at the top.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: I do not know anyone who has got to the top without hard work. That is the recipe. It will not always get you to the top, but should get you pretty near.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: Never measure the height of a mountain until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.text: Nobody's a natural. You work hard to get good and then work to get better. It's hard to stay on top.
quotes.author: Paul Coffey

quotes.text: My dad said if you become a tennis professional just make sure you get into the top hundred, because you have to make a little bit of money. You make a living so you can pay your coaching and, you know, your travels.
quotes.author: Roger Federer

quotes.text: Women may not have it easy, but we are given a fairer chance to reach for the top.
quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

quotes.text: Without hard work and discipline it is difficult to be a top professional.
quotes.author: Jahangir Khan

quotes.text: We think too small, like the frog at the bottom of the well. He thinks the sky is only as big as the top of the well. If he surfaced, he would have an entirely different view.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.text: There is always room at the top.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.text: 'Perfection' to me is, I walk away from a situation and say, 'I did everything I could do right there. There was nothing more that I could do.' I was a hundred percent, like the meter was at the top. There was nothing else I could have done. You know? Like, I worked as hard as I possibly could have. That's perfection.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.text: Most leadership strategies are doomed to failure from the outset. As people have been noting for years, the majority of strategic initiatives that are driven from the top are marginally effective - at best.
quotes.author: Peter Senge

quotes.text: Why is Cloud 9 so amazing? What is wrong with Cloud 8? That joke came off the top of my head, and the top of my head ain't funny!
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.text: My second favorite household chore is ironing. My first being hitting my head on the top bunk bed until I faint.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: I am not interested in considering another TV series. This one was a wonderful experience which will be hard to top, and It's caused me to turn down several good film opportunities because of the schedule.
quotes.author: Dennis Franz

quotes.text: Professionalism is not sportsmanship. If you don't succeed, you won't be in your profession for long. In our society, it's not about good or bad. It's about who's on top.
quotes.author: Chili Davis

quotes.text: I wondered how they would top the Pirates and skeletons and moonlight, because that's a pretty cool concept.
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.text: I really love 'America's Next Top Model.' I'm always tweeting about it, and people are like, 'You need to get a life!' Any time I do a photo shoot, I always think, 'What would Tyra say?'
quotes.author: Carly Chaikin

quotes.text: Consciousness-one level is understanding where we are in space. Consciousness two is where we understand our position in society: who's top dog, who's underdog and who's in the middle. And type-three consciousness is simulating the future. And type-three consciousness, only humans have this ability to see far into the future.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.text: In every other science fiction series, humans are at the top of the food chain. In the 'Babylon 5' universe, they're in the bottom third.
quotes.author: J. Michael Straczynski

quotes.text: Balancing family and work is a top priority for me, and I treat it as such. Meaning, I actually put specific family time and events in my calendar so that precious time is dedicated and properly blocked off from any work that may try to sneak its way into my schedule.
quotes.author: Biz Stone

quotes.text: I have been lucky enough to work with the world's best designers and top stylists - who have been my mentors.
quotes.author: Alessandra Ambrosio

quotes.text: Most of the top actors and actresses may be working in ten or twelve films at the same time, so they will give one director two hours and maybe shoot in Bombay in the morning and Madras in the evening. It happens.
quotes.author: Satyajit Ray

quotes.text: Mounting a large rock, I was able to see a considerable body of the enemy moving by the flank in rear of their line engaged, and passing from the direction of the foot of Great Round Top through the valley toward the front of my left.
quotes.author: Joshua Chamberlain

quotes.text: When I was 14, I thought I looked terrible. I wore these typical Slavic shoes with metal bottoms so you could always hear me coming and this really ugly princess skirt and blouse with the top button closed. I had a boy haircut, a baby face covered with pimples, and a really big nose.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.text: Society is like a stew. If you don't stir it up every once in a while then a layer of scum floats to the top.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.text: The top 10 verbs in the English language are all irregular, even though irregular verbs make up only 3 per cent of the language.
quotes.author: Erez Lieberman Aiden

quotes.text: At Microsoft there are lots of brilliant ideas but the image is that they all come from the top - I'm afraid that's not quite right.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: You have to consistently be successful to be one of the top players in the world, and everything is possible in life.
quotes.author: Novak Djokovic

quotes.text: Red lips and fragrance always top off an outfit for me.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.text: It's important to have people around you with enough confidence to say if you are not acting in a good way. Normally, when you are at the top, people say everything is fantastic. Probably in that moment it is what you want to hear, but it's best to be reminded how to act properly.
quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

quotes.text: To succeed in business, to reach the top, an individual must know all it is possible to know about that business.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.text: The top of one mountain is always the bottom of another.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: Now that I'm on top, everyone wants to bring me down. Everyone's trying to tug at me and take my spot.
quotes.author: Justin Bieber

quotes.text: A man who graduated high in his class at Yale Law School and made partnership in a top law firm would be celebrated. A man who invested wisely would be admired, but a woman who accomplishes this is treated with suspicion.
quotes.author: Barbra Streisand

quotes.text: From the top of the quarry cliffs, one could see the New Jersey suburbs bordered by the New York City skyline.
quotes.author: Robert Smithson

quotes.text: I once had a friend who did the hair for sci-fi movies, and after a particularly bad break-up I stupidly went to her salon and told her she could do anything she liked. She dyed the bottom cherry red and the top peroxide blonde.
quotes.author: Sally Phillips

quotes.text: There is always room at the top - after the investigation.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.text: I'm just trying to really take it one day at a time, because for me - and I know this sounds cliche, whatever - I achieved my ultimate goal, and nothing can really top that, you know?
quotes.author: Nastia Liukin

quotes.text: If you don't go over the top you can't see what's on the other side.
quotes.author: Jim Steinman

quotes.text: I had a wonderful time playing Dr. Kaufman in Tomorrow Never Dies. It was a real Bond villain, over the top, almost laughable but dangerous.
quotes.author: Vincent Schiavelli

quotes.text: I came from a Hindi medium school... the principal felt that I would not fit into an English medium college. Though I was top in my class in school, and I got admission in other colleges, but I really wanted to study in St. Xavier's.
quotes.author: Lakshmi Mittal

quotes.text: I've always considered myself the best and the top. I never considered that I was out of it.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.text: I believe the projects were a social experiment; we were laboratory rats stacked on top of each other, and people just knew, inherently, that there was something wrong. There's not a lot of regard for the property by the residents.
quotes.author: Mos Def

quotes.text: If your working television sits on top of your non-working television, you might be a redneck.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.text: When it was over my daughter said, 'Oh, I felt so sorry for him - he didn't want to hurt you, he liked you.' That was Victoria. When you visualize him up there on top of the Empire State Building, you do feel sorry for him.
quotes.author: Fay Wray

quotes.text: There are occasionally eureka moments - off the top of my head, maybe Darth Vader's theme, you know, the imperial march.
quotes.author: John Williams

quotes.text: I want to top expectations. I want to blow you away.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.text: Our top story tonight: Famous TV dolphin flipper was arrested today on prostitution ring charges. He allegedly was seen transporting two 16 year olds across state line for immoral porpoises.
quotes.author: Colin Mochrie

quotes.text: No woman in my time will be prime minister or chancellor or foreign secretary - not the top jobs. Anyway, I wouldn't want to be prime minister; you have to give yourself 100 percent.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: Human life is far more important than just getting to the top of a mountain.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.text: Don't try to buy at the bottom and sell at the top. It can't be done except by liars.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.text: I'm always down to try a new burger, but Shake Shack is still my top. What makes them so special is for the bread they use Martin's potato rolls which is just the best hamburger buns ever.
quotes.author: Aziz Ansari

quotes.text: Famous people feel that they must perpetually be on the crest of the wave, not realising that it is against all the rules of life. You can't be on top all the time, it isn't natural.
quotes.author: Olivia De Havilland

quotes.text: In some parts of life, like mathematics and science, yeah, I was a genius. I would top all the top scores you could ever measure it by.
quotes.author: Steve Wozniak

quotes.text: It's lonely and cold on the top... lonely and cold.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.text: I remember in '37 when trolley cars were so big in New York. It was five cents for a ride... There used to be open-air buses, and you could go up a spiral staircase and sit up on top. Those were great, great days.
quotes.author: Tiny Tim

quotes.text: I don't want to have to be beautiful all the time. I want to be able to look cruddy in my weekend sweats, with a pimple on my face and pimple cream on top of the pimple. The expectation to always be beautiful bothers me.
quotes.author: Cindy Crawford

quotes.text: The higher up you go, the more mistakes you are allowed. Right at the top, if you make enough of them, it's considered to be your style.
quotes.author: Fred Astaire

quotes.text: My audience is the baby-boomers, the bulk of the population. This is also a group that is being ignored by most record companies because they're not the Top 40 hit singles market. They forget these people still listen to music.
quotes.author: Helen Reddy

quotes.text: When people ask how have I kept on top, I have to say with the help of every photographer, make-up artist and hairdresser I've ever worked with.
quotes.author: Linda Evangelista

quotes.text: Martin Luther King took us to the mountain top: I want to take us to the bank.
quotes.author: Don King

quotes.text: Anytime you see a turtle up on top of a fence post, you know he had some help.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.text: I'm not afraid to be lonely at the top.
quotes.author: Barry Bonds

quotes.text: People think that at the top there isn't much room. They tend to think of it as an Everest. My message is that there is tons of room at the top.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: Each and every master, regardless of the era or the place, heard the call and attained harmony with heaven and earth. There are many paths leading to the top of Mount Fuji, but there is only one summit - love.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.text: Many financial and industrial companies have been bailed out with the public's money, but very few of those who had run those companies have been punished for their failures. Yes, the top managers of those companies have lost their jobs - but with a fat pension and mostly with a handsome severance payment.
quotes.author: Ha-Joon Chang

quotes.text: Math was a two-part exam and I once didn't go for the second part. I knew I'd done so badly on the first it was hopeless. I re-took it about four or five times. I think I eventually got it by getting the top GCSE grade.
quotes.author: Rob Brydon

quotes.text: For girls, something that accentuates the curves looks sexy. It can be a dress, it can be jeans, it can be a tank top, who cares!
quotes.author: Brody Jenner

quotes.text: The 'New Yorker' asked me to shoot a story on climate change in 2005, and I wound up going to Iceland to shoot a glacier. The real story wasn't the beautiful white top. It ended up being at the terminus of the glacier where it's dying.
quotes.author: James Balog

quotes.text: I was never top of the class at school, but my classmates must have seen potential in me, because my nickname was Einstein.
quotes.author: Lucy Hawking

quotes.text: Before the Civil War, Canada was at the top of the underground railroad. If you made it into Canada, you were safe unless someone came and hauled you back. That was also true during the Vietnam War for draft resisters.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.text: I was never top of the class at school, but my classmates must have seen potential in me, because my nickname was 'Einstein.'
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: My own dreams fortunately came true in this great state. I became Mr. Universe; I became a successful businessman. And even though some people say I still speak with a slight accent, I have reached the top of the acting profession.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: We pride ourselves as being top, really, on the African ladder... We feel that we have actually been advancing rather than going backwards.
quotes.author: Robert Mugabe

quotes.text: Unfortunately, it is human nature for us to only learn and grow from a place of emptiness. It's hard to learn when we are winning and on top of the world.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.text: Tennis has to become everything to you if you're going to make it to the top. You have to live it.
quotes.author: Monica Seles

quotes.text: I think there have always been funny women, from Carol Burnett to Joan Rivers. When the audience sees a woman, they innately know she's worked twice as hard to get there, she's had to prove that she can be the leader, first, and then be funny on top of it. She has to emit a confidence that she's in control.
quotes.author: Wendy Liebman

quotes.text: Heaven knows where I'll end up - but it's a safe bet that I'll never be at the top of anything! Nor do I particularly care to be.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.text: If one morning I walked on top of the water across the Potomac River, the headline that afternoon would read: 'President Can't Swim.'
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.text: I wear my Viking helmet because the horns define how sharp my brains are. If you try to rub me the wrong way, I will stick you with both of my horns.
quotes.author: Flavor Flav

quotes.text: I started looking at small companies that were running a sort of virtual reality cottage industry: I had imagined that I would just put on a helmet and be somewhere else - that's your dream of what it's going to be.
quotes.author: Thomas Dolby

quotes.text: Before a game, you know, I can take off my helmet, run over there and spend a few moments with someone who is dealing with so much more than I've ever had to deal with and to love on them and care about them and in front of thousands and thousands of people, you know, let them know that they're more important than all of this.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.text: Scarily, football helmets, which do a fine job of protecting against scalp laceration and skull fracture, do little to prevent concussions and may even exacerbate them, since even as the brain is rattling around inside the skull, the head is rattling around inside the helmet.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.text: I look my best when I take my helmet off after a long motorcycle ride. I have a glow and a bit of helmet hair.
quotes.author: Eric Bana

quotes.text: More and more these days what I find myself doing in my stories is making a representation of goodness and a representation of evil and then having those two run at each other full-speed, like a couple of PeeWee football players, to see what happens. Who stays standing? Whose helmet goes flying off?
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.text: Man, when I'm riding with the helmet on, I'm invisible. And people just deal with me as the guy on the bike... it gives you a chance to read 'em.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.text: You will never know the feeling of a driver when winning a race. The helmet hides feelings that cannot be understood.
quotes.author: Ayrton Senna

quotes.text: I could be walking down the street one minute and get a handshake and then get spat on the next. I'm never sure whether to wear gloves or a helmet.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.text: People are too hung up on winning. I can get off on a really good helmet throw.
quotes.author: Bill Lee

quotes.text: I've seen descriptions of advanced TV systems in which a simulation of reality is computer-controlled; the TV viewer of the future will wear a special helmet. You'll no longer be an external spectator to fiction created by others, but an active participant in your own fantasies/dramas.
quotes.author: J. G. Ballard

quotes.text: Taking B12 is the price of getting to be vegan, the way wearing a helmet is the price of getting to ride a motorcycle and giving up alcohol for nine months is the price of getting to have a baby.
quotes.author: Victoria Moran

quotes.text: A helmet is the most important part of any jockey's kit because of the number of falls you take, so I wouldn't want to be wearing anything on the track unless it had been thoroughly tested.
quotes.author: Tony McCoy

quotes.text: In the middle of a play, I go crazy and don't realize what I'm doing. I'll snap back to reality and I realize, 'Hey, I just ripped that boy's helmet off,' or, 'I'm over here twisting this guy's knee.
quotes.author: Brian Bosworth

quotes.text: Winning at Monaco feels unbelievable, because it's such a special race and it's also my home race. My first memories were of watching Ayrton Senna here with his yellow helmet, and one day dreaming to win the Monaco GP.
quotes.author: Nico Rosberg

quotes.text: I lead by example. My kids know what sweat is. They've seen me come home from so many runs and asked, 'What's on your skin? How did you get it?' And I tell them, 'It's from exercise!' So now my son will come home from a bike ride, take off his helmet and say, 'Look, Mom. I'm sweating! I just worked out!'
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.text: Do I wear a helmet? Ugh. I do when I'm riding through a precarious part of town, meaning Midtown traffic. But when I'm riding on secure protected lanes or on the paths that run along the Hudson or through Central Park - no, I don't wear the dreaded helmet then.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.text: When I let my hair down, I just let it down. It's more comfortable in my helmet.
quotes.author: Troy Polamalu

quotes.text: When my hair was dark for 'House,' that was the hardest to maintain because it was like every three weeks my light roots would start coming in. And you can't really just dye your hair one color brown because then it looks like a helmet on television, so then I had to have four colors of brown woven into my hair every three weeks.
quotes.author: Jennifer Morrison

quotes.text: I have my hair done by Valery Joseph, who does a version of the Palm Beach crash helmet so that it doesn't move.
quotes.author: Marjorie Gubelmann

quotes.text: There will soon be streams of data coming from all manner of products - appliances, clothing, sporting goods, you name it. Wouldn't you rather live in a world where you can export the data from your son's football helmet to a new app that monitors force and impact against a cohort of high school players around the country?
quotes.author: John Battelle

quotes.text: The 70's hair with the long on the sides, just doesn't look good coming down the sides of the helmet.
quotes.author: Steve Yzerman

quotes.text: We are a generation of settlers, and without the steel helmet and gun barrel, we shall not be able to plant a tree or build a house.
quotes.author: Moshe Dayan

quotes.text: I had a few pimples here and there when I was 14. Never had braces though, thank God. A girl in my class had, like, the big helmet of head gear. I felt so bad for her. People always made fun of me enough because of my name.
quotes.author: River Viiperi

quotes.text: I visited a scientist who had a helmet with magnetic fields controlled by computer sequences that could profoundly affect your mood and your perceptions.
quotes.author: Douglas Trumbull

quotes.text: I grew up with lacrosse in my life because my dad played lacrosse all throughout college, so I grew up with the gear in my house - like the sticks, the helmet.
quotes.author: Tyler Posey

quotes.text: No, no, I don't watch football. The last time I tried watching was the last Super Bowl. The problem I have is, you know, the graphic nature of my imagination; when I watch and see them meeting head onto head, helmet onto helmet, what flashes through my mind is what's going on in their brains. It's like torture to me.
quotes.author: Bennet Omalu

quotes.text: I've climbed Stromboli when it's erupting, which is quite a heavy climb: three hours with a helmet to get to the top. When you're there, and it's dark, and you can see this eruption and feel it, it's quite different to watching it on TV.
quotes.author: Michelle Paver

quotes.text: I enjoy just showing people other sides of me, especially everyone always sees me in my helmet and ski suit. It's nice to just show everyone me, just me in my everyday clothes or just me in high heels or just me not in my ski gear, basically.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: Out on the hill under the helmet, nobody sees your face or hair, but then you take it off, and they do - that's the part I'm nervous about.
quotes.author: Mikaela Shiffrin

quotes.text: I just banged it a little bit on a helmet. And you know, if you get your throwing motion and momentum going at a helmet it makes it hurt a little more and it freaks everybody out because it's your throwing shoulder, but honestly, it feels great.
quotes.author: Mark Sanchez

quotes.text: I was lucky that it hit my shaft, and then my helmet, and I was lucky enough to get that breakaway.
quotes.author: Saku Koivu

quotes.text: Helmet was joined to helmet, and spear to spear, and jewels, baggage, and elephants without number went with them, and you would have said it was a host that none could understand.
quotes.author: Ferdowsi

quotes.text: The first movie I can remember seeing in the theater was 'Return of the Jedi.' I can remember seeing Darth Vader's helmet come off. The shock of that moment.
quotes.author: Oscar Isaac

quotes.text: I listen to Helmet - and I love Helmet, they're a great band - but every song sounds the same.
quotes.author: Adam Jones

quotes.text: He played football too long without a helmet.
quotes.author: Jerome Cavanagh

quotes.text: I'm a firm believer that there's no way that a six-year-old should have a helmet on and learn a tackling drill.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.text: I was talking to my good friend Kid Rock a while ago, and he told me if I'd send him a helmet, he'd send me an autographed platinum record. I thought that was a pretty sweet swap.
quotes.author: Peyton Manning

quotes.text: The cycling helmet can save your life, but it doesn't look good and tends to ruin your hair.
quotes.author: Astro Teller

quotes.text: If chronic bashing of the head could destroy a boxer's brain, couldn't it also destroy a football player's brain? Surely someone in the history of football had thought to look for dementia pugilistica. Unlike boxers, football players wear helmets, but a helmet can't fully protect the head from damaging impact.
quotes.author: Jeanne Marie Laskas

quotes.text: The brain is suspended in a kind of thick jelly inside the skull, and a helmet can't keep it from sloshing around. If you hit your head hard enough, the brain goes bashing against the walls of the skull.
quotes.author: Jeanne Marie Laskas

quotes.text: What are the crumple zones on scooters? The helmet is the only crumple zone I can think of.
quotes.author: Ratan Tata

quotes.text: 'Fowl Space' was a lovechild of boredom. While in class, two of the developers started passing designs back and forth. Somewhere in the middle of all that ink and crumpled paper, a chicken in a space helmet was born and thus we have 'Fowl Space.'
quotes.author: Rob Manuel

quotes.text: I think for me, wearing the helmet and being part of the Stormtroopers felt so strange. Like, so this is what it feels like to just be one of the many. And to look the same, and to have to do the same thing. To be under the same orders. This is what it feels like.
quotes.author: John Boyega

quotes.text: I wear my Viking helmet because the horns define how sharp my brains are. If you try to rub me the wrong way, I will stick you with both of my horns.
quotes.author: Flavor Flav

quotes.text: I started looking at small companies that were running a sort of virtual reality cottage industry: I had imagined that I would just put on a helmet and be somewhere else - that's your dream of what it's going to be.
quotes.author: Thomas Dolby

quotes.text: Before a game, you know, I can take off my helmet, run over there and spend a few moments with someone who is dealing with so much more than I've ever had to deal with and to love on them and care about them and in front of thousands and thousands of people, you know, let them know that they're more important than all of this.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.text: Scarily, football helmets, which do a fine job of protecting against scalp laceration and skull fracture, do little to prevent concussions and may even exacerbate them, since even as the brain is rattling around inside the skull, the head is rattling around inside the helmet.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.text: I look my best when I take my helmet off after a long motorcycle ride. I have a glow and a bit of helmet hair.
quotes.author: Eric Bana

quotes.text: More and more these days what I find myself doing in my stories is making a representation of goodness and a representation of evil and then having those two run at each other full-speed, like a couple of PeeWee football players, to see what happens. Who stays standing? Whose helmet goes flying off?
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.text: Man, when I'm riding with the helmet on, I'm invisible. And people just deal with me as the guy on the bike... it gives you a chance to read 'em.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.text: You will never know the feeling of a driver when winning a race. The helmet hides feelings that cannot be understood.
quotes.author: Ayrton Senna

quotes.text: I could be walking down the street one minute and get a handshake and then get spat on the next. I'm never sure whether to wear gloves or a helmet.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.text: People are too hung up on winning. I can get off on a really good helmet throw.
quotes.author: Bill Lee

quotes.text: I've seen descriptions of advanced TV systems in which a simulation of reality is computer-controlled; the TV viewer of the future will wear a special helmet. You'll no longer be an external spectator to fiction created by others, but an active participant in your own fantasies/dramas.
quotes.author: J. G. Ballard

quotes.text: Taking B12 is the price of getting to be vegan, the way wearing a helmet is the price of getting to ride a motorcycle and giving up alcohol for nine months is the price of getting to have a baby.
quotes.author: Victoria Moran

quotes.text: A helmet is the most important part of any jockey's kit because of the number of falls you take, so I wouldn't want to be wearing anything on the track unless it had been thoroughly tested.
quotes.author: Tony McCoy

quotes.text: In the middle of a play, I go crazy and don't realize what I'm doing. I'll snap back to reality and I realize, 'Hey, I just ripped that boy's helmet off,' or, 'I'm over here twisting this guy's knee.
quotes.author: Brian Bosworth

quotes.text: Winning at Monaco feels unbelievable, because it's such a special race and it's also my home race. My first memories were of watching Ayrton Senna here with his yellow helmet, and one day dreaming to win the Monaco GP.
quotes.author: Nico Rosberg

quotes.text: I lead by example. My kids know what sweat is. They've seen me come home from so many runs and asked, 'What's on your skin? How did you get it?' And I tell them, 'It's from exercise!' So now my son will come home from a bike ride, take off his helmet and say, 'Look, Mom. I'm sweating! I just worked out!'
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.text: Do I wear a helmet? Ugh. I do when I'm riding through a precarious part of town, meaning Midtown traffic. But when I'm riding on secure protected lanes or on the paths that run along the Hudson or through Central Park - no, I don't wear the dreaded helmet then.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.text: When I let my hair down, I just let it down. It's more comfortable in my helmet.
quotes.author: Troy Polamalu

quotes.text: When my hair was dark for 'House,' that was the hardest to maintain because it was like every three weeks my light roots would start coming in. And you can't really just dye your hair one color brown because then it looks like a helmet on television, so then I had to have four colors of brown woven into my hair every three weeks.
quotes.author: Jennifer Morrison

quotes.text: I have my hair done by Valery Joseph, who does a version of the Palm Beach crash helmet so that it doesn't move.
quotes.author: Marjorie Gubelmann

quotes.text: When I admire the wonders of a sunset or the beauty of the moon, my soul expands in the worship of the creator.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: To be a Christian without prayer is no more possible than to be alive without breathing.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: I never knew how to worship until I knew how to love.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: A thorough knowledge of the Bible is worth more than a college education.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Prayer does not change God, but it changes him who prays.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.text: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Aim at heaven and you will get earth thrown in. Aim at earth and you get neither.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: The Bible shows the way to go to heaven, not the way the heavens go.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.text: You cannot believe in God until you believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.text: Religion is part of the human make-up. It's also part of our cultural and intellectual history. Religion was our first attempt at literature, the texts, our first attempt at cosmology, making sense of where we are in the universe, our first attempt at health care, believing in faith healing, our first attempt at philosophy.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.text: I do not feel obliged to believe that the same God who has endowed us with sense, reason, and intellect has intended us to forgo their use.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.text: So I say to you, Ask and it will be given to you; search, and you will find; knock, and the door will be opened for you.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: Religion is what keeps the poor from murdering the rich.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: Rivers, ponds, lakes and streams - they all have different names, but they all contain water. Just as religions do - they all contain truths.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: I love you when you bow in your mosque, kneel in your temple, pray in your church. For you and I are sons of one religion, and it is the spirit.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: It is easy to talk on religion, but difficult to practice it.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.text: Worship is a way of seeing the world in the light of God.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.text: The World is my country, all mankind are my brethren, and to do good is my religion.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.text: Science can purify religion from error and superstition. Religion can purify science from idolatry and false absolutes.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.text: If, then, you are looking for the way by which you should go, take Christ, because He Himself is the way.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.text: True religion is real living; living with all one's soul, with all one's goodness and righteousness.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The Sabbath is a weekly cathedral raised up in my dining room, in my family, in my heart.
quotes.author: Anita Diament

quotes.text: There is no need for temples, no need for complicated philosophies. My brain and my heart are my temples; my philosophy is kindness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: I prayed for twenty years but received no answer until I prayed with my legs.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.text: However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: If I have any worth, it is to live my life for God so as to teach these peoples; even though some of them still look down on me.
quotes.author: Saint Patrick

quotes.text: I think you can judge from somebody's actions a kind of a stability and sense of purpose perhaps created by strong religious roots. I mean, there's a certain patience, a certain discipline, I think, that religion helps you achieve.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.text: Within the covers of the Bible are the answers for all the problems men face.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: For God so loved the World that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: We must seek the loving-kindness of God in all the breadth and open-air of common life.
quotes.author: George A. Smith

quotes.text: God is to be worshipped as the one beloved, dearer than everything in this and next life.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.text: Whether one believes in a religion or not, and whether one believes in rebirth or not, there isn't anyone who doesn't appreciate kindness and compassion.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: It is only when men begin to worship that they begin to grow.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.text: Being religious means asking passionately the question of the meaning of our existence and being willing to receive answers, even if the answers hurt.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.text: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Just as the soul fills the body, so God fills the world. Just as the soul bears the body, so God endures the world. Just as the soul sees but is not seen, so God sees but is not seen. Just as the soul feeds the body, so God gives food to the world.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: Religion is regarded by the common people as true, by the wise as false, and by the rulers as useful.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.text: It is wonderful how much time good people spend fighting the devil. If they would only expend the same amount of energy loving their fellow men, the devil would die in his own tracks of ennui.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: This is all the inheritance I give to my dear family. The religion of Christ will give them one which will make them rich indeed.
quotes.author: Patrick Henry

quotes.text: One act of obedience is better than one hundred sermons.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.text: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: To gather with God's people in united adoration of the Father is as necessary to the Christian life as prayer.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: Religion is about turning untested belief into unshakable truth through the power of institutions and the passage of time.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.text: If the grandfather of the grandfather of Jesus had known what was hidden within him, he would have stood humble and awe-struck before his soul.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: We are always on the anvil; by trials God is shaping us for higher things.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: When the missionaries came to Africa they had the Bible and we had the land. They said 'Let us pray.' We closed our eyes. When we opened them we had the Bible and they had the land.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: I like the religion that teaches liberty, equality and fraternity.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.text: We have to pray with our eyes on God, not on the difficulties.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.text: There seems to be a terrible misunderstanding on the part of a great many people to the effect that when you cease to believe you may cease to behave.
quotes.author: Louis Kronenberger

quotes.text: Morality is of the highest importance - but for us, not for God.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Heaven is under our feet as well as over our heads.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: I would rather live my life as if there is a God and die to find out there isn't, than live as if there isn't and to die to find out that there is.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: Since many of you do not belong to the Catholic Church and others are non-believers, from the bottom of my heart I give this silent blessing to each and every one of you, respecting the conscience of each one of you but knowing that each one of you is a child of God.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: Religion is not a department of life; it is something that enters into the whole of it.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: My country is the world, and my religion is to do good.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.text: All religions must be tolerated... for every man must get to heaven in his own way.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: I know the Bible is inspired because it inspires me.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.text: A religious man is a person who holds God and man in one thought at one time, at all times, who suffers harm done to others, whose greatest passion is compassion, whose greatest strength is love and defiance of despair.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.text: I was always respectful of people who were deeply religious because I always felt that if they gave themselves to it, then it had to be important to them. But if you can go through life without it, that's OK, too. It's whatever suits you.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.text: It's wonderful to climb the liquid mountains of the sky. Behind me and before me is God and I have no fears.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: When we blindly adopt a religion, a political system, a literary dogma, we become automatons. We cease to grow.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.text: Christianity helps us face the music even when we don't like the tune.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.text: Even if a unity of faith is not possible, a unity of love is.
quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.text: This is my simple religion. There is no need for temples; no need for complicated philosophy. Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: God is a metaphor for that which transcends all levels of intellectual thought. It's as simple as that.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: There are many of us that are willing to do great things for the Lord, but few of us are willing to do little things.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.text: See, I have set before you this day life and good, death and evil... I have set before you life and death, blessing and curse; therefore choose life.
quotes.author: Moses

quotes.text: We can only learn to know ourselves and do what we can - namely, surrender our will and fulfill God's will in us.
quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quotes.text: Jesus is ideal and wonderful, but you Christians - you are not like him.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Religion is essentially the art and the theory of the remaking of man. Man is not a finished creation.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.text: Anti-religious sneers are a hallmark of perpetual adolescents.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: I'm a Muslim, but I think Jesus would have a drink with me. He would be cool. He would talk to me.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: No man ever believes that the Bible means what it says: He is always convinced that it says what he means.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: The more I study religions the more I am convinced that man never worshipped anything but himself.
quotes.author: Richard Burton

quotes.text: The Son of God became man so that we might become God.
quotes.author: Athanasius

quotes.text: Teach us to give and not to count the cost.
quotes.author: Saint Ignatius

quotes.text: Jesus does not give recipes that show the way to God as other teachers of religion do. He is himself the way.
quotes.author: Karl Barth

quotes.text: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: It's an absolute honor to be taking part in the pageant for the Diamond Jubilee. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity and will be a moment in history that will always be remembered. I'm really looking forward to being out on the river with friends and family. To mark this historic moment will be extremely special.
quotes.author: Steve McFadden

quotes.text: In some parts of the world, students are going to school every day. It's their normal life. But in other part of the world, we are starving for education... it's like a precious gift. It's like a diamond.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: Lost - yesterday, somewhere between sunrise and sunset, two golden hours, each set with sixty diamond minutes. No reward is offered, for they are gone forever.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.text: I am a bit sickie happy. I am prone to black clouds too, but... I am embarrassed about them. It's like: 'My diamond shoes are too tight. My money clip doesn't fit all my fifties.' I mean - really. Shut up.
quotes.author: Olivia Colman

quotes.text: We had an apartment on west side of Central Park. The rent was very reasonable. We found out later that it belonged to a gangster called Legs Diamond and it was a front to his headquarters. It was fine.
quotes.author: James Stewart

quotes.text: The bosom can ache beneath diamond brooches; and many a blithe heart dances under coarse wool.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.text: I never worry about diets. The only carrots that interest me are the number you get in a diamond.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Nature has made a pebble and a female. The lapidary makes the diamond, and the lover makes the woman.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: I really think that American gentlemen are the best after all, because kissing your hand may make you feel very good but a diamond and a sapphire bracelet lasts forever.
quotes.author: Anita Loos

quotes.text: I cut 'Diamond in My Crown' in my home in Georgia, because I wanted to use an old 1848 pump organ that my mother-in-law had gotten for Emory for Christmas one year. His mother would be proud to know that pump organ was made use of.
quotes.author: Patty Loveless

quotes.text: The more the diamond is cut the brighter it sparkles; and in what seems hard dealing, there God has no end in view but to perfect His people.
quotes.author: Thomas Guthrie

quotes.text: What do I geek out about? What am I? Hmmm. I love movies. I watch movies. I like big, sweeping epics, like Ed Zwick stuff: 'The Last Samurai,' 'Legends of the Fall,' 'Blood Diamond,' 'Glory.'
quotes.author: Chris Evans

quotes.text: I loved being outside. We'd hold lightning bugs in our fingers and pretend they were diamond rings.
quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

quotes.text: The events that I have attended to mark my Diamond Jubilee have been a humbling experience. It has touched me deeply to see so many thousands of families, neighbors and friends celebrating together in such a happy atmosphere.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.text: There are three things extremely hard: steel, a diamond, and to know one's self.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Invest in the human soul. Who knows, it might be a diamond in the rough.
quotes.author: Mary McLeod Bethune

quotes.text: Good news is rare these days, and every glittering ounce of it should be cherished and hoarded and worshipped and fondled like a priceless diamond.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: I would say Will came at a time in my life where he saw beauty in me that I didn't see in myself at the time. And, you know, he saw a diamond in the rough and kind of, picked me up and blew off all the dust and said, 'I'm telling you, I'm going to make you shine, girl.'
quotes.author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.text: Adversity is the diamond dust Heaven polishes its jewels with.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.text: Every man needs a good, solid watch. My favorite watch is the Presidential Rolex. I own many watches, but this one is usually the one on my wrist. I buy mine in the Diamond District in New York City. Classic.
quotes.author: French Montana

quotes.text: A fine quotation is a diamond in the hand of a man of wit and a pebble in the hand of a fool.
quotes.author: Joseph Roux

quotes.text: I thought of the soul as resembling a castle, formed of a single diamond or a very transparent crystal, and containing many rooms, just as in Heaven there are many mansions.
quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quotes.text: 'Shine On You Crazy Diamond' and 'Wish You Were Here' are standout tracks. 'Comfortably Numb' is another one. 'High Hopes' from 'The Division Bell' is one of my favorite all-time Pink Floyd tracks. 'The Great Gig in the Sky,' 'Echoes,' there's lot of them.
quotes.author: David Gilmour

quotes.text: When diamonds' role in fuelling violent conflict in Africa gained worldwide attention, the diamond industry established the Kimberley process in order to keep "blood diamonds" out of international trade.
quotes.author: Peter Singer

quotes.text: Boron is carbon's neighbor on the periodic table, which means it can do a passable carbon impression and wriggle its way into the matrix of a diamond. But it has one fewer electron, so it can't quite form the same four perfect bonds.
quotes.author: Sam Kean

quotes.text: Wit must be foiled by wit: cut a diamond with a diamond.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.text: Anyone can be confident with a full head of hair. But a confident bald man - there's your diamond in the rough.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.text: Whenever I fail as a father or husband... a toy and a diamond always works.
quotes.author: Shah Rukh Khan

quotes.text: I feel like in L.A., you wake up, you put your diamond studs on, put your workout gear, your cute shades, and it is kind of the outfit you stay in the entire day.
quotes.author: Adrienne Bailon

quotes.text: Better to be a strong man with a weak point, than to be a weak man without a strong point. A diamond with a flaw is more valuable that a brick without a flaw.
quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

quotes.text: If I had a ringtone, it would probably be Neil Diamond.
quotes.author: Evan Spiegel

quotes.text: My mother gave me a pair of diamond earrings when I was 13. It symbolised becoming a teenager. I also remember getting a collection of costume jewellery from my grandmother when I was in high school.
quotes.author: Erin Wasson

quotes.text: The kinds of things I like with crystals are the really beautiful costume jewelry, vintage pieces, and they usually have that diamond shape.
quotes.author: Zoe Kravitz

quotes.text: I love diamond facials - they leave me glowing and refreshed.
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.text: That to me was the most poignant part of Diana's wedding; as she was walking up the aisle and her eyes were going left to right, looking at people and smiling in the way that Diana did - and that diamond tiara glittering like mad. It was great.
quotes.author: Bruce Oldfield

quotes.text: Unfortunately, a lot of executives aren't like producers, and can't hear the diamond in the rough.
quotes.author: Kenneth Edmonds

quotes.text: I've always had my ear pierced with a diamond stud. I did it myself when I was 16.
quotes.author: Vinnie Jones
