quotes.text: My wedding was at home, so I didn't really want to wear a veil in my house. Instead I wore a lot of diamond hair clips. They were brooches, actually, designed by Lorraine Schwartz.
quotes.author: Georgina Chapman

quotes.text: None of my actions have ever sort of been motored by the search for a husband or wondering if I was going to have a family someday or wanting to live in a really great house or thinking it would be really great to have a diamond.
quotes.author: Lena Dunham

quotes.text: Music was our wife, and we loved her. And we stayed with her, and we clothed her, and we put diamond rings on her hands.
quotes.author: Lionel Hampton

quotes.text: Proverbs are mental gems gathered in the diamond fields of the mind.
quotes.author: William R. Alger

quotes.text: My mother was the influence on me - my father was absent. He was a diamond dealer; he was doing wonderful things in the background, and women were left at home. So my mother really was in charge of everything: the ballet, dance lessons, piano lessons, and latkes.
quotes.author: Maira Kalman

quotes.text: Ah... romance to me is spontaneity. It's not diamond earrings; it's a bunch of daffodils that's freshly picked from the field.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.text: I don't like American football. I think it's boring and ridiculous and predictable. But baseball is very beautiful. It's played on a diamond.
quotes.author: Jim Jarmusch

quotes.text: You can find a diamond in the rough a lot of times.
quotes.author: Kenneth Edmonds

quotes.text: You do Batman right, and he's going to be popular. He's a great character. I was once asked by somebody if writing 'Batman' was like holding a Ming vase or something. And I said, 'No, it's like holding a big-ass diamond that you can't break. You can throw him against the ceiling, against the floor, anywhere, and you just can't break Batman.'
quotes.author: Frank Miller

quotes.text: Yeah, it's tough being smart and sexy, too. I have to say, I'm really not that attractive. Until I met my husband, I could not get a date. I promise you it's true. My husband Jeff Richmond saw a diamond in the rough and took me in.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.text: Over the years, the diamond industry has had a devastating impact in countries such as Sierra Leone, Angola and the Congo, where profits from the sale of diamonds have been used to fund brutal wars, with disastrous effects on local communities.
quotes.author: Sheherazade Goldsmith

quotes.text: When you're competing, you don't have the choice of what the weather will be like. It really doesn't affect me. I ran one of my fastest times in the New York Diamond League meeting last year. It was raining pretty hard then.
quotes.author: Oscar Pistorius

quotes.text: The soul is placed in the body like a rough diamond, and must be polished, or the luster of it will never appear.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.text: At 10, I heard Neil Diamond's 'Solitary Man' and it moved me so deeply I stood, frozen in place during school recess, feeling such empathy for the narrator in Diamond's masterpiece that my heart was smashed.
quotes.author: Dan Hill

quotes.text: This diamond has so many carats it's almost a turnip.
quotes.author: Richard Burton

quotes.text: I don't wear diamond necklaces. I'm not against it but I never could afford it, so now I just wear gold. I wear bracelets, rings, anklets.
quotes.author: ASAP Rocky

quotes.text: Now one thing I think is really lame, is if you're an artist and you go to a karaoke bar and sing your own song. I like to get up there and sing stuff that I would never sing on stage anywhere else. Like Neil Diamond.
quotes.author: Jason Aldean

quotes.text: While the House of Blues slogan has been 'In blues we trust,' its stages are usually filled with more reliable moneymakers - Neil Diamond and A Tribe Called Quest among them.
quotes.author: Bill Dedman

quotes.text: The media is convincing people that if you have that 'next thing,' that diamond, the right car, then you'd be happier.
quotes.author: Hill Harper

quotes.text: You can go to Graff and buy a diamond that's flawless. You aren't going to be able to buy the same diamond at Fortunoff, but it's still a diamond you can enjoy. If fashion can allow you to have the Chanel mystique through a lipstick, then why shouldn't art allow you to have that through a sweatshirt that says 'Cremaster' on it?
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.text: When I started the diamond business, no black person, period, was in it to do what we're trying to do to change the industry. So I like to do things that I see clearly that are in my, you know, scope. And then, I had to figure how I get talented or smart business people around me to execute. That's what I have to do.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.text: I think it's fun to look at people with big diamonds. I see them in my audience all the time, with the fur coat, a woman whose hand is always out front, or the two fingers are on the cheek to show her diamond. I don't have anything against that.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.text: I have been listening a lot to The Carpenters and Neil Diamond, Elton John, and thinking, like, 'God, it'd be great to write a sort of subversive, alternative ballad,' like Lou Reed does so well with 'Perfect Day.' And I really loved 'Video Games' - at the time, it hadn't really got as big, but it's a classic song; you can't deny it.
quotes.author: Bat for Lashes

quotes.text: Mozart and Neil Diamond may have begun with the same idea, but that a work of art is more than an idea is confirmed by the difference between the 'Soave sia il vento' and 'Kentucky Woman.' We have different words for 'art' and 'idea' because they are two different things.
quotes.author: Mark Helprin

quotes.text: I'm not full of malice, but I do dislike Neil Diamond a lot, and I'm sorry that I've done a Neil Diamond song.
quotes.author: Robert Wyatt

quotes.text: Born of the impossibly varied options we have to amuse ourselves, cutting-edge companies are finding innovative ways to tailor our entertainment choices to who we are, relieving us of the burden of finding the diamond in the rough of 500 TV channels or thousands of movies and music albums released every year.
quotes.author: Marcus Buckingham

quotes.text: I live in a small apartment in London, not some big house with a lot of security. I don't like too much security. There's no freedom. I'm a person, not some precious diamond that needs guarding every second.
quotes.author: Julian Lennon

quotes.text: I hope more people will ask diamond companies to continue changing the way they do business in Africa.
quotes.author: Djimon Hounsou

quotes.text: 'Blade Runner' is such a unique film. How do you describe a diamond? I don't think you should ever touch it again.
quotes.author: Rutger Hauer

quotes.text: My teachers treated me as a diamond in the rough, someone who needed smoothing.
quotes.author: Mother Jones

quotes.text: Imagine you are walking along, and you trip over something and you turn around and find that it is a huge diamond. You would pick it up and do everything in your power to take care of that diamond because it might take care of you for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Chad Michael Murray

quotes.text: I have a treadmill, and I work out with my trainer, Julie Diamond, as often as possible. She's so positive.
quotes.author: Emily Deschanel

quotes.text: To me this movie is about what is valuable. To one person it might be a stone; to someone else, a story in a magazine; to another, it is a child. The juxtaposition of one man obsessed with finding a valuable diamond with another man risking his life to find his son is the beating heart of this film.
quotes.author: Edward Zwick

quotes.text: My boyfriend's idea of a lesson was to take me on a black diamond run in the middle of a hail storm and say, 'Go!' Ski patrol had to escort me to another lift to get me down the mountain. No, that wasn't humiliating, not at all.
quotes.author: Claudia Black

quotes.text: I've never had a diamond before, and now I've got a diamond surrounded by other diamonds and diamonds in places where, frankly, you don't need diamonds at all, and I would have been happy with a piece of twine.
quotes.author: Summer Phoenix

quotes.text: Even if the whole earth and sea were turned to gold, they could hardly satisfy the avarice of a woman... You can more easily scratch a diamond with your fingernail than you can by any human ingenuity get a woman to consent to giving any of her savings.
quotes.author: Andreas Capellanus

quotes.text: Look at Neil Diamond. Was he the cool guy? No, he was the housewives' guy. He didn't try to be what he wasn't. He just did what he did - made great music, was a good entertainer, nice-enough guy.
quotes.author: Michael Buble

quotes.text: I've been enjoying playing with fashion - gold grills and diamond grills have just become a part of that.
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.text: It's no fun getting older. I might be wearing beautiful diamond earrings, but they can't take away the pain of losing my hearing.
quotes.author: Cilla Black

quotes.text: For me, marriage is about love, not paperwork. I've never been the kid who dreamed of the big white dress, the long veil, the fancy diamond ring.
quotes.author: Crystal Bowersox

quotes.text: I'm not a professional entertainer. I'm not Neil Diamond.
quotes.author: Cat Power

quotes.text: Diamond Dallas saved my life. He didn't have to, but that's the kind of guy he is. He's helped so many people with his DDP Yoga. It's just incredible with the lives he's changing, the lives he's affecting. I am so honored to be part of that.
quotes.author: Jake Roberts

quotes.text: Scratch a dog and you'll find a permanent job.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.text: There's a tremendous difference between alone and lonely. You could be lonely in a group of people. I like being alone. I like eating by myself. I go home at night and just watch a movie or hang out with my dog. I have to exert myself and really say, oh God, I've got to see my friends 'cause I'm too content being by myself.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: I love women, but I feel like you can't trust some of them. Some of them are liars, you know? Like I was in the park and I met this girl, she was cute and she had a dog. And I went up to her, we started talking. She told me her dog's name. Then I said, 'Does he bite?' She said, 'No.' And I said, 'Oh yeah? Then how does he eat?' Liar.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: A door is what a dog is perpetually on the wrong side of.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.text: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: You cannot share your life with a dog, as I had done in Bournemouth, or a cat, and not know perfectly well that animals have personalities and minds and feelings.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.text: A dog is a vehicle, you know; a dog is a window to Mother Nature, and that's the closest species we have.
quotes.author: Cesar Millan

quotes.text: Life is like a dogsled team. If you ain't the lead dog, the scenery never changes.
quotes.author: Lewis Grizzard

quotes.text: A dog will teach you unconditional love. If you can have that in your life, things won't be too bad.
quotes.author: Robert Wagner

quotes.text: I still play hockey every now and then, and I still golf. But my biggest exercise is walking my big dog in the park every day.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.text: Acting is invigorating. But I don't analyse it too much. It's like a dog smelling where it's going to do its toilet in the morning.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.text: My idea of absolute happiness is to be in bed on a rainy day, with my blankie, my cat, and my dog.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: The dog, the rabbit and the hoop all feature in the painting, and take the place of the orrery.
quotes.author: Kit Williams

quotes.text: Consciousness-one level is understanding where we are in space. Consciousness two is where we understand our position in society: who's top dog, who's underdog and who's in the middle. And type-three consciousness is simulating the future. And type-three consciousness, only humans have this ability to see far into the future.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.text: I don't want to be treated like I came from another planet or something or was somehow born with some weird birthright or super power. I don't view myself that way. I am a normal guy, picking up the crap from the dog and scraping the BBQ and having a beer and fixing the shed out back.
quotes.author: Chris Hadfield

quotes.text: How many legs does a dog have if you call his tail a leg? Four. Saying that a tail is a leg doesn't make it a leg.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: I know of nothing more moving, indeed semi-tragic, than the yearning helplessness in the face of a dog, who understands what is said to him, and can not answer!
quotes.author: Bayard Taylor

quotes.text: People teach their dogs to sit; it's a trick. I've been sitting my whole life, and a dog has never looked at me as though he thought I was tricky.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.text: I like to wake up late, around 11 A.M., especially if I have been out the night before. Then I go to brunch with either my friends or my girlfriend. I then like to just chill out: read the papers, read some scripts and then take it very easy. If it's sunny, I go for a walk with my dog, Niles, in the countryside.
quotes.author: Douglas Booth

quotes.text: Did Superman really want to save the world, or did he just feel like he had to? Would he much rather be a farmer? Maybe. Would he much rather be hanging out with his dad and his mom and his dog? Probably.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.text: For us in Russia, communism is a dead dog, while, for many people in the West, it is still a living lion.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.text: If you saw a dog going to be crushed under a car, wouldn't you help him?
quotes.author: Oskar Schindler

quotes.text: When I believe in something, I'm like a dog with a bone.
quotes.author: Melissa McCarthy

quotes.text: I like women, but you can't always trust them. Some of them are big liars, like this one woman I met who had a dog. I asked her her dog's name and then I asked, 'Does he bite?' and she said, 'No.' And I said, 'So how does he eat?' Liar!
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: Love is the emotion that a woman feels always for a poodle dog and sometimes for a man.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.text: Hunger and fear are the only realities in dog life: an empty stomach makes a fierce dog.
quotes.author: Robert Falcon Scott

quotes.text: A lot of us are ruled by fear during our lives - afraid we'll get burgled, afraid a dog will bite us, afraid we'll get fat, afraid someone will leave us. Once you lose fear, life becomes sweeter, and that happens as you get older. I'm sure by the time I'm 80, I'll be able to do absolutely anything!
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.text: I believe that I was a dog in a past life. That's the only thing that would explain why I like to snack on Purina Dog Chow.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.text: A statesman who confines himself to popular legislation - or, for the matter of that, a playwright who confines himself to popular plays - is like a blind man's dog who goes wherever the blind man pulls him, on the ground that both of them want to go to the same place.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: All of Koons's best art - the encased vacuum cleaners, the stainless-steel Rabbit (the late-twentieth century's signature work of Simulationist sculpture), the amazing gleaming Balloon Dog, and the cast-iron re-creation of a Civil War mortar exhibited last month at the Armory - has simultaneously flaunted extreme realism, idealism, and fantasy.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: If you don't own a dog, at least one, there is not necessarily anything wrong with you, but there may be something wrong with your life.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.text: I admired the way McCain worked on campaign finance reform. I admired the way Nancy Pelosi stiffened the Democrats' spine during the health care debate. I admire the way Barack Obama has raised a dog in the White House without ever putting it on the roof of the car for a vacation drive.
quotes.author: Gail Collins

quotes.text: I've always said money may buy you a fine dog, but only love can make it wag its tail.
quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

quotes.text: When I have no appointments, I spend the day in pajamas and go to the dog park in pajamas. I'm very casual.
quotes.author: Alexandra Daddario

quotes.text: I'm not a great actor - let's face it. I don't have a great deal of scope. There are certain things I can do, but when I'm bad, I stink. There's something about my shaggy dog eyes that makes people think I'm good. I'm not all that good.
quotes.author: Steve McQueen

quotes.text: You gotta love Rick Perry's swagger. The Texas Governor is out there in the Iowa cornfields, unabashedly going to toe-to-toe with President Obama, doing his best to instantly cast himself as the big dog in the Republican pack.
quotes.author: Jeff Goodell

quotes.text: I am not a cat man, but a dog man, and all felines can tell this at a glance - a sharp, vindictive glance.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.text: The time to save is now. When a dog gets a bone, he doesn't go out and make a down payment on a bigger bone. He buries the one he's got.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: I have never met a dog I couldn't help; however, I have met humans who weren't willing to change.
quotes.author: Cesar Millan

quotes.text: You may lose your wife, you may lose your dog, your mother may hate you. None of those things matter. What matters is that you achieve success and become free. Then you can do whatever you like.
quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.text: My view is quite simple. When your dog pees on the carpet, you do not give away your dog. You say, This dog is special. I have to teach him not to pee on the carpet. I feel exactly the same way about men. They need to be taught things.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Bisset

quotes.text: I don't want to have kids for like 10 years. I still have a lot to do. I don't even know if I could handle a dog right now. I'm so not ready. Someday I'll be a mom but not until I'm in my 30s.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.text: 'Hound Dog' took like twelve minutes. That's not a complicated piece of work. But the rhyme scheme was difficult. Also the metric structure of the music was not easy. 'Kansas City' was maybe eight minutes, if that. Writing the early blues was spontaneous. You can hear the energy in the work.
quotes.author: Jerry Leiber

quotes.text: In India, if you are from the elite, dogs are extremely important. The breed of the dog indicates your wealth, that you are westernized. The cook, another human being, is on a much lower level than your dog. You see this all the time.
quotes.author: Kiran Desai

quotes.text: I've been on so many blind dates, I should get a free dog.
quotes.author: Wendy Liebman

quotes.text: The life of an uneducated man is as useless as the tail of a dog which neither covers its rear end, nor protects it from the bites of insects.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: It all started when my dog began getting free roll over minutes.
quotes.author: Jay London

quotes.text: I am happier when I love than when I am loved. I adore my husband, my son, my grandchildren, my mother, my dog, and frankly, I don't know if they even like me. But who cares? Loving them is my joy.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.text: The bond with a true dog is as lasting as the ties of this earth will ever be.
quotes.author: Konrad Lorenz

quotes.text: Fall in love with a dog, and in many ways you enter a new orbit, a universe that features not just new colors but new rituals, new rules, a new way of experiencing attachment.
quotes.author: Caroline Knapp

quotes.text: A blind bloke walks into a shop with a guide dog. He picks the Dog up and starts swinging it around his head. Alarmed, a shop assistant calls out: 'Can I help, sir?' 'No thanks,' says the blind bloke. 'Just looking.'
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.text: Sushi is something very exclusive. It is not like a McDonald's, not like a hot dog, not like a French fry. It's very high-class cooking in Japan.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: I am called a dog because I fawn on those who give me anything, I yelp at those who refuse, and I set my teeth in rascals.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.text: I'm cool with the way I look, I'm not an ugly dog, but I don't see myself as a stud or anything.
quotes.author: Seann William Scott

quotes.text: When the idea of 'Chopped' surfaced, it was originally meant to be taped at some guy's mansion with him and his crazy Chihuahua. A stuffy fellow in a tuxedo was to host, and the losing chef's dish was then fed to the dog! I am not kidding, I saw it! I think it is genius! Twisted, but genius!
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.text: The dog can only become what's in your bubble. The dog is imitating the energy that is in your bubble. You are the source, the feast of energy. If you feel anxious, the dog becomes anxious with you. If you become nervous, the dog wakes up nervous with you.
quotes.author: Cesar Millan

quotes.text: I usually plan to read a book for a half-hour before bed, but then I end up staying awake until 3 A.M. to finish it. Fortunately, my dog doesn't mind when I keep the bedside lamp on.
quotes.author: Amanda Hocking

quotes.text: Oh, love will make a dog howl in rhyme.
quotes.author: Francis Beaumont

quotes.text: Truth is a good dog; but always beware of barking too close to the heels of an error, lest you get your brains kicked out.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: In many ways, September feels like the busiest time of the year: The kids go back to school, work piles up after the summer's dog days, and Thanksgiving is suddenly upon us.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.text: The raccoons, foxes, beavers, chinchillas, minks, rabbits, and yes, sometimes even dogs and cats that are killed for fur are not very different from your beloved dog or cat. They all have eyes, ears and hearts. They all experience pain when they are physically maimed. They shake with fear when they experience terror.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.text: From food trucks to hot dog stands to county fair favorites, 'street food' has enjoyed a rich and storied history in American cuisine. However, street food has been around for thousands of years. In fact, street food is believed to have originated as far back as Ancient Rome.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: I love spending time with my dog, my niece and my family. I'm very family-oriented.
quotes.author: Lil' Kim

quotes.text: Animals have come to mean so much in our lives. We live in a fragmented and disconnected culture. Politics are ugly, religion is struggling, technology is stressful, and the economy is unfortunate. What's one thing that we have in our lives that we can depend on? A dog or a cat loving us unconditionally, every day, very faithfully.
quotes.author: Jon Katz

quotes.text: Puerto Rico has a stray dog problem. Tens of thousands of homeless canines - hundreds of thousands, by some estimates - live and die on the streets and beaches all over this Caribbean island of almost four million people.
quotes.author: Juliana Hatfield

quotes.text: I like animals, all animals. I wouldn't hurt a cat or a dog - or a chicken or a cow. And I wouldn't ask someone else to hurt them for me. That's why I'm a vegetarian.
quotes.author: Peter Dinklage

quotes.text: The best thing you can do when you're not feeling funny is go out and get more stimuli from the world, get out and walk around, read a book, go talk to some birds or a dog and replenish the well, as it were.
quotes.author: Rob Delaney

quotes.text: The dog and the rabbit are telling us not to chase unattainable material goals.
quotes.author: Kit Williams

quotes.text: Revenge is often like biting a dog because the dog bit you.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.text: Life is life - whether in a cat, or dog or man. There is no difference there between a cat or a man. The idea of difference is a human conception for man's own advantage.
quotes.author: Sri Aurobindo

quotes.text: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Truly, I would not hang a dog by my will, much more a man who hath any honesty in him.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: They wrote in the old days that it is sweet and fitting to die for one's country. But in modern war, there is nothing sweet nor fitting in your dying. You will die like a dog for no good reason.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: What counts is not necessarily the size of the dog in the fight - it's the size of the fight in the dog.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: In America the schools have become too permissive, the kids now are controlling the schools, the tail is wagging the dog. We've got to make a change there and get it back to where the teachers have control of the classrooms.
quotes.author: Chuck Norris

quotes.text: Jealousy is a dog's bark which attracts thieves.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.text: The dog that trots about finds a bone.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.text: No matter how you're feeling, a little dog gunna love you.
quotes.author: Waka Flocka Flame

quotes.text: My dog doesn't worry about the meaning of life. She may worry if she doesn't get her breakfast, but she doesn't sit around worrying about whether she will get fulfilled or liberated or enlightened. As long as she gets some food and a little affection, her life is fine.
quotes.author: Joko Beck

quotes.text: Time spent with cats is never wasted.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.text: Scratch a dog and you'll find a permanent job.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.text: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: Until one has loved an animal a part of one's soul remains unawakened.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: I love women, but I feel like you can't trust some of them. Some of them are liars, you know? Like I was in the park and I met this girl, she was cute and she had a dog. And I went up to her, we started talking. She told me her dog's name. Then I said, 'Does he bite?' She said, 'No.' And I said, 'Oh yeah? Then how does he eat?' Liar.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.text: If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.text: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.text: There are two means of refuge from the miseries of life: music and cats.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: He who is cruel to animals becomes hard also in his dealings with men. We can judge the heart of a man by his treatment of animals.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.text: Cats have a scam going - you buy the food, they eat the food, they go away; that's the deal.
quotes.author: Eddie Izzard

quotes.text: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: You cannot share your life with a dog, as I had done in Bournemouth, or a cat, and not know perfectly well that animals have personalities and minds and feelings.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.text: Cats are connoisseurs of comfort.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.text: A dog is a vehicle, you know; a dog is a window to Mother Nature, and that's the closest species we have.
quotes.author: Cesar Millan

quotes.text: Ever consider what pets must think of us? I mean, here we come back from a grocery store with the most amazing haul - chicken, pork, half a cow. They must think we're the greatest hunters on earth!
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.text: Animals are sentient, intelligent, perceptive, funny and entertaining. We owe them a duty of care as we do to children.
quotes.author: Michael Morpurgo

quotes.text: There is no psychiatrist in the world like a puppy licking your face.
quotes.author: Bernard Williams

quotes.text: In ancient times cats were worshipped as gods; they have not forgotten this.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: Cats are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a function.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.text: Cats have it all - admiration, an endless sleep, and company only when they want it.
quotes.author: Rod McKuen

quotes.text: I wonder if other dogs think poodles are members of a weird religious cult.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.text: A kitten is in the animal world what a rosebud is in the garden.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.text: Animals are such agreeable friends - they ask no questions; they pass no criticisms.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: Dogs are better than human beings because they know but do not tell.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.text: I have studied many philosophers and many cats. The wisdom of cats is infinitely superior.
quotes.author: Hippolyte Taine

quotes.text: I believe cats to be spirits come to earth. A cat, I am sure, could walk on a cloud without coming through.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.text: Animals are reliable, many full of love, true in their affections, predictable in their actions, grateful and loyal. Difficult standards for people to live up to.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.text: Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.text: I had been told that the training procedure with cats was difficult. It's not. Mine had me trained in two days.
quotes.author: Bill Dana

quotes.text: Pets are humanizing. They remind us we have an obligation and responsibility to preserve and nurture and care for all life.
quotes.author: James Cromwell

quotes.text: The trouble with a kitten is that eventually it becomes a cat.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.text: The smallest feline is a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: The better I get to know men, the more I find myself loving dogs.
quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

quotes.text: Pets have more love and compassion in them than most humans.
quotes.author: Robert Wagner

quotes.text: The cat is a dilettante in fur.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.text: Perhaps it is because cats do not live by human patterns, do not fit themselves into prescribed behavior, that they are so united to creative people.
quotes.author: Andre Norton

quotes.text: I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: What counts is not necessarily the size of the dog in the fight - it's the size of the fight in the dog.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: Dogs got personality. Personality goes a long way.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.text: Cats are very independent animals. They're very sexy, if you want. Dogs are different. They're familiar. They're obedient. You call a cat, you go, 'Cat, come here.' He doesn't come to you unless you have something in your hand that he thinks might be food. They're very free animals, and I like that.
quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

quotes.text: As anyone who has ever been around a cat for any length of time well knows, cats have enormous patience with the limitations of the human kind.
quotes.author: Cleveland Amory

quotes.text: Cats are inquisitive, but hate to admit it.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.text: Some dog I got too. We call him Egypt. Because in every room he leaves a pyramid.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: Don't accept your dog's admiration as conclusive evidence that you are wonderful.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: Just watching my cats can make me happy.
quotes.author: Paula Cole

quotes.text: A kitten is chiefly remarkable for rushing about like mad at nothing whatever, and generally stopping before it gets there.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.text: I have felt cats rubbing their faces against mine and touching my cheek with claws carefully sheathed. These things, to me, are expressions of love.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.text: It's difficult to understand why people don't realize that pets are gifts to mankind.
quotes.author: Linda Blair

quotes.text: I've got a new invention. It's a revolving bowl for tired goldfish.
quotes.author: Lefty Gomez

quotes.text: Cats know how to obtain food without labor, shelter without confinement, and love without penalties.
quotes.author: W. L. George

quotes.text: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.
quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

quotes.text: I like animals because they are not consciously cruel and don't betray each other.
quotes.author: Taylor Caldwell

quotes.text: My little dog - a heartbeat at my feet.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.text: It is much easier to show compassion to animals. They are never wicked.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.text: There are all sorts of cute puppy dogs, but it doesn't stop people from going out and buying Dobermans.
quotes.author: Angus Young

quotes.text: If you are a dog and your owner suggests that you wear a sweater suggest that he wear a tail.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.text: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.text: Owners lavish love on their pets, which is why so many go from non-aggressive pups to being out of control when they're older. People just don't realise their dog must respect them as leader of the pack.
quotes.author: Cesar Millan

quotes.text: Cat: a pygmy lion who loves mice, hates dogs, and patronizes human beings.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.text: No matter how much cats fight, there always seem to be plenty of kittens.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: I wish I could write as mysterious as a cat.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: I wish people would realize that animals are totally dependent on us, helpless, like children, a trust that is put upon us.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.text: No one can feel as helpless as the owner of a sick goldfish.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.text: The clever cat eats cheese and breathes down rat holes with baited breath.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: If a dog jumps into your lap, it is because he is fond of you; but if a cat does the same thing, it is because your lap is warmer.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.text: It is impossible for a lover of cats to banish these alert, gentle, and discriminating friends, who give us just enough of their regard and complaisance to make us hunger for more.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.text: I never married because there was no need. I have three pets at home which answer the same purpose as a husband. I have a dog which growls every morning, a parrot which swears all afternoon, and a cat that comes home late at night.
quotes.author: Marie Corelli

quotes.text: I worked in a pet store and people would ask how big I would get.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: We have three cats. It's like having children, but there is no tuition involved.
quotes.author: Ron Reagan

quotes.text: Dogs laugh, but they laugh with their tails.
quotes.author: Max Eastman

quotes.text: A happy arrangement: many people prefer cats to other people, and many cats prefer people to other cats.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.text: I looked up my family tree and found three dogs using it.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: A real Christian is a person who can give his pet parrot to the town gossip.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.text: Many who have spent a lifetime in it can tell us less of love than the child that lost a dog yesterday.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.text: Before you get a dog, you can't quite imagine what living with one might be like; afterward, you can't imagine living any other way.
quotes.author: Caroline Knapp

quotes.text: People who keep dogs are cowards who haven't got the guts to bite people themselves.
quotes.author: August Strindberg

quotes.text: People always joke that 'dog' spells 'god' backwards. They should consider that it might be the higher power coming down to see just how well they do, what kind of people they are. The animals are right here, right in front of us. And how we treat these companions is a test.
quotes.author: Linda Blair

quotes.text: Animals have a much better attitude to life and death than we do. They know when their time has come. We are the ones that suffer when they pass, but it's a healing kind of grief that enables us to deal with other griefs that are not so easy to grab hold of.
quotes.author: Emmylou Harris

quotes.text: Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.text: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: A lion is called a 'king of beasts' obviously for a reason.
quotes.author: Jack Hanna

quotes.text: It is better to have a lion at the head of an army of sheep, than a sheep at the head of an army of lions.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.text: I never thought much of the courage of a lion tamer. Inside the cage he is at least safe from people.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Once I climbed into a mountain lion's cage and she bounded at me and put her paw on my face, but she kept her claws withdrawn.
quotes.author: Edward Hoagland

quotes.text: I think Clinton, after getting into office and into Washington, was shocked at being bludgeoned. So he spent time trying to be all things to all people - one way guaranteed not to be successful or respected in a lion's den. You can't just play around with all those big cats - you've got to take somebody on.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: When I have bad days, I just eat lots of chocolate ice cream and dance to the 'Lion King' soundtrack. It's really odd, but it's true.
quotes.author: Blake Lively

quotes.text: I carry around this little lion named Leo, which I've had for as long as I can remember.
quotes.author: Shawn Mendes

quotes.text: People go to the zoo and they like the lion because it's scary. And the bear because it's intense, but the monkey makes people laugh.
quotes.author: Lorne Michaels

quotes.text: For us in Russia, communism is a dead dog, while, for many people in the West, it is still a living lion.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.text: Only in art will the lion lie down with the lamb, and the rose grow without thorn.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.text: A lion runs the fastest when he is hungry.
quotes.author: Salman Khan

quotes.text: The lion and the calf shall lie down together but the calf won't get much sleep.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: I would rather be the tail of a lion than the head of a mouse.
quotes.author: Daddy Yankee

quotes.text: After The Wizard Of Oz I was typecast as a lion, and there aren't all that many parts for lions.
quotes.author: Bert Lahr

quotes.text: If you could cross a lion and a monkey, that's what I'd be, because monkeys are funny and lions are strong.
quotes.author: Marlon Wayans

quotes.text: All species capable of grasping this fact manage better in the struggle for existence than those which rely upon their own strength alone: the wolf, which hunts in a pack, has a greater chance of survival than the lion, which hunts alone.
quotes.author: Christian Lous Lange

quotes.text: To achieve the mood of a warrior is not a simple matter. It is a revolution. To regard the lion and the water rats and our fellow men as equals is a magnificent act of a warrior's spirit. It takes power to do that.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.text: People speak of the fear of the blank canvas as though it is a temporary hesitation, a trembling moment of self-doubt. For me it was more like being abducted from my bed by a clown, thrust into a circus arena with a wicker chair, and told to tame a pissed-off lion in front of an expectant crowd.
quotes.author: Hannah Kent

quotes.text: The real power of the Buddha was that he had so much love. He saw people trapped in their notions of small separate self, feeling guilty or proud of that self, and he offered revolutionary teachings that resounded like a lion's roar, like a great rising tide, helping people to wake up and break free from the prison of ignorance.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Vegetarians are cool. All I eat are vegetarians - except for the occasional mountain lion steak.
quotes.author: Ted Nugent

quotes.text: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.text: Do I believe in arbitration? I do. But not in arbitration between the lion and the lamb, in which the lamb is in the morning found inside the lion.
quotes.author: Samuel Gompers

quotes.text: With each new day in Africa, a gazelle wakes up knowing he must outrun the fastest lion or perish. At the same time, a lion stirs and stretches, knowing he must outrun the fastest gazelle or starve. It's no different for the human race. Whether you consider yourself a gazelle or a lion, you have to run faster than others to survive.
quotes.author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

quotes.text: The one excellent thing that can be learned from a lion is that whatever a man intends doing should be done by him with a whole-hearted and strenuous effort.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: I love watching the Serengeti, the way lions live. The only way the king lion loses his crown is by somebody physically defeating him.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.text: You know, I am a Leo. Lion is a giant part of me.
quotes.author: Patrick Swayze

quotes.text: It's better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kenny

quotes.text: The lion is, however, rarely heard - much more seldom seen.
quotes.author: John Hanning Speke

quotes.text: I am sometimes a fox and sometimes a lion. The whole secret of government lies in knowing when to be the one or the other.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: If a lion could talk, we could not understand him.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.text: These are the animals that are the reason why you don't see old animals in the wild. You don't see sick animals in the wild. You don't see lame animals in the wild, and its all because of the predator: the lion, the tiger, the leopard, all the cats.
quotes.author: Tippi Hedren

quotes.text: Fear not, we are of the nature of the lion, and cannot descend to the destruction of mice and such small beasts.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.text: An injured lion still wants to roar.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.text: A lion's work hours are only when he's hungry; once he's satisfied, the predator and prey live peacefully together.
quotes.author: Chuck Jones

quotes.text: When many work together for a goal, Great things may be accomplished. It is said a lion cub was killed By a single colony of ants.
quotes.author: Saskya Pandita

quotes.text: I am impelled, not to squeak like a grateful and apologetic mouse, but to roar like a lion out of pride in my profession.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.text: Only in art will the lion lie down with the lamb, and the rose grow without the thorn.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.text: Cat: a pygmy lion who loves mice, hates dogs, and patronizes human beings.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.text: An optimist is someone who gets treed by a lion but enjoys the scenery.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.text: I was the shyest human ever invented, but I had a lion inside me that wouldn't shut up!
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.text: Some people lose all respect for the lion unless he devours them instantly. There is no pleasing some people.
quotes.author: Will Cuppy

quotes.text: I've eaten lion, leopard, crocodile, python. I don't recommend lion. It tastes exactly like when a tomcat comes into your house and sprays. Snake and crocodile are great - a cross between lobster and chicken.
quotes.author: Wilbur Smith

quotes.text: We have a lion, tiger, liger, which is the father is a lion and the mother is a tiger, black and spotted leopard, mountain lion, Asian leopard cats. Weve got a tremendous number of the exotic feline.
quotes.author: Tippi Hedren

quotes.text: Right now I'm looking at a liger out my bedroom window. He's half lion and half tiger. And he's absolutely beautiful. His name is Patrick.
quotes.author: Tippi Hedren

quotes.text: I was a creative player, but I got some bad injuries early on and I decided that if this was a jungle we were playing in then it's better to be a lion than a lamb.
quotes.author: Johnny Giles

quotes.text: It was the nation and the race dwelling all round the globe that had the lion's heart. I had the luck to be called upon to give the roar.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Dressed in the lion's skin, the ass spread terror far and wide.
quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

quotes.text: I remember in the circus learning that the clown was the prince, the high prince. I always thought that the high prince was the lion or the magician, but the clown is the most important.
quotes.author: Roberto Benigni

quotes.text: 'Hairspray' was a movie turned Broadway musical turned Hollywood remake, and that is the 'Lion King' circle of life as we know it in Times Square, the creative loop that swings for the stars and sometimes crashes into the upper deck.
quotes.author: James Wolcott

quotes.text: At twenty a man is a peacock, at thirty a lion, at forty a camel, at fifty a serpent, at sixty a dog, at seventy an ape, at eighty a nothing at all.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.text: Every dog is a lion at home.
quotes.author: Henry George Bohn

quotes.text: Don't ask me who's influenced me. A lion is made up of the lambs he's digested, and I've been reading all my life.
quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

quotes.text: You don't see sick animals in the wild. You don't see lame animals in the wild, and its all because of the predator: the lion, the tiger, the leopard, all the cats.
quotes.author: Tippi Hedren

quotes.text: Mostly I make lists for projects. This can be daunting. Breaking something big into its constituent parts will help you organize your thoughts, but it can also force you to confront the depth of your ignorance and the hugeness of the task. That's OK. The project may be the lion, but the list is your whip.
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.text: It's not about being thin, it's about being healthy. And when you are a child you like to eat all these unhealthy things like chocolate and sweets. Oh my God. I love strawberries dipped in chocolate and Lion bars and Toffee Crisps - and as you grow up, you have to learn that those things are only good in moderation or you will become very fat.
quotes.author: Dionne Bromfield

quotes.text: I am more afraid of an army of 100 sheep led by a lion than an army of 100 lions led by a sheep.
quotes.author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quotes.text: 'The Lion' all began with a picture of a faun carrying an umbrella and parcels in a snowy wood. This picture had been in my mind since I was about sixteen. Then one day, when I was about forty, I said to myself, 'Let's try to make a story about it.'
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: Those who are preparing for the coming of Christ should be sober, and watch unto prayer, for our adversary, the Devil, goeth about like a roaring lion, seeking whom he may devour; whom we are to resist steadfast in the faith.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.text: You may as well say, 'That's a valiant flea that dare eat his breakfast on the lip of a lion.
quotes.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

quotes.text: What happens when you take a lion out of the safari and try to take him to your place of residence and make him a house pet? It ain't going to happen. That's the type of person that I am. I'm that lion.
quotes.author: Cam Newton

quotes.text: My number one inspiration was my mother. She worked two jobs and had breakfast and dinner prepared. I essentially called my mother, The Lion. She's fierce and she's proud. I'd like to think some of that rubbed off on me.
quotes.author: Christopher Judge

quotes.text: This first print run of the first edition of my first novel, 'When The Lion Feeds.' back in 1964, is so rare it can fetch several thousand pounds at auction. I always wanted to be an author, and I decided to write about what I knew.
quotes.author: Wilbur Smith

quotes.text: Don't ask who's influenced me. A lion is made up of the lambs he's digested, and I've been reading all my life.
quotes.author: Giorgos Seferis

quotes.text: Mushrooms provide a vast array of potential medicinal compounds. Many mushrooms - such as portobello, oyster, reishi and maitake - are well-known for these properties, but the lion's mane mushroom, in particular, has drawn the attention of researchers for its notable nerve-regenerative properties.
quotes.author: Paul Stamets

quotes.text: A lioness has got a lot more power than the lion likes to think she has.
quotes.author: Jacki Weaver

quotes.text: As far as a nuclear weapons-free zone, you know, when the lion lies down with the lamb, and you don't need a new lamb every day to satisfy the lion, then we might have this kind of transformation in the Middle East.
quotes.author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quotes.text: We are all vegetarians here, and except for a mountain lion that's been hanging around and killed our dog, we don't have a care in the world.
quotes.author: Dirk Benedict

quotes.text: Tyria's a big world. We get a grand tour in 'Ghosts of Ascalon.' We're in Divinity's Reach, we're in Lion's Arch, we're in Ebonhawke, we're in the Dragon's Land, we're in Ascalon. We're basically hitting a lot of the major human and charr locations.
quotes.author: Jeff Grubb

quotes.text: I came back from university thinking I knew all about politics and racism, not knowing my dad had been one of the youngest-serving Labour councillors in the town and had refused to work in South Africa years ago because of the situation there. And he's never mentioned it - you just find out. That's a real man to me. A sleeping lion.
quotes.author: Johnny Vegas

quotes.text: I've eaten sheep's eyes, the still hot meat from a zebra killed by a lion, and maggots which give you 70 calories to the ounce.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.text: Whenever the lion fish in the fish tank in the captain's ready room died it was always a sad moment.
quotes.author: Patrick Stewart

quotes.text: I don't mind going into a liberal lion's den. That's where you test yourself.
quotes.author: Charles Krauthammer

quotes.text: I would love to go into an animal's dream - like a lion's or a cat's. I'm sure that's pretty awesome.
quotes.author: Marion Cotillard

quotes.text: I did an interview once where I was asked who I found attractive and I went on about cartoons and Nala from 'The Lion King' - and it's a bit weird but various of my ex-girlfriends actually did look like Nala.
quotes.author: Eddie Redmayne

quotes.text: My mum loves cats so I took her to see the lion cubs which at about a year old are actually quite big. She wasn't scared at all and went straight over and kissed one on the mouth! She thought they were just like her pets at home.
quotes.author: Amanda Holden

quotes.text: A lion is not a lion is not a lion. As individuals, as mates, as members of a society, they're all very different.
quotes.author: Frans Lanting

quotes.text: I'm for conservation, but it's mostly a con. That's the trouble. It's sentimental. Buy an elephant a drink, a lion an acre.
quotes.author: Peter Beard

quotes.text: It's an incredibly difficult thing to bring a giraffe down. They can kill a lion with a single blow from their feet.
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.text: An Englishman, being flattered, is a lamb; threatened, a lion.
quotes.author: George Chapman

quotes.text: Time is the substance from which I am made. Time is a river which carries me along, but I am the river; it is a tiger that devours me, but I am the tiger; it is a fire that consumes me, but I am the fire.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.text: 'In Search of Excellence' - even the title - is a reminder that business isn't dry, dreary, boring, or by the numbers. Life at work can be cool - and work that's cool isn't confined to Tiger Woods, Yo-Yo Ma, or Tom Hanks. It's available to all of us and any of us.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.text: There isn't a flaw in his golf or his makeup. He will win more majors than Arnold Palmer and me combined. Somebody is going to dust my records. It might as well be Tiger, because he's such a great kid.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.text: Oddly enough, I'm not a particularly judgmental person. I just don't have a lot of filtering when I'm in 'tiger mother' mode. I say what comes into my head.
quotes.author: Amy Chua

quotes.text: So while I was in college I did a little study on the freight industry, the air freight industry. And I looked at this company called Flying Tiger. And I actually put a thousand dollars in it and I remember I thought this air cargo was going to be a thing of the future.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.text: Tiger's a horrible golf teacher.
quotes.author: Stuart Scott

quotes.text: A tiger does not shout its tigritude, it acts.
quotes.author: Wole Soyinka

quotes.text: In me the tiger sniffs the rose.
quotes.author: Siegfried Sassoon

quotes.text: Khrushchev reminds me of the tiger hunter who has picked a place on the wall to hang the tiger's skin long before he has caught the tiger. This tiger has other ideas.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: To me, Arnold was a pioneer in the spirit of Thomas Edison or Benjamin Franklin, while Tiger is a pioneer in the spirit of Bill Gates.
quotes.author: Mark McCormack

quotes.text: In waking a tiger, use a long stick.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.text: I give a speech to the black freshmen at Harvard each year, and I say, 'You can like Mozart and ice hockey...' - and then I used to say 'golf,' but Tiger took over golf! - 'and Picasso and still be as black as the ace of spades.'
quotes.author: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.text: Some people regard private enterprise as a predatory tiger to be shot. Others look on it as a cow they can milk. Not enough people see it as a healthy horse, pulling a sturdy wagon.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: China is responsible for a lot of the major conservation issues we're facing. It's the main market for rhino horn. Tigers are being killed for tiger bone wine. They're driving the tropical timber trade and illegal logging in Indonesia, and the trade in tropical reef fish.
quotes.author: Mark Carwardine

quotes.text: When a man wants to murder a tiger he calls it sport; when a tiger wants to murder him he calls it ferocity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: I have a different constitution. I have a different brain; I have a different heart; I got tiger blood, man.
quotes.author: Charlie Sheen

quotes.text: I'm different. I have a different constitution, I have a different brain, I have a different heart. I got tiger blood, man. Dying's for fools, dying's for amateurs.
quotes.author: Charlie Sheen

quotes.text: The serpent, the king, the tiger, the stinging wasp, the small child, the dog owned by other people, and the fool: these seven ought not to be awakened from sleep.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: My dad's a Pentecostal minister, meaning that he's full of charisma. If he's telling a story about Noah's ark, you best know each tiger is going to be having their own little conversation and narrative.
quotes.author: John Boyega

quotes.text: If we choose to walk into a forest where a tiger lives, we are taking a chance. If we swim in a river where crocodiles live, we are taking a chance. If we visit the desert or climb a mountain or enter a swamp where snakes have managed to survive, we are taking a chance.
quotes.author: Peter Benchley

quotes.text: An oppressive government is more to be feared than a tiger.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: These are the animals that are the reason why you don't see old animals in the wild. You don't see sick animals in the wild. You don't see lame animals in the wild, and its all because of the predator: the lion, the tiger, the leopard, all the cats.
quotes.author: Tippi Hedren

quotes.text: If you rile a tiger, he's going to show his claws.
quotes.author: Rob James-Collier

quotes.text: I feel like a tiger right now. There's nothing impossible if you get up and work for it.
quotes.author: Michael Flatley

quotes.text: I definitely have the eye of the tiger. I've fought my way to where I am and will continue to do so. I'm a hard worker - I get it from my family. We only know work. Nothing was handed to us. When I believe in something, I go after it. It's very hard to tell me 'no.'
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.text: An infallible method of conciliating a tiger is to allow oneself to be devoured.
quotes.author: Konrad Adenauer

quotes.text: I was slightly disappointed, but also encouraged, because I put myself in position to win a major, which is all even Tiger says he tries to do.
quotes.author: Stuart Appleby

quotes.text: The most magnificent creature in the entire world, the tiger is.
quotes.author: Jack Hanna

quotes.text: Added to the rooster of courses, 'Tiger Woods 10' adds in seven new courses from the pristine Bethpage Black, home of this year's U.S. Open, to the legendary Pinehurst. The Wii Weather Channel will even adjust the forecast to match the fairway because sometimes even the pros have to play in the rain.
quotes.author: Rob Manuel

quotes.text: We have a lion, tiger, liger, which is the father is a lion and the mother is a tiger, black and spotted leopard, mountain lion, Asian leopard cats. Weve got a tremendous number of the exotic feline.
quotes.author: Tippi Hedren

quotes.text: Right now I'm looking at a liger out my bedroom window. He's half lion and half tiger. And he's absolutely beautiful. His name is Patrick.
quotes.author: Tippi Hedren

quotes.text: The tiger springs in the new year. Us he devours.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: The atom bomb is a paper tiger which the United States reactionaries use to scare people. It looks terrible, but in fact it isn't.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.text: I admire a lot of people, but in terms of sport I've always loved the mentality of Tiger Woods on a golf course. I always love his eyes when he's setting himself and focusing on his decision; he has a really strong, focused face and believes that he can make the shot.
quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

quotes.text: To anger female voters in America is to tread on the tiger's tail. Women turn out in huge numbers, and they are well aware of how their bodies work and what they need.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: Tiger Woods did not always win majors with ease; after his narrow victory in the 1999 PGA, he slumped and sighed as if he'd been carrying rocks uphill all afternoon.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.text: You don't see sick animals in the wild. You don't see lame animals in the wild, and its all because of the predator: the lion, the tiger, the leopard, all the cats.
quotes.author: Tippi Hedren

quotes.text: I have both English bulldog determination and Bengal tiger strength.
quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

quotes.text: Every woman should have four pets in her life. A mink in her closet, a jaguar in her garage, a tiger in her bed, and a jackass who pays for everything.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: My father had always called me Sam since the day I was born. He rarely ever called me Tiger. I would ask him, 'Why don't you ever call me Tiger?' He says, 'Well, you look more like a Sam.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.text: Tiger is the greatest thing that's happened to the tour in a long time. He has brought incredible attention to golf at a time of year when football and the World Series always take precedence. Everything I've heard about him seems to be true.
quotes.author: Payne Stewart

quotes.text: The violinist is that peculiarly human phenomenon distilled to a rare potency - half tiger, half poet.
quotes.author: Yehudi Menuhin

quotes.text: I met Tiger Woods when he was younger. He's amazing - obviously technically, but his mental approach, too. He's really something.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Wooing the press is an exercise roughly akin to picnicking with a tiger. You might enjoy the meal, but the tiger always eats last.
quotes.author: Maureen Dowd

quotes.text: If Tiger Woods had played football, he would have been a quarterback.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: I see so many guys, really athletic guys, wearing pleats and I just shake my head. Like, Tiger Woods used to wear pleated pants! I'm like, 'C'mon, Tiger!'
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.text: You can use martial arts to tell a different story. Ang Lee used martial arts in 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' to talk about love.
quotes.author: Jet Li

quotes.text: I have to make things right with Tiger first before anything else.
quotes.author: Fuzzy Zoeller

quotes.text: Pop just didn't have enough substance for me. All this nyah-nyah-nyah, you know, 'Paper Tiger' and 'Hold the Ladder, James' and 'Crimson and Clover.' That wasn't music!
quotes.author: Gregg Allman

quotes.text: If I could give a shout-out to anything in the childhood world, I have to say 'Daniel Tiger.' I want to write a love letter to everyone on that staff. It is so perfectly, thoughtfully, lovingly done. And as a parent, it is the one thing out of everything that we dip in to that really helps.
quotes.author: Emma McLaughlin

quotes.text: The Malays have many queer notions about tigers and usually only speak of them in whispers, because they think that certain souls of human beings who have departed this life have taken up their abode in these beasts, and in some places, for this reason, they will not kill a tiger unless he commits some specially bad aggression.
quotes.author: Isabella Bird

quotes.text: Our concerns about what we saw in Australia: an economy clearly tied to China has hitched its wagon to the tail of the tiger. In terms of the general complacency, what we heard over and over from investors and clients and potential clients is, 'yes, yes, there are some excesses, but the government will figure out a way.'
quotes.author: James Chanos

quotes.text: We're in a celebrity culture, and when I turn on the news today I hear about Lindsay Lohan, Tiger Woods and Paris Hilton and the Kardashian sisters and 'Dancing with the Stars,' one thing after another, Kate Gosselin's new body.
quotes.author: Philip Yancey

quotes.text: When I'm not the Tiger Mom, I'm a professor at Yale Law School, and if one thing is clear to me from years of teaching, it's that there are many ways to produce fabulous kids. I have amazing students; some of them have strict parents, others have lenient parents, and many come from family situations that defy easy description.
quotes.author: Amy Chua

quotes.text: Tiger the dog had a showdown with a fast moving flower truck in the middle of the street and lost.
quotes.author: Barry Williams

quotes.text: I love the ambiguous kind of endings. I think, oftentimes, that's what life really is - there's no concrete path for you to take. It's always kind of a jumble of variables. Behind this door could be a beautiful woman, and behind the same door could be a tiger, you know? You don't know.
quotes.author: Joe Carnahan

quotes.text: If you got the game, you got the game. That's why Tiger Woods is out there playing golf with Greg Norman.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.text: I met Tiger Woods, and I looked in his eyes - and I saw Derek Jeter. They don't have to tell people they're good. They just prove it by the way they love the competition.
quotes.author: Joe Torre

quotes.text: How can I intimidate Tiger Woods? I mean, the guy's got 75 or whatever PGA Tour wins, 14 majors. He's been the biggest thing ever in our sport. How could some little 23-year-old from Northern Ireland with a few wins come up and intimidate him.
quotes.author: Rory McIlroy

quotes.text: I know I was a great friend to Tiger Woods. But when you have a relationship that's involves business and friendship - and the business part comes to an end - things always get a little blurry.
quotes.author: Hank Haney

quotes.text: Call it the Tiger Mom effect: In the business world today, failure is apparently not an option.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.text: 'The Tiger And The Snow' is a beautiful movie. I am in love with this idea.
quotes.author: Roberto Benigni

quotes.text: Tiger Woods makes me a better athlete.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: Well it's not easy being Tiger Woods on the course. It's not easy being Tiger Woods off the course. In his defense, it's not easy being Tiger Woods.
quotes.author: Hank Haney

quotes.text: My first novel, 'The Tiger's Daughter,' embodies the loneliness I felt but could not acknowledge, even to myself, as I negotiated the no man's land between the country of my past and the continent of my present.
quotes.author: Bharati Mukherjee

quotes.text: I have done everything I have ever wanted to do. I have swum with tiger sharks, been charged by lions and elephants. I have been shot three times, chased by crocodiles and, God be praised, I've made enough money that I can continue to do all the things I want to for as long as I am able.
quotes.author: Wilbur Smith

quotes.text: I just wasn't cut out to be a Chinese Tiger Mom. I'm more of an Irish Setter Dad.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: I was a tiger, a good fighter, in good shape, but I was always nervous before boxing matches.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.text: Tiger Woods was a month away from 34 years of age when his debutantes began turning up in the news. He was a grown man with a wife and two children. Well, we supposed he had a wife, but that was before we learned she was only an ornament.
quotes.author: Dan Jenkins

quotes.text: Roaring like a tiger turns some children into pianists who debut at Carnegie Hall but only crushes others. Coddling gives some the excuse to fail and others the chance to succeed.
quotes.author: Ayelet Waldman

quotes.text: Tiger Woods is the only sports star who's worth every penny he makes.
quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg

quotes.text: I think if you're a 'tiger parent' early on, you don't need to be a 'helicopter parent' in high school.
quotes.author: Amy Chua

quotes.text: Tiger parenting is all about raising independent, creative, courageous kids. In America today, there's a dangerous tendency to romanticize creativity in a way that may undermine it.
quotes.author: Amy Chua

quotes.text: I got this tiger head ring that's similar to a Cartier ring. I had my jeweler Sean from Detroit make it similar to the Cartier ring, but gold and diamonded-out. That's my Detroit tiger. It's made with two different golds - the bottom is yellow and the top is gold.
quotes.author: Big Sean

quotes.text: When I was a kid, everybody that played golf was an old man. Until Tiger showed up, they weren't in very good shape.
quotes.author: Norm MacDonald

quotes.text: My mother is an immigrant from China, and she filled my head with stories about ghosts and fighting monks in China, so the world of 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' was a very familiar one.
quotes.author: Tess Gerritsen

quotes.text: I don't think there is a perfect athlete. But if I had to come close to picking someone who demonstrates all the traits that I feel an athlete should have, I would say the perfect athlete would be Tiger Woods. He has the ability, he's humble and he's very good at what he does.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.text: For me, take Tiger Woods. I always thought he was great, but I never truly understood how good he was until I had the chance to go to Tiger Woods Golf Camp. He taught me how to swing and was hitting the ball, and this dude was unreal.
quotes.author: Larry Fitzgerald

quotes.text: Animal totems, like the tiger, come from the Other Side to protect us while we are away from Home.
quotes.author: Sylvia Browne

quotes.text: Kneeling on the sea bottom in a place known as Tiger Beach, I watched a 12-foot- long female tiger shark cruise over the turtle grass with three silver bar jacks swimming in front of her nose.
quotes.author: Brian Skerry

quotes.text: Any dictator would admire the uniformity and obedience of the U.S. media.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: A pattern is a guide or a model. Patterns are used in sewing and knitting, in wood and metalworking, and in a wide variety of other productive pursuits, activities, and jobs. Patterns help to avoid waste and unwanted deviations and facilitate uniformity that is appropriate and beneficial.
quotes.author: David A. Bednar

quotes.text: A well-made salad must have a certain uniformity; it should make perfect sense for those ingredients to share a bowl.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.text: The uniformity of the earth's life, more astonishing than its diversity, is accountable by the high probability that we derived, originally, from some single cell, fertilized in a bolt of lightning as the earth cooled.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.text: America has believed that in differentiation, not in uniformity, lies the path of progress. It acted on this belief; it has advanced human happiness, and it has prospered.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.text: The diversity in the faculties of men, from which the rights of property originate, is not less an insuperable obstacle to an uniformity of interests. The protection of these faculties is the first object of government.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.text: The human race is a herd. Here we are, unique, eternal aspects of consciousness with an infinity of potential, and we have allowed ourselves to become an unthinking, unquestioning blob of conformity and uniformity. A herd. Once we concede to the herd mentality, we can be controlled and directed by a tiny few. And we are.
quotes.author: David Icke

quotes.text: God requireth not a uniformity of religion.
quotes.author: Roger Williams

quotes.text: I distrust Great Men. They produce a desert of uniformity around them and often a pool of blood too, and I always feel a little man's pleasure when they come a cropper.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.text: In bodies moved, the motion is received, increased, diminished, or lost, according to the relations of the quantity of matter and velocity; each diversity is uniformity, each change is constancy.
quotes.author: Charles de Secondat

quotes.text: Let's make it simple: Government control means uniformity, regulation, fees, inspection, and yes, compliance.
quotes.author: Tom Graves

quotes.text: Houses are built to live in, and not to look on: therefore let use be preferred before uniformity.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Science has sometimes been said to be opposed to faith, and inconsistent with it. But all science, in fact, rests on a basis of faith, for it assumes the permanence and uniformity of natural laws - a thing which can never be demonstrated.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.text: You're going to have 100s of millions of users on Chrome, spanning mobile, tablets, and desktops. That is one unfragmented base. That uniformity is probably better than most of the issues across browsers.
quotes.author: Sundar Pichai

quotes.text: Our party believes in diversity, not uniformity.
quotes.author: Francis Maude

quotes.text: What's sometimes really overwhelming in Sweden is the uniformity. People kind of disappear by all looking the same and wearing the same clothes. There are a lot of great individuals, but it can become a very blank and bleak picture.
quotes.author: Neneh Cherry

quotes.text: With 'Divergent' and 'Insurgent,' there isn't great emphasis on uniformity; it's a vigilante military, the state is in disarray, and there is no reference point for authenticity, so it's just weapons work and circumstantial fighting.
quotes.author: Jai Courtney

quotes.text: Americans enjoy uniformity in a way that the British don't; they wanted everybody of a sort of nice chorus line height and here I was, this person who was a good three inches taller than anyone else on the end of the line.
quotes.author: Jeremy Irons

quotes.text: We have the universe to roam in in imagination. It is our virtue to be infinitely varied. The worst tyranny is uniformity.
quotes.author: George William Russell

quotes.text: The simplicity and uniformity of rural occupations, and their incessant practice, preclude any anxieties and agitations of hope and fear, to which employments of a more precarious and casual nature are subject.
quotes.author: William Falconer

quotes.text: We want a vernacular in art. No mere verbal or formal agreement, or dead level of uniformity but that comprehensive and harmonizing unity with individual variety which can be developed among people politically and socially free.
quotes.author: Walter Crane

quotes.text: I'm not Amish, but I grew up in that same area of Pennsylvania and became very attracted to the inherent strictness and uniformity of that community.
quotes.author: Thom Browne

quotes.text: The problem, for me, with the writing programs is that they produce a terrible uniformity of product.
quotes.author: Peter Davison

quotes.text: The great fact of individual difference and variability (that is, inequality) is evident from the long record of human experience: hence, the general recognition of the antihuman nature of a world of coerced uniformity.
quotes.author: Murray Rothbard

quotes.text: A whole set of values comes with fast food: Everything should be fast, cheap and easy; there's always more where that came from; there are no seasons; you shouldn't be paid very much for preparing food. It's uniformity and a lack of connection.
quotes.author: Alice Waters

quotes.text: Variety of mere nothings gives more pleasure than uniformity of something.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.text: People have different takes on clothes and what to wear and colors and all that stuff, so why make a big deal about uniformity? It took me a long time to grasp that particular concept, simply because I was coming from the James Brown thing. Again, I wouldn't trade that experience for anything.
quotes.author: Maceo Parker

quotes.text: Any dictator would admire the uniformity and obedience of the U.S. media.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky
