quotes.text: Ever consider what pets must think of us? I mean, here we come back from a grocery store with the most amazing haul - chicken, pork, half a cow. They must think we're the greatest hunters on earth!
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.text: Canada is like an old cow. The West feeds it. Ontario and Quebec milk it. And you can well imagine what it's doing in the Maritimes.
quotes.author: Tommy Douglas

quotes.text: For almost seventy years the life insurance industry has been a smug sacred cow feeding the public a steady line of sacred bull.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.text: Real nutrition comes from soybeans, almonds, rice, and other healthy vegetable sources, not from a cow's udder.
quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

quotes.text: If happiness truly consisted in physical ease and freedom from care, then the happiest individual would not be either a man or a woman; it would be, I think, an American cow.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.text: My cow is not pretty, but it is pretty to me.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.text: The cow is of the bovine ilk; one end is moo, the other milk.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.text: In the 1990s, it's OK to do comedy about the Chernobyl disaster or the Space Shuttle blowing up. It's acceptable to ridicule the Pope or the President of the United States, but God forbid you do a joke... about gays. The gay community is the last sacred cow in this society.
quotes.author: Sam Kinison

quotes.text: If one commits the act of sodomy with a cow, an ewe, or a camel, their urine and their excrements become impure, and even their milk may no longer be consumed. The animal must then be killed and as quickly as possible and burned.
quotes.author: Ruhollah Khomeini

quotes.text: I don't do impersonations. I can do a wounded elephant! I can do a really good cow! And because of the amount of time I spent in North Yorkshire, I do a variety of sheep. All of which I will be happy to roll out for you!
quotes.author: Patrick Stewart

quotes.text: I like animals, all animals. I wouldn't hurt a cat or a dog - or a chicken or a cow. And I wouldn't ask someone else to hurt them for me. That's why I'm a vegetarian.
quotes.author: Peter Dinklage

quotes.text: Some people regard private enterprise as a predatory tiger to be shot. Others look on it as a cow they can milk. Not enough people see it as a healthy horse, pulling a sturdy wagon.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Growing up, I was a little hippie kid. I went to some good concerts... Amnesty International with Bob Dylan and Tracy Chapman... The best concert I ever went to was this one at the Cow Palace my freshman year in college on New Year's Eve. It was Pearl Jam opening for Nirvana opening for Red Hot Chili Peppers.
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.text: I absolutely adore cows. They're the most fascinating, gentle and beautiful animals. Their eyes are so amazing. I have ten that live on the land around my house. I love to talk to them. There are few things better than falling asleep in a field and being woken up by an inquisitive cow.
quotes.author: Mary Quant

quotes.text: So Pa sold the little house. He sold the cow and calf. He made hickory bows and fastened them upright to the wagon box. Ma helped him stretch white canvas over them.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.text: Moo may represent an idea, but only the cow knows.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.text: What shocked me, and what I wasn't prepared for, was just how brutal and how unethical some people can be in the NFL. I mean, there were some great people, but there were some real snakes, too. I was like, 'Holy cow!' But it made me a better person, and it got me ready for other things.
quotes.author: Terry Crews

quotes.text: I don't believe that you have to be a cow to know what milk is.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: I don't like looking back. I'm always constantly looking forward. I'm not the one to sort of sit and cry over spilt milk. I'm too busy looking for the next cow.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.text: I do believe sometimes discipline is very important. I'm not just lying around like a lazy cow all the time.
quotes.author: Bjork

quotes.text: We were so poor as kids. I didn't even see a bathtub, running water, hot water, commode - we didn't have any of that. We started with a humble log house, milk cow, garden-raised our own food, killed a hog every year in the fall, and had the meat hanging up in the smokehouse - that was our childhood, me and ol' Si.
quotes.author: Phil Robertson

quotes.text: This was more than just a cow - this was an entire career I was looking at.
quotes.author: Gary Larson

quotes.text: I think it's great training for any comedian to start on cows. Because with cows, you expect them to be bored and just stare at you blankly. And that's exactly what you'll get at a comedy club. If you can toughen up with a cow audience, then you'll never be worried with a human audience.
quotes.author: Kristen Schaal

quotes.text: I always thought it was a goat that kicked me over the fence. My mama told me the other day it was a cow. Now I'm sort of scared of both.
quotes.author: Kelsea Ballerini

quotes.text: It's like that Simpsons joke - they're filming a cow in a movie and they go, 'OK, we'll tape a bunch of cats together to make a cow', and it's like, 'Why don't you just use a cow?'. For some reason that is novel - like, 'Oh, my guitar sounds like a piano and now if I can just get my piano to sound like my guitar'.
quotes.author: Ian Williams

quotes.text: You can only milk a cow so long, then you're left holding the pail.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.text: I can't say that I've ever actually got on a horse and roped a cow, no.
quotes.author: Blake Shelton

quotes.text: Not only do I know how to milk a cow, but I know how to herd a bunch of cows, too, which is a life skill that I think may come in handy someday.
quotes.author: Martina McBride

quotes.text: A dead cow or sheep lying in a pasture is recognized as carrion. The same sort of a carcass dressed and hung up in a butcher's stall passes as food.
quotes.author: John Harvey Kellogg

quotes.text: One can quite understand vegetarianism. One can quite understand meat-eating. But it is difficult to understand why a person who is a flesh-eater should object to one kind of flesh, namely cow's flesh. This is an anomaly which call for explanation.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.text: The average man is a conformist, accepting miseries and disasters with the stoicism of a cow standing in the rain.

quotes.text: 'Meat' is a vague term and can be used to refer to many parts of an animal, including internal organs and skin. For the most part, the meat we eat consists of muscle tissue taken from farm animals, whether it's a sirloin steak, which is cut from the rear of a cow, or a pork chop, taken from flesh near the spine of a pig.
quotes.author: Michael Specter

quotes.text: It's a pragmatist's business, comedy. Start off with good intentions and references to the Pompidou Centre and you end up with boiled sweets and a pantomime cow.
quotes.author: Mel Smith

quotes.text: I have a cow's valve in my heart.
quotes.author: Maurice Strong

quotes.text: Unfortunately, the greatest photographers don't pay extreme attention to the clothes. If they decide to put a dress in a bathtub or in front of a cow in the countryside with dirt everywhere, well, the dresses come back... ready to be put in the garbage.

quotes.text: If a cow walked into this room, I'd probably walk out. I could milk it, but my dad never forced me to do a lot of chores like that, mostly because he loved doing it himself.

quotes.text: On the farm, I had chores. I had a calf. We had a herd of cattle in the pasture. We'd go and get me a calf at a cow auction with Amish people, which I would raise. I gave it a bottle every day, in this cute little coop, like a giant dog coop almost. I've always been a big animal person.
quotes.author: Krysten Ritter

quotes.text: I write in order to attain that feeling of tension relieved and function achieved which a cow enjoys on giving milk.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: Holy cow, in the course of one week I feel like I've lived about a year!
quotes.author: Karlie Kloss

quotes.text: I'd never heard of the 'Lord of the Rings', actually. So I went to the bookstore and there it was, three shelves of books about Tolkien and Middle-earth, and I was like, 'Holy cow, what else am I missing out on?'

quotes.text: If you do not milk the cow fully, it falls sick.
quotes.author: Lalu Prasad Yadav

quotes.text: The mere brute pleasure of reading the sort of pleasure a cow must have in grazing.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: No longer diverted by other emotions, I work the way a cow grazes.
quotes.author: Kathe Kollwitz

quotes.text: When you're the cash cow that lays the golden goose egg, people are always going to cheer you on, whatever.
quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

quotes.text: All the good ideas I ever had came to me while I was milking a cow.
quotes.author: Grant Wood

quotes.text: Life has got a habit of not standing hitched. You got to ride it like you find it. You got to change with it. If a day goes by that don't change some of your old notions for new ones, that is just about like trying to milk a dead cow.

quotes.text: The money in politics is a cash cow for the media.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: Mostly I want to talk positive; I wanna talk about a bunch of great kids that I coached and made me look good and the university that I've seen grow from a cow college, which it was, only 12,000 people, and when I came here, we weren't at Pennsylvania State University, we were at Penn State College.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.text: Consumers of meat, eggs and dairy products might well ask what they are supporting. Do farmers care about anyone but themselves? Can't anyone see the cow for the cheese?
quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

quotes.text: A publisher who writes is like a cow in a milk bar.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.text: I don't want any vegetables, thank you. I paid for the cow to eat them for me.

quotes.text: Everyone now has a sacred cow in the tax code. For my money, the most sacred thing of all is our country and its growth, but the sacred cows have turned into a pack of wolves.

quotes.text: I've never met a general yet who could milk a cow.
quotes.author: Lennart Meri

quotes.text: Holy cow!
quotes.author: Harry Caray

quotes.text: Not every man remembers the name of the cow which supplied him with each drop of milk he has drunk.
quotes.author: Shmuel Yosef Agnon

quotes.text: I grew up in a village of 12 houses. We had a well and a cow.
quotes.author: Olesya Rulin

quotes.text: The mere brute pleasure of reading - the sort of pleasure a cow must have in grazing.
quotes.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quotes.text: I want to figure out a way to not be stupid with money, then make a whole bunch of it, then I want to move to Outer Mongolia. I want to milk a yak. Maybe I'll just settle for a cow. Can you milk a bison?

quotes.text: If an actor knows how to milk a cow, I always know it will not be difficult to be in business with him.

quotes.text: When I listen to hip-hop, it's like no big difference how people sing in my village, 'cause bling would be their cow.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Jal

quotes.text: It was jolly in the country. A cow and little pigs to play with and milk warm from the cow.
quotes.author: Georg Brandes

quotes.text: When I was younger, I was insecure for about 10 years: I wore glasses, had a cow's lick, buck teeth and braces. I looked ridiculous.
quotes.author: Jack Whitehall

quotes.text: Growing up in eastern Turkey, I was not really involved with the family business - sheep and cow farming, yogurt and cheese making. But I think I learned from my father the unspoken business language or instincts that go back thousands of years.
quotes.author: Hamdi Ulukaya

quotes.text: I couldn't kill a chicken, I couldn't kill a cow - I was a vegetarian too at that time - so I thought, well what is there that I could kill? I couldn't kill this and I couldn't kill that.
quotes.author: Ellen Burstyn

quotes.text: North Dakota State. What do you have to do there to graduate? Milk a cow with your left hand?
quotes.author: Bobby Heenan

quotes.text: When I was little, we lived on 8 acres and my mom had a horse. But when I was 7, my mom kicked my dad out, and then in order to feed us five kids, she got critters cheap or for free and raised them for food. We milked a cow, raised chickens, pigs and beef cattle. We heated our one-story house with wood and stayed cold all winter.
quotes.author: Bonnie Jo Campbell

quotes.text: Kiss till the cow comes home.
quotes.author: Francis Beaumont

quotes.text: I knew the profanity used up and down my street would not go over the air... So I trained myself to say 'Holy Cow' instead.
quotes.author: Harry Caray

quotes.text: I'm not here to say I don't eat vegetables - I do, a lot of them - but, from a soil perspective, they're actually more costly than a cow grazing on grass.
quotes.author: Dan Barber

quotes.text: The United States is not just an old cow that gives more milk the more it's kicked in the flanks.
quotes.author: Dean Rusk

quotes.text: I cannot harness a horse. I am afraid of a cow.
quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

quotes.text: If I don't work, I'll be sitting on the couch watching TV, eating popcorn and getting like a cow.
quotes.author: Celia Cruz

quotes.text: Don't have a cow, man.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.text: USDA says pink slime, which is made of cow connective tissue and other scraps and then treated with ammonia to kill the salmonella, e Coli, potentially, the U.S. Government says it's totally safe.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.text: I really do love being outdoors - I mean, you'd never think it in my high heels and pencil skirt! But I really do miss the smell of hay and farms, and I like milking a cow.
quotes.author: Christina Hendricks

quotes.text: I want to figure out a way to not be stupid with money, then make a whole bunch of it, then I want to move to Outer Mongolia. I want to milk a yak. Maybe I'll just settle for a cow.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.text: The cow, basically, eats three basic things in their feed: corn, beets, and barley, and so what I do is I actually challenge my staff with these crazy, wild ideas. Can we take what the cow eats, remove the cow, and then make some hamburgers out of that?
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: Fortified plant-based milks are delicious and contain all the calcium, protein, and vitamin D of dairy products but with none of the cholesterol, lactose, hormones, or cruelty found in cow's milk.
quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

quotes.text: Skinny Cow ice cream and candy - like dancing - brings a little bit of fun to your day.
quotes.author: Jennifer Grey

quotes.text: Then a neighbor, Mr Smith, had a dairy cow and an couple bulls. He showed me how to bluff a bull.
quotes.author: Jim Fowler

quotes.text: I learned long ago, never to wrestle with a pig. You get dirty, and besides, the pig likes it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: I'd rather be onstage with a pig - a duet with Jennifer Lopez and me just ain't going to happen.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.text: A pig has a plow on the end of its nose because it does meaningful work with it. It is built to dig and create soil disturbance, something it can't do in a concentrated feeding environment. The omnivore has historically been a salvage operation for food scraps around the homestead.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.text: Down South, even our vegetables have some pig hidden somewhere in it. A vegetable isn't a vegetable without a little ham hock.

quotes.text: Processed pig is white trash meat. Some people call it Spam.
quotes.author: Scott Weiland

quotes.text: The difference between involvement and commitment is like ham and eggs. The chicken is involved; the pig is committed.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.text: The industrial food system is so cruel and so horrific in its treatment of animals. It never asks the question: 'Should a pig be allowed to express its pig-ness?'
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.text: I love chicken fingers, I love French fries. I love desserts. I'm not just into dessert or just into savoury food. I love it all. I'm a pig. I love food. So it takes a lot of discipline to eat healthy.

quotes.text: I am the people, I'm not the pig. You got to make a distinction. And the people are going to have to attack the pigs. The people are going to have to stand up against the pigs. That's what the Panthers is doing, that's what the Panthers are doing all over the world.
quotes.author: Fred Hampton

quotes.text: Fame is like a shaved pig with a greased tail, and it is only after it has slipped through the hands of some thousands, that some fellow, by mere chance, holds on to it!
quotes.author: Davy Crockett

quotes.text: I'm a selfish, little pig of a man.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.text: You can put wings on a pig, but you don't make it an eagle.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.text: I still, at hotel rooms, I do this one sort of not-so-cool thing: continually shoving my room service tray in front of someone else's door. Because I don't want the remnants. I don't want to be caught, like, being like the pig that I was at two in the morning.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: Primate and elephant and even pig societies show considerable evidence of care for others, parent-child bonding, solidarity in the face of danger, and so on.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.text: Litigation: A machine which you go into as a pig and come out of as a sausage.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: I have eyes like those of a dead pig.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.text: Edible - good to eat and wholesome to digest, as a worm to a toad, a toad to a snake, a snake to a pig, a pig to a man, and a man to a worm.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: We are Jesus Christ's; we belong to him. But even more, we are increasingly him. He moves in and commandeers our hands and feet, requisitions our minds and tongues. We sense his rearranging: debris into the divine, pig's ear into silk purse. He repurposes bad decisions and squalid choices. Little by little, a new image emerges.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.text: It's no good running a pig farm badly for 30 years while saying, 'Really, I was meant to be a ballet dancer.' By then, pigs will be your style.

quotes.text: Asking a critic to name his favorite book is like asking a butcher to name his favorite pig.

quotes.text: I have two Iceland horses, a very hairy dog called Looney, and a guinea pig.

quotes.text: You can't fatten the pig on market day.

quotes.text: When it comes to having a central nervous system, and the ability to feel pain, hunger, and thirst, a rat is a pig is a dog is a boy.
quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

quotes.text: I don't think it's a good advert for any restaurant, a fat chef, and secondly, who wants to eat a dessert when the chef's a fat pig.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.text: One day we will have more inflation, and our bonds will bleed like a pig. The only reason for buying long bonds is short-term or as a desperate haven for terrorized investors. But the potential to make longer-term real money is naught.

quotes.text: To steal from a brother or sister is evil. To not steal from the institutions that are the pillars of the Pig Empire is equally immoral.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.text: Anything that got to do with a pig, I ain't eatin'.

quotes.text: A pig resembles a saint in that he is more honored after death than during his lifetime.
quotes.author: Irma S. Rombauer

quotes.text: 'Meat' is a vague term and can be used to refer to many parts of an animal, including internal organs and skin. For the most part, the meat we eat consists of muscle tissue taken from farm animals, whether it's a sirloin steak, which is cut from the rear of a cow, or a pork chop, taken from flesh near the spine of a pig.
quotes.author: Michael Specter

quotes.text: You can't have it both ways. You can't tell me that you're taxed enough already, and that you want constitutional government and then in the next breath say, 'Bring me home some bacon.' The pig has been picked clean.

quotes.text: I do love Italian food. Any kind of pasta or pizza. My new pig out food is Indian food. I eat Indian food like three times a week. It's so good.

quotes.text: Look, I hate to sound like Pollyanna, but I literally can't wait to get to work in the morning. I've got steady jobs, I've got my health, and I'm here in the greatest city in the world. I'd be a pig not to be grateful.
quotes.author: Christopher Meloni

quotes.text: If we could establish a deep abiding relationship with nature, we would never kill an animal for our appetite; we would never harm, vivisect, a monkey, a dog, a guinea pig for our benefit. We would find other ways to heal our wounds, heal our bodies.

quotes.text: I am not a pig farmer. The pigs had a great time, but I didn't make any money.

quotes.text: I have a pig valve.

quotes.text: We overweight people, we say terrible things to ourselves. Oh, you wouldn't believe it. 'You fat pig. How can you do this? You're a disgusting jerk.' And that gets you nowhere. That gets you right back into a bowl of pasta fregula.

quotes.text: You know, in our culture today, our Western, reductionist, Roman, linear, fragmented... culture, we don't ask how to make a pig happy. We ask how to grow it faster, fatter, bigger, cheaper, and that's not a noble goal.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.text: I am not strict vegan, because I'm a hedonist pig. If I see a big chocolate cake that is made with eggs, I'll have it.
quotes.author: Grace Slick

quotes.text: A peasant becomes fond of his pig and is glad to salt away its pork. What is significant, and is so difficult for the urban stranger to understand, is that the two statements are connected by an and not by a but.

quotes.text: I followed this one pig with number '05049,' all the way up until the end and to what products it's made of. And in these years, I met all kinds people like, for instance, farmers and butchers, which seems logical. But I also met aluminum mold makers, ammunition producers and all kinds of people.

quotes.text: They're always saying I'm a capitalistic pig. I suppose I am. But... it's good for my drumming.

quotes.text: Mel Blanc is a hero because of what he could do with his voice for all the Looney Tunes, the Warner Brothers cartoons, to be the voice of Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Elmer Fudd, Porky Pig.

quotes.text: My nursery school did a production of 'The Three Little Pigs.' I played the third pig. When the wolf knocked on my door, I refused to get up and answer it because, to me, he was knocking the wrong way. I just lay there, snoring away on stage, fully immersed in my character. My dad turned to my mom and said: 'Dustin Hoffman.'

quotes.text: Lawsuit: A machine which you go into as a pig and come out of as a sausage.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: I never apologized for anything in my life. The only thing I'm sorry about is putting a curse on Roger Ebert's colon. If a fat pig like Roger Ebert doesn't like my movie, then I'm sorry for him.

quotes.text: So is the savage buffalo, especially delighting in dark places, where he can wallow in the mud and slake his thirst without much trouble; and here also we find the wild pig.

quotes.text: The Travel Channel had success with their 'Food Paradise' series, '10 Best Places to Pig Out' and those types of specials, so they knew there was a market for comfort food and wanted to develop a show around it.
quotes.author: Adam Richman

quotes.text: All chefs have pictures of food in their phones, stuffed pig's ears and pigs' heads and the like.
quotes.author: April Bloomfield

quotes.text: These are bagpipes. I understand the inventor of the bagpipes was inspired when he saw a man carrying an indignant, asthmatic pig under his arm. Unfortunately, the man-made sound never equalled the purity of the sound achieved by the pig.

quotes.text: I wrote a story about a man who is orphaned during the 1927 Mississippi River flood in Louisiana, and he's on the banks of levee, and he's starving. And there are other people starving, too. And he's so desperate, he's seven years old, that he finds a pig that's been abandoned. He kills it with a hammer, and he drags it back.
quotes.author: Susan Straight

quotes.text: Our motto is we respect and honour the pigness of the pig and the chickenness of the chicken. That means not confining them in a house with hundreds of others.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.text: Edible, adj.: Good to eat, and wholesome to digest, as a worm to a toad, a toad to a snake, a snake to a pig, a pig to a man, and a man to a worm.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: Mel Blanc is a hero because of what he could do with his voice for all the Looney Tunes, the Warner Brothers cartoons, to be the voice of Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Elmer Fudd, Porky Pig. To me, he's a great actor.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.text: I have no desire to maintain a lifestyle. I am a horrible celebrity. If I am out in public I dress like a pig.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.text: And call me a pig, but isn't it brilliantly refreshing how early the Dutch eat dinner? When they're still laying out the cutlery in achingly hip Barcelona, they're hanging the Closed sign on the restaurant doors of old Amsterdam.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: I want a pig. I want a pig on a leash. A baby pig on a leash.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.text: If you make a film about a pig farmer in Wales and you are a huge hit as the pig farmer's wife, the next thing is you'll be asked to do a film about a sheep farmer in Scotland.
quotes.author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quotes.text: When actors first come up, you're auditioning for everything - you're trying to sniff it out like a pig with a truffle and you would do anything!
quotes.author: Bryan Cranston

quotes.text: I never want to be in that stage where a band ends up playing state fairs and casinos. I am not willing to go out shooting up Botox and eating corn dogs while judging pig contests.
quotes.author: Al Jourgensen

quotes.text: My whole approach to wardrobe is, throw it in a suitcase and make sure they don't press it, for Pete's sake, so I can try to display some rumpled charm. Actually, I'm just a pig. I've got coffee stains on my pants. I think they're coffee stains, anyway.
quotes.author: Mel Gibson

quotes.text: To eat the boiled head of a pig sliced like salami is very strange. It may seem cutting edge, but it's actually a lot older than any of the other traditional salami.
quotes.author: Mario Batali

quotes.text: I took anatomy classes. I went to medical libraries and talked to doctors and nutritionists. I did the whole thing before using myself as a human guinea pig.
quotes.author: Marilu Henner

quotes.text: I have a cat. When I was younger, I had a guinea pig.
quotes.author: Alison Goldfrapp

quotes.text: When I was a kid, I wanted to emulate Mel Blanc, who is arguably one of the most legendary voiceover recording artists of our time. I used to watch all the cartoons where he would voice Daffy, Elmer Fudd and Porky the Pig. I knew one day I wanted to do that.
quotes.author: Jesse McCartney

quotes.text: I get 100 e-mails a day from Americans who say, 'What you're doing is cool - can we work for you?' From Germans, I also get 100 e-mails a day, saying, 'You fat pig!' or 'You're a liar and a criminal!' I'm trying to change this.
quotes.author: Kim Dotcom

quotes.text: I treat my writing like a day job, like my main job, even if for many years I was doing other jobs to pay the bills. I worked as a copy editor. I was a medical guinea pig. I was an eBay power seller of ladies' handbags. I was an assistant to a bookie at the horse races. I bartended. I did anything I could to make ends meet.
quotes.author: Miguel Syjuco

quotes.text: I never know what I'm going to do for the Post next. Two weeks ago I had a piece on Homeland Security. This is one of my pig ongoing projects. How unprepared we are for a terrorist attack.
quotes.author: Sally Quinn

quotes.text: A pig's trotter is a fantastic thing. The first night of my honeymoon in Paris, my wife fell asleep in her steak tartare, so my trotter kept me company.
quotes.author: Fergus Henderson

quotes.text: The best days I have are usually days where I'm out in the woods and something happens, like I see an amazing animal like a fox, or I get a glimpse of a wild pig or something that I never see. Or crazy things happen.
quotes.author: Amy Ray

quotes.text: My mother was an English teacher who decided to become a math teacher, and she used me as a guinea pig at home. My father had been a math teacher and then went to work at a steel mill because, frankly, he could make more money doing that.
quotes.author: Freeman A. Hrabowski III

quotes.text: My wife tells me I am a male chauvinist pig and I have to sort of admit it. In my office and in my home, I'm not very democratic. I think of myself as a benevolent dictator.
quotes.author: Edgar Mitchell

quotes.text: From the practical point of view, the susceptibility to infection of the guinea pig proved to be the most useful step forward. Today, all laboratories use this animal for preserving the virus.
quotes.author: Charles Jules Henry Nicole

quotes.text: I love food. I'm a huge food addict. I think in my past life I was a pig or something like that, but I love eating; I never stop eating.
quotes.author: Justin Lee

quotes.text: In interior decorating, the pig's actually quite there. It's used in paint for the texture, but also for the glossiness. In sandpaper, bone glue is actually the glue between the sand and the paper. And then in paintbrushes, hairs are used because, apparently, they're very suitable for making paintbrushes because of their hard-wearing nature.
quotes.author: Christien Meindertsma

quotes.text: In the Netherlands - where I come from - you actually never see a pig, which is really strange, because, in a population of 16 million people, we have 12 million pigs. And well, of course, the Dutch can't eat all these pigs. They eat about one-third, and the rest is exported to all kinds of countries in Europe and the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Christien Meindertsma

quotes.text: If I am to be a chauvinist pig, I want to be the number one pig.
quotes.author: Bobby Riggs

quotes.text: Americans! They want to go 600 miles an hour, and they don't know how to walk! Look at them in the street. Bent over. Coughing! Young men with gray faces! Why can't they look at the animals? Look at a cat. Look at any animal. The only animal that doesn't hold its stomach in is the pig.
quotes.author: Joseph Pilates

quotes.text: In my mind's eye, Shakespeare is a huge, hot sea-beast, with fire in his veins and ice on his claws and inscrutable eyes, who looks like an inchoate hump under the encrustations of live barnacle-commentaries, limpets and trailing weeds.
quotes.author: A. S. Byatt

quotes.text: Do not free a camel of the burden of his hump; you may be freeing him from being a camel.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: I hump the wild to take it all in, there is no bag limit on happiness.
quotes.author: Ted Nugent

quotes.text: The thing that got me over the hump was accepting that I had to do whatever I could to stay in the game.
quotes.author: Dennis Eckersley

quotes.text: We were not allowed to say, Screw, but we could say, Hump the hostess, because hump is in Shakespeare.
quotes.author: Uta Hagen

quotes.text: It's natural canine behavior to chew on all sorts of things, roll in other animals' droppings, hump and fight other dogs, menace anything that invades the home. All these behaviors can be curbed, but that takes a lot of work. Trainers say it requires nearly 2,000 repetitions of a behavior for a dog to completely absorb it.
quotes.author: Jon Katz

quotes.text: He piled upon the whale's white hump the sum of all the general rage and hate felt by his whole race from Adam down; and then, as if his chest had been a mortar, he burst his hot heart's shell upon it.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.text: The only thing that matters is what happens on the little hump out in the middle of the field.
quotes.author: Earl Weaver

quotes.text: Free-to-play isn't a business model. Free-to-play is a marketing strategy. It's a way to get people over the hump of trying out your game. It gets rid of the friction that happens when you charge an upfront fee.
quotes.author: Mitch Lasky

quotes.text: I'd love to stay in baseball, but I won't beg. I'd love to work with young umpires. I think I could teach them, help them develop. I can spot flaws, help them get over the hump. You're striving for perfection every game, yet you never achieve it. If baseball wants me, I'm available.
quotes.author: Doug Harvey

quotes.text: In my mind's eye, Shakespeare is a huge, hot sea-beast, with fire in his veins and ice on his claws and inscrutable eyes, who looks like an inchoate hump under the encrustations of live barnacle-commentaries, limpets and trailing weeds.
quotes.author: A. S. Byatt

quotes.text: Do not free a camel of the burden of his hump; you may be freeing him from being a camel.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: I hump the wild to take it all in, there is no bag limit on happiness.
quotes.author: Ted Nugent

quotes.text: The thing that got me over the hump was accepting that I had to do whatever I could to stay in the game.
quotes.author: Dennis Eckersley

quotes.text: We were not allowed to say, Screw, but we could say, Hump the hostess, because hump is in Shakespeare.
quotes.author: Uta Hagen

quotes.text: It's natural canine behavior to chew on all sorts of things, roll in other animals' droppings, hump and fight other dogs, menace anything that invades the home. All these behaviors can be curbed, but that takes a lot of work. Trainers say it requires nearly 2,000 repetitions of a behavior for a dog to completely absorb it.

quotes.author: Mitch Lasky

quotes.text: I'd love to stay in baseball, but I won't beg. I'd love to work with young umpires. I think I could teach them, help them develop. I can spot flaws, help them get over the hump. You're striving for perfection every game, yet you never achieve it. If baseball wants me, I'm available.
quotes.author: Doug Harvey

quotes.text: If you are neutral in situations of injustice, you have chosen the side of the oppressor. If an elephant has its foot on the tail of a mouse and you say that you are neutral, the mouse will not appreciate your neutrality.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: Some kinds of animals burrow in the ground; others do not. Some animals are nocturnal, as the owl and the bat; others use the hours of daylight. There are tame animals and wild animals. Man and the mule are always tame; the leopard and the wolf are invariably wild, and others, as the elephant, are easily tamed.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: A camel makes an elephant feel like a jet plane.
quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.text: The elephant can survive only if forests survive.
quotes.author: Mark Shand

quotes.text: We'll be back to our nature documentary, 'Baggy the Anorexic Elephant' in just a second.
quotes.author: Colin Mochrie

quotes.text: Religion looms as large as an elephant in the United States, to the point that being nonreligious is about the biggest handicap a politician running for office can have, bigger than being gay, unmarried, thrice married, or black.
quotes.author: Frans de Waal

quotes.text: Living next to you is in some ways like sleeping with an elephant. No matter how friendly and even-tempered is the beast, if I can call it that, one is affected by every twitch and grunt.
quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.text: Yeah, Kubrick's a big influence. In something like 'A Clockwork Orange,' he is trying to use the practical light - I mean, at least he says that in his interviews, like they're not using traditionally Hollywood lights. In 'Elephant' we basically used no lights; we never really adjusted.
quotes.author: Gus Van Sant

quotes.text: Elephant populations in India and also in the whole of Asia are under severe stress. The captive ones are rendered jobless due to changes in the mode of transport and lifestyle of people. The ones in the wild are also no better off, as the forests are shrinking.
quotes.author: Mark Shand

quotes.text: I feel as if I go to Africa, I may never come back. I'm just going to live with the animals and adopt an elephant, and it's going to be my friend.
quotes.author: Dianna Agron

quotes.text: People are so difficult. Give me an elephant any day.
quotes.author: Mark Shand

quotes.text: I don't do impersonations. I can do a wounded elephant! I can do a really good cow! And because of the amount of time I spent in North Yorkshire, I do a variety of sheep. All of which I will be happy to roll out for you!
quotes.author: Patrick Stewart

quotes.text: The question is, are we happy to suppose that our grandchildren may never be able to see an elephant except in a picture book?
quotes.author: David Attenborough

quotes.text: I have a memory like an elephant. In fact, elephants often consult me.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.text: Most people know that forests are the lungs of our planet, literally playing a critical role in every breath we take. And that they're also home to incredible animals like the orangutan and elephant, which will go extinct if we keep cutting down their forests.
quotes.author: Chris Noth

quotes.text: When you have got an elephant by the hind legs and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: God is really only another artist. He invented the giraffe, the elephant and the cat. He has no real style, He just goes on trying other things.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Love will draw an elephant through a key-hole.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.text: I don't know how many lions and leopards I've shot. I've shot two elephants, which was enough - never again. It's a melancholy and moving thing to hunt an elephant. It's like shooting an old man.
quotes.author: Wilbur Smith

quotes.text: If you've never seen an elephant ski, you've never been on acid.
quotes.author: Eddie Izzard

quotes.text: One morning I shot an elephant in my pajamas. How he got into my pajamas I'll never know.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: Nature's great masterpiece, an elephant; the only harmless great thing.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.text: I have a memory like an elephant. I remember every elephant I've ever met.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.text: Primate and elephant and even pig societies show considerable evidence of care for others, parent-child bonding, solidarity in the face of danger, and so on.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.text: God is not troubled by one who is conservative or liberal, and He certainly never inclines His ear toward a donkey or an elephant.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.text: Some animals are cunning and evil-disposed, as the fox; others, as the dog, are fierce, friendly, and fawning. Some are gentle and easily tamed, as the elephant; some are susceptible of shame, and watchful, as the goose. Some are jealous and fond of ornament, as the peacock.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Only those with skin as thick as elephant hide can hope to sail through their teens unscathed by self-doubt and bouts of depression.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.text: There were times, especially when I was traveling for 'Eat, Pray, Love,' when, I swear to God, I would feel this weight of my female ancestors, all those Swedish farmwives from beyond the grave who were like, 'Go! Go to Naples! Eat more pizza! Go to India, ride an elephant! Do it! Swim in the Indian Ocean. Read those books. Learn a language.'
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.text: Well, the big elephant in the whole system is the baby boomer generation that marches through like a herd of elephants. And we begin to retire in 2008.
quotes.author: Lindsey Graham

quotes.text: When you look at elephant herds that are nonstressed, the males are never around. They mate, they go; they're loners.
quotes.author: Mark Shand

quotes.text: Our brains have been designed to blur the line between self and other. It is an ancient neural circuitry that marks every mammal, from mouse to elephant.
quotes.author: Frans de Waal

quotes.text: Learning to play with a big amplifier is like trying to control an elephant.
quotes.author: Ritchie Blackmore

quotes.text: The U.N. bureaucracy has grown to elephantine proportions. Now that the Cold War is over, we are asking that elephant to do gymnastics.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.text: I've never liked the moment of seeing something beautiful - a sunset, a moose, an elephant - and then raising a camera and trying to capture it for some future moment. That's always struck me as strange.
quotes.author: Joseph Monninger

quotes.text: Words are cheap. The biggest thing you can say is 'elephant'.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.text: I saw David Lynch's 'The Elephant Man' when I was 15. I was completely bowled over. I found it so beautiful, strange and mesmerizing that I went back to the cinema every night for a week to see it.
quotes.author: Ben Daniels

quotes.text: By the time you get to your sixth record, some of the benefits of being in a band are grander than ever, but some of the obstacles are just massive. You deal with these lateral subjects, and all that is left is the elephant in the room.
quotes.author: Josh Homme

quotes.text: Making films is about having absolute and foolish confidence; the challenge for all of us is to have the heart of a poet and the skin of an elephant.
quotes.author: Mira Nair

quotes.text: I watched a film called 'Elephant' recently. Its not stylish in the sense of expensive suits and Italian cars, but the styling on every single character is spot on.
quotes.author: Tinie Tempah

quotes.text: Indian democracy has often been likened to the stately progress of the elephant - ponderous in its gait and reluctant to change course, but not easily swayed from its new path when it does.
quotes.author: Shashi Tharoor

quotes.text: In the divine Scriptures, there are shallows and there are deeps; shallows where the lamb may wade, and deeps where the elephant may swim.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: I'm for conservation, but it's mostly a con. That's the trouble. It's sentimental. Buy an elephant a drink, a lion an acre.
quotes.author: Peter Beard

quotes.text: Patriarchy is like the elephant in the room that we don't talk about, but how could it not affect the planet radically when it's the superstructure of human society.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.text: We already live a very long time for mammals, getting three times as many heartbeats as a mouse or elephant. It never seems enough though, does it?
quotes.author: David Brin

quotes.text: They say an elephant never forgets. Well, you are not an elephant. Take notes, constantly. Save interesting thoughts, quotations, films, technologies... the medium doesn't matter, so long as it inspires you.
quotes.author: Aaron Koblin

quotes.text: I'm just getting settled as a responsible man - but if you split the elephant into little mouthfuls it will be fine.
quotes.author: Tom Hardy

quotes.text: There's a lot of films that have relatively rigid road maps because they have a script and others that are less rigid because they have less of a script, like 'Elephant.' The road map becomes more interpretive, maybe, than one with a detailed script. Editing-wise, they all have their problems.
quotes.author: Gus Van Sant

quotes.text: Seriously, a smaller, leaner, cleaner, tuskless and more secretive elephant is exactly what is needed. It definitely would live longer.
quotes.author: Lyall Watson

quotes.text: I'm not much for cats. I'm terrified of mice. I've worked a lot with elephants, and they are extremely intelligent and sensitive, and thankfully, they seem to like me. You never want to get on the bad side of an elephant. And never trust a chimp.
quotes.author: Mary Ellen Mark

quotes.text: I always think I look like the Elephant Man - I can't get used to my own image.
quotes.author: Brian Cox

quotes.text: Unlike the primate hand, the elephant's grasping organ is also its nose. Elephants use their trunks not only to reach food but also to sniff and touch it. With their unparalleled sense of smell, the animals know exactly what they are going for. Vision is secondary.
quotes.author: Frans de Waal

quotes.text: My first yak was fairly quiet and looked a noble steed with my Mexican saddle and gay blanket among rather than upon his thick black locks. His back seemed as broad as that of an elephant, and with his slow, sure, resolute step, he was like a mountain in motion.
quotes.author: Isabella Bird

quotes.text: There's an academic tradition called the 'Last Lecture.' Hypothetically, if you knew you were going to die and you had one last lecture, what would you say to your students? Well, for me, there's an elephant in the room. And the elephant in the room, for me, it wasn't hypothetical.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.text: The reason I know about 'Tomb Raider' is from when I was researching 'Elephant.' It was 1999, and I was trying to research the Columbine-massacre kids, and they had played video games, and I, at the time, had never really seen one. It was a world I didn't know.
quotes.author: Gus Van Sant

quotes.text: My wife and I, we started a foundation about companion animal rescue, but there's a group called Performing Animal Welfare Society just outside of Sacramento... and they offered me a job as an elephant keeper.
quotes.author: Tony La Russa

quotes.text: We're adding a billion people every decade. We're just spin doctors. Whatever we do is supposedly great, and yet it's always at the expense of diversity and nature. We're like elephants. The ecology of the elephant is more similar to human than any other.
quotes.author: Peter Beard

quotes.text: Shallows where a lamb could wade and depths where an elephant would drown.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: When eating an elephant take one bite at a time.
quotes.author: Creighton Abrams

quotes.text: I have a face like the behind of an elephant.
quotes.author: Charles Laughton

quotes.text: My roommate got a pet elephant. Then it got lost. It's in the apartment somewhere.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: While I had often said that I wanted to die in bed, what I really meant was that in my old age I wanted to be stepped on by an elephant while making love.
quotes.author: Roger Zelazny

quotes.text: Books were my window on the world. Growing up at the Elephant and Castle, which was very rough, my paradise was the library.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.text: I was called 'Dumbo,' like the elephant, as a child because I couldn't understand things at school.
quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

quotes.text: But my mother loved The Elephant Man, and my father gave David Lynch a scholarship to study in Rome.
quotes.author: Isabella Rossellini

quotes.text: I was never a great reader, but there were two stories I loved best: Kipling's 'The Elephant's Child' and 'The Jungle Book.' Deep down, I've always wanted to write a book about a wild child and an elephant.
quotes.author: Michael Morpurgo

quotes.text: Plastic surgery is like a big elephant sitting in the Hollywood living room.
quotes.author: Patricia Heaton

quotes.text: Band of Skulls is joining Cage the Elephant as my new musical caffeine.
quotes.author: Michael Koryta

quotes.text: In the central Indian state of Orissa, mining has scarred the landscape, and it is already too late to secure most of the traditional elephant corridors.
quotes.author: Mark Shand

quotes.text: Let's get the elephant out of the room. I'm a conservative Democrat.
quotes.author: Scott Howell

quotes.text: It wasn't until I had been writing on and off for maybe ten years that I started to establish any kind of routine, thought I couldn't put a finger on an exact date, and this routine relates simply to the aphorism 'How do you eat an elephant? One bite at a time.'
quotes.author: Neal Asher

quotes.text: Jackie had a keen eye for talent, and like an elephant never forgot. And, he was always right on the mark.
quotes.author: Audrey Meadows

quotes.text: Prior to Elephant I'd taken about six years of acting classes in Portland, but there's not a huge market there. The only thing we have is commercial stuff, and that didn't really appeal to me. So this is really a dream come true.
quotes.author: John Robinson

quotes.text: My first experience with film was through a still camera. I would sit, very much against my will, with my father in the game reserve, watching some elephant or rhino or whatever, through a 400 millimeter lens and wait, and waiting and waiting.
quotes.author: Gavid Hood

quotes.text: In 1255, Louis IX of France presented an elephant to Henry III of England to add to the menagerie of exotic animals he kept in the Tower of London.
quotes.author: Karen Maitland

quotes.text: I couldn't hit an elephant's ass with a bull fiddle.
quotes.author: Babe Didrikson Zaharias

quotes.text: Race in this country is still the elephant in the room that no one wants to discuss.
quotes.author: Lenny Kravitz

quotes.text: I really wanted to work with David Lynch. I was a big fan of The Elephant Man and Eraserhead.
quotes.author: Sting

quotes.text: The four movies I can remember seeing as a kid were 'The Elephant Man,' 'The Magnificent Seven,' 'The Good, The Bad and The Ugly' and 'Mad Max!' Two of those are westerns. So the western genre is emblazoned on my memory from childhood, and those are two great movies.
quotes.author: Casey Affleck

quotes.text: Let's point out the elephant in the room: Actor bands are not notoriously successful enterprises. I can't think of any.
quotes.author: Michael Shannon

quotes.text: There are 13 Asian countries that still have elephants, and Elephant Family is looking to invest in further projects that will be the most critical for saving elephants while there is still time.
quotes.author: Mark Shand

quotes.text: If you are neutral in situations of injustice, you have chosen the side of the oppressor. If an elephant has its foot on the tail of a mouse and you say that you are neutral, the mouse will not appreciate your neutrality.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: I only hope that we don't lose sight of one thing - that it was all started by a mouse.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Human beings have a lot of problems identifying themselves with other human beings who don't resemble them exactly. But there's something about drawing that means that anyone can identify to a drawing. I mean, people can identify themselves with Donald Duck and Mickey Mouse.
quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

quotes.text: I would rather be the tail of a lion than the head of a mouse.
quotes.author: Daddy Yankee

quotes.text: All the children had to wear a gas mask in case of a gas attack by the Germans. They tried to make the masks like Mickey Mouse faces so the children would like them. But I didn't. They had big ears on them.
quotes.author: Gerald Scarfe

quotes.text: The real color of my hair is mouse. I always want to be ginger, which I was when I was born, or blond, because I live in L.A., and I want to look like I go surfing without any physical effort.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.text: There was a period of time when they estimated the two biggest stars in Hollywood were Charlie Chaplin and Mickey Mouse.
quotes.author: John Lasseter

quotes.text: I played in rhumba bands, mickey mouse bands; all kinds of bands.
quotes.author: Stan Getz

quotes.text: Americans are obsessed with wild, outlandish things. Marilyn Monroe, Mickey Mouse, and Michael Jackson are all wild, outlandish things.
quotes.author: Lily Koppel

quotes.text: When you say 'comic book' in America, people think of Mickey Mouse, and Archie. It has a connotation of juvenile.
quotes.author: Mark Hamill

quotes.text: The early bird may get the worm, but its the second mouse that gets the cheese.
quotes.author: Jeremy Paxman

quotes.text: I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Mickey Mouse popped out of my mind onto a drawing pad 20 years ago on a train ride from Manhattan to Hollywood at a time when business fortunes of my brother Roy and myself were at lowest ebb and disaster seemed right around the corner.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Hollywood always represents this big dream and fairy tale in people's minds, but to me, it's just hard work. Of course, we play fairy tale on the red carpet. It's all Cinderella. But when the clock strikes midnight, I turn into a gray mouse and I go home, and I take my dress off and it's over. That's Hollywood.
quotes.author: Olga Kurylenko

quotes.text: I am impelled, not to squeak like a grateful and apologetic mouse, but to roar like a lion out of pride in my profession.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.text: Online, you can become much more than a reactive donor - you can become a proactive, strategic, collaborative philanthropist, improving your giving every day by tapping into the wealth of philanthropic resources available at the tap of a keyboard or the click of a mouse.
quotes.author: Laura Arrillaga-Andreessen

quotes.text: T'was the night before Christmas, when all through the house, not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse.
quotes.author: Clement Clarke Moore

quotes.text: Oh, I adored Mickey Mouse when I was a child. He was the emblem of happiness and funniness. You went to the movies then, you saw two movies and a short. When Mickey Mouse came on the screen and there was his big head, my sister said she had to hold onto me. I went berserk.
quotes.author: Maurice Sendak

quotes.text: Kids, adults, men, women, everybody has a relationship with Mickey Mouse.
quotes.author: Warren Spector

quotes.text: In Australia, I grew up watching 'The Mickey Mouse Club,' my son grew up watching 'Sesame Street,' my grandson's growing up watching 'Dora The Explorer.' So we are sort of saturated with American culture from the day we're born, and to those of those who do have an ear for it, it's second nature.
quotes.author: Jacki Weaver

quotes.text: Most original viewers of the Mickey Mouse Club didn't face the crush of family and social problems children have today.
quotes.author: Annette Funicello

quotes.text: Mountains will go into labour, and a silly little mouse will be born.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.text: A mouse does not rely on just one hole.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.text: I'm Mickey Mouse. They don't know who's inside the suit.
quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

quotes.text: Previously, young children had to be shown by their parents how to use a mouse or a remote, and the connection between what they were doing with their hand and what was happening on the screen took some time to grasp. But with the iPad, the connection is obvious, even to toddlers.
quotes.author: Hanna Rosin

quotes.text: I found many treasures in the woods over the years: shotgun shells, empty Colt 45 bottles, old railroad spikes, orange and black beetles eating a dead mouse, pebbles that looked just like teeth, old stone walls and cellar holes, a rusted out frying pan, the skull of a cat.
quotes.author: Jennifer McMahon

quotes.text: Browsing for books with a mouse and screen is not nearly as joyful an act as wandering the stacks and getting lost in the labyrinthine corridors of knowledge. The best libraries are places of imagination, education and community. The best libraries have mystery to them.
quotes.author: Sam Weller

quotes.text: Today, if you invent a better mousetrap, the government comes along with a better mouse.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: Popular culture bombards us with examples of animals being humanized for all sorts of purposes, ranging from education to entertainment to satire to propaganda. Walt Disney, for example, made us forget that Mickey is a mouse, and Donald a duck. George Orwell laid a cover of human societal ills over a population of livestock.
quotes.author: Frans de Waal

quotes.text: When people laugh at Mickey Mouse, it's because he's so human; and that is the secret of his popularity.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Mickey Mouse is, to me, a symbol of independence. He was a means to an end.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: We think touch is short-term. The mouse and keyboard were stable for 25 years, but I think touch will be stable for 10 years. Post-touch will be stable for a really long time, longer than 25 years.
quotes.author: Gabe Newell

quotes.text: I'd vote for Mickey Mouse before I voted for John McCain and Sarah Palin.
quotes.author: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.

quotes.text: Our brains have been designed to blur the line between self and other. It is an ancient neural circuitry that marks every mammal, from mouse to elephant.
quotes.author: Frans de Waal

quotes.text: I adored Mickey Mouse when I was a child. He was the emblem of happiness and funniness.
quotes.author: Maurice Sendak

quotes.text: Only very brave mouse makes nest in cat's ear.
quotes.author: Earl Derr Biggers

quotes.text: Even in China. Children there, next to the Great Wall, who had never seen Mickey Mouse responded. So the studio did have that skill to communicate with images.
quotes.author: John Hench

quotes.text: When Steve Jobs toured Xerox PARC and saw computers running the first operating system that used Windows and a mouse, he assumed he was looking at a new way to work a personal computer. He brought the concept back to Cupertino and created the Mac, then Bill Gates followed suit, and the rest is history.
quotes.author: Douglas Rushkoff

quotes.text: Las Vegas without Wayne Newton is like Disneyland without Mickey Mouse.
quotes.author: Merv Griffin

quotes.text: The trouble with most Englishwomen is that they will dress as if they had been a mouse in a previous incarnation they do not want to attract attention.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.text: That's what happens nowadays with people working on computers. They can so easily fix things with their mouse and take out all the, 'Oh, somebody coughed in the background; we need to take that out' - or somebody hit a bad note. Those are all the best moments.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.text: We already live a very long time for mammals, getting three times as many heartbeats as a mouse or elephant. It never seems enough though, does it?
quotes.author: David Brin

quotes.text: A fly with a brain the size of a salt grain has the behavioral repertoire nearly as complex as a much larger animal such as a mouse. That's a super-interesting problem from an engineering perspective.
quotes.author: Michael Dickinson

quotes.text: The internet has become one of the motors of the 21st century economy, allowing all of us to reach a global audience at a click of a mouse and creating hundreds of thousands of businesses and millions of jobs.
quotes.author: Vint Cerf

quotes.text: In my home office, I have two large, 30-inch computer monitors - a Mac and a PC. They share the same mouse and keyboard, so I can type or copy and paste between them. I'll typically do Web stuff on the Mac and e-mail and chat stuff on the PC.
quotes.author: Matt Mullenweg

quotes.text: My first ideas of human in vitro fertilization (IVF) arose with my Ph.D. in Edinburgh University in the early 1950s. Supervised by Alan Beatty, my research was based on his work on altering chromosomal complements in mouse embryos.
quotes.author: Robert Edwards

quotes.text: First was the mouse. The second was the click wheel. And now, we're going to bring multi-touch to the market. And each of these revolutionary interfaces has made possible a revolutionary product - the Mac, the iPod and now the iPhone.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Mickey Mouse... is always there-he's part of my life. That really is something not everyone can call their claim to fame.
quotes.author: Annette Funicello

quotes.text: Many cats are the death of the mouse.
quotes.author: Kaspar Hauser

quotes.text: I do see your point, but to me, I'm just a mouse compared to the President of the United States.
quotes.author: Jon Lovitz

quotes.text: Whether it's as the hero of an adventure story, as teacher and friend, as icon on watch, shirt or hat - everyone knows Mickey Mouse.
quotes.author: Warren Spector

quotes.text: Of the many guests we welcomed to the Mickey Mouse Club, my absolute favorites were the Lennon Sisters.
quotes.author: Annette Funicello

quotes.text: Pointing is a metaphor we all know. We've done a lot of studies and tests on that, and it's much faster to do all kinds of functions, such as cutting and pasting, with a mouse, so it's not only easier to use but more efficient.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: I do what I do because of Walt Disney. Goofy. Mickey Mouse. I never forgot how their films entertained me.
quotes.author: John Lasseter

quotes.text: Security is always going to be a cat and mouse game because there'll be people out there that are hunting for the zero day award, you have people that don't have configuration management, don't have vulnerability management, don't have patch management.
quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

quotes.text: I went to Bali, and I was in a small village, and somebody who was with me showed a woman a little figurine of Bart and asked: 'Do you know who this is?' And she said: 'Mickey Mouse.'
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.text: I wasn't a trained Mickey Mouse club performer. I played in jazz clubs and restaurants.
quotes.author: Norah Jones

quotes.text: Oh my goodness gracious, what you can buy off the Internet in terms of overhead photography. A trained ape can know an awful lot of what is going on in this world, just by punching on his mouse, for a relatively modest cost.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.text: To me there is no more depressing sight than a five-year-old staring at a screen, unsmiling, mouse in hand. Besides whatever dreadful things this prolonged exposure to screens is doing to their brains, computer games tend to be solitary affairs, and produce little laughter.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.text: The mouse that hath but one hole is quickly taken.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.text: A mouse never entrusts his life to only one hole.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.text: My main regret about my years in football was keeping my mouth shut like a little mouse, not daring to speak out because I was told you left the managers to get on with the job and that the chairman must never interfere with the manager's decisions or the performance of his team.
quotes.author: Alan Sugar

quotes.text: Just as TurboTax simplified much of the tax process, so has the colossally scary legal process been reduced to a kinder, gentler series of mouse clicks and 'Continue' buttons by LegalZoom, the online leader that has become so prominent in its market that it's practically a generic.
quotes.author: Lynda Resnick

quotes.text: I hope we don't get to the point where we have to have the cat stop chasing the mouse to teach him glassblowing and basket weaving.
quotes.author: Joseph Barbera

quotes.text: What about Mickey Mouse? Disney tried very hard to make him a star. But Mickey Mouse is more of a symbol than a real character.
quotes.author: Joseph Barbera

quotes.text: My dear friend Jimmie Dodd was the heart and the soul of The Mickey Mouse Club.
quotes.author: Annette Funicello

quotes.text: When I was on the 'Mickey Mouse Club,' there was Britney Spears, Justin Timberlake and Ryan Gosling and Christine Aguilera. But they were 12 and I was 17, so there was a bit of an age difference.
quotes.author: Keri Russell

quotes.text: The purpose of the UN mechanism, this inspection mechanism, is not to engage in a cat and mouse game with Saddam Hussein and try to find weapons that the Iraqi government is working on concealing.
quotes.author: Douglas Feith

quotes.text: This dapper little mouse that wore such cute clothes and said such interesting things, yeah. I thought it was a great idea to have a mouse like that in your family, so now I get to see what it was like.
quotes.author: Geena Davis

quotes.text: Michael has a connection with children, just like Mickey Mouse does, and he brings happiness to them, and joy.
quotes.author: Jermaine Jackson

quotes.text: I grew up watching Mickey Mouse and going to Disney World, like, 2,000 times. Mickey Mouse is like my guru.
quotes.author: Greg Cipes

quotes.text: The image we have would be impossible for Mickey Mouse to maintain. We're just... normal people.
quotes.author: Karen Carpenter

quotes.text: Two old Bachelors were living in one house; One caught a Muffin, the other caught a Mouse.
quotes.author: Edward Lear

quotes.text: Is the destiny of the human species to sit back and play with our mouse and computer and imagine, fantasize?
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.text: If you were to look back at me as a school kid you'd see a very quiet little church mouse kind of character.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.text: I used to have this little mouse. I buy birds from the pet store and I let them go.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.text: The past two decades revolutionized the way we access information. You and I can have our questions answered with the click of a mouse at any time of day. If America, both corporation and citizen alike, can use these services to solve problems, why can't Washington?
quotes.author: J. C. Watts

quotes.text: A young imagination is bold, likes to make bigger leaps. It likes to, well, imagine that the dustbuster is a dinosaur; that the computer mouse is a hotrod; that the box is a cave; that the rawhide is a torch... or a baton... or something.
quotes.author: Mo Rocca

quotes.text: People's mouse clicks decide what businesses, services, and content succeed. Users have equal access to tiny businesses with viral ideas and blue-chip companies, allowing these enterprises to compete on their own merits. It's how so many small start-ups have been able to become Internet success stories.
quotes.author: Chellie Pingree

quotes.text: I still don't know precisely why The Mickey Mouse Club ended when it did.
quotes.author: Annette Funicello

quotes.text: The dog, the rabbit and the hoop all feature in the painting, and take the place of the orrery.
quotes.author: Kit Williams

quotes.text: It was amazing that a play that seems dated in this world... A man whose best friend is a six-foot white rabbit... But it caught on, especially with young people - they surprised me most of all.
quotes.author: James Stewart

quotes.text: All of Koons's best art - the encased vacuum cleaners, the stainless-steel Rabbit (the late-twentieth century's signature work of Simulationist sculpture), the amazing gleaming Balloon Dog, and the cast-iron re-creation of a Civil War mortar exhibited last month at the Armory - has simultaneously flaunted extreme realism, idealism, and fantasy.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: The dog and the rabbit are telling us not to chase unattainable material goals.
quotes.author: Kit Williams

quotes.text: I have always wanted a bunny and I'll always have a rabbit the rest of my life.
quotes.author: Amy Sedaris

quotes.text: The difference between sentiment and being sentimental is the following: Sentiment is when a driver swerves out of the way to avoid hitting a rabbit on the road. Being sentimental is when the same driver, when swerving away from the rabbit, hits a pedestrian.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.text: A hunk of beef raised on Scottish moorland has a very different ecological footprint from one created in an intensive feedlot using concentrated cereal feed, and a wild venison or rabbit casserole is arguably greener than a vegetable curry.
quotes.author: Tristram Stuart

quotes.text: I have pets, but they're the really ordinary sort - yellow Labrador, tabby cat, white rabbit, a few goldfish - that kind of stuff. Nothing very... extravagant or unusual or exotic, but I find, in terms of inspiration, Mother Nature is just it.
quotes.author: Graeme Base

quotes.text: My dinners at home are startlingly simple. Every night, I stop at the market near my hotel and pick up a steak, lamb chops or some liver, which I broil in the electric oven in my room. I usually eat four or five raw carrots with my meat, and that is all. I must be part rabbit; I never get bored with raw carrots.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: You have this mounting aggressive ignorance with the rabbit's foot of their particular religion. You don't really have any kind of spiritual law, just a kind of a rabid mental illness. The songs are a little slice of life.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.text: For me, there is very little difference between magic and art. To me, the ultimate act of magic is to create something from nothing: It's like when the stage magician pulls the rabbit from the hat.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.text: Romance, like the rabbit at the dog track, is the elusive, fake, and never attained reward which, for the benefit and amusement of our masters, keeps us running and thinking in safe circles.
quotes.author: Beverly Jones

quotes.text: The thought of eating rabbit and squirrels doesn't appeal to me. And that was on our table quite often as a kid. In your uppity restaurants, they serve a lot of rabbit. But I just can't help but think of Peter. And deer, I can't go there, because of Bambi.
quotes.author: Paula Deen

quotes.text: You either evolve or you don't. I don't like old people on a rock n' roll stage. I think they look pathetic, me included. And the fact that I represent an era means I can't just go out there and do all new stuff. They would all say, 'Sing 'White Rabbit,' and I'd say no? That's rude.
quotes.author: Grace Slick

quotes.text: I'm obsessed with broccoli, carrots, celery, string beans, snap peas, black kale, brussels sprouts, cabbage - I could go on! They used to call me 'rabbit' when I was a kid. I hate mushrooms, though. I apologize to fungi lovers, but this way, there's more for you!
quotes.author: Lisa Edelstein

quotes.text: So, did I work with Warhol? I worked with him less on that play then I did on other things. He actually did a portrait of my rabbit and some other stuff. Warhol was definitely... Warhol.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.text: I remember once I had lunch with George W Bush, his father, and Condoleezza Rice. Then I went home to find my dog and my neighbour's dog fighting over a dead rabbit, and I had to separate them. I like that my home life keeps things real.
quotes.author: Jeff Kinney

quotes.text: Well, you know... I grew up in postwar Britain, when you were lucky to get anything to eat. People in America have absolutely no conception of how austere England was after the war. While you were all sort of eating butter and eggs, we were eating rabbit. That's what there was in the butcher shop.
quotes.author: Tim Curry

quotes.text: I can write, He floated up to the ceiling, and a baby rabbit came out of his pocket, grew wings, and flew away. And you will believe that it really happened. That's magic, isn't it?
quotes.author: Humphrey Carpenter

quotes.text: I drove around in a Volkswagen Rabbit I shared with one of my roommates, and it didn't have a roof. It doesn't rain much in L.A., but when it did, it was utterly miserable.
quotes.author: Jon Hamm

quotes.text: If I let a blue mood run rampant, before I know it I'm obsessing about the color of the satin lining in my coffin - will it match my dress? That's when I feel like Alice in Cancerland falling down the rabbit hole and just have to stop.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.text: We're always on the side of the animal that's being chased. We always seem to be on the side of the rabbit or the fox and not on the side of the hounds.
quotes.author: Norman Jewison

quotes.text: I have this desire to just while away weeks, months and years. It took me two years to make this record but that was with me trying to condense my process and not disappear down the rabbit hole with all the cool things I've collected. I could take 10 years and not explore everything I want to with these instruments.
quotes.author: Gotye

quotes.text: I loved 'Roger Rabbit' growing up.
quotes.author: Stephanie Leonidas

quotes.text: Sex in a dance is in the eyes of the beholder. I never thought my dances sexy. I suppose that's because I see myself with my face washed, and to me I look like a rabbit.
quotes.author: Gwen Verdon

quotes.text: It seems like a totally gratuitous myth to tell people a giant rabbit comes round at night leaving candy in a haphazard way around the house... and the cover shows the bunny caught in the act.
quotes.author: Todd Rundgren

quotes.text: Once I showed up at my sister's with a baby rabbit I had bought from some children because its ears were cold. I put the rabbit on a hot water bottle and massaged its ears for quite a while. After all, I knew that all healthy animals had warm ears.
quotes.author: Juliette Gordon Low

quotes.text: I thought I'd be edgy and dye my hair red. And I dyed my hair, like, Jessica Rabbit red. It kind of allowed me to have this whole new confidence and this whole new swagger and this whole new sense of self. It kind of brought out the inner rock star in me. I had never dyed my hair like that, and no one forgot me after that.
quotes.author: Candice Accola

quotes.text: I was totally into cartoon babes when I was a little dude. Cheetara from the 'Thundercats,' then Jessica Rabbit, and finally I moved onto a real-life human being and was into Punky Brewster, and then Christina Applegate on 'Married with Children.'
quotes.author: Pete Wentz

quotes.text: We believe 'Peter Rabbit' because Beatrix Potter believes it. You have to.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.text: That's a powerful lucky rabbit's foot. I got the part in Gone With the Wind because of it. I got my Warner contract, thanks to it.
quotes.author: Hattie McDaniel

quotes.text: Sometimes you have to censor books. When I read 'Peter Rabbit,' I skip the part about Peter's father ending up in one of Mrs. McGregor's pies. I also hid the book of 'Grimm Fairy Tales.' They're just too grim for my grandkids. Reality will come soon enough.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: When my daughter, Clare, was 4, she told me that a school friend had told her what I did for a living. Clare asked me, 'Is it true you play Jack Rabbit?'
quotes.author: Peter Bergman

quotes.text: Applause is interesting, but I'm a monster with or without it. Something is either well written or it isn't. 'White Rabbit' is not well written, and no amount of applause or royalties can convince me it is. I could have done a better job with those lyrics. They didn't say what I wanted.
quotes.author: Grace Slick

quotes.text: Why pour shampoo into a rabbit's eyes to see how much shampoo you can put in an adult's eyes before they go blind? I'll put them in my hair, in my eyes before I would give them to anyone else.
quotes.author: John Paul DeJoria

quotes.text: I love prints of skulls and bones and have some taxidermy - a crow and a rabbit - to remind me of home. I like art and have a big portrait of Bjork.
quotes.author: Ellie Goulding

quotes.text: Forty years ago this country went down a rabbit hole in Vietnam and millions died. I fear we're going down a rabbit hole once again - and if people can stop and think and reflect on some of the ideas and issues in this movie, perhaps I've done some damn good here!
quotes.author: Errol Morris

quotes.text: We can't allow ourselves to descend down the rabbit hole of unbridled partisanship for partisan sake.
quotes.author: Mike Quigley

quotes.text: The world is really run by the Web. There's so much information out there that you can click and keep going down the rabbit hole finding stuff.
quotes.author: Big Boi

quotes.text: Weapons of mass destruction aren't pulled out of a black hat like a white rabbit at a magic show. They're produced in factories. There's science and technology involved. They're not produced in a hole in the ground or in a basement.
quotes.author: Scott Ritter

quotes.text: If you look closely you can see that they are all interconnected, symbolic of a never-ending circle in which it is simply impossible for the dog to catch the rabbit.
quotes.author: Kit Williams

quotes.text: So I think that in the beginning of your career you're just looking to work. Luckily for me, my first movie was 'Rabbit Hole' and I got to work with incredible people, a Pulitzer prize winning writer, John Cameron Mitchell, and all the actors involved. So it's tough, man, because you want to have credibility.
quotes.author: Miles Teller

quotes.text: Jessica Rabbit! People wouldn't call her the most beautiful person in Hollywood, but I find her quirkiness and talent very attractive.
quotes.author: Tom Weston-Jones

quotes.text: I have to be careful because there is something destructive within me, I think, and I can have a tendency to just search for the kicks. I can't really get too close to someone who's too destructive, or too dark, because then I might go down the rabbit hole myself.
quotes.author: Alexander Skarsgard

quotes.text: The Brer Rabbit ploy has been quite effective for me. When a country is talking about prosecuting me, I demand to be charged and put on trial and offer to pay my own airfare. They know that I'm going to bring a lot of international media with me and put their whaling programme on trial, and they decide it's better to keep quiet and do nothing.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: I did every diet: Atkins. Cabbage-soup diet. Dean Ornish. But I couldn't live the rest of my life like a rabbit.
quotes.author: Mike Huckabee

quotes.text: When my sister Joan arrived, I asked if I could swap her for a rabbit. When I think what a marvellous friend she's been, I'm so glad my parents didn't take me at my word.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.text: 'White Rabbit' was mostly done in about two days, the music in about half an hour. The music is a 'Bolero' rip-off and the lyrics a rearrangement of 'Alice in Wonderland.' You take two spectacular hits and throw them together, and it's hard to miss.
quotes.author: Grace Slick

quotes.text: Travelling to make television programmes means I have some unusual food memories. In Pasto, Colombia, I was taken to a restaurant where I chose my meat for the evening from a cage of white rats. It tasted perfectly good - like rabbit.
quotes.author: Jonathan Dimbleby

quotes.text: I was digging for stuff in a used bookstore, and I came upon 'Little Sister.' I fell in love with Chandler that night. I fell right down the rabbit hole of crime fiction.
quotes.author: Robert Crais

quotes.text: I lived for going down the rabbit hole of meeting weird people. Of course, come Monday I would be tallying up all the different situations, and each one was progressively more dangerous. I got lucky in that I didn't go to jail.
quotes.author: Dax Shepard
