quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.text: Analyzing humor is like dissecting a frog. Few people are interested and the frog dies of it.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.text: I found in one of the tombs an inscription saying, 'If you touch my tomb, you will be eaten by a crocodile and hippopotamus.' It doesn't mean the hippo will eat you, it means the person really wanted his tomb to be protected.
quotes.author: Zahi Hawass

quotes.text: See you later, alligator. After a while, crocodile.
quotes.author: Bill Haley

quotes.text: To sit back hoping that someday, some way, someone will make things right is to go on feeding the crocodile, hoping he will eat you last - but eat you he will.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: An appeaser is one who feeds a crocodile, hoping it will eat him last.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: I have no fear of losing my life - if I have to save a koala or a crocodile or a kangaroo or a snake, mate, I will save it.
quotes.author: Steve Irwin

quotes.text: I've eaten lion, leopard, crocodile, python. I don't recommend lion. It tastes exactly like when a tomcat comes into your house and sprays. Snake and crocodile are great - a cross between lobster and chicken.
quotes.author: Wilbur Smith

quotes.text: Every cent we earn from Crocodile Hunter goes straight back into conservation. Every single cent.
quotes.author: Steve Irwin

quotes.text: I like solitude. I'm very good at being disconnected. I do a lot of disappearing. People who know me go, 'Oh yeah, Mailman, she's gone into her cave again.' I'm like that, a bit of a hibernating bear. Like that crocodile that just sits there in the water and doesn't do much. I was always a bit of a dreamer as a kid, so that hasn't changed.
quotes.author: Deborah Mailman

quotes.text: I put a bullet into the back of the crocodile's neck just behind the head, thus killing it. If a crocodile is hit in any other part of its anatomy it disappears into the water and is irrecoverable.
quotes.author: Louis Leakey

quotes.text: I wrote about a bird that cleaned a crocodile's teeth. The story was so good that my teacher could not believe that a ten-year-old could write that well. I was even punished because my teacher thought I'd lied about writing it! I had always loved to write, but it was then that I realized that I had a talent for it.
quotes.author: Brian Jacques

quotes.text: When I went to Amazonia, l went as the field doctor for biologists studying crocodile behavior. There's no way humans should have any encounters with crocodiles. You should stay away from them!
quotes.author: Kenneth Kamler

quotes.text: Actually, I have this random fear, and it's of bees and wasps. Bees and wasps actually scare me just a little bit. I'd rather have a snake or a crocodile, yes... I appreciate them, and I love them, but I have a slight fear.
quotes.author: Bindi Irwin

quotes.text: The first crocodile I ever caught was at nine years of age, and it was a rescue.
quotes.author: Steve Irwin

quotes.text: Give me a 15-ft. crocodile any day over a bee.
quotes.author: Bindi Irwin

quotes.text: Take the crocodile, for example, my favorite animal. There are 23 species. Seventeen of those species are rare or endangered. They're on the way out, no matter what anyone does or says, you know.
quotes.author: Steve Irwin

quotes.text: 'Crocodile Dundee' is about people; it's 10 seconds about crocodiles.
quotes.author: Paul Hogan

quotes.text: I have the best daddy in the whole world, and I will miss him every day. When I see a crocodile, I will always think of him, and I know that Daddy made this zoo so everyone could come and learn to love all the animals.
quotes.author: Bindi Irwin

quotes.text: My guiltiest pleasure? 'Untamed & Uncut'. Videos of people being attacked by animals. Yeah. I don't know why. I just love seeing guys who say, 'I'm gonna stick my hand in that crocodile's mouth and see what happens.' And then it snaps down on them. There you go - that's what you get! It's a wild animal, my friend.
quotes.author: Nathan Fillion

quotes.text: My maternal granddad, Leonard, was full of amazing stories. He was an orphan, with 11 or 12 brothers and sisters, and he used to tell us about growing up near the Irrawaddy river and how one brother was eaten by a crocodile.
quotes.author: Jamie Cullum

quotes.text: The Allegator is the same, as the Crocodile, and differs only in Name.
quotes.author: John Lawson

quotes.text: After 'Crocodile Dundee,' I turned down lots of stuff, most of it where I'd play the girlfriend of some funny man.
quotes.author: Linda Kozlowski

quotes.text: I wish that one of my children will be like the Australian guy from the Discovery Channel show. The crocodile hunter.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.text: I am trying different styles, and while you can't climb a tree or jump on a crocodile in a dress, it is nice to get dressed up every now and then and kind of walk away from the khaki for a moment.
quotes.author: Bindi Irwin

quotes.text: I got a film fairly quickly and felt like I was on a roll. I would walk into auditions sounding like Crocodile Dundee, thinking, 'This is going to be a novelty for them.' Then I realised that there are a million other Australians here, and I should just shut up.
quotes.author: Chris Hemsworth

quotes.author: Jamie Cullum

quotes.text: The Allegator is the same, as the Crocodile, and differs only in Name.
quotes.author: John Lawson

quotes.text: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.
quotes.author: Bill Copeland

quotes.text: Behold the turtle. He makes progress only when he sticks his neck out.
quotes.author: James Bryant Conant

quotes.text: It's OK to do cute little things like kissing a turtle, but you can't kiss another person because he's a different color? Give me a break. And you have to remember, I'm from Dallas, Texas.
quotes.author: Aaron Spelling

quotes.text: Anytime you see a turtle up on top of a fence post, you know he had some help.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.text: I remember reading 'The Grapes of Wrath' in high school in 1983. My family had immigrated to the U.S. three years before, and I had spent the better part of the first two years learning English. John Steinbeck's book was the first book I read in English where I had an 'Aha!' moment, namely in the famed turtle chapter.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.text: 'Changes in Latitudes' began when I was looking at a photograph of a sea turtle swimming underwater. I had such a strong feeling for the beauty of this ancient creature, at home in the sea. On the spot, I wanted to swim with that turtle. I began to imagine a character who would do just that.
quotes.author: Will Hobbs

quotes.text: Take a walk with a turtle. And behold the world in pause.
quotes.author: Bruce Feiler

quotes.text: Watch the turtle. He only moves forward by sticking his neck out.
quotes.author: Louis V. Gerstner, Jr.

quotes.text: Being on a successful show is kind of like being a sea turtle. Every year, sea turtles lay hundreds and hundreds of eggs, but only a few manage to survive and mature. It's the same with TV pilots. There are so many great ideas, but for whatever reason only the lucky ones get picked up.
quotes.author: Keiko Agena

quotes.text: I am now a turtle. Virtually everything I own is on my back and suffice it to say I am one ton lighter and therefore 2,000 pounds happier. All houses are gone.
quotes.author: Bobby Darin

quotes.text: Aging gracefully is about no heavy makeup, and not too much powder because it gets into the wrinkles, and, you know, to not get turtle eyelids and to not try to look young.
quotes.author: Iris Apfel

quotes.text: You are absolutely free to describe me as a turtle or something.
quotes.author: Paul Giamatti

quotes.text: I wonder what the most intelligent thing ever said was that started with the word 'dude.' 'Dude, these are isotopes.' 'Dude, we removed your kidney. You're gonna be fine.' 'Dude, I am so stoked to win this Nobel Prize. I just wanna thank Kevin, and Turtle, and all my homies.'
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: Words have a life of their own. There is no telling what they will do. Within a matter of days, they can even turn turtle and mean the opposite.
quotes.author: Craig Brown

quotes.text: And when you look at the Turtle's movie there is something there, definitely something there.
quotes.author: Eddie Campbell

quotes.text: When I come to Chicago, I gorge myself. I get off the plane and start with Gene and Jude's for two hot dogs with everything, swing by The Fudge Pot for a taffy apple and a turtle, chocolate clusters at Sarah's Pastries and Candies and steak at Smith and Wollensky. I find time for Gino's pizza within the next 12 hours.
quotes.author: James Belushi

quotes.text: I actually think I'm more of a turtle than Verne is. Where Verne is up on two legs and moving at full speed and doesn't pull his head into the shell very often, I in reality was five or ten minutes later to every recording session.
quotes.author: Garry Shandling

quotes.text: Every sea-captain who sailed to the West Indies was expected to bring home a turtle on the return voyage for a feast to his expectant friends.
quotes.author: Alice Morse Earle

quotes.text: Every Halloween for six years, I was a Ninja Turtle, and Mikey was my favorite. The turtles really made me who I am today. They got me into martial arts, meditation, surfing, skateboarding; big time influence on who I am today.
quotes.author: Greg Cipes

quotes.text: The idea of the state is, or should be, a very limited, prescribed idea. The state looks after the defense of the realm, and other matters - raising revenue to pay for things which are for all of us, and so on. That idea has turned turtle now. The state isn't any longer perceived as an institution which exists to serve us.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.text: I've been exploring different options for when I'm done skiing. I have the Turtle Ridge Foundation, which is helping a bunch of worthy causes around the Northeast. I've also started SkiSpace, which is an online social network that basically deals with all things based around any snow sport.
quotes.author: Bode Miller

quotes.text: Kneeling on the sea bottom in a place known as Tiger Beach, I watched a 12-foot- long female tiger shark cruise over the turtle grass with three silver bar jacks swimming in front of her nose.
quotes.author: Brian Skerry

quotes.text: After 'Divergent,' I got a job rewriting a sci-fi script at Paramount. I think they really liked what I did, so I got a call saying, 'We're about to shoot 'Ninja Turtles' in three or four months; do you wanna come in and do a little work on the script?' That was the beginning of a many-month 'Ninja Turtle' odyssey.
quotes.author: Evan Daugherty

quotes.text: Gypsy was the name my brother gave a pet turtle he had. I always thought it was so peculiar.
quotes.author: Joel Hodgson

quotes.text: Hawaii was beautiful of course, we played at Turtle Bay an amazing resort right on the ocean.
quotes.author: Natalie Gulbis

quotes.text: All morning they watched for the plane which they thought would be looking for them. They cursed war in general and PTs in particular. At about ten o'clock the hulk heaved a moist sigh and turned turtle.
quotes.author: John Hersey

quotes.text: Our cat is kind dove shellfish, and thinks the world is hers, She finds a comfy spot and then we pet turtle sheep purrs.
quotes.author: Brian P. Cleary

quotes.text: 'The Green Turtle' was created in the 1940s by a cartoonist named Chu Hing, one of the first Asian Americans to work in the American comic book industry.
quotes.author: Gene Luen Yang

quotes.text: 'The Green Turtle' wasn't all that popular. He lasted only five issues of Blazing Comics before disappearing into obscurity.
quotes.author: Gene Luen Yang

quotes.text: The rumor is Chu Hing really wanted the 'Green Turtle' to be Chinese American, but the publisher didn't think that would sell. If you read those books, the hero almost always has his back facing the camera so you can't see his face. When he turns around, his face is obscured.
quotes.author: Gene Luen Yang

quotes.text: My mother is Turtle Mountain Chippewa, and she lived on her home reservation. My father taught there. He had just been discharged from the Air Force. He went to school on the GI Bill and got his teaching credentials. He is adventurous - he worked his way through Alaska at age seventeen and paid for his living expenses by winning at the poker table.
quotes.author: Louise Erdrich

quotes.text: On its 2015 list, the Fish and Wildlife Service included the 'ea, or hawksbill turtle, as well as the green turtle, Ridley sea turtle, leatherback turtle and loggerhead turtle. Four mammals are considered endangered: the Hawaiian hoary bat; the kohola, or humpback whale; the sperm whale; and the endemic Hawaiian monk seal.
quotes.author: Susanna Moore

quotes.text: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.
quotes.author: Bill Copeland

quotes.text: Behold the turtle. He makes progress only when he sticks his neck out.
quotes.author: James Bryant Conant

quotes.text: It's OK to do cute little things like kissing a turtle, but you can't kiss another person because he's a different color? Give me a break. And you have to remember, I'm from Dallas, Texas.
quotes.author: Aaron Spelling

quotes.text: Anytime you see a turtle up on top of a fence post, you know he had some help.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.text: I remember reading 'The Grapes of Wrath' in high school in 1983. The state isn't any longer perceived as an institution which exists to serve us.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.text: It does not do to leave a live dragon out of your calculations, if you live near him.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.text: I always wanted to ride a dragon myself, so I decided to do this for a year in my imagination.
quotes.author: Cornelia Funke

quotes.text: It's been a thrilling journey - I have had to really learn that an orchestra is an entity - it's a creature. I have been calling it the dragon and the conductor is the dragon tamer. And you just have to... ride and don't let go and you will be fine.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.text: Really, I have to laugh because there was a whole set of stories that made me sound like the Dragon Lady, you know, 'tough this and tough that.' Then there is this business about 'gooey.' The bottom line is I am a pragmatic idealist.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.text: When the prison doors are opened, the real dragon will fly out.
quotes.author: Ho Chi Minh

quotes.text: I think women should be more independent. In society, we're portrayed as people who simply wear make-up and sit around. We need a Princess Charming - a woman who rescues her man and slays the dragon instead of the other way round.
quotes.author: Adora Svitak

quotes.text: Jealousy, that dragon which slays love under the pretence of keeping it alive.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.text: Take it from a guy: If you're in love with somebody, you will swim the stream, you will climb the mountain, you will slay the dragon. You're going to get to her somehow, some way.
quotes.author: Phil McGraw

quotes.text: Always speak politely to an enraged Dragon.
quotes.author: Steven Brust

quotes.text: This little hobbit saves the world. The wizard kills the dragon and saves the town. So many people connect to that character; it doesn't matter if it's an elf or a hobbit or a dwarf. It doesn't matter. They're human in their heart and soul.
quotes.author: R. A. Salvatore

quotes.text: Stress is an important dragon to slay - or at least tame - in your life.
quotes.author: Marilu Henner

quotes.text: It is possible that mankind is on the threshold of a golden age; but, if so, it will be necessary first to slay the dragon that guards the door, and this dragon is religion.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.text: I can no longer type, so I use TalkingPoint and Dragon Dictate. It's a speech-to-text program, and there's an add-on for talking which some guys came up with.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: The Classic games were Classic because, like classical music or architecture, they strove to give life and weight to ideals of order and proportion, to provide a vision of timelessness. In 'Double Dragon,' we can see the cracks in the brick, the mold growing on the drainage pipes, the unmistakable deterioration of the world we live in.
quotes.author: D. B. Weiss

quotes.text: Typecasting is something I have to be careful with, since I play myself on Geek & Sundry so much on my weekly show 'The Flog.' That's why I did 'Dragon Age: Redemption' last year, so I could do something a little more dramatic and hard-edged.
quotes.author: Felicia Day

quotes.text: Tyria's a big world. We get a grand tour in 'Ghosts of Ascalon.' We're in Divinity's Reach, we're in Lion's Arch, we're in Ebonhawke, we're in the Dragon's Land, we're in Ascalon. We're basically hitting a lot of the major human and charr locations.
quotes.author: Jeff Grubb

quotes.text: The 'crownd' is still the unit, the favourite coin of the labourers, especially the elder folk. They use the word something in the same sense as the dollar, and look with regret upon the gradual disappearance of the broad silver disc with the figure of 'St. Gaarge' conquering the dragon.
quotes.author: Richard Jefferies

quotes.text: A poet can write about a man slaying a dragon, but not about a man pushing a button that releases a bomb.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.text: You can use martial arts to tell a different story. Ang Lee used martial arts in 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' to talk about love.
quotes.author: Jet Li

quotes.text: I think so, Silence of the Lambs was a great, suspenseful thriller and I would expect Red Dragon to be similar. And I think it's very character driven.
quotes.author: Emily Watson

quotes.text: With her first Oscar nomination for her portrayal of Lisbeth Salander in 'The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo,' Rooney Mara gave fashion fans a new Gothic-chic muse.
quotes.author: Derek Blasberg

quotes.text: I certainly hope 'Dragon' can leave some legacy behind.
quotes.author: Donnie Yen

quotes.text: I love 'Enter the Dragon,' and I love Japanese movies. I love Jackie Chan movies; they are my heroes.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I'm kind of honored to be a dragon lady. The dragon is a very powerful, mythical animal.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: When you're 14, anything with a sword and a dragon is pretty cool. But when you're 21 and you've read 2,000 fantasy novels, you start to realize that some of those books, well, they weren't really good. OK, let's be honest. A lot of them were crap.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.text: I think being a dragon would be pretty awesome... you get to fly.
quotes.author: Josh Keaton

quotes.text: I learned how to comport myself among trolls, elves, hobbits or goblins. I learned that a friend can be lost to greed and avarice. I learned that solving riddles may be as important a survival skill as bowmanship. I know how to talk to a dragon, and that it's best not to.
quotes.author: Karen Joy Fowler

quotes.text: Becoming a walking, dancing, fire-breathing lifestyle dragon is not something you can pursue overnight! It takes years of studying, living, and understanding the modern culture!
quotes.author: Theophilus London

quotes.text: So many people think that if you're writing fantasy, it means you can just make everything up as you go. Want to add a dragon? Add a dragon! Want some magic? Throw it in. But the thing is, regardless of whether you're dealing with realism or fantasy, every world has rules. Make sure to establish a natural order.
quotes.author: V. E. Schwab

quotes.text: Nearly all monster stories depend for their success on Jack killing the Giant, Beowulf or St. George slaying the Dragon, Harry Potter triumphing over the basilisk. That is their inner grammar, and the whole shape of the story leads towards it.
quotes.author: A. N. Wilson

quotes.text: Occasionally, some sitcoms still stereotype women - the old dragon or the dolly bird - but on the whole we've moved away from that.
quotes.author: Jo Brand

quotes.text: Twelve-piece cookware sets for ninety-nine bucks are routinely hawked on late-night TV - often by friends of mine. But with a mere five pieces, you can do whatever you like - slay the dragon and then cook its tenderloin in the style of the duke of Wellington, if you want to.
quotes.author: Mario Batali

quotes.text: I'm not sure if it's fair to call it a 'fairy tale,' but I really loved 'Mulan,' the Disney film. It was my favorite. I guess it's not really a fairy tale, but you do get Eddie Murphy as a dragon.
quotes.author: Lily Cole

quotes.text: My mother is an immigrant from China, and she filled my head with stories about ghosts and fighting monks in China, so the world of 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' was a very familiar one.
quotes.author: Tess Gerritsen

quotes.text: I gained a lot of confidence after 'IP Man' as being a true actor. I went on to tackle what it is an actor is supposed to do before a film. Do a lot of research, get into the character. That's what I did with 'Dragon.'
quotes.author: Donnie Yen

quotes.text: I got halfway through 'The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo.' I don't get it at all. What's the big thrill? It's boring.
quotes.author: Elmore Leonard

quotes.text: I remember when we were doing the first Dragon's Lair, I got really involved with coming up with all the little rooms and what was the danger in the room and going into it with bats and spiders and snakes.
quotes.author: Don Bluth

quotes.text: The heart of Dragon's Lair has always been its compelling story. With Dragon's Lair 3D, we think the team has really created an interactive animated movie.
quotes.author: Don Bluth

quotes.text: In animation, no one gets to see your face, so you can really mess up with your voice like I did 'ParaNorman;' I was a bully in that, which was so much fun to do. In 'How to Train Your Dragon,' I'm a little Viking character. So, it's kind of exciting to play these roles that you normally wouldn't get to play in a live-action movie.
quotes.author: Christopher Mintz-Plasse

quotes.text: And I plan to write a sequel to Dragon Rider.
quotes.author: Cornelia Funke

quotes.text: I think 'The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo' is a good example of a film where you have to juggle a whole lot of information to follow that story, and even if you haven't read the book, it seems to go pretty well. And that is a film where the characters didn't meet until 74 minutes into the film, not on page 17.
quotes.author: Niels Arden Oplev

quotes.text: The puppet characters were combinations of people I had known and to some degree aspects of my own personality. Weird was based on someone I knew in Chicago. Dirty Dragon was based on a good friend I had in Indianapolis.
quotes.author: William Jackson

quotes.text: I saw the first 'How to Train Your Dragon' film with my children, and I found it utterly exhilarating.
quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

quotes.text: I was on tour with Little Dragon with the Gorillaz. She's got an amazing voice and is a lovely girl. Her vibe is fresh pressed and harmless fun with a tinge of the dark side if you look in the right bits of the tunes.
quotes.author: Neneh Cherry

quotes.text: It was always that detail that drove me. Ever since I was a little kid, I used to get into the nitty gritty... when I was drawing army tanks or monsters, I'd do every nut and rivet, and I'd do every scale on the dragon's back. It was just the way I was built.
quotes.author: Graeme Base

quotes.text: After The Silence of the Lambs and Hannibal, the audience would like to know where, when, and who arrests Hannibal Lecter for the first time. This is the story of Red Dragon.
quotes.author: Dino De Laurentiis

quotes.text: There were dragons to slay in the old days. Nixon was a good dragon.
quotes.author: Pat Oliphant

quotes.text: One of the beauties of 'The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo' is the very delicate and strange relationship between the two main characters.
quotes.author: Stellan Skarsgard

quotes.text: I was a huge bookworm as a kid, and you could usually find me reading something with a dragon on its cover.
quotes.author: Julie Kagawa

quotes.text: 'How To Train your Dragon 2' is an amazing film. I think it's an extraordinary film. The animation in it is fantastic.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.text: If we want to talk about the movies that have made an impact in what I do in the action realm - Bruce Lee in 'Enter the Dragon.' I've watched that countless times.
quotes.author: Jason Statham

quotes.text: Dragon fruit is very subtle, very delicate. So you want to be careful not to kill it with things that have very strong flavor.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.text: I was shocked when 'The Hobbit' ended where it ended. I wasn't paying attention to what they were doing; I didn't know they had another movie, and I couldn't believe it was when the dragon came out.
quotes.author: Adam McKay

quotes.text: I felt perhaps 'The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo' was a little premature. It was a huge hit around the world - it was still running in the theatres - and the Americans at that time were already shooting the remake, and I was like, 'Whoa! Give it a break of five or six years and get a little inspired, and then do it.'
quotes.author: Mads Mikkelsen

quotes.text: I really like the Glycolic Cleansing Pads because they're super easy. Sometimes it's annoying to scrub your face with your hands, but these are just little pads, so I like that. I also really like the Kale Fix Moisturizer and Dragon's Blood Fix Serum. The Dragon's Blood is good for priming before your makeup.
quotes.author: Kylie Jenner

quotes.text: I'll usually wash my face with a face wash, then I'll go to my makeup. I like to use Nip + Fab Dragon's Blood Fix Serum. It's moisturizing and also a great primer for your makeup. And, I try to use sunscreen every day.
quotes.author: Kylie Jenner

quotes.text: 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' is not a direct-to-video, low-budget sequel: it's a big film. And it'd be fantastic to have the opportunity to see it on the IMAX screens at the same time, and IMAX has made arrangements with us for that to happen.
quotes.author: Ted Sarandos

quotes.text: Our feature film, 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon Two,' has a built-in fan base from the original film.
quotes.author: Ted Sarandos

quotes.text: You know how they say that old people with Alzheimer's, they kind of go back, and they revert to the most emotional part of their life, what they did when they were younger... I think I am going to be cursed with reliving 'Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope' in my mind. And playing 'Dragon's Layer' when I enter Alzheimer's.
quotes.author: Rich Moore

quotes.text: 'How to Train Your Dragon,' the first one, was a film I'd seen prior to being approached for the sequel. I don't often watch family animated movies, but it's one that I loved and thought was really well done: beautifully crafted storytelling.
quotes.author: Kit Harington

quotes.text: I was a tremendous fan of the original Kenneth Grahame short story, 'The Reluctant Dragon.'
quotes.author: Tony DiTerlizzi

quotes.text: Dragon's Lair 3D is about as close as you can come to controlling an animated feature film.
quotes.author: Don Bluth

quotes.text: I'm also very pleased that we were able to include a full orchestrated score for Dragon's Lair 3D. The 40 different music pieces blend with the action to make you feel more a part of the whole adventure.
quotes.author: Don Bluth

quotes.text: Working with Scorsese was an absolute dream, and one of my favourite ever jobs was 'Beowulf' because it was just pure acting. Your imagination explodes as you try to imagine you're fighting a dragon or whatever.
quotes.author: Ray Winstone

quotes.text: My education started with Latin taught at home by a governess, I can't imagine why, and for some reason I attended the Infants Department of the Oxford High School for Girls before moving to the Dragon School at the dangerous age of 8 or so.
quotes.author: Tim Hunt

quotes.text: I read 'Red Dragon' back in high school. I love Thomas Harris' approach to the crime thriller that crossed over into horror in a way that nobody really tapped into.
quotes.author: Bryan Fuller

quotes.text: I'd like to work with Florence and The Machine, Little Dragon, Frank Ocean, Miguel, Calvin Harris... there are so many artists and producers.
quotes.author: Wynter Gordon

quotes.text: I love Pixar films; I think they're the greatest filmmakers in the world. I love Disney films. 'Tangled,' was great. I loved 'How to Train Your Dragon,' the Dreamworks film. But it's not for me. I don't want to make a film for families; I want to make adult films.
quotes.author: Bill Plympton

quotes.text: I read a lot of the 'Pern books' growing up - basically up through 'All the Weyrs of Pern,' maybe a couple after that. As far as formative dragon influences are concerned, she's probably one of the top ones; I know I read other fantasy novels that had them, but none particularly stick in mind.
quotes.author: Marie Brennan

quotes.text: Bruce Lee has always been a hero of mine, and the choreography in 'Enter The Dragon' is amazing.
quotes.author: Benedict Wong

quotes.text: I grew up on genre. If it had a dragon on the cover, I was interested. But horror, especially, really gripped me in its bony fist.
quotes.author: Benjamin Percy

quotes.text: I'm still a small shrimp, not a dragon.
quotes.author: Barry Lam

quotes.text: I especially don't like the graphic violence against women and children often depicted in novels such as 'The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo' and others. I'm not sure if it's being done just to entertain or whether it really is necessary for the characters involved.
quotes.author: Ann Cleeves

quotes.text: The thing with 'The Girl with a Dragon Tattoo' is that is it's like an Agatha Christie plot, and an investigating journalist is also a classic character.
quotes.author: Niels Arden Oplev

quotes.text: With the release of the Dragon sensor... I have finished my mission. I am done posting. I will no longer be the face of Red.
quotes.author: James Jannard

quotes.text: The car resembles a dragon fly or any other jumping animal that moves shorter distances in straight lines and then changes its direction at different points.
quotes.author: Fritz Todt

quotes.text: 'Dragon Age' needs to have big story moments. It is a game about character first, and the party is an absolutely central part of that. I want to keep pursuing interactivity with the world: taking crowds to the next level or having things catch fire because you indiscriminately cast a fireball into a wheat field.
quotes.author: Marc Laidlaw

quotes.text: I think it's important to have scaling challenge because there are players who I feel play 'Dragon Age' for the wonder, story and exploration but wouldn't enjoy getting their butts handed to them. We do still have easy mode - it's not a pure story mode in that there's zero combat, but it's not super-challenging.
quotes.author: Marc Laidlaw

quotes.text: If you want an MMO, there are plenty out there. The difference with a single player game is that in the same way you lose yourself in a good novel, you can lose yourself in a single player story. You see it in all these games, where you can fill your house with turnips or decorate your armour with a dragon skull.
quotes.author: Marc Laidlaw

quotes.text: We built 'Jade Empire,' then we built 'Mass Effect,' then we built 'Dragon Age.' With those last two, when you're dealing with two big ideas that are on their third iterations, you develop some strategies for managing your lore, or you drown!
quotes.author: Marc Laidlaw

quotes.text: Does Greenpeace think it can stop whaling in Antarctica by publicly eating whale meat and declaring it delicious? What are these people thinking?
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: God gave me some weird, beautiful scent that makes men and women go crazy. People compare it to Carvel. It is a whale of a smell.
quotes.author: Adam Sandler

quotes.text: If the Bible had said that Jonah swallowed the whale, I would believe it.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.text: We have sat on the river bank and caught catfish with pin hooks. The time has come to harpoon a whale.
quotes.author: John Hope

quotes.text: People sometimes feel frustrated about what's going on in our oceans and environment, and 'Whale Wars' shows that ordinary people can take action and make things happen.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: Fiction was invented the day Jonas arrived home and told his wife that he was three days late because he had been swallowed by a whale.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.text: I done wrestled with an alligator, I done tussled with a whale; handcuffed lightning, thrown thunder in jail; only last week, I murdered a rock, injured a stone, hospitalised a brick; I'm so mean I make medicine sick.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: The real threat to whales is whaling, which has endangered many whale species.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: Light doesn't penetrate beneath the surface of the water, so ocean creatures like whales and dolphins and even 800 species of fish communicate by sound. And a North Atlantic right whale can transmit across hundreds of miles.
quotes.author: Rose George

quotes.text: The Bible is full of dubious scientific impossibilities, from Jonah living inside a whale, to the sun standing still in the sky for Joshua.
quotes.author: Lawrence M. Krauss

quotes.text: I would probably have more in common with a whale than with a bourgeois married couple employed at worthy institutions that I would wipe from the face of the earth if it was given to me to do so.
quotes.author: Che Guevara

quotes.text: It's funny, I'm very analytical in my real life, but in terms of my films, I try to not analyze them at all and let things just go into them and let them be what they are. I mean, people ask me to this day what 'The Squid and the Whale' stood for, and I have no idea except that it's an exhibit in the Natural History Museum.
quotes.author: Noah Baumbach

quotes.text: My wife says I'm making a noise like a stranded whale. I think I have a major snoring problem.
quotes.author: Rex Hunt

quotes.text: The whale is endangered, while the ant continues to do just fine.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.text: I go to the Natural History Museum and look at the cage of stuffed starlings there. But my favourite thing is the big blue whale. The scale of it is unbelievable, and makes you feel how insignificant you are as a human being.
quotes.author: Arthur Darvill

quotes.text: I have a tattoo on my foot that says 'it's a whale' in Japanese, because Japanese people kill whales. My stuffed whale was like most children's teddy bear. I took it with me everywhere. I slept with it. I couldn't live without my whale.
quotes.author: Skylar Grey

quotes.text: I wanted to do something creatively, having been a beached whale for many months and nursing my daughter.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.text: Like Jonah, the whale had swallowed me; unlike him, I believed I would spend eternity inside the belly of the beast.
quotes.author: Bob Kerrey

quotes.text: Whales are killed today to supply the limited demand for whale meat or to be used in pet foods or as fodder for fur-bearing animals used in the fur trade.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: Must whales and dolphins be subjected to deafening noise that will cause more than 3.5 million instances of temporary and/or permanent hearing loss? For species that depend on hearing for survival - to find food, migrate, and communicate - any hearing loss could be catastrophic. As one scientist noted, a deaf whale is a dead whale.
quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.text: To have a huge, friendly whale willingly approach your boat and look you straight in the eye is without doubt one of the most extraordinary experiences on the planet.
quotes.author: Mark Carwardine

quotes.text: Now that I finally have the time for it, this web surfing stuff turns out to be as interesting and fun and addictive as you've all been telling me. Zipping from link to link, chasing an idea across the noosphere, sucking up information like a killer whale - way cool.
quotes.author: Spider Robinson

quotes.text: The killer whale Tilikum has helped SeaWorld sell millions of dollars worth of tickets.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.text: Sea World's killer whale collection needs constant replenishing. The average life span of the animals in captivity is less than half the average for killer whales in the ocean.
quotes.author: Nina Easton

quotes.text: A whale ship was my Yale College and my Harvard.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.text: Thanks to a lot of people, not just myself, 'Whale Rider' had an amazing impact emotionally, and people remember it. I count myself very lucky that all those doors were unlocked, I just had to open them.
quotes.author: Keisha Castle-Hughes

quotes.text: As long as there is a Southern Ocean whale sanctuary, Sea Shepherd crew will continue to patrol and defend it.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: Being lampooned on 'South Park' is hardly something to complain about. They brought the issue of the dolphin and whale slaughter by the Japanese to a very large audience. I could not really care less how I was portrayed.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: I will not watch a whale die. I've not seen a whale die since I left Greenpeace in 1977.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: In 'Deadliest Catch,' we have men in ships in rough seas catching crabs. With 'Whale Wars,' we have men and women from a dozen different nations going out to sea in rough weather to help save the whales. We also have icebergs, whales, penguins, and dramatic ship-to-ship confrontations.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: He piled upon the whale's white hump the sum of all the general rage and hate felt by his whole race from Adam down; and then, as if his chest had been a mortar, he burst his hot heart's shell upon it.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.text: I wanted to make connections between Whale's past and present.
quotes.author: Bill Condon

quotes.text: We made connections between the monsters created by war and the monsters he created, the typical outcast that Whale was attracted to, and the monster in himself, that's inside all of us.
quotes.author: Bill Condon

quotes.text: To wake up in England and have the newspaper on your front door with a headline that says, 'Ozzie's Beach Whale of a Daughter,' doesn't really do much for your self-esteem at all.
quotes.author: Kelly Osbourne

quotes.text: Instead of being a page-turner, 'Moby-Dick' is a repository of American history and culture and the essentials of Western literature. The book is so encyclopedic that space aliens could use it to re-create the whale fishery as it once existed on the planet Earth in the midst of the 19th century.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Philbrick

quotes.text: On my second swim at Deception Island, the water was very clear and I was looking at hundreds of whale bones beneath me. It was a graveyard from the whaling some time in the 1920s-30s.
quotes.author: Lewis Gordon Pugh

quotes.text: For the first time in my life I tried whale. It was very chewy and quite fatty. My friend had had whale before, so I knew it would be quite blubbery. It was delicious. I loved it. It was smoked, so it had a lovely kind of tangy taste to it. We had it a couple of nights. I was won over. It was very yummy.
quotes.author: Rose Leslie

quotes.text: The fin whale is the second largest whale species on Earth, weighing up to 80 tons.
quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.text: I find it abhorrent to see a whale being slaughtered and do nothing but bear witness.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: To me extremism is targeting endangered whales in a whale sanctuary in violation of a moratorium. That, to me, is extreme.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: 'The Squid and the Whale' I shot in 23 days. I would have loved more time for it at the time, but in some ways that kind of kamikaze way of shooting was right for that movie.
quotes.author: Noah Baumbach

quotes.text: There's no question that Whale's movies are classics. They were wonderful, and successful.
quotes.author: Bill Condon

quotes.text: Most whale photos you see show whales in this beautiful blue water - it's almost like space.
quotes.author: Brian Skerry

quotes.text: The thing about Moby Dick is that, at heart, it's a very simple plot - there's only one white whale in the ocean. When you're a boy growing up in a hostile home, you imagine it's unique: it's happening only to you.
quotes.author: Gavin O'Connor

quotes.text: I live on the beautiful Northern California coast. I have always loved hiking, whale watching and being outdoors.
quotes.author: Christine Feehan

quotes.text: To this day, I have people I might meet who will make assumptions about my life based on fictional elements of 'The Squid And The Whale.' But I think that's par for the course if you make something that feels kind of real.
quotes.author: Noah Baumbach

quotes.text: You watch 'Whale Rider,' and I defy you to not get teary-eyed at the end there.
quotes.author: Oscar Isaac

quotes.text: Shamu the killer whale is Sea World's Mickey Mouse; whales named Shamu are the star attractions of three parks and the focus of their marketing efforts.
quotes.author: Nina Easton

quotes.text: No highbrow literary type would ever say 'Moby Dick' is good but it's just about a whale, or a Jane Austen would be important if she wasn't just writing about romantic relationships.
quotes.author: Sophie Hannah

quotes.text: My daughter has probably gotten some benefit of being inspired by a woman who is willing to take on things. We travel. We travel to exotic places. I'm the first person to jump in the ocean with a whale. Even if I'm scared, I'll do it anyway, because I never wanted her to see fear, especially when she was younger.
quotes.author: Teri Hatcher

quotes.text: I have no personal agenda in whether or not a library keeps 'Whale Talk' or 'Athletic Shorts' or any of my books shelved.
quotes.author: Chris Crutcher

quotes.text: In 2004, one of my books, 'Whale Talk,' was chosen as an all-school read in Fowlerville, Michigan, a rural town not far from Detroit. They had done what I thought was a brilliant and innovative thing: decided to teach the book in every discipline, sophomores through seniors.
quotes.author: Chris Crutcher

quotes.text: 'Whale Talk' is a tough book, but it is also a compassionate book about telling the truth and about redemption. I didn't draw the tough parts out of thin air; they are stories handed to me by people in pain.
quotes.author: Chris Crutcher

quotes.text: My commitment is to my kids and my mum and I'm having a whale of a time.
quotes.author: Carol Vorderman

quotes.text: We knew that there was a certain kind of interest in Whale among a genre crowd.
quotes.author: Bill Condon

quotes.text: 'Son of Frankenstein' is never talked about in the same tone as James Whale's 1931 'Frankenstein.' But it should be. It was Boris Karloff's last appearance in the Frankenstein series and stars Donnie Dunagan, then a child actor.
quotes.author: Mark Gatiss

quotes.text: I had whale tartare when I was in Japan, but I probably wouldn't have it again.
quotes.author: Sasha Cohen

quotes.text: On its 2015 list, the Fish and Wildlife Service included the 'ea, or hawksbill turtle, as well as the green turtle, Ridley sea turtle, leatherback turtle and loggerhead turtle. Four mammals are considered endangered: the Hawaiian hoary bat; the kohola, or humpback whale; the sperm whale; and the endemic Hawaiian monk seal.
quotes.author: Susanna Moore

quotes.text: 'The Whale' was in the category of so-called serious music, and yet it brings together a wide series of musical styles. It was influenced by people such as The Beatles, the spirit of the times, and I think 'The Whale' certainly had a pop element to it.
quotes.author: John Tavener

quotes.text: I attempt to surf. I'm not as good as anyone else in the water. I'm more like a beached whale. I just hang out on my board. I can ride, but I get too nervous unless I go with my boyfriend or my trainer. There are too many burly men out there!
quotes.author: Olesya Rulin

quotes.text: Does Greenpeace think it can stop whaling in Antarctica by publicly eating whale meat and declaring it delicious? What are these people thinking?
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: God gave me some weird, beautiful scent that makes men and women go crazy. People compare it to Carvel. It is a whale of a smell.
quotes.author: Adam Sandler

quotes.text: If the Bible had said that Jonah swallowed the whale, I would believe it.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.text: We have sat on the river bank and caught catfish with pin hooks. The time has come to harpoon a whale.
quotes.author: John Hope

quotes.text: People sometimes feel frustrated about what's going on in our oceans and environment, and 'Whale Wars' shows that ordinary people can take action and make things happen.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: Fiction was invented the day Jonas arrived home and told his wife that he was three days late because he had been swallowed by a whale.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.text: I done wrestled with an alligator, I done tussled with a whale; handcuffed lightning, thrown thunder in jail; only last week, I murdered a rock, injured a stone, hospitalised a brick; I'm so mean I make medicine sick.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: The real threat to whales is whaling, which has endangered many whale species.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: Light doesn't penetrate beneath the surface of the water, so ocean creatures like whales and dolphins and even 800 species of fish communicate by sound. And a North Atlantic right whale can transmit across hundreds of miles.
quotes.author: Rose George

quotes.text: The Bible is full of dubious scientific impossibilities, from Jonah living inside a whale, to the sun standing still in the sky for Joshua.
quotes.author: Lawrence M. Krauss

quotes.text: I would probably have more in common with a whale than with a bourgeois married couple employed at worthy institutions that I would wipe from the face of the earth if it was given to me to do so.
quotes.author: Che Guevara

quotes.text: It's funny, I'm very analytical in my real life, but in terms of my films, I try to not analyze them at all and let things just go into them and let them be what they are. I mean, people ask me to this day what 'The Squid and the Whale' stood for, and I have no idea except that it's an exhibit in the Natural History Museum.
quotes.author: Noah Baumbach

quotes.text: My wife says I'm making a noise like a stranded whale. I think I have a major snoring problem.
quotes.author: Rex Hunt

quotes.text: The whale is endangered, while the ant continues to do just fine.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.text: I go to the Natural History Museum and look at the cage of stuffed starlings there. But my favourite thing is the big blue whale. The scale of it is unbelievable, and makes you feel how insignificant you are as a human being.
quotes.author: Arthur Darvill

quotes.text: I have a tattoo on my foot that says 'it's a whale' in Japanese, because Japanese people kill whales. My stuffed whale was like most children's teddy bear. I took it with me everywhere. I slept with it. I couldn't live without my whale.
quotes.author: Skylar Grey

quotes.text: I wanted to do something creatively, having been a beached whale for many months and nursing my daughter.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.text: Like Jonah, the whale had swallowed me; unlike him, I believed I would spend eternity inside the belly of the beast.
quotes.author: Bob Kerrey

quotes.text: Whales are killed today to supply the limited demand for whale meat or to be used in pet foods or as fodder for fur-bearing animals used in the fur trade.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: Must whales and dolphins be subjected to deafening noise that will cause more than 3.5 million instances of temporary and/or permanent hearing loss? For species that depend on hearing for survival - to find food, migrate, and communicate - any hearing loss could be catastrophic. As one scientist noted, a deaf whale is a dead whale.
quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.text: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.text: Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing that it is not fish they are after.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: What is a fish without a river? What is a bird without a tree to nest in? What is an Endangered Species Act without any enforcement mechanism to ensure their habitat is protected? It is nothing.
quotes.author: Jay Inslee

quotes.text: It is our art that has an opportunity to leave a footprint in the sand. They don't wrap fish in our work.
quotes.author: Hugh Newell Jacobsen

quotes.text: Something I like to do a lot is just sit by water when there's a current and just stare into the water. I don't fish, I don't hunt, I don't scuba, I don't spear, don't boat, don't play basketball or football - I excel at staring into space. I'm really good at that.
quotes.author: Iggy Pop

quotes.text: The ocean is the lifeblood of our world. If we were to lose our fish that we appreciate so much by overfishing; or if we were to lose some of our favorite beaches to overbuilding and pollution, then how would we feel? It's become a case of not knowing what you've got until it's gone.
quotes.author: Aaron Peirsol

quotes.text: Telling a teenager the facts of life is like giving a fish a bath.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.text: I do hunt, and I do fish, and I don't apologize to anybody for hunting and fishing.
quotes.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.text: We found letters at the house we bought from a sailor to his wife who lived in the house. He went down to the Caribbean on this trader vessel, bringing down salted fish. There would be handwritten letters, but also telegrams, saying which ports he was in. And he'd be gone for three months. That was just the way it is.
quotes.author: Michael Winter

quotes.text: If you are going to wrestle a bear, try to stay away from all fish oil products, you know. I mean it's tough for me, because I love to rub myself with salmon oil every day - it's a great conditioner for the hair, skin.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.text: If you give a person a fish, they'll fish for a day. But if you train a person to fish, they'll fish for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.text: I'm going to gut you like a fish.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: I'm the person who wouldn't send back my food even if I got steak when I'd ordered fish.
quotes.author: Anna Kendrick

quotes.text: Fishing is much more than fish. It is the great occasion when we may return to the fine simplicity of our forefathers.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.text: A quintessential experience is to raft the Rio Grande through the Blue Mountains, stopping off at waterfalls and having picnics of barbecued fish.
quotes.author: Ben Elliot

quotes.text: The Cruise missiles do not frighten anyone. We are catching them like fish in a river. I mean here that over the past two days, we managed to shoot down 196 missiles before they hit their target.
quotes.author: Mohammed Saeed al-Sahaf

quotes.text: I knew more about produce from the sea than any of my schoolmates, and my reports in school, from kindergarten on, amused and shocked my classmates and teachers. I told them how we ate with chopsticks, had rice and seaweed for breakfast, raw fish, octopus, and sea urchin eggs for supper, and cakes made from sharks.
quotes.author: Eugenie Clark

quotes.text: I was a hunter and fisherman, and many a time I have slipped out into the woods and prairies at 4 a.m. and brought home plenty of game, or have gone in a canoe to the cove and brought back a good supply of fresh fish.
quotes.author: Jay Cooke

quotes.text: Let your hook be always cast. In the pool where you least expect it, will be fish.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: My favorite way to cook trout is whole, bone-in, on the grill. The fish are stuffed with sliced lemons and herb sprigs, brushed with oil, and cooked over fairly hot coals until the skin is crisp and the flesh is moist and flaky. Go ahead and gild the lily by adding a sauce.
quotes.author: Tom Douglas

quotes.text: I may be only a fish and chip shop lady, but some of these economists need to get their heads out of the textbooks and get a job in the real world. I would not even let one of them handle my grocery shopping.
quotes.author: Pauline Hanson

quotes.text: From birth to death, anyone can fish. I just think it's fantastic to see old people going fishing with young people and teaching them things. I'm very, very critical.
quotes.author: Rex Hunt

quotes.text: I like working with fish, so naturally I like seafood.
quotes.author: Roy Yamaguchi

quotes.text: The opposite for courage is not cowardice, it is conformity. Even a dead fish can go with the flow.
quotes.author: Jim Hightower

quotes.text: I just love mermaids. I was a mermaid in my past life. I just feel it when I go in the sea. I just feel a connection there between me, and the water, and the fish - they speak to me - and the shells - they ring out to me.
quotes.author: Ella Henderson

quotes.text: A few years ago, the city council of Monza, Italy, barred pet owners from keeping goldfish in curved bowls... saying that it is cruel to keep a fish in a bowl with curved sides because, gazing out, the fish would have a distorted view of reality. But how do we know we have the true, undistorted picture of reality?
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: Is this chicken, what I have, or is this fish? I know it's tuna, but it says 'Chicken of the Sea.'
quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

quotes.text: I ate no butcher's meat, lived chiefly on fruits, vegetables, and fish, and never drank a glass of spirits or wine until my wedding day. To this I attribute my continual good health, endurance, and an iron constitution.
quotes.author: John James Audubon

quotes.text: The sea hath fish for every man.
quotes.author: William Camden

quotes.text: There's a great metaphor that one of my doctors uses: If a fish is swimming in a dirty tank and it gets sick, do you take it to the vet and amputate the fin? No, you clean the water. So, I cleaned up my system. By eating organic raw greens, nuts and healthy fats, I am flooding my body with enzymes, vitamins and oxygen.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.text: Saturday night is your big night. Everybody used to fry up fish and have one hell of a time. Find me playing till sunrise for 50 cents and a sandwich. And be glad of it. And they really liked the low-down blues.
quotes.author: Muddy Waters

quotes.text: It's okay to eat fish because they don't have any feelings.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.text: If I were not African, I wonder whether it would be clear to me that Africa is a place where the people do not need limp gifts of fish but sturdy fishing rods and fair access to the pond. I wonder whether I would realize that while African nations have a failure of leadership, they also have dynamic people with agency and voices.
quotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.text: Don't be a fish; be a frog. Swim in the water and jump when you hit ground.
quotes.author: Kim Young-ha

quotes.text: China is responsible for a lot of the major conservation issues we're facing. It's the main market for rhino horn. Tigers are being killed for tiger bone wine. They're driving the tropical timber trade and illegal logging in Indonesia, and the trade in tropical reef fish.
quotes.author: Mark Carwardine

quotes.text: Governing a great nation is like cooking a small fish - too much handling will spoil it.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Human evolution, at first, seems extraordinary. How could the process that gave rise to slugs and oak trees and fish produce a creature that can fly to the moon and invent the Internet and cross the ocean in boats?
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.text: I think fish is nice, but then I think that rain is wet, so who am I to judge?
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.text: The old adage about giving a man a fish versus teaching him how to fish has been updated by a reader: Give a man a fish and he will ask for tartar sauce and French fries! Moreover, some politician who wants his vote will declare all these things to be among his 'basic rights.'
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.text: Doing 20 minutes of stretching, light weights and floor exercises three times a week takes the same amount of time as a long coffee break - and eating a tuna fish salad, sardines on toast or scrambled eggs is surely preferable to a Big Mac or KFC.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.text: You've got to think lucky. If you fall into a mudhole, check your back pocket - you might have caught a fish.
quotes.author: Darrell Royal

quotes.text: I'm not a vegetarian by any means; I eat fish. But the problem with shark finning is they catch the shark, cut their fins and throw them back in the ocean, and to me, that's wrong. If you're going to kill an animal, you should use the entire animal and do it humanely. I'm definitely not a big fan.
quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

quotes.text: Man can now fly in the air like a bird, swim under the ocean like a fish, he can burrow into the ground like a mole. Now if only he could walk the earth like a man, this would be paradise.
quotes.author: Tommy Douglas

quotes.text: I love to deer hunt and fish and drive down the back roads in my truck. All those things basically equal freedom to me - and not having to return that message or call from my record company or management. At some point, I need to recharge.
quotes.author: Blake Shelton

quotes.text: Remember, a dead fish can float downstream, but it takes a live one to swim upstream.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: All men are equal before fish.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.text: You know how fighting fish do it? They blow bubbles and in each one of those bubbles is an egg and they float the egg up to the surface. They keep this whole heavy nest of eggs floating, and they're constantly repairing it. It's as if they live in both elements.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.text: What's the two things they tell you are healthiest to eat? Chicken and fish. You know what you should do? Combine them, eat a penguin.
quotes.author: Dave Attell

quotes.text: Mobile is a seaport town, and we ate a lot of seafood. We'd go fishing, we'd catch our fish and we'd eat our fish. It was a ritual on Saturday morning for all my family - my grandfather, my brothers, my uncles, my father - to go fishing, and then the ladies of the family would clean the fish and fry them up.
quotes.author: Billy Williams

quotes.text: I have a lot of plants and fish and a pet lizard and Venus flytraps. I have a whole ecosystem in my room, like a running waterfall and different lights and sensors set on digital timers.
quotes.author: Chris Pratt

quotes.text: Every city has a town outside with a lake. I pull out my fishing pole and fish. I've been doing that for a long time.
quotes.author: Brandi Carlile

quotes.text: Underwater, I experience space with my body. I'll see a school of fish gathering and moving together and I'll exclaim, 'This is architecture.'
quotes.author: Antoine Predock

quotes.text: The shark is the apex predator in the sea. Sharks have molded evolution for 450 million years. All fish species that are prey to the sharks have had their behavior, their speed, their camouflage, their defense mechanisms molded by the shark.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: Light doesn't penetrate beneath the surface of the water, so ocean creatures like whales and dolphins and even 800 species of fish communicate by sound. And a North Atlantic right whale can transmit across hundreds of miles.
quotes.author: Rose George

quotes.text: I keep my diet simple by sticking to mostly fruits and vegetables all day and then having whatever I want for dinner. I end up making healthy choices, like sushi or grilled fish, because I feel so good from eating well.
quotes.author: Jennifer Morrison

quotes.text: Dead fish don't swim around in jealous tides.
quotes.author: Scott Weiland

quotes.text: He who does not love his own language is worse than an animal and smelly fish.
quotes.author: Jose Rizal

quotes.text: Do not tell fish stories where the people know you; but particularly, don't tell them where they know the fish.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Going from 'Shark Night' to 'Piranha,' a guy holding a fish on a stick in front of you that they're going to replace in post-production, it's a lot different than seeing this animatronic shark that, if you get caught up in the moment, looks, acts and you sometimes think could be real.
quotes.author: Chris Zylka

quotes.text: Fish recognize a bad leader.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.text: Agriculture is a business that has been up to its bib overalls in politics since the first Thanksgiving dinner kickback to the Indians for subsidizing Pilgrim maize production with fish head fertilizer grants.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: You can be vegetarian and eat fish. It's your choice, just say: 'I am what I am.' There are no hardcore divisions anymore.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.text: I am a believer in nutrient timing and supplementation, through 8Zone. I love eggs, apples, wild fish, leafy greens, brown rice, pasta, oatmeal, home grown Washington Potatoes, and cooking with coconut and olive oils.
quotes.author: Apolo Ohno

quotes.text: Real shapes and real patterns are things you would observe in nature, like the marks on the back of a cobra's hood or the markings on a fish or a lizard. Imaginary shapes are just that, symbols that come to a person in dreams or reveries and are charged with meaning.
quotes.author: Jim Woodring

quotes.text: Increase your consumption of healthful fats like extra virgin olive oil, avocado, grass-fed beef, wild fish, coconut oil, nuts and seeds. At the same time, keep in mind that modified fats like hydrogenated or trans fats are the worst choices for brain health.
quotes.author: David Perlmutter

quotes.text: Christ's fishermen should not meddle with men's law, for men' s law contains sharp stones and trees by which the net of God is broken, and the fish wend out of the world.
quotes.author: John Wycliffe

quotes.text: I just learned how to scuba dive. I'd been scared to rely on one little air hose for oxygen, but swimming with all those fish is exhilarating.
quotes.author: Cheryl Hines

quotes.text: Travelling to different countries is a goal. I wouldn't mind playing huge places if we got an opportunity to, but it's nice to play small places too. Fish was saying yesterday that he doesn't ever want to play stadiums, or maybe he would once, he said.
quotes.author: Mike Gordon

quotes.text: I can't think of anything I regret. Everything I've done, I've enjoyed doing. I've had five husbands, four children. I've done it all, but mainly I've enjoyed studying fish and being underwater with them, being in their natural habitat, looking at the fish and the fish looking at me.
quotes.author: Eugenie Clark

quotes.text: He didn't come out of my belly, but my God, I've made his bones, because I've attended to every meal, and how he sleeps, and the fact that he swims like a fish because I took him to the ocean. I'm so proud of all those things. But he is my biggest pride.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Chance is always powerful. Let your hook always be cast; in the pool where you least expect it, there will be fish.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: Some heat, some spice and plenty of citrus are the building blocks of many North African fish dishes.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.text: This island is made mainly of coal and surrounded by fish. Only an organizing genius could produce a shortage of coal and fish at the same time.
quotes.author: Aneurin Bevan

quotes.text: As a rough rule of thumb, I would say the smaller the pond, the more belligerent the fish.
quotes.author: Craig Brown

quotes.text: When I'm doing a movie, I eat the same thing every day. For lunch, it's tuna salad or chicken salad and cole slaw. That's it. For dinner it's either veal and rice, fish and rice or steak and rice. It gets boring; boy, does it get boring.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.text: I love nature - it's probably my most favorite thing. I don't watch much telly, the telly hardly goes on, but the things I do watch are sort of nature programs, and something about the oceans and the amount of weird fish that's in there.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.text: I love my Force Fins, which are the kind of fins Special Forces use and really are adapted from the fins of fish. They're very efficient. They are so beautiful, a pair is in the Museum of Modern Art. The set I have are ruby red. I call them my ruby flippers.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.text: It has always been my private conviction that any man who puts his intelligence up against a fish and loses had it coming.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.text: The guerrilla must move amongst the people as a fish swims in the sea.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.text: Music as background to me becomes like a mosquito, an insect. In the studio we have big speakers, and to me that's the way music should be listened to. When I listen to music, I want to just listen to music.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.text: What would be left of our tragedies if an insect were to present us his?
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.text: I'm obsessed with insects, particularly insect flight. I think the evolution of insect flight is perhaps one of the most important events in the history of life. Without insects, there'd be no flowering plants. Without flowering plants, there would be no clever, fruit-eating primates giving TED Talks.
quotes.author: Michael Dickinson

quotes.text: We live in a dancing matrix of viruses; they dart, rather like bees, from organism to organism, from plant to insect to mammal to me and back again, and into the sea, tugging along pieces of this genome, strings of genes from that, transplanting grafts of DNA, passing around heredity as though at a great party.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.text: I wanted to know the name of every stone and flower and insect and bird and beast. I wanted to know where it got its color, where it got its life - but there was no one to tell me.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.text: Love has its own instinct, finding the way to the heart, as the feeblest insect finds the way to its flower, with a will which nothing can dismay nor turn aside.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: Nature will bear the closest inspection. She invites us to lay our eye level with her smallest leaf, and take an insect view of its plain.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Because there is something helpless and weak and innocent - something like an infant - deep inside us all that really suffers in ways we would never permit an insect to suffer.
quotes.author: Jack Henry Abbott

quotes.text: I can't stop moving. I'm like this weird insect. I can't sit still in real life.
quotes.author: Robin Wright

quotes.text: If we go on the way we have, the fault is our greed and if we are not willing to change, we will disappear from the face of the globe, to be replaced by the insect.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.text: We can allow satellites, planets, suns, universe, nay whole systems of universes, to be governed by laws, but the smallest insect, we wish to be created at once by special act.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.text: A slug is always on its own. It's a lonely insect.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.text: None of God's Creatures absolutely consider'd are in their own Nature Contemptible; the meanest Fly, the poorest Insect has its Use and Vertue.
quotes.author: Mary Astell

quotes.text: Indeed, our everyday world presents intellectual challenges just as daunting as those of the cosmos and the quantum, and that is where 99 per cent of scientists focus their efforts. Even the smallest insect, with its intricate structure, is far more complex than either an atom or a star.
quotes.author: Martin Rees

quotes.text: A fly, Sir, may sting a stately horse and make him wince; but, one is but an insect, and the other is a horse still.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: We need healthy forests if we want to protect our climate. As the climate changes, forests become more vulnerable to insect outbreaks, droughts and wildfires. Simultaneously, when our forests are destroyed, their carbon is released back into the atmosphere, further impacting climate change. It's a horrifying one-two punch.
quotes.author: Chris Noth

quotes.text: I've become a much more serious young insect.
quotes.author: Andrew Denton

quotes.text: The souls you have got cast upon the screen of publicity appear like the horrid and writhing creatures enlarged from the insect world, and revealed to us by the cinematograph.
quotes.author: James Larkin

quotes.text: If you want to study one of these strange organisms, you had better have a good justification. It's not good to study gene organisation in some obscure insect that no one's ever heard about.
quotes.author: Thomas R. Cech

quotes.text: Herein lies our problem. If we level that much land to grow rice and whatever, then no other animal could live there except for some insect pest species. Which is very unfortunate.
quotes.author: Steve Irwin

quotes.text: The dragonfly is an exceptionally beautiful insect and a fierce carnivore. It has four wings that beat independently. This gives it an ability to maneuver in the air with superb dexterity. A dragonfly can put on a burst of speed, stop on a dime, hover, fly backward, and switch direction in a flash. This is a hunting behavior known as hawking.
quotes.author: Richard Preston

quotes.text: In the holy city of Mecca, violence of any kind was forbidden. From the moment they left home, pilgrims were not permitted to carry weapons, to swat an insect or speak an angry word, a discipline that introduced them to a new way of living.
quotes.author: Karen Armstrong

quotes.text: It's easy for me to go back to being a kid. You know how kids can be like savages before they get civilized? There's that sadist quality. Y'know, like boys who like to pick apart an insect for the sake of it.
quotes.author: Helena Bonham Carter

quotes.text: Anyway, the title The War of the Insect Gods came before we had that ending, before we knew they had become gods. That we knew the evolutionary cycle they went through. Before we even knew anything about that. We had an ending.
quotes.author: Michael O'Donoghue

quotes.text: So, when I say 'match the hatch', if the fish are taking the nymph, and you're actually producing a replica of a flying insect, you'll catch fresh air.
quotes.author: Rex Hunt

quotes.text: Cincinnati has one of the most diverse animal collections in the world, with more than 500 species represented. They also have a really good insect exhibit.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.text: To many forms of life of our northern lands, winter means a long sleep; to others, it means what it means to many fortunate human beings - travels in warm climes. To still others, who again have their human prototypes, it means a struggle, more or less fierce, to keep soul and body together; while to many insect forms, it means death.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.text: Not enough people know what Lyme disease is and the dangers of being bitten by an insect.
quotes.author: Gigi Hadid

quotes.text: God knows Himself and every created thing perfectly. Not a blade of grass or the tiniest insect escapes His eye.
quotes.author: Mother Angelica

quotes.text: The child's mind is not the type of mind we adults possess. If we call our type of mind the conscious type, that of the child is an unconscious mind. Now an unconscious mind does not mean an inferior mind. An unconscious mind can be full of intelligence. One will find this type of intelligence in every being, and every insect has it.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.text: Travel stories teach geography; insect stories lead the child into natural science; and so on. The teacher, in short, can use reading to introduce her pupils to the most varied subjects; and the moment they have been thus started, they can go on to any limit guided by the single passion for reading.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.text: For decades, I have cringed whenever someone called me 'illegal,' as if I'm an insect on someone's back. I found out I didn't have the right papers - that I was here illegally - when I tried to get a driver's permit at age 16. But I am not 'illegal.' No person is.
quotes.author: Jose Antonio Vargas

quotes.text: People traveling to malaria-prone areas can protect themselves by taking steps such as taking antimalarial drugs, using insect repellent, sleeping under insecticide-treated bed-nets, and wearing protective clothing.
quotes.author: Tom Frieden

quotes.text: I think that the leaf of a tree, the meanest insect on which we trample, are in themselves arguments more conclusive than any which can be adduced that some vast intellect animates Infinity.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.text: When people talk about people who are optimistic about gold, they call them 'gold bugs.' A bug is an insect. I don't call equity bugs 'cockroaches.' Do you understand? There is already a negative connotation with the expression of 'gold bug.'
quotes.author: Marc Faber

quotes.text: Music as background to me becomes like a mosquito, an insect. In the studio we have big speakers, and to me that's the way music should be listened to. When I listen to music, I want to just listen to music.
quotes.author: David Lynch

Without insects, there'd be no flowering plants. Without flowering plants, there would be no clever, fruit-eating primates giving TED Talks.

quotes.author: Andrew Denton

quotes.text: The souls you have got cast upon the screen of publicity appear like the horrid and writhing creatures enlarged from the insect world, and revealed to us by the cinematograph.

quotes.author: Thomas R. Cech

quotes.text: Herein lies our problem. If we level that much land to grow rice and whatever, then no other animal could live there except for some insect pest species. Which is very unfortunate.
quotes.author: Steve Irwin

quotes.text: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
quotes.author: Max Muller

quotes.text: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.text: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.text: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Every flower is a soul blossoming in nature.
quotes.author: Gerard De Nerval

quotes.text: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure; Love is a flower, you've got to let it grow.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Just imagine becoming the way you used to be as a very young child, before you understood the meaning of any word, before opinions took over your mind. The real you is loving, joyful, and free. The real you is just like a flower, just like the wind, just like the ocean, just like the sun.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.text: When you take a flower in your hand and really look at it, it's your world for the moment. I want to give that world to someone else. Most people in the city rush around so, they have no time to look at a flower. I want them to see it whether they want to or not.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.text: Happiness held is the seed; Happiness shared is the flower.
quotes.author: John Harrigan

quotes.text: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand, the sound of music, the smell of a flower, a beautiful sunset, a work of art, love, laughter, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self, and they have physiological consequences as well.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.text: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: That though the radiance which was once so bright be now forever taken from my sight. Though nothing can bring back the hour of splendor in the grass, glory in the flower. We will grieve not, rather find strength in what remains behind.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.text: To see a world in a grain of sand and heaven in a wild flower Hold infinity in the palms of your hand and eternity in an hour.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: Happiness radiates like the fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.text: Pick a flower on Earth and you move the farthest star.
quotes.author: Paul Dirac

quotes.text: The flower that smells the sweetest is shy and lowly.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.text: When the flower blossoms, the bee will come.
quotes.author: Srikumar Rao

quotes.text: Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.text: I love spring flowers: daffodils and hyacinths are the ultimate flower for me. They are the essence of spring.
quotes.author: Kirsty Gallacher

quotes.text: I spent my childhood clad in 1970s hand-me-downs, primarily from male cousins, which mainly consisted of a selection of beige, brown and orange dungarees. That, combined with a perfectly round pudding-bowl haircut, made me look, on a good day, like a cross between Ann Widdecombe, one of the Flower Pot Men, and a monk.
quotes.author: Miranda Hart

quotes.text: Just as a flower which seems beautiful and has color but no perfume, so are the fruitless words of the man who speaks them but does them not.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.text: The fairest thing in nature, a flower, still has its roots in earth and manure.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.text: For happiness one needs security, but joy can spring like a flower even from the cliffs of despair.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.text: The smallest flower is a thought, a life answering to some feature of the Great Whole, of whom they have a persistent intuition.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: How can you consider flower power outdated? The essence of my lyrics is the desire for peace and harmony. That's all anyone has ever wanted. How could it become outdated?
quotes.author: Robert Plant

quotes.text: It is still my dream to own a little flower shop.
quotes.author: Kirsty Gallacher
