quotes.text: I'm forbidden fruit. Once you go to certain households, mommy doesn't want you to see that dirty man who sticks his tongue out and spits out blood and all that stuff.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.text: Guinea pigs are practically synonymous with experiments. Lab rats have become the workhorses of modern medicine. Genetics owes a huge debt to the humble fruit fly. There's almost no branch of the life sciences, in fact, that hasn't leaned heavily on one animal or another.
quotes.author: Sam Kean

quotes.text: The tree that is beside the running water is fresher and gives more fruit.
quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quotes.text: Did you know there's a difference between being busy and being fruitful? Did you ever stop to think that just being busy - running around in circles all day but not accomplishing anything - is the same as wasting your time? It's frustrating to expend so much energy and time and not have any fruit from your effort!
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: I always have apples and fruit in the house. It's easier to eat something healthy if it's within reach. I also have yogurt, cheese and crackers, and raw almonds.
quotes.author: Martina McBride

quotes.text: Apples, grapes... any kind of fruit gives me the energy I need to get through my busy day.
quotes.author: Kristin Chenoweth

quotes.text: I also eat fruit instead of drinking juices. That's something I've read up on. I think that if you drink a lot of fruit juice you take in way too much sugar. You'd be better off eating a bunch of strawberries or apples.
quotes.author: Kris Humphries

quotes.text: I can't tell you enough about cinnamon. Cinnamon is an awesome spice to use and it goes great with something like apples in the morning or in a mixture of fruit or in your oatmeal or even in your cereal.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.text: All men's gains are the fruit of venturing.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.text: There does not exist a category of science to which one can give the name applied science. There are science and the applications of science, bound together as the fruit of the tree which bears it.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.text: If you get hungry mid-day, a banana is the best snack at your desk, after a workout, or in between classes. Fruit is a very good snack in general.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.text: I like fruit baskets because it gives you the ability to mail someone a piece of fruit without appearing insane. Like, if someone just mailed you an apple you'd be like, 'huh? What the hell is this?' But if it's in a fruit basket you're like, 'this is nice!'
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: The highest Hindu intellectual training was based on the practice of yoga, and produced, as its fruit, those marvellous philosophical systems, the six Darshanas and the Brahma Sutras, which are still the delight of scholars and the inspiration of occultists and mystics.
quotes.author: Annie Besant

quotes.text: Good thoughts bear good fruit, bad thoughts bear bad fruit.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.text: World's use is cold, world's love is vain, world's cruelty is bitter bane; but is not the fruit of pain.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.text: What I remember the most really was just running wild there. Barefooted, swimming in dirty lakes, selling fruit, picking mango trees, hoping not to get caught because they don't take kindly to thieves in Africa.
quotes.author: Akon

quotes.text: I'm noticing a new approach to art making in recent museum and gallery shows. It flickered into focus at the New Museum's 'Younger Than Jesus' last year and ran through the Whitney Biennial, and I'm seeing it blossom and bear fruit at 'Greater New York,' MoMA P.S. 1's twice-a-decade extravaganza of emerging local talent.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: Some people call God, some people call Allah; I want to see the fruit of the love, I want to see the love, the love to help the brothers who may not be as fortunate as us.
quotes.author: MC Hammer

quotes.text: One that would have the fruit must climb the tree.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.text: A good mother remembers to serve fruit at breakfast, is always cheerful and never yells, manages not to project her own neuroses and inadequacies onto her children, is an active and beloved community volunteer. She remembers to make play dates, her children's clothes fit, she does art projects with them and enjoys all their games.
quotes.author: Ayelet Waldman

quotes.text: Sometimes you've just got to grab an apple - or grapes, or strawberries. Something that's healthy but maybe a little bit more adventurous, if you can see fruit as adventurous.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.text: I wasn't eating the right kinds of calories. I didn't know about healthy carbs such as brown rice and lentils. Now I eat small meals throughout the day: oatmeal with cinnamon to start, fruit and yogurt as a snack, and vegetables or with chicken or tuna, and a healthy carb, like a yam, for lunch.
quotes.author: Alison Sweeney

quotes.text: Often times we feel like either we can't make a world of difference, or we feel that it's not going to change anything anyway. The truth is you can change someone's day, you can change someone's life, but you have to show up and do what you got to do to actually see any fruit coming from it.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.text: Everything existing in the universe is the fruit of chance and necessity.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.text: Adopting a new healthier lifestyle can involve changing diet to include more fresh fruit and vegetables as well as increasing levels of exercise.
quotes.author: Linford Christie

quotes.text: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: I think perhaps the most important problem is that we are trying to understand the fundamental workings of the universe via a language devised for telling one another when the best fruit is.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: We know what the birth of a revolution looks like: A student stands before a tank. A fruit seller sets himself on fire. A line of monks link arms in a human chain. Crowds surge, soldiers fire, gusts of rage pull down the monuments of tyrants, and maybe, sometimes, justice rises from the flames.
quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.text: My favorite fruit is grapes. Because with grapes, you always get another chance. 'Cause, you know, if you have a crappy apple or a peach, you're stuck with that crappy piece of fruit. But if you have a crappy grape, no problem - just move on to the next. 'Grapes: The Fruit of Hope.'
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: The fruit of your own hard work is the sweetest.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.text: Things don't just happen in this world of arising and passing away. We don't live in some kind of crazy, accidental universe. Things happen according to certain laws, laws of nature. Laws such as the law of karma, which teaches us that as a certain seed gets planted, so will that fruit be.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.text: Taste every fruit of every tree in the garden at least once. It is an insult to creation not to experience it fully. Temperance is wickedness.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.text: The trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.text: The meaning of life is not to be discovered only after death in some hidden, mysterious realm; on the contrary, it can be found by eating the succulent fruit of the Tree of Life and by living in the here and now as fully and creatively as we can.
quotes.author: Paul Kurtz

quotes.text: Unless a tree has borne blossoms in spring, you will vainly look for fruit on it in autumn.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.text: The smallest seed of faith is better than the largest fruit of happiness.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: I miss Saturday morning, rolling out of bed, not shaving, getting into my car with my girls, driving to the supermarket, squeezing the fruit, getting my car washed, taking walks.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Sorrow is a fruit. God does not make it grow on limbs too weak to bear it.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: To me, breakfast is my most important meal. It's often the meal you play a game on. I make sure I have oatmeal, milk, and fruit. It's the fuel you use to hopefully do your best, so eating right is a big part of being a professional athlete. I wish I paid more attention to it earlier in my life.
quotes.author: Andrew Luck

quotes.text: Our bloom is gone. We are the fruit thereof.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.text: Although finding fruit flies in your wine or beer can be a bit annoying, I hope people will pause to admire the tenacity of these clever little creatures. They are really just hungry animals looking for something to eat, and have no intention of ruining your happy hour.
quotes.author: Michael Dickinson

quotes.text: Living with fear stops us taking risks, and if you don't go out on the branch, you're never going to get the best fruit.
quotes.author: Sarah Parish

quotes.text: A man watches his pear tree day after day, impatient for the ripening of the fruit. Let him attempt to force the process, and he may spoil both fruit and tree. But let him patiently wait, and the ripe pear at length falls into his lap.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Nothing great is created suddenly, any more than a bunch of grapes or a fig. If you tell me that you desire a fig. I answer you that there must be time. Let it first blossom, then bear fruit, then ripen.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: If we should be blessed by some great reward, such as fame or fortune, it's the fruit of a seed planted by us in the past.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.text: I feel like a tree. A tree doesn't feel a duty to start doing something about the earth from which it comes. A tree just has to bear fruit, and leaves and blossoms. It doesn't feel grateful to the earth.
quotes.author: Abbas Kiarostami

quotes.text: You've got to go out on a limb sometimes because that's where the fruit is.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Your life is the fruit of your own doing. You have no one to blame but yourself.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: The ultimate goal of the architect...is to create a paradise. Every house, every product of architecture... should be a fruit of our endeavour to build an earthly paradise for people.
quotes.author: Alvar Aalto

quotes.text: To be honest, I think bananas are a pathetic fruit.
quotes.author: Andy Murray

quotes.text: I have a huge breakfast every morning because I never know if I'll have time for lunch, especially during Fashion Week. It keeps my mood positive all day. And my parents taught me to have tons of fruit and vegetables, which I think helps my skin.
quotes.author: Constance Jablonski

quotes.text: Too late for fruit, too soon for flowers.
quotes.author: Walter de La Mare

quotes.text: My late wife Olympia was Goan and I've been to India many times. I love the food there. We used to do our shopping in Southall, where you can find cheap but wonderful fruit like mangoes, vegetables and spices. I didn't do much of the cooking, as Olympia did a lot - I was the under-chef and did some of the chopping.
quotes.author: Vince Cable

quotes.text: The goldenrod is yellow, The corn is turning brown, The trees in apple orchards With fruit are bending down.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.text: It is not all bad, this getting old, ripening. After the fruit has got its growth it should juice up and mellow. God forbid I should live long enough to ferment and rot and fall to the ground in a squash.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: I always make my favorite pancakes with milk, and I also add some fruit - like a banana or apple with some cinnamon sprinkled on top. I also sometimes put peanut butter on my pancakes!
quotes.author: Gabriela Isler

quotes.text: Labor is prior to, and independent of, capital. Capital is only the fruit of labor, and could never have existed if labor had not first existed. Labor is the superior of capital, and deserves much the higher consideration.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: I think that if you shake the tree, you ought to be around when the fruit falls to pick it up.
quotes.author: Mary Cassatt

quotes.text: Hopefully, if not it's not working right. I'm like a navigator and I try to encourage our collaboration and find the best way that will produce fruit. I like fruit. I like cherries, I like bananas.
quotes.author: Jim Jarmusch

quotes.text: What is wine? It is the grape present in another form; its essence is there, though the fruit which produced it grew thousands of miles away, and perished years ago. So the object of many a tender thought may be spiritually present, in defiance of space - and fond recollections cherished in defiance of time.
quotes.author: Samuel Lover

quotes.text: When motherhood becomes the fruit of a deep yearning, not the result of ignorance or accident, its children will become the foundation of a new race.
quotes.author: Margaret Sanger

quotes.text: Some think love can be measured by the amount of butterflies in their tummy. Others think love can be measured in bunches of flowers, or by using the words 'for ever.' But love can only truly be measured by actions. It can be a small thing, such as peeling an orange for a person you love because you know they don't like doing it.
quotes.author: Marian Keyes

quotes.text: There is no blue without yellow and without orange.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.text: Ukraine is a vital link for Europe: our energy transportation networks; our location between the European Union and Eurasia. We're the melting pot of Catholicism and Orthodox Christianity. The democracy we founded with the Orange Revolution has to be an example for other post-Soviet states.
quotes.author: Yulia Tymoshenko

quotes.text: The moon is bland in color. I call it shades of gray. You know, the only color we see is what we bring or the Earth, which is looking down upon us all the time. And to find orange soil on the moon was a surprise.
quotes.author: Eugene Cernan

quotes.text: There's nothing sexy about Orange County.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.text: I spent my childhood clad in 1970s hand-me-downs, primarily from male cousins, which mainly consisted of a selection of beige, brown and orange dungarees. That, combined with a perfectly round pudding-bowl haircut, made me look, on a good day, like a cross between Ann Widdecombe, one of the Flower Pot Men, and a monk.
quotes.author: Miranda Hart

quotes.text: Ever since I was a girl, I have written about one to five pages every day - on napkins, on scrap paper, in notebooks and tablets, on the walls in my room as a teenager, and in orange paint on the cheap white plastic blinds in my room.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.text: I was just so sick. I thought that orange juice was going to make me fat.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.text: Every meal I eat, I be like, 'Can I get some orange juice?'
quotes.author: Slim Jimmy

quotes.text: Yeah, Kubrick's a big influence. In something like 'A Clockwork Orange,' he is trying to use the practical light - I mean, at least he says that in his interviews, like they're not using traditionally Hollywood lights. In 'Elephant' we basically used no lights; we never really adjusted.
quotes.author: Gus Van Sant

quotes.text: When the doctors showed me an X-ray of my brain, they pointed to a black hole on the upper left side and told me that all memory from that spot was dead. I thought to myself that I hoped that's where I kept 'The Orange Blossom Special.'
quotes.author: Johnny Gimble

quotes.text: California is a fine place to live - if you happen to be an orange.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.text: At first, my bedroom had flowers and yellow walls and huge furniture in plastic that was orange and green - and furry green bed cover and everything. Then, I think the day I turned 13, I painted the walls black and put Kurt Cobain on the wall and just changed everything into a dark theme.
quotes.author: Tove Lo

quotes.text: Tanning is tricky, because a lot of people just look orange.
quotes.author: Laura Linney

quotes.text: I had a couple of really cool friends when I was a kid, and we'd find cool music and movies and show them to each other. My friend Dennis had a copy of 'A Clockwork Orange' and he'd already seen it once, and he was like, 'We need to watch this.' I was sleeping over his house - and I think we were literally 15 - and we watched it.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.text: You can't compare an apple to an orange. It will cause a lot of self-esteem issues.
quotes.author: Craig Sheffer

quotes.text: I got up one Christmas morning and we didn't have nothing to eat. We didn't have an apple, we didn't have an orange, we didn't have a cake, we didn't have nothing.
quotes.author: Muddy Waters

quotes.text: A lesser complaint: hair extensions. There are moments on 'All My Children' when half the women actors, young and old, seem to be afflicted by android Barbie creep. All those thick swatches of lifeless strands clustering lankly round ladies' necks! Like orange tanning spray, this is a fashion fad that should be put out of its misery.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: I like to peel it and share it with friends. You can spread the love with an orange.
quotes.author: Gina Rodriguez

quotes.text: Everyone should wake up and have a fresh-squeezed orange every day. By having a fresh glass of orange juice with American oranges, you are supporting the local economy, you have all the vitamin C you need in a day, and you support the environment because you don't use any plastic from bottles or bags.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.text: I started 'Society's Child' on a bus in East Orange as I was going home from school. I saw a black and white couple sitting there and started thinking about it.
quotes.author: Janis Ian

quotes.text: Don Chew is the owner of the Orange County Badminton Club, the location where I train. He played badminton when he was young and always had the passion for it. He never made it at the international level, but he wanted to give back to the sport. The majority of the elite players train at Orange County Badminton Club.
quotes.author: Howard Bach

quotes.text: During summer or charity games I'll wear my bright orange or green or turquoise ones and guys are always like, 'Why are your shoes so bright?'
quotes.author: James Harden

quotes.text: With a little more tweaking, we could make orange juice in the orange without any packaging or processing.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: An orange on the table, your dress on the rug, and you in my bed, sweet present of the present, cool of night, warmth of my life.
quotes.author: Jacques Prevert

quotes.text: I run three to four times a week. I go down to Orange County in California and I run all the time... all the time. You see the oceans, the trees. I like running in hot weather. I like to sweat and get all those toxins out of my system. I thoroughly enjoy it.
quotes.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quotes.text: I have one of the most beautiful places in the world in Orange County. That's a great place to live.
quotes.author: Thomas Dooley

quotes.text: It's kind of low brow, but the show 'Bob's Burgers' is hilarious, and being from the Midwest, I can kind of relate to a lot of the jokes. 'Orange is The New Black' is a Netflix Exclusive, I think - that's really funny.
quotes.author: Gracie Gold

quotes.text: In 1984, George Orwell wrote of a world where the only colour to be found was in the propaganda posters. Such is the case in North Korea. Images of Kim Il-sung are depicted in vivid colours. Rays of yellow and orange emanate from his face: he is the sun.
quotes.author: Barbara Demick

quotes.text: I found many treasures in the woods over the years: shotgun shells, empty Colt 45 bottles, old railroad spikes, orange and black beetles eating a dead mouse, pebbles that looked just like teeth, old stone walls and cellar holes, a rusted out frying pan, the skull of a cat.
quotes.author: Jennifer McMahon

quotes.text: If I feel really ugly or unhappy, sometimes I'll choose bright colors so they'll make me feel good. Yellows, pinks, light blues and orange. I just want to feel good all the time if I can. And colors and hairstyles and all that kind of helps out.
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.text: Google is my best friend and my worst enemy. It's fabulous for research, but then it becomes addictive. I'll have a character eating an orange, and next thing I'm Googling types of oranges, I'm visiting chat rooms about oranges, I'm learning the history of the orange.
quotes.author: Liane Moriarty

quotes.text: My mum taught me that redheads shouldn't wear pink, red or orange, but if you choose the right shade, such as a bright orange or a cherry red, it can look fabulous.
quotes.author: Jane Asher

quotes.text: Fall is my favorite my time of the year. I love it. I'll try and make it back to Vancouver a bunch. I love going back home for that. Everything turns orange. You start to get out of summer, start making your way into the winter, everyone is wearing jackets. Vancouver lights up in the fall, so I definitely go back there for a bit.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Bilodeau

quotes.text: Orange blossom water would make a magical addition to your store cupboard.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.text: I used to go to Cold Stone Creamery, get a tub of Butterfinger ice cream, and eat it all before bedtime. And my fingers were permanently stained orange from Cheetos.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.text: If Lady Gaga is like an orange Bugatti Veyron, then I am like a black 1970 Chevelle.
quotes.author: Caity Lotz

quotes.text: When I think of flavours, I think colour, so lemon should be yellow and orange is orange.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.text: In 'Clockwork Orange,' you're there with your eyes, watching all those things, your brain goes off, ahh, exposes you to so many things, and at the end of the day, it's just like a roller coaster. Why do you jump in a roller coaster? You want a thrill.
quotes.author: Fede Alvarez

quotes.text: That's one thing people don't know about me - I eat in my sleep. I can't keep things in the house; I literally have in my refrigerator water, coconut water, orange juice, hemp milk and like, tea bags. And that's really it. Because I eat in my sleep.
quotes.author: Denise Vasi

quotes.text: Come over here and sit on my knee and finish your orange juice.
quotes.author: Sonny Liston

quotes.text: The happiest moments of my childhood were spent on my grandmother's front porch in Durham, N.C., or at her sister's farmhouse in Orange County, where chickens paraded outside the kitchen's screen door and hams were cured in the smokehouse.
quotes.author: Andre Leon Talley

quotes.text: I've pretty much given up on the orange. I really have. I just don't even bother. It's just either sour, or woody, or the skin's too thick. It's very nice when you come across the perfect orange, because it's really a beautiful experience. But the stakes are too high.
quotes.author: Scott Thompson

quotes.text: During a color consultation, I like to reference food as a visual. Hot fudge and orange marmalade paint a clearer picture and helps prevent end results that leave you feeling unsatisfied.
quotes.author: Tabatha Coffey

quotes.text: Who wants an orange whip? Orange whip? Orange whip? Three orange whips.
quotes.author: John Candy

quotes.text: My two primary areas of focus have been open-space conservation and education, and I expect those to remain my priorities in the future. The Irvine open space and parklands provide serenity and balance to our unique Orange County lifestyle.
quotes.author: Donald Bren

quotes.text: I remember when I first came out on tour, it was Greg Norman and Nick Price. We forget how big Norman was, what a presence he was. I remember one of my first tournaments, Greg threw an orange peel down on the ground and some fan ran over and grabbed it. 'This is Greg Norman's orange peel!'
quotes.author: Phil Mickelson

quotes.text: There's nothing more marvelously wintery than orange root veg mash; some butter is all it needs.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.text: Make sure that when you look at your plate, it's a beautiful blank canvas to start with, and you want lots of color on there. You want to make sure you have whole grains and protein. It should not be beige in color; it should be green and bright red, and orange and yellow.
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.text: Children go with whatever makes them feel good - like if that's the color green or orange, they do that with their clothes. As I've grown older, everything reversed. My music, my personality - onstage those things became my colors.
quotes.author: Janelle Monae

quotes.text: Latinos, Asians, African-Americans, women - we're all trying to find our place in this world of cinema and television and theater. And the great thing with comedy is that most of the time, you could be orange. It doesn't matter, as long you're funny.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.text: If I'm in Italy, I'm going to have a cappuccino and two small brioches and then a mix of orange and grapefruit. I don't drink tea in Italy.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: Look, the whole world wants to modernize, and when you look to what they mean by modernizing, they mean Americanize. Would a modern Greek prefer to live in Orange County than Piraeus? Yes. Absolutely.
quotes.author: Rupert Murdoch

quotes.text: The reason I'm not more political is because I have music. And from a young age, I needed it. After prison, my father came to America, joined the Army, fought in Vietnam - and was exposed to Agent Orange. He died a slow, horrible death. Music was my escape.
quotes.author: Gloria Estefan

quotes.text: I grew up in Orange County, without a team. I never affiliated myself with the Chargers, south of me, or the Raiders, north of me. I've always followed the Dallas Cowboys. I've been a huge fan since the early '90s.
quotes.author: Stephen Colletti

quotes.text: The sight of burnt orange makes me puke.
quotes.author: Brian Bosworth

quotes.text: The problem with the mobile industry is that it deals with an intangible service which is largely similar across major players. Most consumers cannot tell the difference between Vodafone and Orange, or AT&T and Verizon in the U.S., beyond the colors and the logos. I suspect neither can the companies.
quotes.author: Nirmalya Kumar

quotes.text: Gray goes with gold. Gray goes with all colors. I've done gray-and-red paintings, and gray and orange go so well together. It takes a long time to make gray because gray has a little bit of color in it.
quotes.author: Ellsworth Kelly

quotes.text: The revolution has been dubbed The Orange Revolution, orange being the campaign color of Viktor Yushchenko. The demonstrators say they are tired of living under a corrupt government.
quotes.author: Bob Schaffer

quotes.text: I worked with James Orange and Hosea Williams as a teenager, and he's portrayed in the movie by Wendell Pierce. So, for me to be able to come in, 20 years after working with them as a teenager, and to portray Reverend James Orange in 'Selma' is mind-blowing.
quotes.author: Omar Dorsey

quotes.text: Focus on making you the best you you can be as an actor and follow your own path. You can't compare an apple to an orange. It will cause a lot of self-esteem issues.
quotes.author: Craig Sheffer

quotes.text: When I booked 'Orange,' I thought things were going to change a little bit, and I'd be a little more busy, but obviously I underestimated it. I don't think anyone knew that my character would be taken to so well.
quotes.author: Ruby Rose

quotes.text: Orange juice from concentrate is labeled. Food coloring Red #5 is labeled. Fish are labeled as to whether they've been previously frozen. To a consumer, there's no plausible reason why these factors should be on a food ingredient label while the presence of GMOs shouldn't be.
quotes.author: Ramez Naam

quotes.text: I'd worked in Clockwork Orange with Stanley Kubrick and since Stanley was such a prestigious director this opened all sorts of doors for me - one of them being Star Wars.
quotes.author: David Prowse

quotes.text: In an organic system you don't waste anything. We need to educate the consumer to accept a tiny blemish on an orange.
quotes.author: Robert Patterson

quotes.text: I'll drink water. Sometimes tomato juice, which I like. Sometimes orange juice, which I like. I'll drink different things. But the Coke or Pepsi boosts you up a little.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: Beauty and the Beast seemed like it all was really brown. The whole thing was just so brown and orange and yellow, like Burger King or something. I don't think I would have liked Beauty and the Beast at any age.
quotes.author: Mike Judge

quotes.text: We pretended there was no problem with Agent Orange after Vietnam and later the Pentagon recanted, after untold suffering by veterans.
quotes.author: Jim McDermott

quotes.text: Between 'Orange' with Laverne, the show 'Transparent,' and Caitlyn Jenner, obviously we're in the middle of something enormous - a transgender movement. I'm just proud to be alive during this massive shift in the world.
quotes.author: Ruby Rose

quotes.text: I was in Vietnam, and I was exposed to Agent Orange. And there's a high relationship between people that were exposed to Agent Orange and the kind of lymphoma that I had. The prostate cancer was genetic in my family. My father had prostate cancer, my - three of my four uncles had prostate cancer.
quotes.author: Hamilton Jordan

quotes.text: I have really long hair, so I don't cut it all that often. Sometimes, when I'm working, I just have the stylist on set trim it for me. I don't dye my hair. When I was a teenager, I dyed my hair five colors at one time. It was all different shades of red going from more orange to more purple. I thought I looked so cool.
quotes.author: Zhu Zhu

quotes.text: Try not thinking of peeling an orange. Try not imagining the juice running down your fingers, the soft inner part of the peel. The smell. Try and you can't. The brain doesn't process negatives.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: For Sunday breakfast, I make orange and ricotta pancakes, crepes and eggs. You know men, we usually go for breakfast because it's the easiest thing to cook and then we try to make it seem fancy.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.text: I love Serge Lutens orange blossom perfume; my mom got it for me. It's my favorite. It just smells clean.
quotes.author: Gia Coppola

quotes.text: I'm not afraid to call a wine that tastes like Skittles or green peppers mixed with orange marmalade. I'll say, 'It tastes like chicken.' I mean, that's not what people think of when they think of wine, but that's what it tastes like to me and it hits home.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: I was so unhealthy. I used to go to 'Cold Stone Creamery,' get a tub of Butterfinger ice cream, and eat it all before bedtime. And my fingers were permanently stained orange from Cheetos.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.text: My worst fashion faux pas: probably orange shoes with white pants. I thought I looked spectacular.
quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.text: I wanted to go out of fashion, to study medicine. I thought, you know, who needs fashion? How important is it if you wear a red dress and an orange jacket? It's not, really.
quotes.author: Alber Elbaz

quotes.text: I have one mascara that I use religiously, and I refuse to try anything else, and if they discontinued it I would probably cry. Cover Girl lash blast, in the orange tube.
quotes.author: Nina Dobrev

quotes.text: When I was a little girl, I remember carrying my orange UNICEF carton with me as I went Trick-or-Treating.
quotes.author: Brandy Norwood

quotes.text: Real nutrition comes from soybeans, almonds, rice, and other healthy vegetable sources, not from a cow's udder.
quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

quotes.text: I'm in this absolutely gorgeous manor house with acres of quite beautiful countryside. I've got trout in the river, an organic vegetable garden, I've got my work 40 yards from my home. I don't mind being criticised, but where are they criticising from? Which hut are they criticising me from, exactly?
quotes.author: Jay Kay

quotes.text: I like to cook simple things, like vegetable egg-white omelets; roast chicken; sauteed chicken breast with curry powder; and Greek salad. Just things that are fresh and healthy and fast and easy, because I have such a crazy schedule.
quotes.author: Sasha Cohen

quotes.text: Down South, even our vegetables have some pig hidden somewhere in it. A vegetable isn't a vegetable without a little ham hock.
quotes.author: Paula Deen

quotes.text: Both sides of my family had come from Ireland in the 19th century for the same reason: There was nothing to eat over there. Since then, I've tried to make up for the potato famine by making the potato the only vegetable that passes these lips.
quotes.author: Art Donovan

quotes.text: My favorite hobby is being alone. I like to be alone. I also like dancing, fishing, playing poker sometimes and vegetable gardening - corn, tomatoes, cucumbers, I have a big garden every year.
quotes.author: Emanuel Steward

quotes.text: Cabbage: a familiar kitchen-garden vegetable about as large and wise as a man's head.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: A hunk of beef raised on Scottish moorland has a very different ecological footprint from one created in an intensive feedlot using concentrated cereal feed, and a wild venison or rabbit casserole is arguably greener than a vegetable curry.
quotes.author: Tristram Stuart

quotes.text: The vegetable life does not content itself with casting from the flower or the tree a single seed, but it fills the air and earth with a prodigality of seeds, that, if thousands perish, thousands may plant themselves, that hundreds may come up, that tens may live to maturity; that, at least one may replace the parent.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Imagination is the real and eternal world of which this vegetable universe is but a faint shadow.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: I always think if you have to cook once, it should feed you twice. If you're going to make a big chicken and vegetable soup for lunch on Monday, you stick it in the refrigerator and it's also for Wednesday's dinner.
quotes.author: Curtis Stone

quotes.text: The road passed through a curtain of pine forest and came out on a flat, rolling snow field. In this field the sprawled or bunched bodies of Germans lay thick, like some dark shapeless vegetable.
quotes.author: Martha Gellhorn

quotes.text: Most people are really stunned to find out that the technology has been around for more than 100 years, and that the diesel engine was in fact invented to run on vegetable oil.
quotes.author: Daryl Hannah

quotes.text: Physiology is the science which treats of the properties of organic bodies, animal and vegetable, of the phenomena they present, and of the laws which govern their actions. Inorganic substances are the objects of other sciences, - physics and chemistry.
quotes.author: Johannes P. Muller

quotes.text: I always have breakfast, say, scrambled egg whites, a vegetable smoothie, or whole-grain cereal with low-fat milk. For lunch and dinner, I eat a lot of fish and vegetables. And throughout the day, I try to stay hydrated.
quotes.author: Beyonce Knowles

quotes.text: I often go on a liquid fast a couple of days a week. I never take just water. Instead, I'll have maybe six glasses of vegetable and fruit juices a day.
quotes.author: Paul Lynde

quotes.text: I could happily lean on a gate all the livelong day, chatting to passers-by about the wind and the rain. I do a lot of gate-leaning while I am supposed to be gardening; instead of hoeing, I lean on the gate, stare at the vegetable beds and ponder.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.text: Our typical Western diet is full of inflammatory fats - saturated fats, trans fats, too many omega-6, inflammatory, processed vegetable oils like soy and corn oils. These increase IGF-1 and stimulate pimple follicles.
quotes.author: Mark Hyman

quotes.text: The supermarket chain Whole Foods has quite a radical employee empowerment program, where employees get to decide whether another employee can work in their team or not. If they think this person's a slacker, doesn't have good ideas, they can vote and say, no, we don't want this person to be working with us on the vegetable aisle.
quotes.author: Tim Harford

quotes.text: I had a ton of animals; I had a goat growing up, a bunch of rabbits, a vegetable garden.
quotes.author: Kelli Williams

quotes.text: I recently have gotten into juicing as an in-between-meals snack. I think the more vegetable ingredients the better, especially if they are green. I find that a good juice can really curb my appetite when I need to wait for the next meal.
quotes.author: Noureen DeWulf

quotes.text: My whole problem is that all of my favorite things at Thanksgiving are the starches, and everyone is trying to go low-carb this year, even a green vegetable has carbs in it.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.text: In North Korea, grass is a vegetable eaten by the people, and they've got nuclear weapons and intercontinental ballistic missiles. So, something more stringent than what's been done to North Korea is going to have to work; otherwise, a military strike is the only option.
quotes.author: Oliver North

quotes.text: I make sure I get a lot of vegetables, a lot of fruit. I am a big fruit man; I am a vegetable man, anyway.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.text: I have a lot of fruit trees and my own little vegetable garden and chickens. And every time I eat, I bless my food; I say I'm grateful for for it and let it nourish every part of my body.
quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

quotes.text: I support Alice Waters in her desire that there be a vegetable garden at the White House. I don't think they should rip up the Rose Garden, because that's something that I love. They should probably dig up another patch and grow some vegetables there.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.text: Touring on 'Folie' was like being the last act at the vaudeville show: We were rotten vegetable targets in clandestine hoods.
quotes.author: Patrick Stump

quotes.text: Throughout the whole vegetable, sensible, and rational world, whatever makes progress towards maturity, as soon as it has passed that point, begins to verge towards decay.
quotes.author: Robert Blair

quotes.text: A vegetable garden in the beginning looks so promising and then after all little by little it grows nothing but vegetables, nothing, nothing but vegetables.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.text: Go vegetable heavy. Reverse the psychology of your plate by making meat the side dish and vegetables the main course.
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.text: I cook mostly vegetarian vegetable and bean stews. Quinoa salads. I make my mother-in-law's recipe for chicken and barley stew all the time.
quotes.author: Gail Simmons

quotes.text: An onion can make people cry but there's never been a vegetable that can make people laugh.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: If it's a cocktail party, I generally make five or six different things, and I try to choose recipes that feel like a meal: a chicken thing, a fish or shrimp thing, maybe two vegetable things, and I think it's fun to end the cocktail party with a sweet thing.
quotes.author: Ina Garten

quotes.text: I thought I'd love to be a gardener because I grew up with a vegetable garden and I love being close to the Earth and growing things. At my home in L.A., I have a great garden and I grow all kinds of things. I even have a worm farm! The worms help create organic compost out of kitchen scraps.
quotes.author: Curtis Stone

quotes.text: Any administration foolish enough to call ketchup a vegetable cannot be expected to cut the mustard.
quotes.author: John Glenn

quotes.text: My vegetable patch is my pride and joy.
quotes.author: Sheherazade Goldsmith

quotes.text: I eat eight times a day. But it's what my intake is. I eat all the time, but it's good stuff. You want to eat that chocolate? You want to eat that dessert? Have that apple or vegetable instead.
quotes.author: Billy Magnussen

quotes.text: It has been possible to trace historically back to a very early age the taxes which were imposed on medicines, spices and similar substances in German towns. Thus, for instance, one finds that in the year 1500, thirteen, in 1540, thirty-eight, and in 1708, already one hundred and twenty vegetable oils are mentioned.
quotes.author: Otto Wallach

quotes.text: Wherever I go, as long as I get a hot vegetable dish, I am okay. If I am in Gujarat, I have Gujarati food. If it's Shillong, it's northeastern.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: In Barcelona, things seem so different. For example, I know that it's traditionally the least Spanish city, but you'd never know they had a monarchy, coming here as a tourist - as opposed to the U.K., where the Queen is probably the best-known animal, vegetable and/or mineral going when it comes to overseas visitors.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: Shall I not have intelligence with the earth? Am I not partly leaves and vegetable mould myself.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: I get great pleasure from stuffed foods, from an apple strudel to a vegetable samosa, from a whole roasted bird with a sweet and savoury stuffing to a vine leaf filled with rice and spices.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.text: My diet is mostly chicken and fish. I make sure I get a lot of vegetables, a lot of fruit. I am a big fruit man, I am a vegetable man anyway. And I also get a lot of rest. That's the key I may be up early, but I'm in bed early too.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.text: If I am constantly working, my relationships fail. So at least now I can have enough time to write a happy record. And be in love and be happy. And then I don't know what I'll do. Get married. Have some kids. Plant a nice vegetable patch.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.text: Luckily, my children love broccoli, and although we sometimes enter into UN-like negotiations about how many 'trees' they need to eat before they can partake of ice cream, it is a vegetable that they tend to embrace.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.text: My son, Arzhel, is two, and he eats vegetables twice a day. We have a vegetable garden on our farm in the Southwest, and he gets two baskets, one over each arm, and says, 'Garden, Papa!' and then he eats what he picks.
quotes.author: Alain Ducasse

quotes.text: And I will never, ever respond to anybody - man, woman, vegetable, or mineral - who tells me to keep my mouth shut.
quotes.author: Janice Dickinson

quotes.text: My goal involves a hammock, a vegetable patch, and a solar-powered house. And I hope to eventually get there.
quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

quotes.text: When I eat something like vegetable bibimbap, I get that warm and fuzzy feeling of eating stuff that I grew up with.
quotes.author: Patrick Stump

quotes.text: Vegetable box schemes, local greengrocers, farmers' markets and organic stores are a great place to source package-free foods.
quotes.author: Sheherazade Goldsmith

quotes.text: The West is color. Its colors are animal rather than vegetable, the colors of earth and sunlight and ripeness.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.text: I think of New York as a puree and the rest of the United States as vegetable soup.
quotes.author: Spalding Gray

quotes.text: The essential quality of an animal is that it seeks its own living, whereas a vegetable has its living brought to it.
quotes.author: Henry Mayhew

quotes.text: A gluten-free diet still allows you access to almost every fruit and vegetable, a variety of grains and legumes, your pick of dairy products, fresh meats and fish and a whole slew of special gluten-free delights to satisfy your pretzel-bagel-muffin-doughnut craving.
quotes.author: Daphne Oz

quotes.text: A vegan diet takes care of most of what we need to do. But you'll also want to minimize the use of oils generally, because while olive oil and other vegetable oils are better for your heart than chicken fat, they are as fattening as animal fats.
quotes.author: Neal Barnard

quotes.text: Listen to me: Leek is a vegetable. It can be the center of a dish.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.text: If you eat a lot of starchy foods, introduce a vegetable once a week, then twice a week, and then three times a week. Slowly fill your diet with new flavors. By the time you're ready to let go of whatever it is you want to let go of, you've got a full menu.
quotes.author: Lisa Edelstein

quotes.text: If the British Isles had an official vegetable, it would have to be the potato.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.text: I will not have Botox. You know why? Because I eat! I eat the fat, I eat the vegetable, I eat everything. If you exercise and you don't eat enough, it takes its toll on the skin.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.text: I'd rather be a Jack-of-all-trades than master of one. If I became an icon, where my whole life was music, I would probably have become a vegetable. I wouldn't be able to have all these talents I have today and be an interesting 'character.'
quotes.author: Dick Dale

quotes.text: I don't want to be the passively alert vegetable in the corner that takes in everything but can't communicate, which I think would suck a lot of life out of my family without giving very much to me.
quotes.author: Tony Judt

quotes.text: I just became a vegetable for three months. I couldn't talk to people. I was very ill and that was part of the reason I left college.
quotes.author: Adam Ant

quotes.text: I love to roast vegetables - carrots, fennel, and so on. I also love to mash or puree pretty much any vegetable!
quotes.author: April Bloomfield

quotes.text: Within my own life, I read all the beloved novels by lamps of vegetable oil; I saw the Standard Oil invading my own village, I saw gas lamps in the Chinese shops in Shanghai; and I saw their elimination by electric lights.
quotes.author: Hu Shih

quotes.text: Broccoli is not a Chinese vegetable; in fact, it is originally an Italian vegetable. It was introduced into the United States in the 1800s, but became popularized in the 1920s and the 1930s.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lee

quotes.text: In short, the animal and vegetable lines, diverging widely above, join below in a loop.
quotes.author: Asa Gray

quotes.text: Next it was found that it was physiologically and structurally the same in the plant, that it was the living part of the plant, that which manifested the life and did the work in vegetable as well as in animal organisms.
quotes.author: Asa Gray

quotes.text: I like having my autonomy; I like going into the vegetable aisle with little fanfare. Very few go into that star category, in that uber above-the-title category. The rest of us, day in and day out, we're there to support what they do.
quotes.author: Beth Broderick

quotes.text: It's a lot harder to stick to my regime when I'm travelling, so when I'm home, I make sure that when I wake up in the morning, I drink one litre of water with lemon to cleanse my body from the inside, and then I'll have a big jar of vegetable juice.
quotes.author: Valentina Zelyaeva

quotes.text: My eating is pretty consistent. I like Greek yogurt for breakfast. I eat two giant salads a day, a broiled meat or fish, and a dark green vegetable at every meal.
quotes.author: Veronica Webb

quotes.text: I don't think I ate a green vegetable until I was 30. I didn't grow up with a mom who enforced that at all.
quotes.author: Keri Russell

quotes.text: I love making vegetable, pea, and broccoli soups. They're pure, low-calorie, and incredibly tasty.
quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

quotes.text: The animal world seizes its food in masses little and big, and often gorges itself with it, but the vegetable, through the agency of the solvent power of water, absorbs its nourishment molecule by molecule.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.text: It's nice when you happen into a vegetarian restaurant, but really, you can find veggie food everywhere. Pastas, salads, a vegetable plate - I actually like ordering vegetarian in a meaty place because it gives them a jolt to come up with something and recognize the demand.
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.text: Broccoli gets such a bad rap. This is perplexing to those of us who love that green, treelike, stalky vegetable.
quotes.author: Kate Christensen

quotes.text: I'm quite happy having stuff like quinoa, sushi, and even vegetable juices.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.text: In the depths of the moor, the peat may be seen riven like floes of ice, and the rifts are sometimes twelve to fourteen feet deep, cut through black vegetable matter, the product of decay of plants through countless generations.
quotes.author: Sabine Baring-Gould

quotes.text: The only thing I consider appalling would be to suddenly become a vegetable and a burden on other people. A soul slowly dying out, trapped in a body in which the insides gradually sabotage me - that, I think, would be terrifying.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.text: There is so much more vegetable use in Thailand, India and China than meat. Yes, when you go to the markets or buy street food, you see shrimp or chicken - but mostly vegetables.
quotes.author: Jean-Georges Vongerichten

quotes.text: It's a touchy subject, but as a Southerner, you can't ignore our history any more than a Renaissance painter can ignore the Virgin Mary. And it's impossible to drive down a road or eat a vegetable or pass a church without being reminded of slavery.
quotes.author: Sally Mann

quotes.text: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
quotes.author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quotes.text: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: I refuse to dress 'hot' for Halloween, 'cause I always have to have makeup and hair and look cute for my job. So on Halloween, I either go gory or weird or funny.
quotes.author: Rachel Platten

quotes.text: Modeling is the best because you have to look hot, which comes easy to me, you know. I'm blessed with that.
quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

quotes.text: So much of left-wing thought is a kind of playing with fire by people who don't even know that fire is hot.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: Dropkick Murphys get me going, Red Hot Chili Peppers, Nirvana... plus, all the regular hip-hop stuff.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.text: I don't think of myself as hot or cool or anything, just a dork.
quotes.author: Ashley Olsen

quotes.text: Put your hand on a hot stove for a minute and it seems like an hour. Sit with a pretty girl for an hour, and it seems like a minute.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: There must be quite a few things that a hot bath won't cure, but I don't know many of them.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.text: It's a strange world of language in which skating on thin ice can get you into hot water.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.text: I'm just a regular boy who goofs around, pulls pranks, and makes jokes. I'm not Mr. Debonair Suave. I'm just a regular boy who goofs around, pulls pranks, and makes jokes. That doesn't sound very hot to me.
quotes.author: Jensen Ackles

quotes.text: The other day I got a text from a boy, but it wasn't hot. I mean, if you're going to text me every day, you haven't seen me for months and you're trying to seduce me, you'd better spice up that text and make it more exciting than 'How was your day? I hope you're having a beautiful one.' Sadly, I haven't been doing a lot of kissing lately.
quotes.author: Chloe Sevigny

quotes.text: I call it like I see it. I don't hold back when it comes to being candid on the hot issues.
quotes.author: Jerry Doyle

quotes.text: Tofu hot dogs are actually scarier than real hot dogs. It's like wanting the worst possible meat product without even the thrill of it actually being meat.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: I can't tell you how many hot dogs I've eaten in my life.
quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

quotes.text: I love cheeseburgers and chocolate - milk, not dark, and hot chocolate with marshmallows in the winter!
quotes.author: Nina Dobrev

quotes.text: Not only strike while the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: Oliver Cromwell

quotes.text: One day, I'll be listening to a bunch of Ray Charles, the next day it's nothing but Red Hot Chili Peppers. The next day it might be Tupac all day.
quotes.author: J. Cole

quotes.text: I wear black because I'm comfortable in it. But then in the summertime when it's hot I'm comfortable in light blue.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.text: In Cuba, I would start the first two months hitting around .260 with three or four home runs. After the first half of the season, I would get hot, and that's when I would have my best results.
quotes.author: Yoenis Cespedes

quotes.text: No, because I don't want to hear what's hot and feel I have to copy it. I'll just make up my own thing.
quotes.author: Missy Elliott

quotes.text: Unlike their Western counterparts, Africans take elections very seriously - rising up early to queue patiently in line for hours under the hot sun and cast their ballots. Any misguided attempt to nullify or steal their votes will evoke a strong reaction from them.
quotes.author: George Ayittey

quotes.text: Guys that play videogames are hot!
quotes.author: Nikki Ziering

quotes.text: For short term relaxation, I take a hot tub. It's my best way to unblock writers' block, too. For a bit longer relaxation, I enjoy camping. Just being in the wilderness, with no phones or computers or anything I have to do really refreshes my spirit.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.text: I'd love to paint our roof white - it's so hot down here in Texas! - and I'd love to have a rainwater collection system to save rain runoff for later. I also love to fantasize about keeping chickens in the backyard.
quotes.author: Katherine Center

quotes.text: Since we can produce all types of light by means of hot bodies, we can ascribe, to the radiation in thermal equilibrium with hot bodies, the temperature of these bodies, and thus every radiation, even that issuing from a phosphorescent body, has a certain temperature for every colour.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Wien

quotes.text: I was very camera shy. People like hot girls, so I put my music to hot girls and it just became a trend. The whole 'enigmatic artist' thing, I just ran with it. No one could find pictures of me.
quotes.author: The Weeknd

quotes.text: In my mind's eye, Shakespeare is a huge, hot sea-beast, with fire in his veins and ice on his claws and inscrutable eyes, who looks like an inchoate hump under the encrustations of live barnacle-commentaries, limpets and trailing weeds.
quotes.author: A. S. Byatt

quotes.text: Specifically, my favorite tool in Java is hot code swapping in debug mode, meaning I can edit the code while the game is running and immediately see the results in the running game. This is super great for rapid tweaking.
quotes.author: Markus Persson

quotes.text: Heat not a furnace for your foe so hot that it do singe yourself.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: I deliver my Truth hot and hard.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.text: A straw vote only shows which way the hot air blows.
quotes.author: O. Henry

quotes.text: I'm over being a pop star. I don't wanna be a hot girl. I wanna be iconic. And I feel like I've accomplished a lot. I feel like I'm highly respected, which is more important than any award or any amount of records. And I feel like there comes a point when being a pop star is not enough.
quotes.author: Beyonce Knowles

quotes.text: People get so in the habit of worry that if you save them from drowning and put them on a bank to dry in the sun with hot chocolate and muffins they wonder whether they are catching cold.
quotes.author: John Jay Chapman

quotes.text: There's not as much oxygen in that hot gym and I think it's great for conditioning. I believe in a lot of boxing. You can train and work on the speed bag and heavy bag, but when you get in the ring with another fighter, it's a different story. Punches are coming at you, there's physical contact, muscle against muscle.
quotes.author: Emanuel Steward

quotes.text: I don't care how hot a girl is - if she doesn't like animals, it would be a major, major problem.
quotes.author: Ian Somerhalder

quotes.text: My favorite way to cook trout is whole, bone-in, on the grill. The fish are stuffed with sliced lemons and herb sprigs, brushed with oil, and cooked over fairly hot coals until the skin is crisp and the flesh is moist and flaky. Go ahead and gild the lily by adding a sauce.
quotes.author: Tom Douglas

quotes.text: Is the chemical aftertaste the reason why people eat hot dogs, or is it some kind of bonus?
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: There is little for the great part of the history of the world except the bitter tears of pity and the hot tears of wrath.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.text: I can't play anywhere near like I used to, and I was a hot drummer. It doesn't bother me, because frankly, if you get to that point where you can't hold a drumstick properly, there are many other things in life which are far more important, like cutting a loaf of bread or a piece of cheese.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.text: Being hot never hurts!
quotes.author: Debbie Harry

quotes.text: I think when you are a cool guy but also a hot guy, that makes you even more sexy.
quotes.author: Tessanne Chin

quotes.text: I went on a Hot Pocket diet where I ate two Hot Pockets every four hours. I only had the pepperoni pizza flavour. I didn't go anywhere near the cheeseburger macaroni.
quotes.author: Jason Segel

quotes.text: In February 2003, I signed a three-year contract with MSNBC to host a talk show. Having recently decided not to run again for governor of Minnesota, I was still a pretty hot commodity. The show was originally scheduled for an hour, four nights a week.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.text: What you really want for yourself is always trying to break through, just as a cooling breeze flows through an open window on a hot day. Your part is to open the windows of your mind.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.text: Many thanks for all of the love and good wishes sent our way from my friends out there in cartoon land... the only place where a nine month pregnant woman can still play a hot goth chick in a belly shirt!
quotes.author: Grey DeLisle

quotes.text: A book without potty humor is like a banana split without hot fudge. It can still be good, I suppose, but you kinda get the feeling that something is missing.
quotes.author: Dav Pilkey

quotes.text: I'm happy to be on a winning team. My individual success, that lasts for a short period of time. The success of being a part of the South, of Atlanta, which is now the hot bed of music, that's what's gonna last the longest. The fact that I contributed to planting our flag and moving music to my city, that's what I'm most proud of.
quotes.author: T.I.

quotes.text: I may be a senior, but so what? I'm still hot.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.text: Hotness is uniqueness and just being yourself - that's hot.
quotes.author: Ryan Cabrera

quotes.text: There are so many cute vintage dresses made out of synthetics from the '60s and '70s - but they're so itchy and hot. It's not worth it!
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.text: Sushi is something very exclusive. It is not like a McDonald's, not like a hot dog, not like a French fry. It's very high-class cooking in Japan.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: For some students, school is the only place where they get a hot meal and a warm hug. Teachers are sometimes the only ones who tell our children they can go from an Indian reservation to the Ivy League, from the home of a struggling single mom to the White House.
quotes.author: Denise Juneau

quotes.text: Any reviewer who expresses rage and loathing for a novel is preposterous. He or she is like a person who has put on full armor and attacked a hot fudge sundae.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.text: My two secrets to staying healthy: wash your hands all the time. And, if you can't, use Purell or one of the sanitizers. And the other is hot peppers. I eat a lot of hot peppers. I for some reason started doing that in 1992, and I swear by it.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: The lunch in a normal American restaurant is very problematic for me. I don't like to have hot food for lunch.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.text: Back then it was nothing like today. So you'd go to the bowling alley. We bowled and you could be in the back and you could make out, you know? And you know how hot it was to make out.
quotes.author: Steven Tyler

quotes.text: From food trucks to hot dog stands to county fair favorites, 'street food' has enjoyed a rich and storied history in American cuisine. However, street food has been around for thousands of years. In fact, street food is believed to have originated as far back as Ancient Rome.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: Injustice boils in men's hearts as does steel in its cauldron, ready to pour forth, white hot, in the fullness of time.
quotes.author: Mother Jones

quotes.text: I'm obsessed with frozen yogurt because you don't feel totally guilty eating it. It's not as bad as ice cream, and during the hot summer months, it's a great way to just refresh.
quotes.author: Caroline Sunshine

quotes.text: Everything has a natural explanation. The moon is not a god, but a great rock, and the sun a hot rock.
quotes.author: Anaxagoras

quotes.text: Some people wanted champagne and caviar when they should have had beer and hot dogs.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: I'm proud of myself. I could break and go get all this plastic surgery and get my nose fixed and get lipo or do whatever, but I haven't chosen to do that because I know I'm a great person. I'm pretty damn hot, if you ask me.
quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

quotes.text: Hot girls have so many options. Sitting at home alone any night of the week and searching the Internet for a dude is on zero hot girls' agendas. So they're definitely not coming after you.
quotes.author: Adam DeVine

quotes.text: I love snow; I love building snowman. The only thing I don't like is the cold - so if we could have a hot Christmas, that would be amazing.
quotes.author: Ella Henderson

quotes.text: You don't really have to go anywhere in particular in New York City to have a good time. In every part of town, there's always something going on. It helps to know people there, too, because everything changes so fast, and they will be able to point out what's hot this month.
quotes.author: Tibor Fischer

quotes.text: Gun control means being able to hit your target. If I have a 'hot button' issue, this is definitely it. Don't even think about taking my guns. My rights are not negotiable, and I am totally unwilling to compromise when it comes to the Second Amendment.
quotes.author: Michael Badnarik

quotes.text: No good work is ever done while the heart is hot and anxious and fretted.
quotes.author: Olive Schreiner

quotes.text: Let a man walk ten miles steadily on a hot summer's day along a dusty English road, and he will soon discover why beer was invented.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: I mean, I have done scenes with animals, with owls, with bats, with cats, with special effects, with thespians, in the freezing cold, in the pouring rain, boiling hot; I've done press with every syndication, every country; I've done interviews with people dressed up as cows - there's honestly nothing that's gonna intimidate me!
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.text: Growing up, I was a little hippie kid. I went to some good concerts... Amnesty International with Bob Dylan and Tracy Chapman... The best concert I ever went to was this one at the Cow Palace my freshman year in college on New Year's Eve. It was Pearl Jam opening for Nirvana opening for Red Hot Chili Peppers.
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.text: Let me be the first to tell you, drinking alcohol is the worst thing to do in cold weather. Hot soup is the best because the process of digesting food helps to warm you up.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.text: According to my mother, there pretty much wasn't anything I wouldn't eat as a child. Not just try, but eat. I was even inclined to dig into stuff about which she expressed open disgust - lobster and other shellfish, and cheap Chinese food with pepper so hot it made your gums feel like a medieval dentist had been at them.
quotes.author: Alice Dreger

quotes.text: I loved shooting 'iGo to Japan' because we got to be outside a lot, and our call times were really late because we had so many night scenes. It was pouring rain, so the cast would huddle together in between takes and drink hot chocolate. Shooting that episode was such a great bonding experience.
quotes.author: Jennette McCurdy

quotes.text: My favorite thing about the holiday season is the lights! I love walking around with family, friends, and a cup of peppermint hot chocolate to look at all the beautiful lights and decorations.
quotes.author: Caroline Sunshine

quotes.text: I think a lot of contemplation happens in bathtubs. It does for me. Nothing like a hot bath to ease the tension and think about what's going to happen next.
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.text: I don't know how you get dressed if you live in Wales, because it's pouring rain and then it's hot sunshine, and then it might hail. It's just so confusing.
quotes.author: Piper Perabo

quotes.text: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Vegetables are a must on a diet. I suggest carrot cake, zucchini bread, and pumpkin pie.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.text: Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: Sinful and forbidden pleasures are like poisoned bread; they may satisfy appetite for the moment, but there is death in them at the end.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.text: A loaf of bread, a jug of wine, and thou.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.text: Man cannot live by bread alone; he must have peanut butter.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.text: I have no taste for corruptible food nor for the pleasures of this life. I desire the Bread of God, which is the Flesh of Jesus Christ, who was of the seed of David, and for drink I desire His Blood, which is love incorruptible.
quotes.author: Ignatius of Antioch

quotes.text: My mother made a lot of things because she thought they'd be healthy for us. There were some very unfortunate experiences with whole wheat bread and bananas. I always tried to get rid of that sandwich and eat one of my friends' lunches.
quotes.author: Alice Waters

quotes.text: I have found people on both sides of the aisle, white and black, that'll give you the shirt off their back. And I've also found people that won't give you a piece of bread if you're starving to death.
quotes.author: Al Green

quotes.text: If you're a baker, making bread, you're a baker. If you make the best bread in the world, you're not an artist, but if you bake the bread in the gallery, you're an artist. So the context makes the difference.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.text: Peace goes into the making of a poem as flour goes into the making of bread.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.text: The poor have to labour in the face of the majestic equality of the law, which forbids the rich as well as the poor to sleep under bridges, to beg in the streets, and to steal bread.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: Talk of joy: there may be things better than beef stew and baked potatoes and home-made bread - there may be.
quotes.author: Ray Stannard Baker

quotes.text: Men can starve from a lack of self-realization as much as they can from a lack of bread.
quotes.author: Richard Wright

quotes.text: I love all kinds of bread. Whenever I crave junk food, I want salty things like peanuts or potato chips.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.text: A person who steals bread during a famine is not treated as a thief.
quotes.author: Cat Stevens

quotes.text: There are people in the world so hungry, that God cannot appear to them except in the form of bread.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: I came into music just because I wanted the bread. It's true. I looked around and this seemed like the only way I was going to get the kind of bread I wanted.
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.text: I've done my share of period stuff. I'm not sure why, but people say I have a period face. The bread and butter of British TV is Jane Austen adaptations and bridges and bonnets and boats and horses.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.text: I come from Yorkshire in England where we like to eat chip sandwiches - white bread, butter, tomato ketchup and big fat french fries cooked in beef dripping.
quotes.author: Helen Fielding

quotes.text: Truth is, I think, if God just gave us our daily bread, many of us would be angry. 'That's all you're going to give me? You're just going to give me enough to sustain me for today? What about tomorrow or next year or 10, 20, 30 years from now? I want to know that I'm set up.' And yet Jesus says just pray for your daily provisions.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.text: My sisters like cooking at my place. It has a bit more room, and the food tastes a little bit better. A big pot of spaghetti and sauce, some warm French bread - works all the time. I think I've been eating pasta for 26 years.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.text: I'm always down to try a new burger, but Shake Shack is still my top. What makes them so special is for the bread they use Martin's potato rolls which is just the best hamburger buns ever.
quotes.author: Aziz Ansari

quotes.text: Give us this day our daily taste. Restore to us soups that spoons will not sink in and sauces which are never the same twice. Raise up among us stews with more gravy than we have bread to blot it with Give us pasta with a hundred fillings.
quotes.author: Robert Farrar Capon

quotes.text: Americans mythologize competition and credit it with saving us from socialist bread lines. Actually, capitalism and competition are opposites. Capitalism is premised on the accumulation of capital, but under perfect competition, all profits get competed away.
quotes.author: Peter Thiel

quotes.text: To each other, we were as normal and nice as the smell of bread. We were just a family. In a family even exaggerations make perfect sense.
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.text: I can't play anywhere near like I used to, and I was a hot drummer. It doesn't bother me, because frankly, if you get to that point where you can't hold a drumstick properly, there are many other things in life which are far more important, like cutting a loaf of bread or a piece of cheese.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.text: In Egypt today most people are concerned with getting bread to eat. Only some of the educated understand how democracy works.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.text: With five chances on each hand and one unwavering aim, no boy, however poor, need despair. There is bread and success for every youth under the American flag who has energy and ability to seize his opportunity.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.text: Everybody needs beauty as well as bread, places to play in and pray in, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: Space and light and order. Those are the things that men need just as much as they need bread or a place to sleep.
quotes.author: Le Corbusier

quotes.text: Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone; it has to be made, like bread, remade all the time, made new.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.text: Here is bread, which strengthens man's heart, and therefore is called the staff of Life.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: The sky is the daily bread of the eyes.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: You know how you put peanut butter on a piece of bread and the bread falls - it never falls on the bread side down, it always falls peanut butter side down. That's because of gravity.
quotes.author: J. B. Smoove

quotes.text: All three of my parents - I also had a stepmother - were teachers, and my dad taught high school, and as he always reminded me when I was going to spend some money on something, 'Your mother and I, in the Depression, had to decide whether to spend a dime on a loaf of bread or if we could go to a movie with it.'
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.text: If the poor overweight jogger only knew how far he had to run to work off the calories in a crust of bread he might find it better in terms of pound per mile to go to a massage parlor.
quotes.author: Christiaan Barnard

quotes.text: Sense the blessings of the earth in the perfect arc of a ripe tangerine, the taste of warm, fresh bread, the circling flight of birds, the lavender color of the sky shining in a late afternoon rain puddle, the million times we pass other beings in our cars and shops and out among the trees without crashing, conflict, or harm.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.text: We are big composters. We compost everything - bread, tea bags, coffee grounds. I even dump out my old coffee in the garden. We keep a mixing bowl on the counter and just fill it up as the day goes along, then dump it in the mulch pile before dinner and wash it with the dinner dishes.
quotes.author: Katherine Center

quotes.text: When you share your last crust of bread with a beggar, you mustn't behave as if you were throwing a bone to a dog. You must give humbly, and thank him for allowing you to have a part in his hunger.
quotes.author: Giovanni Guareschi

quotes.text: Let there be work, bread, water and salt for all.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: My parents were children during the Great Depression of the 1930s, and it scarred them. Especially my father, who saw destitution in his Brooklyn, New York neighborhood; adults standing in so called 'bread lines,' children begging in the streets.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.text: Nobody had ever told me junk food was bad for me. Four years of medical school, and four years of internship and residency, and I never thought anything was wrong with eating sweet rolls and doughnuts, and potatoes, and bread, and sweets.
quotes.author: Robert Atkins

quotes.text: If they can make penicillin out of mouldy bread, they can sure make something out of you.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: The American people are sheep. They're comfortable, rich, working. It's like the Romans, they're happy with bread and their spectator sports. The Super Bowl means more to them than any right.
quotes.author: Jack Kevorkian

quotes.text: Was I always going to be here? No I was not. I was going to be homeless at one time, a taxi driver, truck driver, or any kind of job that would get me a crust of bread. You never know what's going to happen.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.text: A wise and frugal government, which shall restrain men from injuring one another, shall leave them otherwise free to regulate their own pursuits of industry and improvement, and shall not take from the mouth of labor the bread it has earned.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: My secret skill is baking bread. My mother was a farmer's daughter and still made bread every day when I was a child. She would have me knead the dough when I got home from school.
quotes.author: Richard Flanagan

quotes.text: And that's really what's happening in this country is a violation of the First Commandment. We have become a country entrenched in idolatry, and that idolatry is the dependency upon our government. We're supposed to depend upon God for our protection and our provision and for our daily bread, not for our government.
quotes.author: Sharron Angle

quotes.text: I am proud to be an American. Because an American can eat anything on the face of this earth as long as he has two pieces of bread.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.text: String theory envisions a multiverse in which our universe is one slice of bread in a big cosmic loaf. The other slices would be displaced from ours in some extra dimension of space.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.text: I like both potatoes and rice. You can do a lot with both of them. But if I could eat only one carbohydrate for the rest of my life, I wouldn't choose bread, potatoes or even noodles. I'd go for rice instead; I eat more of that than anything else.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: My mother missed having dinner with Lyndon Johnson because she couldn't find the right hat to wear. While my father went off to the white house to break bread with the President, my mother, who's not a things and stuff person, stayed at the hotel and tried on 10 different hats and missed dinner.
quotes.author: Emilio Estevez

quotes.text: I eat excellent bread, clean meat, good crisp veggies, organic fruits and nice wine and cheese. It is one of the things I am truly grateful for. I'm not kidding. You can't ask a single mother of three working two jobs for minimum wage to eat that way. I am lucky.
quotes.author: Rachael Taylor

quotes.text: Grace is available for each of us every day - our spiritual daily bread - but we've got to remember to ask for it with a grateful heart and not worry about whether there will be enough for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.text: Sunday's my day off, where I eat whatever I want. I don't not let myself have something. I do love French fries and bread.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: I am God's wheat, and I shall be ground by the teeth of beasts, that I may become the pure bread of Christ.
quotes.author: Ignatius of Antioch
