quotes.text: It is not accidental that all phenomena of human life are dominated by the search for daily bread - the oldest link connecting all living things, man included, with the surrounding nature.
quotes.author: Ivan Pavlov

quotes.text: In the Lord's Prayer, the first petition is for daily bread. No one can worship God or love his neighbor on an empty stomach.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.text: You shall find out how salt is the taste of another man's bread, and how hard is the way up and down another man's stairs.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.text: The art of bread making can become a consuming hobby, and no matter how often and how many kinds of bread one has made, there always seems to be something new to learn.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.text: Walter Scott has no business to write novels, especially good ones. It is not fair. He has fame and profit enough as a poet, and should not be taking the bread out of the mouths of other people.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.text: Poetry is what we do to break bread with the dead.
quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

quotes.text: Business underlies everything in our national life, including our spiritual life. Witness the fact that in the Lord's Prayer, the first petition is for daily bread. No one can worship God or love his neighbor on an empty stomach.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.text: Baking is how you start kids at cooking in the kitchen. It's fun whether it's baking bread or cookies. With baking, you have to be exact when it comes to ingredients.
quotes.author: Sandra Lee

quotes.text: The danger is not lest the soul should doubt whether there is any bread, but lest, by a lie, it should persuade itself that it is not hungry.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.text: I love a sandwich that you can barely fit in your mouth because there's so much stuff on it. The bread should not be the main thing on a sandwich.
quotes.author: Adrianne Palicki

quotes.text: I've spoken in every state in the union, meeting and hugging the people who later bought my books. I spoke to anybody who wanted to hear me, including 1,000 nuns who could pay me only with homemade bread.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: My earliest memories of my mom were of her multi-tasking - preparing dinner while checking on homework and housework; clearing the dinner plates while setting out bowls for breakfast; making sure we ate our breakfast while lining up bread, lunch meats, apples, and snacks assembly-line style so we could make our lunches.
quotes.author: Christine Pelosi

quotes.text: What is nobler than a man wresting and wringing his bread from the stubborn soil by the sweat of his brow and the break of his back for his wife and children!
quotes.author: William Morris Hunt

quotes.text: People who treat other people as less than human must not be surprised when the bread they have cast on the waters comes floating back to them, poisoned.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.text: Higher education must lead the march back to the fundamentals of human relationships, to the old discovery that is ever new, that man does not live by bread alone.
quotes.author: John Hannah

quotes.text: I eat nothing that's processed or refined - no high-fructose corn syrup, no sugar, no trans-fats. I eat a lot of fish and monounsaturated fats from olives, olive oil and nuts. A lot of organic, fresh fruits and vegetables. No bread. No gluten. No wheat. No rice.
quotes.author: Dean Karnazes

quotes.text: For it is we who must pray for our daily bread, and if He grants it to us, it is only through our labour, our skill and preparation.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.text: If you're broke, you don't want to rap about being broke; you gonna rap about hustling and getting that bread.
quotes.author: Juicy J

quotes.text: If you cast your bread upon the water and you have faith, you'll get back cash. If you don't have faith, you'll get soggy bread.
quotes.author: Don King

quotes.text: When I was young, I used to expect Parisians to wear little black berets, to bicycle about with strings of onions around their necks, and to brandish long sticks of bread, just like they used to do in school textbooks.
quotes.author: Craig Brown

quotes.text: My mother taught us to sell food in the market so we could pay for school. I would get up at 4:30 A.M. and start selling bread and cheese before going to class. School cost $65. The average salary was $125 a year, and with 10 kids, how are you going to pay for that?
quotes.author: Dikembe Mutombo

quotes.text: In the West, we look at art through life. Well, that's one way of living. In the Orient they look at life through art. They even drink their tea without sugar, for the same reason that they don't like a lot of frilly decorations on a painting. I can't stand butter on my bread for the same reason. I'm allergic to goo and rococo.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.text: The only reason I wanted 'Making Toast' as the title is that it is a simple gesture of moving on. Every morning there's the bread and you make the toast and you start the day.
quotes.author: Roger Rosenblatt

quotes.text: Pasta with melted cheese is the one thing I could eat over and over again.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.text: Nothing says holidays, like a cheese log.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.text: I have always wanted to open up a brewery slash goat farm. Brew some beer, make some goat cheese, but that's kinda dreamy.
quotes.author: Adam Lamberg

quotes.text: Seriously, who really cares how long the Nile river is, or who was the first to discover cheese? How is memorizing that ever going to help anyone? Instead, we need to give kids projects that allow them to exercise their minds and discover things for themselves.
quotes.author: Aaron Swartz

quotes.text: I am not one to turn down macaroni and cheese, even late at night. I love Italian food. I love pasta... A refrigerator full of water and Gatorade? Honey, that's just not gonna happen.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: You're this rat in the American maze, working your way towards the cheese, which is a job.
quotes.author: Kevin Costner

quotes.text: The most appealing thing to me about food is combining and layering flavors, tastes, and textures. So the perfect sandwich has to be toasted. It has to have Emmenthal Swiss cheese and a combination of sweet and savory - some cranberry or fig thing happening - with different kinds of meats like Black Forest ham and roast beef.
quotes.author: Kyle MacLachlan

quotes.text: Democrats always like to brag that their guys are smarter than the opponents and Republicans always like to brag that their guys are more moral than the opponents. But if you're looking for morals in politics you're looking for bananas in the cheese department.
quotes.author: Harry Shearer

quotes.text: Only peril can bring the French together. One can't impose unity out of the blue on a country that has 265 different kinds of cheese.
quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

quotes.text: I can't play anywhere near like I used to, and I was a hot drummer. It doesn't bother me, because frankly, if you get to that point where you can't hold a drumstick properly, there are many other things in life which are far more important, like cutting a loaf of bread or a piece of cheese.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.text: I'm a bit of a clothes hoarder, admittedly. I try to weed out stuff. My girlfriends come over for cheese and wine and go shopping in my wardrobe. They especially love it when they get stuff with a tag still on.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.text: I always have apples and fruit in the house. It's easier to eat something healthy if it's within reach. I also have yogurt, cheese and crackers, and raw almonds.
quotes.author: Martina McBride

quotes.text: Cheese is milk's leap toward immortality.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.text: You can't be judgmental about babies. They are all have different needs. I was left with an enduring hatred of cheese because it was forced down me when I was young.
quotes.author: Robert Winston

quotes.text: I made lemon spaghetti in an early season of 'Everyday Italian,' and to this day people still come up to me and say they love it. It's very, very simple. Basically, you cook the pasta and mix together Parmesan cheese, olive oil, lemon juice and zest and pour it over the pasta.
quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

quotes.text: Showing up to games year after year, no matter what the product on the field gives you back, is a learned behavior - sort of like rats in a maze searching for cheese. The rat learns the maze, learns where the cheese is placed and eventually goes to it without thought, even when the cheese is taken away. The rat doesn't know anything else.
quotes.author: Joe Cowley

quotes.text: Fettucini alfredo is macaroni and cheese for adults.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.text: How can anyone govern a nation that has two hundred and forty-six different kinds of cheese?
quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

quotes.text: The early bird may get the worm, but its the second mouse that gets the cheese.
quotes.author: Jeremy Paxman

quotes.text: When I first became interested in photography, I thought it was the whole cheese. My idea was to have it recognized as one of the fine arts. Today I don't give a hoot in hell about that. The mission of photography is to explain man to man and each man to himself.
quotes.author: Edward Steichen

quotes.text: I'm a carb queen. I'll always order macaroni and cheese, but I don't want it to be fancy. I want it to be as close to Kraft Services as it can possibly get!
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: These days it's cool to be ethnic and to be different, but when I was a kid, it was not cool - at all. My friends would come over and my mom would make crepes with eggs, stuffed with mozzarella cheese, tomatoes and spinach. And they'd be like, 'What is this?'
quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

quotes.text: Age is not important unless you're a cheese.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.text: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
quotes.author: Luis Bunuel

quotes.text: I started running around my 30th birthday. I wanted to lose weight; I didn't anticipate the serenity. Being in motion, suddenly my body was busy and so my head could work out some issues I had swept under a carpet of wine and cheese. Good therapy, that's a good run.
quotes.author: Michael Weatherly

quotes.text: Once we hit forty, women only have about four taste buds left: one for vodka, one for wine, one for cheese, and one for chocolate.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.text: Do you know how many calories are in butter and cheese and ice cream? Would you get your dog up in the morning for a cup of coffee and a donut?
quotes.author: Jack LaLanne

quotes.text: The clever cat eats cheese and breathes down rat holes with baited breath.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: My mother and I were born in Mieres, Asturias, the most beautiful region you'll ever see in Europe and the home of Cabrales, a great blue cheese made in the Asturian mountains. When I was young, we moved to Barcelona. Whenever my mother was homesick for Asturias, she'd eat a little piece of Cabrales to bring her closer to Mieres.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.text: I eat excellent bread, clean meat, good crisp veggies, organic fruits and nice wine and cheese. It is one of the things I am truly grateful for. I'm not kidding. You can't ask a single mother of three working two jobs for minimum wage to eat that way. I am lucky.
quotes.author: Rachael Taylor

quotes.text: I definitely try to eat a healthy diet, but I am the first person to say I love unhealthy food. I would never tell you I don't. I love fried chicken or mac and cheese. Do I order them all the time when I'm out at restaurants? No, though I do have one splurge meal a week.
quotes.author: Rachel Nichols

quotes.text: I went into a French restaraunt and asked the waiter, 'Have you got frog's legs?' He said, 'Yes,' so I said, 'Well hop into the kitchen and get me a cheese sandwich.'
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.text: There aren't many great passages written about food, but I love one by George Millar, who worked for the SOE in the second world war and wrote a book called 'Horned Pigeon.' He had been on the run and hadn't eaten for a week, and his description of the cheese fondue he smells in the peasant kitchen of a house in eastern France is unbelievable.
quotes.author: Sebastian Faulks

quotes.text: There is absolutely no one, apart from yourself, who can prevent you, in the middle of the night, from sneaking down to tidy up the edges of that hunk of cheese at the back of the fridge.
quotes.author: Boris Johnson

quotes.text: Age is of no importance unless you are a cheese.
quotes.author: Billie Burke

quotes.text: Everyone prefers some foods over others, but some adults take this tendency to an extreme. These people tend to prefer the kinds of bland food they may have enjoyed as children - such as plain or buttered pasta, macaroni and cheese, cheese pizza, French fries and grilled cheese sandwiches - and to restrict their eating to just a few dishes.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.text: The poets have been mysteriously silent on the subject of cheese.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: I have this wonderful personal chef who sources and stocks all my organic produce and I basically live on five smoothies a day. I'm totally vegan. I blend this green concoction with kale, cucumber, broccoli, string beans, avocado. My protein comes from protein powder. There is absolutely no milk, butter, cheese.
quotes.author: Larry Hagman

quotes.text: I do all of the grocery shopping in my little family. I buy cheese, of many different kinds, sliced packaged meats and poultry, bagels, immense quantities of eggs, pre-made fried chicken. Milk. Bacon. It is insane how much dairy, deli and bakery stuff I buy.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.text: Wine and cheese are ageless companions, like aspirin and aches, or June and moon, or good people and noble ventures.
quotes.author: M. F. K. Fisher

quotes.text: Washington, DC is to lying what Wisconsin is to cheese.
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.text: My whole family is lactose intolerant and when we take pictures we can't say cheese.
quotes.author: Jay London

quotes.text: Breakfast is so important, so I'll make an omelet with cheese and deli meats, and then I'll eat muesli and yogurt mixed with fruit or oatmeal with fruit - and then a side of baked beans.
quotes.author: Andrew Luck

quotes.text: I had acne late, in college. My skin used to be really flawless. Went to college, became a vegetarian, ate a lot of cheese - big mistake. Here I am trying to be healthy and I'm eating grilled cheese sandwiches and french fries every day, having mad eruptions all over my face.
quotes.author: Wesley Snipes

quotes.text: My mother taught us to sell food in the market so we could pay for school. I would get up at 4:30 A.M. and start selling bread and cheese before going to class. School cost $65. The average salary was $125 a year, and with 10 kids, how are you going to pay for that?
quotes.author: Dikembe Mutombo

quotes.text: Offers come all the time, but I'm pretty particular. I really have to be wowed by a character I encounter in a script, or a storyline. I really do need to feel inspiration, otherwise I'm just happy planting perennials and making goat cheese.
quotes.author: Vera Farmiga

quotes.text: Yeah, I made it. It sneaks up on you. You're some schmuck and you wake up one day and you go, Good God, I'm the cheese.
quotes.author: William H. Macy

quotes.text: The actual, original 'Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles,' I have vague memories of because I was pretty small, but I loved, loved, loved it. I have only those weird, visceral little-kid memories: I remember the extreme flat, two dimensional green that was their skin or the weird pizza with no sauce - it was just like yellow, drippy cheese.
quotes.author: Mae Whitman

quotes.text: Pessimism is as American as apple pie - frozen apple pie with a slice of processed cheese.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.text: I'm a big pasta fan. I'm a big Italian food fan. Anything Italian - I love cheese, mozzarella. Mozzarella is my favorite, so I have to say anything Italian, I'll take it.
quotes.author: Malin Akerman

quotes.text: I can safely say that other than macaroni and cheese, there's no processed food in my life. There's no inorganic food in my life these days. There's no junk food. There's not a lot of sugar. There's no soy. I mean, really everything that's going into my body is pretty pure.
quotes.author: Ginnifer Goodwin

quotes.text: Right now, I'm as single as a slice of American cheese.
quotes.author: Nick Cannon

quotes.text: I love cheese and biscuits, the stronger the better.
quotes.author: Eric Bristow

quotes.text: I eat junk food, cheesecake, cheese, pizza - but just lower amounts of it.
quotes.author: JWoww

quotes.text: Blue cheese contains natural amphetamines. Why are students not informed about this?
quotes.author: Mark E. Smith

quotes.text: My wife is a terrific Southern cook. My favorite of all the great things she cooks is 'trash potatoes.' That's mashed potatoes with sour cream, bacon, cheddar cheese, and horseradish. It's a total gut bomb.
quotes.author: Mike Vogel

quotes.text: Thanks to my Czech-German heritage, I can't get enough of savory foods like stews, sausage, noodles, and anything that involves melted cheese. Not great choices from a dietary perspective, but at the end of a long day, I feel like I'm entitled.
quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

quotes.text: I eat whatever I want. I like bread and cheese and wine, and that makes my life fun and enjoyable.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.text: What happens to the hole when the cheese is gone?
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.text: A corpse is meat gone bad. Well and what's cheese? Corpse of milk.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.text: The family on my mom's side, their whole business is inventing and pitching stuff. My grandfather is in infomercials. He's a pitchman, so if you're ever watching TV late at night, you'll probably see him pitching knives. My great-grandfather also invented the plastic cheese grater.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: The only way to get vegetables at a diner late night is to order the omelette. A feta cheese and broccoli omelette.
quotes.author: Lisa Loeb

quotes.text: Cheese is one of my great weaknesses, I could eat the stuff by the pound.
quotes.author: Helena Christensen

quotes.text: I love macaroni and cheese. I could eat it every meal of the day.
quotes.author: Cobie Smulders

quotes.text: I used to sit on the couch, and I could go through a pound of Brie cheese and a movie. I was like, 'That's enough,' because it feels like a bowling ball in your stomach.
quotes.author: JWoww

quotes.text: I always preferred my father's pasta the next day, when he'd put it in a hot oven with heaps of extra cheese. It would emerge slightly burned and very crisp on top.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.text: I have an insatiable palate. I'll try anything once, with an open mind. However, there is a special place in my heart for Kraft Macaroni & Cheese. Don't get me wrong, I've sampled specialty Mac & Cheese all over the world, but nothing competes with the stuff I grew up on.
quotes.author: Rachel Nichols

quotes.text: St. Louis has a lot of weird food customs that you don't see other places - and a lot of great ethnic neighborhoods. There's a German neighborhood. A great old school Italian neighborhood, with toasted ravioli, which seems to be a St. Louis tradition. And they love provolone cheese in St. Louis.
quotes.author: Andy Cohen

quotes.text: Never be a food snob. Learn from everyone you meet - the fish guy at your market, the lady at the local diner, farmers, cheese makers. Ask questions, try everything and eat up!
quotes.author: Rachael Ray

quotes.text: Me and my friend Ioan Gruffudd are like chalk and cheese when it comes to clothes. He lives for his clothes and has an amazing wardrobe. If we're going out I'll turn up at his house and say, 'I haven't got anything to wear,' and he'll tut and sigh and then lend me something swanky.
quotes.author: Matthew Rhys

quotes.text: Culture and tradition have to change little by little. So 'new' means a little twist, a marriage of Japanese technique with French ingredients. My technique. Indian food, Korean food; I put Italian mozzarella cheese with sashimi. I don't think 'new new new.' I'm not a genius. A little twist.
quotes.author: Masaharu Morimoto

quotes.text: I'm a human garbage can, but I don't like veggies unless they have Velveeta cheese on top. And forget crunchy broccoli and carrots. I like 'em soggy, soft and wilted. The nutrients have probably gone away, but that's the only way I can eat them.
quotes.author: Sherri Shepherd

quotes.text: The number one mistake is giving pets table scraps. I made the mistake thinking I was showing my dog love by giving her food and treats. You see a tiny 4 oz. piece of cheese, but for a Boston Terrier like mine, that's like one and a half hamburgers. That's unhealthy.
quotes.author: Alison Sweeney

quotes.text: I like to focus on making the music sound simple and true, and very lush and full. I think music should take you to somewhere else where you have the space to contemplate or exercise your imagination. All the while you should be feeling real good, like when you have a delicious and decadent meal, macaroni and cheese or foie gras.
quotes.author: Alice Smith

quotes.text: Casseroles don't have to be about canned ingredients and vegetables you normally wouldn't even think of eating alone, much less stuck in between layers of sauce and breadcrumbs. They can vary from everyone's favorite all-time casserole, macaroni and cheese, to the ultimate English casserole, Shepherd's Pie.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.text: I don't like anything that looks gelatinous - really weirds me out. But when I was a kid, I used to get very, very upset if anything had a kind of chalky texture; like, certain kinds of cottage cheese I know have a weird chalkiness.
quotes.author: Roz Chast

quotes.text: My dear Excellency! I have not gone to war to collect cheese and eggs, but for another purpose.
quotes.author: Manfred von Richthofen

quotes.text: Naps are the key to relieving stress. When you are working on two hours of sleep, the fact that cheese comes on something when you ordered it with no cheese is enough to send you crying under the covers for an hour.
quotes.author: Keri Russell

quotes.text: Manouri is a Greek ewes' milk cheese that's light in colour and texture. It's fresh and milky, and goes well with other subtle flavours.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.text: I don't have much patience for people who are self-conscious about the act of eating, and it irritates me when someone denies themselves the pleasure of a bloody hunk of steak or a pungent French cheese because of some outdated nonsense about what's appropriate or attractive.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.text: Does Greenpeace think it can stop whaling in Antarctica by publicly eating whale meat and declaring it delicious? What are these people thinking?
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: Tofu hot dogs are actually scarier than real hot dogs. It's like wanting the worst possible meat product without even the thrill of it actually being meat.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: I eat a lot of salad, a little meat, and some fruit. That's all. But I like sweets.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.text: I think it's an actor's responsibility to change every time. Not only for himself and the people he's working with, but for the audience. If you just go out and deliver the same dish every time... it's meat loaf again... you'd get bored. I'd get bored.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.text: The current health crisis, however, is a little more the work of the evil empire. We were told, we were assured, that the more meat and dairy and poultry we ate, the healthier we'd be.
quotes.author: Mark Bittman

quotes.text: Wall Street has turned the economy into a giant asset-stripping scheme, one whose purpose is to suck the last bits of meat from the carcass of the middle class.
quotes.author: Matt Taibbi

quotes.text: Meat consumption is just as dangerous to public health as tobacco use... It's time we looked into holding the meat producers and fast-food outlets legally accountable.
quotes.author: Neal Barnard

quotes.text: Processed pig is white trash meat. Some people call it Spam.
quotes.author: Scott Weiland

quotes.text: It's a myth that generally Asians are mostly vegetarians. The Japanese are the kings of red meat, but it's expensive. The Chinese and Vietnamese love their pork. Many Indians, especially the Muslims, can't live without their lamb.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Puck

quotes.text: I'm a vegetarian and very much active in regards to how I feel about animal rights and protecting animals and giving animals a voice. But at the same time, I appreciate and respect other people's decisions to eat meat. The only thing that I hope is that people are educated, that they're aware, that they're living a conscious lifestyle.
quotes.author: Abbie Cornish

quotes.text: No matter how tough the meat may be, it's going to be tender if you slice it thin enough.
quotes.author: Guy Fieri

quotes.text: I ate no butcher's meat, lived chiefly on fruits, vegetables, and fish, and never drank a glass of spirits or wine until my wedding day. To this I attribute my continual good health, endurance, and an iron constitution.
quotes.author: John James Audubon

quotes.text: To fulfill a dream, to be allowed to sweat over lonely labor, to be given a chance to create, is the meat and potatoes of life. The money is the gravy.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.text: Not eating meat is a decision, eating meat is an instinct.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.text: Temptation is like a knife, that may either cut the meat or the throat of a man; it may be his food or his poison, his exercise or his destruction.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: I myself eschew all stimulants. I also practically abstain from meat.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: Let any pretty girl announce a divorce in Hollywood and the wolves come running. Fresh meat for the beast, and they are always hungry.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.text: I don't think I'll have to kill her. Just slap that pretty face into hamburger meat, that's all.
quotes.author: Sterling Hayden

quotes.text: If being a werewolf is really a curse, you've got to treat it honorably. If werewolves are going to carry on, there has to be an incredibly powerful force. There is the business of the craving, the hunger for the kill. It has to be deeply pleasurable and more than an appetite for meat. There has to be a sensual dimension to it.
quotes.author: Glen Duncan

quotes.text: My dinners at home are startlingly simple. Every night, I stop at the market near my hotel and pick up a steak, lamb chops or some liver, which I broil in the electric oven in my room. I usually eat four or five raw carrots with my meat, and that is all. I must be part rabbit; I never get bored with raw carrots.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: At the base level, a burger is a piece of meat and a bun with something on it. It's simple but it seems to make a lot of people happy.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.text: I'm really still a child of the Forties. I still think about it a lot, about the repercussions of armed conflict. Until 1953 we had rationing. We couldn't buy meat, we couldn't buy pleasurable goods like cigarettes and sweets. I didn't starve - my family were lucky - but I knew what it was like standing in line waiting for foodstuffs.
quotes.author: Eric Burdon

quotes.text: If there hadn't been women we'd still be squatting in a cave eating raw meat, because we made civilization in order to impress our girlfriends.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: There is no doubt that some plant food, such as oatmeal, is more economical than meat, and superior to it in regard to both mechanical and mental performance. Such food, moreover, taxes our digestive organs decidedly less, and, in making us more contented and sociable, produces an amount of good difficult to estimate.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: Work is the meat of life, pleasure the dessert.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.text: I have been heartbroken once and it has affected all my relationships from there on. But now I look at it as a occupational hazard. If you are in the meat market at some point you are gonna get mad cows disease.
quotes.author: Dominic Monaghan

quotes.text: When I was old enough to realize all meat was killed, I saw it as an irrational way of using our power, to take a weaker thing and mutilate it. It was like the way bullies would take control of younger kids in the schoolyard.
quotes.author: River Phoenix

quotes.text: It is my meditation all the day, and more than my meat and drink, to know how I shall make the Saints of God comprehend the visions that roll like an overflowing surge before my mind.
quotes.author: Joseph Smith, Jr.

quotes.text: I'm an absolute connoisseur of cheeseburgers and like to think that I can detect even mere percentages of shift in fat content in ground meat in a burger and can actually name the temperature to which it was actually cooked to the degree if I'm, you know, really on my game.
quotes.author: Alton Brown

quotes.text: We were so poor as kids. I didn't even see a bathtub, running water, hot water, commode - we didn't have any of that. We started with a humble log house, milk cow, garden-raised our own food, killed a hog every year in the fall, and had the meat hanging up in the smokehouse - that was our childhood, me and ol' Si.
quotes.author: Phil Robertson

quotes.text: I eat excellent bread, clean meat, good crisp veggies, organic fruits and nice wine and cheese. It is one of the things I am truly grateful for. I'm not kidding. You can't ask a single mother of three working two jobs for minimum wage to eat that way. I am lucky.
quotes.author: Rachael Taylor

quotes.text: Meat is a big deal in my life. I do love breakfast food, but I don't think that's extraordinary. I'm a normal American. We love eggs and meat and potatoes and gravy.
quotes.author: Nick Offerman

quotes.text: Bologna is a deli meat for people with eyes.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.text: Animals that we eat are raised for food in the most economical way possible, and the serious food producers do it in the most humane way possible. I think anyone who is a carnivore needs to understand that meat does not originally come in these neat little packages.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.text: Personal columnists are jackals and no jackal has been known to live on grass once he had learned about meat - no matter who killed the meat for him.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: All of the agreed-upon pariahs throughout pop-culture history put their identities into the thing we decry. And yet we derive our own identities from the act of hating. We connect on the things we are disappointed in. Some may argue that nothing in history gathers a crowd like complaining about Lady Gaga's meat dress.
quotes.author: Patrick Stump

quotes.text: Captain Clarke who had gone out yesterday with eighteen men to bring in the meat we had killed the day before, and to continue the hunt, came in at twelve o'clock.
quotes.author: Meriwether Lewis

quotes.text: I'm learning to hunt with rifles, because if you think about it, hunting gets you the healthiest meat - organic, free-range food. It's a totally yuppie spin on what I thought was kind of a redneck occupation.
quotes.author: Sarah Wayne Callies

quotes.text: Most people see a documentary about the meat industry and then they become a vegetarian for a week.
quotes.author: Jason Reitman

quotes.text: I say have the night and give people the awards, but why do people want to watch people win awards? What are they getting out of it? I don't quite get it. Because they have awards all the time; there's awards for butchers, the best meat served, but they don't televise it. I don't know why they do it for films or TV programs.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.text: I don't eat red meat, but sometimes a man needs a steak.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.text: Vegetables are interesting but lack a sense of purpose when unaccompanied by a good cut of meat.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.text: Those who purify your water, inspect your meat, and test your kids' toys, as well as a huge number of nurses, teachers, and our soldiers, are public employees. The firefighters who don't hesitate to rush toward danger while you run away from it - they are all public employees.
quotes.author: Jennifer Granholm

quotes.text: A man can live and be healthy without killing animals for food; therefore, if he eats meat, he participates in taking animal life merely for the sake of his appetite.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: When people say they prefer organic food, what they often seem to mean is they don't want their food tainted with pesticides and their meat shot full of hormones or antibiotics. Many object to the way a few companies - Monsanto is the most famous of them - control so many of the seeds we grow.
quotes.author: Michael Specter

quotes.text: 'Meat' is a vague term and can be used to refer to many parts of an animal, including internal organs and skin. For the most part, the meat we eat consists of muscle tissue taken from farm animals, whether it's a sirloin steak, which is cut from the rear of a cow, or a pork chop, taken from flesh near the spine of a pig.
quotes.author: Michael Specter

quotes.text: Since we can't count on the meat, egg, and dairy industries to protect animals from the most egregious forms of cruelty, what can we, as consumers, do? Opting out of paying someone to allow animals to die in a barn fire or at the slaughterhouse seems pretty reasonable.
quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

quotes.text: Meat is a wasteful use of water and creates a lot of greenhouse gases. It puts enormous pressure on the world's resources. A vegetarian diet is better.
quotes.author: Nicholas Stern

quotes.text: If you want someone who's big-boned and you like that, ain't nothing wrong with having a little extra meat on there. If you like them thin-boned, then that's okay, too.
quotes.author: Martin Lawrence

quotes.text: Flesh-meats will depreciate the blood. Cook meat with spices, and eat it with rich cakes and pies, and you have a bad quality of blood.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.text: I eat everything, that's a problem. I don't have discipline. My favorite dish is the Caribbean. Meat, rice, lots of grains. But I do like to do exercises. Lately, I've been having capoeira classes and lots of cardiovascular exercises, such as jogging and cycling.
quotes.author: Ricky Martin

quotes.text: I am mean as cats' meat about handbags: mine don't ever look chic. I always prefer bags that aren't made of leather.
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.text: For a slim, sexy body, it's important to eat protein every day - preferably at every meal. Be sure to ask about the origins of your meat, poultry and seafood. If you can't afford organic, free-range meats, opt for natural poultry, pork, and beef that's raised without antibiotics or hormones.
quotes.author: Suzanne Somers

quotes.text: If you see a Renaissance body, this is completely ugly in this time. Everybody has to be skinny. But the Renaissance body with incredible flow of the meat everywhere, it was beauty.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.text: There isn't anything I don't eat, although I'm not too keen on creepy crawly things. Other than that, I'm quite adventurous. I like all types of red meat, and I'm not a fussy eater at all.
quotes.author: Cherie Lunghi

quotes.text: I'm not a fan of grilling meat, since that tends to dry it out, and I find grill marks leave a bitter taste. A good steak house will offer different options for preparation, and I would ask them to broil or pan-roast the steak and finish it with butter. It ends up a dark chocolate color and stays very juicy.
quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

quotes.text: Initially, my decision to stop eating meat was motivated by fear of spiritual consequences, but right away I found that not eating meat made me feel good about myself. It increased my self-esteem, which I found so rewarding, I wanted to do more.
quotes.author: Steve-O

quotes.text: You know, people think I named myself Meat Loaf, even though I didn't. And they think anyone who would name himself Meat Loaf couldn't have an IQ higher than four.
quotes.author: Meat Loaf

quotes.text: I've eaten sheep's eyes, the still hot meat from a zebra killed by a lion, and maggots which give you 70 calories to the ounce.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.text: I don't like to see animals in pain. That was very uncomfortable to me. I don't like factory farming. I'm not an advocate for the meat industry.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.text: The cheapest gadget - and you don't even have to spend a dime - is chopsticks from a Chinese restaurant. I use them for everything: to toss salads, to turn a piece of meat in the pan, to flip croquettes in the Fryolator, to whisk eggs for omelets, to stir eggs into fried rice when I make that for my daughters.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.text: From cheesecake on a stick to meat skewers to deep-fried bananas on a stick - there are no plates anymore. In Los Angeles, everything has become a corn dog. Actually, corn dogs still work. But most other food should be stickless.
quotes.author: Steve Carell

quotes.text: Where do thoroughbreds go after they lose one too many races, throw one too many riders, or develop a limp? Many thousands of thoroughbreds end up being slaughtered for horse meat. The unpleasant truth is horse meat is eaten in Europe and Asia.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.text: My dad's a doctor, and when I was 8, I went to one of his medical conferences where they were demonstrating laser surgery on a chicken. I was so mad that a chicken had to die, I never ate meat again.
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.text: The way to make the world a better place, through your eating, is simply to eat a bit less meat. Local is sometimes good, sometimes bad. But even when it's good, its environmental impact is relatively small compared to other possible improvements.
quotes.author: Tyler Cowen

quotes.text: Gravy is the simplest, tastiest, most memory-laden dish I know how to make: a little flour, salt and pepper, crispy bits of whatever meat anchored the meal, a couple of cups of water or milk and slow stirring to break up lumps.
quotes.author: Dorothy Allison

quotes.text: The thing that you're faulted on today is not that you are too tough, or not that you aren't careful. It's that you might have been too soft. People want that red meat now because you have to keep up with the mood and the mood today is harsh. It really is.
quotes.author: Mark Russell

quotes.text: I ate fantastic Italian food in Croatia, which you wouldn't expect. The food in Istanbul was amazing. I never would've expected that and the food, I guess you're learning something about me, the food in Prague, they're very, very heavy meat eaters, like, a lot of meat, which is great.
quotes.author: Cliff Curtis

quotes.text: The women who inspired this play deserved to be smacked across the head with a meat ax and that, I flatter myself, is exactly what I smacked them with.
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.text: I kill flies, I eat meat, you know, whatever.
quotes.author: Ethan Hawke

quotes.text: My character in 'Fresh Meat' is quite prim and tidy, and then I basically had no make-up for the whole shoot of 'Kidnap and Ransom' - apart from a bit of Vaseline to make me look even sweatier!
quotes.author: Kimberley Nixon

quotes.text: In any restaurant, my eyes alight first, as if by an atavistic pull, on the meat dishes on the menu. In any dinner party I throw, I think of the non-vegetarian dish as central. I view this as a combination of weakness, greed and moral failure. Someone please help.
quotes.author: Neel Mukherjee

quotes.text: A corpse is meat gone bad. Well and what's cheese? Corpse of milk.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.text: My father was an expert hunter, so we ate a lot of wild game when I was growing up in Montana. That helped broaden my palate generally, but I know it informed my distaste for factory farms and unspectacular commercial meat.
quotes.author: Steve Albini

quotes.text: If you get enough sleep, cut back on cigarettes and red meat, you look better the next day.
quotes.author: Robin Wright

quotes.text: Firstly, should we be selling and buying irradiated meat? I think that's up to the consumer, ultimately. But the second point is, this irradiated meat should be clearly and unmistakably labeled as irradiated meat.
quotes.author: Eric Schlosser

quotes.text: It occurred to me that I just didn't see how I could go ahead and continue to eat meat. It just seemed so... cannibalistic to me. And so, I'm a vegetarian, and I have been ever since.
quotes.author: Alice Paul

quotes.text: Divine right went out with the American Revolution and doesn't belong to the White House aides. What meat do they eat that makes them grow so great?
quotes.author: Sam Ervin

quotes.text: I don't eat red meat.
quotes.author: Waka Flocka Flame

quotes.text: I unfortunately still crave chicken McNuggets and bacon, which is the meat candy of the world.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.text: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.text: It's like Forrest Gump said, 'Life is like a box of chocolates.' Your career is like a box of chocolates - you never know what you're going to get. But everything you get is going to teach you something along the way and make you the person you are today. That's the exciting part - it's an adventure in itself.
quotes.author: Nick Carter

quotes.text: No matter what, people grow. If you chose not to grow, you're staying in a small box with a small mindset. People who win go outside of that box. It's very simple when you look at it.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.text: There's no better feeling in the world than a warm pizza box on your lap.
quotes.author: Kevin James

quotes.text: Deadlines refine the mind. They remove variables like exotic materials and processes that take too long. The closer the deadline, the more likely you'll start thinking waaay outside the box.
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.text: I was sort of traumatized by girls in the third grade. Because there was a girl in my third grade class I had a crush on. I bought her a box of Valentine's Day chocolate. And I put it in her cubby with a note that said something like, 'I am deeply in love with you, Your Secret Admirer.' And I didn't sign my name.
quotes.author: Steve Carell

quotes.text: When I was 5 years old, we had nothing in the village. One day, in front of my house, some soldiers in a big Cadillac started to do a picnic. I looked at them like they were coming from the moon. I remember they gave me a box of rice pudding - that, for me, was the American Dream.
quotes.author: Renzo Rosso

quotes.text: When it gets to the part in life where you're more afraid of what your wife is going to do to you than if you box, say, Mike Tyson, you've got to get a new profession. You don't get to be a family. I know why boxers never quit, some of them. They don't have wives.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.text: Thanks to my mother, not a single cardboard box has found its way back into society. We receive gifts in boxes from stores that went out of business twenty years ago.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: Don't believe the hype. I don't care how many number ones you have at the box office, I don't care how much they say you're great, don't believe it. Just stay in your lane and do what you're supposed to do.
quotes.author: Tyler Perry

quotes.text: People look at you, and they've got just the perfect little box for you, the perfect category. Call you a redneck. Call you a hillbilly. Like those were insults.
quotes.author: Travis Tritt

quotes.text: Actors do tend to get pigeonholed. People want to know who you are so they can put you in a box. It's lovely to be known for such diametrically opposite roles.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.text: I never liked apples. In fact, when I was a little girl, my mom wanted to give me apples in my lunch box and I would ask for green peppers. So bizarre... It's funny - I don't have an apple a day, but I can say that I have a few a week.
quotes.author: Lana Parrilla

quotes.text: I keep mementos from everything I've done. I've got my cab driver's license from 'Happiness.' I've got a pair of glasses and a belt buckle from playing John Lennon. I've got a pair of sunglasses from playing Andy Warhol... It's all in a box in the garage.
quotes.author: Jared Harris

quotes.text: I thought boxes were the best toy. When my parents got a new car, I ran to my mother and said, 'Did it come in a box?'
quotes.author: Colin Angle

quotes.text: You have to think outside the box! Can you imagine One Direction and Eminem?! That would be hilarious.
quotes.author: Niall Horan

quotes.text: People put me on a box, and I love when people think they know what I am capable of or not capable of. I thrive off of that.
quotes.author: T.I.

quotes.text: With the possible exception of things like box scores, race results, and stock market tabulations, there is no such thing as Objective Journalism. The phrase itself is a pompous contradiction in terms.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: If the boy and girl walk off into the sunset hand-in-hand in the last scene, it adds 10 million to the box office.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.text: I'll be more enthusiastic about encouraging thinking outside the box when there's evidence of any thinking going on inside it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: I always like to challenge myself. I never want to be put into a box.
quotes.author: Lionel Richie

quotes.text: You get inspiration from craziest places. It's just about being creative. You gotta step outside that box, you know what I'm saying, to reach the people. You never know who can feel it; who it can connect to.
quotes.author: Nayvadius Cash

quotes.text: Cancer is a great wake-up call. A call to take the tag off the new lingerie and wear that black lacy slip. To open the box of pearls and put them on. To crack open the bath oil beads before they shrivel up in a bowl on the toilet tank.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: Always keep your composure. You can't score from the penalty box; and to win, you have to score.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.text: I could party in a cardboard box with people who are funny and don't care. For me, it's really about who I surround myself with, so I just try to always be with hilarious people.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.text: From our broadcasting box you can't see any grass at all. It is simply a carpet of humanity.
quotes.author: Richie Benaud

quotes.text: I used to do the beat box. A friend of mine, he was the rapper and after, we'd be doing a block party or something or a house party, and he's gettin' all the attention and I'd end up with a handful of spit, you know, from doing the beats.
quotes.author: DMX

quotes.text: New Age is a very small box. It was a term that was brought in by the music industry to classify music that is neither jazz, classical, pop or rock. They didn't know what to call it or what to do with it. So they threw it all together under this one name.
quotes.author: Yanni

quotes.text: We love the ability of the people to influence the actions of decision-makers, of lawmakers and presidents to be removed from or elevated to office by the will of voters, and of the community to connect amongst diverse populations through the ballot box.
quotes.author: Charles B. Rangel

quotes.text: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.'
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.text: I think frugality drives innovation, just like other constraints do. One of the only ways to get out of a tight box is to invent your way out.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.text: Christians often want to hide behind the walls of the church, where we are comfortable, but sometimes we have to come out of the box.
quotes.author: Cheryl James

quotes.text: I think it's very comforting for people to put me in a box. 'Oh, she's a fluffy girlie girl who likes clothes and cupcakes. Oh, but wait, she is spending her weekends doing hardware electronics.'
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.text: The ballot box is the surest arbiter of disputes among free men.
quotes.author: James Buchanan

quotes.text: When we first broke into that forbidden box in the other dimension, we knew we had discovered something as surprising and powerful as the New World when Columbus came stumbling onto it.
quotes.author: Ken Kesey

quotes.text: If you've ever been to a poetry slam, you know that the highest scoring emotion is self-righteous indignation: how dare you judge me. So in that way, the poem, 'What Teachers Make,' is an absolutely formulaic slam poem designed to allow me to get up on my soap box and say, 'Let me tell you what really makes me angry.'
quotes.author: Taylor Mali

quotes.text: You know, Nirvana used to start rehearsals with the three of us just jamming. For, like, a half an hour, just noise and freeform crap - and usually it was crap. But sometimes things would come from it, and some songs on Nevermind came from that, and 'Heart Shaped Box' and stuff on 'In Utero' just happened that way.
quotes.author: Dave Grohl

quotes.text: Rap is really just too conventional. Everybody does the same thing. No one ever pushes the box.
quotes.author: Tyler, The Creator

quotes.text: Young man, young man, your arm's too short to box with God.
quotes.author: James Weldon Johnson

quotes.text: Life is like a box of crayons. Most people are the 8-color boxes, but what you're really looking for are the 64-color boxes with the sharpeners on the back. I fancy myself to be a 64-color box, though I've got a few missing.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.text: Hollywood is not known as a culture of grace. Dog-eat-dog is more like it. People love you one day and hate you the next. Personal value is very much attached to box office revenues and the unpredictable and often cruel winds of fashion.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.text: I've been saying for a couple of years now that people need to let God out of the Sunday morning box, that He doesn't want to just be with you for an hour or two on Sunday morning and then put back in His box to sit there until you have an emergency, but He wants to invade your Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: When I was a little kid we had a sand box. It was a quicksand box. I was an only child... eventually.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Some people keep God in a Sunday morning box and say, 'Hey, I did my religious duty.' That's fine, but the scripture says to pray without ceasing. And I think that means all through the day you're talking to God. Even if it's in your thoughts.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Nobody has ever before asked the nuclear family to live all by itself in a box the way we do. With no relatives, no support, we've put it in an impossible situation.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: It's fascinating that people, there's so many people now who will make judgments based on what you look like. I'm black. So I'm supposed to think a certain way. I'm supposed to have certain opinions. I don't do that. You don't create a box and put people in and then make a lot of generalizations about them.
quotes.author: Clarence Thomas

quotes.text: If you don't get out of the box you've been raised in, you won't understand how much bigger the world is.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.text: Anybody who can afford a box of business cards can afford a Web site. Any company with an 800 number can move its services to the Web for peanuts by comparison. The extreme case of corporate promotion is to strip away all other aspects of your business and sell goods or services via the Net alone, as amazon.com has done with books.
quotes.author: Nathan Myhrvold

quotes.text: By the way, intelligence to me isn't just being book-smart or having a college degree; it's trusting your gut instincts, being intuitive, thinking outside the box, and sometimes just realizing that things need to change and being smart enough to change it.
quotes.author: Tabatha Coffey

quotes.text: We should all feel confident in our intelligence. By the way, intelligence to me isn't just being book-smart or having a college degree; it's trusting your gut instincts, being intuitive, thinking outside the box, and sometimes just realizing that things need to change and being smart enough to change it.
quotes.author: Tabatha Coffey

quotes.text: So Pa sold the little house. He sold the cow and calf. He made hickory bows and fastened them upright to the wagon box. Ma helped him stretch white canvas over them.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.text: The creative act lasts but a brief moment, a lightning instant of give-and-take, just long enough for you to level the camera and to trap the fleeting prey in your little box.
quotes.author: Henri Cartier-Bresson

quotes.text: For me an object is something living. This cigarette or this box of matches contains a secret life much more intense than that of certain human beings.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.text: Venice is like eating an entire box of chocolate liqueurs in one go.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.text: My happiest memory of childhood was my first birthday in reform school. This teacher took an interest in me. In fact, he gave me the first birthday presents I ever got: a box of Cracker Jacks and a can of ABC shoe polish.
quotes.author: Flip Wilson

quotes.text: Kids can learn a lot about necessities and wants by recognizing what people live without. A common routine, but one that should not be overlooked, is having a family donation to a charity for those less fortunate. Ask your kids to search for items, toys, or clothes that they no longer use and contribute those items a collection box.
quotes.author: Alexa Von Tobel

quotes.text: If I give five flops, I won't get a job. You have to perform at the box office when you are at the top. No one is running a charity here. People are putting huge amounts of money to make movies, and they want the films to be successful. They have invested money in you, so it is your duty to make sure the film does well.
quotes.author: Abhishek Bachchan

quotes.text: I have a big box of autographs. I took photographs of me and Marlene Dietrich, me and Ida Lupino. I took pictures of Myrna Loy and Joel McCrea in front of the studios. I loved Hollywood. I have 500 autographs and 500 photographs I took.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: My mother was keen that I complete my graduation and never ever wanted me to be in the movies, as my father had made five films that lost money. One of the films he made was 'Agneepath,' which was hugely hyped but underwhelming at the box office, and I remember that my dad had to sell my grandmother's flat to pay off the loan.
quotes.author: Karan Johar

quotes.text: Obviously, sometimes I just feel like looking like a box of crayons.
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.text: If you want an interesting party sometime, combine cocktails and a fresh box of crayons for everyone.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.text: When you take an Android device out of the box, you have to sign up to nine accounts with different vendors to get the experience iOS comes with.
quotes.author: Phil Schiller

quotes.text: Pay attention, don't let life go by you. Fall in love with the back of your cereal box.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: Lana Turner was adorable and funny. Jimmy Stewart was such a nice person. I quickly realized that if you're not a nice person, you're not going to last in this business. I mean, once your box office starts to drop off, like Veronica Lake, they'll get rid of you fast.
quotes.author: Robert Osborne

quotes.text: I'm not cynical about marriage or romance. I enjoyed being married. And although being single was fun for a while, there was always the risk of dating someone who'd owned a lunch box with my picture on it.
quotes.author: Shaun Cassidy

quotes.text: We're so quick to go to make things black and white, and to put things in their box. But everything is this mixture - and that's what this world is - is this blend of different things.
quotes.author: Matisyahu

quotes.text: I look at people like Picasso and Da Vinci and Escher and Miles Davis, and they'll write or paint that one definitive masterpiece of maybe 50 that they have that's really trying to go outside the box, trying to do something that's tough. And then when you accomplish it, you look back and go, 'Yeeaaaah - masterpiece.'
quotes.author: Lupe Fiasco

quotes.text: I sometimes forget to have breakfast in the morning, but when I actually buy a box of cereal, I will probably eat it not only for breakfast but also as a snack later on.
quotes.author: Ryan Gosling

quotes.text: I'll shout it if they want: Down with isms! Up with a Left that is capable of thinking outside the box! In other words, I am more than completely cured of simplifications, of dividing the world into good and evil, of thinking in black and white. I have repented!
quotes.author: Jose Mujica

quotes.text: I grew up in Westlake Villiage, a suburb of L.A. There was a guy there who was a fighter and was like, 'I'll teach you to box.' I started a little bit of boxing, then it crossed over into jiu-jitsu. I was into it for a little while, but then I started doing basketball, baseball, team sports.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lipnicki

quotes.text: Who would have thought that a tap-dancing penguin would outpoint James Bond at the box office? And deserve to? Not that there's anything wrong with 'Casino Royale.' But 'Happy Feet' - written and directed by George Miller - is a complete charmer, even if, in the way of most family fare, it can't resist straying into the Inspirational.
quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

quotes.text: Before now, I've always taken my mixes out to the car and listened to them in the parking lot. I still do that, but more so now I'm listening to it on the Beat box, and I think people should give it at least a listen and check it out and see what it is.
quotes.author: Dr. Dre

quotes.text: I guess I'd like to be known for being an innovator, fostering creativity, thinking outside the box. You know, keeping people playful.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.text: The toughest thing in hitting shouldn't be deciding when to swing. It is, for me, deciding when not to swing. You should be swinging from the time you get into the batter's box until something says don't swing.
quotes.author: Chili Davis

quotes.text: It's funny because I remember when I came to the U.S. with 'Swimming Pool,' the movie did well, and it was great box office for a French movie, but I remember I was a bit upset because all people talked to me about was the nudity.
quotes.author: Ludivine Sagnier

quotes.text: I was riding dirt bikes when I was a little kid. I got my first Harley Davidson when I was 17 years old. It was a frame with wheels and a tank on it and all the parts in a box.
quotes.author: David Labrava

quotes.text: We know that no algorithm can solve global poverty; no pill can cure a chronic illness; no box of chocolates can mend a broken relationship; no educational DVD can transform a child into a baby Einstein; no drone strike can end a terrorist conflict. Sadly, there is no such thing as 'One Tip to a Flat Stomach.'
quotes.author: Carl Honore

quotes.text: Indian culture certainly gives the Indian mind, including the mind of the Indian scientist, the ability to think out of the box.
quotes.author: Roland Joffe

quotes.text: I used to save all my rejection slips because I told myself, one day I'm going to autograph these and auction them. And then I lost the box.
quotes.author: James Lee Burke

quotes.text: You know, people call mystery novels or thrillers 'puzzles.' I never understood that, because when I buy a puzzle, I already know what it is. It's on the box. And even if I don't, if it's a 5,000-piece puzzle of the 'Mona Lisa', it's not like I put the last piece in and go, 'I had no idea it's the 'Mona Lisa'!'
quotes.author: Harlan Coben

quotes.text: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Cakes are special. Every birthday, every celebration ends with something sweet, a cake, and people remember. It's all about the memories.
quotes.author: Buddy Valastro

quotes.text: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.text: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
quotes.author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quotes.text: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.text: Good night, good night! Parting is such sweet sorrow, that I shall say good night till it be morrow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Let us celebrate the occasion with wine and sweet words.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.text: If you don't think your anxiety, depression, sadness and stress impact your physical health, think again. All of these emotions trigger chemical reactions in your body, which can lead to inflammation and a weakened immune system. Learn how to cope, sweet friend. There will always be dark days.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.text: Love planted a rose, and the world turned sweet.
quotes.author: Katharine Lee Bates

quotes.text: What's in a name? That which we call a rose by any other name would smell as sweet.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: It is the sweet, simple things of life which are the real ones after all.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.text: Through Love all that is bitter will be sweet, Through Love all that is copper will be gold, Through Love all dregs will become wine, through Love all pain will turn to medicine.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.text: I think the girl who is able to earn her own living and pay her own way should be as happy as anybody on earth. The sense of independence and security is very sweet.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.text: O wise man! Give your wealth only to the worthy and never to others. The water of the sea received by the clouds is always sweet.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: It is weird. People will say, 'Oh my God, I love you.' And I'll say, 'Oh, that's so sweet. Thank you.' And the people who are walking around with me for the first time will say, 'I don't understand what happened. Somebody just told you they love you. I don't even understand what that means.'
quotes.author: Cheryl Hines

quotes.text: I believe we are still so innocent. The species are still so innocent that a person who is apt to be murdered believes that the murderer, just before he puts the final wrench on his throat, will have enough compassion to give him one sweet cup of water.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: The soul of sweet delight, can never be defiled.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: When all the world appears to be in a tumult, and nature itself is feeling the assault of climate change, the seasons retain their essential rhythm. Yes, fall gives us a premonition of winter, but then, winter, will be forced to relent, once again, to the new beginnings of soft greens, longer light, and the sweet air of spring.
quotes.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quotes.text: Literature is my Utopia. Here I am not disenfranchised. No barrier of the senses shuts me out from the sweet, gracious discourses of my book friends. They talk to me without embarrassment or awkwardness.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Chocolate is not cheating! After a salty meal, you need a little bit of sweet. This is living, not cheating.
quotes.author: Ali Landry

quotes.text: A poet is a nightingale, who sits in darkness and sings to cheer its own solitude with sweet sounds.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.text: Must is a hard nut to crack, but it has a sweet kernel.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: The love of learning, the sequestered nooks, And all the sweet serenity of books.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: How sweet it is to learn the Savior's love when nobody else loves us! When friends flee, what a blessed thing it is to see that the Savior does not forsake us but still keeps us and holds us fast and clings to us and will not let us go!
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Blueberries, strawberries and blackberries are true super foods. Naturally sweet and juicy, berries are low in sugar and high in nutrients - they are among the best foods you can eat.
quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

quotes.text: The body of a dead enemy always smells sweet.
quotes.author: Titus Flavius Vespasian

quotes.text: Being able to breathe underwater would be sweet.
quotes.author: Cameron Bright

quotes.text: The man that hath no music in himself, Nor is not moved with concord of sweet sounds, is fit for treasons, stratagems and spoils.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: My dream is to become a farmer. Just a Bohemian guy pulling up his own sweet potatoes for dinner.
quotes.author: Lenny Kravitz

quotes.text: Justice is sweet and musical; but injustice is harsh and discordant.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Sweet April showers do spring May flowers.
quotes.author: Thomas Tusser

quotes.text: I just want to say, good night, sweet prince, may flights of angels sing thee to thy rest.
quotes.author: Harry Dean Stanton

quotes.text: I have a horrible sweet tooth. It's gotten to the point where if I throw a cookie in the garbage, I have to douse it in Cascade. Otherwise, why wouldn't I take it out and eat it?
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.text: The most appealing thing to me about food is combining and layering flavors, tastes, and textures. So the perfect sandwich has to be toasted. It has to have Emmenthal Swiss cheese and a combination of sweet and savory - some cranberry or fig thing happening - with different kinds of meats like Black Forest ham and roast beef.
quotes.author: Kyle MacLachlan

quotes.text: The truth is that life is delicious, horrible, charming, frightful, sweet, bitter, and that is everything.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: My grandmother taught me how to make the basic pate brise pastry crust when I was young. The one thing I learned simply by eating her endless variations on delicious tarts for dinner every night is that this dough can be used for just about anything - sweet or savory.
quotes.author: Jean-Georges Vongerichten

quotes.text: But his kiss was so sweet, and so closely he pressed, that I languished and pined till I granted the rest.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.text: Softball has given me so much in life. It's taught me the kind of person I want to be, and given me a sweet sisterhood. It even led me to my husband.
quotes.author: Jennie Finch

quotes.text: When I was blonde I was perceived as an innocent and sweet young girl.
quotes.author: Samantha Mathis

quotes.text: But when women are moved and lend help, when women, who are by nature calm and controlled, give encouragement and applause, when virtuous and knowledgeable women grace the endeavor with their sweet love, then it is invincible.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.text: I have some sweets now and then, but I wouldn't say I have a major sweet tooth.
quotes.author: Larry Fitzgerald

quotes.text: How cruelly sweet are the echoes that start, When memory plays an old tune on the heart.
quotes.author: Eliza Cook

quotes.text: I'm a golfer, and what are the two sports you can do till you drop? Golf and surfing. They're great for you limber-wise, they're great for you health-wise, and they put you in sweet locations.
quotes.author: Matthew McConaughey

quotes.text: I'm not a big drinking person and hardly ever have alcohol. Perhaps it's not sweet enough for my sweet tooth.
quotes.author: Dawn French

quotes.text: I've spent a lot of Thanksgivings on the road with my band, so anytime that I can spend Thanksgiving with my family in a traditional aspect, eating sweet potatoes and cranberries and stuffing and all the trappings of Thanksgiving and then get on a treadmill the next day extra long, I'm happy.
quotes.author: Richie Sambora

quotes.text: The rewards of freedom are always sweet, but its demands are stern, for at its heart is the paradox that the greatest enemy of freedom is freedom.
quotes.author: Os Guinness

quotes.text: No, there's nothing half so sweet in life as love's young dream.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.text: There is a dessert dish in Austria called Kaiserschmarrn - it's kind of like a sweet raisin pancake with eggs and sugar. It's definitely not something I can eat often, but if I've done well at a race, sometimes that's my celebration treat!
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: All that's bright must fade, The brightest still the fleetest; All that's sweet was made But to be lost when sweetest.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.text: Why don't women have respect for themselves nowadays? What happen to the woman who learned her grandmama's recipes and made her man sweet potato pie? I tell you, they don't make 'em like they used to. Will my real women stand up, please?
quotes.author: Brandon T. Jackson

quotes.text: There is nothing as sweet as a comeback, when you are down and out, about to lose, and out of time.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: I'm blonde and tanned and normal-sized! I'm sweet, shy, funny, have a big heart and I'm nice - and I like to eat.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: Being able to breathe underwater would be sweet. There is so much life underneath the water that we don't know about. I would love to check out the bottom of the ocean to see what's going on down there.
quotes.author: Cameron Bright

quotes.text: I have a girl crush on Rachel Bilson. She's so cute, I just want to put her in my pocket. I love her style, and I'm fascinated by everything she wears, and I think she's a really sweet and kind person. She's cute. I like her.
quotes.author: Alexandra Chando

quotes.text: Heard melodies are sweet, but those unheard are sweeter.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.text: Sweet mercy is nobility's true badge.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: We engineered activity out of our lives in the name of convenience. We created foods that put fried, fatty, sweet, and salty ahead of fresh, natural, and healthy. We quickly sacrifice sleep to work longer hours in pursuit of the American Dream. Even when we do these things with good intentions, they have life-threatening consequences.
quotes.author: Tom Rath

quotes.text: I've always got a sweet tooth. I have chocolate hidden in places that nobody knows about.
quotes.author: Tony McCoy

quotes.text: The thing about playing percussion is that you can create all these emotions that can be sometimes beautiful, sometimes really ugly, or sometimes sweet, sometimes as big as King Kong and so on. And so there can be a real riot out there, or it can be so refined.
quotes.author: Evelyn Glennie

quotes.text: You've got a movie where the pro-choice family gives their daughter no choice. The pro-life family murders. What seems to be the good mother, the kind of hippie painter, sweet and cute mother has no love for her daughter really.
quotes.author: Ellen Barkin

quotes.text: Success is sweet and sweeter if long delayed and gotten through many struggles and defeats.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.text: I am an old geezer: a grandpa kind of a guy. I was born October 19, 1931. I have gray hair, a beard, and a little pot belly. I have two children who are over 30 years old and a sweet little granddaughter who is 11 years old.
quotes.author: Ed Emberley

quotes.text: They wrote in the old days that it is sweet and fitting to die for one's country. But in modern war, there is nothing sweet nor fitting in your dying. You will die like a dog for no good reason.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: If there were no night, we would not appreciate the day, nor could we see the stars and the vastness of the heavens. We must partake of the bitter with the sweet. There is a divine purpose in the adversities we encounter every day. They prepare, they purge, they purify, and thus they bless.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.text: Why can't you share your bed? The most loving thing to do is to share your bed with someone. It's very charming. It's very sweet. It's what the whole world should do.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.text: Happy is the man whom the Muses love: sweet speech flows from his mouth.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.text: The river flows at its own sweet will, but the flood is bound in the two banks. If it were not thus bound, its freedom would be wasted.
quotes.author: Vinoba Bhave

quotes.text: When you love a man, he becomes more than a body. His physical limbs expand, and his outline recedes, vanishes. He is rich and sweet and right. He is part of the world, the atmosphere, the blue sky and the blue water.
quotes.author: Gwendolyn Brooks

quotes.text: There comes a moment on a journey when something sweet, something irresistible and charming as wine raised to thirsty lips, wells up in the traveller's being.
quotes.author: Patrick MacGill

quotes.text: Beauty, sweet love, is like the morning dew, Whose short refresh upon tender green, Cheers for a time, but till the sun doth show And straight is gone, as it had never been.
quotes.author: Samuel Daniel

quotes.text: Sweet are the uses of adversity which, like the toad, ugly and venomous, wears yet a precious jewel in his head.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: When you're a girl, you have to be everything, You have to be dope at what you do, but you have to be super sweet, and you have to be sexy, and you have to be this and you have to be that and you have to be nice, and you have to - it's like, I can't be all of those things at once. I'm a human being.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.text: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.text: Humility, that low, sweet root, from which all heavenly virtues shoot.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.text: Nobody had ever told me junk food was bad for me. Four years of medical school, and four years of internship and residency, and I never thought anything was wrong with eating sweet rolls and doughnuts, and potatoes, and bread, and sweets.
quotes.author: Robert Atkins

quotes.text: Very few people possess true artistic ability. It is therefore both unseemly and unproductive to irritate the situation by making an effort. If you have a burning, restless urge to write or paint, simply eat something sweet and the feeling will pass.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.text: My most memorable meal is every Thanksgiving. I love the food: the turkey and stuffing; the sweet potatoes and rice, which come from my mother's Southern heritage; the mashed potatoes, which come from my wife's Midwestern roots; the Campbell's green-bean casserole; and of course, pumpkin pie.
quotes.author: Douglas Conant

quotes.text: I love to eat sushi, and, you know, those flavors and wasabi and really eating spoonfuls of it... I would just mix it and put it on everything, literally.
quotes.author: David Chang

quotes.text: Sometimes sushi is just superb, and other times there's nothing like a great big steak. It depends where your taste buds are at the time.
quotes.author: Francesca Annis

quotes.text: I don't discriminate against sushi. It's all good in my book.
quotes.author: Billy Horschel

quotes.text: In general I love to eat anything. I enjoy anything that is well prepared, a good spaghetti, lasagna, taco, steak, sushi, refried beans.
quotes.author: Martin Yan

quotes.text: Sushi is something very exclusive. It is not like a McDonald's, not like a hot dog, not like a French fry. It's very high-class cooking in Japan.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: When I was a kid, I have two dreams. I want to be a baseball player. Hometown, Hiroshima, has a Japanese baseball franchise team called Hiroshima Carps. You know, and then I want to be a sushi chef. I want to make own restaurant - sushi restaurant.
quotes.author: Masaharu Morimoto

quotes.text: L.A., it's nice, but I think of sunshine and people on rollerblades eating sushi. New York, I think of nighttime, I think of Times Square and Broadway and nightlife and the city that never sleeps.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.text: Tuesday nights are sushi nights, so we go out then.
quotes.author: Al Roker

quotes.text: I keep my diet simple by sticking to mostly fruits and vegetables all day and then having whatever I want for dinner. I end up making healthy choices, like sushi or grilled fish, because I feel so good from eating well.
quotes.author: Jennifer Morrison

quotes.text: I'm obsessed with sushi.
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.text: I am a dichotomy of tastes. I'm big on water, and I do a protein drink in the morning, but then I eat off the kids' menu after that. So, there's only like six foods I like. I like quesadillas. I like hamburgers. I like sushi. I like pizza, PB&J, or breakfast any time of the day.
quotes.author: Brad D. Smith

quotes.text: I think that without sushi there would be no David Hasselhoff, because sushi is like the perfect way of describing the insides of David Hasselhoff. He is like a protein, clean and easy. That's how I feel about myself.
quotes.author: David Hasselhoff

quotes.text: I love sushi. But after too much of it, it just starts to taste like a dead animal that hasn't been cooked.
quotes.author: Amy Lee
