quotes.text: You could eat sushi off my bookshelf. My cleaning regime is like a battleground. I'm Genghis Khan and my cleaning products are my Mongolian army and I take no prisoners. The rest of my life is an experiment in chaos so I like to keep my flat neat.
quotes.author: Ryan Adams

quotes.text: I love Chinese food, like steamed dim sum, and I can have noodles morning, noon and night, hot or cold. I like food that's very simple on the digestive system - I tend to keep it light. I love Japanese food too - sushi, sashimi and miso soup.
quotes.author: Shilpa Shetty

quotes.text: Facebook is uniquely positioned to answer questions that people have, like, what sushi restaurants have my friends gone to in New York lately and liked? These are queries you could potentially do with Facebook that you couldn't do with anything else, we just have to do it.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.text: Don't dunk your nigiri in the soy sauce. Don't mix your wasabi in the soy sauce. If the rice is good, complement your sushi chef on the rice.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.text: Making sushi is an art, and experience is everything.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: Kids are now eating things like edamame and sushi. I didn't know what shiitake mushrooms were when I was 10 - most kids today do.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.text: I've sat in sushi bars, really fine ones, and I know how hard this guy worked, how proud he is. I know you don't need sauce. I know he doesn't even want you to pour sauce. And I've seen customers come in and do that, and I've seen him, as stoic as he tries to remain, I've seen him die a little inside.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.text: I have to say, sushi freaks me out more than almost anything.
quotes.author: Kate Beckinsale

quotes.text: California is an unbelievable state. One day I might be in a spiritual place like Joshua Tree, then before I know it, I'm eating groovy sushi in a mini-mall. I'm a Cali girl through and through.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: I'm a big fish eater. Salmon - I love salmon. My sister loves Chinese food and sushi and all that. I'm not as big of a fan, but she likes it so we eat it a lot. So I'm beginning to like it more. I don't like the raw sushi. I liked the cooked crab and lobster and everything.
quotes.author: Elle Fanning

quotes.text: I'm not making art, I'm making sushi.
quotes.author: Masaharu Morimoto

quotes.text: Jiro Ono serves Edo-style traditional sushi, the same 20 or 30 pieces he's been making his whole life, and he's still unsatisfied with the quality and every day wakes up and trains to make the best. And that is as close to a religious experience in food as one is likely to get.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.text: The fine art of preparing sushi is something that you watch and learn.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: There is something that has become part of my routine that I eat two or three times a week. Sushi. It exists in Europe but isn't very popular, and especially in L.A., I started eating it. It's both tasty and healthy.
quotes.author: Marko Jaric

quotes.text: I love sushi. Once on Valentine's Day, someone I was dating rocked up at the airport to pick me up with a bag of salmon because I love it so much.
quotes.author: Ella Eyre

quotes.text: I do have very high customer service standards - I'd send back sushi because it's too fishy.
quotes.author: Greg McHugh

quotes.text: With sushi, it is all about balance. Sometimes they cut the fish too thick, sometimes too thin. Often the rice is overcooked or undercooked. Not enough rice vinegar or too much.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: You know how kids dream of being soccer players or actors? Well, my dream was to be a sushi chef.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: I want a house with a garden, but slap bang in the centre of London. Next door to a sushi bar.
quotes.author: Michelle Dockery

quotes.text: One of my favorite things to make is homemade sushi. I know how to make the rolls and it's really fun to do.
quotes.author: Carly Rae Jepsen

quotes.text: I always thought that bagels and lox was my soul food, but it turns out it's sushi.
quotes.author: Sara Sheridan

quotes.text: For dinner I want real sushi - not the Americanized kind. My parents are American Samoan so I don't go for any of those rolls. I'll have raw prawn or sea urchin or octopus. I love it.
quotes.author: Junior Seau

quotes.text: I love eating sushi and eating raw and clean - no pasta and bread. Low carbs is what works for me.
quotes.author: Christine Teigen

quotes.text: After Nashville sushi and a long debate on Bob Dylan, we went into Woodland Studios at 10 pm that night for a look around, and jammed for 5 hours solid.
quotes.author: Robyn Hitchcock

quotes.text: In LA, I live on sushi or salad.
quotes.author: Denise Van Outen

quotes.text: I've been making sushi for 38 years, and I'm still learning. You have to consider the size and color of the ingredients, how much salt and vinegar to use and how the seasons affect the fattiness of the fish.
quotes.author: Masaharu Morimoto

quotes.text: I love macaroni and cheese. I could eat it every meal of the day. It used to be sushi, but these days I cannot stop eating mac and cheese. I haven't had it from a box in a long time, but I'll make it homemade style with four types of cheeses, lots of milk, maybe a little ketchup. I don't know, I'm crazy like that.
quotes.author: Cobie Smulders

quotes.text: A good plate of sushi after an opening helps to soothe that post-opening blues - especially since you feel like raw meat yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Drain

quotes.text: Aphorisms are food for thought - like sushi, they come in small portions that are both delicious and exquisitely formed. And, like sushi, I can never get enough.
quotes.author: James Geary

quotes.text: I love big shrimp, like Japanese botan shrimp and the meaty ones from Santa Barbara, Calif. In classic Japanese cooking, shrimp like these would be dropped into a broth or boiled as served with sushi. But I think boiling dilutes their great flavor, and they are better when stir-fried.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: In my generation, there was no sushi school, no cooking school, so people have to learn from working.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: One student was mixing my yoga up with other kinds, and I said, 'No, you cannot do that.' You cannot put calamari in the sushi and call it sushi.
quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

quotes.text: I remember my first acting class: I was like, 'That's it.' If I know that I want to do something then I'm going to do it and there's no stopping me, whether it's if I want to take a movie part or don't, or eat sushi for lunch or don't. There's always a very clear goal. Once I figure out what I want that's it.
quotes.author: Ashley Greene

quotes.text: I think I've grown up in a mixed environment, and maybe a lot of the time I haven't really belonged anywhere in the way I've dreamt of belonging to, you know, living on the street and playing to all the kids on the street, growing up together. I suppose 'Raw Like Sushi' was a place where all of those things could come together.
quotes.author: Neneh Cherry

quotes.text: When 'Raw Like Sushi' came out in the U.S., I wasn't considered to be black enough. They didn't really know where to put me. The music wasn't 'black black' sounding. It wasn't R&B; it wasn't straight up hip-hop, although obviously in that dimension and world.
quotes.author: Neneh Cherry

quotes.text: You come to these thresholds in your life where you need to remember why you do what you do, to reconnect with yourself. When I look back at something like 'Raw Like Sushi,' I think I was very much in the right place at the right time.
quotes.author: Neneh Cherry

quotes.text: You know, there are times when you play a song over and over and over and you get a little tired of it and you let it sit for a while. It's like, you may love eating sushi, but if you eat it every single day, you're going to get a little tired of it.
quotes.author: Les Claypool

quotes.text: I like teff, an Ethiopian grain. It's not so popular in the States yet, but it's really good, almost like a porridge. And I love sushi, but it's not always that healthy, so I don't keep it at home.
quotes.author: Landon Donovan

quotes.text: Right after I graduated high school, I joined a sushi restaurant to learn how to make Japanese food. And then spent seven years. Then that time - that's enough. Then sushi restaurant - butchering fish and they make your body smell like fishy.
quotes.author: Masaharu Morimoto

quotes.text: Although, I didn't really like sushi until I moved out to L.A.
quotes.author: Scott Wolf

quotes.text: I'm always interested in finding the new trend. If you love pizza every day, after 22 years of eating pizza, you want to try sushi.
quotes.author: Jean Pigozzi

quotes.text: The first time I had sushi, I hated it. And the second time was no different, and then, I just started loving it. I actually crave for sushi. It's one of the healthiest meals. My experiments with food began when I was working in New York as an architect, be it Korean or Ethiopian food or fusion food.
quotes.author: Riteish Deshmukh

quotes.text: Eating a tuna roll at a sushi restaurant should be considered no more environmentally benign than driving a Hummer or harpooning a manatee.
quotes.author: Daniel Pauly

quotes.text: I play golf, but sometimes it's so un-relaxing, I have to play tennis to wind down. Now that I think about it, this process is sort of like when I go out for sushi and have to get a slice of pizza afterward.
quotes.author: Adam Ross

quotes.text: In Japanese sushi restaurants, a lot of sushi chefs talk too much.
quotes.author: Masa Takayama

quotes.text: I love sushi, though I just read something about how you shouldn't eat sushi more than once a week.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Obradors

quotes.text: I love lean meats like chicken, turkey. I'm obsessed with sushi and fish in general. I eat a lot of veggies and hummus.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.text: I had eel at a sushi bar once; it's disgusting. I thought it was chicken. It looked like chicken. It was brown and looked delicious, and I was like, 'That looks safe.' It wasn't.
quotes.author: Chris Evans

quotes.text: I think I might become a pescatarian. I love sushi, couldn't give it up.
quotes.author: Victoria Pendleton

quotes.text: Sushi is my favorite thing to do in L.A.
quotes.author: Liam Hemsworth

quotes.text: I'm quite happy having stuff like quinoa, sushi, and even vegetable juices.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.text: A sushi chef has to spot the best-quality fresh fish instantly.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: Every year, I do a New Year's day party at my home. I invite my staff and my friends and their kids. Around 40-50 people come by, and I do a barbecue and salads, steak and sushi, and also lots of cheese.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: When I was 11 or 12 - a young boy in Japan - one of my older brothers took me to a sushi restaurant. I had never been to one, and it was very memorable. Back then, sushi was expensive and hard to come by, not like today, when there's a sushi restaurant on every street corner and you can buy it in supermarkets.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.text: I don't eat sushi, but I eat cooked meat.
quotes.author: Drake Bell

quotes.text: I don't like venison or sushi - I don't want to eat what some people think are 'luxurious' foods.
quotes.author: Courteney Cox

quotes.text: I've always worked with my partner, my husband, Cameron, since 'Raw Like Sushi,' and in a way, I feel very free with what I do, but he also has an amazing insight in having intuitions that tend to be right a lot of the time, about where we should go next.
quotes.author: Neneh Cherry

quotes.text: I literally order sushi, watch 'Law & Order,' and go to sleep at 9 o'clock every night. I'm a grandmother.
quotes.author: Bella Hadid

quotes.text: I'm not a big chicken or meat eater, but sometimes I'll eat it if it's locally raised. The family dinner will be stir-fry, or we'll roll our own sushi with brown rice, spinach, salmon, sesame oil, sesame seeds, and seaweed. The kids love it!
quotes.author: Alysia Reiner

quotes.text: Sushi is one of my favorite foods.
quotes.author: Dylan Penn

quotes.text: Asking Siri where the nearest sushi bar is - that's not interesting. What's interesting is asking your phone where one of your friends have last had dinner in the neighborhood, or having it recommend a cool paella place in Barcelona because it knows you eat paella all the time at home.
quotes.author: Dennis Crowley

quotes.text: Think of the sushi trend that started in the '80s. It was as much about the Nintendo entertainment system in your living room as it was about the availability of good-quality raw fish. The Japanese food trend rose as the world of Japanese business and culture was becoming a bigger part of American life.
quotes.author: David Sax

quotes.text: It's better to spend a lot on a getup you love than a fraction of that on something, or even five of those somethings, that you'll never bother to take out of the shopping bag. By the way, this advice also applies to discount love interests. And half-price sushi.
quotes.author: Patricia Marx

quotes.text: You'll always find me at a good sushi spot. Once, at a restaurant, a cook came out from the kitchen and asked for a picture with me. That was flattering.
quotes.author: Charlotte McKinney

quotes.text: I've actually always been a big fan of seafood. Sushi is one my favorite things.
quotes.author: Alexander Gould

quotes.text: Mexican, Mediterranean, Italian, sushi, I love it all. Put it on a plate, and as long as I know what it is, I will eat it.
quotes.author: Camren Bicondova

quotes.text: I was afraid of Korean food when I moved to L.A., let alone sushi. I remember thinking either sink or swim. Living here in Studio City, Ventura Blvd. is the Mecca of sushi restaurants. What you thought was so exotic is just run of the mill.
quotes.author: Parvesh Cheena

quotes.text: Cakes are special. Every birthday, every celebration ends with something sweet, a cake, and people remember. It's all about the memories.
quotes.author: Buddy Valastro

quotes.text: When autumn darkness falls, what we will remember are the small acts of kindness: a cake, a hug, an invitation to talk, and every single rose. These are all expressions of a nation coming together and caring about its people.
quotes.author: Jens Stoltenberg

quotes.text: If you look over the years, the styles have changed - the clothes, the hair, the production, the approach to the songs. The icing to the cake has changed flavors. But if you really look at the cake itself, it's really the same.
quotes.author: John Oates

quotes.text: Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: If you're trying to create a company, it's like baking a cake. You have to have all the ingredients in the right proportion.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: All the world is birthday cake, so take a piece, but not too much.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.text: You know you're getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.text: Vegetables are a must on a diet. I suggest carrot cake, zucchini bread, and pumpkin pie.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.text: My policy on cake is pro having it and pro eating it.
quotes.author: Boris Johnson

quotes.text: I had a little epiphany when I was a writer at 'Chicago' magazine. I sat down to dinner at the Ritz-Carlton. Somebody poured a white dessert wine with chocolate cake. It was a wine I would never have expected to make sense. The idea of any wine tasting fabulous with chocolate cake was fascinating to me.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.text: The great thing about cake is it doesn't feel like work. You forget about work. Kids, adults, they all get the same look in their eye when they're decorating cakes... That's the magic right there.
quotes.author: Duff Goldman

quotes.text: Most recently, I learned another hobby: baking. It's so much fun to mix all the ingredients and to see the cake come out nice. It's so rewarding when the cake comes out great and tastes great.
quotes.author: Yani Tseng

quotes.text: Would ye both eat your cake and have your cake?
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.text: I got my training here in Chicago at the Goodman School Of Drama, and a lot of my personal work is usually internal work and stuff. Everything else that goes on is icing on the cake - your wardrobe, your makeup, whatever else you have to do.
quotes.author: Michael Rooker

quotes.text: We have always said that advertising is just the icing on the cake. It is not the cake.
quotes.author: Meg Whitman

quotes.text: I like birthday cake. It's so symbolic. It's a tempting symbol to load with something more complicated than just 'Happy birthday!' because it's this emblem of childhood and a happy day.
quotes.author: Aimee Bender

quotes.text: A cake is a very good test of an oven: if it browns too much on one side and not on the other, it's not your fault - you need to have your oven checked.
quotes.author: Delia Smith

quotes.text: A lot of movies are about life, mine are like a slice of cake.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.text: The main prank that we play with props is for people's birthdays. The special effects people will put a little explosive in the cake so it blows up in their face - that's always fun to play on a guest star, or one of the trainees or someone who's new.
quotes.author: Catherine Bell

quotes.text: I wanted to be the next Dana Carvey. This was my ultimate goal. If I ever cut into a birthday cake and made a wish, I would wish to be on 'Saturday Night Live.' If I threw a coin into a fountain, I would wish to be on 'Saturday Night Live.' If I saw a shooting star, I would wish to be on 'Saturday Night Live.'
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.text: I think there's something about the homemade birthday cake, because my wife, on my daughter's first birthday, started the tradition where she takes a full cake and cuts the number birthday out of it.
quotes.author: Willie Geist

quotes.text: It's very easy to confuse Sean Connery with James Bond. Sometimes in the entertainment industry, people believe the cake is more real than the baker.
quotes.author: Judd Nelson

quotes.text: I love eating chocolate cake and ice cream after a show. I almost justify it in my mind as, 'You were a good boy onstage and you did your show, so now you can have some cake and ice cream.'
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: The film is made in the editing room. The shooting of the film is about shopping, almost. It's like going to get all the ingredients together, and you've got to make sure before you leave the store that you got all the ingredients. And then you take those ingredients and you can make a good cake - or not.
quotes.author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quotes.text: Part of life and part of the enjoyment of life is a croissant and a chocolate cake and eggs and milkshakes and oatmeal. There's so many things, you have to learn to appreciate it all. When I don't eat as much as I should, I'm not fun to be around; I'm fussy.
quotes.author: Nina Dobrev

quotes.text: A bad review is like baking a cake with all the best ingredients and having someone sit on it.
quotes.author: Danielle Steel

quotes.text: Like a lot of kids, I had a Superman cake or different theme cakes, but then I hit the age where I think my mom thought I was ready for the German chocolate cake that she makes for my dad. Just the sight of that, the taste of that frosting, just reminds me of being at home with my mom and my dad and my sister and my friends.
quotes.author: Willie Geist

quotes.text: You know you're getting old when you get that one candle on the cake. It's like, 'See if you can blow this out.'
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: For me, the cinema is not a slice of life, but a piece of cake.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.text: Let them eat cake.
quotes.author: Marie Antoinette

quotes.text: People have often asked me whether what I know about love has spoiled it for me. And I just simply say, 'Hardly.' You can know every single ingredient in a piece of chocolate cake, and then when you sit down and eat that cake, you can still feel that joy.
quotes.author: Helen Fisher

quotes.text: The three of us just try put our heads down and stay creative. The awards truly are just cake. It's one of those things that you never expect, but getting the head nod from either the fans or your peers, that's the ultimate compliment.
quotes.author: Hillary Scott

quotes.text: I got up one Christmas morning and we didn't have nothing to eat. We didn't have an apple, we didn't have an orange, we didn't have a cake, we didn't have nothing.
quotes.author: Muddy Waters

quotes.text: At her birthday, my seven-year-old daughter will say that she wants these big cakes and certain expensive toys as presents, and I can't say no to her. It would just break my heart. But when I was little, for birthdays we just played outside and we were happy if we got any cake.
quotes.author: Goran Ivanisevic

quotes.text: When someone asks if you'd like cake or pie, why not say you want cake and pie?
quotes.author: Lisa Loeb

quotes.text: A compromise is the art of dividing a cake in such a way that everyone believes he has the biggest piece.
quotes.author: Ludwig Erhard

quotes.text: There are divisions between a culinary chef and a dessert chef, also called a pastry chef. There are specializations within the pastry chef field. Some pastry chefs specialize in baking breads, while others are master cake designers. Each field requires an exceptional level of creativity and attention to detail.
quotes.author: Ron Ben-Israel

quotes.text: Motherhood is an amazing feeling, and if you get to relive those special moments while working, it works as an icing on the cake. Kids have always been close to my heart, and working with them is a pleasure for me.
quotes.author: Kajol

quotes.text: Most of us have fond memories of food from our childhood. Whether it was our mom's homemade lasagna or a memorable chocolate birthday cake, food has a way of transporting us back to the past.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: Being from Baltimore, I'm a crab cake snob, and I'm very particular on where I eat my crab cakes.
quotes.author: Mark Teixeira

quotes.text: I have a very big sweet tooth and I love treating myself to something that I wouldn't necessarily eat during the tournament such as a nice-sized cake.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.text: My mom FedExes a red velvet cake she makes from scratch to me every birthday.
quotes.author: Molly Sims

quotes.text: I tried to bake a cake for my mother's birthday - it took me four hours. It was terrible, and I cried for three days.
quotes.author: Rachael Ray

quotes.text: We'll take the cake with the red cherry on top.
quotes.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quotes.text: I could be hit by a Sara Lee truck tomorrow. Which is not a bad way of going: 'Richard Simmons Found in a Freeway in Pound Cake and Fudge, With a Smile on His Face.' Let's face it. We don't know anything.
quotes.author: Richard Simmons

quotes.text: A great empire, like a great cake, is most easily diminished at the edges.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The most dangerous food is wedding cake.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.text: I was a fat child and loved cake, perhaps because it was the only sweet thing in my life.
quotes.author: Andre Rieu

quotes.text: Chocolate cake is the bomb!
quotes.author: Scarlett Pomers

quotes.text: I'm not much of a cake person.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.text: Let's make a law that gay people can have birthdays, but straight people get more cake - you know, to send the right message to kids.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.text: The thought of bringing a cake into a dance music show is a bizarre one. The idea of rafting on top of people is just as bizarre as well. And I think whenever something bizarre comes into play, it immediately becomes an easy target. And for those reasons, I know that I have been the target of criticism.
quotes.author: Steve Aoki

quotes.text: Also, this is what a pregnant Busy Philipps does in her free time, I'm taking master fondant cake decorating class with Anna from 'Ace of Cakes' at Duff's Charm City Cakes. It's, like, 4 three-hour classes.
quotes.author: Busy Philipps

quotes.text: In the past few years, we've been doing amazing stuff with desserts. Pastry chefs have been using herbs and spices in their desserts. So vanilla cake doesn't have to be just vanilla, it can have a little thyme. Or you could have a custard with a little lavender in it, which is just amazing.
quotes.author: Ron Ben-Israel

quotes.text: You might say, 'Can't we have a more human Christianity, without the cross, without Jesus, without stripping ourselves?' In this way we'd become pastry-shop Christians, like a pretty cake and nice sweet things. Pretty, but not true Christians.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: Stories aren't the icing on the cake; they are the cake!
quotes.author: Peter Guber

quotes.text: For me, the end of childhood came when the number of candles on my birthday cake no longer reflected my age, around 19 or 20. From then on, each candle came to represent an entire decade.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.text: I wanted to buy a candle holder, but the store didn't have one. So I got a cake.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.text: Honestly, I just go to restaurants to eat so I won't die. If there was a pill I could take in January and then I wouldn't have to eat again for the rest of the year, I would take it. Of course, I wouldn't want to sacrifice my chocolate cake and ice cream.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Once you get rid of integrity the rest is a piece of cake.
quotes.author: Larry Hagman

quotes.text: Photographing a cake can be art.
quotes.author: Irving Penn

quotes.text: Sometimes I have a tough time getting along with myself. When I was a child, I needed a lot of attention... and I don't have a small ego. For me, appearing on a stage or presenting a cake is the same thing. You need a crowd around you to do it.
quotes.author: Ron Ben-Israel

quotes.text: When I got to France I realized I didn't know very much about food at all. I'd never had a real cake. I'd had those cakes from cake mixes or the ones that have a lot of baking powder in them. A really good French cake doesn't have anything like that in it - it's all egg power.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.text: The real me now may not be thin but she's got the cake and, if she likes, can eat it too.
quotes.author: Arabella Weir

quotes.text: I love cake. I love pie. I love potato chips. I love salt. I do not want yogurt, plain yogurt. It's healthy. 'Why don't you like it?' Because it tastes like bad breath.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.text: I am not a fan of the cupcake image. This idea that you can distract a girl with something frivolous like a cake or shoes or handbags, and she won't be a threat to men.
quotes.author: Joanna Trollope

quotes.text: If the theory turns out to be right, that will be tremendously thick and tasty icing on the cake.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.text: I've learnt that if I tell myself I'm not allowed something, I binge on it later. So if I want chocolate, I have chocolate. If I want biscuits, I have biscuits. I love cake. I just love cake.
quotes.author: Geri Halliwell

quotes.text: I still love red velvet cake.
quotes.author: Molly Sims

quotes.text: We can do little things for God; I turn the cake that is frying on the pan for love of him, and that done, if there is nothing else to call me, I prostrate myself in worship before him, who has given me grace to work; afterwards I rise happier than a king.
quotes.author: Brother Lawrence

quotes.text: I love carrot cake - that's probably my favorite - and I'm obsessed with peanut butter. I eat anything with peanut butter - maybe not carrot cake with peanut butter - but, I think I got this from 'The Parent Trap': Oreos and peanut butter; I like that. And peanut butter and apples, peanut butter and chocolate.
quotes.author: Jacquelyn Jablonski

quotes.text: You have to have really wide reading habits and pay attention to the news and just everything that's going on in the world: you need to. If you get this right, then the writing is a piece of cake.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: I'm amazed. When I was 40, I thought I'd never make 50. And at 50 I thought the frosting on the cake would be 60. At 60, I was still going strong and enjoying everything.
quotes.author: Gloria Stuart

quotes.text: She tells enough white lies to ice a wedding cake.
quotes.author: Margot Asquith

quotes.text: I can cook to please people, but it's quite conventional. I make a good sponge cake. I find it hard to follow recipes.
quotes.author: Anna Chancellor

quotes.text: 'Cake Boss' does massive, massive things, which are great.
quotes.author: Maisie Williams

quotes.text: My favourite place to eat is my grandma's kitchen. She makes a mean crab cake.
quotes.author: Karlie Kloss

quotes.text: How can a society that exists on instant mashed potatoes, packaged cake mixes, frozen dinners, and instant cameras teach patience to its young?
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.text: When you are a hero you are always running to save someone, sweating, worried and guilty. When you are a villain you are just lurking in the shadows waiting for the hero to pass by. Then you pop them in the head and go home... piece of cake.
quotes.author: James Marsters

quotes.text: It was fantastic to work in Cornwall partly because my family live there so I was able to do lots of visiting and eat lots of cake. They live all over Cornwall and all over Devon.
quotes.author: Dawn French

quotes.text: Sometimes, it's just easier to say yes to that extra snack or dessert, because frankly, it is exhausting to keep saying no. It's exhausting to plead with our kids to eat just one more bite of vegetables.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: I had a little epiphany when I was a writer at 'Chicago' magazine. I sat down to dinner at the Ritz-Carlton. Somebody poured a white dessert wine with chocolate cake. It was a wine I would never have expected to make sense. The idea of any wine tasting fabulous with chocolate cake was fascinating to me.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.text: Diet cola is my absolute favorite drink in the world; I used to drink four cans a day. But to help me cut down, I've turned it into a treat. Now, instead of having dessert, I'll have a can of diet soda. Putting a limit on how often I can drink it has helped me appreciate it more.
quotes.author: Kaley Cuoco

quotes.text: There is a dessert dish in Austria called Kaiserschmarrn - it's kind of like a sweet raisin pancake with eggs and sugar. It's definitely not something I can eat often, but if I've done well at a race, sometimes that's my celebration treat!
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: I love chicken fingers, I love French fries. I love desserts. I'm not just into dessert or just into savoury food. I love it all. I'm a pig. I love food. So it takes a lot of discipline to eat healthy.
quotes.author: Holly Madison

quotes.text: Dessert is probably the most important stage of the meal, since it will be the last thing your guests remember before they pass out all over the table.
quotes.author: William Powell

quotes.text: I love dessert. All kinds. But there's something about ice cream that makes me happy. I am drawn to its simplicity. I am perplexed by the endless supply of constantly growing flavor options. And I am always in the mood for sprinkles and a sugar cone.
quotes.author: Rachel Nichols

quotes.text: I love dessert. I can't be guilty about it because I have to taste everything. I experiment.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.text: There are divisions between a culinary chef and a dessert chef, also called a pastry chef. There are specializations within the pastry chef field. Some pastry chefs specialize in baking breads, while others are master cake designers. Each field requires an exceptional level of creativity and attention to detail.
quotes.author: Ron Ben-Israel

quotes.text: Absolutely eat dessert first. The thing that you want to do the most, do that.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.text: My 93-year-old grandma is a beautiful example of healthy living. She laughs a lot and always says, 'Just be yourself!' She also eats dessert every single day.
quotes.author: Rachel Boston

quotes.text: My secret indulgent food is dessert. I have an incredible sweet tooth - chocolate pudding with vanilla ice-cream or trifle and pavlova. I do love dessert.
quotes.author: Deborra-Lee Furness

quotes.text: Work is the meat of life, pleasure the dessert.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.text: When we think of classic American desserts, we tend to imagine apple pie and ice cream. However, the most classic American dessert of all might be the chocolate chip cookie.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: Thus the public use of reason and freedom is nothing but a dessert, a sumptuous dessert.
quotes.author: Johann Georg Hamann

quotes.text: My kids have always been allowed to have dessert. My husband thinks I'm too free and easy about that kind of stuff, but my kids will throw out a half-eaten ice cream cone if they've had enough, which I've never in my life been able to do.
quotes.author: Julianne Moore

quotes.text: I have a sweet tooth problem. On tour, in catering, the dessert was always so good. When we started the tour I was in the best shape of my life, but by the end of it I was horrible.
quotes.author: Kevin McHale

quotes.text: I don't think it's a good advert for any restaurant, a fat chef, and secondly, who wants to eat a dessert when the chef's a fat pig.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.text: I learned that the hardest party to pull off successfully is Saturday night dinner. This meal is expected to be elaborate: appetizers, first course, dinner, dessert, and coffee. People arrive at 7:30 or 8 p.m. and stay for hours - definitely past my bedtime - and they all go home exhausted.
quotes.author: Ina Garten

quotes.text: I did though at least expect him to correct the false statements he made when he was trying to protect the Presidency. Instead, he talked about it as though I had laid it all out there for the taking. I was the buffet and he just couldn't resist the dessert.
quotes.author: Monica Lewinsky

quotes.text: Chocolate's okay, but I prefer a really intense fruit taste. You know when a peach is absolutely perfect... it's sublime. I'd like to capture that and then use it in a dessert.
quotes.author: Kathy Mattea

quotes.text: I would be lying if I said I cut out all dessert. When I'm training, I try to satisfy those cravings with a slightly healthier dessert, like a piece of dark chocolate or whipped cream and strawberries. Those are two of my favorites!
quotes.author: Josie Loren

quotes.text: Just being aware of what you are about to do greatly diminishes the tendency to do what you don't want to. You will pull your hand back from that pizza slice, tell the waitress that you are passing on dessert, put on your gym shoes instead of going under the comforter, and take several deep breaths instead of screaming at your daughter.
quotes.author: Srikumar Rao

quotes.text: I have a sweet tooth. I love dessert, and if somebody makes me one, I'm going to have it.
quotes.author: Sarah Rafferty

quotes.text: Creme Brulee is the ultimate 'guy' dessert. Make it and he'll follow you anywhere.
quotes.author: Ina Garten

quotes.text: I am crazy for dessert. I eat everything. No one should be denied anything... just don't eat the whole thing.
quotes.author: Keri Russell

quotes.text: Ben & Jerry's is an indulgent dessert that should be eaten in moderation. You should not be replacing more than one meal a day with ice cream. We do not consider a pint or a tub of ice cream to be a single serving.
quotes.author: Jerry Greenfield

quotes.text: My favorite dessert is banana pudding.
quotes.author: Lennon Parham

quotes.text: It was the greatest thing in the world getting fat. Every meal out was an event. Or we'd go to Italy and we'd have pasta, truffles, and dessert and then plan the next incredible meal. It was a happy-go-lucky time. I never had so much fun.
quotes.author: Kirstie Alley

quotes.text: The most classic French dessert around the holidays is the Christmas log, with butter cream. Two flavors. Chocolate and coconut. My first job in the kitchen when I was a boy was to make these Christmas logs.
quotes.author: Alain Ducasse

quotes.text: I never want to be that guy at a dinner table saying, 'I wish I could have dessert.' I actually went through a stage when I would order dessert first.
quotes.author: Ryan Kwanten

quotes.text: One of the things that happens in my house on the holidays is after dessert, we sit down to a very ambitious men-versus-women game of Trivial Pursuit. It's brutal. And there's a trophy.
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.text: I rebelled against the idea of the artist being what I call the 'after-dinner mint' of society. I didn't want them to be just the entertainers, but rather part of the community - the bread, not only the dessert.
quotes.author: Gian Carlo Menotti

quotes.text: The most I ever ate? In one sitting? Maybe four big plates of fried chicken, biscuits, chitlins, gravy. Then dessert. Apple pie, sweet potato pie. My mother cooked that stuff, good Southern food, and when I was 300 pounds, I never missed a meal.
quotes.author: Bruce Smith

quotes.text: Comedy just pokes at problems, rarely confronts them squarely. Drama is like a plate of meat and potatoes, comedy is rather the dessert, a bit like meringue.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: A Web site that promotes flow is like a gourmet meal. You start off with the appetizers, move on to the salads and entrees, and build toward dessert. Unfortunately, most sites are built like a cafeteria. You pick whatever you want. That sounds good at first, but soon it doesn't matter what you choose to do. Everything is bland and the same.
quotes.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quotes.text: I adore summer entertaining. For a dinner party at the farm, I might prepare homemade fettuccine with porcini mushrooms, soft-shell crabs, spinach from the garden, and lemon tarts with fraises des bois for dessert.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.text: I'm a really good cook. I bake a lot. I cook dinner most nights. I cook everything from Italian food to Mexican food. But if I'm going to some place and it's a potluck, I'm always the one to bring dessert!
quotes.author: Amanda Schull

quotes.text: I eat eight times a day. But it's what my intake is. I eat all the time, but it's good stuff. You want to eat that chocolate? You want to eat that dessert? Have that apple or vegetable instead.
quotes.author: Billy Magnussen

quotes.text: The willingness and ability to live fully in the now eludes many people. While eating your appetizer, don't be concerned with dessert.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: I eat as much as the next girl, but I work my butt of in the gym every morning! The key is moderation. I splurge on the weekend. A big bowl of pasta and a delicious slice of cake for dessert are my favorites.
quotes.author: Giuliana Rancic

quotes.text: The Hadley Street Dream is a tribute to making a vision come to life. My father built a compound on a dessert city block, he saw something in that space we couldn't see. It was years later the album was born right there on Hadley St. He built the studio I started recording the album at.
quotes.author: Solange Knowles

quotes.text: I don't eat four-legged animals, but I eat birds, I eat cheese, I eat dessert. I eat everything.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.text: I'll immediately gain, like, 5 pounds even just by thinking about cutting out dessert. It's a nightmare. I decided, for me, the healthiest thing was to eat what I want and just exercise. Some women can watch what they eat, but I just can't do that.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.text: When I saw contestants fighting for their lives on 'The Biggest Loser,' I realized I just wanted to be healthy - to have fun playing soccer with my son or teaching my daughter to shoot hoops. Then it was so much easier to say no to carbs, soda, or dessert, and the weight just came off.
quotes.author: Alison Sweeney

quotes.text: I don't always prepare such rich meals. Sometimes I'll just serve a simple quiche, salad and dessert for dinner. During the week I try to eat lightly.
quotes.author: Paul Lynde

quotes.text: I like to eat pizza and spaghetti pomodoro, and I'm crazy for dessert. I like all of them: cassata, cheesecake, biscuits.
quotes.author: Stefano Gabbana

quotes.text: Of course I treat myself every now and then. Once a month I might have pizza and red wine and maybe a dessert, but that's it.
quotes.author: Ricki-Lee Coulter

quotes.text: Fame is like the dessert that comes with your achievements - it's not an achievement in itself, but sometimes it can overpower the work.
quotes.author: Adam Clayton

quotes.text: It's very confusing when fame comes early on in your career. You get a little bit bent out of shape in terms of what's important. Fame is like the dessert that comes with your achievements - it's not an achievement in itself, but sometimes it can overpower the work.
quotes.author: Adam Clayton

quotes.text: It's hard in the firehouse to avoid the dessert thing. At 3 in the morning after some emergency, I have been known to eat an ice cream sandwich.
quotes.author: Caroline Paul

quotes.text: For me the ideal date would be to drink wine in the backyard under the stars, listen to music and just talk. Then we'd eat steak and, later, dessert. If all went as planned, we'd save some of the dessert and play with it while making out.
quotes.author: Karen McDougal

quotes.text: One thing I have been banging on about, we have a dessert deficit in the U.K. We still import a very large proportion of our desserts. I would ask everyone to go out and buy a British dessert.
quotes.author: Owen Paterson

quotes.text: Candy bar companies, through commercials, have tied their products to low-energy cues, transforming what was once a dessert into a pick-me-up for cubicle dwellers.
quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

quotes.text: It's rare for me to read any fiction. I almost only read nonfiction. I don't believe in guilty pleasures, I only believe in pleasures. People who call reading detective fiction or eating dessert a guilty pleasure make me want to puke.
quotes.author: Ira Glass

quotes.text: I try to be healthy. I train three days a week with a trainer. But I do like to eat, clearly. And I do eat dessert every day. If I cut that out, yes, I would lose weight.
quotes.author: Rebel Wilson

quotes.text: When people say, 'Hey, wanna come to our house for dinner?' I say, 'Yeah, what should I bring?' They say, 'How about the dessert?' I just don't skimp on the dessert. I make it the yummy way it should be made, and then I just don't eat the whole pan.
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.text: My husband is the cook at our house. I can make dessert and salad, but I stay away from meals. He makes amazing omelets, fish, and grilled vegetables like Brussels sprouts and cauliflower.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.text: Sticky toffee pudding is my favorite dessert in the U.K.
quotes.author: Eve

quotes.text: I balance my meals. I have never been a big dessert guy.
quotes.author: Robert Herjavec

quotes.text: I find that when you do yoga, you don't crave unhealthy food. But I try to always let myself eat whatever I want. I have dessert or chocolate every day, but I'll only have a few bites. I try to have a little bit of cereal in the morning, and then I always try to have protein for dinner, too. But I eat pasta and stuff like that.
quotes.author: Rena Sofer

quotes.text: It's so difficult. Sometimes if I have dessert, I think, 'Well, I blew it.' That's something I need to work on and control. But still there's nothing like a buffet.
quotes.author: Donna Dixon

quotes.text: I don't eat a ton of pasta or bread. But I eat dessert almost every night, and I drink. You need a bit of balance, and I've found mine.
quotes.author: Misty Copeland

quotes.text: I really enjoy making breakfast and dinner. But breakfast is a good excuse to have some dessert before dinner.
quotes.author: Tia Mowry

quotes.text: Martin Scorsese was being given an honorary doctorate, and one of the tutors asked if there was a student film he particularly liked. He mentioned our film. There was a dinner after the final show just for the tutors, but I was smuggled in to meet Scorsese over dessert.
quotes.author: Asif Kapadia

quotes.text: When I was pregnant, I was like, 'I'm pregnant, so I'm allowed to eat everything: bagels with cream cheese for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, and I can have pizza for dessert.'
quotes.author: Lake Bell

quotes.text: At my restaurant, we made a dessert called 'milk and honey.' It's milk ice cream that looks like a snowball, and then you cut into it, and honey runs out.
quotes.author: Daniel Humm

quotes.text: I love chocolate, and I love ice cream. That's a double whammy there. I constantly have to check myself and say, 'I've already had dessert today.'
quotes.author: Tony Cardenas

quotes.text: I took a cookery course. On the examination, I had to cook a cheese omelet with peas and an egg custard. With the egg custard, which was supposed to be a dessert, I forget to put the sugar in, so that's more of a quiche, isn't it?
quotes.author: Lesley Nicol

quotes.text: On Christmas Eve, we have a duck or roast pork with caramelised potatoes, braised red cabbage and gravy. For dessert, we have ris a l'amande, a rice pudding, and whoever gets the whole almond in it wins an extra present. Then we dance around the tree and sing carols.
quotes.author: Birgitte Hjort Sorensen

quotes.text: I never serve a dessert on Passover that I would not serve the rest of the year.
quotes.author: Gil Marks

quotes.text: I tend to avoid cakes made with matzo meal instead of flour. Also, most prepared dessert products and mixes. Sometimes the packaging they come in tastes better than the product.
quotes.author: Gil Marks

quotes.text: Walt's idea was that - as soon as the people who were dining got through their main course. They were supposed to all be seated, served at the same time, when they got into the dessert.
quotes.author: John Hench

quotes.text: I didn't know why dessert was invented or what function it was meant to perform. Raising livestock and the harvesting of grains are ancient activities, but when did humankind decide it also needed creme brulee?
quotes.author: Bill Buford

quotes.text: People seldom think of soup for summer, so they are unusual - an interesting, unusual touch for the first course or for dessert. I find cold soups very refreshing. I serve them in cups rather than in bowls, usually, and let people sip them. You don't really need a spoon for soups that are all one consistency.
quotes.author: Ruth Glick

quotes.text: I like Kahlua and ice cream as a dessert.
quotes.author: Hamilton Jordan

quotes.text: Playing games is the dessert. Our real market is people doing everyday things. Rather than pulling your mobile phone in and out of your pocket, we want to create an all-day flow; whether you're going to the doctor or a meeting or hanging out, you will all of a sudden be amplified by the collective knowledge that is on the web.
quotes.author: Rony Abovitz

quotes.text: When I'm not longer rapping, I want to open up an ice cream parlor and call myself Scoop Dogg.
quotes.author: Snoop Dogg

quotes.text: Ice cream is my comfort food.
quotes.author: Jessie Ware

quotes.text: I was sporty in high school. I played tennis and hockey, and was basketball captain. Then I went to university and stopped doing sport and started eating ice cream.
quotes.author: Rebel Wilson

quotes.text: When I have bad days, I just eat lots of chocolate ice cream and dance to the 'Lion King' soundtrack. It's really odd, but it's true.
quotes.author: Blake Lively

quotes.text: Love ice cream. I let myself have that about once a week. Vanilla.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.text: My kids are normal. If they could eat burgers and fries and ice cream every day, they would. And so would I. But that doesn't sustain us.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: I love to eat - Kit Kats or cookies-and-cream ice cream. I need sugar like five times a day.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: I'm not one of those people who writes a biography or tries to figure out what kind of ice cream the character liked when he was 10.
quotes.author: Miguel Ferrer

quotes.text: Candy is my fuel. Ice cream, too.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.text: In time, foods such as hamburgers and ice cream became more than just meals. They became part of American history and culture, touchstones that are almost immediately nostalgic and sentimental no matter how old you are or what part of the country you are from.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: I'm obsessed with frozen yogurt because you don't feel totally guilty eating it. It's not as bad as ice cream, and during the hot summer months, it's a great way to just refresh.
quotes.author: Caroline Sunshine

quotes.text: I love eating chocolate cake and ice cream after a show. I almost justify it in my mind as, 'You were a good boy onstage and you did your show, so now you can have some cake and ice cream.'
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Being married means I can break wind and eat ice cream in bed.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.text: If I have a weakness, it's probably ice cream. That's where I get lax, sloppy. I'll sneak into the refrigerator at night and take two or three bites and put it back. Butter pecan. Only two or three bites, but it shows.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.text: I don't think I've ever seen pie advertised. That's how you know it's good. They advertise ice cream and other desserts. They advertise the bejeezus out of yogurt, but I haven't seen one pie commercial.
quotes.author: Adam Carolla

quotes.text: You can't be the dad who takes your kid out after your wife has said, 'No ice cream,' buys the ice cream, and says, 'Don't tell your mother.' You teach the child to lie - and to disrespect the other parent.
quotes.author: Howie Mandel

quotes.text: Ice cream is the perfect buffer, because you can do things in a somewhat lighthearted way. Plus, people have an emotional response to ice cream; it's more than just food. So I think when you combine caring, and eating wonderful food, it's a very powerful combination.
quotes.author: Jerry Greenfield

quotes.text: So much business is based on the belief that we should do whatever we can within legal limits to make as much money as we can. Ben & Jerry's was based on values, and we try to operate a business that not just sells ice cream but partners with all our stakeholders - whether that's suppliers or customers - to bring about a more sustainable world.
quotes.author: Jerry Greenfield

quotes.text: We should tell our kids to just have fun, participate and not get bent on winning or losing. But every coach, when they say that, they say it tongue in cheek, 'Don't worry about winning': If you win I'll get you ice cream, but if you lose I'm going to pout in the car.
quotes.author: Bode Miller

quotes.text: Ice cream was my undoing, and six chocolate milk shakes in a row were nothing to me at one time.
quotes.author: Kate Smith

quotes.text: I love dessert. All kinds. But there's something about ice cream that makes me happy. I am drawn to its simplicity. I am perplexed by the endless supply of constantly growing flavor options. And I am always in the mood for sprinkles and a sugar cone.
quotes.author: Rachel Nichols

quotes.text: My love for ice cream emerged at an early age - and has never left!
quotes.author: Ginger Rogers

quotes.text: My family lived off the land and summer evening meals featured baked stuffed tomatoes, potato salad, corn on the cob, fresh shelled peas and homemade ice cream with strawberries from our garden. With no air conditioning in those days, the cool porch was the center of our universe after the scorching days.
quotes.author: David Mixner

quotes.text: You can pour melted ice cream on regular ice cream. It's like a sauce!
quotes.author: Chris Pratt

quotes.text: The only emperor is the emperor of ice cream.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.text: I don't know why people eat so badly. I could eat pasta all the time, but it really is fattening. And I love ice cream, but I can't do that. There was a time, until I was in my mid-forties, when I could eat a whole pizza - and really, no effect.
quotes.author: Christopher Walken

quotes.text: If I could eat whatever I wanted every day, I would have Domino's pizza with pasta carbonara inside every slice. And at night, I would have Neapolitan ice cream until I felt absolutely toxic. And then I would drift off telling myself, 'It's going to be O.K... It's going to be O.K. you're going to train in the morning.'
quotes.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quotes.text: Do you know how many calories are in butter and cheese and ice cream? Would you get your dog up in the morning for a cup of coffee and a donut?
quotes.author: Jack LaLanne

quotes.text: It's quite amazing to me, as I walk around a supermarket or a health food shop, to observe the number of Fairtrade choices: not just staples such as coffee, tea, fresh fruits and rice, but cocoa and chocolate, herbs and spices, honey, ice cream, and jams.
quotes.author: Sheherazade Goldsmith

quotes.text: Puberty for me was graduating from Thousand Island salad dressing to Caesar salads. It was like going from hot dogs and hamburgers to beef stroganoff, or from ice cream in a cone to creme brulee.
quotes.author: Richard Simmons

quotes.text: I don't always have the best eating habits. I like butter and ice cream. There are days when I should work out and I don't. But it's never too late to change old habits.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.text: When we think of classic American desserts, we tend to imagine apple pie and ice cream. However, the most classic American dessert of all might be the chocolate chip cookie.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: My kids have always been allowed to have dessert. My husband thinks I'm too free and easy about that kind of stuff, but my kids will throw out a half-eaten ice cream cone if they've had enough, which I've never in my life been able to do.
quotes.author: Julianne Moore

quotes.text: Sure, I like ice cream, but when you keep a healthy lifestyle, it's: Do you prefer sweets and crappy food, or do you prefer to have a nice body? It depends on what you want more.
quotes.author: Tim Howard

quotes.text: After I win a match, I celebrate it by having an ice cream.
quotes.author: Saina Nehwal

quotes.text: Not to like ice cream is to show oneself uninterested in food.
quotes.author: Joseph Epstein

quotes.text: Every two months, I allow myself a splurge day where I eat thick, doughy pizza from Pizzeria Uno or an ice cream sundae from my store with birthday-cake ice cream, Marshmallow Fluff, and toppings mixed in.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.text: When I was seven, I decided to buy all my friends some ice cream, but the problem was where to get the money. Sneaking into church, I went to the side of the altar where you can light a candle for your loved ones and took the money from the collection boxes.
quotes.author: Suzi Quatro

quotes.text: I try to work out my mind more these days. I try to eat right. I don't drink, I don't smoke, and I take the skin off chicken. But I'm not on no special diet. I like my steak and potatoes, ice cream, doughnuts.
quotes.author: Mr. T

quotes.text: Scoops of mint ice cream with chips of chocolate cows.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.text: I am such a do-goody, people-pleasing kid - or I was - I don't think I've ever been fired, not even from an ice cream shop, magician for kids' parties, not even in my early jobs in radio.
quotes.author: Ira Glass

quotes.text: My father died in France, and my sisters and I went over with my mum to bring back his body. I remember going to the funeral parlour in France and being given a laminated menu of coffins, and thinking, surely there is an ice cream at the back of here!
quotes.author: Rachel Joyce

quotes.text: The truth is, I can't help the way people perceive anything, from the role of financial industry in the economic crisis, to the place of women's fiction in the canon of modern literature, to the rank of mint chocolate chip ice cream as a favorite Baskin-Robbins flavor.
quotes.author: Erin Duffy

quotes.text: Love is an ice cream sundae, with all the marvelous coverings. Sex is the cherry on top.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.text: My advice to you is not to inquire why or whither, but just enjoy your ice cream while it's on your plate.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.text: Honestly, I just go to restaurants to eat so I won't die. If there was a pill I could take in January and then I wouldn't have to eat again for the rest of the year, I would take it. Of course, I wouldn't want to sacrifice my chocolate cake and ice cream.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: I eat ice cream. It's better than booze.
quotes.author: Del Shannon

quotes.text: Who would want to get back together with Taylor Swift after having dated her? I'm sure dating her is like talking to a white sheet of paper with a little bit of vanilla ice cream on it that doesn't say anything.
quotes.author: Kurt Braunohler

quotes.text: I've been experimenting more and more with LN2, liquid nitrogen. I've used it in battle on 'Iron Chef America,' but have also made some great ice creams at home for my family. Since it freezes basically on contact, you can have ice cream ready in mere minutes.
quotes.author: Cat Cora

quotes.text: My indulgences are Skittles and rum raisin ice cream.
quotes.author: Sanya Richards-Ross

quotes.text: I used to go to Cold Stone Creamery, get a tub of Butterfinger ice cream, and eat it all before bedtime. And my fingers were permanently stained orange from Cheetos.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.text: I always say whoever can figure out how to make ice cream healthy will be a gazillionaire.
quotes.author: Justin Deeley

quotes.text: I worked at an ice cream parlor called Chadwicks. We wore old-timey outfits and had to bang a drum, play a kazoo, and sing 'Happy Birthday' to people while giving them free birthday sundaes. Lots of ice cream scooping and $1 tips.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.text: I should probably confess that ice cream is my favorite food, and I eat it every night. When I go grocery shopping, I try to buy a new flavor, rather than reverting back to a favorite flavor. I'm on a mission to taste every flavor of ice cream out there!
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.text: I eat healthy, but that doesn't mean I don't enjoy myself. I eat ice cream and chocolate, as my metabolism is pretty fast because I work out so much.
quotes.author: Andie MacDowell

quotes.text: So yes, I do want to try and keep things going if I can. I have a few things brewing... And if it doesn't happen, I did buy an ice cream van a while ago. So I always have that to fall back on.
quotes.author: Rupert Grint

quotes.text: Ben & Jerry's is an indulgent dessert that should be eaten in moderation. You should not be replacing more than one meal a day with ice cream. We do not consider a pint or a tub of ice cream to be a single serving.
quotes.author: Jerry Greenfield

quotes.text: I do everything: I'll have a green juice, then a melted chocolate ice cream. I stay up very late, I get up very early.
quotes.author: Lykke Li

quotes.text: I spent loads of time in Scotland as a kid. My dad would take us back up to Aberdeen loads, and I have very fond memories of getting chips from his favourite chippy and heading down to the beach to eat Baskin Robbins ice cream.
quotes.author: Andrew Buchan

quotes.text: You can show me some stick ice cream and I can tell you if it's good or not just looking at it.
quotes.author: O. Winston Link

quotes.text: Thankfully, I'm lucky enough to be able to eat ice cream. I've got to have my cookies and cream! But I work out a lot, so I burn a lot of calories.
quotes.author: Adrian Peterson

quotes.text: I compose with bells a lot. Bells and breath. Both things you react to without thinking about it. Bells traditionally give us orders: come to the desk, the truck is backing up, the ice cream is here, it's time to go to church. They're sounds our brains are already associated with.
quotes.author: Sxip Shirey

quotes.text: I know I have to run 20 more minutes if I eat ice cream. Basically, I eat everything, but I just do more training.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.text: I never carry a purse. My iPhone is always with me, a credit card, and a piece of mint chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream gum.
quotes.author: Rachel G. Fox

quotes.text: Oh wow, you know what's wrong with all these families on TV? All these kids say stuff no kid would say. Stuff grown-ups want them to say. Man, I'd make a really realistic family. Where kids get spankings. On TV parents say, 'Oh, you shouldn't do that ever again. Now you can have ice cream.' Forget it.
quotes.author: Macaulay Culkin

quotes.text: I have the best memories as a kid eating ice cream. It was a family tradition that I had with my father. It was nice.
quotes.author: Michael Strahan

quotes.text: I think all kids need snacks. Mine are fruit machines. I give them things like apple slices, berries and melon. Do I let them eat ice cream? Absolutely. But not every day.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.text: I eat many different ice creams. I'm not an ice cream snob, although I do think Ben & Jerry's is the best. But I'm happy to eat anybody's ice cream, really. As long as it's good.
quotes.author: Jerry Greenfield

quotes.text: I eat anything, especially sweets. Chocolate, cookies, and I love mint-chip ice cream.
quotes.author: Mary McCormack

quotes.text: I am for the art of underwear and the art of taxicabs. I am for the art of ice cream cones dropped on concrete.
quotes.author: Claes Oldenburg

quotes.text: That was the best ice cream soda I ever tasted.
quotes.author: Lou Costello

quotes.text: I eat ice cream all the time.
quotes.author: Bryce Harper

quotes.text: When I was a kid, I used to think, 'Man, if I could ever afford all the ice cream I want to eat, that's as rich as I ever want to be.'
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.text: Eating ice cream and not exercising is great. The downside is your health isn't so good.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.text: Aside from the obvious chocolate cookies and ice cream, chocolate can be used in a variety of ways for desserts.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.text: All the things I used to like - cookies, ice cream, gumbo - I don't like anymore.
quotes.author: Etta James

quotes.text: I'm a fan of polarization. If you make something that is palatable to everybody, it's like making vanilla ice cream, and I think we have enough of that.
quotes.author: Chris Stapleton

quotes.text: I actually think the same things do make most people happy. The differences are extremely small, and around the margins. You like peach ice cream; I like strawberry ice cream. Both of us like ice cream much better than a smack on the head with two-by-four.
quotes.author: Daniel Gilbert

quotes.text: What makes me happy is just curling up in with my mom in her bed and watching a marathon of 'CSI' and 'Grey's Anatomy' episodes with pints of ice cream.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: I was so unhealthy. I used to go to 'Cold Stone Creamery,' get a tub of Butterfinger ice cream, and eat it all before bedtime. And my fingers were permanently stained orange from Cheetos.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.text: Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: I think I do myself a disservice by comparing myself to Steve Jobs and Walt Disney and human beings that we've seen before. It should be more like Willy Wonka... and welcome to my chocolate factory.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.text: Strength is the capacity to break a chocolate bar into four pieces with your bare hands - and then eat just one of the pieces.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.text: Chocolate is not cheating! After a salty meal, you need a little bit of sweet. This is living, not cheating.
quotes.author: Ali Landry

quotes.text: I was sort of traumatized by girls in the third grade. Because there was a girl in my third grade class I had a crush on. I bought her a box of Valentine's Day chocolate. And I put it in her cubby with a note that said something like, 'I am deeply in love with you, Your Secret Admirer.' And I didn't sign my name.
quotes.author: Steve Carell

quotes.text: I'm a big kid. I love drinking chocolate milk. I'm not afraid to watch some cartoons once in a while when I'm with my nieces and actually be attentive.
quotes.author: Billy Horschel

quotes.text: I had a little epiphany when I was a writer at 'Chicago' magazine. I sat down to dinner at the Ritz-Carlton. Somebody poured a white dessert wine with chocolate cake. It was a wine I would never have expected to make sense. The idea of any wine tasting fabulous with chocolate cake was fascinating to me.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.text: I love cheeseburgers and chocolate - milk, not dark, and hot chocolate with marshmallows in the winter!
quotes.author: Nina Dobrev

quotes.text: When I have bad days, I just eat lots of chocolate ice cream and dance to the 'Lion King' soundtrack. It's really odd, but it's true.
quotes.author: Blake Lively

quotes.text: I hate going out for lunch during a workday because it slows down my pace and ruins my rhythm. I prefer to eat at my desk. Actually, I wander around the design studio with a plate in my hand as I dine on, for example, salmon sashimi and a salad of tomatoes and mozzarella. I often have a bit of dark chocolate after lunch.
quotes.author: Tom Ford

quotes.text: French fries. I love them. Some people are chocolate and sweets people. I love French fries. That and caviar.
quotes.author: Cameron Diaz

quotes.text: I am a picky eater. By that I mean, I love to pick the raisins out of oatmeal raisin cookies, the chips out of chocolate chip cookies, the white side off of black and white cookies, and the vanilla center out of Oreos.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.text: Europe is scooters. Europe is five young people on one bench sharing a chocolate bar. Their idea of entertainment and fun is so much different than ours, which is exactly why a movie about them would be funny.
quotes.author: Mike Myers

quotes.text: My greatest strength is common sense. I'm really a standard brand - like Campbell's tomato soup or Baker's chocolate.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.text: People get so in the habit of worry that if you save them from drowning and put them on a bank to dry in the sun with hot chocolate and muffins they wonder whether they are catching cold.
quotes.author: John Jay Chapman

quotes.text: The chocolate and crisps come in at times. You have to allow the little things that make you happy. I'm not extreme about what I eat.
quotes.author: Naomi Campbell

quotes.text: After about 20 years of marriage, I'm finally starting to scratch the surface of what women want. And I think the answer lies somewhere between conversation and chocolate.
quotes.author: Mel Gibson

quotes.text: To the casual observer, the Dropbox demo video looked like a normal product demonstration, but we put in about a dozen Easter eggs that were tailored for the Digg audience. References to Tay Zonday and 'Chocolate Rain' and allusions to 'Office Space' and 'XKCD.' It was a tongue-in-cheek nod to that crowd, and it kicked off a chain reaction.
quotes.author: Drew Houston

quotes.text: I love KIND bars. My favorites are coconut and almond and the dark chocolate and sea salt because staying fueled helps keep me from getting sick or injured. Bananas have also made a great comeback in my life. My kids eat them all the time on the go, which has inspired my go-to pre-run morning meal of peanut butter and banana on toast.
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.text: Switzerland is a place where they don't like to fight, so they get people to do their fighting for them while they ski and eat chocolate.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.text: Every day, without fail, I eat some dark chocolate.
quotes.author: Phoebe Tonkin

quotes.text: I love eating chocolate cake and ice cream after a show. I almost justify it in my mind as, 'You were a good boy onstage and you did your show, so now you can have some cake and ice cream.'
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: The darker the chocolate is, the more antioxidants it contains. So when eaten in moderation - just a few bites from a well-made dark chocolate bar, for instance - there's no need to feel bad about indulging once in a while.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.text: Part of life and part of the enjoyment of life is a croissant and a chocolate cake and eggs and milkshakes and oatmeal. There's so many things, you have to learn to appreciate it all. When I don't eat as much as I should, I'm not fun to be around; I'm fussy.
quotes.author: Nina Dobrev

quotes.text: I've always got a sweet tooth. I have chocolate hidden in places that nobody knows about.
quotes.author: Tony McCoy

quotes.text: Like a lot of kids, I had a Superman cake or different theme cakes, but then I hit the age where I think my mom thought I was ready for the German chocolate cake that she makes for my dad. Just the sight of that, the taste of that frosting, just reminds me of being at home with my mom and my dad and my sister and my friends.
quotes.author: Willie Geist

quotes.text: Ontologically, chocolate raises profoundly disturbing questions: Does not chocolate offer natural revelation of the goodness of the Creator just as chilies disclose a divine sense of humor? Is the human born with an innate longing for chocolate? Does the notion of chocolate preclude the concept of free will?
quotes.author: David Augsburger

quotes.text: As a child, I lived with being punier than other boys in class. The only consolation was my parents' empathy - they encouraged constant trips to the local drugstore for chocolate milk shakes to fatten me up. The shakes made me happy, but still, all through grammar school, other kids shoved me around.
quotes.author: James D. Watson

quotes.text: I love making smoothies post-workout. My favorite - depending on the day - is either a chocolate whey protein shake with banana and peanut butter, or one with vanilla and berries.
quotes.author: Parker Young

quotes.text: People have often asked me whether what I know about love has spoiled it for me. And I just simply say, 'Hardly.' You can know every single ingredient in a piece of chocolate cake, and then when you sit down and eat that cake, you can still feel that joy.
quotes.author: Helen Fisher

quotes.text: You know, I live a monastic lifestyle. No, I do. I do live in extremes, basically. I go back and forth. Once every six months, I'll have a day where I eat more chocolate than has ever been consumed by a human being.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.text: Ice cream was my undoing, and six chocolate milk shakes in a row were nothing to me at one time.
quotes.author: Kate Smith

quotes.text: I loved shooting 'iGo to Japan' because we got to be outside a lot, and our call times were really late because we had so many night scenes. It was pouring rain, so the cast would huddle together in between takes and drink hot chocolate. Shooting that episode was such a great bonding experience.
quotes.author: Jennette McCurdy

quotes.text: My favorite thing about the holiday season is the lights! I love walking around with family, friends, and a cup of peppermint hot chocolate to look at all the beautiful lights and decorations.
quotes.author: Caroline Sunshine

quotes.text: Anything is good if it's made of chocolate.
quotes.author: Jo Brand

quotes.text: You know an odd feeling? Sitting on the toilet eating a chocolate candy bar.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: Venice is like eating an entire box of chocolate liqueurs in one go.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.text: Cycling keeps me lean and I need to stay in shape, especially as I still like eating chocolate and ice-cream! I like to go mountain biking too. Running is also good; it's what we were designed to do as humans, so it comes naturally.
quotes.author: Mark Webber

quotes.text: Here is my prescription to heal all wounds. Watch the film 'Funny Girl' at least five times, eat at least 45 chocolate bars, and hang out with all those friends you blew off to hang out with your ex. I truly believe that, through a combination of Nutella, old pals and Barbra Streisand, we can achieve happiness and, very probably, world peace.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: Chocolate is the first luxury. It has so many things wrapped up in it: Deliciusness in the moment, childhood memories, and that grin-inducing feeling of getting a reward for being good.
quotes.author: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.text: Once we hit forty, women only have about four taste buds left: one for vodka, one for wine, one for cheese, and one for chocolate.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.text: It takes a real man to make a true confession - a Chocolate Soldier will excuse or cloak his sin.
quotes.author: Charles Studd

quotes.text: At hotels, you are an actress. Absolutely. You can do what you want. Go where you want. I love my home too. But I love to arrive in a hotel. They have books, chocolate, food. I put things in the little refrigerator.
quotes.author: Sonia Rykiel

quotes.text: Every meal should end with something sweet. Maybe it's jelly on toast at breakfast, or a small piece of chocolate at dinner - but it always helps my brain bring a close to the meal.
quotes.author: Robert Irvine

quotes.text: Most of us have fond memories of food from our childhood. Whether it was our mom's homemade lasagna or a memorable chocolate birthday cake, food has a way of transporting us back to the past.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: My secret indulgent food is dessert. I have an incredible sweet tooth - chocolate pudding with vanilla ice-cream or trifle and pavlova. I do love dessert.
quotes.author: Deborra-Lee Furness

quotes.text: When it comes to chocolate, resistance is futile.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.text: It's quite amazing to me, as I walk around a supermarket or a health food shop, to observe the number of Fairtrade choices: not just staples such as coffee, tea, fresh fruits and rice, but cocoa and chocolate, herbs and spices, honey, ice cream, and jams.
quotes.author: Sheherazade Goldsmith

quotes.text: 'Love Letter' reminds me of 'Chocolate Factory' and 'Happy People.' It's a little bit of both of those, yeah. I just wanted it to be classy, man. And romantic. And maybe 10 percent sexy.
quotes.author: R. Kelly

quotes.text: Interestingly, the actress who, in her own persona, may be gentle, shy, and socially awkward, someone whose hand trembles when pouring a cup of tea for a visiting friend, can convincingly portray an elegant, cruel aristocrat tossing off malicious epigrams in an eighteenth-century chocolate house.
quotes.author: Wallace Shawn

quotes.text: I'm an emotional eater. If something's worth celebrating, we're going to grab pizza. If it's going bad, girl, pass me the chocolate. Gotta keep it in check!
quotes.author: Laurieann Gibson

quotes.text: When we think of classic American desserts, we tend to imagine apple pie and ice cream. However, the most classic American dessert of all might be the chocolate chip cookie.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: I've got a really sweet tooth and sometimes I just have to have some chocolate.
quotes.author: Kirsty Gallacher

quotes.text: I love chocolate, and I love to shop - just give me a good boutique. I like mall scenarios, too, because there's more right there at hand. I think Nashville could use some better shopping!
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.text: I owe it all to little chocolate donuts.
quotes.author: John Belushi

quotes.text: Researchers have discovered that chocolate produces some of the same reactions in the brain as marijuana. The researchers also discovered other similarities between the two but can't remember what they are.
quotes.author: Matt Lauer

quotes.text: For exercise, I now run with my chocolate Lab puppy, Oscar.
quotes.author: Daniela Pestova

quotes.text: I still indulge in a glass of wine or chocolate - treats are mandatory. Without deviating from the day-to-day healthy diet once in a while, it wouldn't be sustainable for me, and that's what I wanted: an approach to eating to last my entire life.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.text: Whether it's the experiments on 'MythBusters' or my earlier work in special effects for movies, I've regularly had to do things that were never done before, from designing complex motion-control rigs to figuring out how to animate chocolate.
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.text: Scoops of mint ice cream with chips of chocolate cows.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.text: Chocolate cake is the bomb!
quotes.author: Scarlett Pomers

quotes.text: My beauty secret is... nothing! I don't drink too much water. I don't eat very well. Sometimes I cheat and grab some chocolate. The best thing is to eat what you want, but not very much.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: Chocolate's okay, but I prefer a really intense fruit taste. You know when a peach is absolutely perfect... it's sublime. I'd like to capture that and then use it in a dessert.
quotes.author: Kathy Mattea

quotes.text: I would be lying if I said I cut out all dessert. When I'm training, I try to satisfy those cravings with a slightly healthier dessert, like a piece of dark chocolate or whipped cream and strawberries. Those are two of my favorites!
quotes.author: Josie Loren

quotes.text: I like sugar, be it candy, this season's pumpkin chocolate chip bars, or wine. Sugar is bad for me. It just sits on my tummy, causing my middle child Esme to ask if we are having a fourth baby. Rude!
quotes.author: Alicia Coppola

quotes.text: One of my early childhood memories was my grandmother always having a bowl of Nestle chocolate bars at her house. My sister and I would argue over who could eat the chocolate bars. Looking back, I don't know why we just didn't share. We could have split them.
quotes.author: Carla Hall

quotes.text: The truth is, I can't help the way people perceive anything, from the role of financial industry in the economic crisis, to the place of women's fiction in the canon of modern literature, to the rank of mint chocolate chip ice cream as a favorite Baskin-Robbins flavor.
quotes.author: Erin Duffy
