quotes.text: Chocolate is the first luxury. It has so many things wrapped up in it: deliciousness in the moment, childhood memories, and that grin-inducing feeling of getting a reward for being good.
quotes.author: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.text: It's not about being thin, it's about being healthy. And when you are a child you like to eat all these unhealthy things like chocolate and sweets. Oh my God. I love strawberries dipped in chocolate and Lion bars and Toffee Crisps - and as you grow up, you have to learn that those things are only good in moderation or you will become very fat.
quotes.author: Dionne Bromfield

quotes.text: Honestly, I just go to restaurants to eat so I won't die. If there was a pill I could take in January and then I wouldn't have to eat again for the rest of the year, I would take it. Of course, I wouldn't want to sacrifice my chocolate cake and ice cream.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: I'm the fussiest eater on earth; my husband despairs. I like chicken and pasta, and can't resist milk chocolate. I figure if you're going to do something naughty, make it really enjoyable.
quotes.author: Bonnie Langford

quotes.text: I guess if I'm a product, either you're chocolate, you're vanilla or you're butterscotch. You can't be all three.
quotes.author: Bruno Mars

quotes.text: I love dark chocolate - I could eat it 'til I puke.
quotes.author: Behati Prinsloo

quotes.text: Number one, I absolutely love making chocolate chip cookies. I mean, it's fun. It's exciting. Beyond the fact that I love making them, I love eating them.
quotes.author: Debbi Fields

quotes.text: Most men, no matter how well or badly dressed, carry overstuffed, beat up wallets that should have been replaced years ago. Why is that? Every time I see a guy take out a wallet anywhere, it looks like a piece of old melted chocolate cake-with strings.
quotes.author: Jonathan Carroll

quotes.text: The White Company offers its loyalists an altogether better, whiter world. The White people have edited out any colours that aren't white, off-white, milk chocolate, grey, taupe or black. They can't be doing with Johnnie Boden's cheery Sloane jokes, his spots and stripes, his occasional 'if it's me, it's U' loud colours.
quotes.author: Peter York

quotes.text: Science has yet to isolate the Godiva Chocolate or Prada gene, but that doesn't mean your weakness for pricey swag isn't woven into your DNA. According to a new study of identical twins, it's less TV ads or Labor Day sales that make you buy the things you do than the tastes and temperaments that are already part of you at birth.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.text: I eat healthy, but that doesn't mean I don't enjoy myself. I eat ice cream and chocolate, as my metabolism is pretty fast because I work out so much.
quotes.author: Andie MacDowell

quotes.text: I'm not a fan of grilling meat, since that tends to dry it out, and I find grill marks leave a bitter taste. A good steak house will offer different options for preparation, and I would ask them to broil or pan-roast the steak and finish it with butter. It ends up a dark chocolate color and stays very juicy.
quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

quotes.text: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece, make friendship a fine art, drink deeply from good books - especially the Bible, build a shelter against a rainy day, give thanks for your blessings and pray for guidance every day.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: There is no life to be found in violence. Every act of violence brings us closer to death. Whether it's the mundane violence we do to our bodies by overeating toxic food or drink or the extreme violence of child abuse, domestic warfare, life-threatening poverty, addiction, or state terrorism.
quotes.author: bell hooks

quotes.text: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I don't smoke marijuana anymore. I don't drink. Marijuana is a handicap. So is alcohol. Alcohol is a terrible handicap. But in spite of being a handicap, it shouldn't be criminal.
quotes.author: Gary Johnson

quotes.text: America was the place that said, 'It doesn't matter where you come from, it doesn't matter what your last name is, it doesn't matter if you drink cortaditos, or lattes, or coffee with milk. Here, if you work hard, anything is possible.'
quotes.author: Cristina Saralegui

quotes.text: A little learning is a dangerous thing; Drink deep, or taste not the Pierian spring.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.text: I am happy to make money. I want to make more money, make more music, eat Big Macs and drink Budweisers.
quotes.author: Kid Rock

quotes.text: A woman drove me to drink and I didn't even have the decency to thank her.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: Some people drink from the fountain of knowledge, others just gargle.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.text: Bats have no bankers and they do not drink and cannot be arrested and pay no tax and, in general, bats have it made.
quotes.author: John Berryman

quotes.text: Drink the first. Sip the second slowly. Skip the third.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.text: I have no taste for corruptible food nor for the pleasures of this life. I desire the Bread of God, which is the Flesh of Jesus Christ, who was of the seed of David, and for drink I desire His Blood, which is love incorruptible.
quotes.author: Ignatius of Antioch

quotes.text: Teetotallers lack the sympathy and generosity of men that drink.
quotes.author: W. H. Davies

quotes.text: Some writers take to drink, others take to audiences.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.text: I don't really like to drink. I don't like the way alcohol feels or tastes. On occasion I'll do it as a social thing, just to kind of go, 'Hey! I did something with you guys!'
quotes.author: Reggie Watts

quotes.text: Come, gentlemen, I hope we shall drink down all unkindness.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: I don't drink at lunchtime because I'm very weak at alcohol like most Asians.
quotes.author: Ha-Joon Chang

quotes.text: Many in the world are searching, often intensely, for a source of refreshment that will quench their yearning for meaning and direction in their lives. They crave a cool, satisfying drink of insight and knowledge that will soothe their parched souls.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.text: Get off your horse and drink your milk.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.text: You know, as a young child, I lay in my bedroom and I swore to myself then: 'I'm not going to smoke and I'm not going to drink.' And I said I'm not going to just say that when I'm a kid. I'm going to stick to that as an adult. I kept that in mind my whole life.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quotes.text: Life's not fair, is it? Some of us drink champagne in the fast lane, and some of us eat our sandwiches by the loose chippings on the A597.
quotes.author: Victoria Wood

quotes.text: There were years when I was a beer and tequila guy, then I got real fat. And then I found that you could actually go on a diet and drink scotch. Then I got hooked on scotch, and if you get hooked on scotch, then everything else just tastes wrong.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.text: All the screen cowboys behaved like real gentlemen. They didn't drink, they didn't smoke. When they knocked the bad guy down, they always stood with their fists up, waiting for the heavy to get back on his feet. I decided I was going to drag the bad guy to his feet and keep hitting him.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.text: The most important things to do in the world are to get something to eat, something to drink and somebody to love you.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.text: When I'm hungry, I eat. When I'm thirsty, I drink. When I feel like saying something, I say it.
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.text: Accept what people offer. Drink their milkshakes. Take their love.
quotes.author: Wally Lamb

quotes.text: If I'm a lush at anything, it's food and drink. I'm not materialistic in any way, but I value food.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.text: Honestly, I just try to live right, get enough sleep, and drink a lot of water. I do drink a lot of water; I do live by that. And just eating good clean food... I do love all of it. But I do definitely try to eat better organic food.
quotes.author: Keshia Knight Pulliam

quotes.text: And then you have the responsibility and the duty of being good examples to youngsters, not smoke, training hard, go to bed early, don't drink alcohol, don't take drugs, it's very important to have a policy for educating against doping.
quotes.author: Alberto Juantorena

quotes.text: I'm not a crazy granola person. I like to wear beautiful clothes, and I like having a glass of wine, but it doesn't mean I don't work out every day and drink green juices.
quotes.author: Phoebe Tonkin

quotes.text: I can remember a reporter asking me for a quote, and I didn't know what a quote was. I thought it was some kind of soft drink.
quotes.author: Joe DiMaggio

quotes.text: I'll make a horrible housewife. It's not like I'm disgusting, but I'm pretty bad about having a drink or eating something and then leaving the plate and rushing to go.
quotes.author: Camilla Luddington

quotes.text: Public opinion is a permeating influence, and it exacts obedience to itself; it requires us to drink other men's thoughts, to speak other men's words, to follow other men's habits.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.text: I try to greet my friends with a drink in my hand, a warm smile on my face, and great music in the background, because that's what gets a dinner party off to a fun start.
quotes.author: Ina Garten

quotes.text: I remain faithful to bourbon sour. It's absolutely delicious. You'd have to ask a bartender what's in it, but I think if you know you might never have a drink. I also love a little rum, 7 years aged, brown, when it is chilly, before dinner.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: I pretty much drink a cup of coffee, write in my journal for a while, and then sit at a computer in my office and torture the keys. My one saving grace as a writer is that, if I'm having trouble with the novel I'm writing, I write something else, a poem or a short story. I try to avoid writer's block by always writing something.
quotes.author: Jess Walter

quotes.text: If we eat any food, or drink any beverage, we must recite a blessing over them before and after.
quotes.author: Shmuel Yosef Agnon

quotes.text: I'm a little thirsty, can I go drink out of your toilet?
quotes.author: Mark McKinney

quotes.text: I don't go to the doctor except when I'm very ill, and when I go to India, I drink a drop of local water.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.text: Considering that Americans are now moving away from whiskey, moving away from brown spirits in general, I believe that they will all join Russians who drink vodka straight. They will sip it like cognac.
quotes.author: Roustam Tariko

quotes.text: What I like to drink most is wine that belongs to others.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.text: With every drop of water you drink, every breath you take, you're connected to the sea. No matter where on Earth you live. Most of the oxygen in the atmosphere is generated by the sea.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.text: Diet cola is my absolute favorite drink in the world; I used to drink four cans a day. But to help me cut down, I've turned it into a treat. Now, instead of having dessert, I'll have a can of diet soda. Putting a limit on how often I can drink it has helped me appreciate it more.
quotes.author: Kaley Cuoco

quotes.text: Drink! for you know not whence you came nor why: drink! for you know not why you go, nor where.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.text: Milk is for babies. When you grow up you have to drink beer.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: On long haul flights I always drink loads and loads of water and eat light and healthy food.
quotes.author: Lisa Snowdon

quotes.text: I still drink vodka; I'm not an advocate of drinking, but I'm no angel. I don't like grass, because it just makes me hungry.
quotes.author: Calvin Klein

quotes.text: I also eat fruit instead of drinking juices. That's something I've read up on. I think that if you drink a lot of fruit juice you take in way too much sugar. You'd be better off eating a bunch of strawberries or apples.
quotes.author: Kris Humphries

quotes.text: There are those who love to get dirty and fix things. They drink coffee at dawn, beer after work. And those who stay clean, just appreciate things. At breakfast they have milk and juice at night. There are those who do both, they drink tea.
quotes.author: Gary Snyder

quotes.text: If you are young and you drink a great deal it will spoil your health, slow your mind, make you fat - in other words, turn you into an adult.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: Humanity I love you because when you're hard up you pawn your intelligence to buy a drink.
quotes.author: e. e. cummings

quotes.text: I never had one beer. If I bought a six-pack of beer, I kept drinking till all six beers were gone. You have to have that kind of understanding about yourself. I haven't had a drink now in 12 years.
quotes.author: Samuel L. Jackson

quotes.text: Bliss is the ocean, a towel on the sand, the sun out, the chance to swim in waves or walk dragging a stick behind you, a good book, a cold drink.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.text: I think the Irish woman was freed from slavery by bingo. They can go out now, dressed up, with their handbags and have a drink and play bingo. And they deserve it.
quotes.author: John B. Keane

quotes.text: Strategy is buying a bottle of fine wine when you take a lady out for dinner. Tactics is getting her to drink it.
quotes.author: Frank Muir

quotes.text: In Mexico, when we want to speak deep secrets, we drink pulgue together. It is a drink made from the cactus plant, and when you take the bottle from your mouth, it leaves a string behind, between the mouth and the bottle, like a spider's web. It shows that the truth sticks inside.
quotes.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quotes.text: They who drink beer will think beer.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.text: I like whiskey. I always did, and that is why I never drink it.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.text: I drink coconut water before my workouts. It has just the right amount of calories and electrolytes to get me going. My body has actually started craving it.
quotes.author: Jennifer Morrison

quotes.text: I drink red wine on ice to water it down.
quotes.author: Diane Keaton

quotes.text: For watching sports, I tend to drink Guinness; early evenings always begin well with a Grey Goose and tonic with plenty of lime; and on a cold winter's night, there's nothing quite like a glass of Black Maple Hill... an absolute peach of a bourbon.
quotes.author: Martin Bashir

quotes.text: I never smoked. I never drank and I never took drugs. The funny thing is, nothing is more boring, people like this. For me, it's OK. But most of my friends, at least they smoke and drink.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.text: If I had to describe myself to an alien I'd say I was bigger than the average human, enjoy a drink or two with a good meal and have a bigger head than most. I'd also say I'm really handsome - especially if they were a female alien.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.text: There are only two real ways to get ahead today - sell liquor or drink it.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: I collect art, and I drink wine... things that I like that I had never been exposed to. But I never said, 'I'm going to buy art to impress this crowd.' That's just ridiculous to me. I don't live my life like that, because how could you be happy with yourself?
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.text: Sometimes too much to drink is barely enough.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Certainly the caffeine in coffee, whether it's Starbucks or generic coffee, is somewhat of a stimulant. But if you drink it in moderation, which I think four or five cups a day is, you're fine.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: Wealth is like sea-water; the more we drink, the thirstier we become; and the same is true of fame.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: What's great about this country is that America started the tradition where the richest consumers buy essentially the same things as the poorest. You can be watching TV and see Coca-Cola, and you can know that the President drinks Coke. Liz Taylor drinks Coke, and just think, you can drink Coke, too.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: I normally don't love green juices, but Body & Eden makes theirs tasty by blending ingredients like avocado and banana with the usual suspects like kale and spinach. Delicious as they are, they're low calorie, and the drink names are catchy: I Have Balance, I Have Energy, and my favorite, I Have Calm.
quotes.author: Gayle King

quotes.text: Looking beautiful isn't just about what you apply on your face. It's the little things you do that matter. A combination of a good diet, exercise, healthy habits, discipline, dancing etc. is what my beauty routine consists of. Also, I have no bad habits; I don't drink or smoke. All these contribute to me being fit and looking good.
quotes.author: Madhuri Dixit

quotes.text: We always get up about 5:30, and George gets up and goes in and gets the coffee and brings it to me, and that's been our ritual since we got married. And we read the newspapers in bed and drink coffee for about an hour probably, read our briefing papers.
quotes.author: Laura Bush

quotes.text: Drink and be thankful to the host! What seems insignificant when you have it, is important when you need it.
quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

quotes.text: I neither drink nor smoke, because my schoolmaster impressed upon me three cardinal virtues; cleanliness in person, cleanliness in mind; temperance.
quotes.author: John Burns

quotes.text: All the armies of Europe, Asia and Africa combined, with all the treasure of the earth (our own excepted) in their military chest; with a Buonaparte for a commander, could not by force, take a drink from the Ohio, or make a track on the Blue Ridge, in a trial of a thousand years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Worthless people live only to eat and drink; people of worth eat and drink only to live.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: I drink just as much tea when I'm in Los Angeles as I do when I'm in London. I take my tea bags with me wherever I go.
quotes.author: Helen Mirren

quotes.text: I never drink water; that is the stuff that rusts pipes.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: I am thankful for laughter, except when milk comes out of my nose.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: America was the place that said, 'It doesn't matter where you come from, it doesn't matter what your last name is, it doesn't matter if you drink cortaditos, or lattes, or coffee with milk. Here, if you work hard, anything is possible.'
quotes.author: Cristina Saralegui

quotes.text: My days in hostel were tough. I was ragged by my seniors. We were asked to wash their dirty clothes, do their odd jobs, etc. When it came to eating, we would be often given burnt rotis and milk that had awful odour. But, never once did I call home. I knew if I had to become a tough cricketer, I would have to handle the pressure.
quotes.author: Suresh Raina

quotes.text: Canada is like an old cow. The West feeds it. Ontario and Quebec milk it. And you can well imagine what it's doing in the Maritimes.
quotes.author: Tommy Douglas

quotes.text: Coconut milk is the only thing on this planet that comes identically to mother's milk.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.text: I'm a big kid. I love drinking chocolate milk. I'm not afraid to watch some cartoons once in a while when I'm with my nieces and actually be attentive.
quotes.author: Billy Horschel

quotes.text: I love cheeseburgers and chocolate - milk, not dark, and hot chocolate with marshmallows in the winter!
quotes.author: Nina Dobrev

quotes.text: Get off your horse and drink your milk.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.text: The cow is of the bovine ilk; one end is moo, the other milk.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.text: Focus on eating real, whole, natural foods. As I love to say, if you can pick it, pluck it, milk it, or shoot it, you can eat it!
quotes.author: Suzanne Somers

quotes.text: I have a dream to provide every Chinese, especially children, sufficient milk each day.
quotes.author: Wen Jiabao

quotes.text: Stay away from milk. It is nature's perfect food - but only if you are a calf.
quotes.author: Mark Hyman

quotes.text: I do hold very strongly that tea is better in England. There's something in the milk. They must have special cows.
quotes.author: Gail Carriger

quotes.text: I feed my kids organic food and milk, but I've also been known to buy the odd Lunchable. My kids are not allowed to watch TV during the week, but on weekends even the 2-year-old veges out to 'The Simpsons.'
quotes.author: Ayelet Waldman

quotes.text: While pimples are not as simple as too much milk or sugar in your diet, both have a significant impact. Nutritional deficiencies as well as excesses can worsen acne.
quotes.author: Mark Hyman

quotes.text: My name is Harvey Milk and I'm here to recruit you.
quotes.author: Harvey Milk

quotes.text: Never cry over spilt milk, because it may have been poisoned.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: If one commits the act of sodomy with a cow, an ewe, or a camel, their urine and their excrements become impure, and even their milk may no longer be consumed. The animal must then be killed and as quickly as possible and burned.
quotes.author: Ruhollah Khomeini

quotes.text: Milk is for babies. When you grow up you have to drink beer.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: I received so many hate letters when I breast-fed a starving baby in Africa. I was in Sierra Leone in 2009 and I was weaning my child at that time - she was not there with me. There was a hungry baby who was crying because his mother had no milk, and I thought, 'Why throw away my milk if I can give it to a baby who needs it?'
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.text: I love milk so much! I make a point of drinking a glass of milk every day. So now anyone who did those milk ads with the milk mustaches, they're my heroes.
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.text: There are those who love to get dirty and fix things. They drink coffee at dawn, beer after work. And those who stay clean, just appreciate things. At breakfast they have milk and juice at night. There are those who do both, they drink tea.
quotes.author: Gary Snyder

quotes.text: Cheese is milk's leap toward immortality.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.text: Ireland, in breadth, and for wholesomeness and serenity of climate, far surpasses Britain; for the snow scarcely ever lies there above three days: no man makes hay in the summer for winter's provision, or builds stables for his beasts of burden... the island abounds in milk and honey.
quotes.author: Venerable Bede

quotes.text: I grew up in a household that was a labor household. My dad was a Teamster and a milk truck driver. My mother was a secretary. Neither of them got through high school. But they worked hard and they gave me very, very important opportunities to go to school, get a good education.
quotes.author: Dick Gephardt

quotes.text: Some people regard private enterprise as a predatory tiger to be shot. Others look on it as a cow they can milk. Not enough people see it as a healthy horse, pulling a sturdy wagon.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Man is the only creature that consumes without producing. He does not give milk, he does not lay eggs, he is too weak to pull the plough, he cannot run fast enough to catch rabbits. Yet he is lord of all the animals.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: As a child, I lived with being punier than other boys in class. The only consolation was my parents' empathy - they encouraged constant trips to the local drugstore for chocolate milk shakes to fatten me up. The shakes made me happy, but still, all through grammar school, other kids shoved me around.
quotes.author: James D. Watson

quotes.text: Think what a better world it would be if we all, the whole world, had cookies and milk about three o'clock every afternoon and then lay down on our blankets for a nap.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.text: The two basic items necessary to sustain life are sunshine and coconut milk.
quotes.author: Dustin Hoffman

quotes.text: I'm brilliant at cooking my stepmother's scrambled egg recipe. The secret is to put eggs, butter, milk, and seasoning together in the saucepan, and to keep stirring with a wooden spoon under a low heat until the preferred consistency is reached.
quotes.author: Ian Mckellen

quotes.text: You know, you only get to live life once, so there are two things that that yields. One is that there's no point in crying over spilt milk, but secondly you hate wasting time, energy, and whatever talent you've got.
quotes.author: David Miliband

quotes.text: Ice cream was my undoing, and six chocolate milk shakes in a row were nothing to me at one time.
quotes.author: Kate Smith

quotes.text: On the broad spectrum of solitude, I lean toward the extreme end: I work alone, as well as live alone, so I can pass an entire day without uttering so much as a hello to another human being. Sometimes a day's conversation consists of only five words, uttered at the local Starbucks: 'Large coffee with milk, please.'
quotes.author: Caroline Knapp

quotes.text: I don't believe that you have to be a cow to know what milk is.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: I don't like looking back. I'm always constantly looking forward. I'm not the one to sort of sit and cry over spilt milk. I'm too busy looking for the next cow.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.text: To me, breakfast is my most important meal. It's often the meal you play a game on. I make sure I have oatmeal, milk, and fruit. It's the fuel you use to hopefully do your best, so eating right is a big part of being a professional athlete. I wish I paid more attention to it earlier in my life.
quotes.author: Andrew Luck

quotes.text: We were so poor as kids. I didn't even see a bathtub, running water, hot water, commode - we didn't have any of that. We started with a humble log house, milk cow, garden-raised our own food, killed a hog every year in the fall, and had the meat hanging up in the smokehouse - that was our childhood, me and ol' Si.
quotes.author: Phil Robertson

quotes.text: There's no such thing as soy milk. It's soy juice.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.text: A true yogi may remain dutifully in the world; there, he is like butter on water and not like the easily-diluted milk of unchurned and undisciplined humanity.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.text: My first job was in sixth grade, sweeping the clay tennis courts at the yacht club near my house, which I was not a member of. Always had to pay my own rent. But I don't really have any concept of how money works. I don't know how much things cost. Like a BMW. Or a quart of milk. It's embarrassing.
quotes.author: Chloe Sevigny

quotes.text: I'd rather see you drink a glass of wine than a glass of milk. So many people drink Coca-Cola and all these soft drinks with sugar. Some of these drinks have 8 or 9 teaspoons of sugar in them What's the good of living if you can't have the things that give a little enjoyment?
quotes.author: Jack LaLanne

quotes.text: I always make my favorite pancakes with milk, and I also add some fruit - like a banana or apple with some cinnamon sprinkled on top. I also sometimes put peanut butter on my pancakes!
quotes.author: Gabriela Isler

quotes.text: You can only milk a cow so long, then you're left holding the pail.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.text: They told me I gave the best milk mustache of anybody.
quotes.author: Yasmine Bleeth

quotes.text: I start the day with oatmeal with vanilla almond milk. If I don't, I'm dying by noon and eating everything in sight. On-set, I avoid crap and pack soup and salad. I cook pork chops or turkey tacos for dinner.
quotes.author: Kaley Cuoco

quotes.text: How do you know someone is a grandparent? They've got milk stains on every shirt from burping babies. Their pants are worn out at the knees from crawling around giving pony rides. They have 2,842 pictures of the grandkids on their smart phone and not one photo of their spouse.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: Not only do I know how to milk a cow, but I know how to herd a bunch of cows, too, which is a life skill that I think may come in handy someday.
quotes.author: Martina McBride

quotes.text: I have the same thing every day. I find it comforting. I have a banana, but I can never eat the whole banana. And I'll drink a couple of Actimels. And some kind of cereal with almond milk. And then after that, I have a Coke.
quotes.author: Brandon Flowers

quotes.text: I have this wonderful personal chef who sources and stocks all my organic produce and I basically live on five smoothies a day. I'm totally vegan. I blend this green concoction with kale, cucumber, broccoli, string beans, avocado. My protein comes from protein powder. There is absolutely no milk, butter, cheese.
quotes.author: Larry Hagman

quotes.text: If we could do high-speed rail in California just half a notch above what they've done on the Shanghai line in China, and if we had a straight path from L.A. to San Francisco, as well as the milk run, at least that would be progress.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: I do all of the grocery shopping in my little family. I buy cheese, of many different kinds, sliced packaged meats and poultry, bagels, immense quantities of eggs, pre-made fried chicken. Milk. Bacon. It is insane how much dairy, deli and bakery stuff I buy.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.text: There is always room for losers in the football business. They are the mother's milk of gambling, and why not? Somebody has to do it, or there won't be any winners.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: I always have breakfast, say, scrambled egg whites, a vegetable smoothie, or whole-grain cereal with low-fat milk. For lunch and dinner, I eat a lot of fish and vegetables. And throughout the day, I try to stay hydrated.
quotes.author: Beyonce Knowles

quotes.text: I'm the fussiest eater on earth; my husband despairs. I like chicken and pasta, and can't resist milk chocolate. I figure if you're going to do something naughty, make it really enjoyable.
quotes.author: Bonnie Langford

quotes.text: I asked the waiter, 'Is this milk fresh?' He said, 'Lady, three hours ago it was grass.'
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.text: You don't put milk in chamomile tea - that's disgusting behavior! That's not right.
quotes.author: Laura Fraser

quotes.text: Patriarchy is impotent and qualitatively unable to solve even the most simple problems in the cosmos such as picking up their own socks or placing a carton of milk back in the refrigerator after drinking from it.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.text: The White Company offers its loyalists an altogether better, whiter world. The White people have edited out any colours that aren't white, off-white, milk chocolate, grey, taupe or black. They can't be doing with Johnnie Boden's cheery Sloane jokes, his spots and stripes, his occasional 'if it's me, it's U' loud colours.
quotes.author: Peter York

quotes.text: I love eating it - grilled chicken, pasta, rice, and other foods that give me long term energy. Every once in a while, my sweet tooth gets the best of me and I have to snack on some candy. Beverage wise, I stick to sports drinks, water, milk, and juice.
quotes.author: Derrick Rose

quotes.text: Maybe it's a little ambitious of me to presume that no matter how big the film is, that I can always go down to the shop to buy a pint of milk.
quotes.author: Tom Hardy

quotes.text: I grew up in a farming family. I hated cleaning out the chickens but loved hatching them and feeding the new born sheep. The smell of hot milk still has a special resonance for me. Harvest was back-breaking work, though... Where do you think Jesus got his biceps from?
quotes.author: Joseph Mawle

quotes.text: That's one thing people don't know about me - I eat in my sleep. I can't keep things in the house; I literally have in my refrigerator water, coconut water, orange juice, hemp milk and like, tea bags. And that's really it. Because I eat in my sleep.
quotes.author: Denise Vasi

quotes.text: I won't eat any cereal that doesn't turn the milk purple.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: I'm active even on bad days; it's tough to pin me down. People ask me if I'm a morning or night person. I'm an all-the-time person. I like drinking coffee, but I do it with lots of milk because my energy levels are high even without caffeine. You could call me Obelix, except I don't have a belly.
quotes.author: Bipasha Basu

quotes.text: I mean, there's no point in sittin' around and cryin' about spilt milk. Gotta move on.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.text: The way to my heart is through Belgian milk chocolate.
quotes.author: Emma Donoghue

quotes.text: My grandfather milked several cows twice a day and supplied the neighbours with dairy products. He liked to go visiting around the county on Saturdays, and he also enjoyed the neighbours when they came by once a week with their empty milk jars. He walked them out to their cars and hung over the driver's side window until they drove off.
quotes.author: Kary Mullis

quotes.text: Gravy is the simplest, tastiest, most memory-laden dish I know how to make: a little flour, salt and pepper, crispy bits of whatever meat anchored the meal, a couple of cups of water or milk and slow stirring to break up lumps.
quotes.author: Dorothy Allison

quotes.text: If a cow walked into this room, I'd probably walk out. I could milk it, but my dad never forced me to do a lot of chores like that, mostly because he loved doing it himself.
quotes.author: Stuart Appleby

quotes.text: My boyfriend and I live together, which means we don't have sex - ever. Now that the milk is free, we've both become lactose intolerant.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.text: Written by a sponge dipped in warm milk and sprinkled with sugar.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.text: I miss Irish milk. Probably not as much as Superquinn sausages.
quotes.author: Tristan MacManus

quotes.text: I was the all-American face. You name it, honey - American Dairy Milk, Metropolitan Life insurance, McDonald's, Burger King. The Face That Didn't Matter - that's what I called my face.
quotes.author: Debra Winger

quotes.text: A corpse is meat gone bad. Well and what's cheese? Corpse of milk.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.text: Our milk chocolate is very chocolaty. In fact, we don't call it milk chocolate - we call it milky chocolate.
quotes.author: Alain Ducasse

quotes.text: I write in order to attain that feeling of tension relieved and function achieved which a cow enjoys on giving milk.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: The shelf life of the modern hardback writer is somewhere between the milk and the yogurt.
quotes.author: John Mortimer

quotes.text: If you do not milk the cow fully, it falls sick.
quotes.author: Lalu Prasad Yadav

quotes.text: Midwestern people stick together. Gee willikers, they work hard. There's no glitz, no glamour. When I was a girl in Duluth, Minnesota, I used to get up early and milk cows, so I know what hard work is.
quotes.author: Gena Lee Nolin

quotes.text: If this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: I don't know how people live without coffee, I really don't.
quotes.author: Martha Quinn

quotes.text: I like to sit down, relax, have a cup of coffee on the terrace and read a book. I like to travel the world - and I'm lucky to see so much through cycling.
quotes.author: Marianne Vos

quotes.text: I like coffee because it gives me the illusion that I might be awake.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.text: I think the biggest misconception about me is people really don't know who I really am. They see the party side of me, they see the crazy side of me. But I also have a laid-back side. You know, I'm chill, down to earth. If you want to grab a cup of coffee and just talk about life, I can do that.
quotes.author: Nicole Polizzi

quotes.text: America was the place that said, 'It doesn't matter where you come from, it doesn't matter what your last name is, it doesn't matter if you drink cortaditos, or lattes, or coffee with milk. Here, if you work hard, anything is possible.'
quotes.author: Cristina Saralegui

quotes.text: I love coffee. It's one of my favorite things in the world, and I love tasting different coffees.
quotes.author: Max Schneider

quotes.text: Coffee is a language in itself.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.text: Once you wake up and smell the coffee, it's hard to go back to sleep.
quotes.author: Fran Drescher

quotes.text: I can't imagine a day without coffee. I can't imagine!
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: I wake up some mornings and sit and have my coffee and look out at my beautiful garden, and I go, 'Remember how good this is. Because you can lose it.'
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.text: The muse holds no appointments. You can never call on it. I don't understand people who get up at 9 o'clock in the morning, put on the coffee and sit down to write.
quotes.author: Glen Hansard

quotes.text: I force people to have coffee with me, just because I don't trust that a friendship can be maintained without any other senses besides a computer or cellphone screen.
quotes.author: John Cusack

quotes.text: I wake up at 4:15 A.M., get some coffee, turn on the news, see what's happening, go clickety-clack on the web to see what I missed overnight. Then I go to the gym, around 5:15, and I do what appears to be a very light workout, but who cares. I'm socializing with other nice people at the gym. Then I go into work, and I'm really awake.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.text: I get up at sunrise. I'm a Buddhist, so I chant in the morning. My wife and I sit and have coffee together, but then it's list-making time. I have carpentry projects. We have roads we keep in repair. It's not back-breaking, but it's certainly aerobic and mildly strenuous.
quotes.author: Patrick Duffy

quotes.text: If I asked for a cup of coffee, someone would search for the double meaning.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: It seems to me that trying to live without friends is like milking a bear to get cream for your morning coffee. It is a whole lot of trouble, and then not worth much after you get it.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.text: Too much coffee. Too much coffee and Gatorade. It's a hell of a mix. If you're ever tired in the morning, just try that mix, and tell me what you think.
quotes.author: Kevin Garnett

quotes.text: A 41-inch bust and a lot of perseverance will get you more than a cup of coffee - a lot more.
quotes.author: Jayne Mansfield

quotes.text: So in our pride we ordered for breakfast an omelet, toast and coffee and what has just arrived is a tomato salad with onions, a dish of pickles, a big slice of watermelon and two bottles of cream soda.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.text: I pretty much drink a cup of coffee, write in my journal for a while, and then sit at a computer in my office and torture the keys. My one saving grace as a writer is that, if I'm having trouble with the novel I'm writing, I write something else, a poem or a short story. I try to avoid writer's block by always writing something.
quotes.author: Jess Walter

quotes.text: I found 'The Twin' sitting on a coffee table at a writers' colony in 2009. It carried praise from J.M. Coetzee. That seemed ample justification for using it to avoid my own writing. I finished it - weeping - a day later, and I've been puzzling over its powerful hold on me ever since.
quotes.author: Amy Waldman

quotes.text: During my breakdown, many things, tiny things I had not even registered before, had begun to torment me with guilt. I used to steal Splenda from Starbucks. I would go into a Starbucks whenever I needed the sweetener and would take a fistful of packets, even when I didn't buy a coffee.
quotes.author: Akhil Sharma

quotes.text: Karma is experience, and experience creates memory, and memory creates imagination and desire, and desire creates karma again. If I buy a cup of coffee, that's karma. I now have that memory that might give me the potential desire for having cappuccino, and I walk into Starbucks, and there's karma all over again.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.text: I never let politics get personal. You can have the most intense, heated debate on issues, and so long as you keep it on issues, you can go out and have coffee afterwards and you're good friends.
quotes.author: Phil Crane

quotes.text: Coffee and cigarettes, that's one of my weaknesses.
quotes.author: Jason Behr

quotes.text: I have an affinity for the old Seattle coffee shops, places like the Green Onion and the Copper Kettle, the classic kind of coffee bar - little places that served breakfast, lunch and dinner and have pretty much disappeared.
quotes.author: Tom Douglas

quotes.text: Chicago is constantly auditioning for the world, determined that one day, on the streets of Barcelona, in Berlin's cabarets, in the coffee shops of Istanbul, people will know and love us in our multidimensional glory, dream of us the way they dream of San Francisco and New York.
quotes.author: Mary Schmich

quotes.text: I smoke as much as I want and chew tobacco a good deal of the time. I don't pay any attention to the rules for keeping in physical condition. I think they are a lot of bunk. The less you worry about the effect of tea and coffee on the lining of your stomach, the longer you will live, and the happier you will be.
quotes.author: Zack Wheat

quotes.text: There are those who love to get dirty and fix things. They drink coffee at dawn, beer after work. And those who stay clean, just appreciate things. At breakfast they have milk and juice at night. There are those who do both, they drink tea.
quotes.author: Gary Snyder

quotes.text: Our job is to represent the truth of human nature, whether you're playing a tender love story that's set in a coffee shop or whether you're in 'The Avengers,' which is set in a Manhattan which is exploding.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.text: I like light green, sometimes red is fun to look at, not a fan of yellow, unless it's in a rainbow or on a coffee mug or on a happy face.
quotes.author: Chris Kattan

quotes.text: A mathematician is a device for turning coffee into theorems.
quotes.author: Paul Erdos

quotes.text: I gave up coffee. It's almost worse than giving up a lover.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.text: Abundant choice doesn't force us to look for the absolute best of everything. It allows us to find the extremes in those things we really care about, whether that means great coffee, jeans cut wide across the hips, or a spouse who shares your zeal for mountaineering, Zen meditation, and science fiction.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.text: When I get up, I have a cup of coffee, surf the Internet, then do a half-hour run.
quotes.author: Katarina Witt

quotes.text: You don't even really need a place. But you feel like you're doing something. That is what coffee is. And that is one of the geniuses of the new coffee culture.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: I could serve coffee using my rear as a ledge.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.text: I get up, go and get a coffee, and go do the crossword - I'm loyal to one particular paper, the 'Guardian' - and that's my idea of a perfect morning.
quotes.author: Laura Marling

quotes.text: The one thing I don't consume during 'Today' - which surprises many people - is coffee. I find that a lot of water helps wake me up, without the buzz. I love coffee, but usually reserve a double espresso as an afternoon pick-me-up before settling in to do the weekend 'Nightly News.'
quotes.author: Lester Holt

quotes.text: Certainly the caffeine in coffee, whether it's Starbucks or generic coffee, is somewhat of a stimulant. But if you drink it in moderation, which I think four or five cups a day is, you're fine.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: I was taken by the power that savoring a simple cup of coffee can have to connect people and create community.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: Starbucks represents something beyond a cup of coffee.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: When you wash your hands, when you make a cup of coffee, when you're waiting for the elevator - instead of indulging in thinking, these are all opportunities for being there as a still, alert presence.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: I like cappuccino, actually. But even a bad cup of coffee is better than no coffee at all.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.text: Emotions are contagious. We've all known it experientially. You know after you have a really fun coffee with a friend, you feel good. When you have a rude clerk in a store, you walk away feeling bad.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.text: I sit in places like Costa Coffee in Banstead and write rubbish. I need a deadline. I think about the 44 tour dates and keep imagining standing in front of all these people. Then every day I write 15 jokes minimum.
quotes.author: Tim Vine

quotes.text: We always get up about 5:30, and George gets up and goes in and gets the coffee and brings it to me, and that's been our ritual since we got married. And we read the newspapers in bed and drink coffee for about an hour probably, read our briefing papers.
quotes.author: Laura Bush

quotes.text: Science may never come up with a better office communication system than the coffee break.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.text: I believe in breakfast. It's the one meal that my kids usually eat without a fuss, so that's huge. As for myself, I can't function without it, and I see it as a great way to get some healthy greens in, some coffee, and on a good day, maybe even some news of the world via the newspaper.
quotes.author: Samantha Bee

quotes.text: Well, they're Southern people, and if they know you are working at home they think nothing of walking right in for coffee. But they wouldn't dream of interrupting you at golf.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.text: We are big composters. We compost everything - bread, tea bags, coffee grounds. I even dump out my old coffee in the garden. We keep a mixing bowl on the counter and just fill it up as the day goes along, then dump it in the mulch pile before dinner and wash it with the dinner dishes.
quotes.author: Katherine Center

quotes.text: Good communication is as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard.
quotes.author: Anne Spencer

quotes.text: Do Lipton employees take coffee breaks?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: To me, the smell of fresh-made coffee is one of the greatest inventions.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.text: Doing 20 minutes of stretching, light weights and floor exercises three times a week takes the same amount of time as a long coffee break - and eating a tuna fish salad, sardines on toast or scrambled eggs is surely preferable to a Big Mac or KFC.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.text: Our printing press is the Internet. Our coffee houses are social networks.
quotes.author: Heather Brooke

quotes.text: Starbucks has a role and a meaningful relationship with people that is not only about the coffee.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: I am a coffee fanatic. Once you go to proper coffee, you can't go back. You cannot go back.
quotes.author: Hugh Laurie

quotes.text: On the broad spectrum of solitude, I lean toward the extreme end: I work alone, as well as live alone, so I can pass an entire day without uttering so much as a hello to another human being. Sometimes a day's conversation consists of only five words, uttered at the local Starbucks: 'Large coffee with milk, please.'
quotes.author: Caroline Knapp

quotes.text: Good communication is just as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.text: When traveling with someone, take large does of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.text: My dream is to have a house on the beach, even just a little shack somewhere so I can wake up, have coffee, look at dolphins, be quiet and breathe the air.
quotes.author: Christina Applegate

quotes.text: Like everyone else who makes the mistake of getting older, I begin each day with coffee and obituaries.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.text: In my tradition, one must wait until one has learned a lot of Bible and Talmud and the Prophets to handle mysticism. This isn't instant coffee. There is no instant mysticism.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.text: If I were running a campaign, I'd urge taking the mountain of money reportedly squandered on pizza, coffee and bagels and spending it more wisely - on a talented young comedy writer.
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.text: I never drink coffee at lunch. I find it keeps me awake for the afternoon.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: I make a mean cup of coffee, if you give me the right ingredients.
quotes.author: Ice Cube

quotes.text: I'm not one of those people who wakes up and thinks, 'Bring on the day!' I have to have about 7 pints of coffee before I'm even remotely awake. But I love the golden hour in the evening, as hokey as that sounds. Just as the sun is about to set and you get those lovely shadows and everything looks gold and yellow.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.text: Do you know how helpless you feel if you have a full cup of coffee in your hand and you start to sneeze?
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.text: We want to do a lot of stuff; we're not in great shape. We didn't get a good night's sleep. We're a little depressed. Coffee solves all these problems in one delightful little cup.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: Going home, spending time with the family, I feel they're my friends as well, all of them. I look forward to meeting any one of them for a coffee, and when we all get together, I just love it.
quotes.author: Domhnall Gleeson

quotes.text: If it wasn't for the coffee, I'd have no identifiable personality whatsover.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.text: Do you know how many calories are in butter and cheese and ice cream? Would you get your dog up in the morning for a cup of coffee and a donut?
quotes.author: Jack LaLanne

quotes.text: A girl in a bikini is like having a loaded pistol on your coffee table - There's nothing wrong with them, but it's hard to stop thinking about it.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.text: It's quite amazing to me, as I walk around a supermarket or a health food shop, to observe the number of Fairtrade choices: not just staples such as coffee, tea, fresh fruits and rice, but cocoa and chocolate, herbs and spices, honey, ice cream, and jams.
quotes.author: Sheherazade Goldsmith

quotes.text: I usually write away from home, in coffee shops, on trains, on planes, in friends' houses. I like places where there's stuff going on that you can lift your eyes, see something interesting, overhear a conversation.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.text: My perfect morning is spent drinking coffee, eating porridge and reading the paper at a local cafe.
quotes.author: Anton du Beke

quotes.text: I carry an umbrella when I am outdoors and always wear sunscreen, even when I am sitting in front of a computer screen! I never touch coffee or other caffeinated drinks.
quotes.author: Fan Bingbing

quotes.text: My dad had always been a big decaf coffee drinker. But my mom had always been more of a tea drinker. So I grew up around a lot of tea. And I also really love tea. But I'm not one of those people who has ever felt the need to choose between coffee and tea. I think that is a completely false dichotomy.
quotes.author: Chelsea Clinton

quotes.text: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: If this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: When you have nobody you can make a cup of tea for, when nobody needs you, that's when I think life is over.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Come, let us have some tea and continue to talk about happy things.
quotes.author: Chaim Potok

quotes.text: You can't get a cup of tea big enough or a book long enough to suit me.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: I'm not everybody's cup of tea. But sometimes criticism can be hurtful. Be respectful. I'm a good piano player, I can sing well, I write good songs. If you don't like it, fair enough. But give me a break.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.text: The teapot takes in water and gives out tea. So the human individual takes in anything you give him and promptly transforms it; he is ready to give you out again his own reactions - first, in thought and emotion, then in voice or action.
quotes.author: Louis MacNeice

quotes.text: I was in Yorkshire. We were a family of five and I used to be sent sometimes to get the rations for the week and I was easily able to carry them back. It was like one egg and a tiny bit of tea.
quotes.author: Judi Dench

quotes.text: A Tea Party tidal wave is coming.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.text: If immigration reform passes, it'll be a big victory for sanity - nobody really believes it's healthy for a country to have millions and millions of undocumented noncitizens living in the shadows. But it'll also be a sign that the Republican Party has gotten tired of letting the Tea Party push it around.
quotes.author: Gail Collins

quotes.text: I would make tea for Joni Mitchell or clean her car, anything to be in the studio and watch her work.
quotes.author: Sheena Easton

quotes.text: I do hold very strongly that tea is better in England. There's something in the milk. They must have special cows.
quotes.author: Gail Carriger

quotes.text: I was mixing iced tea and lemonade in my kitchen since as long as I can remember. It wasn't until some time in the early 1960s that it became associated with me publicly.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.text: Growing up in Ireland, when my family received important news, good or bad, we would boil water and make tea. It was the first thing I did when my father died in 1984. This ritual allowed me a moment to take in the enormity of what had happened.
quotes.author: Roma Downey

quotes.text: I have a Viking stove. The color is butter lemon, and I had to wait several months for it, because that color wasn't available and I really wanted butter lemon! But I don't know that it's seriously ever been cooked on. I mean, I make tea every morning. Does that count?
quotes.author: Andy Cohen

quotes.text: Where there's tea there's hope.
quotes.author: Arthur Wing Pinero

quotes.text: The days when the words 'Hollywood actor' framed Ronald Reagan like bunny fingers as an ID tag and an implied insult seem far-off and quaint: nearly everybody in politics - candidate, consultant, pundit, and Tea Party crowd extra alike - is an actor now, a shameless ham in a hoked-up reality series that never stops.
quotes.author: James Wolcott

quotes.text: That I survived the Holocaust and went on to love beautiful girls, to talk, to write, to have toast and tea and live my life - that is what is abnormal.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.text: I smoke as much as I want and chew tobacco a good deal of the time. I don't pay any attention to the rules for keeping in physical condition. I think they are a lot of bunk. The less you worry about the effect of tea and coffee on the lining of your stomach, the longer you will live, and the happier you will be.
quotes.author: Zack Wheat

quotes.text: There are those who love to get dirty and fix things. They drink coffee at dawn, beer after work. And those who stay clean, just appreciate things. At breakfast they have milk and juice at night. There are those who do both, they drink tea.
quotes.author: Gary Snyder

quotes.text: I got nasty habits; I take tea at three.
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.text: I don't want to be in my car all day. I love getting up in the morning in Venice and walking my dogs down to the cafe to get my tea, and then perhaps going to a bookstore and sitting and reading, then walking to the beach.
quotes.author: Jessica Chastain

quotes.text: I liked being a teenager, but I would not go back for all the tea in China.
quotes.author: Rob Lowe

quotes.text: This morning, I went to wipe my hands on a tea towel, and while I was using it, it seemed like it felt a bit light. I unfolded it and realized my daughter had cut little bits out of it to make frocks for her dolls!
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.text: His track record of pragmatism, depth and candor all speak to a person who would find the Tea Party simplistic, opportunistic and misguided. Reagan was surrounded by some very smart people who gave him very sound advice. They were not wondering where certain countries are on the map.
quotes.author: Eugene Jarecki

quotes.text: Never trust a man, who when left alone with a tea cosey... Doesn't try it on.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.text: I'm not sure whether I've been happy. After my last book tour, I sat on my balcony with a cup of tea. I thought: 'You can't rewind the movie. I've spent more than half my life in the Middle East. There have been great moments of horror and depression and loneliness.'
quotes.author: Robert Fisk

quotes.text: Drama's not safe and it's not pretty and it's not kind. People expect the basic template of television drama where there might be naughty villains, but everyone ends up having a nice cup of tea. You've got to do big moral choices and show the terrible things people do in terrible situations. Drama is failing if it doesn't do that.
quotes.author: Russell T Davies

quotes.text: We are big composters. We compost everything - bread, tea bags, coffee grounds. I even dump out my old coffee in the garden. We keep a mixing bowl on the counter and just fill it up as the day goes along, then dump it in the mulch pile before dinner and wash it with the dinner dishes.
quotes.author: Katherine Center

quotes.text: To a philosopher all news, as it is called, is gossip, and they who edit and read it are old women over their tea.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: I drink just as much tea when I'm in Los Angeles as I do when I'm in London. I take my tea bags with me wherever I go.
quotes.author: Helen Mirren

quotes.text: There are few hours in life more agreeable than the hour dedicated to the ceremony known as afternoon tea.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.text: People started saying I was ignoring my country, making up stories about me. Ludicrous things, like that I throw tea on my assistants.
quotes.author: Joss Stone

quotes.text: The liberal feminist movement never imagined that women would take seriously the encouragement to become our own heroes and claim life for ourselves, on our terms, no matter who we are. Pro-choice and pro-life, Christian and not, poor and rich, black, white, gay and straight. It is a dream we all hold dear, and it's called the Tea Party.
quotes.author: Tammy Bruce

quotes.text: People are familiar with 'the stick' of the Tea Party... challenging incumbents, flooding the phone lines. What they're not so much familiar with, and what I want to expand, is 'the carrot.' So when a Mitch McConnell, or when a Republican caucus stands firm... we have to reward them.
quotes.author: Niger Innis

quotes.text: I don't know what's happened to me. I've got a bit more sophisticated in my old age. I like a bit of jasmine tea. I love it.
quotes.author: Danny Dyer

quotes.text: I wanted to be a singer forever. But it's not really my cup of tea. Having the whole world know who you are.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.text: Let's be very honest about what this is about. It's not about bashing Democrats, it's not about taxes, they have no idea what the Boston tea party was about, they don't know their history at all. This is about hating a black man in the White House. This is racism straight up.
quotes.author: Janeane Garofalo

quotes.text: I have a message from the Tea Party, a message that is loud and clear and does not mince words. We've come to take our government back.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.text: I put hibiscus flower in every cup of tea I have. It's sweet, sexy, and cleansing.
quotes.author: Mario Batali

quotes.text: Brewing a good cuppa is something not everyone can do, and I loathe bad tea.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.text: It's quite amazing to me, as I walk around a supermarket or a health food shop, to observe the number of Fairtrade choices: not just staples such as coffee, tea, fresh fruits and rice, but cocoa and chocolate, herbs and spices, honey, ice cream, and jams.
quotes.author: Sheherazade Goldsmith

quotes.text: Interestingly, the actress who, in her own persona, may be gentle, shy, and socially awkward, someone whose hand trembles when pouring a cup of tea for a visiting friend, can convincingly portray an elegant, cruel aristocrat tossing off malicious epigrams in an eighteenth-century chocolate house.
quotes.author: Wallace Shawn

quotes.text: There's absolutely nothing irrational about me; insane, yes, irrational, no. But my dumbest fear would be spinning in the magic tea cups. Who the hell wants to pay to spin around like a bent yoyo for laughs?
quotes.author: Akshay Kumar

quotes.text: My dad had always been a big decaf coffee drinker. But my mom had always been more of a tea drinker. So I grew up around a lot of tea. And I also really love tea. But I'm not one of those people who has ever felt the need to choose between coffee and tea. I think that is a completely false dichotomy.
quotes.author: Chelsea Clinton

quotes.text: I'm a green tea addict, though the occasional glass of red wine is nice, too.
quotes.author: Shilpa Shetty

quotes.text: I'm not in the business of reading tea leaves. I don't have a crystal ball.
quotes.author: Christine Lagarde

quotes.text: I was gone so much in my first marriage. I love the moments when I engage with my youngest daughter now. It's not my thing to sit on the ground and play tea party, but I'll do it because it's a moment that will stick with me forever.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.text: As much as you can eat healthy, it's also important to remember to drink healthy too. Tea is very healing.
quotes.author: Kristin Chenoweth

quotes.text: The growth of the company and the license that Starbucks has is to participate in other food and beverage opportunities. We have a global business... and in many parts of the world, tea is much, much bigger than coffee, and we're going to bring tea and bring our capability and our understanding of what we've done for coffee to tea.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: England was full of words I'd never heard before - streaky bacon, short back and sides, Belisha beacon, serviettes, high tea, ice-cream cornet.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.text: Cricket makes no sense to me. I find it beautiful to watch and I like that they break for tea. That is very cool, but I don't understand. My friends from The Clash tried to explain it years and years ago, but I didn't understand what they were talking about.
quotes.author: Jim Jarmusch

quotes.text: I'm a Cancerian, the typical crab with the tough outer shell and the soft bit in the middle. I don't think I'll ever come to terms with people being unnecessarily nasty, but I can take it if someone doesn't like my music - I'm not everyone's cup of tea.
quotes.author: Katherine Jenkins

quotes.text: I would rather have a cup of tea than sex.
quotes.author: Boy George

quotes.text: The tea partiers are a great addition. The tea partiers have invigorated a base that has been dormant for a long period of time. We're going to have a broad array of different views in our Republican conference, and I think it might be more interesting than any I've been in in a long time.
quotes.author: John McCain

quotes.text: Baseball is a red-blooded sport for red-blooded men. It's no pink tea, and mollycoddles had better stay out. It's a struggle for supremacy, a survival of the fittest.
quotes.author: Ty Cobb

quotes.text: Well, look, I'm as Tea Party as it gets.
quotes.author: Jason Chaffetz

quotes.text: Another woman approached me while I was having lunch at the Russian Tea Room in New York and told me that the reason she had become a lawyer was because she had read 'Rage of Angels'. To me, that kind of feedback has more meaning than any sales figures.
quotes.author: Sidney Sheldon

quotes.text: President Obama has only had two major policy victories during his tenure: the stimulus package and Obamacare. Both are massively unpopular. The stimulus package launched the Tea Party movement. Obamacare led to the Republican wipeout of 2010.
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.text: From tea parties to the election in Massachusetts, we are witnessing the single greatest political pushback in American history.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.text: Really it's hard to know where the Republican Party ends and the Tea Party begins.
quotes.author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

quotes.text: There are good people and bad people in all organizations fundamentally however, when you look at the basis of the Tea Party it has nothing to do with race. It has to do with an economic recovery. It has to do with limiting the role of our government in our lives. It has to do with free markets.
quotes.author: Tim Scott

quotes.text: Before 'Life of Pi,' I wanted to do economics. And now, I realize how bad a mistake that would have been. I just can't see it as my cup of tea anymore.
quotes.author: Suraj Sharma

quotes.text: I like cups of tea and reading books and poetry and old people things.
quotes.author: Bindi Irwin

quotes.text: Tea time is a chance to slow down, pull back and appreciate our surroundings.
quotes.author: Letitia Baldrige

quotes.text: Love and scandal are the best sweeteners of tea.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.text: As an adolescent, I went to charm school, where I learned to pour tea and relate to boys, which, as I recall, meant giving them the pickle jar to unscrew, whether it was too hard for me or not.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.text: Architecture is basically a container of something. I hope they will enjoy not so much the teacup, but the tea.
quotes.author: Yoshio Taniguchi

quotes.text: I wouldn't recommend people to go up and ride their road bikes in Kenya. Bikes are not meant to be on the roads. But the mountain biking is fantastic. You can go right up into the tea and coffee plantations up in the highlands. You can descend the great Rift Valley.
quotes.author: Chris Froome

quotes.text: It has been well said that tea is suggestive of a thousand wants, from which spring the decencies and luxuries of civilization.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.text: Tea, though ridiculed by those who are naturally coarse in their nervous sensibilities will always be the favorite beverage of the intellectual.
quotes.author: Thomas de Quincey

quotes.text: After tea it's back to painting - a large poplar at dusk with a gathering storm. From time to time instead of this evening painting session I go bowling in one of the neighbouring villages, but not very often.
quotes.author: Gustav Klimt

quotes.text: But I try to steal other moments. Sometimes I get up very early in the morning and enjoy a quiet house and cup of tea before the craziness begins. Other times, I'll take a quick walk on the beach. You can find peace in a few minutes.
quotes.author: Cindy Crawford

quotes.text: You don't put milk in chamomile tea - that's disgusting behavior! That's not right.
quotes.author: Laura Fraser

quotes.text: In the West, we look at art through life. Well, that's one way of living. In the Orient they look at life through art. They even drink their tea without sugar, for the same reason that they don't like a lot of frilly decorations on a painting. I can't stand butter on my bread for the same reason. I'm allergic to goo and rococo.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.text: Now my poor hometown is being castigated as the center of an IRS scandal. Humble workers at the Cincinnati office targeted Tea Party groups and other conservative organizations for special scrutiny when those groups applied for tax-exempt status. There's no conceivable excuse for that. It was deeply, deeply wrong.
quotes.author: Gail Collins

quotes.text: Tea Party people know that I stood against the Wall Street scam from Day One, that I voted against TARP, that I voted against repealing Glass-Steagall Act that kept these guys under some control.
quotes.author: Russ Feingold

quotes.text: That's one thing people don't know about me - I eat in my sleep. I can't keep things in the house; I literally have in my refrigerator water, coconut water, orange juice, hemp milk and like, tea bags. And that's really it. Because I eat in my sleep.
quotes.author: Denise Vasi

quotes.text: In a big Bollywood romantic film, taking my shirt off and spreading the hand towards the mountain with dancers behind me are not my cup of tea.
quotes.author: Vir Das

quotes.text: I've never been a hands-on dad. I'm not ashamed to admit it, but you can't run a restaurant and be home for tea at 4:30 and bath and change nappies.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.text: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Let us celebrate the occasion with wine and sweet words.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.text: Through Love all that is bitter will be sweet, Through Love all that is copper will be gold, Through Love all dregs will become wine, through Love all pain will turn to medicine.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.text: Sorrow can be alleviated by good sleep, a bath and a glass of wine.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.text: A loaf of bread, a jug of wine, and thou.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.text: If I had five minutes to live, I don't think I'd be bothered singing a song. I'd be dead, so it won't really matter. I'd have a glass of wine and a cigarette.
quotes.author: Loudon Wainwright III

quotes.text: If you love food and you love red wine and they put you in France, you're in a good place and you're in a bad place at the same time. You have to weigh yourself every day, and you have to have an alarm number. When you get to that number, you have to start putting it in reverse.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.text: It is the hour to be drunken! to escape being the martyred slaves of time, be ceaselessly drunk. On wine, on poetry, or on virtue, as you wish.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: I have dreamed in my life, dreams that have stayed with me ever after, and changed my ideas; they have gone through and through me, like wine through water, and altered the color of my mind.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.text: Essentially, wines are fermented grape juice, so I'm trying to make the point that the wine world is about scores and marketing and kind of creating a scarce resource where they don't really exist.
quotes.author: Joe Bastianich

quotes.text: Wine is something to enjoy. We get sick and tired of people who pick it apart and talk about its 'saucy nuances.'
quotes.author: Pat Paulsen

quotes.text: To take wine into our mouths is to savor a droplet of the river of human history.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.text: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: I had a little epiphany when I was a writer at 'Chicago' magazine. I sat down to dinner at the Ritz-Carlton. Somebody poured a white dessert wine with chocolate cake. It was a wine I would never have expected to make sense. The idea of any wine tasting fabulous with chocolate cake was fascinating to me.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.text: Truth comes out in wine.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.text: You can be drinking the wine today, but picking the grapes tomorrow.
quotes.author: Jonathan Tucker

quotes.text: Great people talk about ideas, average people talk about things, and small people talk about wine.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.text: Beauty is worse than wine, it intoxicates both the holder and beholder.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: There's something about having a great bottle of wine and a great cigar. Nothing compares to it.
quotes.author: D. L. Hughley

quotes.text: Wine gives a man nothing... it only puts in motion what had been locked up in frost.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: I'm not a crazy granola person. I like to wear beautiful clothes, and I like having a glass of wine, but it doesn't mean I don't work out every day and drink green juices.
quotes.author: Phoebe Tonkin

quotes.text: The wine of youth does not always clear with advancing years; sometimes it grows turbid.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Seduction is often difficult to distinguish from rape. In seduction, the rapist often bothers to buy a bottle of wine.
quotes.author: Andrea Dworkin

quotes.text: Friendship's the wine of life: but friendship new... is neither strong nor pure.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.text: The fashion industry isn't merely content to encase my meaty flanks in skintight denim. Oh, no! That denim also has to be white, a color that attracts ketchup, wine, garlic aioli, and any other foodstuffs I might otherwise be able to enjoy if I wasn't wearing ridiculously tight pants.
quotes.author: Diablo Cody

quotes.text: Since the outbreak of war, there has been in our country a steady increase in the consumption of spirits, wine and beer. It is estimated that in dollar volume, the annual outlay is now practically double what it was before the war.
quotes.author: William Lyon Mackenzie King

quotes.text: What I like to drink most is wine that belongs to others.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.text: I would say that a good shoe is exactly like a good wine. These shoes are going to stay and last for a long time.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.text: One of the disadvantages of wine is that it makes a man mistake words for thoughts.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: I'm a bit of a clothes hoarder, admittedly. I try to weed out stuff. My girlfriends come over for cheese and wine and go shopping in my wardrobe. They especially love it when they get stuff with a tag still on.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.text: I think I'm like wine. The older I get, the better I get.
quotes.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quotes.text: I'm like old wine. They don't bring me out very often - but I'm well preserved.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: I was lucky to marry Paul. He was a great inspiration, his enthusiasm about wine and food helped to shape my tastes, and his encouragement saw me through discouraging moments. I never would have had my career without Paul Child.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.text: The woman who thinks she can choose femininity, can toy with it like the social drinker toys with wine - well, she's asking for it, asking to be undone, devoured, asking to spend her life perpetrating a new fraud, manufacturing a new fake identity, only this time it's her equality that's fake.
quotes.author: Rachel Cusk

quotes.text: Strategy is buying a bottle of fine wine when you take a lady out for dinner. Tactics is getting her to drink it.
quotes.author: Frank Muir

quotes.text: I ate no butcher's meat, lived chiefly on fruits, vegetables, and fish, and never drank a glass of spirits or wine until my wedding day. To this I attribute my continual good health, endurance, and an iron constitution.
quotes.author: John James Audubon

quotes.text: I prioritize in life. I like to work, I do TV shows, I do a lot of Iron Man training. I enjoy kicking back on a good night and drinking wine until I go to bed, and having fun with my friends. You just have to make time for it and keep it balanced.
quotes.author: Joe Bastianich

quotes.text: I drink red wine on ice to water it down.
quotes.author: Diane Keaton

quotes.text: My books are like water; those of the great geniuses are wine. (Fortunately) everybody drinks water.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Under the pressure of the cares and sorrows of our mortal condition, men have at all times, and in all countries, called in some physical aid to their moral consolations - wine, beer, opium, brandy, or tobacco.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.text: The 'good' mother, with her fixed smile, her rigidity, her goody-goody outlook, her obsession with unnecessary hygiene, is in fact a fool. It is the 'bad' mother, unafraid of a joke and a glass of wine, richly self-expressive, scornful of suburban values, who is, in reality, good.
quotes.author: Rachel Cusk

quotes.text: I have drunken deep of joy, And I will taste no other wine tonight.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.text: I collect art, and I drink wine... things that I like that I had never been exposed to. But I never said, 'I'm going to buy art to impress this crowd.' That's just ridiculous to me. I don't live my life like that, because how could you be happy with yourself?
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.text: Holiday? Is like, what? I'm a hyperactive girl, so it may be boring for me to be on the beach doing nothing. I just need to find a place for three weeks and work but sleep in the morning, maybe write a little bit, have a glass of red wine. That's my perfect holiday.
quotes.author: Melanie Laurent

quotes.text: Even if you believe a creator god invented the laws of physics, would you so insult him as to suggest that he might capriciously and arbitrarily violate them in order to walk on water, or turn water into wine as a cheap party trick at a wedding?
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.text: All four elements were happening in equal measure - the cuisine, the wine, the service, and the overall ambience. It taught me that dining could happen at a spiritual level.
quotes.author: Charlie Trotter

quotes.text: Music is the wine which inspires one to new generative processes, and I am Bacchus who presses out this glorious wine for mankind and makes them spiritually drunken.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
