quotes.text: No weapon has ever settled a moral problem. It can impose a solution but it cannot guarantee it to be a just one.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: The sword was a very elegant weapon in the days of the samurai. You had honor and chivalry much like the knights, and yet it was a gruesome and horrific weapon.
quotes.author: Dustin Diamond

quotes.text: And the things that we fear are a weapon to be held against us.
quotes.author: Ian Rush

quotes.text: The Iranian regime gives financial support to terrorist organizations all over the world, denies the Holocaust, and calls for the wiping the state of Israel from the map, while developing long-range missiles and trying to obtain nuclear weapon.
quotes.author: Moshe Katsav

quotes.text: Since being in India, I am more convinced than ever before that the method of nonviolent resistance is the most potent weapon available to oppressed people in their struggle for justice and human dignity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Leadership is intangible, and therefore no weapon ever designed can replace it.
quotes.author: Omar N. Bradley

quotes.text: People often ask me how I feel about my invention being used to kill people every day and the AK being a common weapon of ethnic conflicts. I want to make it clear that I created my assault rifle to protect my country. You can blame politicians for its spreading out of control on a global scale.
quotes.author: Mikhail Kalashnikov

quotes.text: The most formidable weapon against errors of every kind is reason.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.text: The weapon of the advocate is the sword of the soldier, not the dagger of the assassin.
quotes.author: Alexander Cockburn

quotes.text: The most powerful weapon in the world, as far as I'm concerned, is the camera.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.text: We are not called upon to enter into controversy with those who hold false theories. Controversy is unprofitable. Christ never entered into it. 'It is written' is the weapon used by the world's Redeemer. Let us keep close to the Word. Let us allow the Lord Jesus and His messengers to testify. We know that their testimony is true.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.text: I think a submarine is a very worthwhile weapon. I believe we can defend ourselves with submarines and all our troops back at home. This whole idea that we have to be in 130 countries and 900 bases... is an old-fashioned idea.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.text: Racism, in the first place, is a weapon used by the wealthy to increase the profits they bring in by paying Black workers less for their work.
quotes.author: Angela Davis

quotes.text: We have always said that in our war with the Arabs we had a secret weapon - no alternative.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.text: Nonviolence is a powerful and just weapon. Indeed, it is a weapon unique in history, which cuts without wounding and ennobles the man who wields it.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: When George W. Bush came into office, North Korea had maybe one nuclear weapon and verifiably wasn't producing any more.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: Film is such a powerful medium. It's like a weapon and I think you have a duty to self-censor.
quotes.author: Peter Jackson

quotes.text: The United States, and the president's made this clear, does not want Iran to develop a nuclear weapon. That's a red line for us. And it's a red line obviously for the Israelis so we share a common goal here.
quotes.author: Leon Panetta

quotes.text: Hungry man, reach for the book: it is a weapon.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.text: Temper is a weapon that we hold by the blade.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.text: Hope is a necessity for normal life and the major weapon against the suicide impulse.
quotes.author: Karl A. Menninger

quotes.text: Contempt is the weapon of the weak and a defense against one's own despised and unwanted feelings.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.text: I am getting better at facing the bouncers, as I know opposition tries to use those as a weapon against me. Yet, no one is perfect, and he takes time to master a particular thing.
quotes.author: Suresh Raina

quotes.text: Now I'm old... maybe I'm still an eccentric hippie. There's a wonderful freedom in the eccentricity - you can go places, you can be wacky, and you don't have to be constrained. I think that's why people are eccentric - eccentricity is a weapon... and it's great!
quotes.author: Sylvester McCoy

quotes.text: Nevertheless, there is another threat on the horizon. I see this threat in environmentalism which is becoming a new dominant ideology, if not a religion. Its main weapon is raising the alarm and predicting the human life endangering climate change based on man-made global warming.
quotes.author: Vaclav Klaus

quotes.text: An intellectual's weapon is writing, but sometimes people react as if it were a firearm. A writer can do a lot to change the situation, but as far as I know, no dictatorship has fallen because of a sonnet.
quotes.author: Mario Benedetti

quotes.text: Prayer is a strong wall and fortress of the church; it is a goodly Christian weapon.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: Any woman who chooses to behave like a full human being should be warned that the armies of the status quo will treat her as something of a dirty joke. That's their natural and first weapon. She will need her sisterhood.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.text: Terrorism has become the systematic weapon of a war that knows no borders or seldom has a face.
quotes.author: Jacques Chirac

quotes.text: In the past, the greatest weapon the white man has had has been his ability to divide and conquer. If I take my hand and slap you, you don't even feel it. It might sting you because these digits are separated. But all I have to do to put you back in your place is bring those digits together.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: Beauty is our weapon against nature; by it we make objects, giving them limit, symmetry, proportion. Beauty halts and freezes the melting flux of nature.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: The camera can be the most deadly weapon since the assassin's bullet. Or it can be the lotion of the heart.
quotes.author: Norman Parkinson

quotes.text: I think the 'Lethal Weapon' movies contain my favorite performances. It sounds really crummy, I know, but although the work doesn't look hard, it's difficult to create 'effortless' on screen.
quotes.author: Mel Gibson

quotes.text: The two most precious things this side of the grave are our reputation and our life. But it is to be lamented that the most contemptible whisper may deprive us of the one, and the weakest weapon of the other.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.text: Buddha's teaching are very simple, you don't have to break your head to understand the message. The part that I like the most from Buddha's teachings and from His Holiness, The Dalai Lama, is that the most powerful weapon is to not attack, to be able to have self-control.
quotes.author: Ricky Martin

quotes.text: Fighting is essentially a masculine idea; a woman's weapon is her tongue.
quotes.author: Hermione Gingold

quotes.text: Patriotism is an indispensable weapon in the defense of civilization against barbarism.
quotes.author: Bill Kristol

quotes.text: The atom bomb was no 'great decision.' It was merely another powerful weapon in the arsenal of righteousness.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: There are some problems, and maybe these huge magazines, even, for someone who says, 'Look, I just use an AR-15 for target practice,' but do you really need to be standing there shooting at a silhouette a shot a second or even quicker with that kind of weapon? For what purpose?
quotes.author: Phil Gingrey

quotes.text: As a nuclear power - as the only nuclear power to have used a nuclear weapon - the United States has a moral responsibility to act.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: An emotion that lives with me is a sense of 'what might have been' had injuries not robbed me of my most lethal weapon - speed.
quotes.author: Michael Owen

quotes.text: We have weapons of mass destruction we have to address here at home. Poverty is a weapon of mass destruction. Homelessness is a weapon of mass destruction. Unemployment is a weapon of mass destruction.
quotes.author: Dennis Kucinich

quotes.text: A fragrance that matches the personality of the man or woman who wears it is an integral part of the memory that you have of him or her. It goes without saying that it's a formidable weapon of seduction.
quotes.author: Dree Hemingway

quotes.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.text: A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: I know who I am. I am not perfect. I'm not the most beautiful woman in the world. But I'm one of them.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.text: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures that we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.text: All the beautiful sentiments in the world weigh less than a single lovely action.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.text: Childhood means simplicity. Look at the world with the child's eye - it is very beautiful.
quotes.author: Kailash Satyarthi

quotes.text: You may not always have a comfortable life and you will not always be able to solve all of the world's problems at once but don't ever underestimate the importance you can have because history has shown us that courage can be contagious and hope can take on a life of its own.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.text: Never believe that a few caring people can't change the world. For, indeed, that's all who ever have.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.text: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.text: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The more often we see the things around us - even the beautiful and wonderful things - the more they become invisible to us. That is why we often take for granted the beauty of this world: the flowers, the trees, the birds, the clouds - even those we love. Because we see things so often, we see them less and less.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.text: Nothing in this world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not: nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not: the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.text: I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: Nothing in all the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.text: God used beautiful mathematics in creating the world.
quotes.author: Paul Dirac

quotes.text: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: To effectively communicate, we must realize that we are all different in the way we perceive the world and use this understanding as a guide to our communication with others.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: This world of ours... must avoid becoming a community of dreadful fear and hate, and be, instead, a proud confederation of mutual trust and respect.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: You can design and create, and build the most wonderful place in the world. But it takes people to make the dream a reality.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: The biggest risk is not taking any risk... In a world that changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.text: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting.
quotes.author: e. e. cummings

quotes.text: As long as poverty, injustice and gross inequality persist in our world, none of us can truly rest.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The world is a dangerous place to live; not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Life is a series of experiences, each one of which makes us bigger, even though sometimes it is hard to realize this. For the world was built to develop character, and we must learn that the setbacks and grieves which we endure help us in our marching onward.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: This world is but a canvas to our imagination.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us, and the world will be as one.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: A college degree is the key to realizing the American dream, well worth the financial sacrifice because it is supposed to open the door to a world of opportunity.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.text: I do believe we're all connected. I do believe in positive energy. I do believe in the power of prayer. I do believe in putting good out into the world. And I believe in taking care of each other.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.text: Let the ruling classes tremble at a communist revolution. The proletarians have nothing to lose but their chains. They have a world to win. Workingmen of all countries, unite!
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.text: All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players: they have their exits and their entrances; and one man in his time plays many parts, his acts being seven ages.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: The greatest self is a peaceful smile, that always sees the world smiling back.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.text: All the adversity I've had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me... You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.text: Women are the largest untapped reservoir of talent in the world.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: Historically, privacy was almost implicit, because it was hard to find and gather information. But in the digital world, whether it's digital cameras or satellites or just what you click on, we need to have more explicit rules - not just for governments but for private companies.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: The highest prize in a world of men is the most beautiful woman available on your arm and living there in her heart loyal to you.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.text: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: Voting is the expression of our commitment to ourselves, one another, this country and this world.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.text: There will be no end to the troubles of states, or of humanity itself, till philosophers become kings in this world, or till those we now call kings and rulers really and truly become philosophers, and political power and philosophy thus come into the same hands.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: Giving up smoking is the easiest thing in the world. I know because I've done it thousands of times.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Humans aren't as good as we should be in our capacity to empathize with feelings and thoughts of others, be they humans or other animals on Earth. So maybe part of our formal education should be training in empathy. Imagine how different the world would be if, in fact, that were 'reading, writing, arithmetic, empathy.'
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: What makes a child gifted and talented may not always be good grades in school, but a different way of looking at the world and learning.
quotes.author: Chuck Grassley

quotes.text: The only fence against the world is a thorough knowledge of it.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.text: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: I don't see the world completely in black and white. Sometimes I do.
quotes.author: Benicio Del Toro

quotes.text: In this world nothing can be said to be certain, except death and taxes.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: There is a lot that happens around the world we cannot control. We cannot stop earthquakes, we cannot prevent droughts, and we cannot prevent all conflict, but when we know where the hungry, the homeless and the sick exist, then we can help.
quotes.author: Jan Schakowsky

quotes.text: I think the world would be a lot better off if more people were to define themselves in terms of their own standards and values and not what other people said or thought about them.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: I do not know what I may appear to the world, but to myself I seem to have been only like a boy playing on the seashore, and diverting myself in now and then finding a smoother pebble or a prettier shell than ordinary, whilst the great ocean of truth lay all undiscovered before me.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.text: The evil that is in the world almost always comes of ignorance, and good intentions may do as much harm as malevolence if they lack understanding.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: European nations began World War I with a glamorous vision of war, only to be psychologically shattered by the realities of the trenches. The experience changed the way people referred to the glamour of battle; they treated it no longer as a positive quality but as a dangerous illusion.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.text: God wants us to know that life is a series of beginnings, not endings. Just as graduations are not terminations, but commencements. Creation is an ongoing process, and when we create a perfect world where love and compassion are shared by all, suffering will cease.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.text: They tell us that suicide is the greatest piece of cowardice... that suicide is wrong; when it is quite obvious that there is nothing in the world to which every man has a more unassailable title than to his own life and person.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: The world of reality has its limits; the world of imagination is boundless.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.text: There's nobody in the world that knows me better than my sister.
quotes.author: Tia Mowry

quotes.text: Black and white is abstract; color is not. Looking at a black and white photograph, you are already looking at a strange world.
quotes.author: Joel Sternfeld

quotes.text: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.text: A little bit of mercy makes the world less cold and more just.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: Diversity is about all of us, and about us having to figure out how to walk through this world together.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Woodson

quotes.text: Living inside the shuttle was a little like camping out. We ended up sleeping in our seats. You had to pay attention to housekeeping, not get things too dirty.
quotes.author: Robert Crippen

quotes.text: For short term relaxation, I take a hot tub. It's my best way to unblock writers' block, too. For a bit longer relaxation, I enjoy camping. Just being in the wilderness, with no phones or computers or anything I have to do really refreshes my spirit.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.text: October of 2011, Occupy protestors descended upon McPherson Square, and they decided to stay. Despite the clear language of the law, these protestors camped at McPherson Square with the definition of camping being sleeping or preparing to sleep.
quotes.author: Trey Gowdy

quotes.text: Camping is nature's way of promoting the motel business.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: When I was younger, my family would go camping and fishing on our ranches. My dad loves being around all kinds of animals. He's the one who got me to be a really big animal lover.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: Some people think that going on a caravan holiday is a slightly more upscale version of camping. Let me assure you, it is much better than that. You know that you will have your creature comforts wherever you are. I never have to pack light, and I can put the kettle on in any location.
quotes.author: Margaret Beckett

quotes.text: When Reg died and we first looked into getting a new dog, I was adamant we should pick up a mongrel from an animal-rescue shelter. It's not only that they're usually healthier and have better temperaments, they also fit with my world view - I prefer a ballpoint to a fountain pen, a barber to a hair stylist, and camping over glamping.
quotes.author: Mark Barrowcliffe

quotes.text: My earliest memory from childhood is of fishing with my father. And I remember vividly we were in a store, and we were buying a pup tent to go on our first camping trip.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.text: I'm really an outdoorsy girl. People think I can't go anywhere without getting all primped up, but I love to go camping, and I'm totally fine with not doing my hair or makeup, not taking a shower and just hiking.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.text: Millions of Americans each year use our national forests to go hiking, fishing, hunting, camping, swimming, horseback riding, and canoeing.
quotes.author: Ric Keller

quotes.text: A perfect day would be to get into the car, drive out to Yosemite and go camping.
quotes.author: Michael Steger

quotes.text: My hobbies are mountain biking, horseback riding and packing, canoeing and kayaking, hiking, camping, cooking, and skiing.
quotes.author: Douglas Preston

quotes.text: I like going to museums and stuff, but I also like going out and doing lots of physical activity like camping and hiking. I like doing stuff that I've never done before. Curiosity is a big thing. Usually it means that people are intelligent and that they want to learn stuff about the world.
quotes.author: Nicholas D'Agosto

quotes.text: Is that weird, taking my Louis Vuitton bag camping?
quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

quotes.text: Camping is something I've done all my life.
quotes.author: Stefanie Powers

quotes.text: The ultimate camping trip was the Lewis and Clark expedition.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: Another thing I like to do is sit back and take in nature. To look at the birds, listen to their singing, go hiking, camping and jogging and running, walking along the beach, playing games and sometimes being alone with the great outdoors. It's very special to me.
quotes.author: Larry Wilcox

quotes.text: I've been very physical my whole life. I went out hiking and camping for days in the Australian forest, and when I trained at drama school for three years, we did a whole lot on stage-fighting techniques. And I was a dancer from 5 to 18, so I have a memory for choreography.
quotes.author: Yvonne Strahovski

quotes.text: Well, right now we're so busy that I kind of had to put all the hobbies on hold. But I like going camping with my kids. I have two daughters; they're 7 and 10 years old.
quotes.author: Mark Kelly

quotes.text: The normal storyline of a horror film or a slasher film is the young, beautiful college folks go camping and get systematically killed by the person in a mask. So that's how it normally is.
quotes.author: John Schneider

quotes.text: I went camping in the Maasai Mara and we moved site every night. I had no idea how spectacular it would be, how removed from ordinary life, or how many animals we would see.
quotes.author: Georgina Chapman

quotes.text: Growing up, it was about finding a way to entertain myself outdoors. We spent all the summers on the beach, camping with my family a bunch, and traveling as much as we could. My parents wouldn't let me watch too much TV growing up or play video games, or anything like that.
quotes.author: Stephen Colletti

quotes.text: I was a Scout years ago, before the movement started, when my father took me fishing, camping and hunting. Then I was sorry that more girls could not have what I had. When I learned of the movement, I thought, here is what I always wanted other girls to have.
quotes.author: Lou Henry Hoover

quotes.text: When I was a boy, I read a terrible article in a big weekly American magazine called the 'Saturday Evening Post.' In the middle of this family magazine on my parent's coffee table was an article about this family that was camping, and they were all mauled by a grizzly bear in their sleeping bags.
quotes.author: Robert Englund

quotes.text: I have this dream of what I ultimately want my life to be like, and it involves a lot of quaint activities like cooking and canoeing and camping and hiking.
quotes.author: Hannah Kearney

quotes.text: If you're not in New York, you're camping out.
quotes.author: Thomas Dewey

quotes.text: Following my junior year in high school, I went on a camping trip through Russia in a group led by Horst Momber, a young language teacher from Roosevelt.
quotes.author: Peter Agre

quotes.text: I never camped as a kid, but I really got into camping and sleeping outdoors. I've also done some amazing river floats in New Mexico and Idaho. It's peaceful and awesome.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.text: I've been camping and stuff, but if you left me in the woods I'd probably just curl up and cry until someone found me.
quotes.author: Norman Reedus

quotes.text: My camping days are over, but I might consider glamping.
quotes.author: Christine Feehan

quotes.text: One can find a squalid America as easily as a scenic America; a bitter, hopeless America as easily as the confident America of polyethylene wrapping, new cars, and camping trips in the summer.
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.text: We take it for granted that we can see at all times of day and night. But there was a time, not all that long ago, in the age before electricity, when night brought total darkness - and with it, a not-so-small amount of terror. We get a sense of this when we go camping or when there's a power outage, and our fear of the darkness is primal.
quotes.author: Jake Halpern

quotes.text: I hate camping, but I love summer camp.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.text: I've enjoyed many camping holidays with my sister and her children, but we're pretty posh campers.
quotes.author: Erin O'Connor

quotes.text: My sport is biking. I'm not much of a gym person, but I like being outside - hiking, canoeing, camping.
quotes.author: Diane Kruger

quotes.text: I'd like to go on a hardcore safari in Africa, something off the beaten track with anti-poaching people and camping out in the savannah.
quotes.author: Dominic Monaghan

quotes.text: I went camping one time when I was twelve, to the Great Lakes. My friend stepped in really deep muddy water and started screaming and sinking. My mom ran up, and I was just standing there a foot away and wouldn't stick out my hand to pull him up. So I'm probably not the best person to take on a camping trip.
quotes.author: Norman Reedus

quotes.text: I like golf, hiking, camping, boating and fishing.
quotes.author: Bryan Clay

quotes.text: If I went on vacation, I'd rather go camping than stay in some four-star hotel... My friends treat me the same at home. They just want to sit down with you and have a beer.
quotes.author: Travis Fimmel

quotes.text: The rite of passage of learning to build a fire that will burn all night with one match is not an insignificant one in my husband's family, and I grew up camping and backpacking. I love to camp.
quotes.author: Sarah Wayne Callies

quotes.text: Lake Pend Oreille is definitely my favorite place to be while in Sandpoint. I love to get out on a boat to enjoy water sports, camping, fishing, or just to relax and catch a sunset.
quotes.author: Nate Holland

quotes.text: My parents had us very young. We lived in a modest house. We built forts, we hiked, we went camping and they wanted us to be independent. It's how children grew up in the 1940s and 50s: outside all the time, playing in the dirt, riding your bike around.
quotes.author: Brooklyn Decker

quotes.text: We're not much of a camping family. When I was in Cub Scouts, we went camping once, and my dad snored the whole time and kept me up. It wasn't that fun.
quotes.author: Chandler Riggs

quotes.text: It was at the beginning of all this tabloid frenzy. Our garbage was being gone through, and we were involved in all these chases getting home, and people camping out on our property to get pictures.
quotes.author: Lauren Holly

quotes.text: There's some things you just have to live with. Like twelve cars camping outside your house, and when you wake up in the morning, they're going to follow you wherever you go. It helps that I live in Valencia. It eliminates some. But they're still here.
quotes.author: Taylor Lautner

quotes.text: I, more or less, love camping out, so I dug it, but I didn't enjoy other people's pain.
quotes.author: Casper Van Dien

quotes.text: I like reading, writing, hiking, camping, free running, surfing, rock climbing, long boarding, and so much more.
quotes.author: Nolan Gould

quotes.text: I love kids, outings, camping, sports, Legoland, all the Daddy stuff. I love it. I wish I could just do that, but I have to work, too.
quotes.author: Mekhi Phifer

quotes.text: I enjoy doing fun things outdoors with my son to stay in shape. We like camping together. After a weekend in the woods, I'm sorer than after a week at the gym!
quotes.author: Beth Riesgraf

quotes.text: At school, if I was ever bored in class, I would draw maps of islands or detailed interior of boats or lists of provisions and equipment I would need when I went camping in the summer.
quotes.author: Michelle Magorian

quotes.text: I had first visited Kurdistan in 2003 before the invasion of Iraq, camping out in Erbil and Sulaimaniya while waiting for Saddam Hussein's fall.
quotes.author: Lynsey Addario

quotes.text: 'Onward' was a song I wrote in Montreux, in Switzerland, when we were there camping out for the whole winter. In the summer, Montreux is a really, really big summertime-touristy, full-of-life kind of place. In the winter, it closes down.
quotes.author: Chris Squire

quotes.text: For sure, Potrero Chico is a super nice winter vacation climbing area. It's really convenient to fly into Monterrey, one of the nicer cities in Mex, and get a taxi to Potero. Then you can just live in the camping area and walk everywhere. It's muy tranquilo, as they say there.
quotes.author: Alex Honnold

quotes.text: If you lived next door to me and didn't know what I did, you wouldn't know I was a celebrity. I don't have that lifestyle, nor do I want that lifestyle. I want to know that I can have a separate life with my wife and my kids and just be normal and go camping and fishing and outdoor stuff.
quotes.author: Bill Engvall

quotes.text: When I'm not acting, I'm usually sailing or camping or exploring or travelling or spending time in New Zealand.
quotes.author: Martin Henderson

quotes.text: I don't like to camp. Early on, Mars is going to be camping. I think there are people far better suited to do that than me. But when the first Holiday Inn Express shows up, maybe I'll go.
quotes.author: Gwynne Shotwell

quotes.text: I went camping for 33 days, and now everybody seems to care.
quotes.author: Colleen Haskell

quotes.text: I like camping.
quotes.author: Keir Gilchrist

quotes.text: Living inside the shuttle was a little like camping out. We ended up sleeping in our seats. You had to pay attention to housekeeping, not get things too dirty.
quotes.author: Robert Crippen

quotes.text: For short term relaxation, I take a hot tub. It's my best way to unblock writers' block, too. For a bit longer relaxation, I enjoy camping. Just being in the wilderness, with no phones or computers or anything I have to do really refreshes my spirit.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.text: The ultimate camping trip was the Lewis and Clark expedition.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: Another thing I like to do is sit back and take in nature. To look at the birds, listen to their singing, go hiking, camping and jogging and running, walking along the beach, playing games and sometimes being alone with the great outdoors. It's very special to me.
quotes.author: Larry Wilcox

quotes.text: I've been very physical my whole life. I went out hiking and camping for days in the Australian forest, and when I trained at drama school for three years, we did a whole lot on stage-fighting techniques. And I was a dancer from 5 to 18, so I have a memory for choreography.
quotes.author: Yvonne Strahovski

quotes.text: Well, right now we're so busy that I kind of had to put all the hobbies on hold. But I like going camping with my kids. I have two daughters; they're 7 and 10 years old.
quotes.author: Mark Kelly

quotes.text: The normal storyline of a horror film or a slasher film is the young, beautiful college folks go camping and get systematically killed by the person in a mask. So that's how it normally is.
quotes.author: John Schneider

quotes.text: The three great elemental sounds in nature are the sound of rain, the sound of wind in a primeval wood, and the sound of outer ocean on a beach.
quotes.author: Henry Beston

quotes.text: I look my best when I'm totally free, on holiday, walking on the beach.
quotes.author: Rosamund Pike

quotes.text: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.text: I grew up in a family where everybody had a good time and we were at the lake every weekend and going to the beach and living a good life. It's been the way we always lived, and my wife's the same way - enjoy every day and have fun.
quotes.author: Luke Bryan

quotes.text: There will always be a Beach Boys. Being a Beach Boy is like being in love.
quotes.author: Dennis Wilson

quotes.text: The beach is definitely where I feel most at home. It's my oxygen. I forget how much I need it sometimes when I'm away working.
quotes.author: Behati Prinsloo

quotes.text: Summer means happy times and good sunshine. It means going to the beach, going to Disneyland, having fun.
quotes.author: Brian Wilson

quotes.text: I still love things that you don't even need to pay for. Going to the beach and being around five of your friends and having a good time means so much more than going out and spending hundreds of dollars.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.text: I believe it's a woman's right to decide what she wants to wear and if a woman can go to the beach and wear nothing, then why can't she also wear everything?
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: I love the beach, and I love sunshine.
quotes.author: Megan Fox

quotes.text: One of my earliest memories is of seeing my mother in her beach chair, reading a book under an umbrella by the water's edge while my sisters and I played beside her. Of all the life lessons she taught me, that is one of my favorites: to take time at a place I love, restore my spirit with books and the beach.
quotes.author: Luanne Rice

quotes.text: The sun shines everywhere, not just at the beach.
quotes.author: Brande Roderick

quotes.text: I read and walked for miles at night along the beach, writing bad blank verse and searching endlessly for someone wonderful who would step out of the darkness and change my life. It never crossed my mind that that person could be me.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.text: With the red hair, you get the white skin; it's a package deal. The cons are that you never look particularly attractive on the beach. The pros are in a softly lit room, you look pretty.
quotes.author: Marcia Cross

quotes.text: The most adventurous thing I've done is learn how to fly a helicopter in the Philippines. One night we landed on a beach and slept on it.
quotes.author: Francis Ford Coppola

quotes.text: I'll get pretty much everything the way I want it. I've always dreamed of a beach wedding.
quotes.author: Nicole Appleton

quotes.text: Ever since our Surfin' Safari' began in the early 1960's, the relations'hip with The Beach Boys and water has been synonymous. 'Surfin', 'Catch a Wave', and 'Surfin' USA' are songs which capture the feelings of being out in the water without a care in the world, living a dream so many long to live no matter where they are from.
quotes.author: Mike Love

quotes.text: A simple life is good with me. I don't need a whole lot. For me, a T-shirt, a pair of shorts, barefoot on a beach and I'm happy.
quotes.author: Yanni

quotes.text: I am a pretty emotional person. Any act of kindness or unkindness moves me. When I see a romantic couple sitting by the beach, it moves me. I don't break down or crack under pressure, but I am just sensitive.
quotes.author: Nimrat Kaur

quotes.text: 'SMiLE' is perhaps the Beach Boys' most legendary album. It was recorded in 1966 and 1967 but only saw a formal release in 2011. That's a long time to wait for what was said to be Brian Wilson's masterpiece.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: I don't want to be in my car all day. I love getting up in the morning in Venice and walking my dogs down to the cafe to get my tea, and then perhaps going to a bookstore and sitting and reading, then walking to the beach.
quotes.author: Jessica Chastain

quotes.text: I've never been one to run around in Speedos on the beach.
quotes.author: Jason Statham

quotes.text: Certainly, light fiction exists and encompasses mysteries or second-class romance novels, books that are read on the beach, whose only aim is to entertain. These books are not concerned with style or creativity - instead they are successful because they are repetitive and follow a template that readers enjoy.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.text: The thing is with hip-hop, it has its waves and the waves crash against the beach and the new waves come in. So to stay relevant you have to roll with that.
quotes.author: Ice Cube

quotes.text: Holiday? Is like, what? I'm a hyperactive girl, so it may be boring for me to be on the beach doing nothing. I just need to find a place for three weeks and work but sleep in the morning, maybe write a little bit, have a glass of red wine. That's my perfect holiday.
quotes.author: Melanie Laurent

quotes.text: I love Miami; I miss it so much. I miss the beach, the peace it brings you. I love the sound and smell of the sea.
quotes.author: Genesis Rodriguez

quotes.text: My ideal meal varies, depending on the time of year. Lobster on a deck overlooking a beach at sunset is one - but all my kids have to be there, because they are all lobster-lovers. Making a bolognese sauce over pappardelle for my husband on a winter evening, because he loves my bolognese sauce and it's his comfort food.
quotes.author: Amy Bloom

quotes.text: I'm not someone who can lie on a beach and do nothing. I am not sure what you are supposed to do, so I get bored. I prefer to have a purpose, such as going to Alaska to see orca whales.
quotes.author: Miranda Richardson

quotes.text: Right now I'm living my boyhood dream, which was to play for a European club. The fact that it's a huge club like Barcelona makes it a tremendous honour. I like everything about the city: the climate, the people. It's quite similar to Brazil, which helps a lot. There's even a beach!
quotes.author: Neymar

quotes.text: One cannot collect all the beautiful shells on the beach.
quotes.author: Anne Spencer

quotes.text: I typically enjoy a beautiful beach destination, as I find the water and sand to be the most replenishing.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berkley

quotes.text: I love to be outdoors, so I like to hike, bike and go to the beach.
quotes.author: Jillian Rose Reed

quotes.text: A beach is not only a sweep of sand, but shells of sea creatures, the sea glass, the seaweed, the incongruous objects washed up by the ocean.
quotes.author: Henry Grunwald

quotes.text: My idea of relaxation is not lying down by a beach. I have to move around, do stuff. Though I'm a massive quiz show person.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.text: I was on the beach every summer. That was the pleasant part of my childhood because we were right by the sea. We'd take a picnic, and I'd spend hours in the water until I turned blue. You couldn't get me out of there.
quotes.author: Olga Kurylenko

quotes.text: I love out-of-the-way, rugged places. For me, holidays are about the experiences, and the people, and the memories, rather than sitting on a nice beach getting tanned. I try to plant myself where I am and embrace what is there in front of me.
quotes.author: Evelyn Glennie

quotes.text: The sea does not reward those who are too anxious, too greedy, or too impatient. One should lie empty, open, choiceless as a beach - waiting for a gift from the sea.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.text: You would think with me living in Los Angeles I would go to the beach all the time, but we don't. It's the same as visiting the Statue of Liberty. If you don't live in N.Y.C., it's the first stop on your family vacation, but if you live there, you only go if you have relatives visiting from out of town!
quotes.author: Marissa Jaret Winokur

quotes.text: My dream is to have a house on the beach, even just a little shack somewhere so I can wake up, have coffee, look at dolphins, be quiet and breathe the air.
quotes.author: Christina Applegate

quotes.text: Every time we walk along a beach some ancient urge disturbs us so that we find ourselves shedding shoes and garments or scavenging among seaweed and whitened timbers like the homesick refugees of a long war.
quotes.author: Loren Eiseley

quotes.text: I'm in two modes when I'm on Lanai: In engineering mode, I'm trying to find the right place for the reservoir and the desalination plant, and looking at designs for new hotel rooms. The rest of the time, I'm in decompression mode. I'm on Hulopoe Beach, going for a swim, or on my paddleboard surrounded by 100 spinner dolphins.
quotes.author: Larry Ellison

quotes.text: My relaxation has always been my animals - going to the dog park with them, going to the beach.
quotes.author: Hilary Swank

quotes.text: My memories of my childhood are wonderful memories. I feel that I was privileged because I grew up in a beautiful city. It is Catania, on the eastern coast of Sicily. It's a place filled with sun, close to the beach.
quotes.author: Luca Parmitano

quotes.text: I am definitely a Type A personality, always rushing around, trying to do too much, not good at just lying on the beach. But I'm so thankful for everything I have: wonderfully supportive parents and sisters, the best husband in the world, terrific students I love teaching and hanging out with, and above all, my two amazing daughters.
quotes.author: Amy Chua

quotes.text: I can't wait to be that age and hanging out with a bunch of people hanging out all day playing golf and going to the beach, all my own age. We'd be laughing and having a good time and getting loopy on our prescription drugs. Driving golf carts around. I can't wait.
quotes.author: Cameron Diaz

quotes.text: One cannot collect all the beautiful shells on the beach. One can collect only a few, and they are more beautiful if they are few.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.text: Half the time on vacation, if I'm in a bikini, I allow myself - I eat, like, waffles and pancakes for breakfast, so that's me after, like, a big meal. I'm not the one that's like, 'Oh my gosh, I'm going to be on the beach.'
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: I'm a Cancer; I'm music-passionate. I like long walks on the beach.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.text: There's an ease that I have living in Australia. The best things about Sydney are free: the sunshine's free, and the harbour's free, and the beach is free.
quotes.author: Russell Crowe

quotes.text: I love being natural. I never feel more beautiful then after I've been to the beach and my hair's just a crazy mess of salt curls, or when I've just been outside all day hiking.
quotes.author: Troian Bellisario

quotes.text: Here's my definition of a great beach read - a fabulous story that sucks me in like a black hole and when it's over, it jettisons my bones across the galaxy with a hair on fire mission to convince everyone I know that they must read that book or they will die.
quotes.author: Dorothea Benton Frank

quotes.text: I like things going on in my life. I don't want to be on a beach somewhere just relaxing.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.text: Once you become an actor, it's important to take care of yourself. I live in Santa Monica, where I can mountain bike, hike and go running on the beach. I like a nice sunset jog.
quotes.author: Mark Feuerstein

quotes.text: Abstention means you stayed at home or went to the beach. By casting a blank vote, you're saying you have a political conscience but you don't agree with any of the existing parties.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.text: When I wrote the song, I had the sea near Bombay in mind. We stayed at a hotel by the sea, and the fishermen come up at five in the morning and they were all chanting. And we went on the beach and we got chased by a mad dog - big as a donkey.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.text: I could take you for a walk on the beach and I could point out just about any creature and give you their Latin names.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.text: I'm actually most comfortable when I'm in a bikini, running around on the beach, like, no makeup. It's really free-feeling, whereas I'm always having to get dressed up and putting makeup on.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: I am just your everyday, average girl. I live by the beach. I wear flip flops. I don't wear make-up. I go to the gym.
quotes.author: A. J. Cook

quotes.text: I'm definitely much more of a beach bunny. I prefer the sun over the snow.
quotes.author: Gillian Zinser

quotes.text: This is going to make me sound ancient, but I remember Juhu Beach when there weren't any buildings on it. You'd go through countryside and arrive at this amazing beach. I remember driving from Delhi to the Qutab Minar through countryside. Mehrauli was a little village - that's all gone.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.text: We won the European Championship last September and now the world title. That is some year for French beach soccer! Now comes the hard part. We have to keep improving and that's difficult because it's tough to do better than winning a world title.
quotes.author: Eric Cantona

quotes.text: So I started to relax and would work on my act eight hours a day, sitting at a desk writing at my grandmother's house, and I would put on Richard Pryor Live on Long Beach and would play it like a loop and think and write.
quotes.author: George Lopez

quotes.text: I'm a real nature lover, so whenever possible, I like to get to the beach or get to a forest or get somewhere there's fresh air. Apart from that, I'm a film addict and a DVD freak.
quotes.author: Murray Bartlett

quotes.text: I was an anorexic, beer drinking, class cutting, doodling, shoplifting, skater chick that was into nature, art class, and the beach.
quotes.author: Rebecca Miller

quotes.text: My wife and I were on our honeymoon in Turks and Caicos, in the middle of nowhere, and I'm sitting on this deserted beach, and I see one lone person walking along the shore. He walks right up to me and says, 'I love 'Laser Cats,' and then just walks away.
quotes.author: Bill Hader

quotes.text: Puerto Ricans who find they can no longer afford to keep their pets often choose to drop their dogs, sometimes even whole litters of puppies, at a beach - sometimes under cover of night, in secret - rather than surrender the animal to a city or state-run shelter where the animals will face grim conditions and almost certain death by euthanasia.
quotes.author: Juliana Hatfield

quotes.text: That's why you can't be a true Yankee without winter: because all the best pleasures are earned - the fire, the fried oysters; the warmer seasons, too. Who knows the real worth of summer at the beach without a good taste of the seaside in winter?
quotes.author: Julia Glass

quotes.text: Listen: I like my bikinis very small, and I also like, uh, nude-colored bikinis because people double-take - they think I'm naked on the beach.
quotes.author: Kate Upton

quotes.text: I would like to play Pebble Beach at some point. I keep waiting for them to call and ask me to that little pro-am thing, but I'm not big enough.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.text: Cirque du Soleil means Circus of the Sun. When I need to take time to reenergize, I go somewhere by the ocean to sit back and watch the sunsets. That is where the idea of 'Soleil' came from, on a beach in Hawaii, and because the sun is the symbol of youth and energy.
quotes.author: Guy Laliberte

quotes.text: 'Safe Harbor' is a state of mind... it's the place - in reality or metaphor - to which one goes in times of trouble or worry. It can be a friendship, marriage, church, garden, beach, poem, prayer, or song.
quotes.author: Luanne Rice

quotes.text: I remember having this friend in school who said she didn't like the Beach Boys. And in that moment I knew we couldn't be friends anymore.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.text: No matter where you go in this world, you will always find a Jew sitting in the beach chair next to you.
quotes.author: Don Rickles

quotes.text: There were times over the years when life was not easy, but if you're working a few hours a day and you've got a good book to read, and you can go outside to the beach and dig for clams, you're okay.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.text: There are a handful of barbecue seafood shacks on the beach at Hat Nai Yang, which is a fabulous place to have dinner. It's very much run for locals and they serve the catch of the day, which might be lobster, white snapper or squid. It's ridiculously reasonable, too.
quotes.author: Tony Parsons

quotes.text: I burn very easily, so if I forget sunscreen, I will be a tomato by the end of the day. I'm very big on sunscreen and hats. I grew up in Florida, and I love the beach, and I think it's healthy to get a little bit of color.
quotes.author: Candice Accola

quotes.text: I love the beach. I love the sea. All my life I live within - in front of the sea.
quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

quotes.text: In Hawaii, we go to this wonderful place, all families. My wife and I go directly from breakfast to a beach chair where we read all day. My daughter goes from water to pool to running around with friends she meets, some of whom are regulars there.
quotes.author: Stephen Collins

quotes.text: My mum's from Broome, so I'm a saltwater person - Aboriginal people are either freshwater, saltwater or desert mob. So I always feel much more comfortable in close proximity to the beach, even if I'm not necessarily in the water.
quotes.author: Shari Sebbens

quotes.text: Words today are like the shells and rope of seaweed which a child brings home glistening from the beach and which in an hour have lost their luster.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.text: Anonymity would be a fantastic umbrella. I don't like intrusion.
quotes.author: Sam Taylor-Wood

quotes.text: Going around under an umbrella interferes with one's looking up at the sky.
quotes.author: Jerzy Kosinski

quotes.text: One of my earliest memories is of seeing my mother in her beach chair, reading a book under an umbrella by the water's edge while my sisters and I played beside her. Of all the life lessons she taught me, that is one of my favorites: to take time at a place I love, restore my spirit with books and the beach.
quotes.author: Luanne Rice

quotes.text: I'm interested in people who have to overcome obstacles, people who are not sheltered by the umbrella of the establishment, marginals.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.text: Whether the Sikhs want to worship in Wisconsin or the Christians want to worship in Texas or the Jews want to worship in New York, we're living under the magnificent umbrella of a Constitution that says we can.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: A bank is a place where they lend you an umbrella in fair weather and ask for it back when it begins to rain.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Compromise makes a good umbrella, but a poor roof; it is temporary expedient, often wise in party politics, almost sure to be unwise in statesmanship.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.text: He was so benevolent, so merciful a man that, in his mistaken passion, he would have held an umbrella over a duck in a shower of rain.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.text: I am not feeling any better because I cannot stay in bed, having constant cause for walking. They say I leave at night by the window of my tower, hanging from a red umbrella with which I set fire to the forest!
quotes.author: Camille Claudel

quotes.text: Who am I that I have to sing under an umbrella? These people are my fans, and if they can stand in the rain to hear me sing, I can stand in the rain.
quotes.author: Bobby Darin

quotes.text: I carry an umbrella when I am outdoors and always wear sunscreen, even when I am sitting in front of a computer screen! I never touch coffee or other caffeinated drinks.
quotes.author: Fan Bingbing

quotes.text: There's an image that some of us have of Jackie Onassis, stepping out in the rain, and Maurice Tempelsman is holding her umbrella. We want that man. We want the man to be the concierge and the masseur and the travel booker.
quotes.author: Sandra Tsing Loh

quotes.text: What's great about documentary, it seems to me, is that it can be experimental filmmaking. You have a license to do a lot of diverse things under the umbrella of 'documentary.'
quotes.author: Errol Morris

quotes.text: All identity labels are umbrella terms to some degree, but this term 'bisexual' is not only serviceable, but it is sufficient. And yes, it brings together a bunch of people who are maybe shades different from one another. And maybe that's the beauty of labels: that they force you to be with other people and see the difference.
quotes.author: Charles M. Blow

quotes.text: I think the American people are very smart in understanding our country is very trustworthy with nuclear weapons. We've had them from the beginning. But they have also been critical for keeping the world more at peace than it would have been if it hadn't been for the American nuclear umbrella.
quotes.author: Haley Barbour

quotes.text: Under the big political umbrella, a man is just like a leaf in the ocean, with no control of his destiny and does not have any choice.
quotes.author: Zhang Yimou

quotes.text: Societies cannot move forward without law, and our constitution is the cornerstone of the law and our National Assembly is its umbrella and fortress.
quotes.author: Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa

quotes.text: A British porch is a musty, forbidding non-room in which to fling a sodden umbrella or a muddy pair of boots; a guard against the elements and strangers. By contrast the good ol' American front porch seems to stand for positivity and openness; a platform from which to welcome or wave farewell; a place where things of significance could happen.
quotes.author: Dan Stevens

quotes.text: 'The Lion' all began with a picture of a faun carrying an umbrella and parcels in a snowy wood. This picture had been in my mind since I was about sixteen. Then one day, when I was about forty, I said to myself, 'Let's try to make a story about it.'
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: Rogue economics is a sort of umbrella under which we find the criminal economy, the illegal economy, but also those gray areas, gray areas where there is not a proper regulation, where there is not legislation for the economy.
quotes.author: Loretta Napoleoni

quotes.text: If I wanted to do clothes or if I wanted to make a building or design a choreography, you are able to do that - they are all under a similar kind of design umbrella.
quotes.author: Zaha Hadid

quotes.text: If you write nonfiction, a historical account of what really happened, first of all, it's always white men who do that, and you don't have the voices that are really interesting to me, of the people who are not sheltered by the big umbrella of the establishment.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.text: Be ever watchful for the opportunity to shelter little children with the umbrella of your charity; be generous to their schools, their hospitals, and their places of worship. For, as they must bear the burdens of our mistakes, so are they in their innocence the repositories of our hopes for the upward progress of humanity.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.text: Chris Cutler was kind enough to offer his company as an umbrella, so now I can have all my back catalogue under one roof as it were, and it has the same feeling as with Daniel; this is a matter between friends rather than businessmen.
quotes.author: Fred Frith

quotes.text: There was a week where I was depressed with the rain, and people were telling me to get a light box. But I live on the 14th floor of an apartment complex, and I see the Broadway Bridge and Mount Hood, and it keeps me such company. And like true Oregonians, I don't carry an umbrella anymore.
quotes.author: Reggie Lee

quotes.text: The biggest challenge for everybody to realize out there is that we're in a very complicated business world and that were all under one umbrella and it's very challenging for everybody to figure out where the priorities lie and where the loyalties lie.
quotes.author: Scott Bakula

quotes.text: I think anything we do outside of Gym Class Heroes still falls under the Gym Class Heroes umbrella. There's really no method to the madness. With Gym Class, it's more of a democratic process, and when I'm working on solo stuff, it's just me, either working with producers or sitting in a room by myself. They balance and complement each other.
quotes.author: Travie McCoy

quotes.text: The American people never carry an umbrella. They prepare to walk in eternal sunshine.
quotes.author: Al Smith

quotes.text: Citizenship rights is about making all Iranians feel they are part of one nation, one identity, under one umbrella they can feel proud of.
quotes.author: Hassan Rouhani

quotes.text: If you are in a band like my brother, Rudolf, who is in the Scorpions, then you have a kind of umbrella and you cover each other. You have five people to discuss things with and you are all in the same boat, and therefore make much wiser choices.
quotes.author: Michael Schenker

quotes.text: The U.S. should support the Nigerian government to stay in Sierra Leone under the ECOMOG umbrella. The U.S. should also support other countries, including Ghana, in ECOMOG until stability is established.
quotes.author: Ed Royce

quotes.text: My dad says that when I was two or three I used to go out dressed as a different character every day. I remember thinking it was perfectly normal to wear different coloured shoes and carry a pink umbrella. But now I've got a goddaughter of that age; I realise it's not normal at all.
quotes.author: Alice Eve

quotes.text: The word we have in Korea for K-Pop is 'Gaio.' And I guess it's a huge umbrella term. Basically it's like saying Coldplay and Kanye West, or Eminem and Celine Dion, are the same genre.
quotes.author: Tablo

quotes.text: 'Roc The Life' is a song I wrote with The Dream, who made 'Umbrella,' 'Single Ladies' and loads more.
quotes.author: Rita Ora

quotes.text: Impact investing has become a broad umbrella that includes all investing with a focus on both financial return and social impact, but in its best form, impact investing prioritizes impact over returns and achieves outcomes that traditional investing cannot.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Novogratz

quotes.text: Rock n' roll was one thing, and then they chopped off the 'roll' and called it 'rock,' which became a sort of umbrella term for anything with a guitar in it. Like hair bands. How could we possibly believe that? It's just gotten downright silly, to the point where now it's sort of become like professional wrestling.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.text: I turned down the first script offered to me, and the second. I lay on my back one day under an umbrella, in the garden, reading the third, and wondered why I had turned down the first.
quotes.author: Conrad Veidt

quotes.text: I see what other people do and what songwriters don't. They don't get out and take care of themselves. Producers turn themselves into a massive brand. Songwriters tend to be under someone else's umbrella. If you're building your own legacy, it can't be under an umbrella.
quotes.author: Ester Dean

quotes.text: I wish feminism wasn't so scary to people. It should be an evolving concept. I think it's an umbrella term to embrace conflicting ideas.
quotes.author: Merritt Wever

quotes.text: I say, 'I write romance, women's fiction, chick lit.' I think it all fits very comfortably under the same umbrella. Basically, I write books for women - books about relationships: books that make you laugh and sometimes make you cry a little.
quotes.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.text: I would just randomly blurt out things like, 'What if a man showed up today and was carrying an umbrella, but it wasn't raining?' Eventually, people started to call me weird.
quotes.author: Lynn Coady

quotes.text: In its original version, the FTAA was meant to be a special carve-out for Washington and Wall Street as global 'free trade' advanced under the umbrella of the Doha round of the WTO.
quotes.author: Greg Grandin

quotes.text: I'm a fan of genre in the abstract, but at best, perhaps all we can really say when we talk about genre is that we're talking about an umbrella that covers a kind of story with certain elements.
quotes.author: Greg Rucka

quotes.text: You know, we've got so much on Bravo and coming up on Bravo, and I think we have so much more going on than 'The Real Housewives.' And I think 'The Real Housewives' is a great, you know, great addition to the portfolio. I think it brings a lot of viewers under our umbrella. And I think they stay and sample other shows.
quotes.author: Andy Cohen

quotes.text: The question is, What type of human do I want to be? How do I want to use my platform? Do I want to be safe, under the umbrella of my white privilege? Or do I want to push back and resist?
quotes.author: Macklemore

quotes.text: I have read books that are so cliched and lazy, my eyes have bled. But I also have read books marketed under the chick-lit umbrella that are so honest, clever and gritty that I've wanted to give up writing and paint walls instead.
quotes.author: Jojo Moyes

quotes.text: As a child, I copied Tenniel's illustrations from 'Alice's Adventures in Wonderland' obsessively, particularly his drawing of the white rabbit in waistcoat and frockcoat, umbrella tucked under one arm and a fob watch in paw, a look of suppressed panic in his eye.
quotes.author: Chris Riddell

quotes.text: I write first drafts by hand. Never do I open an umbrella inside the house. I don't predict wins or losses. I used to stand on a certain piece of rug if my brothers and husband were watching football and their team got in trouble - but now the luck went out of that rug. If a circle is involved, I try to go clockwise.
quotes.author: Louise Erdrich

quotes.text: Period drama is such a huge umbrella term: it seems to cover everything from Claudius to something from the 1920s.
quotes.author: Natasha Little

quotes.text: Fantasy encompasses a wide, wide spectrum of writing. We have beast fables, we have gothics, we have tales of vampires and werewolves, and we have sword and sorcery; we have epics from Homer, and there is just so much out there that we put under the umbrella of 'fantasy.'
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.text: Ultimately, I think there's this umbrella term of jazz, and what's cool about not just what's happening with my music but this general sense of what's happening with this generation of musicians, is it's a very broad term, and we can incorporate all types of music, and we can be influenced and inspired by all kinds of sounds.
quotes.author: Gretchen Parlato

quotes.text: Anonymity would be a fantastic umbrella. I don't like intrusion.
quotes.author: Sam Taylor-Wood

quotes.text: Going around under an umbrella interferes with one's looking up at the sky.
quotes.author: Jerzy Kosinski

quotes.text: One of my earliest memories is of seeing my mother in her beach chair, reading a book under an umbrella by the water's edge while my sisters and I played beside her. Of all the life lessons she taught me, that is one of my favorites: to take time at a place I love, restore my spirit with books and the beach.
quotes.author: Luanne Rice

quotes.text: I'm interested in people who have to overcome obstacles, people who are not sheltered by the umbrella of the establishment, marginals.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.text: Whether the Sikhs want to worship in Wisconsin or the Christians want to worship in Texas or the Jews want to worship in New York, we're living under the magnificent umbrella of a Constitution that says we can.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: A bank is a place where they lend you an umbrella in fair weather and ask for it back when it begins to rain.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Compromise makes a good umbrella, but a poor roof; it is temporary expedient, often wise in party politics, almost sure to be unwise in statesmanship.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.text: He was so benevolent, so merciful a man that, in his mistaken passion, he would have held an umbrella over a duck in a shower of rain.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.text: I am not feeling any better because I cannot stay in bed, having constant cause for walking. They say I leave at night by the window of my tower, hanging from a red umbrella with which I set fire to the forest!
quotes.author: Camille Claudel

quotes.text: Who am I that I have to sing under an umbrella? These people are my fans, and if they can stand in the rain to hear me sing, I can stand in the rain.
quotes.author: Bobby Darin

quotes.text: I carry an umbrella when I am outdoors and always wear sunscreen, even when I am sitting in front of a computer screen! I never touch coffee or other caffeinated drinks.
quotes.author: Fan Bingbing

quotes.text: There's an image that some of us have of Jackie Onassis, stepping out in the rain, and Maurice Tempelsman is holding her umbrella. We want that man. We want the man to be the concierge and the masseur and the travel booker.
quotes.author: Sandra Tsing Loh

quotes.text: What's great about documentary, it seems to me, is that it can be experimental filmmaking. You have a license to do a lot of diverse things under the umbrella of 'documentary.'
quotes.author: Errol Morris

quotes.text: All identity labels are umbrella terms to some degree, but this term 'bisexual' is not only serviceable, but it is sufficient. And yes, it brings together a bunch of people who are maybe shades different from one another. And maybe that's the beauty of labels: that they force you to be with other people and see the difference.
quotes.author: Charles M. Blow

quotes.text: I think the American people are very smart in understanding our country is very trustworthy with nuclear weapons. We've had them from the beginning. But they have also been critical for keeping the world more at peace than it would have been if it hadn't been for the American nuclear umbrella.
quotes.author: Haley Barbour

quotes.text: Under the big political umbrella, a man is just like a leaf in the ocean, with no control of his destiny and does not have any choice.
quotes.author: Zhang Yimou

quotes.text: Societies cannot move forward without law, and our constitution is the cornerstone of the law and our National Assembly is its umbrella and fortress.
quotes.author: Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa

quotes.text: A British porch is a musty, forbidding non-room in which to fling a sodden umbrella or a muddy pair of boots; a guard against the elements and strangers. By contrast the good ol' American front porch seems to stand for positivity and openness; a platform from which to welcome or wave farewell; a place where things of significance could happen.
quotes.author: Dan Stevens

quotes.text: 'The Lion' all began with a picture of a faun carrying an umbrella and parcels in a snowy wood. This picture had been in my mind since I was about sixteen. Then one day, when I was about forty, I said to myself, 'Let's try to make a story about it.'
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: Rogue economics is a sort of umbrella under which we find the criminal economy, the illegal economy, but also those gray areas, gray areas where there is not a proper regulation, where there is not legislation for the economy.
quotes.author: Loretta Napoleoni

quotes.text: True friendship multiplies the good in life and divides its evils. Strive to have friends, for life without friends is like life on a desert island... to find one real friend in a lifetime is good fortune; to keep him is a blessing.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.text: If you put the federal government in charge of the Sahara Desert, in 5 years there'd be a shortage of sand.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.text: Sadly, it's much easier to create a desert than a forest.
quotes.author: James Lovelock

quotes.text: Use every man after his desert, and who should scape whipping?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: The rules of survival never change, whether you're in a desert or in an arena.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.text: Americans admire a people who can scratch a desert and produce a garden. The Israelis have shown qualities that Americans identify with: guts, patriotism, idealism, a passion for freedom. I have seen it. I know. I believe that.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: Our knowledge is a receding mirage in an expanding desert of ignorance.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.text: When I was little, I went to the Sahara desert and met an older woman with beautiful earrings that came all the way down to her stomach. She told me, 'For us Tuareg, jewelry is not meant for decoration. It absorbs negative energy that comes your way.' So think twice when you buy a vintage ring!
quotes.author: Sofia Boutella

quotes.text: I'm just going to put out three or four releases a year and make it so that if you like the Desert Sessions, then you'll definitely like everything else.
quotes.author: Josh Homme

quotes.text: Well it seems to me, that all real communities grow out of a shared confrontation with survival. Communities are not produced by sentiment or mere goodwill. They grow out of a shared struggle. Our situation in the desert is an incubator for community.
quotes.author: Larry Harvey

quotes.text: I did grow up next door to Steve McQueen, who was a very famous movie star at the time, but as a kid it didn't impress me. We always had great fun with him. He would take us out on Sundays on his motorcycles, riding around in the desert; he was like a second father.
quotes.author: Herb Ritts

quotes.text: I never think of an entire book at once. I always just start with a very small idea. In 'Holes,' I just began with the setting; a juvenile correctional facility located in the Texas desert. Then I slowly make up the story, and rewrite it several times, and each time I rewrite it, I get new ideas, and change the old ideas around.
quotes.author: Louis Sachar

quotes.text: Too much good fortune can make you smug and unaware. Happiness should be like an oasis, the greener for the desert that surrounds it.
quotes.author: Rachel Field

quotes.text: The sea is everything. It covers seven tenths of the terrestrial globe. Its breath is pure and healthy. It is an immense desert, where man is never lonely, for he feels life stirring on all sides.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.text: I don't see the desert as barren at all; I see it as full and ripe. It doesn't need to be flattered with rain. It certainly needs rain, but it does with what it has, and creates amazing beauty.
quotes.author: Joy Harjo

quotes.text: As a remedy to life in society I would suggest the big city. Nowadays, it is the only desert within our means.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: If you can't stand a little sacrifice and you can't stand a trip across the desert with limited water, we're never going to straighten this country out.
quotes.author: Ross Perot

quotes.text: You should not see the desert simply as some faraway place of little rain. There are many forms of thirst.
quotes.author: William Langewiesche

quotes.text: Christ shared our experience; he suffered as we suffer; he died as we shall die, and for forty days in the desert he underwent the struggle between good and evil.
quotes.author: Basil Hume

quotes.text: Let us be honest with each other. The threat to marriage is not the gays. It is a lack of loving commitment - whether it is found in the form of neglect, indifference, cruelty or adultery, to name just a few manifestations of the loveless desert in which too many marriages come to grief.
quotes.author: Malcolm Turnbull

quotes.text: If we choose to walk into a forest where a tiger lives, we are taking a chance. If we swim in a river where crocodiles live, we are taking a chance. If we visit the desert or climb a mountain or enter a swamp where snakes have managed to survive, we are taking a chance.
quotes.author: Peter Benchley

quotes.text: The Worldly Hope men set their Hearts upon Turns Ashes - or it prospers; and anon, Like Snow upon the Desert's dusty Face, Lighting a little hour or two - is gone.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.text: Poets say science takes away from the beauty of the stars - mere globs of gas atoms. I, too, can see the stars on a desert night, and feel them. But do I see less or more?
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.text: A father may turn his back on his child, brothers and sisters may become inveterate enemies, husbands may desert their wives, wives their husbands. But a mother's love endures through all.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.text: Men have looked upon the desert as barren land, the free holding of whoever chose; but in fact each hill and valley in it had a man who was its acknowledged owner and would quickly assert the right of his family or clan to it, against aggression.
quotes.author: T. E. Lawrence

quotes.text: Sometimes bad things happen to good people. We don't know the meaning of all things, but we know God loves His children! And because He loves us, He will never desert us.
quotes.author: John Bytheway

quotes.text: The desert has its holiness of silence, the crowd its holiness of conversation.
quotes.author: Walter Elliot

quotes.text: Are you a politician asking what your country can do for you or a zealous one asking what you can do for your country? If you are the first, then you are a parasite; if the second, then you are an oasis in the desert.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Night comes to the desert all at once, as if someone turned off the light.
