quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.text: If you don't die of thirst, there are blessings in the desert. You can be pulled into limitlessness, which we all yearn for, or you can do the beauty of minutiae, the scrimshaw of tiny and precise. The sky is your ocean, and the crystal silence will uplift you like great gospel music, or Neil Young.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.text: A desert is a place without expectation.
quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

quotes.text: Someone asked me, if I were stranded on a desert island what book would I bring... 'How to Build a Boat.'
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Rebellion without truth is like spring in a bleak, arid desert.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: I always have this image of a woman running across a desert carrying children, trying to find water and food, not knowing when they'll get that. And her feet are slashed up from the dry, hard earth... Even when I'm uncomfortable, sometimes in pain, or just cold... I think, 'Thank God for what I've got.'
quotes.author: Sue Townsend

quotes.text: I had to live in the desert before I could understand the full value of grass in a green ditch.
quotes.author: Ella Maillart

quotes.text: I think the American West really attracts me because it's romantic. The desert, the empty space, the drama.
quotes.author: Ang Lee

quotes.text: As you wake up to sort of Morocco coming to life, and you drive a two hour journey through the desert as the sun is rising over the sand dunes... I saw landscapes and visual stuff that I'll never forget. It was special.
quotes.author: Jim Sturgess

quotes.text: Whatever you are by nature, keep to it; never desert your line of talent. Be what nature intended you for, and you will succeed.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.text: Oman overall has great animal and plant biodiversity because it has mountains, desert, coastal areas and rich coral reefs.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.text: Without music, life is a journey through a desert.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.text: I've always really, really wanted to go to Egypt and go inside some pyramids and just hang out there. I don't know why. I don't like hot weather, and I don't like the desert, but something about the pyramid and the mummies and all their history there, I'd love to go check it out.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Bilodeau

quotes.text: The desert is natural; when you are out there, you can get in tune with your environment, something you lose when you live in the city.
quotes.author: Robyn Davidson

quotes.text: I was a fighter pilot, flying Hurricanes all round the Mediterranean. I flew in the Western Desert of Libya, in Greece, in Syria, in Iraq and in Egypt.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.text: This creed of the desert seemed inexpressible in words, and indeed in thought.
quotes.author: T. E. Lawrence

quotes.text: Let me tell you something that we Israelis have against Moses. He took us 40 years through the desert in order to bring us to the one spot in the Middle East that has no oil!
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.text: I love Sufism as I love beautiful poetry, but it is not the answer. Sufism is like a mirage in the desert. It says to you, come and sit, relax and enjoy yourself for a while.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.text: 'Legion' was a lot of fun to shoot. It was a real unique apocalypse scenario that takes place in a diner out in the desert. Very much like a drive-in B-movie, but in a good way.
quotes.author: Dennis Quaid

quotes.text: I'm most passionate about anything to do with nature and the simple things. I love taking walks with my family or my friends and seeing nature. And that's why I love living where I live because I live up in the desert area in the mountains.
quotes.author: Atticus Shaffer

quotes.text: The vast sage desert undulates with almost imperceptible tides like the oceans.
quotes.author: Frank Waters

quotes.text: When does money run out of time? The countdown begins when investable assets pose too much risk for too little return; when lenders desert credit markets for other alternatives such as cash or real assets.
quotes.author: Bill Gross

quotes.text: My mum's from Broome, so I'm a saltwater person - Aboriginal people are either freshwater, saltwater or desert mob. So I always feel much more comfortable in close proximity to the beach, even if I'm not necessarily in the water.
quotes.author: Shari Sebbens

quotes.text: The cool parts - the parts that have won Dubai its reputation as 'the Vegas of the Middle East' or 'the Venice of the Middle East' or 'the Disney World of the Middle East, if Disney World were the size of San Francisco and out in a desert' - have been built in the last ten years.
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.text: It seemed that rebellion must have an unassailable base, something guarded not merely from attack, but from the fear of it: such a base as we had in the Red Sea Parts, the desert, or in the minds of the men we converted to our creed.
quotes.author: T. E. Lawrence

quotes.text: We have all been guilty of complaining, but God does not look at it as lightly as we may think. Complaining was the reason the Jews ended up wandering in the desert for forty years. If we were more grateful for what God has done for us, abasing ourselves would not be a problem.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.text: There are not many places in the world where you can get to the beach in an hour, the desert in two hours and snowboarding or skiing in three hours. You can do all that in California.
quotes.author: Alex Pettyfer

quotes.text: Ethnically, Tuareg describe themselves as white. And they don't look Arab or black. Many Tuareg have light skin, light eyes and sharp angular noses and cheekbones. They are cousins of the Berbers of North Africa. Some legends say the Tuareg are the decedents of an ancient Roman legion that disappeared into the desert two millennia ago.
quotes.author: Richard Engel

quotes.text: We shot 'Delusion' in the middle of the desert and outside of Las Vegas where they did those underground nuclear bomb testings. So I only ate oysters and drank coffee because I didn't want to turn into a mutant.
quotes.author: Jennifer Rubin

quotes.text: I love being outdoors, being in the mountains and the desert, and my wife enjoys that too. That's one of the things that sustain our relationship.
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

quotes.text: To hike out alone in the desert; to sleep on the valley floor on a night with no moon, in the pitch black, just listening to the boom of silence: you can't imagine what that's like.
quotes.author: Nicole Krauss

quotes.text: I'd had no particular interest in the Southwest at all as a young girl, and I was completely surprised that the desert stole my heart to the extent it did.
quotes.author: Terri Windling

quotes.text: Broadly speaking, the Southern and Western desert and mountain states will vote for the candidate who endorses an aggressive military, a role for religion in public life, laissez-faire economic policies, private ownership of guns and relaxed conditions for using them, less regulation and taxation, and a valorization of the traditional family.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.text: I wrote about wasting time, which I suppose is a part of the great human journey. We're supposed to wallow, to go through the desert without water for a long time so that when we finally drink it, we'll truly need it and we won't spill a drop. It's about being present.
quotes.author: Walton Goggins

quotes.text: Those fields of daisies we landed on, and dusty fields and desert stretches. Memories of many skies and earths beneath us - many days, many nights of stars.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.text: Just as Mars - a desert planet - gives us insights into global climate change on Earth, the promise awaits for bringing back to life portions of the Red Planet through the application of Earth Science to its similar chemistry, possibly reawakening its life-bearing potential.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.text: I can understand why those primitive desert people think a camera steals their soul. It is unnatural to see yourself from the outside.
quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

quotes.text: In Botswana in the Kalahari Desert there's a tented camp called Jack's Camp, which is like old Africa meets Ralph Lauren. The Oriental rugs, the old leather chairs - you feel like you've just jumped out of a Ralph Lauren ad.
quotes.author: Mark Burnett

quotes.text: I can bat in the morning, afternoon, evening, night, on ice, desert, wherever and whenever. It is almost nirvana for me. It takes me away from the stresses of life.
quotes.author: Gautam Gambhir

quotes.text: Grieve not, then, if your sons seem to desert you, but rejoice, rather, seeing the will of God done gladly.
quotes.author: Jim Elliot

quotes.text: Often undecided whether to desert a sinking ship for one that might not float, he would make up his mind to sit on the wharf for a day.
quotes.author: Max Aitken

quotes.text: The people who were honored in the Bible were the false prophets. It was the ones we call the prophets who were jailed and driven into the desert.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: I'm most suspicious of scripts that have a lot of stage direction at the top of the page... sunrise over the desert and masses of... a whole essay before you get to the dialogue.
quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

quotes.text: A friend of mine has a big farm in the desert, and she picks up feathers and roadkill for me, then makes it into clothes. I think it's cool to wear roadkill. If I died and somebody wanted to wear my teeth around their neck to VMAs, I'd feel honored.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.text: The craziest place I've probably ever visited while filming would have to be Jordan. I did a small test shoot for a test movie. We arrived in Jordan, and we stayed in Amman for a night. Then we drove down for three hours into the middle of the Wadi Rum Desert, which is in the absolute middle of nowhere. It was insane.
quotes.author: Isaac Hempstead Wright

quotes.text: They defended the grains of sand in the desert to the last drop of their blood.
quotes.author: Gamal Abdel Nasser

quotes.text: I am very much a person who appreciates perennial things. Things like a Lacoste shirt, a Clarks desert boot, Persol sunglasses and Vans shoes that have been the same forever. There are certain things that once you find it, you like it and it's done. I like Italian clothing, like suits from Battistoni and I have a shirt by Piero Albertelli.
quotes.author: Roman Coppola

quotes.text: I distrust Great Men. They produce a desert of uniformity around them and often a pool of blood too, and I always feel a little man's pleasure when they come a cropper.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.text: I started to draw desert islands. They were just rough, shapes in the middle of the page. Then I began drawing shapes within those shapes and I was amazed how quickly the islands got better. It took off from there.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.text: The progress of science is strewn, like an ancient desert trail, with the bleached skeleton of discarded theories which once seemed to possess eternal life.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.text: If you can survive in the desert, you survive anywhere. I know more than anything life in desert. You can tell by looking at the dirt how long ago it rained, how hard it rained, how much water came through. You can by looking at a plant, a tree, from an animal's look. I can read the desert like I read my hand.
quotes.author: Waris Dirie

quotes.text: Never make your home in a place. Make a home for yourself inside your own head. You'll find what you need to furnish it - memory, friends you can trust, love of learning, and other such things. That way it will go with you wherever you journey.
quotes.author: Tad Williams

quotes.text: Love begins by taking care of the closest ones - the ones at home.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Where we love is home - home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.text: Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do... but how much love we put in that action.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Have nothing in your house that you do not know to be useful, or believe to be beautiful.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.text: And when the day arrives I'll become the sky and I'll become the sea and the sea will come to kiss me for I am going home. Nothing can stop me now.
quotes.author: Trent Reznor

quotes.text: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The home should be the treasure chest of living.
quotes.author: Le Corbusier

quotes.text: The ache for home lives in all of us, the safe place where we can go as we are and not be questioned.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Home is one's birthplace, ratified by memory.
quotes.author: Henry Anatole Grunwald

quotes.text: Home is where the heart is.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.text: Home is the place where, when you have to go there, they have to take you in.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: You never know what events are going to transpire to get you home.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: Where thou art, that is home.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.text: Whether rich or poor, a home is not a home unless the roots of love are ever striking deeper through the crust of the earthly and the conventional, into the very realities of being, not consciously always; seldom, perhaps; the simplicity of loving grows by living simply near nature and God.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.text: It may be that the satisfaction I need depends on my going away, so that when I've gone and come back, I'll find it at home.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Seek home for rest, for home is best.
quotes.author: Thomas Tusser

quotes.text: My home is in Heaven. I'm just traveling through this world.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.text: The prospect of going home is very appealing.
quotes.author: David Ginola

quotes.text: To be happy at home is the ultimate result of all ambition, the end to which every enterprise and labor tends, and of which every desire prompts the prosecution.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: The home is the chief school of human virtues.
quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

quotes.text: I would not change my blest estate for all the world calls good or great.
quotes.author: Isaac Watts

quotes.text: Home is the place we love best and grumble the most.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.text: The spirit is at home, if not entirely satisfied, in America.
quotes.author: Allan Bloom

quotes.text: Strength of character may be learned at work, but beauty of character is learned at home.
quotes.author: Henry Drummond

quotes.text: There's no place like home. And I do miss my home.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: If you reject the food, ignore the customs, fear the religion and avoid the people, you might better stay at home.
quotes.author: James A. Michener

quotes.text: Nothing can bring a real sense of security into the home except true love.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.text: I told my mother-in-law that my house was her house, and she said, 'Get the hell off my property.'
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.text: Home is any four walls that enclose the right person.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: Homesickness is nothing. Fifty percent of the people in the world are homesick all the time.
quotes.author: John Cheever

quotes.text: One never reaches home, but wherever friendly paths intersect the whole world looks like home for a time.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.text: Decorate your home. It gives the illusion that your life is more interesting than it really is.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.text: I long, as does every human being, to be at home wherever I find myself.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Be grateful for the home you have, knowing that at this moment, all you have is all you need.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.text: There is nothing more important than a good, safe, secure home.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.text: Home is where you feel at home and are treated well.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: If you go anywhere, even paradise, you will miss your home.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.text: I'm the type who'd be happy not going anywhere as long as I was sure I knew exactly what was happening at the places I wasn't going to. I'm the type who'd like to sit home and watch every party that I'm invited to on a monitor in my bedroom.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: Home is where one starts from.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: Of all the home remedies, a good wife is best.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.text: The more one does and sees and feels, the more one is able to do, and the more genuine may be one's appreciation of fundamental things like home, and love, and understanding companionship.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: I'm lucky because I have a job I love. I really miss being away from home, being in my own bed, seeing my animals and siblings, having my moms cookies. I have a couple cats. I got a kitten about a year ago and now Im going on the road so I wont see him for a while. I feel bad.
quotes.author: Michelle Branch

quotes.text: A house that does not have one warm, comfy chair in it is soulless.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.text: Home interprets heaven. Home is heaven for beginners.
quotes.author: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quotes.text: A home without books is a body without soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: When you finally go back to your old home, you find it wasn't the old home you missed but your childhood.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.text: A house is not a home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: He is happiest, be he king or peasant, who finds peace in his home.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: I believe that being successful means having a balance of success stories across the many areas of your life. You can't truly be considered successful in your business life if your home life is in shambles.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: I kiss the soil as if I placed a kiss on the hands of a mother, for the homeland is our earthly mother. I consider it my duty to be with my compatriots in this sublime and difficult moment.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.text: Home is the nicest word there is.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.text: The home to everyone is to him his castle and fortress, as well for his defence against injury and violence, as for his repose.
quotes.author: Edward Coke

quotes.text: When it comes to developing character strength, inner security and unique personal and interpersonal talents and skills in a child, no institution can or ever will compare with, or effectively substitute for, the home's potential for positive influence.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: The house has to please everyone, contrary to the work of art which does not. The work is a private matter for the artist. The house is not.
quotes.author: Adolf Loos

quotes.text: A girl phoned me the other day and said... 'Come on over, there's nobody home.' I went over. Nobody was home.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: Home is, I suppose just a child's idea. A house at night, and a lamp in the house. A place to feel safe.
quotes.author: V. S. Naipaul

quotes.text: To be a queen of a household is a powerful thing.
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.text: In the mind, in the heart, I was always home. I always imagined, really, going back home.
quotes.author: Miriam Makeba

quotes.text: It takes patience to appreciate domestic bliss; volatile spirits prefer unhappiness.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.text: I feel like I've never had a home, you know? I feel related to the country, to this country, and yet I don't know exactly where I fit in... There's always this kind of nostalgia for a place, a place where you can reckon with yourself.
quotes.author: Sam Shepard

quotes.text: Charity begins at home, and justice begins next door.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: When I go home, its an easy way to be grounded. You learn to realize what truly matters.
quotes.author: Tony Stewart

quotes.text: There are only two things we should fight for. One is the defense of our homes and the other is the Bill of Rights.
quotes.author: Smedley Butler

quotes.text: When everyone goes home, you're stuck with yourself.
quotes.author: Layne Staley

quotes.text: If I were asked to name the chief benefit of the house, I should say: the house shelters day-dreaming, the house protects the dreamer, the house allows one to dream in peace.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.text: I have an answering machine in my car. It says, I'm home now. But leave a message and I'll call when I'm out.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Home life is no more natural to us than a cage is natural to a cockatoo.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: God is at home, it's we who have gone out for a walk.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.text: Home is the most popular, and will be the most enduring of all earthly establishments.
quotes.author: Channing Pollock

quotes.text: The worst feeling in the world is the homesickness that comes over a man occasionally when he is at home.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.text: Home life ceases to be free and beautiful as soon as it is founded on borrowing and debt.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.text: Housework is what a woman does that nobody notices unless she hasn't done it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.text: A man's home is his wife's castle.
quotes.author: Alexander Chase

quotes.text: The human brain now holds the key to our future. We have to recall the image of the planet from outer space: a single entity in which air, water, and continents are interconnected. That is our home.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.text: Charity begins at home, but should not end there.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.text: A man's house is his castle.
quotes.author: James Otis

quotes.text: Owning a home is a keystone of wealth - both financial affluence and emotional security.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.text: I love grocery shopping when I'm home. That's what makes me feel totally normal. I love both the idea of home as in being with my family and friends, and also the idea of exploration. I think those two are probably my great interests.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.text: When you take a flower in your hand and really look at it, it's your world for the moment. I want to give that world to someone else. Most people in the city rush around so, they have no time to look at a flower. I want them to see it whether they want to or not.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.text: As societies grow decadent, the language grows decadent, too. Words are used to disguise, not to illuminate, action: you liberate a city by destroying it. Words are to confuse, so that at election time people will solemnly vote against their own interests.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.text: Eventually, I think Chicago will be the most beautiful great city left in the world.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.text: In Amsterdam, the river and canals have been central to city life for the last four centuries.
quotes.author: Janet Echelman

quotes.text: There are always things I find difficult - being in crowds, remembering faces. I do like routines. I always travel with someone. My life in Avignon is a very quiet one. I have an apartment that looks over the whole city. I can drop into town, but a lot of the time I write from home. In some respects I still live a very quiet, simple life.
quotes.author: Daniel Tammet

quotes.text: I feel like, big city or small town, you can relate to following your parents' footsteps or putting your own dreams on the back burner or vices that we get caught up in - that whole cycle. That's not just a small-town thing. That's a life thing.
quotes.author: Kacey Musgraves

quotes.text: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.text: Everyone feels like family and I am back in the city that I love.
quotes.author: Chris Noth

quotes.text: There are three orchestras in Munich, all world-quality, in a city of one million. Yet every hall is full.
quotes.author: Zubin Mehta

quotes.text: I'm a union guy; I've always been. I've been in SAG 35 years; my father was a garbage man, a sanitation man, for the city, a union guy.
quotes.author: Tony Danza

quotes.text: Not being re-signed in Baltimore was probably the lowest point, mentally, of my career. That city was the only place where I wanted to be at the time, based on everything that had transpired.
quotes.author: Eric Davis

quotes.text: I beg to present you as a Christmas gift the city of Savannah.
quotes.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

quotes.text: Often even a whole city suffers for a bad man who sins and contrives presumptuous deeds.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.text: In 20 or 30 years, you'll be able to hold in your hand as much computing knowledge as exists now in the whole city, or even the whole world.
quotes.author: Douglas Engelbart

quotes.text: It's a paradox to be an actress, living in the city, taking planes all the time, trying to find the right balance in this life, which is not so eco-friendly, and still try to respect the environment.
quotes.author: Marion Cotillard

quotes.text: I like Kauffman Stadium in Kansas City. With the waterfall and things like that, I think it's pretty cool.
quotes.author: CC Sabathia

quotes.text: The Democratic Party is made up of trial lawyers, labor unions, government employees, big city political machines, the coercive utopians, the radical environmentalists, feminists, and others who want to restructure society with tax dollars and government fiat.
quotes.author: Grover Norquist

quotes.text: Look at the bark of a redwood, and you see moss. If you peer beneath the bits and pieces of the moss, you'll see toads, small insects, a whole host of life that prospers in that miniature environment. A lumberman will look at a forest and see so many board feet of lumber. I see a living city.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.text: I have struck a city - a real city - and they call it Chicago... I urgently desire never to see it again. It is inhabited by savages.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.text: I love Amsterdam. The city is vibrant and alive. It's fresh and so open. It's definitely one of my favorite places.
quotes.author: Stefon Harris

quotes.text: Rio's a beautiful city, a vibrant place, special place.
quotes.author: Eduardo Paes

quotes.text: Ay, rail at gaming - 'tis a rich topic, and affords noble declamation. Go, preach against it in the city - you'll find a congregation in every tavern.
quotes.author: Edward Moore

quotes.text: We may not always agree with every one of our neighbors. That's life. And it's part of living in such a diverse and dense city. But we also recognize that part of being a New Yorker is living with your neighbors in mutual respect and tolerance. It was exactly that spirit of openness and acceptance that was attacked on 9/11, 2001.
quotes.author: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.text: Moral habits, induced by public practices, are far quicker in making their way into men's private lives, than the failings and faults of individuals are in infecting the city at large.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.text: Milan, for me, is a city of discovery. You can find some amazing gardens behind some great houses; I also love finding beautiful galleries and incredible shops, but you have to explore. And the food is amazing.
quotes.author: Francisco Costa

quotes.text: I mean, just because you're a musician doesn't mean all your ideas are about music. So every once in a while I get an idea about plumbing, I get an idea about city government, and they come the way they come.
quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

quotes.text: New York may be the city that never sleeps, but Shanghai doesn't even sit down, and not just because there is no room.
quotes.author: Patricia Marx

quotes.text: The city is as large as Seville or Cordova; its streets, I speak of the principal ones, are very wide and straight; some of these, and all the inferior ones, are half land and half water, and are navigated by canoes.
quotes.author: Hernan Cortes

quotes.text: Standing on soil feels so much different than standing on city pavement; it lets you look inward and reflect and see who you really are, while you see a beautiful, unspoiled land as far as the eye can see. It allows your inner life to grow.
quotes.author: Ricardo Montalban

quotes.text: Each year, every city in the world that can should have a multiday festival. More people meeting each other, digging new types of music, new foods, new ideas. You want to stop having so many wars? This could be a step in the right direction.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: If there is one city apart from Mumbai where I would love to settle down, it has to be Chennai.
quotes.author: Ashwin Sanghi

quotes.text: The San Gabriel Mountains rise like a rampart at the edge of the city, safeguarding more than 500,000 acres of mature forests, mountain streams, dramatic waterfalls, and towering peaks that reach over 9,000 feet. These untamed places attract bighorn sheep, mountain lions, and other threatened or endangered species.
quotes.author: Frances Beinecke

quotes.text: A mayor is a symbol and a public face of what a city bureaucracy provides its citizens.
quotes.author: John Hickenlooper

quotes.text: Some day the workers will take possession of your city hall, and when we do, no child will be sacrificed on the altar of profit!
quotes.author: Mother Jones

quotes.text: Clearly, then, the city is not a concrete jungle, it is a human zoo.
quotes.author: Desmond Morris

quotes.text: In a big city like L.A. you can spend a lot of time surrounded by hundreds of people yet you feel like an alien or a ghost or something.
quotes.author: Morley

quotes.text: There's an expression in Australia that's called 'Go Bush,' which means to get out of the city and relax. I try and 'go bush' to places where there's no cell reception. But, I don't get to do that often, so for the most part, it's just a state of mind.
quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

quotes.text: Hiroshima does not look like a bombed city. It looks as if a monster steamroller had passed over it and squashed it out of existence.
quotes.author: Wilfred Burchett

quotes.text: City people live the city. We live in L.A., New York, we live in places where it's chaotic and you never know what's gonna happen. And that's the music - you never know what's gonna happen.
quotes.author: Alice Cooper

quotes.text: From the top of the quarry cliffs, one could see the New Jersey suburbs bordered by the New York City skyline.
quotes.author: Robert Smithson

quotes.text: You know what's nice about Montreal? Not only is it a beautiful city, but you have Cuban cigars.
quotes.author: Jamie Farr

quotes.text: Many cities make music, but no city breathes music quite like Memphis. The songs and sounds that come from here are uniquely American.
quotes.author: Shawn Amos

quotes.text: There are a lot more tabloids in England that like to report other things in your life, some of which are true and some of which are exaggerated and untrue. There have been stories where people claim to have seen me in one place and I wasn't even in that city then. The Aussie press is more judgmental and moralistic.
quotes.author: Shane Warne

quotes.text: It's been amazing getting to go from city to city and perform for thousands of people. It's an amazing feeling, and the energy is crazy.
quotes.author: Austin Mahone

quotes.text: I had a dream of music and art and the big city in which I would get lost, where no one would know me and I wouldn't know anyone, where I would work at some ordinary job, and if one day I got up in the morning and decided I wasn't going to go to work anymore, no one would ask questions.
quotes.author: Ori Gersht

quotes.text: I adore Madrid. It's my city. If I ever move, it will only be for work. Whenever I travel, I always want to get back home.
quotes.author: Maria Valverde

quotes.text: I live in New York, and I love New York as well, but I think Los Angeles is a place where if you have the right person with you, there are all these little worlds that you would never guess by just looking at the exterior of what the city is.
quotes.author: Greta Gerwig

quotes.text: Having Black hair is unique in that Black women change up styles a lot. You can walk down one street block in New York City and see 10 different hairstyles that Black women are wearing: straight curls, short cuts, braids - we really run the gamut.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: Being born in Kansas City, Missouri and raised in the very rural parts of Kansas led me to believe that everything was simple, everything made sense and that anything was possible.
quotes.author: Chely Wright

quotes.text: We made it known that we were trying to show the reality of France. People think of Paris as the city of love or the city of light, but where you got love you got hate, where you got light you got darkness.
quotes.author: Mathieu Kassovitz

quotes.text: The chief function of the city is to convert power into form, energy into culture, dead matter into the living symbols of art, biological reproduction into social creativity.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.text: I was on the San Diego school board for 4 years, where I watched children successfully matriculate into elementary schools from Head Start programs from all around our city.
quotes.author: Bob Filner

quotes.text: Shortly thereafter, some friends encouraged me to try out for the Miss South Carolina World beauty pageant. To my surprise, I won - and was sent to New York City to compete nationally.
quotes.author: Donna Rice

quotes.text: Life is one long decay, no? There's a lot of beauty in it. Like the patina in an old city.
quotes.author: Urs Fischer

quotes.text: I try to jog in every city I visit, and I particularly enjoy harbour-front paths that let me ogle big ships, railroad bridges and the ruins of factories and warehouses.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.text: One of the characteristics of North American culture is that you can always start again. You can always move forward, cross a border of a state or a city or a county, and move West, most of the time West. You leave behind guilt, past traditions, memories.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.text: Delhi means everything to me. This city has given me everything, and I love it.
quotes.author: Virat Kohli

quotes.text: I was always very curious about what a scientist's life was like when I was young. Of course, when I was young, you didn't have very many opportunities to find out with no web, TV. I was very lucky: I was born in the city of Chicago and went to the University of Chicago where I actually saw things.
quotes.author: James D. Watson

quotes.text: Everyone has the right to walk from one end of the city to the other in secure and beautiful spaces. Everybody has the right to go by public transport. Everybody has the right to an unhampered view down their street, not full of railings, signs and rubbish.
quotes.author: Richard Rogers

quotes.text: Once I moved to London I thought it was unbeatable. I work a lot in L.A. and love it, but would never give up London. It's a true world city, with an energy that's unique.
quotes.author: Bruno Tonioli

quotes.text: I love everything about Philadelphia, and its food is like the city itself: real-deal, hearty, and without pretension. We've always had an underdog vibe as a city, but that just makes us try harder, and I love our scrappiness and scruffiness.
quotes.author: Lisa Scottoline

quotes.text: 'Trilogy' was more of a claustrophobic body of work. Before it was released, I hadn't left my city for 21 years, and I had never been on a plane, not once. I spent my entire life on one setting; that's probably why pieces of the album feel like one long track, because that's what my life felt like. It felt like one long song.
quotes.author: The Weeknd

quotes.text: The great city can teach something that no university by itself can altogether impart: a vivid sense of the largeness of human brotherhood, a vivid sense of man's increasing obligation to man; a vivid sense of our absolute dependence on one another.
quotes.author: Seth Low

quotes.text: I moved to New York City when I was 20 years old, started making movies non-stop. I didn't have any friends, so I would just sit at home all night editing on my iMac.
quotes.author: Casey Neistat

quotes.text: Conquer your neighbourhood, conquer your city, conquer your country, and then go after the rest of the world. That's my mantra.
quotes.author: Grandmaster Flash

quotes.text: I started my career with 'Refugee' in Bhuj. Now, it has become a full-fledged city.
quotes.author: Kareena Kapoor Khan

quotes.text: Washington, D.C. is a city filled with people who believe they are important.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.text: I love cities, and I love city governments in particular. But in politics it would have taken me 8 years from implementing a policy before I would get to see the feedback. With programming I could model the same policies and see the impact immediately. Technology is a far more efficient way to test.
quotes.author: Jack Dorsey

quotes.text: Just two days in Manhattan and you find yourself looking for a place to wash your handkerchief after you wipe your forehead and it comes away black. Is there a dirtier or more fascinating city anywhere in the land? The answer to both parts of the question has to be positively negative.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.text: Las Vegas is a 24-hour city. It never stops.
quotes.author: Eli Roth

quotes.text: I think when people mean that Discworld books have become darker they really mean the series is growing up. In 'The Colour of Magic' most of the city is set alight. It's a joke, in much the same way that the Earth is destroyed almost at the start of Douglas Adams's 'The Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy.'
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: I guess I just always had this idea that I would go to Hollywood. I had the typical 'get up and go' attitude that you have to have in order to make the brave step into the big city.
quotes.author: Felicia Day

quotes.text: Frankly, Milan kind of sucks as a restaurant city. It's so fashion-obsessed that people don't pay that much attention to the food.
quotes.author: Joe Bastianich

quotes.text: Sarajevo was this beautiful city, very cosmopolitan, multiethnic, full of wonderful people, artists and writers and poets and Serbs and Muslims and Croats, and living side by side. And then this medieval siege, and it was a medieval siege, came, and the Bosnian Serbs were on the hills lobbing in rockets and grenades and mortars.
quotes.author: Janine di Giovanni

quotes.text: The reality, sitting ten thousand miles away, is that we remain the country that inspires. We remain that shining city on a hill.
quotes.author: Jon Huntsman, Jr.

quotes.text: When I was little, I didn't really travel - from the suburbs to Paris was already a journey. I had a foreigner's eye on the city, and I still enjoy that point of view. Then there's the fact that one of the things that touches me most is injustice.
quotes.author: JR

quotes.text: When you look at a city, you know, it looks so unique. You feel this kind of uniqueness, you know, and especially if you go from a big city to a small city or if you go from one country to another. Cities look very different, often. They even feel very different. You know, and they are, of course. They certainly are.
quotes.author: Geoffrey West

quotes.text: The first trip I remember taking was on the train from Virginia up to New York City, watching the summertime countryside rolling past the window. They used white linen tablecloths in the dining car in those days, and real silver. I love trains to this day. Maybe that was the beginning of my fixation with leisurely modes of travel.
quotes.author: Billy Campbell

quotes.text: 'Hound Dog' took like twelve minutes. That's not a complicated piece of work. But the rhyme scheme was difficult. Also the metric structure of the music was not easy. 'Kansas City' was maybe eight minutes, if that. Writing the early blues was spontaneous. You can hear the energy in the work.
quotes.author: Jerry Leiber

quotes.text: I like sundresses with cowboy boots, little shorts with big wedge heels and a big piece of turquoise. I also love classic, Old Hollywood romantic styles. I'm 'country girl meets city girl' circa 1930.
quotes.author: Kirsten Prout

quotes.text: All life demands struggle. Those who have everything given to them become lazy, selfish, and insensitive to the real values of life. The very striving and hard work that we so constantly try to avoid is the major building block in the person we are today.
quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

quotes.text: Think about what people are doing on Facebook today. They're keeping up with their friends and family, but they're also building an image and identity for themselves, which in a sense is their brand. They're connecting with the audience that they want to connect to. It's almost a disadvantage if you're not on it now.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.text: It is not the beauty of a building you should look at; its the construction of the foundation that will stand the test of time.
quotes.author: David Allan Coe

quotes.text: If we desire a society of peace, then we cannot achieve such a society through violence. If we desire a society without discrimination, then we must not discriminate against anyone in the process of building this society. If we desire a society that is democratic, then democracy must become a means as well as an end.
quotes.author: Bayard Rustin

quotes.text: The four building blocks of the universe are fire, water, gravel and vinyl.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: You can't build a great building on a weak foundation. You must have a solid foundation if you're going to have a strong superstructure.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: Building capacity dissolves differences. It irons out inequalities.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: There are the further difficulties of building a population out of a diversity of races, each at a different stage of cultural evolution, some in need of restraint, many in need of protection; everywhere a bewildering Babel of tongues.
quotes.author: Arthur Keith

quotes.text: Predicting rain doesn't count. Building arks does.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: Living at risk is jumping off the cliff and building your wings on the way down.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: There's a fine line between character building and soul destroying.
quotes.author: Colin Hay

quotes.text: With my channel, and what people associate with Internet, most people think it goes viral, you become this huge thing super quick. I never had an explosion or a huge thing. It's just been something that has progressively been growing. It's been building.
quotes.author: PewDiePie

quotes.text: Changes in the traditional way of building are only permitted if they are an improvement. Otherwise stay with what is traditional, for truth, even if it be hundreds of years old has a stronger inner bond with us than the lie that walks by our side.
quotes.author: Adolf Loos

quotes.text: We are material creatures who spend much of our lives on material pursuits (even building a cathedral or writing a novel requires stone and mortar or paper and ink).
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.text: They're building a bridge over the Potomac for all the white liberals fleeing to Virginia.
quotes.author: George C. Wallace

quotes.text: You've got the Democratic Party that now depends on more government spending and actual building the dependence on government in order to increase their political party.
quotes.author: Jim DeMint

quotes.text: I had a lot of coaches growing up that were very hard on the kids in the name of building character, but it could have the opposite effect on kids.
quotes.author: Steve Carell

quotes.text: My friends are people who like building cool stuff. We always have this joke about people who want to just start companies without making something valuable. There's a lot of that in Silicon Valley.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.text: I'm satisfied with making true choices and finding the woman I love, Angie, and building a family that I love so much.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.text: When you have an audience standing and screaming the entire way through the short program and cheering every element you do, whether it's footwork, or spin, or a jump, to have that kind of emotion coming at you from every direction in the building, it's the most amazing sensation you can get as a sportsman.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.text: Suspense is very important. Even though this is humor and they're short stories, that theory of building suspense is still there.
quotes.author: Sergio Aragones

quotes.text: Money you won't need to use for at least seven years is money for investing. The goal here is to have your account grow over time to help you finance a distant goal, such as building a retirement fund. Since your goal is in the future, money for investing belongs in stocks.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.text: The Beliebers have done some pretty crazy stuff. Last week, the night before I was due to do a show in Germany, four girls went into a dumpster so they could sneak into the building. They climbed in and hid. When the guys working on the truck started getting the garbage they found them straight away. It was crazy.
quotes.author: Justin Bieber

quotes.text: Some scientists claim that hydrogen, because it is so plentiful, is the basic building block of the universe. I dispute that. I say there is more stupidity than hydrogen, and that is the basic building block of the universe.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.text: Networking is an essential part of building wealth.
quotes.author: Armstrong Williams

quotes.text: It was like falling off a building and suddenly, bang, you hit the bottom. The first time it happened was on an ordinary day at home. I was taking down some curtains. I took one step, turned around, took another step and then I fell and hit my head hard on the rowing machine.
quotes.author: Jonah Lomu

quotes.text: Building sustainable cities - and a sustainable future - will need open dialogue among all branches of national, regional and local government. And it will need the engagement of all stakeholders - including the private sector and civil society, and especially the poor and marginalized.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.text: The tallest building in the world is now in Dubai, the biggest factory in the world is in China, the largest oil refinery is in India, the largest investment fund in the world is in Abu Dhabi, the largest Ferris wheel in the world is in Singapore.
quotes.author: Fareed Zakaria

quotes.text: I've learned over decades of building that a deadline is a potent tool for problem-solving.
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.text: I like to see myself as a bridge builder, that is me building bridges between people, between races, between cultures, between politics, trying to find common ground.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.text: Building your own home is about desire, fantasy. But it's achievable; anyone can do it.
quotes.author: Kevin McCloud

quotes.text: I think that both parties should declare the debt limit as a political weapon of mass destruction which can't be used. I mean, it is silly to have a country that has 237 years building up its reputation and then have people threaten to tear it down because they're not getting some other matter.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: So I rang up a local building firm, I said 'I want a skip outside my house.' He said 'I'm not stopping you.'
quotes.author: Tim Vine

quotes.text: Organisms don't think of CO2 as a poison. Plants and organisms that make shells, coral, think of it as a building block.
quotes.author: Janine Benyus

quotes.text: I won a scholarship with the Brixton School of Building. I screwed around, not putting in a proper attendance.
quotes.author: Ronald Biggs

quotes.text: I don't feel 'vibes' when I enter a building - don't feel the previous owners looking down on me. But I do know when a place feels friendly.
quotes.author: Penelope Keith

quotes.text: The body moves through space every day, and in architecture in cities that can be orchestrated. Not in a dictatorial fashion, but in a way of creating options, open-ended sort of personal itineraries within a building. And I see that as akin to cinematography or choreography, where episodic movement, episodic moments, occur in dance and film.
quotes.author: Antoine Predock

quotes.text: When it was over my daughter said, 'Oh, I felt so sorry for him - he didn't want to hurt you, he liked you.' That was Victoria. When you visualize him up there on top of the Empire State Building, you do feel sorry for him.
quotes.author: Fay Wray

quotes.text: In short, avoiding the scourge of unemployment may have less to do with chasing after growth and more to do with building an economy of care, craft and culture. And in doing so, restoring the value of decent work to its rightful place at the heart of society.
quotes.author: Tim Jackson

quotes.text: Every song has a composer, every book has an author, every car has a maker, every painting has a painter, and every building has a builder. So it isn't irrational to take this simple logic a little further and say that nature must have had a Maker. It would be irrational to believe that it made itself.
quotes.author: Ray Comfort

quotes.text: I don't have any formula for ousting a dictator or building democracy. All I can suggest is to forget about yourself and just think of your people. It's always the people who make things happen.
quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

quotes.text: When one has finished building one's house, one suddenly realizes that in the process one has learned something that one really needed to know in the worst way - before one began.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: There is one timeless way of building. It is a thousand years old, and the same today as it has ever been. The great traditional buildings of the past, the villages and tents and temples in which man feels at home, have always been made by people who were very close to the center of this way.
quotes.author: Christopher Alexander

quotes.text: I recently went to a new doctor and noticed he was located in something called the Professional Building. I felt better right away.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: If a patron buys from an artist who needs money, the patron then makes himself equal to the artist; he is building art into the world; he creates.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.text: The Liberal State is a mask behind which there is no face; it is a scaffolding behind which there is no building.
quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

quotes.text: It has become impossible to give up the enterprise of disarmament without abandoning the whole great adventure of building up a collective peace system.
quotes.author: Arthur Henderson

quotes.text: The millennial generation and a growing number of employees are looking for more than just a paycheck. If a nonprofit could make that easy for me, they are doing me a favor. It's not just a one-way value exchange; it is an internal morale building opportunity.
quotes.author: Gerald Chertavian

quotes.text: I wrote 'Fight Song' as this declaration to believe in myself, and that is similar to what you are taught to believe in Girl Scouts. Building confidence. Building character. And above all else, being there for each other as a community.
quotes.author: Rachel Platten

quotes.text: We must always refill and ensure there is a critical mass of leaders and activists committed to nonviolence and racial and economic justice who will keep seeding and building transforming movements.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.text: I don't really care where I work, actually, because you know making a movie is like living in movie world. There's such a secluded world, and the director is the king ruling the country, and everybody's building this little town to speak in symbolism.
quotes.author: Franka Potente

quotes.text: I think of novels in architectural terms. You have to enter at the gate, and this gate must be constructed in such a way that the reader has immediate confidence in the strength of the building.
quotes.author: Ian Mcewan

quotes.text: I'm not a religious person. But, when I look at a beautiful cathedral, what brings awe, what induces awe is the idea that architecture, you know, a beautiful cathedral, a beautiful building.
quotes.author: Jason Silva

quotes.text: Building our homes as fortresses of righteousness for protection from the world takes constant labor and diligence.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.text: If we are serious about providing upward mobility and building a skilled workforce, pre-school is the place to begin.
quotes.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quotes.text: When I was building the Vietnam Memorial, I never once asked the veterans what it was like in the war, because from my point of view, you don't pry into other people's business.
quotes.author: Maya Lin

quotes.text: But in Japan, there's nothing like that, since the temple is made of wood. The divine spirit inside the building is eternal, so the enclosure doesn't have to be.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.text: The Communist Party said that I must finish my studies because after the revolution in Germany people would be required with technical knowledge to take part in the building of the Communist Germany.
quotes.author: Klaus Fuchs

quotes.text: The first Parikrma school started in a slum where there were 70,000 people living below the poverty line. Our first school was on a rooftop of a building inside the slums, a second story building, the only second story building inside the slums. And that rooftop did not have any ceiling, only half a tin sheet. That was our first school.
quotes.author: Shukla Bose

quotes.text: I don't want to over generalize, but I believe that women are typically drawn to leadership styles that focus on consensus building, effective listening and working in teams. That's certainly been my leadership style, and I think it's been very successful.
quotes.author: Margaret Hamburg

quotes.text: I'm very optimistic about the future. I'm just not optimistic about the skyscraper as a building typology that is suited for the future.
quotes.author: James Howard Kunstler

quotes.text: One great building does not make a great city.
quotes.author: Thomas Heatherwick

quotes.text: I have often wondered what it is an old building can do to you when you happen to know a little about things that went on long ago in that building.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.text: Peace is a daily, a weekly, a monthly process, gradually changing opinions, slowly eroding old barriers, quietly building new structures.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Belief in oneself is one of the most important bricks in building any successful venture.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.text: A great building must begin with the unmeasurable, must go through measurable means when it is being designed and in the end must be unmeasurable.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.text: Money doesn't mean anything to me. I've made a lot of money, but I want to enjoy life and not stress myself building my bank account. I give lots away and live simply, mostly out of a suitcase in hotels. We all know that good health is much more important.
quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

quotes.text: I never called my work an 'art'. It's part of show business, the business of building entertainment.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: The toughest thing about the power of trust is that it's very difficult to build and very easy to destroy. The essence of trust building is to emphasize the similarities between you and the customer.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.text: Ethics or simple honesty is the building blocks upon which our whole society is based, and business is a part of our society, and it's integral to the practice of being able to conduct business, that you have a set of honest standards.
quotes.author: Kerry Stokes

quotes.text: We have a long way to go before we are able to hear the voices of everyone on earth, but I believe that providing voices and building bridges is essential for the World Peace we all wish for.
quotes.author: Joichi Ito

quotes.text: Even at the United Nations, where legend has it that the building was designed so that there could be no corner offices, the expanse of glass in individual offices is said to be a dead giveaway as to rank. Five windows are excellent, one window not so great.
quotes.author: Enid Nemy

quotes.text: When I'm not acting, I'm writing, building an inventory of scripts. Even if they sit on the shelf, I just keep stacking them up.
quotes.author: Dan Aykroyd

quotes.text: At a relatively early age, I began to believe that building a business was perhaps the greatest opportunity for making an impact, because it's a tool for making a change in the world.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Holmes

quotes.text: God gives me the children's ministry heart and patience. This is what He wants. It's awesome. I don't know where He's gonna take it - but God is building this thing.
quotes.author: Willie Aames

quotes.text: It's such a joy to work with different ensembles and create a collaboration. Rehearsing and building a performance is very interesting for me.
quotes.author: Cecilia Bartoli

quotes.text: If you get a chance to be in a film, that's great. One of my goals is to make a record as good as Don Henley's album, Building the Perfect Beast.
quotes.author: Glenn Frey

quotes.text: There are so many steps you have to go through to reach a high level, so you're kind of building your own, I would say, mountain. You have to go piece by piece by piece. When you're young and really ambitious, you want to jump right up. It kind of teaches you a lesson, I would say.
quotes.author: Victoria Azarenka

quotes.text: Firefighters go where they're needed, sometimes ignoring the dangers even when no one is inside a burning building to be saved.
quotes.author: Bill Dedman

quotes.text: Trying to tear down the past prohibits you from building up your future.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.text: Social media is changing the way we communicate and the way we are perceived, both positively and negatively. Every time you post a photo, or update your status, you are contributing to your own digital footprint and personal brand.
quotes.author: Amy Jo Martin

quotes.text: The President's post should not be politicised. Once a president is elected, he is above politics.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: My favorite parts about 'The Battle of Five Armies' were the moments where you could clearly see that we were looking at New Zealand. That it wasn't done in post, it wasn't CGI, it was the beautiful, incredible creation of Mother Nature in all of her splendor.
quotes.author: Evangeline Lilly

quotes.text: Well, the post office is probably not the place you want to go if you want to be infused with patriotism and a renewed sense of vigor.
quotes.author: Adam Carolla

quotes.text: Death by plane crash scares me. I travel a lot, and when you hit turbulence, and post 9/11, that's in the back of my mind a bit.
quotes.author: Robert Englund

quotes.text: The ability to send applications by post allows fraudsters to apply in false or stolen identities without fear of arrest and to make multiple applications in the hope of getting one through. It allows the possibility of passports being applied for with the photographs of people who are outside the U.K. and seeking to enter illegally.
quotes.author: Des Browne

quotes.text: Growing up, we didn't have anything. My mum wasn't well, so I was in three care homes then foster homes before me and my little brother went back to her. I was passed from pillar to post.
quotes.author: Rebecca Ferguson

quotes.text: The way I understand it, the Russians are sort of a combination of evil and incompetence... sort of like the Post Office with tanks.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.text: You're on Facebook, and these people seem to have endless lives. I don't have time to live my life, let alone tell you what I'm doing, or post a photo.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.text: Each week, I post a video about some 'Pigeon of Discontent' raised by a reader. Because, as much as we try to find the 'Bluebird of Happiness,' we're also plagued by those small but pesky 'Pigeons of Discontent.'
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.text: I have a phenomenal team behind me who have helped get me here and I, along with them, will now put everything we can into the final few weeks of preparations before the Olympic Games, where I am aiming to race well, work well through the rounds, post good times and maybe even a personal best time on the biggest stage of them all.
quotes.author: Oscar Pistorius

quotes.text: My father worked in a post office and never made probably more than $8,000 a year as an employee of the post office, so when people can rise up from very modest circumstances and do well economically, I think that's a good thing about America, and we should encourage that kind of activity.
quotes.author: David Rubenstein

quotes.text: Anytime you see a turtle up on top of a fence post, you know he had some help.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.text: I post pictures that I want to post and say what I want to say. If that's three times a day or three times per month, then whatever.
quotes.author: Gigi Hadid

quotes.text: He is a man of courage who does not run away, but remains at his post and fights against the enemy.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: My father worked in the Post Office. A lot of double shifts. All his friends were in the same situation - truck drivers, taxi cab drivers, grocery clerks. Blue collar guys punching the clock and working long, hard hours. The thought that sustained them was the one at the center of the American dream.
quotes.author: Gary David Goldberg

quotes.text: Every decently-made object, from a house to a lamp post to a bridge, spoon or egg cup, is not just a piece of 'stuff' but a physical embodiment of human energy, testimony to the magical ability of our species to take raw materials and turn them into things of use, value and beauty.
quotes.author: Kevin McCloud

quotes.text: If I have the power to post 'Happy Birthday' on someone's Facebook page and make them feel really good, it feels really good to make other people feel really good. I love it. I'm a huge Facebook and Twitter person. And I love talking to my fans. It's fun.
quotes.author: Rebecca Mader

quotes.text: I have gone on the air and announced my telephone number at the Washington Post. I go into the night, talking to people, looking for things. The great dreaded thing every reporter lives with is what you don't know. The source you didn't go to. The phone call you didn't return.
quotes.author: Bob Woodward

quotes.text: Mail your packages early so the post office can lose them in time for Christmas.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.text: I find that I have about six bloggable ideas a day. I also find that writing twice as long a post doesn't increase communication, it usually decreases it. And finally, I found that people get antsy if there are unread posts in their queue.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.text: My favorite affirmation when I feel stuck or out of sorts is: Whatever I need is already here, and it is all for my highest good. Jot this down and post it conspicuously throughout your home, on the dashboard of your car, at your office, on your microwave oven, and even in front of your toilets!
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: At a time when the Post Office is losing substantial revenue from the instantaneous flow of information by email and on the Internet, slowing mail service is a recipe for disaster.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.text: I think I was just bored one summer afternoon, and I decided to post a little video of me singing and playing guitar out of tune.
quotes.author: Shawn Mendes

quotes.text: I'm actually on the Twitter like all those crazy young kids are, and if I'm going to do an in-store appearance or I post something on my website, I tweet these followers, a word I don't like so much, and over 50,000 people go, like, 'Okay, I got it.'
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: It is a great honor to be awarded a Nobel Prize. This is a wonderful experience for my wife Betty and me. We received congratulations by email, phone and post, many from old friends we had not seen for some time.
quotes.author: Willard Boyle

quotes.text: I tell you the past is a bucket of ashes, so live not in your yesterdays, no just for tomorrow, but in the here and now. Keep moving and forget the post mortems; and remember, no one can get the jump on the future.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.text: A lot of these kids I think are more content just to be on Facebook and the computer than they are to actually go out. They just really want to get a picture to post to their buddies, and that's about it.
quotes.author: Dave Attell

quotes.text: There's ups and downs of any job. If you worked at the post office, there's ups and downs. You have your good days, and you have your bad days. If you're a housewife, you have your good days, and you have your bad days.
quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

quotes.text: The post office doesn't guarantee delivery, but it tries really hard. It's called best efforts communication. If you put two postcards in the post-box, they don't necessarily come out then in the same order that you put them in. So, that means that there's potentially disorder with your delivery, and that's also true in the Internet.
quotes.author: Vint Cerf

quotes.text: I used to tweet, but it's an act of futility. You're not really making any impact, and if you find yourself in a mood when you wanna be a bit controversial and you post something, you suddenly realise, 'Oh my God!' because you've opened yourself up to a bunch of criticism from strangers.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.text: Cricket is my life. Before the cancer, I was happy-go-lucky. I used to think about my career and worry about the future. But post it, my thinking has completely changed. I'm happy to eat and breathe normally. I'm happy to have my life back.
quotes.author: Yuvraj Singh

quotes.text: Handwriting challenges aside, I love paper cards. I love the endless stewing involved in picking them out at the store. I love buying holiday stamps at the post office, and I love that 'whoosh' sound the cards make when I drop them into the mail slot.
quotes.author: Meghan Daum

quotes.text: My walk is a public one. My business is in the world, and I must mix in the assemblies of men or quit the post which Providence seems to have assigned me.
quotes.author: William Wilberforce

quotes.text: I'm friends with Taylor Swift, and I am tired of people asking me questions about our friendship. When I post a picture of us on Instagram, I'm posting a picture of me and my friend.
quotes.author: Sarah Hyland

quotes.text: People start to talk about post-racist, post-feminist. What does that mean? We're clearly not post either. Would you say post-democracy? Clearly we haven't reached true democracy yet.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.text: Bad company is like a nail driven into a post, which, after the first and second blow, may be drawn out with little difficulty; but being once driven up to the head, the pincers cannot take hold to draw it out, but which can only be done by the destruction of the wood.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.text: The perfect love affair is one which is conducted entirely by post.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Post office closures in the Dakotas and Minnesota will impact many communities, but the White Earth reservation villages, and other tribal towns of Squaw Lake, Ponemah, Brookston in Minnesota, and Manderson, Wounded Knee and Wakpala (South Dakota) as well as Mandaree in North Dakota will mean hardships for a largely Native community.
quotes.author: Winona LaDuke

quotes.text: I had an uncle who was a postal official at the Polish post office in Gdansk. He was one of the defenders of the Polish postal service and, after it capitulated, was shot by the Germans under the provisions of martial law. Suddenly he was no longer a member of the family, and we were no longer allowed to play with his children.
quotes.author: Gunter Grass

quotes.text: I record cello Etudes that are fewer than four minutes long and post them on YouTube. How can one execute fully-formed ideas with utmost perfection, yet stay free enough to allow improvisatory nuance? This has immediate application in almost every area of life, but especially in performance.
quotes.author: Joshua Roman

quotes.text: My favourite books are Charles Bukowski's 'Post Office' and 'Women.'
quotes.author: Alex Pettyfer

quotes.text: I would say that the Pentagon Papers case of 1971 - in which the government tried to block the The New York Times and The Washington Post that they obtained from a secret study of how we got involved in the war in Vietnam - that is probably the most important case.
quotes.author: Floyd Abrams

quotes.text: In my fairly disorganized life, yellow stickies are too easily lost, and as for software, I try to avoid using my computer as much more than a typewriter and a post office. I rely on my lifelong habit of daydreaming to spin my stories.
quotes.author: Julia Glass

quotes.text: Medical school education and post graduate education emphasize thoroughness.
quotes.author: Ezekiel Emanuel

quotes.text: I love to post behind-the-scenes photos of what is really going on. My twitter friends really seem to like that and the great thing is I can deliver them information right away.
quotes.author: Nancy O'Dell

quotes.text: For God's sake build not your faith upon Tradition, 'tis as rotten as a rotten Post.
quotes.author: Nicholas Culpeper

quotes.text: I think a lot of people think it's easy to just post stuff. They think it's the easy way to fame nowadays, but it's been hard. You have to film the video, which takes forever because I'm super picky about all my takes and stuff. Then you have to edit it and upload it, and doing that three times a week is very, very difficult.
quotes.author: Jacob Whitesides

quotes.text: I notice increasing reluctance on the part of marketing executives to use judgment; they are coming to rely too much on research, and they use it as a drunkard uses a lamp post for support, rather than for illumination.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.text: And remember don't high post when you're far from home, and high posting when you're all alone.
quotes.author: Mos Def

quotes.text: As the BBC approaches the final phase of decisions about its future, it will be important for those involved to be established in post and ready to take responsibility for implementation of the outcome.
quotes.author: Pauline Neville-Jones

quotes.text: A whopping 89 percent of buyers start their home search online. How your house looks online is the modern equivalent of 'curb appeal.' Rent a wide-angle lens and good lighting, get rid of your clutter and post at least eight great photos to win the beauty contest.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.text: A study in the Washington Post says that women have better verbal skills than men. I just want to say to the authors of that study: 'Duh.'
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.text: The right way to reign in healthcare costs is not by applying more government and more controls and making it more like the post office, it's by making it more like a consumer-driven market.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: The cholera had broken out at the post, and five or six men were dying daily.
quotes.author: Buffalo Bill

quotes.text: When I was a boy, I read a terrible article in a big weekly American magazine called the 'Saturday Evening Post.' In the middle of this family magazine on my parent's coffee table was an article about this family that was camping, and they were all mauled by a grizzly bear in their sleeping bags.
quotes.author: Robert Englund

quotes.text: I was with the 101st Airborne Division in Iraq, really in the middle of nowhere, about 80 miles south of Baghdad. And it was almost midnight, and I got a computer message from the home office of the Washington Post asking me to call them. I did call them and was told that I'd won the Pulitzer Prize.
quotes.author: Rick Atkinson

quotes.text: Users socialize to figure out what they're going to do on the weekend. They use MySpace to discover new music and post events. Musicians upload their music. People use it for entertainment purposes or to sell goods in the classified area. MySpace makes what they do in the offline world a) more efficient or b) more interesting.
quotes.author: Chris DeWolfe

quotes.text: I want every idea I have to make me money. I want every post I write to have 10,000 Facebook likes. I want every talk I give to have people laughing at all the right jokes. I want everyone to like me all the time.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.text: The internet was supposed to make this whole business of job searching rational and simple. You could post your resume and companies would search them and they'd find you. It doesn't seem to work that way. There aren't enough jobs for experienced, college educated managers and professionals.
quotes.author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.text: Immortality Device has been tested and researched by medical researchers all over the world from time to time. They email me and told me what they found. I post their results sometimes on my site.
quotes.author: Alex Chiu

quotes.text: In my view, far from deserving condemnation for their courageous reporting, the New York Times, the Washington Post and other newspapers should be commended for serving the purpose that the Founding Fathers saw so clearly.
quotes.author: Hugo Black

quotes.text: Sally Jenkins of the 'Washington Post' is the best sports columnist in the country. Second best is Gene Wojciechowski of ESPN.com, and third is Dan Wetzel on Yahoo!
quotes.author: Dan Jenkins

quotes.text: When I was a kid, I wrote to the BBC, and the producers sent me a huge package through the post with 'Doctor Who' scripts. I'd never even seen a script and couldn't believe that they actually wrote this stuff down. It sort of opened a door.
quotes.author: Peter Capaldi

quotes.text: One of the things the government can't do is run anything. The only things our government runs are the post office and the railroads, and both of them are bankrupt.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.text: Post traumatic stress disorder starts out with nightmares, flashbacks and actually reliving the event. And this happens over and over and over and over in your mind. If you let it go on, it can become chronic and become hard if not impossible to treat.
quotes.author: Dale Archer

quotes.text: I'm not only a lawyer, I have a post doctorate degree in federal tax law from William and Mary. I work in serious scholarship and work in the United States federal tax court. My husband and I raised five kids. We've raised 23 foster children. We've applied ourselves to education reform. We started a charter school for at-risk kids.
quotes.author: Michele Bachmann

quotes.text: I believe many people feel like God is mad at them. One day I put a post on Facebook that said, 'God is not mad at you.' Within a few hours, we literally had thousands of positive responses from people saying things like, 'That is exactly what I needed to hear today.' Obviously, this is a message we need to hear.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: I started thinking that if post modernism is about people opening up all their skeletons, I'm going the other way. I don't want anyone knowing anything about me anymore.
quotes.author: Billy Corgan

quotes.text: In the real world, I see conservatives volunteering at adoption agencies, at churches, at bake sales and the local American Legion Post while the only charity a progressive sends is a smug sermon on fair share and what fairness is.
quotes.author: Allen West

quotes.text: If you write a blog post, you've got something to say; you're not just creating words and synonyms. We'd like the computers to actually pick up on that semantic meaning.
quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

quotes.text: I think, from a standpoint of editorial, you know, AOL historically has played in a very deep way across many different verticals in the content space. Huffington Post adds a very large new dimension to that.
quotes.author: Tim Armstrong

quotes.text: In America, after 9/11, and after the death of bin Laden, and after two wars, one of them fought, a lot of people think, on false pretenses, and definitely post the Patriot Act, there are a lot of these questions about what can we do to our citizens in order to prevent the next attack.
quotes.author: Gideon Raff

quotes.text: To consult the statistician after an experiment is finished is often merely to ask him to conduct a post mortem examination. He can perhaps say what the experiment died of.
quotes.author: Ronald Fisher

quotes.text: Digital media are biased toward replication and storage. Our digital photos practically upload and post themselves on Facebook, and our most deleted e-mails tend to resurface when we least expect it. Yes, everything you do in the digital realm may as well be broadcast on prime-time television and chiseled on the side of the Parthenon.
quotes.author: Douglas Rushkoff

quotes.text: As we're bombarded with the imagery that we are and now, post 9-11, it's hard not to get hardened by the world and the amount of violence that's allowed to be shown to kids these days.
quotes.author: Mark Ruffalo

quotes.text: I think that horror films have a very direct relationship to the time in which they're made. The films that really strike a film with the public are very often reflecting something that everyone, consciously or unconsciously feeling - atomic age, post 9-11, post Iraq war; it's hard to predict what people are going to be afraid of.
quotes.author: Eli Roth

quotes.text: There was a time in the 1930s when magazine writers could actually make a good living. 'The Saturday Evening Post' and 'Collier's' both had three stories in each issue.
