These were usually entertaining, and people really went for them. But then television came along, and now of course, information technology... the new way of killing time.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.text: If you really care about Facebook likes, don't just post your stuff to Twitter and then rely on it being republished automatically to Facebook. In my sample size of one, Facebook penalizes you significantly for that and shows that content to far fewer people.
quotes.author: Michael Arrington

quotes.text: More academics should blog, post videos, post audio, post lectures, offer articles and more. You'll enjoy it: I've had threats and blackmail, abuse, smears and formal complaints with forged documentation.
quotes.author: Ben Goldacre

quotes.text: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers. It may not be difficult to store up in the mind a vast quantity of facts within a comparatively short time, but the ability to form judgments requires the severe discipline of hard work and the tempering heat of experience and maturity.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.text: I've had a blessed life. I've pulled back from trying to control my destiny and gone back to accepting whatever fate has in store for me. I live for today because I don't know what'll happen tomorrow.
quotes.author: Cilla Black

quotes.text: Space is big. You just won't believe how vastly, hugely, mind-bogglingly big it is. I mean, you may think it's a long way down the road to the drug store, but that's just peanuts to space.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.text: If you take 12 waters from the coconut - not the ones you buy in the store, although that's good - but the fresh coconuts, the little brown ones with the three eyes, if you take 12 of those within 24 hours, your blood will go back to the way it was when you were born.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.text: Ever consider what pets must think of us? I mean, here we come back from a grocery store with the most amazing haul - chicken, pork, half a cow. They must think we're the greatest hunters on earth!
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.text: Chinese people, young people, they don't go shopping a lot in department stores. All department store guys hate me. They say business is bad because of Jack.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.text: Maybe Christmas, the Grinch thought, doesn't come from a store.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: You can live your life angry, bitter, mad at somebody or even guilty, not letting go of your own mistakes, but you won't receive the good things God has in store.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: I don't know what is in store for the movie business any better than anybody else does, but it does seem like my kind of movies are a little trickier than it used to be - or maybe a lot trickier.
quotes.author: Wes Anderson

quotes.text: Character development is what I value most as a reader of fiction. If an author can manage to create the sort of characters who feel fully real, who I find myself worrying about while I'm walking through the grocery store aisles a week later, that to me is as close to perfection as it gets.
quotes.author: J. Courtney Sullivan

quotes.text: The things that make me happiest in the whole world are going on the occasional picnic, either with my children or with my partner; big family gatherings; and being able to go to the grocery store - if I can get those things in, I'm doing good.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.text: I was born in Chicago in 1927, the only child of Morris and Mildred Markowitz, who owned a small grocery store. We lived in a nice apartment, always had enough to eat, and I had my own room. I never was aware of the Great Depression.
quotes.author: Harry Markowitz

quotes.text: The key to success is to get out into the store and listen to what the associates have to say.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: There are times, like after a long day of work, when the thought of an easy drive-through is enticing. But then I remember how crappy I felt when I ate fast food in the past, and it inspires me to head to the grocery store or my local farmer's market and whip up an easy but healthier option.
quotes.author: Alison Sweeney

quotes.text: Cease to inquire what the future has in store, and take as a gift whatever the day brings forth.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.text: In the absence of the gold standard, there is no way to protect savings from confiscation through inflation. There is no safe store of value.
quotes.author: Alan Greenspan

quotes.text: There's a store in my neighborhood called Futon World. I like that name, 'Futon World.' Makes me think of a magical place that gets less and less comfortable over time.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: Every dollar of SNAP benefits generates $1.84 in the economy in terms of economic activity. If people are able to buy a little more in the grocery store, someone has to stock it, package it, shelve it, process it, ship it. All of those are jobs. It's the most direct stimulus you can get in the economy during these tough times.
quotes.author: Tom Vilsack

quotes.text: When I was at college, I worked in a department store called Brit Home Stores, which is a pretty lackluster department store, selling clothes for middle-aged women. My job was to walk the floor and find anything that was damaged, take it to the store room and log it.
quotes.author: Dominic Monaghan

quotes.text: My family originally lived in Brooklyn. Our first apartment was a little place above my father and uncle's hardware store in Coney Island. Now, don't get the impression that we were surrounded by merry-go-rounds, roller coasters and Ferris wheels. Nope, this was a little side street.
quotes.author: Gilbert Gottfried

quotes.text: I do feel like by buying rats from a pet store, you are saving them because if not, they would get fed to a snake or something.
quotes.author: Nikki Reed

quotes.text: Brushes are crucial for applying glazes, sauces, and oils. The pastry brushes that you find in homestores can be pricey so pay a visit to your local hardware store and pick up a few paint brushes which are less expensive and work equally as well.
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.text: I love feeling like I'm inhabiting the body of a ninja, like I could rob a liquor store with my bare hands if I wanted to.
quotes.author: Ronda Rousey

quotes.text: Today, most women are surrounded by ingenious gadgets. They don't grow the peas or raise the chicken that they serve for dinner; instead they hunt and gather in the grocery store. They go through catalogs or department stores to buy clothes instead of shearing sheep, carding wool, and weaving cloth for skirts and coats and blankets.
quotes.author: Helen Fisher

quotes.text: Ninety percent of the day is working out. Sometimes I get my nails done and go to the grocery store.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: If people want to find me, they can. They'll see a middle-aged woman wandering around the grocery store, looking to see what to buy for dinner.
quotes.author: S. E. Hinton

quotes.text: I just love to shop. If I could, I would shop every single day in every single store and spend all of my money which, you know, I do anyway.
quotes.author: Ariana Grande

quotes.text: Man's mind is like a store of idolatry and superstition; so much so that if a man believes his own mind it is certain that he will forsake God and forge some idol in his own brain.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.text: I stopped believing in Santa Claus when I was six. Mother took me to see him in a department store and he asked for my autograph.
quotes.author: Shirley Temple

quotes.text: One must realise his Self in order to open the store of unalloyed happiness.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.text: The Christian's Bible is a drug store. Its contents remain the same, but the medical practice changes.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The film is made in the editing room. The shooting of the film is about shopping, almost. It's like going to get all the ingredients together, and you've got to make sure before you leave the store that you got all the ingredients. And then you take those ingredients and you can make a good cake - or not.
quotes.author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quotes.text: I've never known a musician who regretted being one. Whatever deceptions life may have in store for you, music itself is not going to let you down.
quotes.author: Virgil Thomson

quotes.text: The price of freedom is eternal vigilance. Don't store unnecessary data, keep an eye on what's happening, and don't take unnecessary risks.
quotes.author: Chris Bell

quotes.text: I like my house to be unique to me. Sure, I've bought plenty of things out of a catalog, but the way I put them together in my home is special. You might have bought your sofa at a major home decorating store, but the rug you found at the flea market is so unique, it takes your room from 'carbon copy' to 'simply yours' in no time.
quotes.author: Nate Berkus

quotes.text: Emotions are contagious. We've all known it experientially. You know after you have a really fun coffee with a friend, you feel good. When you have a rude clerk in a store, you walk away feeling bad.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.text: When I was working at the Sprint store, I got laid off. I was bummed out, but I stayed positive. I used the money I had earned while working there to make my first album. Without that job, maybe 'Corazon Sin Cara' would never had been made. It's a very inspirational story.
quotes.author: Prince Royce

quotes.text: I saw a stationery store move.
quotes.author: Jay London

quotes.text: When I was a kid... if I couldn't get a ride to the comic book store, I would walk a mile and a half each way to get the latest issues of 'Batman' and 'Spider-Man' and 'X-Men.' I could not choose one over the other.
quotes.author: Jarrett J. Krosoczka

quotes.text: I've always written. There's a journal which I kept from about 9 years old. The man who gave it to me lived across the street from the store and kept it when my grandmother's papers were destroyed. I'd written some essays. I loved poetry, still do. But I really, really loved it then.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: It is a myth that art has to be sold. It is not like stocking a grocery store where people fill a pushcart. Art is a product that has no apparent need. The salesperson builds the need in the mind of the buyer.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.text: I know people think we drive around in these nice cars and we do whatever we want and our parents will pay our credit cards, but that's not the case. Sure, my parents were generous; I got a nice car at 16, but at 18 I was cut off. I've worked really hard. I opened the store myself.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: My earliest memory from childhood is of fishing with my father. And I remember vividly we were in a store, and we were buying a pup tent to go on our first camping trip.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.text: Housing Works is the coolest thrift store in the world, because not only are they the best thrift store - they're not the most thrifty thrift store - but they have amazing stuff and all of their proceeds go directly to kids, mostly homeless kids, living with AIDS and HIV in New York, in the metropolitan area.
quotes.author: Ezra Miller

quotes.text: Cruelty is all out of ignorance. If you knew what was in store for you, you wouldn't hurt anybody, because whatever you do comes back much more forceful than you send it out.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.text: Each Wal-Mart store should reflect the values of its customers and support the vision they hold for their community.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: My early childhood memories center around this typical American country store and life in a small American town, including 4th of July celebrations marked by fireworks and patriotic music played from a pavilion bandstand.
quotes.author: Frederick Reines

quotes.text: Yes, e-commerce is a strange situation for an old guy like me. You can buy a TV online, OK, but to buy a dress or shoes? Ugh. The customer has to go back to the store and breathe and smell and have a good time. Because shopping is a good time - like going to a nice restaurant.
quotes.author: Max Azria

quotes.text: My store, Wine Library, outsells big national chains. How do you think we do it? It started with hustle. I always say that our success wasn't due to my hundreds of online videos about wine that went viral, but to the hours I spent talking to people online afterward, making connections and building relationships.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: It's about getting the kids up and fed, getting one to school, getting the other down for a nap, going to the grocery store, picking one up from school, getting the other one down for another nap, cooking dinner... I live my life at these two extremes. I'm either a full-time stay-at-home mom or a full-time actress.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: Whether it's by helping us search for health-related information, connecting us with doctors through online portals, or enabling us to store and retrieve our medical records online, the Internet is starting to show the promise it has to transform the way people interact with and improve their own health and wellness.
quotes.author: Dean Ornish

quotes.text: Most important thought, if you love someone, tell him or her, for you never know what tomorrow may have in store.
quotes.author: Walter Payton

quotes.text: We may not know what each day has in store for us. We could be gone tomorrow. Any minute could truly be our goodbye. But we do have this moment. This time. Today. Right now. It takes way more effort to shell out hate then it does to allow love to flow freely in our lives. After all, it's what we were born to do.
quotes.author: Grace Gealey

quotes.text: You walk into a retail store, whatever it is, and if there's a sense of entertainment and excitement and electricity, you wanna be there.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: I followed a girl I met in Japan to Los Angeles and ended up working in a motorcycle store. I quit the job one night, went to a party in the Hollywood Hills and ended up yelling at a bunch of people. Someone saw me yelling and asked me to be in a play. The first night, there was an agent in the audience who took me on and sent me out for jobs.
quotes.author: Norman Reedus

quotes.text: Unfortunately, in collective bargaining one party or the other too often tries to gain an advantage - a bargain, like buying something in a store for less than it is worth.
quotes.author: Charles E. Wilson

quotes.text: It's a great battle, and it really is a battle, and there are people from all walks of life, you know, never judge anybody at the table: A man can be the greatest poker player and he might know all the numbers, but he might get beaten by a really savvy kid who works in a grocery store; and that's what's so great about this game.
quotes.author: James Woods

quotes.text: Everyone coming out of a perfume store is smelling the back of their hand.
quotes.author: Jonathan Carroll

quotes.text: I like to work when I'm not working - do something that may not be considered work, but to me it's work. Getting exercise by going to the grocery store.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: I worked at a hot dog place, a bagel place, the Jersey Store and the hottest fashion joint around. I was getting too famous to work there anymore. I was almost showing up as a joke. I made $2,000 on my show the previous night and I'm going to go shopping during my five-hour shift.
quotes.author: Wale

quotes.text: Each time you go to the grocery store with your kids, it is a potential learning opportunity. In order not to overemphasize materialism, focus on other things to do with money. In 'Beyond the Lemonade Stand,' I try to emphasize the importance of saving money, and of using it to help other people.
quotes.author: Bill Rancic

quotes.text: My mom passed on her obsession of all things antique or vintage. I love to go thrift store shopping or explore any sort of garage sale. Treasure hunting is a family passion.
quotes.author: Zoey Deutch

quotes.text: I grew up with the Blind Boys' music. My family owns a music store in Claremont, California, called The Claremont Folk Music Center. I grew up with a heavy diet of gospel, folk, and blues because those are kind of the cornerstones of traditional American music.
quotes.author: Ben Harper

quotes.text: It was very much like Norman Rockwell: small town America. We walked to school or rode our bikes, stopped at the penny candy store on the way home from school, skated on the pond.
quotes.author: Dorothy Hamill

quotes.text: The desktop metaphor was invented because one, you were a stand-alone device, and two, you had to manage your own storage. That's a very big thing in a desktop world. And that may go away. You may not have to manage your own storage. You may not store much before too long.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: I worked in a pet store and people would ask how big I would get.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: Every two months, I allow myself a splurge day where I eat thick, doughy pizza from Pizzeria Uno or an ice cream sundae from my store with birthday-cake ice cream, Marshmallow Fluff, and toppings mixed in.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.text: Always be prepared if someone asks you what you want for Christmas. Give brand names, the store that sells the merchandise, and, if possible, exact model numbers so they can't go wrong. Be the type who's impossible to buy for, so they have to get what you want.
quotes.author: John Waters

quotes.text: For those who are willing to make an effort, great miracles and wonderful treasures are in store.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.text: Handwriting challenges aside, I love paper cards. I love the endless stewing involved in picking them out at the store. I love buying holiday stamps at the post office, and I love that 'whoosh' sound the cards make when I drop them into the mail slot.
quotes.author: Meghan Daum

quotes.text: I went to a general store but they wouldn't let me buy anything specific.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: I went into a clothing store, and the lady asked me what size I was. I said, 'Actual'. I'm not to scale.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: There was a power outage at a department store yesterday. Twenty people were trapped on the escalators.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: When I was 16... I worked in a pet store. And they fired me because... they had three snakes in there, and one day I braided them.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Know how to effectively voice a complaint or make a claim at a retail store.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.text: Go to a wig store with your girlfriends, never by yourself. You need someone to say, 'Girl that looks good!' You need someone to encourage you to try pieces on. Try to purchase a wig close to your natural hair color as possible, don't come in with brown hair and try to leave as a redhead unless you are fine with that!
quotes.author: Sherri Shepherd

quotes.text: Well, when I was fifteen years old I worked in a lingerie store and that's how I feel in love with vintage lingerie because I wanted to know the history of it.
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.text: A great department store, easily reached, open at all hours, is more like a good museum of art than any of the museums we have yet established.
quotes.author: John Cotton Dana

quotes.text: In my entire life, any time I've ever lost something, I've gotten something even better going around the next corner. It's like one door closes and another door opens. As long as I can walk through the produce section in every grocery store in this country and eat the grapes that they're going to throw away, I know I can be fine.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: As much as I love to shop online, I also love walking the streets on a beautiful day and seeing what finds I can discover in a small shop or vintage store.
quotes.author: Natalie Massenet

quotes.text: And you have to remember that I came to America as an immigrant. You know, on a ship, through the Statue of Liberty. And I saw that skyline, not just as a representation of steel and concrete and glass, but as really the substance of the American Dream.
quotes.author: Daniel Libeskind

quotes.text: Every block of stone has a statue inside it and it is the task of the sculptor to discover it.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.text: The Statue of Liberty is no longer saying, 'Give me your poor, your tired, your huddled masses.' She's got a baseball bat and yelling, 'You want a piece of me?'
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.text: My life used to be like that game of freeze tag we played as kids. Once tagged, you had to freeze in the position you were in. Whenever something happened, I'd freeze like a statue, too afraid of moving the wrong way, of making the wrong decision. The problem is, if you stand still too long, that's your decision.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: Your work is carved out of agony as a statue is carved out of marble.
quotes.author: Louise Bogan

quotes.text: Dear God! how beauty varies in nature and art. In a woman the flesh must be like marble; in a statue the marble must be like flesh.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: The apathy of the people is enough to make every statue leap from its pedestal and hasten the resurrection of the dead.
quotes.author: William Lloyd Garrison

quotes.text: I have a wonderful make-up crew. They're the same people restoring the Statue of Liberty.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.text: The sculptor who deals with form seeks to imprison beauty in a marble statue that will withstand the ravages of time during millenniums; but a marble statue is cold and speaks to but a few of the most evolved who are able to infuse the statue with their own life.
quotes.author: Max Heindel

quotes.text: We're all just bags of bones and muscle and hormones; I'll never understand what makes our minds do the things we do. It's like that statue of the monkey holding a skull. We're trying to use a thing we don't understand to understand ourselves.
quotes.author: Meshell Ndegeocello

quotes.text: Living in New York City, I am reminded by the Statue of Liberty that the United States of America has always welcomed those yearning to breathe free and seek a better life.
quotes.author: Charles B. Rangel

quotes.text: The sculptor produces the beautiful statue by chipping away such parts of the marble block as are not needed - it is a process of elimination.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: You have to accept the fact that sometimes you are the pigeon, and sometimes you are the statue.
quotes.author: Claude Chabrol

quotes.text: Many of America's and New York's sons and daughters are around the world fighting for the freedoms that the Statue of Liberty stands for.
quotes.author: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.text: You would think with me living in Los Angeles I would go to the beach all the time, but we don't. It's the same as visiting the Statue of Liberty. If you don't live in N.Y.C., it's the first stop on your family vacation, but if you live there, you only go if you have relatives visiting from out of town!
quotes.author: Marissa Jaret Winokur

quotes.text: Every human being has within him an ideal man, just as every piece of marble contains in a rough state a statue as beautiful as the one that Praxiteles the Greek made of the god Apollo.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.text: There's a statue of Jimmy Stewart in the Hollywood Wax Museum, and the statue talks better than he does.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.text: The Marianne Vos Route goes through the seven villages of Aalburg, where I grew up, and celebrates my World and Olympic titles with a number of benches along the route, where you can stop and rest your legs. You'll see the white windmill in Meeuwen and, in Babylonienbroek, a statue of the silver bike I rode to celebrate my Olympic track win.
quotes.author: Marianne Vos

quotes.text: I recommend that the Statue of Liberty be supplemented by a Statue of Responsibility on the west coast.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.text: The more the marbles wastes, the more the statue grows.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.text: The relationship between critic and writer is similar to the one between the pigeon and the statue.
quotes.author: Ashwin Sanghi

quotes.text: I run from Horatio Street down just past Battery Park City and back. It's amazing to run and see the Statue of Liberty and the ferries coming in. People think if you're not near Central Park, there's nowhere to go, but there's a whole ecosystem happening down here.
quotes.author: Andy Cohen

quotes.text: The first time I saw America was from my perch on the mast of a Spanish naval ship, where I could spot the Statue of Liberty reaching proudly into the open, endless American sky.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.text: I've always had a strong feeling for the Statue of Liberty, because it became the statue of my personal liberty.
quotes.author: David Antin

quotes.text: I don't see any justification for the federal government owning land, other than the Statue of Liberty and maybe a few parks, maybe a few refuges. But to just own land to do nothing with it I think is a disservice to the Constitution.
quotes.author: Don Young

quotes.text: Many parts of the granite statues were found, the most important of which had features close to Ramses II. The statue needs some restoration and weighs between four and five tons.
quotes.author: Zahi Hawass

quotes.text: If you're writing a book that takes place in New York in the moment, you can't not write about 9-11; you can't not integrate it. My main character's view is the Statue of Liberty and the Trade Center. It doesn't have to take over, but it has to be acknowledged.
quotes.author: Richard Price

quotes.text: Society is one vast conspiracy for carving one into the kind of statue likes, and then placing it in the most convenient niche it has.
quotes.author: Randolph Bourne

quotes.text: Nobody ever built a statue to a committee.
quotes.author: Roger Stone

quotes.text: I grew up in New Jersey and never went up the Statue of Liberty.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.text: The crime problem in New York is getting really serious. The other day the Statue of Liberty had both hands up.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.text: I'm delighted. I don't know of anybody who had a statue built of them while they were living. It's a great feeling.
quotes.author: Al Lopez

quotes.text: A drawing is essentially a private work, related only to the artist's own needs; a 'finished' statue or canvas is essentially a public, presented work - related far more directly to the demands of communication.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.text: The word 'iconic' is used too frequently - an icon is a statue carved in wood. It was shocking at first, when I got that reference. It was a responsibility, and it's impossible to live up to - you're supposed to be dead, for one thing.
quotes.author: Debbie Harry

quotes.text: In judging of a beautiful statue, the aesthetic faculty is absolutely and completely gratified by the splendid curves of those marble lips that are dumb to our complaint, the noble modelling of those limbs that are powerless to help us.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: I launched Imperia at the Statue of Liberty because I wanted to use something symbolic. I like American society because it always wants to do something new and better.
quotes.author: Roustam Tariko

quotes.text: I'm not Hans Christian Anderson. Nobody's gonna make a statue in the park with a lot of scrambling kids climbing up me. I won't have it, okay?
quotes.author: Maurice Sendak

quotes.text: I have absolutely no regret about my vote against this war. The same questions remain. The cost in human lives, the cost to our budget, probably 100 billion. We could have probably brought down that statue for a lot less.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.text: As a memorial, I'd like a statue. Not of me, but a little modern statue, in marble or bronze, maybe of a bird, in a park where children could play and people going by could see it. On it, I'd just like it to say: 'Maeve Binchy, storyteller' and people could look at the name and remember that they'd seen it somewhere else.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.text: I always say if I'm not good at something it's just because I've not had time to focus on it... it's just uncrafted, like a slab of rock that contains the statue of David within it.
quotes.author: Michael Sheen

quotes.text: The craft Emmys are kind of the kids' table at Thanksgiving. You're not really invited to the big dance. It's still really, really exciting, and the statue still counts.
quotes.author: Hank Azaria

quotes.text: I base jumped off the Jesus statue in Rio de Janeiro.
quotes.author: Felix Baumgartner

quotes.text: I can only speak for myself, but when I was growing up in Memphis - and having the Martin Luther King holiday and the moment of pause on April 4th - he was just a statue to me. I wanted to make him a little bit more real to me as a human being.
quotes.author: Katori Hall

quotes.text: I love my kitchen. For Manhattan, I have a rather decent-size kitchen, and it has an opening that gives out to the dining room, which has a window with a view of the city and in the distance the Statue of Liberty.
quotes.author: Mireille Guiliano

quotes.text: The statue of Freedom has not been cast yet, the furnace is hot, we can all still burn our fingers.
quotes.author: Georg Buchner

quotes.text: When I first came to New York City, what I was thrilled about was not the Empire State Building, or the Statue of Liberty; it was the fireplugs in the street. These things that Jack Kirby had drawn. Or these cylindrical water towers on top of buildings that Steve Ditko's 'Spider-Man' fights used to happen in and around.
quotes.author: Dave Gibbons

quotes.text: I've named a couple things after Edgar Allan Poe: the cat, and my garden upstate, where I only planted black flowers and purple flowers - and there's a raven statue.
quotes.author: Hilarie Burton

quotes.text: I tried to go to Kosovo to establish a statue to commemorate those who died during the wars, and to discuss moving on, so we could move into a new era. But I was banned from there.
quotes.author: Ivica Dacic

quotes.text: Activating is about changing people's perceptions of overlooked or invisible spaces. A building can become an archetype, invisible, like for a New Yorker, for example, the Statue of Liberty. You look at it, and it disappears into the thousands of times you've already seen it.
quotes.author: Chris Jordan

quotes.text: Sometimes people damage paintings or sculpture because they love it. They throw their arms around a statue in a fit of hysterical passion and it falls over.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kostova

quotes.text: I have a bronze statue of myself, naked. I have these really big curls and water comes out of every curl. It's hot.
quotes.author: Macy Gray

quotes.text: Now there was no wonder in the Statue of Liberty illusion because he, Copperfield, attempted to do something so large that it stretched the credibility of the audience to the point where most people didn't believe any of it anymore.
quotes.author: Doug Henning

quotes.text: I would much rather have men ask why I have no statue than why I have one.
quotes.author: Marcus Porcius Cato

quotes.text: Did you see the statue topple? Bill Clinton got nostalgic seeing something that big in a beret go down.
quotes.author: Craig Kilborn

quotes.text: Up there with my awards, I have a great big statue of Groucho Marx, just to put everything in perspective.
quotes.author: John Lithgow

quotes.text: To have a statue of you up 100 years from now at the Superdome, I think that's amazing.
quotes.author: Steve Gleason

quotes.text: Christians well know that the much-decorated statue of the Church, as it now stands, is not of pure chiseled marble, but of clay, cemented together by blood and tears and hardened in the fires of hatred and persecution.
quotes.author: Virchand Gandhi

quotes.text: When they told me there would be a statue erected at Wrigley Field, I was happy with that. I know there will be a meeting place for a lot of people. There will be a conversation every day. They say now, 'I'll meet you at Ernie Banks' statue.' After Sept. 7, they'll say, 'I'll meet you by Billy Williams' statue.'
quotes.author: Billy Williams

quotes.text: When I got a telly we had no aerial, but I discovered that if I or one of the children stood by it you could get a picture. So I had to make a statue that could stand by the telly.
quotes.author: Beryl Bainbridge

quotes.text: I know it is a somewhat delicate matter to refuse a gift, but in this case the statue is so atrocious that every endeavour should be made to keep it out of the church.
quotes.author: Giles Gilbert Scott

quotes.text: The real sustains the same relation to the ideal that a stone does to a statue - or that paint does to a painting. Realism degrades and impoverishes.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.text: Many people first encounter Jesus during childhood when they are suddenly confronted by a horrifying statue of a man nailed to a cross, and this is often a most unfortunate and repulsive beginning.
quotes.author: Michael Leunig

quotes.text: I've got a statue of St. Francis in my front yard, and I'm not even a practicing Catholic.
quotes.author: Michael Keaton

quotes.text: Checking email every 45 seconds is not only compulsive, it's presumptuous. It suggests a belief that anyone who sends us a message needs us to read it immediately, even if the message is from SkyMall telling us our Bigfoot Garden Yeti statue has shipped.
quotes.author: Meghan Daum

quotes.text: If you walk into the front hallway of the CIA, you will see, on your left, a statue of William 'Wild Bill' Donovan. Bill Donovan was the person who created the OSS, the Office of Strategic Services, which was America's spy agency during World War II and then kind of morphed into what's now the CIA.
quotes.author: David Ignatius

quotes.text: In 2012, the city of Austin erected an eight-foot-tall bronze statue of Willie Nelson in the heart of the business district. Schoolchildren, churchgoers, tourists, slackers, conventioneers, tech geeks - everybody, it seems - now congregate around this ponytailed shrine to outlaw country.
quotes.author: Douglas Brinkley

quotes.text: I have a beautiful wooden Superman statue with a removable cape - I really love that piece.
quotes.author: Tim Daly

quotes.text: I've asked every grammar schoolteacher in the nation to have their students write on the meaning of the Statue of Liberty. Wouldn't it be wonderful if the winning kid got up to the microphone and, in front of the world, had to dig into a pocket to pull out a crumpled sheet of paper containing the words that would move us all?
quotes.author: David L. Wolper

quotes.text: 'Luncheon of the Boating Party,' owned by The Phillips Collection in Washington, D.C., has served Americans as a symbol of France and French culture, both of which I love, and is as evocative and triumphant an image as that other emissary of France, the Statue of Liberty.
quotes.author: Susan Vreeland

quotes.text: You may name a bronze statue 'Liberty,' or a painted figure in a city hall 'Commerce,' or a marble form in a temple 'Athene' or 'Venus;' but what is really there is only a representation of a single woman.
quotes.author: George Edward Woodberry

quotes.text: It's been an unbelievable thing for me to walk Bruin Walk and walk past Coach Wooden's statue, a guy that when I was in elementary school, it's Coach Wooden winning his final championship, his 10th in 12 years.
quotes.author: Steve Alford

quotes.text: I think watching Channing Tatum caress his Lego Oscar statue will be something I won't forget. Even if I try.
quotes.author: Nathan Sawaya

quotes.text: Kids can't build a marble statue at home. But I've had parents tell me that, after an exhibit, their kids immediately dug out their Lego kits and disappeared for three days.
quotes.author: Nathan Sawaya

quotes.text: The team behind 'The Lego Movie' approached me. They wanted to do something extra special for the Academy Award performance of best song nominee 'Everything is Awesome.' They had seen my earlier version of a Lego Oscar statue, and I was happy to take on the challenge.
quotes.author: Nathan Sawaya

quotes.text: Obviously, as you get a little older, you are not going to be quite as quick or quite as strong, and so I might be regarded by some as the underdog... There is actually a statue of Big Ben and I in Perth, Ont., and I was on a Canadian stamp once, and normally you have to be dead to do either of those things, and, well, here I am, still going.
quotes.author: Ian Millar

quotes.text: In my living room - it's probably going to be moved to my office soon because it freaks too many people out - I have a huge seven foot statue of 'Seven of Nine' of 'Star Trek Voyager.'
quotes.author: Matthew Moy

quotes.text: The French never allow a distinguished son of France to lack a statue.
quotes.author: E. V. Lucas

quotes.text: I have a statue of Superman. It's actually a big one... It's a collectible statue of Superman, which the DC guys very kindly gave to me. So that's a little prized possession of mine.
quotes.author: Matt Ryan

quotes.text: That's the thing about depression: A human being can survive almost anything, as long as she sees the end in sight. But depression is so insidious, and it compounds daily, that it's impossible to ever see the end. The fog is like a cage without a key.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.text: Truth is the torch that gleams through the fog without dispelling it.
quotes.author: Claude Adrien Helvetius

quotes.text: It's impossible to know what happens in the fog of war.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: All action takes place, so to speak, in a kind of twilight, which like a fog or moonlight, often tends to make things seem grotesque and larger than they really are.
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.text: Writing is like driving at night in the fog. You can only see as far as your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.text: My trumpeting sounds like a goose farting in the fog.
quotes.author: Alex O'Loughlin

quotes.text: I would wear a full-length cape if I could get away with it - I do love a good swirl in a fog.
quotes.author: Martin Freeman

quotes.text: Why be in music, why write songs, if you can't use them to explore life or an idealized vision of life? I believe a lot of our lives are spent asleep, and what I've been trying to do is hold on to those moments when a little spark cuts through the fog and nudges you.
quotes.author: Rufus Wainwright

quotes.text: Most of us live in a fog. It's like life is a movie we arrived to 20 minutes late. You know something important seems to be going on. But we can't figure out the story. We don't know what part we're supposed to play or what the plot is.
quotes.author: John Eldredge

quotes.text: I believe a lot of our lives are spent asleep, and what I've been trying to do is hold on to those moments when a little spark cuts through the fog and nudges you.
quotes.author: Rufus Wainwright

quotes.text: Much of the impotence of American churches is tied to a profound ignorance and apathy about justification. Our people live in a fog of guilt. Or just as bad, they think being a better person is all God requires.
quotes.author: Kevin DeYoung

quotes.text: History is moving the furniture around in the house of mankind just about everywhere but the U.S.A. Things have changed, except here, where people come and go through the rooms of state, and everything looks shabbier by the day, and lethargy eats away at the upholstery like an acid fog, and the walls reverberate with meaningless oratory.
quotes.author: James Howard Kunstler

quotes.text: Even as fog continues to lie in the valleys, so does ancient sin cling to the low places, the depressions in the world consciousness.
quotes.author: Dewitt Bodeen

quotes.text: In tragedy, it's hard to find a good resolution; it's not black and white: it's a big fog of gray.
quotes.author: Paul Dano

quotes.text: The purpose of writing is to inflate weak ideas, obscure pure reasoning, and inhibit clarity. With a little practice, writing can be an intimidating and impenetrable fog!
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: Technology is so much fun but we can drown in our technology. The fog of information can drive out knowledge.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.text: A low line of shore was visible at first on the right between the movement of the waves and fog, but when we came further it was lost sight of, and nothing could be seen but the mist curling in the rigging, and a small circle of foam.
quotes.author: John Millington Synge

quotes.text: It is not the clear-sighted who rule the world. Great achievements are accomplished in a blessed, warm fog.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.text: When I was 13, I began relaxing my hair, and that meant when I turned 18 it began to crack and fall off, and when I began anchoring, I had short, stubbly pieces of hair. And trying to report in San Francisco with fog meant my hair swelled.
quotes.author: Soledad O'Brien

quotes.text: Fog and smog should not be confused and are easily separated by color.
quotes.author: Chuck Jones

quotes.text: After a breakup, it takes a couple weeks for the fog to settle, but it's always a period of self-priority and growth. Life presents you with so many decisions. A lot of times, they're right in front of your face and they're really difficult, but we must make them.
quotes.author: Brittany Murphy

quotes.text: Most consequential choices involve shades of gray, and some fog is often useful in getting things done.
quotes.author: Timothy Geithner

quotes.text: But we have to pass the bill so you can find out what is in it, away from the fog of the controversy.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.text: Derive happiness in oneself from a good day's work, from illuminating the fog that surrounds us.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.text: Humans believe so many lies because we aren't aware. We ignore the truth or we just don't see the truth. When we are educated, we accumulate a lot of knowledge, and all that knowledge is just like a wall of fog that doesn't allow us to perceive the truth, what really is.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.text: The point is that life for me is not going to be the way it is for everyone else. I have a fog machine and movie lights in my bedroom.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.text: When I came to New York and I opened the window of the thirty-fifth-floor apartment, there's light pollution and fog, and I couldn't see my star. So I drew it on my wrist with a pen, but it kept washing away. Then I went to a tattoo parlor on Second Avenue and had it done.
quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

quotes.text: We went to a small lake, Bass Lake. It was beautiful. It was perfectly still when we got there in the morning. The fog was lifting off the water. It was just magical. And we did catch some fish, 13 fish.
quotes.author: Jennifer Granholm

quotes.text: I love eulogies. They are the most moving kind of speech because they attempt to pluck meaning from the fog, and on short order, when the emotions are still ragged and raw and susceptible to leaps.
quotes.author: Peggy Noonan

quotes.text: I was born in London, England during the great fog of 1952, but survived the coal-fueled air pollution with no ill effects and after less than a year in England was carried to Canada by my parents.
quotes.author: Jack W. Szostak

quotes.text: There is this strange fog of being a young man that I would refer to as soft time. Time does not go forward there. It's a series of doors that kind of wind back into one another, like a series of doors in the upper floor of a house. You revisit the same lessons over and over again, or you choose to ignore them.
quotes.author: Ryan Adams

quotes.text: Also, as I lay there thinking of my vision, I could see it all again and feel the meaning with a part of me like a strange power glowing in my body; but when the part of me that talks would try to make words for the meaning, it would be like fog and get away from me.
quotes.author: Black Elk

quotes.text: My office doubles as a karaoke den for the neighborhood. There are strobe lights and Rock Band plastic guitars, a disco ball and a fog machine and some other things. I have a really long work day, and you might find me doing karaoke by myself late at night.
quotes.author: Jeff Kinney

quotes.text: The atmosphere of libraries, lecture rooms and laboratories is dangerous to those who shut themselves up in them too long. It separates us from reality like a fog.
quotes.author: Alexis Carrel

quotes.text: People realised this is real pollution; it is not fog. Now everyone has to face the data and come out of their comfort zone.
quotes.author: Ma Jun

quotes.text: Redwoods flourish in fog, but they don't like salt air. They tend to appear in valleys that are just out of sight of the sea. In their relationship with the sea, redwoods are like cats that long to be stroked but are shy to the touch.
quotes.author: Richard Preston

quotes.text: Murk can be described as an enfeebled fog with a personality disorder; it is more troubled than ethereal, sulking moodily over our lives at the end of the day.
quotes.author: Michael Leunig

quotes.text: The thing that I like about Germany is that Germans are so much like us. It's not like going to some other countries, where the differences are overwhelming and you walk around in a fog. Germans are so similar to Americans.
quotes.author: Matt Damon

quotes.text: I don't remember 'Doctor Who' not being part of my life, and it became a part of growing up, along with The Beatles, National Health spectacles, and fog. And it runs deep. It's in my DNA.
quotes.author: Peter Capaldi

quotes.text: I do so much music that it's like a fog, and I can't even remember all of it.
quotes.author: Yelawolf

quotes.text: I was amazed at how easy it was for the Clinton Administration to basically cover what they did at Waco in the fog of lies and avoid any responsibility for it.
quotes.author: James Bovard

quotes.text: We always got a strong response but I think in this day in age there is less of a marijuana fog at concerts and more of people just more naturally exuberant - it seems to me.
quotes.author: James Young

quotes.text: There were times after my marriage ended where, you know, I really felt like I was at the bottom of a mountain, there was a great big, fog up there, and I'm never going to cross to the other side.
quotes.author: Lynn Redgrave

quotes.text: I'm one of those writers who can't talk about what they're working on. The entire four years I was writing 'House of Sand and Fog,' my wife never saw a word of it. I just have to keep it in the womb, and then everyone can have a crack at it.
quotes.author: Andre Dubus III

quotes.text: In TV, sometimes you get lost in the fog of the scene, and when you're working with such good actors, they can bring you into the scene.
quotes.author: Adriano Giannini

quotes.text: Congress has an obligation to clear the legal fog by passing my bill to require the federal government to obtain a warrant if it wants to conduct aerial surveillance.
quotes.author: Suzan DelBene

quotes.text: The American system of civilian control of the military recognizes that soldiers' attention must be fixed on winning battles and staying alive, and that the fog of war can sometimes obscure the rule of law.
quotes.author: Andrew Rosenthal

quotes.text: I spend most of my time in a room alone where eight hours go by, and I have no sense of time. I work seven days a week, and I live in this sort of vague subconscious fog a lot.
quotes.author: Dan Gilroy

quotes.text: The spirit of L.A. is untamed wilderness. It's earthquakes and wildfires and oceans and mountain lions and fog. There's great physical beauty.
quotes.author: Dan Gilroy

quotes.text: Skeptical of strangers, lobstermen are keepers of secrets, working in the howling wind and hot sun, the icy snows, and bewildering fog. When I was growing up, the lore was that they had the right to shoot anyone who messed with their traps.
quotes.author: Isabel Gillies

quotes.text: Though they don't always have to be set in fog, weather is incredibly important in ghost stories. As is suspense: you've got to turn the screw very, very slowly.
quotes.author: Susan Hill

quotes.text: I was really surprised at the success of 'House of Sand and Fog,' because it is so awfully dark. Believe it or not, when writing it, I never had the word 'tragedy' in my head - I wasn't trying to write a dark book at all.
quotes.author: Andre Dubus III

quotes.text: It was magical growing up in New Jersey. My sister and I would go nuts in the basement and do full theater productions. We used a humidifier as a fog machine. It was over the top.
quotes.author: Brandon Uranowitz

quotes.text: That's the thing about depression: A human being can survive almost anything, as long as she sees the end in sight. But depression is so insidious, and it compounds daily, that it's impossible to ever see the end. The fog is like a cage without a key.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.text: Truth is the torch that gleams through the fog without dispelling it.
quotes.author: Claude Adrien Helvetius

quotes.text: It's impossible to know what happens in the fog of war.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: All action takes place, so to speak, in a kind of twilight, which like a fog or moonlight, often tends to make things seem grotesque and larger than they really are.
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.text: Writing is like driving at night in the fog. You can only see as far as your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.text: My trumpeting sounds like a goose farting in the fog.
quotes.author: Alex O'Loughlin

quotes.text: I would wear a full-length cape if I could get away with it - I do love a good swirl in a fog.
quotes.author: Martin Freeman

quotes.text: Why be in music, why write songs, if you can't use them to explore life or an idealized vision of life? I believe a lot of our lives are spent asleep, and what I've been trying to do is hold on to those moments when a little spark cuts through the fog and nudges you.
quotes.author: Rufus Wainwright

quotes.text: Most of us live in a fog. It's like life is a movie we arrived to 20 minutes late. You know something important seems to be going on. But we can't figure out the story. We don't know what part we're supposed to play or what the plot is.
quotes.author: John Eldredge

quotes.text: I believe a lot of our lives are spent asleep, and what I've been trying to do is hold on to those moments when a little spark cuts through the fog and nudges you.
quotes.author: Rufus Wainwright

quotes.text: Much of the impotence of American churches is tied to a profound ignorance and apathy about justification. Our people live in a fog of guilt. Or just as bad, they think being a better person is all God requires.
quotes.author: Kevin DeYoung

quotes.text: History is moving the furniture around in the house of mankind just about everywhere but the U.S.A. Things have changed, except here, where people come and go through the rooms of state, and everything looks shabbier by the day, and lethargy eats away at the upholstery like an acid fog, and the walls reverberate with meaningless oratory.
quotes.author: James Howard Kunstler

quotes.text: Even as fog continues to lie in the valleys, so does ancient sin cling to the low places, the depressions in the world consciousness.
quotes.author: Dewitt Bodeen

quotes.text: In tragedy, it's hard to find a good resolution; it's not black and white: it's a big fog of gray.
quotes.author: Paul Dano

quotes.text: The purpose of writing is to inflate weak ideas, obscure pure reasoning, and inhibit clarity. With a little practice, writing can be an intimidating and impenetrable fog!
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: Technology is so much fun but we can drown in our technology. The fog of information can drive out knowledge.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.text: A low line of shore was visible at first on the right between the movement of the waves and fog, but when we came further it was lost sight of, and nothing could be seen but the mist curling in the rigging, and a small circle of foam.
quotes.author: John Millington Synge

quotes.text: It is not the clear-sighted who rule the world. Great achievements are accomplished in a blessed, warm fog.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.text: When I was 13, I began relaxing my hair, and that meant when I turned 18 it began to crack and fall off, and when I began anchoring, I had short, stubbly pieces of hair. And trying to report in San Francisco with fog meant my hair swelled.
quotes.author: Soledad O'Brien

quotes.text: Fog and smog should not be confused and are easily separated by color.
quotes.author: Chuck Jones

quotes.text: I often think that the night is more alive and more richly colored than the day.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.text: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
quotes.author: Bernard Williams

quotes.text: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.text: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: They who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: My theory on life is that life is beautiful. Life doesn't change. You have a day, and a night, and a month, and a year. We people change - we can be miserable or we can be happy. It's what you make of your life.
quotes.author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

quotes.text: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting.
quotes.author: e. e. cummings

quotes.text: Good night, good night! Parting is such sweet sorrow, that I shall say good night till it be morrow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: There's a tremendous difference between alone and lonely. You could be lonely in a group of people. I like being alone. I like eating by myself. I go home at night and just watch a movie or hang out with my dog. I have to exert myself and really say, oh God, I've got to see my friends 'cause I'm too content being by myself.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: Prayer should be the key of the day and the lock of the night.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.text: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: A good wife is one who serves her husband in the morning like a mother does, loves him in the day like a sister does and pleases him like a prostitute in the night.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: Sometimes, things may not go your way, but the effort should be there every single night.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: There is a part of me that will forever want to be walking under autumn leaves, carrying a briefcase containing the works of Shakespeare and Yeats and a portable chess set. I will pass an old tree under which once on a summer night I lay on the grass with a fragrant young woman and we quoted e.e. cummings back and forth.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.text: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: As a kid, there are some things you looked forward to. You looked forward to Charlie Brown during Halloween and you looked forward to Monday Night Football.
quotes.author: Nick Ferguson

quotes.text: Summer ends, and Autumn comes, and he who would have it otherwise would have high tide always and a full moon every night.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.text: All men dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds, wake in the day to find that it was vanity: but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act on their dreams with open eyes, to make them possible.
quotes.author: T. E. Lawrence

quotes.text: I have to be alone very often. I'd be quite happy if I spent from Saturday night until Monday morning alone in my apartment. That's how I refuel.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: One night, I lay awake for hours, just terrified. When the dawn finally came up - the comfortable blue sky, the familiar world returning - I could think of no other way to express my relief than through poetry. I made a decision there and then that it was what I wanted to do. Every time I pulled a wishbone, it was what I asked for.
quotes.author: Alice Oswald

quotes.text: Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.text: How did it get so late so soon? Its night before its afternoon. December is here before its June. My goodness how the time has flewn. How did it get so late so soon?
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: My first injury ever was a broken toe, and my mother made me run laps around the mat for the rest of the night. She said she wanted me to know that even if I was hurt, I was still fine.
quotes.author: Ronda Rousey

quotes.text: The soles of Neil Armstrong's boots on the moon made permanent impressions on our souls and in our national psyche. Ann and I watched those steps together on her parent's sofa. Like all Americans we went to bed that night knowing we lived in the greatest country in the history of the world. God bless Neil Armstrong.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: I pray every night, sometimes long prayers about a lot of things and a lot of people, but I don't talk about it or brag about it because that's between God and me, and I'm no better than anybody else in God's sight.
quotes.author: Peyton Manning

quotes.text: If capital and labor ever do get together it's good night for the rest of us.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.text: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.text: You cannot look up at the night sky on the Planet Earth and not wonder what it's like to be up there amongst the stars. And I always look up at the moon and see it as the single most romantic place within the cosmos.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.text: Good night, and good luck.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.text: What is faithfulness, anyway? Can you be unfaithful to your own feelings and faithful to someone else? Is it faithful to lie in bed night after night with someone you love but no longer desire while ardently dreaming of someone else?
quotes.author: Mary Gaitskill

quotes.text: There's a very real possibility in this industry of going out and leading your life and then going home and being a voyeur of your own life. You can literally go watch yourself - where you went last night, what you did, what the things that people presuppose about you. It's kind of crazy.
quotes.author: Ryan Reynolds

quotes.text: The dawn is not distant, nor is the night starless; love is eternal.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: When I am traveling in a carriage, or walking after a good meal, or during the night when I cannot sleep; it is on such occasions that ideas flow best and most abundantly.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.text: I worked night and day for twelve years to prevent the war, but I could not. The North was mad and blind, would not let us govern ourselves, and so the war came.
quotes.author: Jefferson Davis

quotes.text: We must never forget why we have, and why we need our military. Our armed forces exist solely to ensure our nation is safe, so that each and every one of us can sleep soundly at night, knowing we have 'guardians at the gate.'
quotes.author: Allen West

quotes.text: Philosophically, the universe has really never made things in ones. The Earth is special and everything else is different? No, we've got seven other planets. The sun? No, the sun is one of those dots in the night sky. The Milky Way? No, it's one of a hundred billion galaxies. And the universe - maybe it's countless other universes.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: Yesterday ended last night. Today is a brand-new day.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Some people go to bed at night thinking, 'That was a good day.' I am one of those who worries and asks, 'How did I screw up today?'
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.text: Our obsession with speed, with cramming more and more into every minute, means that we race through life instead of actually living it. Our health, diet and relationships suffer. We make mistakes at work. We struggle to relax, to enjoy the moment, even to get a decent night's sleep.
quotes.author: Carl Honore

quotes.text: I never manage to get to bed early on Sunday night but this doesn't matter, as I don't know one level of exhaustion from another.
quotes.author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

quotes.text: I only ever play Vegas one night at a time. It's a hideous, gaudy place; it may not be the end of the world per se, but you can certainly see it from there.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.text: I think if you give in and accept society's stereotypes, then you start thinking, 'I cannot dance till late at night because I'm 70.'
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: I carried my Oscar to bed with me. My first and only three-way happened that night.
quotes.author: Halle Berry

quotes.text: There's a line I have that our family was designed more for public than for private. But there are definitely some things that are only mine. I am someone who dreams at night, and you don't know what I'm dreaming.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.text: In high school, my prom date fooled around with another guy - on prom night!
quotes.author: Matthew Perry

quotes.text: Every woman needs a girls' night out.
quotes.author: Genesis Rodriguez

quotes.text: I have patches of insomnia, and I'm fascinated by the otherness of the world at night. The stillness. Daytime preoccupations fall away, standards change, thoughts change. It's a canvas for reinvention, I think.
quotes.author: Morag Joss

quotes.text: My growing up years, we watched 'Happy Days,' every night. I don't know what was reruns and what was new.
quotes.author: Sarah Silverman

quotes.text: I never thought I'd be making a living off of acting - it's still kind of a shock for my family and friends to see my face on TV every Wednesday night.
quotes.author: Matthew Gray Gubler

quotes.text: Metaphorically speaking, of course, if I put a problem behind my pillow and fall asleep, very often because my brain went to sleep with that idea or the problem alive, very often in the middle of the night I wake up, and I wake up with a solution or with a direction of solution.
quotes.author: Philippe Petit

quotes.text: I want to spend the night alone in a haunted mansion. I wouldn't say I'm sceptical because that word implies the truth is out there when there is no truth out there.
quotes.author: Aidan Turner

quotes.text: I actually think the whole concept of retirement is a bit stupid, so yes, I do want to do something else. There is this strange thing that just because chronologically on a Friday night you have reached a certain age... with all that experience, how can it be that on a Monday morning, you are useless?
quotes.author: Stuart Rose

quotes.text: I'm a lucky guy and I'm happy to be with the Yankees. And I want to thank everyone for making this night necessary.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.text: When I was a teenager, my dad used to call me 'Hollywood' because I wore sunglasses all the time, even at night. Cue song.
quotes.author: Michael Weatherly

quotes.text: Poetry is not an expression of the party line. It's that time of night, lying in bed, thinking what you really think, making the private world public, that's what the poet does.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.text: Once upon a perfect night, unclouded and still, there came the face of a pale and beautiful lady. The tresses of her hair reached out to make the constellations, and the dewy vapours of her gown fell soft upon the land.
quotes.author: Kit Williams

quotes.text: I knew that my staying up would not change the election result if I were defeated, while if elected I had a hard day ahead of me. So I thought a night's rest was best in any event.
quotes.author: Benjamin Harrison

quotes.text: And if you don't believe the sun will rise, stand alone and greet the coming night in the last remaining light.
quotes.author: Chris Cornell

quotes.text: Night, the beloved. Night, when words fade and things come alive. When the destructive analysis of day is done, and all that is truly important becomes whole and sound again. When man reassembles his fragmentary self and grows with the calm of a tree.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.text: I flew into a small airport surrounded by cornfields and pastures, ready to carry out the two commands my father had written out for me the night before I left Calcutta: Spend two years studying creative writing at the Iowa Writers' Workshop, then come back home and marry the bridegroom he selected for me from our caste and class.
quotes.author: Bharati Mukherjee

quotes.text: It's such a rare and rewarding thing to be in control of space and time for two hours a night, to go through a journey and take the audience along. There's nothing quite like it.
quotes.author: Jefferson Mays

quotes.text: We should every night call ourselves to an account: what infirmity have I mastered today? what passions opposed? what temptation resisted? what virtue acquired? Our vices will abate of themselves if they be brought every day to the shrift.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.text: I am not one to turn down macaroni and cheese, even late at night. I love Italian food. I love pasta... A refrigerator full of water and Gatorade? Honey, that's just not gonna happen.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: I went to a fight the other night, and a hockey game broke out.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: Medicine is my lawful wife and literature my mistress; when I get tired of one, I spend the night with the other.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.text: For me, healthy eating and exercising is something I work on constantly. I'm not the most disciplined dieter. I try to eat a lot of fruit and vegetables but sometimes late at night I tend to have fast-food meals - and that's where I get myself into trouble! So I'm not in the best shape I could be, but I'm still healthy and comfy.
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.text: If people sat outside and looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: The Beliebers have done some pretty crazy stuff. Last week, the night before I was due to do a show in Germany, four girls went into a dumpster so they could sneak into the building. They climbed in and hid. When the guys working on the truck started getting the garbage they found them straight away. It was crazy.
quotes.author: Justin Bieber

quotes.text: I often eat Skippy's Super Chunk peanut butter out of the jar with a spoon. I don't shamefully sneak it in the dark of night when everyone is in bed. I just twist that cap off and go to town right out in the open.
quotes.author: Willie Geist

quotes.text: The Detroit String Quartet played Brahms last night. Brahms lost.
quotes.author: Bennett Cerf

quotes.text: Depending upon my activities, I sleep between five and ten hours every night. I sleep in an extra-wide single bed, and I use only one heavy down comforter over me, summer or winter. I have never been able to wear pajamas or creepy nightgowns; they disturb my sleep.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: We agreed to do it when I was drunk at his house one night, then on the day I had to have four large brandies - they didn't touch the sides at all. People just got on with it though. It didn't gather a crowd!
quotes.author: Daniel Craig

quotes.text: I like to wake up late, around 11 A.M., especially if I have been out the night before. Then I go to brunch with either my friends or my girlfriend. I then like to just chill out: read the papers, read some scripts and then take it very easy. If it's sunny, I go for a walk with my dog, Niles, in the countryside.
quotes.author: Douglas Booth

quotes.text: It is easy to go down into Hell; night and day, the gates of dark Death stand wide; but to climb back again, to retrace one's steps to the upper air - there's the rub, the task.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.text: Writing is like driving at night in the fog. You can only see as far as your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.text: That smell of freshly cut grass makes me think of Friday night football in high school. The smell of popcorn and cigar smoke reminds me of the stadium. The cutting of the grass reminds me of the August practice.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.text: I had a birthday one night on a farm we were shooting on. I walked into the tent, and there were 150 people waiting for me, all wearing masks of my face.
quotes.author: Stephen Hopkins

quotes.text: A clear cold morning with high wind: we caught in a trap a large gray wolf, and last night obtained in the same way a fox who had for some time infested the neighbourhood of the fort.
quotes.author: Meriwether Lewis

quotes.text: Ali's got a left, Ali's got a right - when he knocks you down, you'll sleep for the night; and when you lie on the floor and the ref counts to ten, hope and pray that you never meet me again.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Everyone has highs and lows that they have to learn from, but every morning I start off with a good head on my shoulders, saying to myself, 'It's going to be a good day!'.
quotes.author: Lindsay Lohan

quotes.text: Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Every day I feel is a blessing from God. And I consider it a new beginning. Yeah, everything is beautiful.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.text: Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend - or a meaningful day.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
quotes.author: Bernard Williams

quotes.text: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestley

quotes.text: Thank God every morning when you get up that you have something to do that day, which must be done, whether you like it or not.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.text: Be pleasant until ten o'clock in the morning and the rest of the day will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: If it's your job to eat a frog, it's best to do it first thing in the morning. And If it's your job to eat two frogs, it's best to eat the biggest one first.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The sun is new each day.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: I get up every morning and it's going to be a great day. You never know when it's going to be over so I refuse to have a bad day.
quotes.author: Paul Henderson

quotes.text: Love. Fall in love and stay in love. Write only what you love, and love what you write. The key word is love. You have to get up in the morning and write something you love, something to live for.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.text: God's mercy is fresh and new every morning.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: Early morning cheerfulness can be extremely obnoxious.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.text: He, who every morning plans the transactions of the day, and follows that plan, carries a thread that will guide him through a labyrinth of the most busy life.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: The light which puts out our eyes is darkness to us. Only that day dawns to which we are awake. There is more day to dawn. The sun is but a morning star.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: It's always such a joy that you wake up in the morning and there's work to do.
quotes.author: Jerome Lawrence

quotes.text: Nothing is more beautiful than the loveliness of the woods before sunrise.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.text: This morning when I put on my underwear I could hear the fruit-of-the-loom guys laughing at me.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: I wake up some mornings and sit and have my coffee and look out at my beautiful garden, and I go, 'Remember how good this is. Because you can lose it.'
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.text: Morning comes whether you set the alarm or not.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.text: When I wake up in the morning, I feel just like any other insecure 24-year-old girl.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: To simply wake up every morning a better person than when I went to bed.
quotes.author: Sidney Poitier

quotes.text: I never knew a man come to greatness or eminence who lay abed late in the morning.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: If some great catastrophe is not announced every morning, we feel a certain void. Nothing in the paper today, we sigh.
quotes.author: Lord Acton

quotes.text: We could hardly wait to get up in the morning.
quotes.author: Wilbur Wright

quotes.text: I'm a very early riser, and I don't like to miss that beautiful early morning light.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.text: The man with the best job in the country is the vice-president. All he has to do is get up every morning and say, 'How is the president?'
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: I never really look for anything. What God throws my way comes. I wake up in the morning and whichever way God turns my feet, I go.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.text: I had a monumental idea this morning, but I didn't like it.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.text: The person who doesn't scatter the morning dew will not comb gray hairs.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: I, of course, meditate for two hours every morning. It's part of my schedule; I wake up at 4 a.m. every day and I love it.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.text: Some mornings, it's just not worth chewing through the leather straps.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.text: First thing every morning before you arise say out loud, 'I believe,' three times.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: I see myself at 7:30 in the morning and it's not too pretty.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.text: In the morning a man walks with his whole body; in the evening, only with his legs.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: We sleep, but the loom of life never stops, and the pattern which was weaving when the sun went down is weaving when it comes up in the morning.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: Every morning I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I'm not there, I go to work.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.text: If you're changing the world, you're working on important things. You're excited to get up in the morning.
quotes.author: Larry Page

quotes.text: Cut your morning devotions into your personal grooming. You would not go out to work with a dirty face. Why start the day with the face of your soul unwashed?
quotes.author: Robert A. Cook

quotes.text: When I woke up this morning my girlfriend asked me, 'Did you sleep good?' I said 'No, I made a few mistakes.'
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: A good idea will keep you awake during the morning, but a great idea will keep you awake during the night.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.text: Each morning when I awake, I experience again a supreme pleasure - that of being Salvador Dali.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.text: You cry and you scream and you stomp your feet and you shout. You say, 'You know what? I'm giving up, I don't care.' And then you go to bed and you wake up and it's a brand new day, and you pick yourself back up again.
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.text: I remind myself every morning: Nothing I say this day will teach me anything. So if I'm going to learn, I must do it by listening.
quotes.author: Larry King

quotes.text: Good morning is a contradiction of terms.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.text: Each day is a little life: every waking and rising a little birth, every fresh morning a little youth, every going to rest and sleep a little death.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: I think that when you get dressed in the morning, sometimes you're really making a decision about your behavior for the day. Like if you put on flipflops, you're saying: 'Hope I don't get chased today.' 'Be nice to people in sneakers.'
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: Most of the time I spend when I get up in the morning is trying to figure out what is going to happen.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.text: Each morning sees some task begun, each evening sees it close; Something attempted, something done, has earned a night's repose.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: Manners is the key thing. Say, for instance, when you're growing up, you're walking down the street, you've got to tell everybody good morning. Everybody. You can't pass one person.
quotes.author: Usain Bolt

quotes.text: I miss Saturday morning, rolling out of bed, not shaving, getting into my car with my girls, driving to the supermarket, squeezing the fruit, getting my car washed, taking walks.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: What inspires you, what excites you when you wake up in the morning?
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.text: If you're bored with life - you don't get up every morning with a burning desire to do things - you don't have enough goals.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz
