quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.text: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: No matter what you're going through, there's a light at the end of the tunnel and it may seem hard to get to it but you can do it and just keep working towards it and you'll find the positive side of things.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.text: A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
quotes.author: Allan Bloom

quotes.text: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.text: What light is to the eyes - what air is to the lungs - what love is to the heart, liberty is to the soul of man.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.text: In order for the light to shine so brightly, the darkness must be present.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: At times our own light goes out and is rekindled by a spark from another person. Each of us has cause to think with deep gratitude of those who have lighted the flame within us.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: Just as treasures are uncovered from the earth, so virtue appears from good deeds, and wisdom appears from a pure and peaceful mind. To walk safely through the maze of human life, one needs the light of wisdom and the guidance of virtue.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Come forth into the light of things, let nature be your teacher.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.text: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.text: When you can't make them see the light, make them feel the heat.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: Deep in their roots, all flowers keep the light.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.text: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: It is better to light a candle than curse the darkness.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.text: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Light is meaningful only in relation to darkness, and truth presupposes error. It is these mingled opposites which people our life, which make it pungent, intoxicating. We only exist in terms of this conflict, in the zone where black and white clash.
quotes.author: Louis Aragon

quotes.text: When you look at the light bulb above you, you remember Thomas Alva Edison. When the telephone bell rings, you remember Alexander Graham Bell. Marie Curie was the first woman to win the Nobel Prize. When you see the blue sky, you think of Sir C.V. Raman.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Every man must decide whether he will walk in the light of creative altruism or in the darkness of destructive selfishness.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: The art of art, the glory of expression and the sunshine of the light of letters, is simplicity.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: Words which do not give the light of Christ increase the darkness.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: We are told to let our light shine, and if it does, we won't need to tell anybody it does. Lighthouses don't fire cannons to call attention to their shining - they just shine.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.text: I am not bound to win, but I am bound to be true. I am not bound to succeed, but I am bound to live by the light that I have. I must stand with anybody that stands right, and stand with him while he is right, and part with him when he goes wrong.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Light tomorrow with today!
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.text: On one hand, we know that everything happens for a reason, and there are no mistakes or coincidences. On the other hand, we learn that we can never give up, knowing that with the right tools and energy, we can reverse any decree or karma. So, which is it? Let the Light decide, or never give up? The answer is: both.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.text: The sun is gone, but I have a light.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.text: When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
quotes.author: Tecumseh

quotes.text: Christmas is joy, religious joy, an inner joy of light and peace.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: Electrical science has revealed to us the true nature of light, has provided us with innumerable appliances and instruments of precision, and has thereby vastly added to the exactness of our knowledge.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: It is not light that we need, but fire; it is not the gentle shower, but thunder. We need the storm, the whirlwind, and the earthquake.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.text: Being stylish is about enjoying your life and expressing yourself and your inner light.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.text: What makes photography a strange invention is that its primary raw materials are light and time.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.text: Humans have a light side and a dark side, and it's up to us to choose which way we're going to live our lives. Even if you start out on the dark side, it doesn't mean you have to continue your journey that way. You always have time to turn it around.
quotes.author: Taraji P. Henson

quotes.text: Every moment of light and dark is a miracle.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: We are a nation of communities... a brilliant diversity spread like stars, like a thousand points of light in a broad and peaceful sky.
quotes.author: George H. W. Bush

quotes.text: Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.text: So the darkness shall be the light, and the stillness the dancing.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: The light which puts out our eyes is darkness to us. Only that day dawns to which we are awake. There is more day to dawn. The sun is but a morning star.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Worship is a way of seeing the world in the light of God.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.text: To light a candle is to cast a shadow.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.text: Following the light of the sun, we left the Old World.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.text: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: Find beauty not only in the thing itself but in the pattern of the shadows, the light and dark which that thing provides.
quotes.author: Junichiro Tanizaki

quotes.text: When all the world appears to be in a tumult, and nature itself is feeling the assault of climate change, the seasons retain their essential rhythm. Yes, fall gives us a premonition of winter, but then, winter, will be forced to relent, once again, to the new beginnings of soft greens, longer light, and the sweet air of spring.
quotes.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quotes.text: When I was a child I thought I saw an angel. It had wings and kinda looked like my sister. I opened the door so some light could come into the room, and it sort of faded away. My mother said it was probably my Guardian Angel.
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.text: I really just want to be warm yellow light that pours over everyone I love.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.text: A blessing is a circle of light drawn around a person to protect, heal and strengthen.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.text: Music is the arithmetic of sounds as optics is the geometry of light.
quotes.author: Claude Debussy

quotes.text: In the flush of love's light, we dare be brave. And suddenly we see that love costs all we are, and will ever be. Yet it is only love which sets us free.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Sometimes corruption is slowed by shedding light into what was previously shadowed.
quotes.author: Paul Wolfowitz

quotes.text: Many hands make light work.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.text: When you make the finding yourself - even if you're the last person on Earth to see the light - you'll never forget it.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: There is a single light of science, and to brighten it anywhere is to brighten it everywhere.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: The moment we begin to fear the opinions of others and hesitate to tell the truth that is in us, and from motives of policy are silent when we should speak, the divine floods of light and life no longer flow into our souls.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.text: Wonder knows that while you cannot look at the light, you cannot look at anything else without it. It is not exhausted by childhood, but finds its key there. It is a journey like a walk through the woods over the usual obstacles and around the common distractions while the voice of direction leads, saying, 'This is the way, walk ye in it.'
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.text: Light in Nature creates the movement of colors.
quotes.author: Robert Delaunay

quotes.text: We writers are shy, nocturnal creatures. Push us into the light and the light blinds us.
quotes.author: John Banville

quotes.text: Resistance to revelation, resistance to becoming conscious of all that dwells within us - high and low, light and dark - is the anti-change factor. It is also the mainspring of all our psychological fears.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.text: There are a lot of things that frustrate me. I get frustrated when I have to wait at a red light.
quotes.author: Kevin Garnett

quotes.text: There is one simple Divinity found in all things, one fecund Nature, preserving mother of the universe insofar as she diversely communicates herself, casts her light into diverse subjects, and assumes various names.
quotes.author: Giordano Bruno

quotes.text: We are each one on a road going toward home, but we're not trying to get there for Christmas. We're trying to get there for eternity. We want to arrive home safely to our loving Father in Heaven. He wants us to make it safely there, so He has sent a guiding light for us to follow: a Savior, the Lord Jesus Christ, the perfect example.
quotes.author: Margaret D. Nadauld

quotes.text: Put it before them briefly so they will read it, clearly so they will appreciate it, picturesquely so they will remember it and, above all, accurately so they will be guided by its light.
quotes.author: Joseph Pulitzer

quotes.text: I like Dolce & Gabbana's fragrance Light Blue - it's my everyday perfume.
quotes.author: Natasha Poly

quotes.text: A light wind swept over the corn, and all nature laughed in the sunshine.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.text: You can drive an SUV, but there's a balance. If you do that, maybe use energy-efficient light bulbs at home or just be conscious of switching off lights. If you can afford to drive an SUV, maybe you can afford to make a donation to a wind farm or plant some trees. It's all about balance.
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.text: As we become purer channels for God's light, we develop an appetite for the sweetness that is possible in this world. A miracle worker is not geared toward fighting the world that is, but toward creating the world that could be.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: Revolutionaries who come to power by force of arms usually have great crimes in their background. Leaders who survive campaigns by great powers to destroy them do not survive because they observe the niceties of law. Subversives who shape world events by covert action and violence work in shadows and detest the light of day.
quotes.author: Stephen Kinzer

quotes.text: Just as our eyes need light in order to see, our minds need ideas in order to conceive.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: And if you don't believe the sun will rise, stand alone and greet the coming night in the last remaining light.
quotes.author: Chris Cornell

quotes.text: I keep dreaming of a future, a future with a long and healthy life, not lived in the shadow of cancer but in the light.
quotes.author: Patrick Swayze

quotes.text: Death is pitch-dark, but colors are light. To be a painter, one must work with rays of light.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.text: For light I go directly to the Source of light, not to any of the reflections.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.text: Impressionism; it is the birth of Light in painting.
quotes.author: Robert Delaunay

quotes.text: Literature is my Utopia. Here I am not disenfranchised. No barrier of the senses shuts me out from the sweet, gracious discourses of my book friends. They talk to me without embarrassment or awkwardness.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The greatest obstacle to international understanding is the barrier of language.
quotes.author: Christopher Dawson

quotes.text: The greatest barrier to someone achieving their potential is their denial of it.
quotes.author: Simon Travaglia

quotes.text: The biggest barrier to starting a company isn't ideas, funding or experience. It's excuses.
quotes.author: Sarah Lacy

quotes.text: Yoga is a method for restraining the natural turbulence of thoughts, which otherwise impartially prevent all men, of all lands, from glimpsing their true nature of Spirit. Yoga cannot know a barrier of East and West any more than does the healing and equitable light of the sun.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.text: As you become more successful, the gender barrier disappears. The credibility challenges you have during your growing up years starts disappearing when you start demonstrating success.
quotes.author: Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw

quotes.text: There is no failure except in no longer trying. There is no defeat except from within, no really insurmountable barrier save our own inherent weakness of purpose.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.text: If you have a strong opponent, a competition is stimulating. I am generally most open to ideas when I have had a bad result. In chess, too, players specialise. This specialty then becomes an entry barrier.
quotes.author: Viswanathan Anand

quotes.text: Great companies that build an enduring brand have an emotional relationship with customers that has no barrier. And that emotional relationship is on the most important characteristic, which is trust.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: I've always loved to prove people wrong. I want to be able to cross color lines, because in music, there really is no barrier.
quotes.author: Pink

quotes.text: Human beliefs, like all other natural growths, elude the barrier of systems.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.text: Problems do not go away. They must be worked through or else they remain, forever a barrier to the growth and development of the spirit.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.text: The world is given to me only once, not one existing and one perceived. Subject and object are only one. The barrier between them cannot be said to have broken down as a result of recent experience in the physical sciences, for this barrier does not exist.
quotes.author: Erwin Schrodinger

quotes.text: I think YouTube has destroyed the genre barrier. People can be into Justin Bieber and Eminem at the same time. It's a good thing.
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.text: When I look at China's environmental problems, the real barrier is not lack of technology or money. It's lack of motivation.
quotes.author: Ma Jun

quotes.text: Age is no barrier. It's a limitation you put on your mind.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.text: When I started running, the pain barrier was very familiar to me, and I had no problem pushing beyond the pain. When for your whole life, every single workout, you are programmed to push beyond belief, it's really hard to just turn that off and kind of just be a social competitor.
quotes.author: Summer Sanders

quotes.text: We are of the opinion that an important and irreversible process is taking place among the white population. Just as with the blacks, the whites, too, are currently overcoming a psychological barrier.
quotes.author: Joe Slovo

quotes.text: Quit thinking that you must halt before the barrier of inner negativity. You need not. You can crash through... whatever we see a negative state, that is where we can destroy it.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.text: As soon as you start feeling like you can't trust the person and you need to check his phone or have his Facebook password or look through his messages - as soon as that trust barrier is broken - it's hard to keep a relationship going after that.
quotes.author: Austin Butler

quotes.text: My parents shared not only an improbable love, they shared an abiding faith in the possibilities of this nation. They would give me an African name, Barack, or blessed, believing that in a tolerant America your name is no barrier to success.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Style offers concrete rules you can follow. You can use it as a resource rather than a barrier to feeling good about yourself.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.text: The biggest barrier to dealing with climate change is us: our own attachment to habits that are hard to shift, and our great ability to park or ignore uncomfortable choices.
quotes.author: Geoff Mulgan

quotes.text: The Berlin Wall wasn't the only barrier to fall after the collapse of the Soviet Union and the end of the Cold War. Traditional barriers to the flow of money, trade, people and ideas also fell.
quotes.author: Fareed Zakaria

quotes.text: I think the Sixties in some ways is a barrier to young people today. They think of it, you know, what we're doing is not that. But it's partly the myth of the Sixties. It always felt embattled and small. It always, almost always, was a small group of people relative to the opposition around.
quotes.author: Bernadine Dohrn

quotes.text: As a vulnerability researcher, the greatest barrier I see is our low tolerance for vulnerability. We're almost afraid to be happy. We feel like it's inviting disaster.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.text: If you have a recital to do, you have to memorize the songs. I never use music when I do recitals. It produces an instant barrier, both for yourself and the audience.
quotes.author: Bryn Terfel

quotes.text: We do not want to live in a theocracy. We should maintain that barrier and government has no business telling someone what they ought to believe or how they should conduct their private lives.
quotes.author: Robert Reich

quotes.text: Big-government economics breeds crony capitalism. It's corrupt, anything but neutral, and a barrier to broad participation in prosperity.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.text: I think, 'How could anybody mock a good pop song?' It is timeless; it transcends barriers; it breaks down every single type of social barrier that you can possibly have. It can deal with the most difficult subjects, even if it abstracts the subject matter.
quotes.author: Mika

quotes.text: I hate to toot my own horn but I just feel that I know people and I know fans and I don't feel there is that Angelina Jolie/Brad Pitt barrier with me. I've always felt from everyone I talk to that the fans feel like I'm tangible and they can talk to me and they know me.
quotes.author: Hulk Hogan

quotes.text: Later, I realized that the mission had to end in a let-down because the real barrier wasn't in the sky but in our knowledge and experience of supersonic flight.
quotes.author: Chuck Yeager

quotes.text: A barrier is of ideas, not of things.
quotes.author: Mark Caine

quotes.text: Independent media can go to where the silence is and break the sound barrier, doing what the corporate networks refuse to do.
quotes.author: Amy Goodman

quotes.text: Natural erosion had reduced the critical barrier islands in the Gulf, the result of the destruction of some 300,000 acres of wetlands. This amounted to 30 miles of marshlands.
quotes.author: Mortimer Zuckerman

quotes.text: I have never smuggled anything in my life. Why, then, do I feel an uneasy sense of guilt on approaching a customs barrier?
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.text: There's been very little writing about speech impediments, even though it's this huge psychological barrier.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.text: Parallel parking is desirable for two reasons: parked cars create a physical barrier and psychological buffer that protects pedestrians on the sidewalk from moving vehicles; and a rich supply of parallel parking can eliminate the need for parking lots, which are extremely destructive of the civic fabric.
quotes.author: James Howard Kunstler

quotes.text: Gender used to be a barrier for women to overcome if they wanted to be in politics, but today in Taiwan the situation is somewhat different. I think there is even a preference for a woman candidate, and in local elections, we have seen that younger, better-educated female candidates are overwhelmingly preferred by the voters.
quotes.author: Tsai Ing-wen

quotes.text: This is still a big barrier for me and it is for a lot of foreign actors.
quotes.author: Chow Yun-Fat

quotes.text: One day I discovered that one could get the barrier to internal rotation in ethane approximately right using this method. This was the beginning of my work on organic molecules.
quotes.author: Roald Hoffmann

quotes.text: It's a great time for independent media because technology reduces the entry barrier. It makes it a phenomenal time for media in general. It's David versus Goliath, and David is always a little smarter, more nimble, more fast.
quotes.author: Sasa Vucinic

quotes.text: What's the right way to think about the distribution part of Steam? You need to worry about viruses and people trying to publish other people's content, but the underlying thing is to eliminate that barrier between people who create stuff and people who want to have access to it.
quotes.author: Gabe Newell

quotes.text: Mountains and oceans do not furnish any impassable barrier to the extension of trade.
quotes.author: Henry J. Heinz

quotes.text: We want to allow Costa Ricans to make a qualitative leap in our development and go to an economy based on innovation and developing a broadband infrastructure in order to overcome the barrier of 15 per cent penetration.
quotes.author: Laura Chinchilla

quotes.text: The only barrier to human development is ignorance, and this is not insurmountable.
quotes.author: Robert H. Goddard

quotes.text: Places like Hilton Head, with water adjacency and nice climates, are in high demand, and land values are insane. In the case of Hilton Head, which was developed in 1970 on what had been a mosquito- and alligator-infested swampy barrier island, land value has leaped from nearly zero to now unaffordable.
quotes.author: Susan Orlean

quotes.text: But once the ants and termites jumped the high barrier that prevents the vast variety of evolving animal groups from becoming fully social, they dominated the world.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.text: Unlike with any other art form, filmmakers have this unique web of festivals. There are hundreds. It is a democratic system in which you submit films, and if they are good enough, they play. The only barrier to entry is the submission fee.
quotes.author: Jason Reitman

quotes.text: We use so much bad language that it forms a barrier between ourselves and the truth.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.text: It's been so amazing. I've always struggled with this barrier that I felt like I'd had up until blogging came along. Just one comment from somebody really sparks something in me. It doesn't need to be this huge war between me and the listeners anymore. I really thrive on that.
quotes.author: Imogen Heap

quotes.text: For an economic recovery program to be effective, it must not only create a short-term economic boost but also generate lasting value. Home Star would accomplish that by breaking down the key barrier between homeowners and money-saving retrofits: upfront costs.
quotes.author: Peter Welch

quotes.text: I clipped a Ferrari, hit the gravel trap at a fair old speed, which lifted the car up into the barrier, and then rolled a few times. I had no injuries or anything - I just had to wait for the marshals to right the car before I could get out.
quotes.author: Allan McNish

quotes.text: I believe every woman's body is beautiful in its own way. I have never understood that just because a woman has thick thighs, she is considered fat. For so long, I've been around in the modeling world and have tried to break that barrier. But I think now it's turning around.
quotes.author: Coco Austin

quotes.text: I am so scared of the sea, so what did I do? Learned to scuba in the Great Barrier Reef.
quotes.author: Tracie Bennett

quotes.text: The idea that we are not going to look after the Great Barrier Reef, which is just a wonderful tourism resource that it can be just for one example - we are not going to look after it, we won't have tight environment regulation, is frankly just not true.
quotes.author: Campbell Newman

quotes.text: The want of education and moral training is the only real barrier that exists between the different classes of men.
quotes.author: Susanna Moodie

quotes.text: Take the great example of the four-minute mile. One guy breaks it, then all of a sudden everyone breaks it. And they break it in such a short period of time that it can't be because they were training harder. It's purely that it was a psychological barrier, and someone had to show them that they could do it.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.text: The biggest barrier we've seen to student progress is this: School policies and practices often prevent good teachers from doing great work and even dissuade some talented Americans from entering the profession. This needs to change.
quotes.author: Eli Broad

quotes.text: What is likely to vanish - or be transformed beyond recognition - are many of the things we think of when we think of Australia: the barrier reef, the koalas, the sense of the country as a land of almost limitless natural resources.
quotes.author: Jeff Goodell

quotes.text: What I love about comedy is breaking down the barrier between the audience and the performer.
quotes.author: Scott Aukerman

quotes.text: To jump and break the sound barrier will not be a mere record breaking experience or another extreme event that ends once the mission is accomplished.
quotes.author: Felix Baumgartner

quotes.text: There is always someone in the world who is better or worse off than yourself, and I've never seen that - in either direction - as a barrier to becoming friends with somebody.
quotes.author: Jools Holland

quotes.text: Mr. Lincoln's elevation shows that in America every station in life may be honorable; that there is no barrier against the humblest; but that merit, wherever it exists, has the opportunity to be known.
quotes.author: Matthew Simpson

quotes.text: My idea of an amusement park story is getting adventurers to go tour environmental disaster areas. After all, if the entire Great Barrier Reef gets killed, which seems like an extremely lively possibility, what are you going to do with all that rotting limestone?
quotes.author: Bruce Sterling

quotes.text: The Pentagon Papers case stands today as a barrier to silence by official edict.
quotes.author: Anthony Lewis

quotes.text: Before 9/11 there were weak procedures, willingness, and mechanisms for communicating among agencies for foreign intelligence and the FBI with its focus on law enforcement. The domestic-vs.-foreign barrier has been solved by the reforms after 9/11 that established the DNI.
quotes.author: Dennis C. Blair

quotes.text: Broadband eliminates so many barriers to entry for so many different people that it's actually become a barrier to entry in and of itself if you're not getting online on a regular basis.
quotes.author: Michael K. Powell

quotes.text: I got bored with the topic; I felt this was 19th century physics. I was wondering if there was still something profound that could be made with light microscopy. So I saw that the diffraction barrier was the only important problem that had been left over.
quotes.author: Stefan Hell

quotes.text: It's amazing that something only an atom thick can be an impenetrable barrier. You can have gas on one side and vacuum or liquid on the other, and with a wall only one atom thick, nothing would go through it.
quotes.author: Paul McEuen

quotes.text: To say that a thing has never yet been done among men is to erect a barrier stronger than reason, stronger than discussion.
quotes.author: Thomas Reed

quotes.text: From my experience, there are so many regulations for investing in the United States that they become an impediment, a barrier to investing.
quotes.author: Michael Otto

quotes.text: Throughout the second intifada, America provided unprecedented support for Israel's struggle against Palestinian terrorism and Israel's construction of the security barrier.
quotes.author: Ehud Olmert

quotes.text: Bollywood is not a stepping stone to the West. I am extremely picky and in no hurry to sign a Hollywood film. I am only greedy for great roles; language and country is no barrier. And yes, I'll always be a Hindi film star first.
quotes.author: Priyanka Chopra

quotes.text: Language has historically stood as a barrier for some voters seeking to participate in the electoral process.
quotes.author: Eric Schneiderman

quotes.text: When I first started touring, we had a crappy van, and we would all share rooms. So for many years as a grown adult woman, I would share a bed with a bandmate, whether it would be Jimmy Tamborello from the Postal Service or Pierre De Reeder from Rilo Kiley, just a pillow barrier between us sleeping on the same bed.
quotes.author: Jenny Lewis

quotes.text: I think it's nice to break down that barrier, that models are seen and not heard.
quotes.author: Cara Delevingne

quotes.text: I think it's really cool that there are people like Adele on the cover of 'Vogue' and 'Rolling Stone,' and like I think it's really important that people are talking about your body, because if they don't, then you'll never be able to break that barrier.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: Arafat was a barrier to peace.
quotes.author: Chuck Schumer

quotes.text: Business is a string of seemingly impossible problems looking for solutions. Each problem you solve creates a new barrier to entry for your next competitor.
quotes.author: Jon Oringer

quotes.text: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The airplane stays up because it doesn't have the time to fall.
quotes.author: Orville Wright

quotes.text: If I had to choose, I would rather have birds than airplanes.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.text: And, you know, being able to wear the stars and stripes, when you step up on one of the blocks or, you know, when you step off of an airplane or when you hear the national anthem play, you know, it's one of the greatest feelings in the world because you know that there are people at home who are supporting you and watching you.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.text: Cutting the deficit by gutting our investments in innovation and education is like lightening an overloaded airplane by removing its engine. It may make you feel like you're flying high at first, but it won't take long before you feel the impact.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: From computers to information technology to airplanes, it has been America's unique blend of republican government and free-market capitalism that has allowed us to surpass all other nations in history.
quotes.author: George Nethercutt

quotes.text: My movies were the kind they show in prisons and airplanes, because nobody can leave.
quotes.author: Burt Reynolds

quotes.text: All of the biggest technological inventions created by man - the airplane, the automobile, the computer - says little about his intelligence, but speaks volumes about his laziness.
quotes.author: Mark Kennedy

quotes.text: One of the reasons I wrote 'Airborn' was that I'd fallen in love with the great passenger airships which flew in the '20s and '30s. Their time was short-lived. They were frail, they tended to crash; and they could never be as fast, safe and efficient as the airplanes that replaced them.
quotes.author: Kenneth Oppel

quotes.text: If you can walk away from a landing, it's a good landing. If you use the airplane the next day, it's an outstanding landing.
quotes.author: Chuck Yeager

quotes.text: I've jumped out of an airplane 34 times. I've dove 212 feet under water. I've done a lot of things that defied death.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.text: My grandfather was an engineer who invented the automatic pilot for airplanes.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.text: Crossword puzzles, Sudoku... I'm good at all those things. It's not daily, but I'll do stuff on the airplane. I love playing chess. It's my favorite game.
quotes.author: Larry Fitzgerald

quotes.text: The thing is helicopters are different from airplanes An airplane by it's nature wants to fly, and if not interfered with too strongly by unusual events or incompetent piloting, it will fly.
quotes.author: Harry Reasoner

quotes.text: Most of the writers in TV are from L.A. or New York, and those are places where people are cynical and snarky. And they fly from L.A. to New York in an airplane over this vast, expansive land where people aren't snarky; they're a lot more like the 'Parks and Rec' characters.
quotes.author: Chris Pratt

quotes.text: No reporter is flying around in borrowed twin-engine airplanes.
quotes.author: Dee Dee Myers

quotes.text: I jumped out of an airplane on my 34th birthday because I promised myself I would. I have an interest in confronting my fears.
quotes.author: Michael Trucco

quotes.text: Slow travel now rivals the fly-to-Barcelona-for-lunch culture. Advocates savour the journey, travelling by train or boat or bicycle, or even on foot, rather than crammed into an airplane. They take time to plug into the local culture instead of racing through a list of tourist traps.
quotes.author: Carl Honore

quotes.text: The term 'serious actor' is kind of an oxymoron, isn't it? Like 'Republican party' or 'airplane food.'
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.text: I've owned 41 airplanes. A few of them would talk with me. This little seaplane, though, we've had long conversations in flight. There's a spirit in anything, I think, into which we weave our soul. Not many pilots talk about it, but they think about it in the quiet dark of a night flight.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: I'm a crazy car guy. I've got an airplane hangar full of cars.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.text: New needs need new techniques. And the modern artists have found new ways and new means of making their statements... the modern painter cannot express this age, the airplane, the atom bomb, the radio, in the old forms of the Renaissance or of any other past culture.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.text: I've had a chance to fly a lot of different airplanes, but it was nothing like the shuttle ride.
quotes.author: Chris Hadfield

quotes.text: If any foreign minister begins to defend to the death a 'peace conference', you can be sure his government has already placed its orders for new battleships and airplanes.

quotes.text: I used to do my best thinking while staring out airplane windows. The seat-back video system put a stop to that. Now I sit and watch old' Friends' and 'Everybody Loves Raymond' episodes. Walking is good, but here again, technology has interfered. I like to listen to iTunes while I walk home. I guess I don't think anymore.

quotes.text: To be happy in this world, first you need a cell phone and then you need an airplane. Then you're truly wireless.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.text: I have an airplane hangar with 17 cars in it. That's no joke. I have a 'half pipe' in there, too - you know, like a big ramp, where I skateboard. It's awesome. It's the ultimate fantasy.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.text: This generation is so dead. You ask a kid, 'What are you doing this Saturday?' and they'll be playing video games or watching cable, instead of building model cars or airplanes or doing something creative. Kids today never say, 'Man, I'm really into remote-controlled steamboats.'

quotes.text: Before we had airplanes and astronauts, we really thought that there was an actual place beyond the clouds, somewhere over the rainbow. There was an actual place, and we could go above the clouds and find it there.

quotes.text: To invent an airplane is nothing. To build one is something. But to fly is everything.
quotes.author: Otto Lilienthal

quotes.text: So I'm more at home with my backpack, sleeping in a hotel room or on a bus or on an airplane, than I am necessarily on a bed. It's weird being here. It feels like I'm standing next to my real life.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: If my favorite, most comfortable place is by our fireplace in cold weather, expedient places are on an airplane, in a waiting room or even waiting in line; frequently these days, while on the phone having been 'put on hold.'

quotes.text: Before marriage, many couples are very much like people rushing to catch an airplane; once aboard, they turn into passengers. They just sit there.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.text: I realized that If I had to choose, I would rather have birds than airplanes.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.text: Jimmy Carter used to walk off the airplane carrying his own luggage. Do you remember that? I don't want my president carrying - I want the freaking Marines to be carrying his luggage, and they want to carry his luggage.

quotes.text: Airplanes may kill you, but they ain't likely to hurt you.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: I carry around, like, a little journal with me and just write all the time. Not necessarily, like, actually sitting down and writing lyrics - just freeform writing, whatever's going on in my mind. I write a lot on airplanes, actually, because it's completely isolating.
quotes.author: Mandy Moore

quotes.text: I feel about airplanes the way I feel about diets. It seems to me that they are wonderful things for other people to go on.

quotes.text: I was a pilot and flying hang gliders, paragliders, aerobatics airplanes, and then I discovered skydiving. Free fall. Free. With nothing around you, just a parachute on your back. And you go down. But you don't feel like you're going down. Total freedom.
quotes.author: Yves Rossy

quotes.text: I went to the University of Washington as a physics and astronomy major. My other interest, of course, was aviation. I always wanted to be a pilot. And if you're going to fly airplanes, the best place to be is the Air Force.
quotes.author: Michael P. Anderson

quotes.text: I don't think I'm a celebrity. I'm just a guy from east Texas who loves cars and airplanes.
quotes.author: Carroll Shelby

quotes.text: I was a mechanic in the Navy. And mechanics in the Navy are like mechanics in airlines. You may have more stripes than I do, but you don't know how to fix the airplane.
quotes.author: Gordon Bethune

quotes.text: Airplane travel is nature's way of making you look like your passport photo.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.text: You know, I remember Career Day in high school. I remember plumbers and lawyers... I don't remember a booth where you could sign up to learn how to shoot chickens out of a cannon at the windshield of an airplane, 'cause there would have been a line at my school to do that!

quotes.text: The chances that your tombstone will read 'Killed by Asteroid' are about the same as they'd be for 'Killed in Airplane Crash.'

quotes.text: The century of airplanes has a right to its own music.
quotes.author: Claude Debussy

quotes.text: I love flying so much. I even like airplane food. No one bothers you and your phone never goes off and you can't have emails go through. It's undisturbed.

quotes.text: A lot of writing I do on tour. I do a lot on airplanes. At home, I write a lot, obviously. When I write a song, what I usually do is work the lyric out first from some basic idea that I had, and then I get an acoustic guitar and I sit by the tape recorder and I try to bang it out as it comes.

quotes.text: There are aphorisms that, like airplanes, stay up only while they are in motion.

quotes.text: Happiness is actually found in simple things, such as taking my nephew around the island by bicycle or seeing the stars at night. We go to coffee shops or see airplanes land at the airport.

quotes.text: When you get into an airplane by yourself and take off, you find yourself in this lovely, three-dimensional world where you can go in any direction. There is no feeling any more exciting than that.

quotes.text: Something I'll always remember - when I was a kid, I shook hands with Orville Wright. Forty years later, I shook hands with Neil Armstrong. The guy that invented the airplane and the guy that walked on the moon. In a lifetime, that's kinda wild when you think about it.

quotes.text: Every time I step onto an airplane, I turn to the right and take a good, hard stare into the maw of the engine. I don't know what I'm looking for. I just do it.

quotes.text: I am a crazy online shopper. My husband always jokes, 'Another box arrived!' Airplanes used to be my sanctuary for reading books, but now I have to peruse Gilt sales.

quotes.text: There was a wonderful little short four-year time period when marvelous things happened. It started in 1908, when the Wright brothers flew in Paris, and everybody said, 'Ooh, hey, I can do that.' There's only a few people that have flown in early 1908. In four years, 39 countries had hundreds of airplanes, thousands of pilots.

quotes.text: In Germany air became generally accepted Berlin in this area. It operated with 45 airplanes within the Low Cost range from Germany, and is one the most successful carriers in Europe.
quotes.author: Niki Lauda

quotes.text: I definitely rediscovered reading for pleasure by devoting such a large swath of my time to sitting on airplanes. I am now painfully adept at removing my shoes so as to have the least amount of foot surface area touching an airport floor.

quotes.text: I've always loved airplanes and flight. The space program was really important to me as a kid. I still have a photo of Armstrong and Aldrin on the moon in my living room.

quotes.text: It takes a lot to get people talking in airplanes. But once they start talking, you just can't shut them up.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.text: Everything from airplanes to kitchen blenders and even chopsticks comes with an instruction manual. Children, despite all their complexity, do not.

quotes.text: For me, modern technology has ruined romance and movies - nobody can run to the airplane gate anymore.

quotes.text: But if you really want to get involved in making a difference, you can stay at home with your family and have a job and make a reasonable living without having to be on an airplane all of the time, then you ought to go back home and run for School Board.

quotes.text: I spent about seven years during the Vietnam War flight-testing airplanes for the Air Force. And then I went in and I had a lot of fun building airplanes that people could build in their garages. And some 3,000 of those are flying. Of course, one of them is around-the-world Voyager.

quotes.text: I was always afraid of dying. Always. It was my fear that made me learn everything I could about my airplane and my emergency equipment, and kept me flying respectful of my machine and always alert in the cockpit.

quotes.text: Why are video games so violent? The ones I've seen remind me of the 4th of July, with everything exploding, buildings, cars, airplanes, men and women. Kill, kill, and kill for sport and entertainment.

quotes.text: Most pilots learn, when they pin on their wings and go out and get in a fighter, especially, that one thing you don't do, you don't believe anything anybody tells you about an airplane.

quotes.text: Touring is tough. You're almost in a haze because you don't really know where you are half the time: You're in a hotel room one moment, and the next thing you know, you're onstage performing for 60,000 people, then you're back on an airplane. It's very hectic and I couldn't do it without my family.

quotes.text: And so, whether they came here on the Mayflower, on a slave ship, or on an airplane from Havana, we are all descendants of the men and women who built here the nation that saved the world.

quotes.text: For the undocumented immigrants, the big priority is just to get out from the shadows, be able to get a driver's license, buy an airplane ticket and stop worrying about sudden deportation. But for the country as a whole, it's crucial that everybody have a citizen's stake in the nation's welfare.

quotes.text: World barista champions use the AeroPress to make coffee on the folding tray tables of airplanes.

quotes.text: Any design, whether it's for a ship or an airplane, must be done in anticipation of potential failures.

quotes.text: We have been the cowards lobbing cruise missiles from 2,000 miles away. That's cowardly. Staying in the airplane when it hits the building, say what you want about it, it's not cowardly.

quotes.text: Regardless of how me or this man right here or anybody else in this business get, when we walk on an airplane in first-class looking like this, we're gonna get searched.

quotes.text: I just want to be able to get on an airplane and enjoy myself in Disneyland, not sit there worrying about all these assassins.

quotes.text: I've spent my life as an airplane mechanic, pilot, aircraft manufacturer and airline CEO who never lost a life or an airplane. I am considerate of the risk we take every time we fly. I also know we need to fly and always to improve safety.

quotes.text: I tell my employees that we're in the service business, and it's incidental that we fly airplanes.

quotes.text: Boys like either dinosaurs or airplanes. I was very much an airplane boy.
quotes.author: Jim Lovell

quotes.text: I never have more than one bag at a time. I think one is already quite enough. Also, I hate changing bags, so I never have the thing of having ten bags. Any bag that's with me will take the same course as I will. It will take the same airplanes and will be squashed in the same way and will be used as a cushion in the airports.
quotes.author: Jane Birkin

quotes.text: Computers, like automobiles and airplanes, do only what people tell them to do.
quotes.author: Bill James

quotes.text: It turns out that if you optimize the performance of a car and of an airplane, they are very far away in terms of mechanical features. So you can make a flying car. But they are not very good planes, and they are not very good cars.
quotes.author: Gregory Benford

quotes.text: When you look at the light bulb above you, you remember Thomas Alva Edison. When the telephone bell rings, you remember Alexander Graham Bell. Marie Curie was the first woman to win the Nobel Prize. When you see the blue sky, you think of Sir C.V. Raman.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: It's ironic, really. Guys should be excited that I got Kristen Bell. If Brad Pitt gets Kristen Bell, it's like, 'Well, of course he did.' With me, it should be, 'Oh good, a normal-looking guy got her. Maybe I'll get me a Kristen Bell.' But guys hate my guts for always dating women I have no right to be with.

quotes.text: Let's pretend my career in music is a bell. Whether you like my music or not is up to you. But you've got to admit I rang that bell pretty hard and pretty often.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: War is tragedy. The great war stories are tragedies. It's the failure of diplomacy. 'War and Peace,' 'A Farewell to Arms,' 'For Whom the Bell Tolls.' Those are some of the greatest tragedies.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.text: Any man's death diminishes me, because I am involved in Mankind; And therefore never send to know for whom the bell tolls; it tolls for thee.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.text: I'm a promoter of the people for the people and by the people and my magic lies in my people ties. I'm a promoter of America. I'm American people. You know what I mean? So therefore, uh, do not send for who the bell tolls 'cause the bell tolls for thee.
quotes.author: Don King

quotes.text: At the end of the day, 'Rocky' is a love story, and he could never have reached the final bell without Adrian.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.text: A bell's not a bell 'til you ring it, A song's not a song 'til you sing it, Love in your heart wasn't put there to stay, Love isn't love 'til you give it away!

quotes.text: Once that bell rings you're on your own. It's just you and the other guy.
quotes.author: Joe Louis

quotes.text: The world is a bell curve. Classroom test scores, employee performance in a company or how many people really, really like you. No matter the population you're studying, they always fit neatly across the standard deviations of the famous bell curve.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.text: If there are occasions when my grape turned into a raisin and my joy bell lost its resonance, please forgive me. Charge it to my head and not to my heart.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.text: One of my sensory problems was hearing sensitivity, where certain loud noises, such as a school bell, hurt my ears. It sounded like a dentist drill going through my ears.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.text: The temple bell stops but I still hear the sound coming out of the flowers.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.text: I don't want a door bell. I don't want anyone ringing my door bell... seems to be intrusive. They can call me on their cell phones.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.text: I was going to McDonald's and Taco Bell every day. The kids behind the counter knew me - it wouldn't even faze them. Or I'd sit up at Denny's or Big Boy and just eat by myself. It was sad. I got so heavy that people started to not recognize me.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.text: It's really funny because the same people who loved me as Stringer Bell were the same people that were watching 'Daddy's Little Girls' literally in tears.
quotes.author: Idris Elba

quotes.text: I have a graduate degree from Penn State. I studied at Penn State under a noted Hemingway scholar, Philip Young. I had an interest in thrillers, and it occurred to me that Hemingway wrote many action scenes: the war scenes in 'A Farewell to Arms' and 'For Whom the Bell Tolls' come to mind. But the scenes don't feel pulpy.
quotes.author: David Morrell

quotes.text: 'Shine On You Crazy Diamond' and 'Wish You Were Here' are standout tracks. 'Comfortably Numb' is another one. 'High Hopes' from 'The Division Bell' is one of my favorite all-time Pink Floyd tracks. 'The Great Gig in the Sky,' 'Echoes,' there's lot of them.
quotes.author: David Gilmour

quotes.text: When I decided to be a musician I reckoned that that was going to be the way of less profit, less money. I was sort of giving up the idea of making a lot of money. It was what I loved to do. I would have done it anyway. If I'd had to work at Taco Bell I'd have still been out at night trying to play music.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.text: Poverty is an anomaly to rich people; it is very difficult to make out why people who want dinner do not ring the bell.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.text: I have always adhered to two principles. The first one is to train hard and get in the best possible physical condition. The second is to forget all about the other fellow until you face him in the ring and the bell sounds for the fight.
quotes.author: Rocky Marciano

quotes.text: Innocence is like a dumb leper who has lost his bell, wandering the world, meaning no harm.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.text: My experience in Amsterdam is that cyclists ride where the hell they like and aim in a state of rage at all pedestrians while ringing their bell loudly, the concept of avoiding people being foreign to them.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: You take that walk from the dressing room to the ring and that's when the real man comes out. Then you climb up those four stairs and into the ring. Then finally, you can't wait for the bell to ring.
quotes.author: Gerry Cooney

quotes.text: The film 'The Diving Bell and the Butterfly,' based the book of the same name, has a line that enlightens and comforts me. The protagonist, who has lost all ability to move except one eye, discusses his role as a father. He notes, 'Even a fraction of a father is still a father.'
quotes.author: Steve Gleason

quotes.text: I found that when I went from Albany to Savannah, that I needed to put that white rice away, and I needed to turn that into Savannah red rice because they were big into that sausage, tomato-y, bell pepper-y rice mixture.
quotes.author: Paula Deen

quotes.text: Kristen Bell is rare as an actress, because she's the type of actor who jumps out of a plane without a parachute - from a totally fearless place, which is really refreshing and inspiring.
quotes.author: Steve Antin

quotes.text: When a nation's young men are conservative, its funeral bell is already rung.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: I read The Bell Jar, and then I read her memoir and her diaries, and a third book, an outside opinion. Just the way she made the pillows so neat on the oven door. It just seems to be the opposite of, if you're going to take your life, in a horrible rage it happens.
quotes.author: Paul Westerberg

quotes.text: It would no doubt be very sentimental to argue - but I would argue it nevertheless - that the peculiar combination of joy and sadness in bell music - both of clock chimes, and of change-ringing - is very typical of England. It is of a piece with the irony in which English people habitually address one another.
quotes.author: A. N. Wilson

quotes.text: I never dreamed I'd be a spokesman for anything. But Pac Bell just asked me. The money was OK; the scripts were fun because I had to do in 30 seconds what it takes a whole feature to do and because the dysfunctional family of agents, managers and lawyers who represent me said it was cool.
quotes.author: Chris Eigeman

quotes.text: Innocence always calls mutely for protection when we would be so much wiser to guard ourselves against it: innocence is like a dumb leper who has lost his bell, wandering the world, meaning no harm.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.text: On the Net, the bell curve reclaims its tails. The uncommon is as accessible as the common. The very fragmentation of the Internet allows us to find ourselves in other people - and to know that we are not alone.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.text: Be sure to buy organic versions of the 'dirty dozen:' the fruits and vegetables that, when grown conventionally, are loaded with pesticides and chemicals: Grapes, apples, lettuce, bell peppers, carrots, nectarines, peaches, strawberries, pears, kale, and celery.
quotes.author: Suzanne Somers

quotes.text: I think music is a lifting force, I think love is the lifting force in the human condition. I think you see someone loving on their child, and it moves you, and you can't help it. It rings a bell inside of us that elevates us as human beings, and I treasure that. I think it's one of the few great things about human beings.
quotes.author: David Crosby

quotes.text: I did great things in the theater. I did some nice roles, 'The Diving Bell and the Butterfly' or 'La Vie en Rose.' And I love my role in 'Frantic.'
quotes.author: Emmanuelle Seigner

quotes.text: Somehow, I don't think Jesus came to Earth to ring the bell at the New York Stock Exchange.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.text: 'Bell Choir Coast' is about a fictional land where I was able to start over, discover myself, and learn to take life a lot less seriously.
quotes.author: Sydney Wayser

quotes.text: My recipe for dealing with anger and frustration: set the kitchen timer for twenty minutes, cry, rant, and rave, and at the sound of the bell, simmer down and go about business as usual.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.text: Run for your life from any man who tells you that money is evil. That sentence is the leper's bell of an approaching looter.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: As to Bell's talking telegraph, it only creates interest in scientific circles... its commercial values will be limited.
quotes.author: Elisha Gray

quotes.text: I love Taco Bell. Whenever I go there, I could get anything on the menu and be totally happy.
quotes.author: Chris Massoglia

quotes.text: The act of bell ringing is symbolic of all proselytizing religions. It implies the pointless interference with the quiet of other people.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.text: I just love food, especially my mom's Bulgarian cooking. Taco Bell is my favorite fast food restaurant. I also love Italian food.
quotes.author: Leah LaBelle

quotes.text: I'm famous for splurging at fast-food places. I'm currently obsessed with Taco Bell's bean and cheese burritos with extra green sauce and extra cheese. Gluttony!
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.text: As a boy, the very words 'Liberty Bell' and 'Independence Hall' fired my imagination and made a profound and lasting impression on my mind. Throughout my struggle to secure national freedom for China, I have continuously dreamed of the day when she would assume the full stature of an independent, democratic nation.
quotes.author: Chiang Kai-shek

quotes.text: I used to do bell ringing in Benenden church. It was really good fun, actually. My best friend's dad was the local vicar, and so it was expected as her best friend that I would go to church every Sunday with her.
quotes.author: Jo Brand

quotes.text: A jellyfish is little more than a pulsating bell, a tassel of trailing tentacles and a single digestive opening through which it both eats and excretes - as regrettable an example of economy of design as ever was.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.text: In 'For Whom the Bell Tolls,' Hemingway cozies up to revolution by romanticizing it (and not only with those execrable love scenes).
quotes.author: Madison Smartt Bell

quotes.text: At noon, on the Fourth of July, 1826, while the Liberty Bell was again sounding its old message to the people of Philadelphia, the soul of Thomas Jefferson passed on; and a few hours later John Adams entered into rest, with the name of his old friend upon his lips.
quotes.author: Allen Johnson

quotes.text: Coming from a little suburban town, I wasn't a hip city kid. I was quite the opposite, really. Songs like 'Saturday's Kids' rang a bell for kids all over the country. That song was about the kids I grew up with.
quotes.author: Paul Weller

quotes.text: Whether one eats a cat or not is a personal choice, and I don't want to sway anyone one way or another. But if you do, there is one obvious cooking tip: Always remember to remove the bell from the cat's collar before cooking.
quotes.author: Mike Royko

quotes.text: 'For Whom the Bell Tolls' was a problem which I carried on each day. I knew what was going to happen in principle. But I invented what happened each day I wrote.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: Kristen Bell is one of my best friends. I've had the pleasure of working with some really great people, and Kristen is just a beautiful, talented young lady.
quotes.author: Chris Lowell

quotes.text: Novels are not about expressing yourself, they're about something beautiful, funny, clever and organic. Self-expression? Go and ring a bell in a yard if you want to express yourself.
quotes.author: Zadie Smith

quotes.text: What Alexander Graham Bell thought up occupied less space than a flower vase. Now it's so small that I have to search all my pockets to discover I've received a spam text.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: Most of us cluster somewhere in the middle of most statistical distributions. But there are lots of bell curves, and pretty much everyone is on a tail of at least one of them. We may collect strange memorabilia or read esoteric books, hold unusual religious beliefs or wear odd-sized shoes, suffer rare diseases or enjoy obscure movies.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.text: I am deeply saddened and shocked at the loss of umpire Wally Bell.
quotes.author: Joe Torre

quotes.text: Acting still rings my bell as much as it did in high school. Plus, I can now indulge my interests as a producer as well. My work is more fun than fun but, best of all, it's still very scary. You are always walking some kind of high wire.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.text: A lot of children are interested in fairies, especially young girls, and Tinker Bell is the ueber-fairy. She's the pin-up girl of fairies. She's the ultimate fairy, but she's also got a mischievous spirit and she's very strong-willed. I think a lot of youngsters recognize themselves in Tinker Bell.
quotes.author: Michael Sheen

quotes.text: I trained like an animal, but the thing is focus and concentration. When the bell rings it's like when the little red light goes on over the camera. And I can usually nail my lines on the first or second take because I'm right there.
quotes.author: Mickey Rourke

quotes.text: When people say that you kind of just get - you know, just feel like a little buzzed or dazed or had your bell rung - they consider that a concussion. I wouldn't. But if that is considered a concussion, I would say any football player at least records 50 to 100 in the course of a year.
quotes.author: Troy Polamalu

quotes.text: When I started blogging in 2004, I responded to every comment no matter how nasty the reader was. I was generally polite, believing that these critics would be so charmed by my professionalism that they would see the error of their misogynist ways and swiftly run out to read a bell hooks book. Ha!
quotes.author: Jessica Valenti

quotes.text: I love Christmas. Frosty the Snowman, peace on Earth and mangers, Salvation Army bell ringers and reindeer, the movie 'Meet Me in St. Louis,' office parties and cookies.
quotes.author: Mo Rocca

quotes.text: Someone recently played me 'Combination Pizza Hut and Taco Bell' by Das Racist. That should be my theme song.
quotes.author: Dhani Harrison

quotes.text: I remember I'd come home from fifth, sixth grade, and I'd watch 'Saved by the Bell' and be like, 'I hope my high school experience is like that.' And it totally wasn't. It sucked.
quotes.author: Cory Monteith

quotes.text: Believe it or not, I got into the charismatic, shady, sly heart of Sedgewick Bell by watching CNN and C-SPAN.
quotes.author: Emile Hirsch

quotes.text: Why not mix this and that? If soy goes well with fish, how come no one does beef carpaccio with soy? Why do we have such a taste and not another? It's all about culture. There is something, however, that I really don't like: bell peppers.
quotes.author: Ferran Adria

quotes.text: I think my dad did legal work for someone who had a Packard Bell 8088, and they couldn't pay him, so they gave him a computer. I was initially not allowed to touch it, but that didn't last long. I started tinkering with it, and there were many times I screwed up the computer.
quotes.author: Jeremy Stoppelman

quotes.text: But when researchers at Bell Labs discovered that static tends to come from particular places in the sky, the whole field of radio astronomy opened up.
quotes.author: Murray Gell-Mann

quotes.text: I've always listened to music while I write, but none of my work has been so directly impacted by a song as my new novel, 'So Cold the River,' for which the brilliant strings piece 'Short Trip Home,' composed by Edgar Meyer and featuring the incredible Joshua Bell on violin, inspired much of the story.
quotes.author: Michael Koryta

quotes.text: I remember visiting my grandmother Adele in Ponce Inlet, Florida, when I was three years old, and she had an IBM electric typewriter. I thought that this electric typewriter was about the most fascinating toy in the world - I liked the little bell and the sounds and the feel of the keys and especially the erase key.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Zevin

quotes.text: Montana's ranchers raise the best cattle in the world. If Taco Bell needs to beef up, they can give their customers the highest quality meat around by using Montana beef, and in the process, supporting agriculture jobs in Montana.
quotes.author: Jon Tester

quotes.text: In the beginning, everybody that gets to work with me, thinks I'm nice. But three weeks later, they hear a bell ringing. Then they realise I meant everything I said during that first week. It's not my fault people are not taking me serious from the first moment.
quotes.author: Andrew Eldritch

quotes.text: My favorite movie is 'The Diving Bell and the Butterfly.'
quotes.author: Jason Momoa

quotes.text: My mother was a Bloomsbury figure: a great friend of TS Eliot, Duncan Grant, Vanessa Bell. My grandmother, Mary Hutchinson, gave her life to works of art, being an admirer of Matisse and Giaometti, whom I collected as a young man because of her.
quotes.author: Jacob Rothschild

quotes.text: How I longed to see these things; how I longed to see the Liberty Bell and walk on the streets where Thomas Jefferson, Tom Paine and Benjamin Franklin had walked.
quotes.author: Burl Ives

quotes.text: The bell that tolls for all in boxing belongs to a cash register.
quotes.author: Bob Verdi

quotes.text: I was allowed to ring the bell for five minutes until everyone was in assembly. It was the beginning of power.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Archer

quotes.text: I have a rule: I want the pilot flying me up in the air at 30,000 feet to make more than a guy working at Taco Bell.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.text: In awe, I watched the waxing moon ride across the zenith of the heavens like an ambered chariot towards the ebony void of infinite space wherein the tethered belts of Jupiter and Mars hang, for ever festooned in their orbital majesty. And as I looked at all this I thought... I must put a roof on this toilet.
quotes.author: Les Dawson

quotes.text: Acting is invigorating. But I don't analyse it too much. It's like a dog smelling where it's going to do its toilet in the morning.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.text: I can say with a solid degree of authority that I am a selfish person. I spontaneously forget the names of more people than not, unless I want to make out with them. I will take the last square of toilet paper off the roll without thinking twice. I tip taxi drivers so poorly I'm amazed none of them have run over my foot while speeding off.
quotes.author: Sloane Crosley

quotes.text: Now, as husbands go, I have to admit I did all right. Joe is unquestionably handsome, doesn't leave ragged toenail clippings scattered about the house, and has never once, in nearly five thousand days of togetherness, left the toilet seat up.
quotes.author: Jenna McCarthy

quotes.text: Online, you're providing each other with the good aspects of being together as far as communication and support, but you don't have to deal with the realities of paying bills together, or being annoyed when they leave the toilet seat up or don't put the food away in the fridge.
quotes.author: Nev Schulman

quotes.text: Yup, the toilet is my best friend before a show.
quotes.author: Eric Carr

quotes.text: Cancer is a great wake-up call. A call to take the tag off the new lingerie and wear that black lacy slip. To open the box of pearls and put them on. To crack open the bath oil beads before they shrivel up in a bowl on the toilet tank.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: I'm a little thirsty, can I go drink out of your toilet?
quotes.author: Mark McKinney

quotes.text: Eric Schmidt looks innocent enough, with his watercolor blue eyes and his tiny office full of toys and his Google campus stocked with volleyball courts and unlocked bikes and wheat-grass shots and cereal dispensers and Haribo Gummi Bears and heated toilet seats and herb gardens and parking lots with cords hanging to plug in electric cars.
quotes.author: Maureen Dowd

quotes.text: France is the country where the money falls apart and you can't tear the toilet paper.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.text: I don't think many people understand what racism is. The intellectuals use it like toilet paper; it's something they can use. It's not something they live.
quotes.author: Mark Fuhrman

quotes.text: You know an odd feeling? Sitting on the toilet eating a chocolate candy bar.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: There are some ghost stories in Japan where - when you are sitting in the bathroom in the traditional style of the Japanese toilet - a hand is actually starting to grab you from beneath. It's a very scary story.
quotes.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quotes.text: Rules governing defecation, hygiene, and pollution exist in every culture at every period in history. It may in fact be the foundation of civilization: What is toilet training if not the first attempt to turn a child into an acceptable member of society?
quotes.author: Rose George

quotes.text: Don't let yourself fall into 'empty.' Keep cash in the house. Keep gas in your tank. Keep an extra roll of toilet paper squirreled away. Keep your phone charged.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.text: I'm way better in person than I am on things like Twitter. I know Twitter is the best and fastest way to connect with fans who really appreciate you but I'm still not cool with it - although I am trying! I try my best but I'm a one-on-one person and I don't want to tell people I'm on the toilet or I just brushed my teeth.
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.text: Can you imagine a guy breaking into your car, and he steals your guitar case 'cause he thinks it's a guitar, and he gets it home and opens it up and there's a rake inside it, an electric toilet plunger and a dog skull? That actually happened.
quotes.author: Eugene Chadbourne

quotes.text: We are now in the 21st century: all books, including the Koran, should be fair game for flushing down the toilet without fear of violent reprisal.
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.text: Endangered forests are being slaughtered for toilet paper.
quotes.author: Daphne Zuniga

quotes.text: The first thing I did when I decided that I was going to dive into the world of poop was look at who was doing stuff in that world. The first I came across was the World Toilet Organization. So one of the first things I did was to go to their annual show in Moscow.
quotes.author: Rose George

quotes.text: No innovation in the past 200 years has done more to save lives and improve health than the sanitation revolution triggered by invention of the toilet. But it did not go far enough. It only reached one-third of the world.
quotes.author: Sylvia Mathews Burwell

quotes.text: My goal is that after seeing 'Grand Canyon,' every person in the audience will go home knowing they have to conserve water: even something as simple as installing a low-flow toilet or showerhead, or turning off the faucet while they're brushing their teeth.
quotes.author: Greg MacGillivray

quotes.text: What they have done in Japan, which I find so inspirational, is they've brought the toilet out from behind the locked door. They've made it conversational. People go out and upgrade their toilet. They talk about it. They've sanitized it.
quotes.author: Rose George

quotes.text: You can almost judge how screwed up somebody is by the kind of toilet paper they use. Go in any rich house and it's some weird coloured embossed stuff.
quotes.author: Captain Beefheart

quotes.text: Castro couldn't even go to the bathroom unless the Soviet Union put the nickel in the toilet.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: I didn't go to high school. I think that after you learn to read and write and do your numbers and flush the toilet behind yourself, you don't need no more schoolin'. You need to get out in the water and swim.
quotes.author: Wilford Brimley

quotes.text: Men who consistently leave the toilet seat up secretly want women to get up to go the bathroom in the middle of the night and fall in.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.text: I've always loved 3D. In fact, as a kid, I was exposed to 3D at an early age because my grandfather was a specialist of 3D in cinematheques. And then my cousin put it in 'Science of Sleep' with toilet paper tube cities. But he was a specialist and I always wanted to do something in 3D.
quotes.author: Michel Gondry

quotes.text: It is better to have a relationship with someone who cheats on you than with someone who does not flush the toilet.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.text: I have the largest collection of Hulk memorabilia in the world - everything from toilet paper, wallpaper, bicycles - all boxed up at my house in Northern California. I've had it for so long, I think it might be time to sell it.
quotes.author: Lou Ferrigno

quotes.text: Before you rip off three feet of toilet paper, consider that each year 500,000 acres of virgin boreal forest in northern Alberta and Ontario are being clear-cut to make the stuff. These forests are home to some 500 First Nation communities, as well as caribou and bears, moose and wolves, and, in the summertime, billions of songbirds.
quotes.author: Alex Shoumatoff

quotes.text: I decided to build a studio in my house. We built it in my basement kitchen. I had the drummer up by the fish tank. I was in the toilet singing. The bass player was out by the shelves in the living room, and the guitarist was on the couch by the telly.
quotes.author: Eddi Reader

quotes.text: I really can't be bothered going to a barber. And shaving every morning, that's nightmarish. I spent my teenage years covered in tiny little bits of toilet paper.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.text: In many parts of the world, more people have access to a mobile device than to a toilet or running water.
quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.text: It is difficult to produce a television documentary that is both incisive and probing when every twelve minutes one is interrupted by twelve dancing rabbits singing about toilet paper.
quotes.author: Rod Serling

quotes.text: In the period where I had to live the life of a citizen - a life where, like everybody else, I did tons of laundry and cleaned toilet bowls, changed hundreds of diapers and nursed children - I learned a lot.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.text: When somebody follows you 20 blocks to the pharmacy, where they watch you buy toilet paper, you know your life has changed.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.text: Today, the degradation of the inner life is symbolized by the fact that the only place sacred from interruption is the private toilet.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.text: When I was writing my dissertation, I wrote about Freud and the process of sublimation, which is when you learn to stop breast-feeding, or stop going to the toilet whenever you want to. It's about learning to repress a desire for instant gratification.
quotes.author: Bat for Lashes

quotes.text: Well, I don't use the toilet much to pee in. I almost always pee in the yard or the garden, because I like to pee on my estate.
quotes.author: Iggy Pop

quotes.text: If you don't want your dog to have bad breath, do what I do: Pour a little Lavoris in the toilet.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.text: Well, my wife and I were married in a toilet - it was a marriage of convenience!
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.text: I walk into rooms and I don't know why I'm there. I'm like, 'Why am I standing in front of the toilet now?'
quotes.author: Matthew Broderick

quotes.text: When you go to jail, there's so much simple stuff missing. You just want some good toilet paper or a real toothbrush, a real blanket and a real bed to lay in.
quotes.author: Ja Rule

quotes.text: If you're embarking around the world in a hot-air balloon, don't forget the toilet paper.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.text: I refuse to go into a fast-food outlet - to use the toilet even - in case anyone got the wrong idea and thought I was sneaking in a quick burger.
quotes.author: Jonny Wilkinson

quotes.text: Maybe humans are just the pet alligators that God flushed down the toilet.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.text: You know, I've been to some superstars' houses, and I've been really disgusted when I see their platinum discs hanging in the toilet. They're just there on the walls glaring at you when you're trying to be occupied with other things.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.text: It wasn't that I couldn't write. I wrote every day. I actually worked really hard at writing. At my desk by 7 A.M., would work a full eight and more. Scribbled at the dinner table, in bed, on the toilet, on the No. 6 train, at Shea Stadium. I did everything I could. But none of it worked.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.text: You do live longer with bran, but you spend the last fifteen years on the toilet.
quotes.author: Alan King

quotes.text: Most people in America want an easy read. I call it McFiction - books which pass right through you without you even digesting them. I don't mean a book that has two-syllable words. I mean chapters you can read in a toilet break. Happy endings. We are more of a TV culture.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.text: I, made in England, felt excluded, miffed, resistant to the idea of even visiting India, a position of increasing absurdity as, one by one, backpacking friends returned from the place with the standard anecdotal combo of nirvanic epiphany and toilet horror.
quotes.author: Glen Duncan

quotes.text: In our skulls, we carry around 3 pounds of slimy, wet, greyish tissue, corrugated like crumpled toilet paper. You wouldn't think, to look at the unappetizing lump, that it was some of the most powerful stuff in the known universe.
quotes.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky
