quotes.text: I have a very silly sense of humor. I've never laughed harder in my entire life than seeing someone with toilet paper stuck on the bottom of their shoe.
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.text: I have said with as much sincerity as I can muster that if I were thrown into a dungeon with a sentence of one hundred years, with my only company being an illiterate guard who came twice a day with meals but who never spoke, I would still write - on coarse toilet paper in the dark if I could spare it.
quotes.author: Edward P. Jones

quotes.text: There is a lot of rubbish written about toilet humour - people saying it is childish and pretending it is beneath them - but there is no doubting the effectiveness of a really good willy gag.
quotes.author: Adrian Edmondson

quotes.text: It's funny: I put money into short films, and I put really good actors in it, and I write some stuff that's really funny, and I'll get, like, a million views. But to the right of me, there will be a video of a kitten that falls into a toilet bowl, and it's three seconds long, and it will get 25 million views.
quotes.author: Ben Schwartz

quotes.text: You know you're big when you sit in the bathtub and the water in the toilet rises.
quotes.author: Art Donovan

quotes.text: I left Israel to work as a model, to just make money - I didn't care if I was doing an ad for toilet paper or diapers, I just really wanted to allow myself to go to school, to go to university without waitressing, because when I'm in a school environment I just really like to study and have the best grades and learn as much as I can.
quotes.author: Moran Atias

quotes.text: Don't get married in a house where there is no toilet.
quotes.author: Jairam Ramesh

quotes.text: Rightly or wrongly, the Victorian considered that there were certain subjects which were not meet for inter-sexual discussion, just as they held that certain processes of the feminine toilet, like the powdering of the nose and the application of lipstick to the mouth, were (if done at all) better done in private.
quotes.author: E. F. Benson

quotes.text: I think the bottom line for me and for Newsweek is that there were a lot of - we did retract this specific matter about the Koran and the toilet for the reasons that you just cited.
quotes.author: Michael Isikoff

quotes.text: The main part of the house is a deep red and I have butterscotch carpet. And I have a bathroom with leopard skin floor, wallpaper and toilet.
quotes.author: Macy Gray

quotes.text: Today you can go to a gas station and find the cash register open and the toilets locked. They must think toilet paper is worth more than money.
quotes.author: Joey Bishop

quotes.text: The Pacific is the best toilet for satellites.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: When someone follows you all the way to the shop and watches you buy toilet roll, you know your life has changed.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.text: In the case of the classic Western helicopter parent, it starts with Baby Einstein and reward charts for toilet training, and it never really ends, which is why colleges have to devote so many resources to teaching parents how to leave their kids alone.
quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.text: In Michigan, a liberal democrat raised taxes and kept their government programs at the same level. And guess what? Their economy continued into the toilet, it continued down.
quotes.author: Rick Perry

quotes.text: I was sitting in the toilet and I was by myself. I was tired of playing with the roller, so I said I'd better write a book.
quotes.author: Don Rickles

quotes.text: As a wheelchair user, I am utterly obsessed with toilets, and all my friends know it. A simple invitation to the pub is consistently followed by, 'Do you know if they have an accessible toilet?'
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.text: My mother, who died aged 82, had Alzheimer's. Losing your memory is bad enough, but everything shuts down. You can't remember how to eat or go to the toilet. It's a terrible disease and so distressing to watch it take over someone you love.
quotes.author: Bonnie Tyler

quotes.text: When I was on the swim team as a kid, I used to hide out from my coach by going into the bathroom and hiding out in one of the stalls. And I would literally wrap myself in toilet paper so as not to get hypothermia.
quotes.author: Jeff Kinney

quotes.text: NASA asked me to create meals for the space shuttle. Thai chicken was the favorite. I flew in a fake space shuttle, but I have no desire to go into space after seeing the toilet.
quotes.author: Rachael Ray

quotes.text: Paris's neighborhoods, the arrondissements, are organized like a twist. They spiral from the river like toilet water flushing in reverse and erupting out of the bowl - a corkscrew or what have you, a flattened pig's tail, a whorling braid notched one to 20.
quotes.author: Rosecrans Baldwin

quotes.text: I like getting toilet paper thrown at me.
quotes.author: Joel Madden

quotes.text: I was focused on building things from an early age. When I was about 3, our toilet broke, and my mother was ready to call the plumber. I told her I would fix it and asked her to get my Richard Scarry book 'How Things Work in Busytown.' Between the picture of a toilet and the text she read to me explaining how the parts worked, I fixed it.
quotes.author: Colin Angle

quotes.text: Every time I went on the radio, I would take the crummiest radio station, the station that was like a toilet bowl. I would go on there and build up the ratings, so you couldn't do any worse.
quotes.author: Howard Stern

quotes.text: And I have this little litany of things they can do. And the first one, of course, is to write - every day, no excuses. It's so easy to make excuses. Even professional writers have days when they'd rather clean the toilet than do the writing.
quotes.author: Octavia Butler

quotes.text: I must admit, the constant invasion of privacy was becoming a real concern. I've been asked for autographs while I've been doing laps in the pool and even in the toilet!
quotes.author: Rick Astley

quotes.text: I visited a new cultural center in Shanghai in 2005 that was pretty much perfect, except for the really badly translated Chinglish signs: a handicapped restroom that said 'Deformed Man's Toilet,' that kind of thing.
quotes.author: David Henry Hwang

quotes.text: Sorrow can be alleviated by good sleep, a bath and a glass of wine.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.text: When I come home and I'm tired from filming all day, I expect her to be there and make sure everything is cool for me. You know, like drawing my bath and helping me into bed.
quotes.author: Oliver Reed

quotes.text: There must be quite a few things that a hot bath won't cure, but I don't know many of them.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.text: Telling a teenager the facts of life is like giving a fish a bath.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.text: There is nothing in the world that I loathe more than group activity, that communal bath where the hairy and slippery mix in a multiplication of mediocrity.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.text: Cancer is a great wake-up call. A call to take the tag off the new lingerie and wear that black lacy slip. To open the box of pearls and put them on. To crack open the bath oil beads before they shrivel up in a bowl on the toilet tank.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: Tiles, the best furniture, fabrics, bath fixtures, bronze - just leaf through any design magazine and you immediately understand they're all 'Made in Italy.' We have the premier opera house in the world, La Scala, and behind the Nobel given to CERN is the research of many Italians.
quotes.author: Lapo Elkann

quotes.text: The only way I'd be caught without makeup is if my radio fell in the bathtub while I was taking a bath and electrocuted me and I was in between makeup at home. I hope my husband would slap a little lipstick on me before he took me to the morgue.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.text: I can stay in the bath for, well, the longest has been seven or eight hours. I get completely set up with my laptop so I can watch 'The Sopranos,' put out some scented candles, music. I have a towel nearby so I can dry my hand to change the music or the TV. I make a little heaven for myself. And then I just refill and refill.
quotes.author: Suki Waterhouse

quotes.text: One of the big questions in the climate change debate: Are humans any smarter than frogs in a pot? If you put a frog in a pot and slowly turn up the heat, it won't jump out. Instead, it will enjoy the nice warm bath until it is cooked to death. We humans seem to be doing pretty much the same thing.
quotes.author: Jeff Goodell

quotes.text: I'm not trying to win an award for being the best vegetarian, just want to be healthy. Take a salt bath. Do things that my parents were never able to do. I'm blessed to do anything I want, so I decide to take the best care of my body and my family in the same way. Holistically. Vitally.
quotes.author: Erykah Badu

quotes.text: I remember from my school days Archimedes jumping into his bath and displacing water and coming up with his famous principle, and of course Isaac Newton being hit on the head with an apple. In other words, this realm of human knowledge - which is mathematical, essentially - can have a playful visual element to it.
quotes.author: James Marsh

quotes.text: When you're in the editing room, the dangerous thing is that it becomes like telling a joke again and again and again. Eventually, the joke starts to not be funny. So you have to be careful that you're not throwing the baby out with the bath water.
quotes.author: Ridley Scott

quotes.text: I knew I was an unwanted baby when I saw that my bath toys were a toaster and a radio.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.text: I could tell my parents hated me. My bath toys were a toaster and a radio.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: If you sit in a bath of pineapple chunks, it can kill you. That's well documented.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.text: I think a lot of contemplation happens in bathtubs. It does for me. Nothing like a hot bath to ease the tension and think about what's going to happen next.
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.text: Your best ideas, those eureka moments that turn the world upside down, seldom come when you're juggling emails, rushing to meet the 5 P.M. deadline or straining to make your voice heard in a high-stress meeting. They come when you're walking the dog, soaking in the bath or swinging in a hammock.
quotes.author: Carl Honore

quotes.text: If you go out on the Appalachian Trail, you have to bring so much more equipment - a tent, sleeping bag - but if you go hiking in England, or Europe, generally, towns and villages are near enough together at the end of the day you can always go to a nice little inn and have a hot bath and something to drink.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.text: The truth is, you know, we need our anodynes. You know that word, anodynes? We need that in life some times. A good warm bath can be one for you, or a whatever.
quotes.author: Al Pacino

quotes.text: You can often wash your troubles away with the right kind of bath. Throw everything you have into the tub: bubble gels, bubble oils, bubble powders, bubble gum.
quotes.author: Henry Beard

quotes.text: It's important not to lay in a bubble bath drinking champagne. It's important to take part in what life's all about.
quotes.author: Lena Olin

quotes.text: Every man has a right to a Saturday night bath.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.text: If you go long enough without a bath, even the fleas will leave you alone.
quotes.author: Ernie Pyle

quotes.text: My evening really begins when I take a long, hot bath. I light a candle, and I turn on the news and try to catch up. It's when I can breathe from the day to the night, and that means a lot to me.
quotes.author: Vera Wang

quotes.text: Much of my reading time over the last decade and a half has been spent reading aloud to my children. Those children's bedtime rituals of supper, bath, stories, and sleep have been a staple of my life and some of the best, most special times I can remember.
quotes.author: Louise Brown

quotes.text: Now I meditate twice a day for half an hour. In meditation, I can let go of everything. I'm not Hugh Jackman. I'm not a dad. I'm not a husband. I'm just dipping into that powerful source that creates everything. I take a little bath in it.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.text: It's just an ice bucket with a bottle in it. The two flute glasses are little tray. I got to shut the curtains. I'm in my boxer shorts and shirt. I'm going to take a bath and go to bed. But I want to shut the blinds so it's really dark in the room.
quotes.author: Danny DeVito

quotes.text: I was always with a single mom, and we never had schedules or anything. We were just Bohemian, us against the world, which was kind of great, but it certainly didn't breed security. I've gotten hyper-sensitive to schedules and bath time and eating at the dinner table. We don't just 'Bohemian' go out at nine o'clock and go get Chinese food.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.text: When life catches up with us, we all need space to dream and indulge, so I have created my own special range of bath & beauty loveliness to help you find your happy place.
quotes.author: Zoe Sugg

quotes.text: Existentialism means that no one else can take a bath for you.
quotes.author: Delmore Schwartz

quotes.text: There are times when I have to take, I call it a 'silence bath,' where I shut off all of the external gadgets. I go walk around, talk to people, and just live life for a while.
quotes.author: Patton Oswalt

quotes.text: There is just something about starting your day with something luxurious like a bath.
quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

quotes.text: I love to have a bath with beautiful, relaxing music on and have no rush to do anything. It's a wonderful indulgence, and it helps me to calm down and stop my mind running overtime.
quotes.author: Kylie Minogue

quotes.text: Basically my wife was immature. I'd be at home in the bath and she'd come in and sink my boats.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: I used to lie between cool, clean sheets at night after I'd had a bath, after I had washed my hair and scrubbed my knuckles and finger-nails and teeth. Then I could lie quite still in the dark with my face to the window with the trees in it, and talk to God.
quotes.author: Frances Farmer

quotes.text: Right now I'm just delighted to be alive and to have had a nice long bath.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.text: I'm obsessed with cleanliness for myself, so I will take a bath three times a day, sometimes a steam twice a day in addition to that.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.text: Last Wednesday, I stupidly dropped my iPhone in the bath, and my life has sort of spiraled almost out of control.
quotes.author: Patrick Stewart

quotes.text: I like to give my inhibitions a bath now and then.
quotes.author: Oliver Reed

quotes.text: I think I'll take a bath in his blood.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: I'm really old-fashioned. An Epsom salt bath, that's genuinely better than any massage.
quotes.author: Emilia Clarke

quotes.text: I find a bath meditative and usually prepare myself for the day in this manner.
quotes.author: Tom Ford

quotes.text: I've never been a hands-on dad. I'm not ashamed to admit it, but you can't run a restaurant and be home for tea at 4:30 and bath and change nappies.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.text: I'm a big bath person.
quotes.author: Bethenny Frankel

quotes.text: I really enjoy making sure the kids get a healthy dinner, a good bath and several books... I really like to try and end the day with some quality time with my kids. If not, I feel guilty.
quotes.author: Norah O'Donnell

quotes.text: An election is a moral horror, as bad as a battle except for the blood; a mud bath for every soul concerned in it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Most of the time it's the parents who recognise me. They try to tell their kids, 'Look, it's Giselle,' and I say, 'No, no, no, don't ruin this for them,' because I'm usually standing there with my hair sideways and no make-up on. And the kid is saying, 'That is not Giselle. No way. That is some worn-out girl who really needs a bath.'
quotes.author: Amy Adams

quotes.text: The Enlightenment was an attempt to liberate myth and base truth claims on evidence, not just dogma. But when science threw out the church, they threw out the baby with the bath water.
quotes.author: Ken Wilber

quotes.text: All a woman needs is a good bath, clean clothes, and for her hair to be combed. These things she can do herself. I very seldom go to the hairdresser, but when I do, I just marvel.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.text: Everything is a miracle. It is a miracle that one does not dissolve in one's bath like a lump of sugar.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: If you get stuck, get away from your desk. Take a walk, take a bath, go to sleep, make a pie, draw, listen to music, meditate, exercise; whatever you do, don't just stick there scowling at the problem. But don't make telephone calls or go to a party; if you do, other people's words will pour in where your lost words should be.
quotes.author: Hilary Mantel

quotes.text: They tell me a revival is only temporary; so is a bath, but it does you good.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.text: You go to a show, and there's no food at all, so if you're doing shows back to back, you can forget eating. I remember standing up in the bath one day, and there was a mirror in front of me, and I was so thin! I hated it. I never liked being that skinny.
quotes.author: Kate Moss

quotes.text: As scientists, we track down all promising leads, and there's reason to suspect that our universe may be one of many - a single bubble in a huge bubble bath of other universes.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.text: Before competition, I always take an ice bath to make my body feel more refreshed. Then I always have coffee with a little cream and sugar. It's a superstitious thing.
quotes.author: McKayla Maroney

quotes.text: I've got this thing for spicy stuff. Now, if you give me hot chocolate with chili pepper, a book and a bubble bath, I'm a happy girl.
quotes.author: Shiloh Walker

quotes.text: You can't have an energy policy that means you can only have a bath when the wind blows.
quotes.author: Jim Ratcliffe

quotes.text: To unwind after training, I love to have a long hot soak in the bath, then veg out on the sofa with a box set. I'm a box-set junkie! I absolutely love 'Grey's Anatomy.'
quotes.author: Jessica Ennis

quotes.text: I have no plans to rock myself to sleep in my bath chair yet.
quotes.author: Bruce Forsyth

quotes.text: Christ hath instituted Baptism as a bath, to wash away the anger, and hath put into us the Noble Stone, viz. the water of eternal life, for an earnest-penny, so that instantly in our childhood we might be able to escape the wrath.
quotes.author: Jakob Bohme

quotes.text: Californians are people who insist on growing their own vegetables, but they won't dig up the pretty lawn, won't plant anything for fear of getting dirty, and they use fragrant bath salts from The Body Shop instead of smelly compost.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: In my heart, I'm just a kid from the council houses. I can remember the old cottage and my dad coming round with the tin bath. I'm not a rich man.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: Our cellar home had a kitchen and a combination bedroom and half bath, which meant we had a sink next to the bed. We had no refrigerator, no shower or tub, and no privacy. My parents shared the bedroom with my sister and me.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: Field hockey is my strongest sport, and if I lose a game, I take a long, hot bath and moan about it.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.text: I've been told the weirdest things: 'Yeah, I love taking a bath to your music!' or 'I gave birth to my daughter while listening to your music.'
quotes.author: Norah Jones

quotes.text: I love a long bath. I love anything creative. I love decorating. I even love just flipping through magazines and vegging out for a while. But I'm also one of those people who loves to work, so I'll sing, dance, work on my next performance, or write whomever it may be about a new idea.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.text: Elizabeth Taylor taught me that if you do your hair and makeup first then take a hot bath right before you leave, it brings out your inner glow and takes away the powdery look from makeup. I do that right before every date.
quotes.author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quotes.text: Routines may include taking a warm bath or a relaxing walk in the evening, or practicing meditation/relaxation exercises. Psychologically, the completion of such a practice tells your mind and body that the day's work is over and you are free to relax and sleep.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.text: You don't want to take the world over with a whole hamper full of dirty clothes. That's the main thing people overlook. And take a shower, take a bath every day.
quotes.author: J. B. Smoove

quotes.text: Most days, I have a slice of toast, then lie in a hot bath for an hour to get up a sweat. I have a sauna at the racecourse and then go and ride. On the way home, I might stop at a service station and have a bar of chocolate and a Diet Coke. And that's it, basically.
quotes.author: Tony McCoy

quotes.text: I love a warm bath at the end of a day.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nixon

quotes.text: This may sound funny, but I feel my most beautiful when I'm clean, fresh out of the bath. I don't have to be dressed up. I could be in comfy clothes at home hanging out with my family.
quotes.author: Faith Hill

quotes.text: I like to have a massage therapist come to my house, get a massage, take a bath, go to bed. That's a perfect night alone for me.
quotes.author: Stacy Keibler

quotes.text: I live on the edge of Bath. It's really lovely, but its very loveliness freaks me out a bit. It's peaceful, a great antidote to the craziness of being on tour, but sometimes I feel as though I've retired.
quotes.author: Alison Goldfrapp

quotes.text: And takin' a bath in the creek. That's the stuff that really made it worthwhile. Anybody can stay in a motel.
quotes.author: Chris LeDoux

quotes.text: I daily disconnect and read a good book or listen to a good sermon or call a friend or my mom and talk on the phone with my feet up. I also take baths with bath salts that I make myself.
quotes.author: Kim Alexis

quotes.text: Bath twice a day to be really clean, once a day to be passably clean, once a week to avoid being a public menace.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.text: When I was 17, I had my first proper girlfriend, and on Valentine's Day, I painted a canvas of her, bought her a massage, put flowers on the stairs, and ran a bath.
quotes.author: Tom Cullen

quotes.text: A conventional good read is usually a bad read, a relaxing bath in what we know already. A true good read is surely an act of innovative creation in which we, the readers, become conspirators.
quotes.author: Augustine Birrell

quotes.text: Yesterday's the past, tomorrow's the future, but today is a gift. That's why it's called the present.
quotes.author: Bil Keane

quotes.text: No matter how busy you are, you must take time to make the other person feel important.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.text: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.text: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.text: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Lost time is never found again.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.text: You can fool all the people some of the time, and some of the people all the time, but you cannot fool all the people all the time.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players: they have their exits and their entrances; and one man in his time plays many parts, his acts being seven ages.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: You may delay, but time will not.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.text: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.text: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Time sometimes flies like a bird, sometimes crawls like a snail; but a man is happiest when he does not even notice whether it passes swiftly or slowly.
quotes.author: Ivan Turgenev

quotes.text: We must use time wisely and forever realize that the time is always ripe to do right.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: If you don't have time to do it right, when will you have time to do it over?
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Time moves in one direction, memory in another.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.text: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

quotes.text: Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Lost - yesterday, somewhere between sunrise and sunset, two golden hours, each set with sixty diamond minutes. No reward is offered, for they are gone forever.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.text: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.text: Most people spend more time and energy going around problems than in trying to solve them.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: How did it get so late so soon? Its night before its afternoon. December is here before its June. My goodness how the time has flewn. How did it get so late so soon?
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
quotes.author: Theophrastus

quotes.text: We are so obsessed with doing that we have no time and no imagination left for being. As a result, men are valued not for what they are but for what they do or what they have - for their usefulness.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.text: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of 60 minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: Time will pass and seasons will come and go.
quotes.author: Roy Bean

quotes.text: Know the true value of time; snatch, seize, and enjoy every moment of it. No idleness, no laziness, no procrastination: never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
quotes.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quotes.text: The only thing wrong with immortality is that it tends to go on forever.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.text: It is strange that the years teach us patience; that the shorter our time, the greater our capacity for waiting.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.text: I want to go ahead of Father Time with a scythe of my own.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.text: Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.text: The past always looks better than it was. It's only pleasant because it isn't here.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.text: Time was God's first creation.
quotes.author: Walter Lang

quotes.text: Time is the school in which we learn, time is the fire in which we burn.
quotes.author: Delmore Schwartz

quotes.text: Work is hard. Distractions are plentiful. And time is short.
quotes.author: Adam Hochschild

quotes.text: Put two ships in the open sea, without wind or tide, and, at last, they will come together. Throw two planets into space, and they will fall one on the other. Place two enemies in the midst of a crowd, and they will inevitably meet; it is a fatality, a question of time; that is all.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.text: The time I kill is killing me.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.text: We must use time as a tool, not as a couch.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Time is a sort of river of passing events, and strong is its current; no sooner is a thing brought to sight than it is swept by and another takes its place, and this too will be swept away.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: There are no secrets that time does not reveal.
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.text: Time is a circus, always packing up and moving away.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.text: I must govern the clock, not be governed by it.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.text: Time is a dressmaker specializing in alterations.
quotes.author: Faith Baldwin

quotes.text: Procrastination is the thief of time.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.text: Eternity: a moment standing still for ever.
quotes.author: James Montgomery

quotes.text: But time growing old teaches all things.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.text: Time brings all things to pass.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.text: Time is the father of truth, its mother is our mind.
quotes.author: Giordano Bruno

quotes.text: We have not the time to take our time.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.text: The clock talked loud. I threw it away, it scared me what it talked.
quotes.author: Tillie Olsen

quotes.text: Time goes, you say? Ah, no! alas, time stays, we go.
quotes.author: Henry Austin Dobson

quotes.text: Time is money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Time passes irrevocably.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.text: We are time's subjects, and time bids be gone.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Time is flying never to return.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.text: For time is the longest distance between two places.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.text: Punctuality is the virtue of the bored.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.text: When Time is spent, Eternity begins.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.text: Time = Life, Therefore, waste your time and waste of your life, or master your time and master your life.
quotes.author: Alan Lakein

quotes.text: There's time enough, but none to spare.
quotes.author: Charles W. Chesnutt

quotes.text: The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I went to a restaurant that serves 'breakfast at any time'. So I ordered French Toast during the Renaissance.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.text: Don't let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it. The time will pass anyway; we might just as well put that passing time to the best possible use.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.text: Nobody sees a flower really; it is so small. We haven't time, and to see takes time - like to have a friend takes time.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.text: Time and tide wait for no man.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.text: Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
quotes.author: Michael LeBoeuf

quotes.text: Time is but the stream I go a-fishing in.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Time abides long enough for those who make use of it.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: The present time has one advantage over every other - it is our own.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.text: All our sweetest hours fly fastest.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.text: The best way to fill time is to waste it.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.text: Perfection is the child of time.
quotes.author: Joseph Hall

quotes.text: We must use time creatively.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Let the refining and improving of your own life keep you so busy that you have little time to criticize others.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: Well-timed silence is the most commanding expression.
quotes.author: Mark Helprin

quotes.text: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: We need to find God, and he cannot be found in noise and restlessness. God is the friend of silence. See how nature - trees, flowers, grass- grows in silence; see the stars, the moon and the sun, how they move in silence... We need silence to be able to touch souls.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: When I admire the wonders of a sunset or the beauty of the moon, my soul expands in the worship of the creator.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.text: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: You can be the moon and still be jealous of the stars.
quotes.author: Gary Allan

quotes.text: There are nights when the wolves are silent and only the moon howls.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: Modern science says: 'The sun is the past, the earth is the present, the moon is the future.' From an incandescent mass we have originated, and into a frozen mass we shall turn. Merciless is the law of nature, and rapidly and irresistibly we are drawn to our doom.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: Summer ends, and Autumn comes, and he who would have it otherwise would have high tide always and a full moon every night.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.text: In awe, I watched the waxing moon ride across the zenith of the heavens like an ambered chariot towards the ebony void of infinite space wherein the tethered belts of Jupiter and Mars hang, for ever festooned in their orbital majesty. And as I looked at all this I thought... I must put a roof on this toilet.
quotes.author: Les Dawson

quotes.text: And Fall, with her yeller harvest moon and the hills growin' brown and golden under a sinkin' sun.
quotes.author: Roy Bean

quotes.text: The soles of Neil Armstrong's boots on the moon made permanent impressions on our souls and in our national psyche. Ann and I watched those steps together on her parent's sofa. Like all Americans we went to bed that night knowing we lived in the greatest country in the history of the world. God bless Neil Armstrong.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: You cannot look up at the night sky on the Planet Earth and not wonder what it's like to be up there amongst the stars. And I always look up at the moon and see it as the single most romantic place within the cosmos.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.text: When I was 5 years old, we had nothing in the village. One day, in front of my house, some soldiers in a big Cadillac started to do a picnic. I looked at them like they were coming from the moon. I remember they gave me a box of rice pudding - that, for me, was the American Dream.
quotes.author: Renzo Rosso

quotes.text: There is a side of the Moon which we never see, but that hidden half is as potent a factor in causing the ebb and flow of the Earth's tide as the part of the Moon which is visible.
quotes.author: Max Heindel

quotes.text: The moon is bland in color. I call it shades of gray. You know, the only color we see is what we bring or the Earth, which is looking down upon us all the time. And to find orange soil on the moon was a surprise.
quotes.author: Eugene Cernan

quotes.text: With just one polka dot, nothing can be achieved. In the universe, there is the sun, the moon, the earth, and hundreds of millions of stars. All of us live in the unfathomable mystery and infinitude of the universe. Pursuing 'philosophy of the universe' through art under such circumstances has led me to what I call 'stereotypical repetition.'
quotes.author: Yayoi Kusama

quotes.text: Perhaps the two greatest moments of my life were standing on the moon and being outside of the room when my granddaughter was born! We tend not to remember the worst.
quotes.author: Eugene Cernan

quotes.text: I used to play too with a boy who played a saxophone. We didn't play no blues, we'd play a lot of love songs - 'Stardust', 'Blue Moon', 'Out Cold Again', 'Sophisticated Lady', 'Stars Fell On Alabama', a lot of different stuff.
quotes.author: David Edwards

quotes.text: I was only a hero by default. The flights were few and far between. There weren't that many astronauts. The moon flights were so interesting and exciting.
quotes.author: Jim Lovell

quotes.text: If you're going to go to the moon, you don't shoot the rocket right at the moon. You have to go at it obliquely.
quotes.author: Drew Houston

quotes.text: I grew up watching a lot of the coverage of the early U.S. space program, all the way back starting with Mercury and then through Gemini and Apollo and of course going to the moon as the main part of the Apollo program.
quotes.author: Linda M. Godwin

quotes.text: For most people, we often marvel at the beauty of a sunrise or the magnificence of a full moon, but it is impossible to fathom the magnitude of the universe that surrounds us.
quotes.author: Richard H. Baker

quotes.text: When Kennedy said, 'Let's go to the moon,' we didn't yet have a vehicle that wouldn't kill you on launch. He said we'll land a man on the moon in eight years and bring him back. That was an audacious goal to put forth in front of the American people.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: It has been said, by engineers themselves, that given enough money, they can accomplish virtually anything: send men to the moon, dig a tunnel under the English Channel. There's no reason they couldn't likewise devise ways to protect infrastructure from the worst hurricanes, earthquakes and other calamities, natural and manmade.
quotes.author: Henry Petroski

quotes.text: There was a different ending to 'New Moon' originally. It was a much quieter book. It was very much all in Bella's head.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.text: Landing on the moon was a dream that millions of kids have had for hundreds of years.
quotes.author: Rusty Schweickart

quotes.text: If China was like the moon, then arriving in Saudi Arabia was Mars. At least you can see the moon from Earth.
quotes.author: Basmah bint Saud

quotes.text: 'Little Night' has layers of meaning. There's something enchanted about night. All those heavenly bodies, shooting stars, the crescent moon, celestial phenomenon. Owls fly at night, and first kisses happen. Night is romantic. Alternately, darkness hides the worst of human behavior.
quotes.author: Luanne Rice

quotes.text: Whenever I gaze up at the moon, I feel like I'm on a time machine. I am back to that precious pinpoint of time, standing on the foreboding - yet beautiful - Sea of Tranquility. I could see our shining blue planet Earth poised in the darkness of space.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.text: A factory that can turn carbon nanotubes into a sheet a yard wide and long enough to stretch one-fourth of the way to the moon is not something you'll find at your local industrial park. That's the show-stopper for the space elevator. The ribbon.
quotes.author: Seth Shostak

quotes.text: No one's played on the moon yet. No one's played in zero gravity. Some bands have played at the Pyramids of Giza, but we'd very much like to do that in the near future.
quotes.author: Brandon Boyd

quotes.text: The Dark Side of the Moon has flash - the true flash that comes from the excellence of a superb performance.
quotes.author: Alan Parsons

quotes.text: The moon is very rugged.
quotes.author: Alan Bean

quotes.text: Another thing that I don't like to do is show too much how it goes. I do it once in a blue moon. Sometimes there are lessons when I don't pick up a violin at all.
quotes.author: Itzhak Perlman

quotes.text: The child often sees only what he already knows. He projects the whole of his verbal thought into things. He sees mountains as built by men, rivers as dug out with spades, the sun and moon as following us on our walks.
quotes.author: Jean Piaget

quotes.text: I've never felt like I was born with a silver spoon at all, although I've felt like howling at the moon a lot of times!
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.text: Globalisation means many other countries are asserting themselves and trying to take over leadership. Please don't ask Americans to let others assume the leadership of human exploration. We can do wonderful science on the Moon, and wonderful commercial things. Then we can pack up and move on to Mars.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.text: The day will dawn when all the people of Ireland will have the desire for freedom to show. It is then we'll see the rising of the moon.
quotes.author: Bobby Sands

quotes.text: The soldiers did go away and their towns were torn down; and in the Moon of Falling Leaves (November), they made a treaty with Red Cloud that said our country would be ours as long as grass should grow and water flow.
quotes.author: Black Elk

quotes.text: I can honestly say - and it's a big surprise to me - that I have never had a dream about being on the moon.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.text: They won't break me because the desire for freedom, and the freedom of the Irish people, is in my heart. The day will dawn when all the people of Ireland will have the desire for freedom to show. It is then that we will see the rising of the moon.
quotes.author: Bobby Sands

quotes.text: I think we're going to the moon because it's in the nature of the human being to face challenges. It's by the nature of his deep inner soul... we're required to do these things just as salmon swim upstream.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.text: I'm probably the only one in the world you can name that's worked with Billie Holiday, Louie Armstrong, Ella, Duke, Miles, Dizzy, Ray Charles, Aretha, Michael Jackson, rappers. 'Fly Me to the Moon' was played on the moon by Buzz Aldrin. Sinatra. Paul Simon. Tony Bennett. I'm the only one.
quotes.author: Quincy Jones

quotes.text: The supermoon is a 16-inch pizza compared with a 15-inch pizza. It's a slightly bigger moon; I ain't using the adjective 'supermoon.'
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: The Moon is a ball of left-over debris from a cosmic collision that took place more than four billion years ago. A Mars-sized asteroid - one of the countless planetesimals that were frantically churning our solar system into existence - hit the infant Earth, bequeathing it a very large natural satellite.
quotes.author: Seth Shostak

quotes.text: Nobody can take those footsteps I made on the surface of the moon away from me.
quotes.author: Eugene Cernan

quotes.text: The moon is brighter since the barn burned.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.text: I started off with a company, InfoSpace, with my own funding. The company was listed among the most successful companies and I went on to start Intelius and Moon Express. Now, I focus my time on using the skills of an entrepreneur to solve many of the grand challenges facing us in the areas of education, healthcare, clean water and energy.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.text: The moon was a ghostly galleon tossed upon cloudy seas.
quotes.author: Alfred Noyes

quotes.text: The Moon! Artemis! the great goddess of the splendid past of men! Are you going to tell me she is a dead lump?
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.text: It's very dangerous to put astronauts on a moon base where there's radiation, solar flares and micro meteorites. It'd be much better to put robots on the moon and have them mentally connected to astronauts on the Earth.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.text: I promise to be an excellent husband, but give me a wife who, like the moon, will not appear every day in my sky.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.text: The day, water, sun, moon, night - I do not have to purchase these things with money.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.text: Everything has a natural explanation. The moon is not a god, but a great rock, and the sun a hot rock.
quotes.author: Anaxagoras

quotes.text: I am going to notice the lights of the earth, the sun and the moon and the stars, the lights of our candles as we march, the lights with which spring teases us, the light that is already present.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: Since my childhood, I have always made works with polka dots. Earth, moon, sun and human beings all represent dots; a single particle among billions.
quotes.author: Yayoi Kusama

quotes.text: I love to think that animals and humans and plants and fishes and trees and stars and the moon are all connected.
quotes.author: Gloria Vanderbilt

quotes.text: The Sun, Moon and Stars are there to guide us.
quotes.author: Dennis Banks

quotes.text: The faults of a superior person are like the sun and moon. They have their faults, and everyone sees them; they change and everyone looks up to them.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Five centuries from now - barring unimaginable catastrophe - the moon will be developed real estate. There's economic incentive to exploit the moon - the helium-3 will be useful in powering fusion reactors, and the rare earth elements could supplant the limited terrestrial supply of these materials.
quotes.author: Seth Shostak

quotes.text: If the Sun and Moon should ever doubt, they'd immediately go out.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: As a young boy growing up in rural India, most of what I knew of the world was what I could see around me. But each night, I would look at the Moon - it was impossibly far away, yet it held a special attraction because it allowed me to dream beyond my village and country, and think about the rest of the world and space.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.text: You've got the sun, you've got the moon, and you've got the Rolling Stones.
quotes.author: Keith Richards

quotes.text: I've never seen a moon in the sky that, if it didn't take my breath away, at least misplaced it for a moment.
quotes.author: Colin Farrell

quotes.text: The lunar flights give you a correct perception of our existence. You look back at Earth from the moon, and you can put your thumb up to the window and hide the Earth behind your thumb. Everything you've ever known is behind your thumb, and that blue-and-white ball is orbiting a rather normal star, tucked away on the outer edge of a galaxy.
quotes.author: Jim Lovell

quotes.text: The wailing owl Screams solitary to the mournful moon.
quotes.author: David Mallet

quotes.text: To an observer situated on the moon or on one of the planets, the most noticeable feature on the surface of our globe would no doubt be the large areas covered by oceanic water. The sunlit face of the earth would appear to shine by the light diffused back into space from the land and water-covered areas.
quotes.author: C. V. Raman

quotes.text: By refocusing our space program on Mars for America's future, we can restore the sense of wonder and adventure in space exploration that we knew in the summer of 1969. We won the moon race; now it's time for us to live and work on Mars, first on its moons and then on its surface.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.text: There's a historical milestone in the fact that our Apollo 11 landing on the moon took place a mere 66 years after the Wright Brothers' first flight.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.text: Human evolution, at first, seems extraordinary. How could the process that gave rise to slugs and oak trees and fish produce a creature that can fly to the moon and invent the Internet and cross the ocean in boats?
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.text: The stars look the same from night to night. Nebulae and galaxies are dully immutable, maintaining the same overall appearance for thousands or millions of years. Indeed, only the sun, moon and planets - together with the occasional comet, asteroid or meteor - seem dynamic.
quotes.author: Seth Shostak

quotes.text: Never say no when a client asks for something, even if it is the moon. You can always try, and anyhow there is plenty of time afterwards to explain that it was not possible.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: In spite of the opinions of certain narrow-minded people, who would shut up the human race upon this globe, as within some magic circle it must never outstep, we shall one day travel to the moon, the planets, and the stars, with the same facility, rapidity, and certainty as we now make the voyage from Liverpool to New York!
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.text: Don't tell me the moon is shining; show me the glint of light on broken glass.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.text: Life is too short to not have fun; we are only here for a short time compared to the sun and the moon and all that.
quotes.author: Coolio

quotes.text: If you strive for the moon, maybe you'll get over the fence.
quotes.author: James Woods

quotes.text: I don't need a holiday or a feast to feel grateful for my children, the sun, the moon, the roof over my head, music, and laughter, but I like to take this time to take the path of thanks less traveled.
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.text: Over the tops of it, beginning to dusk under a young white moon, trailed a wavering ghost of smoke, and at the end of it I came upon the Pocket Hunter making a dry camp in the friendly scrub.
quotes.author: Mary Hunter Austin

quotes.text: I don't want to give advice to people about their religious beliefs, but I do think that it's not smart to bet against the power of science to figure out the natural world. It used to be, a thousand years ago, that if you wanted to explain why the moon moved through the sky, you needed to invoke God.
quotes.author: Sean M. Carroll

quotes.text: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: The thing to do, it seems to me, is to prepare yourself so you can be a rainbow in somebody else's cloud. Somebody who may not look like you. May not call God the same name you call God - if they call God at all. I may not dance your dances or speak your language. But be a blessing to somebody. That's what I think.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Behind every cloud is another cloud.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.text: Accidents on big mountains happen when people's ambitions cloud their good judgment. Good climbing is about climbing with heart and with instinct, not ambition and pride.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.text: Why is Cloud 9 so amazing? What is wrong with Cloud 8? That joke came off the top of my head, and the top of my head ain't funny!
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.text: I can be jubilant one moment and pensive the next, and a cloud could go by and make that happen.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: And I cannot tell you how much I appreciate that because the days are long, the road is hard, the trials are there and I never know when, I have this little gray cloud that's over my head, when it's gonna start raining on me again. And I do need everyone's prayers. But I also believe that we're here for a purpose, and Mitt is prepared.
quotes.author: Ann Romney

quotes.text: A lot of the records you buy, there's nothing you can hold in your hand, it's all 1's and 0's, this digital cloud floating in the ether. but with analog albums, you can hold it in your hand.
quotes.author: Dave Grohl

quotes.text: When I wrote 'The World Is Flat,' I said the world is flat. Yeah, we're all connected. Facebook didn't exist; Twitter was a sound; the cloud was in the sky; 4G was a parking place; LinkedIn was a prison; applications were what you sent to college; and Skype, for most people, was a typo.
quotes.author: Thomas Friedman

quotes.text: Every cloud has its silver lining but it is sometimes a little difficult to get it to the mint.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.text: I'm somewhat in my own cloud.
quotes.author: Karlie Kloss

quotes.text: It is intellectually dishonest to look backwards with all the facts and judge the decisions that were made with almost none of the facts, or the facts that existed hidden in the normal cloud of endless speculation of what might happen.
quotes.author: Norm Coleman

quotes.text: The cloud never comes from the quarter of the horizon from which we watch for it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quotes.text: Do not give up your dream because it is apparently not being realized, because you cannot see it coming true. Cling to your vision with all the tenacity you can muster. Keep it bright; do not let the bread-and-butter side of life cloud your ideal or dim it.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.text: There is no cloud above my head - there is not even a mist.
quotes.author: Jacob Zuma

quotes.text: The soldiers did go away and their towns were torn down; and in the Moon of Falling Leaves (November), they made a treaty with Red Cloud that said our country would be ours as long as grass should grow and water flow.
quotes.author: Black Elk

quotes.text: I believe cats to be spirits come to earth. A cat, I am sure, could walk on a cloud without coming through.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.text: I try and stay positive; being negative isn't good for my personality. I don't just bring myself down, I bring everyone around me down. It's like a dark cloud, 'Uh oh, here we go,' and have to snap out of it.
quotes.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quotes.text: I will try to cram these paragraphs full of facts and give them a weight and shape no greater than that of a cloud of blue butterflies.
quotes.author: Brendan Gill

quotes.text: I have to admit it: I'm not a huge fan of the cloud computing concept.
quotes.author: Jamais Cascio

quotes.text: Nature is a mutable cloud which is always and never the same.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: From my childhood I had been intended for the clergy. This prospect hung like a dark cloud on my mind.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: There's a bright spot in every dark cloud.
quotes.author: Bruce Beresford

quotes.text: A cloud is made of billows upon billows upon billows that look like clouds. As you come closer to a cloud you don't get something smooth, but irregularities at a smaller scale.
quotes.author: Benoit Mandelbrot

quotes.text: Shining through tears, like April suns in showers, that labour to overcome the cloud that loads 'em.
quotes.author: Thomas Otway

quotes.text: We can think so much about life and take ourselves so seriously; I mean, I like to tell people, 'Don't take life too seriously' because you'll cloud the experience. That's what the meaning of life is to me - being able to enjoy the moment.
quotes.author: Janine Shepherd

quotes.text: We'll continue to expand our footprint... Oracle's Fusion cloud applications for HCM, CRM and ERP all have a new simplified user interface and an integrated social network that makes our enterprise applications as easy-to-use and familiar as Facebook, while enabling better collaboration and teamwork among your employees and your customers.
quotes.author: Larry Ellison

quotes.text: Above the cloud with its shadow is the star with its light. Above all things reverence thyself.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.text: If you learned how to make a cloud, your time is not wasted.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: A dark cloud is no sign that the sun has lost his light; and dark black convictions are no arguments that God has laid aside His mercy.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: America must not ignore the threat gathering against us. Facing clear evidence of peril, we cannot wait for the final proof, the smoking gun that could come in the form of a mushroom cloud.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.text: A lost election can have the jolt of a drop through the gallows door, leading to a dark night of the soul in which the future presses down like a cloud that will never lift.
quotes.author: James Wolcott

quotes.text: The day I will never forget is the day I married my wife, Tashera. Tashera is so special to my boys and me. Her energy is enough to put anyone on a cloud. Her dedication and care gives me comfort and ease.
quotes.author: DMX

quotes.text: We think a modern cloud lets you decide when you want to upgrade. We don't decide for you.
quotes.author: Larry Ellison

quotes.text: They don't call it the Internet anymore, they call it cloud computing. I'm no longer resisting the name. Call it what you want.
quotes.author: Larry Ellison

quotes.text: The interesting thing about cloud computing is that we've redefined cloud computing to include everything that we already do.
quotes.author: Richard Stallman

quotes.text: We inherit every one of our genes, but we leave the womb without a single microbe. As we pass through our mother's birth canal, we begin to attract entire colonies of bacteria. By the time a child can crawl, he has been blanketed by an enormous, unseen cloud of microorganisms - a hundred trillion or more.
quotes.author: Michael Specter

quotes.text: Cloud computing means you are doing your computing on somebody else's computer. Looking ahead a little, I firmly believe cloud - previously called grid computing - will become very widespread. It's much cheaper than buying your own computing infrastructure, or maybe you don't have the power to do what you want on your own computer.
quotes.author: Whitfield Diffie

quotes.text: Happiness is like a cloud, if you stare at it long enough, it evaporates.
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.text: The world is being re-shaped by the convergence of social, mobile, cloud, big data, community and other powerful forces. The combination of these technologies unlocks an incredible opportunity to connect everything together in a new way and is dramatically transforming the way we live and work.
quotes.author: Marc Benioff

quotes.text: Every silver lining has a cloud.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.text: It's almost like a lot of black people in America, a lot of young black men, are born with this cloud over their heads. It's their penitentiary cloud, this philosophy we all have, that it's harder for us.
quotes.author: Erykah Badu

quotes.text: I fell off my pink cloud with a thud.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.text: In Texas it's always hot, dry, sunny, not a cloud in the sky.
quotes.author: Piper Perabo

quotes.text: The problem here is that there will always be some uncertainty about how quickly Saddam can acquire nuclear weapons. But we don't want the smoking gun to be a mushroom cloud.
quotes.author: Condoleezza Rice

quotes.text: The writer is a mysterious figure, wandering lonely as a cloud, fired by inspiration, or perhaps a cocktail or two.
quotes.author: Sara Sheridan

quotes.text: Now suddenly there was nothing but a world of cloud, and we three were there alone in the middle of a great white plain with snowy hills and mountains staring at us; and it was very still; but there were whispers.
quotes.author: Black Elk

quotes.text: Traveling, you realize that differences are lost: each city takes to resembling all cities, places exchange their form, order, distances, a shapeless dust cloud invades the continents.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.text: If I win seven tournaments in a row, I get so confident I'm in a cloud. A loss gets me eager again.
quotes.author: Chris Evert

quotes.text: I started in time-sharing and networking with packet switching, which was the precursor to what became the Internet. Time-shared use on packet-switch networks, when you think about it, is the cloud.
quotes.author: Audrey MacLean

quotes.text: Were I a cloud I'd gather My skirts up in the air, And fly well know whither, And rest I well know where.
quotes.author: Robert Bridges

quotes.text: Some astronauts describe the routine flushing of urine into space, where the freezing temperatures turn the droplets into a cloud of bright, drifting crystals, as being among the most amazing sights they saw on an entire voyage.
quotes.author: Eugene Cernan

quotes.text: My children, as long as you live, the shadow of the Hiss Case will brush you. In every pair of eyes that rests on you, you will see pass, like a cloud passing behind a woods in winter, the memory of your father - dissembled in friendly eyes, lurking in unfriendly eyes.
quotes.author: Whittaker Chambers

quotes.text: Cloud computing offers individuals access to data and applications from nearly any point of access to the Internet, offers businesses a whole new way to cut costs for technical infrastructure, and offers big computer companies a potentially giant market for hardware and services.
quotes.author: Jamais Cascio

quotes.text: The cloud of doubt that surrounds political figures tends to remain and never dissipate or be clarified.
quotes.author: Bob Woodward

quotes.text: Oracle's latest database, version 12c, was specifically designed for the cloud. Oracle 12c makes all your Oracle applications multitenant applications without you having to make any changes whatsoever to your applications.
quotes.author: Larry Ellison

quotes.text: Nothing good bursts forth all at once. The lightning may dart out of a black cloud; but the day sends his bright heralds before him, to prepare the world for his coming.
quotes.author: Augustus Hare

quotes.text: Misfortune is never mournful to the soul that accepts it; for such do always see that every cloud is an angel's face.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.text: Many people can rightfully claim, as much as anyone can rightfully claim anything, that much of their lives have been spent stumbling through a cloud of cluelessness.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.text: We have been travelling through a cloud. The sky has been dark ever since the war began.
quotes.author: Black Kettle

quotes.text: In this new world, with smartphones and tablets and cloud computing, things are moving around fast.
quotes.author: Hector Ruiz

quotes.text: And the blood of brave men was shed like unto the shedding of rain from a black cloud.
quotes.author: Ferdowsi

quotes.text: Since I was 16, I've felt a black cloud hangs over me. Since then, I have taken pills for depression.
quotes.author: Amy Winehouse

quotes.text: I spent my thirties living out of boxes and moving every six months to a year. It was my cloud period: I just wandered like a cloud for ten years, following the food supply. I was a hunter, gatherer, an academic migrant.
quotes.author: Sandra Cisneros

quotes.text: If someone asks me what cloud computing is, I try not to get bogged down with definitions. I tell them that, simply put, cloud computing is a better way to run your business.
quotes.author: Marc Benioff

quotes.text: Suddenly, at about ten o'clock, a dull thud sounded somewhere far away from us, and simultaneously we saw a small white round cloud about half a mile ahead of us where the shrapnel had exploded. The battle had begun.
quotes.author: Fritz Kreisler

quotes.text: Everything is going to be connected to cloud and data... All of this will be mediated by software.
quotes.author: Satya Nadella

quotes.text: Product pricing is aligned to the way customers want to acquire their solutions and are delivered via different delivery models including appliances, the cloud, or as on-premise software solutions.
quotes.author: N. Robert Hammer

quotes.text: Since I was 16, I've felt a black cloud hangs over me.
quotes.author: Amy Winehouse

quotes.text: But what Web services suggest is that the connection is always there between an application that is resident somewhere in the cloud, and a user who is somewhere on the other end of a connection.
quotes.author: John W. Thompson

quotes.text: The cloud computing model may be a wonderful system when it works, but it's a nightmare when it fails. And the more people who come to depend upon it, the bigger the nightmare.
quotes.author: Jamais Cascio

quotes.text: It's ridiculous that time and time again we need a radioactive cloud coming out of a nuclear power-station to remind us that atomic energy is extraordinarily dangerous.
quotes.author: Pierre Schaeffer

quotes.text: Being a playwright is like the equivalent of doing a jigsaw puzzle that has 1,500 pieces, and it's a jigsaw of a blue sky. Not a cloud in sight.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.text: In 2000, when my partner Ben Horowitz was CEO of the first cloud computing company, Loudcloud, the cost of a customer running a basic Internet application was approximately $150,000 a month.
quotes.author: Marc Andreessen

quotes.text: In Hong Kong, 'wonton' means swallowing a cloud.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.text: There's a weird cloud around you when you're recognizable. It was a brief window for me. I think you have to have a pathological need for attention of any type, negative or positive, to thrive in that kind of situation. And I only want compliments.
quotes.author: Diablo Cody

quotes.text: The first real unhappiness I remember to have felt was when some one told me, one day, that I did not love God. I insisted, almost tearfully, that I did; but I was told that if I did truly love Him I should always be good. I knew I was not that, and the feeling of sudden orphanage came over me like a bewildering cloud.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.text: Elephants are highly emotional. Whatever they are feeling, they let it out immediately, and the histrionics are over and forgotten in a moment, lasting no longer than the cloud formations that are constantly coming apart and re-forming overhead. There is no guile in pachyderms.
quotes.author: Alex Shoumatoff

quotes.text: But you have to take all of those things, you have to take into consideration the paths, the roadways, how much cloud cover there is, how much foliage cover there is, whether there are streams, all of that comes into play.
quotes.author: Richard Serra

quotes.text: The Internet creates as well as destroys. Social networks, search advertising, and cloud computing are multibillion dollar industries that didn't exist 10 years ago. They are products of the same force that has rendered the Postal Service's core business obsolete.
quotes.author: John Sununu

quotes.text: The biggest competition is myself. I am not looking to follow others or pull them down. I'm planning to test my own boundaries.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: Endless effort, endless humility, endless modesty.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I was told that when I'm dancing, I give off the feeling of a rainy day.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: Although I still have a long way to go, I would like to become the pride of Asia. When another Asian artist enters the U.S. market, I would like him to think, 'There was an artist called Rain who succeeded in the U.S. market.' This is my dream.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I like junk food, French fries, hamburgers - I love it.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I love 'Enter the Dragon,' and I love Japanese movies. I love Jackie Chan movies; they are my heroes.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I want to challenge myself to see where my limit is and experiment with a lot of different films. A lot of artists from Asia focus too much on their Asian background. I don't want to let go of my background, but to be a success in the U.S., which is my goal, I realize I need to surround myself with American filmmakers and producers.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: In Korea, when I started, there wasn't a trend where people chose to be both actors and singers. I was the first to do both. It was a great deal hard work, but I got a lot of support and love from my audience. And for me to receive the same treatment overseas, I felt that I was also very lucky.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I loved ninjas when I was younger.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: The more criticism I get, the more it gives me a stronger urge to win. So I try harder.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I experienced firsthand what it means to be poor, what it means to go hungry, and that, I think, may be the reason, the root cause of why I'm able to work so hard, even these days.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I want to read a lot of comic books. I want to watch movies. I want to rest.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I dedicated my 20s, my passion and energy to the name 'Rain.' I always did my best, and I thought if I did, it would eventually show, and even if it didn't turn out well, I wouldn't have any regrets.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I've always wanted to be a singer and an actor. I will continue to concentrate on both because I love both.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: Having fans wherever I go gives me an energy, and it is the source of my power.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I learned that instead of relying on and imitating American music, there is a better chance for an Asian artist to succeed if he or she follows his or her own culture.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I was very innocent and shielded as a child, so I didn't know a lot about music or dancing. When I was in Primary Six, no one would participate in a talent show, so I decided to go on. When the audience applauded me, I felt euphoric, and I started dancing right after that!
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I'd love to continue my career in Hollywood - I'd love to do another action film, or a romantic comedy, or horror. I love horror films.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: The more times I was turned down, the more I believed I was getting closer to making it. A lot of people in Korea say that failure is the mother of success, so I believed that more times I failed, the more likely I was to succeed.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: From when I was young, I wanted to be an action hero. I always dreamed about being an action star. So finally, I made it.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I don't get my inspiration from a specific source. It's more like if you listen to a good tune, it gives me inspiration to write a better tune.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I learned how to dance every move of 'Billie Jean.'
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I love Al Pacino.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: When I was young, 'Scarface' was my favorite film. Al Pacino is my hero. I want to work with him.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: The biggest competition is myself. I am not looking to follow others or pull them down. I'm planning to test my own boundaries.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: Endless effort, endless humility, endless modesty.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I was told that when I'm dancing, I give off the feeling of a rainy day.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: Although I still have a long way to go, I would like to become the pride of Asia. When another Asian artist enters the U.S. market, I would like him to think, 'There was an artist called Rain who succeeded in the U.S. market.' This is my dream.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I like junk food, French fries, hamburgers - I love it.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I love 'Enter the Dragon,' and I love Japanese movies. I love Jackie Chan movies; they are my heroes.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I want to challenge myself to see where my limit is and experiment with a lot of different films. A lot of artists from Asia focus too much on their Asian background. I don't want to let go of my background, but to be a success in the U.S., which is my goal, I realize I need to surround myself with American filmmakers and producers.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: In Korea, when I started, there wasn't a trend where people chose to be both actors and singers. I was the first to do both. It was a great deal hard work, but I got a lot of support and love from my audience. And for me to receive the same treatment overseas, I felt that I was also very lucky.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I loved ninjas when I was younger.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: The more criticism I get, the more it gives me a stronger urge to win. So I try harder.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I experienced firsthand what it means to be poor, what it means to go hungry, and that, I think, may be the reason, the root cause of why I'm able to work so hard, even these days.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I want to read a lot of comic books. I want to watch movies. I want to rest.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I dedicated my 20s, my passion and energy to the name 'Rain.' I always did my best, and I thought if I did, it would eventually show, and even if it didn't turn out well, I wouldn't have any regrets.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I've always wanted to be a singer and an actor. I will continue to concentrate on both because I love both.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: Having fans wherever I go gives me an energy, and it is the source of my power.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: I learned that instead of relying on and imitating American music, there is a better chance for an Asian artist to succeed if he or she follows his or her own culture.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.author: Rain

I don't want to let go of my background, but to be a success in the U.S., which is my goal, I realize I need to surround myself with American filmmakers and producers.

It was a great deal hard work, but I got a lot of support and love from my audience. And for me to receive the same treatment overseas, I felt that I was also very lucky.

quotes.author: Rain

quotes.author: Rain

quotes.author: Rain

quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: From when I was young, I wanted to be an action hero. I always dreamed about being an action star. So finally, I made it.
quotes.author: Rain

quotes.text: Prayer is not asking. It is a longing of the soul. It is daily admission of one's weakness. It is better in prayer to have a heart without words than words without a heart.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Each of us has an inner dream that we can unfold if we will just have the courage to admit what it is. And the faith to trust our own admission. The admitting is often very difficult.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.text: Regret is not a proactive feeling. It is situated in disappointment, sorrow, even remorse. It merely wishes things were different without an act to cause a difference. However, repentance is different. Repentance is an admission of, hatred of, and turning away from sin before God.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.text: I came from a Hindi medium school... the principal felt that I would not fit into an English medium college. Though I was top in my class in school, and I got admission in other colleges, but I really wanted to study in St. Xavier's.
quotes.author: Lakshmi Mittal

quotes.text: Year after year, we see a new crop of musicians who do their best to look tough in lipstick and makeup. Maybe it's a cry for help, an admission of their strong feminine side, or the realization that they don't look so good any other way. Whatever the reason, makeup is as rock n' roll as a Marshall stack.
quotes.author: Shawn Amos

quotes.text: The 'morality of compromise' sounds contradictory. Compromise is usually a sign of weakness, or an admission of defeat. Strong men don't compromise, it is said, and principles should never be compromised.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.text: Jamie Moyer was in his third year as a major league pitcher and was, by his own admission, still wide-eyed, watching everything going on around him and soaking it in. He paid particular attention to older teammates on his Chicago Cubs squad, hoping to emulate habits that had allowed those veterans to extend their careers.
quotes.author: Don Yaeger

quotes.text: A good film is when the price of the dinner, the theatre admission and the babysitter were worth it.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.text: It is in the admission of ignorance and the admission of uncertainty that there is a hope for the continuous motion of human beings in some direction that doesn't get confined, permanently blocked, as it has so many times before in various periods in the history of man.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.text: If a man does not control his temper, it is a sad admission that he is not in control of his thoughts.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.text: Bacon is so good by itself that to put it in any other food is an admission of failure. You're basically saying, 'I can't make this other food taste good, so I'll throw in bacon.'
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.text: I am convinced that our movement will be more demoralized and weakened by blind and uncritical admiration than by frank admission of past mistakes.
quotes.author: Marie Louise

quotes.text: Each success only buys an admission ticket to a more difficult problem.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.text: As ugly an admission as this is, I met my wife at a party, and if I had been to the same party and she were dressed in different clothes, I might never have talked to her. She might have projected something that I found distasteful, even if she otherwise looked exactly the same - a beautiful woman to me.
quotes.author: James Gray

quotes.text: The pretended admission of a fault on our part creates an excellent impression.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.text: You can take a school like the University of Colorado, with a selective admission standard. It has a better caliber student going in, so you ought to have a better caliber coming out.
quotes.author: Roy Romer

quotes.text: I was 16 when I got admission in Hans Raj College. I completed school when I was 16, so everyone in my class - Zoology Honours batch 92 - was 18, and I was often treated like a kid.
quotes.author: Anurag Kashyap

quotes.text: Permanent bonds of culture began to be formed between the extreme East and the extreme West of Europe by intermarriage, by commerce, by the admission of the nobles of Byzantium within the orders of chivalry.
quotes.author: Joseph Jacobs

quotes.text: A great idea is usually original to more than one discoverer. Great ideas come when the world needs them. Great ideas surround the world's ignorance and press for admission.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stuart Phelps

quotes.text: A sequel is an admission that you've been reduced to imitating yourself.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.text: The most important factor in college admissions is a test that benefits those who are least prepared for college.
quotes.author: Eliot Schrefer

quotes.text: Though silence is not necessarily an admission, it is not a denial, either.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: Pride is an admission of weakness; it secretly fears all competition and dreads all rivals.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.text: To make an embarrassing admission, I like video games. That's what got me into software engineering when I was a kid. I wanted to make money so I could buy a better computer to play better video games - nothing like saving the world.
quotes.author: Elon Musk
