quotes.text: We were totally unprepared for such a large quantity of visitors, and in view of the preservation of the antiquities they being very crowded and in poor preservation, we were obliged to refuse admission until some preparation was made to safeguard the objects.
quotes.author: Howard Carter

quotes.text: Slightly embarrassing admission: Even when I was a kid, I used to have these little spy books, and I would, like, see what everybody was doing in my neighborhood and log it down.
quotes.author: Heather Brooke

quotes.text: Politicians also have a love affair with the 'small business exemption.' Too much paperwork? Too heavy a burden? Not enough time? Just exempt small businesses from the rule. It sounds so pro-growth. Instead it's an admission that the costs of a regulation just can't be justified.
quotes.author: John Sununu

quotes.text: By their own admission, leaders of the Republican Revolution of 1994 think their greatest mistake was overlooking the power of the veto. They gave the impression they were somehow in charge when they weren't.
quotes.author: Mitch McConnell

quotes.text: I like to pretend that I'm a tough guy. It's kind of an admission of defeat if I have to ask for help - or even kindness. But if it doesn't come, at some point I snap and demand it.
quotes.author: Mary-Louise Parker

quotes.text: And in Canada we, you know, it costs us three or $400 million to have an election. You know, it's always been my position that we shouldn't complain about that; that's the price of admission for a living in a great democracy.
quotes.author: Rick Mercer

quotes.text: Right now, American law bars the admission of aliens suspected of terrorist activity - but not of terrorist sympathies.
quotes.author: Richard Perle

quotes.text: An application of judicial power that does not rest on facts is worse than mindless, it is inherently dangerous. If its deployment does not rest on facts - cold, hard, solid facts, established either by admissions or by trials - it serves no lawful or moral purpose and is simply an engine of oppression.
quotes.author: Jed S. Rakoff

quotes.text: You find out your mistakes from an audience that pays admission.
quotes.author: Edgar Bergen

quotes.text: ACT and SAT each have their own parts of the country. The GRE has its lock on graduate admissions. And so, one could blame the companies, but really, economically, they have no incentive to change things very much because they're getting the business.
quotes.author: Robert Sternberg

quotes.text: Much of what's called 'public' is increasingly a private good paid for by users - ever-higher tolls on public highways and public bridges, higher tuitions at so-called public universities, higher admission fees at public parks and public museums.
quotes.author: Robert Reich

quotes.text: Lie detectors sometimes work because people believe they work, deterring the wrong people from applying for jobs in the first place, or prompting admissions of guilt during interrogations.
quotes.author: Bill Dedman

quotes.text: What I'd really like to write is a romantic comedy. This is my favorite kind of movie. I feel almost embarrassed revealing this, because the genre has been so degraded in the past twenty years that saying you like romantic comedies is essentially an admission of mild stupidity.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.text: In an age when the fashion is to be in love with yourself, confessing to be in love with somebody else is an admission of unfaithfulness to one's beloved.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.text: To be fair to the Inquisition, they only used confessions extracted after the torture had ended, which let them claim that admissions had been freely given; the fact that the torture would have started again if they hadn't confessed was a minor detail.
quotes.author: Simon Hoggart

quotes.text: Like so much in Singapore, admission to the Marina Bay's casino is hierarchical: Free for anyone with an international passport, costly for locals, off-limits to migrant workers altogether.
quotes.author: Alan Huffman

quotes.text: African American children can't be educationally disadvantaged for 12 years and then experience a miracle cure when it comes time for admission into college.
quotes.author: Chaka Fattah

quotes.text: I wasn't a good student in high school. I wanted to go to college, but they weren't exactly beating down my door to offer me admission, and it's so expensive in the U.S. If you join up for a period, the army will pay your school and provide a stipend.
quotes.author: Kevin Powers

quotes.text: Declining overseas admissions costs us not only much needed revenues for colleges and universities, but much more importantly, we lose the best opportunity we have to introduce foreign students to all that America has to offer the world.
quotes.author: Richard Lugar

quotes.text: Hospice means end-of-life care. The admission ticket is a diagnosis from a doctor that you have six months or less to live.
quotes.author: Eleanor Clift

quotes.text: One of the worst of errors would be the general admission of the proposition that a Government has no right to interfere for any purpose except for that of affording protection.
quotes.author: Nassau William Senior

quotes.text: The game has kept faith with the public, maintaining its old admission price for nearly thirty years while other forms of entertainment have doubled and tripled in price. And it will probably never change.
quotes.author: Connie Mack

quotes.text: The automatic bread maker is not as good as breads made by hand, but waking up to the smell of fresh bread is worth the price of admission. We use it for fresh cinnamon raisin toast - mmmmmmm!
quotes.author: Irma S. Rombauer

quotes.text: The SAT plays an important role in helping admissions officers around the country sort out students, well-deserving students from 20,000 high schools that have different curriculums, different grading standards, and different ability to help students get ready for college.
quotes.author: Jonathan Grayer

quotes.text: In public, an admission of technological inadequacy would be too embarrassing.
quotes.author: Elliott Abrams

quotes.text: I came home from school one day, and there was a phone call for me. And I picked up the phone. They said, 'This is the Harvard Admissions Department. We'd like to let you know that you're accepted in the freshman class.' And I said, 'Come on, who is this really?'
quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

quotes.text: Most blacks want school vouchers, but most liberals vehemently oppose them. Why? Because what is good for teachers' unions is of more importance to the Left than what is good for blacks. Who, then, is racist? By their own admission, and by the policies they pursue, the answer is the people who call themselves progressive.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.text: With the commissioning of new schools undertaken by a local director of school standards, decisions will be fair and transparent, rooted in the needs of the local community. The admissions code and the role of the adjudicator will also be strengthened to provide fairness for all children.
quotes.author: David Blunkett

quotes.text: Cultivating more leaders who reflect our heterogeneous society depends on universities' transparent use of race as one of many factors in an admissions process that is accessible to all.
quotes.author: Wendy Kopp

quotes.text: For Republicans, accepting responsibility means accepting punishment; for Democrats, it means only an admission of error and a suggestion they'll do better in the future. This double standard must end.
quotes.author: Monica Crowley

quotes.text: We know that a college degree is rapidly becoming the price of admission to the global economy.
quotes.author: Evan Bayh

quotes.text: 'Thank you' is often an admission that you needed something that wasn't being fulfilled or you couldn't do on your own, so you needed someone else. There is also guilt. We think, 'Well, too much time has gone by, and it doesn't matter,' but it does. It always matters.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Banks

quotes.text: I'm a big 'American Idol' watcher, and sometimes I like to watch 'America's Got Talent.' Those are big, corny admissions, but sometimes it's so fun to see those kids really sing their hearts out.
quotes.author: Katey Sagal

quotes.text: Early admission programs tend to advantage the advantaged.
quotes.author: Derek Bok

quotes.text: I happen to have a giant ego, an admission that will not shock my close friends or critics. I am not uncomfortable in saying that because the ego of a man often gets great things done.
quotes.author: Joe Jamail

quotes.text: When I address admitted students each spring, I ask them to consider two questions: Why would Harvard be the right place for the person I am? Why would it be the right place for the person that I want to become? These questions, in my mind, get at the heart of any admissions process.
quotes.author: Drew Gilpin Faust

quotes.text: Limited partnerships are required to amend their filings whenever important changes, such as the admission of new partners, take place.
quotes.author: Carol Loomis

quotes.text: My first three novels were all the subjects of intensely exciting flurries of calls from producers and even stars' production companies, and once someone actually hired a screenwriter to adapt one of my books - but it all came to nothing, so I tried not to get too excited when a Hollywood suitor came calling for 'Admission,' my fourth novel.
quotes.author: Jean Hanff Korelitz

quotes.text: Many high school students are under so much competitive pressure. They are sometimes taught that if they don't have a 4.0 GPA, score in the 99th percentile on admissions tests, and demonstrate leadership in sports and participate in clubs, they won't get into college anywhere. Even highly credentialed professionals get caught up in this.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Thornton

quotes.text: What SAT tutoring does is it invisibly alters the admissions pool so a school could try to be as egalitarian as they can, but if a student is SAT-tutored, and their score goes up 200 points in a year, and the college admissions committee has no idea that the student got tutored, all of a sudden it's shifting the pool back toward old money.
quotes.author: Eliot Schrefer

quotes.text: When I applied for grad school, I did not specify genre. I said I wanted an MFA in Creative Writing. I was so cute and stupid! The admissions committee at Pitt decided to put me in poetry.
quotes.author: Terrance Hayes

quotes.text: It appears that PepsiCo views structural change as a sign of weakness, an admission of failure, and an untenable break with past traditions.
quotes.author: Nelson Peltz

quotes.text: Judaism to me, as badly as I practiced it, what I've always loved about it was its total embrace of complexity, its admission of unknowability.
quotes.author: Ben Marcus

quotes.text: But you take a four-year state college, with a broader range of admission, and what happens during those four years may be an even greater value-added educational experience. I don't know.
quotes.author: Roy Romer

quotes.text: The creation of NIT has ensured some seats for admission in undergraduate courses for students of Arunachal Pradesh, which will bound to uplift economics of locality directly or indirectly and help in enhancing human development index in the state.
quotes.author: Pallam Raju

quotes.text: However, I had a chance encounter with an admissions officer of Stevens Institute of Technology, who so impressed me by his erudition and enthusiasm for the school that I changed course and entered Stevens Institute.
quotes.author: Frederick Reines

quotes.text: The interval allowed was only five minutes, at the end of which I resumed the lecture; but so refreshing was the effects of the brief rest and, above all, the admission of pure air, that during the second hour the attention was as completely sustained as during the first.
quotes.author: George Combe

quotes.text: I am in favor of admitting any territory into the Union of States as soon as it has fulfilled the requirements of the Constitution and shall petition for admission.
quotes.author: Ambrose Burnside

quotes.text: At some of our most competitive universities, 17 times the amount of students that can go to the school, apply. And these applicants are from all over the country, and admissions officers need ways to sort through them. The SAT is just one of those things.
quotes.author: Jonathan Grayer

quotes.text: I loathe all political parties, which I regard as inventions of the devil. My favourite prime minister was Sir Alec Douglas-Home, not because he was on the Right, but because he spent a year in office without, on his own admission, doing a damned thing.
quotes.author: George MacDonald Fraser

quotes.text: I worked three and then six hours a day in my studio with strict discipline and emotion. I obtained awards usually granted to other foreigners during the end-of-year admission tests.
quotes.author: Ralph Allen

quotes.text: I entered KC College in 1975. When I came here for my interview, for my admission, every person I spoke to spoke to me in Sindhi. Be it Kundanani, Bhambani, Nichani, Kevalramani... and they also thought that Ambani was the same. For a moment, I thought that I got my admission at KC College because I have a 'ni' in my surname.
quotes.author: Anil Ambani

quotes.text: I would be surprised to see the White House scaling back on anything. That would be an admission they are operating from a position of weakness.
quotes.author: Rich Galen

quotes.text: Luxury brands are about elite access. In consumer goods, that's elite cost. In education, it's elite criteria for admission. Minerva is maintaining those high standards, but not artificially limiting the number of people who can meet it... This really may be redefining education.
quotes.author: Kevin Harvey

quotes.text: I don't know where my first gold medal is.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.text: I hope I can compete in one or two Olympics in my career. Of course I would like to win a medal, but just being there would be awesome.
quotes.author: Patrick Chan

quotes.text: You don't get any medal for trying something, you get medals for results.
quotes.author: Bill Parcells

quotes.text: People think the gold medal is yours and they say you're going to win - but they have no idea how hard it is. People aren't doing it negatively - they're mostly lovely and they really do want you to win - but they don't understand the difficulty and intensity of competition.
quotes.author: Jessica Ennis

quotes.text: There are a lot of guys who play in the NBA. There aren't a lot of guys who have a chance to win a gold medal, too.
quotes.author: James Harden

quotes.text: I think as a Canadian hockey player, you go through it in your mind so many times, being able to stand on that blue line and hear your national anthem play and being a gold medal champion, you dream of that. And then to be able to accomplish that and actually win a gold medal and represent your country its an amazing feeling.
quotes.author: Sidney Crosby

quotes.text: I was still young when I missed Beijing. I was favourite to win a medal but I knew I had time. My coach advised me to stay at school and finish my exams. Even if I had gone and won the Olympics, I might not have handled the pressure. So I moved on.
quotes.author: David Rudisha

quotes.text: That's the awesome part. Little girls now have a chance to look up and see women playing soccer, basketball, softball and now hockey - and know they can win a gold medal, too.
quotes.author: Angela Ruggiero

quotes.text: Growing up, watching the Premier League as far back as I can remember, feeling the trophy and having the medal around my neck was an unbelievable feeling.
quotes.author: Wayne Rooney

quotes.text: Much like the conservationists who previously have received the Audubon Medal, including Stewart Udall, Rachel Carson and Ted Turner, I realize that this recognition cannot be a cause to rest, but a spur to continue our work.
quotes.author: Louis Bacon

quotes.text: The Olympic Gold medal in 1968 was definitely the highest moment of my career. It was a dream come true. I was a 19-year-old boy, and it was just amazing to be standing on top of the podium and hearing the National Anthem in the background.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.text: I hoped to win a medal and hoped it would be gold. I knew I was good but didn't know I would be the one to score something that had never been done before.
quotes.author: Nadia Comaneci

quotes.text: As a soccer player, I wanted an FA Cup winner's medal. As an actor you want an Oscar. As a chef it's three-Michelin's stars, there's no greater than that. So pushing yourself to the extreme creates a lot of pressure and a lot of excitement, and more importantly, it shows on the plate.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.text: To make America the greatest is my goal, so I beat the Russian and I beat the Pole. And for the U.S.A. won the medal of gold. The Greeks said, 'You're better than the Cassius of old.'
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Winning a gold medal is not easy but I believed in myself, especially over the last four years.
quotes.author: Sally Pearson

quotes.text: I have always wanted an Olympic medal. I always wanted to see India's national flag going up at the podium.
quotes.author: Saina Nehwal

quotes.text: Coming in as a veteran, I'd like to finish with a gold medal.
quotes.author: Howard Bach

quotes.text: I'm not disappointed with bronze. It's always good to come away with a medal.
quotes.author: Bryan Volpenhein

quotes.text: I think the mental victory is worth it as much as a gold medal.
quotes.author: Cameron van der Burgh

quotes.text: Everybody has to deal with tough times. A gold medal doesn't make you immune to that. A skater is used to falling down and getting up again.
quotes.author: Dorothy Hamill

quotes.text: I never believed that India could win a medal in badminton because the competition is so tough.
quotes.author: Saina Nehwal

quotes.text: I've learned that winning isn't everything, and it's more about the journey. But at the end of the day, I just want to stand on the podium with the gold medal.
quotes.author: Hope Solo

quotes.text: On no further occasion present a flag or medal to an Indian.
quotes.author: Zebulon Pike

quotes.text: Once 'Walk Two Moons' received the Newbery Medal, I decided to write full-time. Partly because there seemed to be an audience out there who wanted to read what I wanted to write, and partly because I could now support myself financially through writing.
quotes.author: Sharon Creech

quotes.text: I had already been into my professional career for six years and had not won an individual gold medal at the Olympics. There was a tremendous amount of pressure going into 1996 to get it done.
quotes.author: Michael Johnson

quotes.text: In 1962, my injury wasn't because of violence; I just kicked the ball and it happened. And that was OK because Brazil won; I didn't have any difficulty in accepting that. I still got a medal because I'd played two games.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.text: While starving refugees in Homs were providing target practice for government snipers, Bashar al-Assad's strongest international backer was in Sochi, at the Iceberg Skating Palace, visibly moved, smiling with deep satisfaction, as the Russians beautifully glided and leaped their way to the gold medal in the team event.
quotes.author: George Packer

quotes.text: Going to the Olympics as a Maasai I want to make them proud because, after the warm welcome they gave me when I went back and being their leader, I want to also be the warrior in the Olympics. That will be something good because that will be the first Olympic gold medal for the Maasai.
quotes.author: David Rudisha

quotes.text: I was running track early in my years and I was breaking track records in sprint running. I was training and I wanted to be in the Olympics. I thought I was going to be able to win a gold medal, and my mind was pretty much set on 'this is what I want to do'.
quotes.author: Sheila E.

quotes.text: An Olympic medal is much better than a world record, and so is a world championship or Commonwealth Games medal.
quotes.author: Chad le Clos

quotes.text: Standing on the podium at the 1996 Olympic Games in Atlanta and receiving a gold medal was the crowning jewel in a successful gymnastics career and, most certainly, the confirmation that my parents' sacrifices were not in vain.
quotes.author: Dominique Moceanu

quotes.text: I won my first medal when I was nine years old. It was at the Boston Open.
quotes.author: Nancy Kerrigan

quotes.text: If you dream and you allow yourself to dream you can do anything. And that's what this Olympic medal represents.
quotes.author: Clara Hughes

quotes.text: The incentive of a medal at the biggest sporting arena in the world is what drives me. Before I hang my gloves, I want to win the Olympic medal, and my performance at London will decide my future in the sport.
quotes.author: Mary Kom

quotes.text: Cricket pays well, so a lot of people are naturally drawn towards the game. But to carve a niche in non-cricket sports is not easy. So state governments need to be proactive. Indians need to be made aware of the power of an Olympic medal. It should be treated at par with an Oscars or a Nobel Prize.
quotes.author: Gagan Narang

quotes.text: Maybe there's a little girl who thinks she can be an Olympic athlete, and she sees all the things I struggled through to get here. Yeah, I didn't walk away with a medal or run away with a medal, but I think there's lessons to be learned when you win and lessons to be learned when you lose.
quotes.author: Lolo Jones

quotes.text: I think if I am to win an Olympic medal I'll have to score like I did today.
quotes.author: Tom Daley

quotes.text: To have this gold medal around my neck is an indescribable feeling. I'm the happiest person right now.
quotes.author: Jordyn Wieber

quotes.text: Looking back, I'm almost happy I lost that fight. Just imagine if I would have come back to Germany with a victory. I had nothing to do with the Nazis, but they would have given me a medal. After the war I might have been considered a war criminal.
quotes.author: Max Schmeling

quotes.text: As a teenager I had no idea that I had the potential to win an Olympic gold medal and my athletic career developed only by lucky circumstances.
quotes.author: Peter Snell

quotes.text: I always feel I had a very lucky life. For example, I sure didn't want to go in the army: when I was drafted in the Korean War, I wanted to go as a photographer. But luckily, they put me in the infantry - luckily because the official photographer was photographing the medal awarding and all the official situations.
quotes.author: Harold Feinstein

quotes.text: I would be happy with an Olympic bronze. What I don't have is an Olympic medal.
quotes.author: Paula Radcliffe

quotes.text: I played college soccer before I was hurt, and just to be able to jump back into something that you could be so competitive at or you can achieve, to get to the Paralympics, that's the first really big achievement that you can have. It's the second biggest sporting event in the world. To be a part of it and to get a medal for that, it's unreal.
quotes.author: Mark Zupan

quotes.text: From Clara Barton's tireless work founding the American Red Cross to the first female Medal of Honor winner, Dr. Mary Walker, to our first female combat fighter pilot Lt. Kara Hultgreen, no list of American heroes is complete without the names of some of these extraordinary women.
quotes.author: Brian Kilmeade

quotes.text: Winning an Olympic gold medal is like nothing else.
quotes.author: Rebecca Lobo

quotes.text: I've won a world championship, I know how that feels. I don't know how it feels to win a gold medal. I want to feel that; I want to know that.
quotes.author: Ariane Fortin

quotes.text: I don't know about you, but I lie awake nights worrying about Canadian uranium. I know these people. I grew up there. You have no idea what they're capable of doing. If Sidney Crosby hadn't scored that goal to win the Olympic gold medal, there's no telling what might have ensued.
quotes.author: Charles Krauthammer

quotes.text: No matter what, like, I couldn't - I could break a world record, get an Olympic gold medal, and my mom would be, like, you could have done better. But you looked pretty. That's what she says all the time.
quotes.author: Ryan Lochte

quotes.text: WikiLeaks is a service to the population. Assange should get an award for - presidential medal of honor.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: If I do something for my kids, I get a medal, because most fathers don't.
quotes.author: Louis C. K.

quotes.text: For sure, 2010 was the best year I've ever had. It couldn't have gone any better for me. Even if I just won the Olympic gold medal, that would have made it the best year of my career and the best day of my life, period. Winning the World Cup races and the overall title just topped it off.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: It took putting one foot in front of the other every single day to get through it to the point where I made it back on the team and won a gold medal in 2008.
quotes.author: Hope Solo

quotes.text: Team GB's success at the Beijing Olympics can, in part, be said to have been made in Manchester. For example, all the cycling medal winners trained at Manchester's velodrome, the National Cycling Centre.
quotes.author: Lucy Powell

quotes.text: If I bring back only one gold people are going to say it's a disappointment. But not too many of them own an Olympic gold medal so if I get one I'm going to be happy.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.text: It surprised me, the feeling I got when I won the Oscar for 'Scent of a Woman.' It was a new feeling. I'd never felt it. I don't see my Oscar much now. But when I first got it, there was a feeling for weeks afterward that I guess is akin to winning a gold medal in the Olympics.
quotes.author: Al Pacino

quotes.text: I had my Olympic gold medal cut up into eleven pieces. Gave all eleven of my kids a piece. It'll come together again when they put me down.
quotes.author: Joe Frazier

quotes.text: Now that I have an Olympic medal in my room, it makes me hungry for another and a different color one.
quotes.author: Gracie Gold

quotes.text: I always look back to my first Olympic medal in 2004 in Athens. I was very new to the sport, and it was my first big win at the Olympics.
quotes.author: Allyson Felix

quotes.text: Breaking the world record in '92 was a very special personal moment, but I'd say my favorite moment as a decathlete was winning the Olympic gold medal.
quotes.author: Dan O'Brien

quotes.text: Through everything I've gone through- and I've been everywhere, at the top of the world, in jail, hung over drunk - I never gave up my dream of winning a gold medal in the Olympics.
quotes.author: Dan O'Brien

quotes.text: Looking back, I'm so proud to have gone to five Olympics - I believe only three other Americans have achieved that. My true gold medal, though, is my daughter, Karsen, who is 18 months old. And I have a wonderful husband, Mike.
quotes.author: Gail Devers

quotes.text: At the age of nine, I could cross the length of Glasgow on a succession of buses, wearing regulation garter-topped stockings and compulsory cap and - if I'd done well enough to earn the honour in last week's test - with a First World War medal on a striped ribbon pinned to my brown blazer. I must have looked like a chocolate soldier.
quotes.author: Ronald Frame

quotes.text: One minute you're a developing athlete trying to get to the top, then the next minute you do well and win a medal somewhere, and then it's all foisted on you. You never know when it's going to happen. You don't think about the media side of things when you're a young athlete trying to do well.
quotes.author: Jessica Ennis

quotes.text: I got a bronze medal and I can't complain about that, the only African-American to get a medal in the Winter Olympics.
quotes.author: Debi Thomas

quotes.text: Many medal winners dream of competing in a sport other than the one they're famous for.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.text: If you can come to the Olympic Games and leave with a medal then that is alright.
quotes.author: Yohan Blake

quotes.text: You want to come home from a tournament with a winner's medal. That's not the fans or the media putting us under pressure, that's the pressure we put ourselves under.
quotes.author: Rio Ferdinand

quotes.text: Actually, I always dreamed about getting a gold medal in the 100-meter freestyle in Olympic swimming. I always thought that would be the epic award in sports to get.
quotes.author: Chris Klein

quotes.text: The only medal that I am certain I deserved is the Purple Heart.
quotes.author: Bob Kerrey

quotes.text: My kids love it. I thought I was the coolest dad in the world when I got to be in a Bond film, but 'Harry Potter', too? Well, I think I qualify for a medal for exceptional parenting or something, don't you?
quotes.author: Robbie Coltraine

quotes.text: It's incredible in our sport how small the differences are, and we are all aware of that. We're all on a high level and skiing well, and at the end, it's just hundredths that count. Maybe it's just one finger or a hand can change the color of a medal.
quotes.author: Tina Maze

quotes.text: I haven't let the gold medal out of my sight; it sleeps next to me in bed.
quotes.author: Magdalena Neuner

quotes.text: Yeah, that's what kind of, we get the idea a little bit yeah, because other people from different countries also try as hard as they can to get a medal or a gold medal in the Olympic Games. And you know, if they can work hard, we can work hard as well.
quotes.author: Inge de Bruijn

quotes.text: London 2012 is all about winning a medal. Not just any medal, the gold medal.
quotes.author: Hope Solo

quotes.text: Joe Frazier's life didn't start with Ali. I was a Golden Gloves champ. Gold medal in Tokyo '64. Heavyweight champion of the world long before I fought Ali in the Garden.
quotes.author: Joe Frazier

quotes.text: I graduated a the top of my class in the '84 Olympic Games; I won a gold medal.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.text: Army Specialist Bradley Manning deserves a medal, not prison.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.text: Since I started playing at the Olympics in 2000, I have always wanted to do a dress based on Wonder Woman. It should be interesting to wear. And hopefully, it will get me a gold medal.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.text: It's an honor to be awarded the Liberty Medal.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: No one pretends anymore that the Olympics are just about sports. It's routine to talk about what effect holding the Games in this or that capital will have on the host country's international reputation, how a nation's prestige can be raised by its medal count.
quotes.author: George Packer

quotes.text: The supreme quality for leadership is unquestionably integrity. Without it, no real success is possible, no matter whether it is on a section gang, a football field, in an army, or in an office.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: To me, football is so much about mental toughness, it's digging deep, it's doing whatever you need to do to help a team win and that comes in a lot of shapes and forms.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.text: Football is like life - it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Growing up in a group home, and with an undiagnosed learning disability to boot, the odds of success were not on my side. But when I joined the high school football team, I learned the value of discipline, focus, persistence, and teamwork - all skills that have proven vital to my career as a C.E.O. and social entrepreneur.
quotes.author: Darell Hammond

quotes.text: I prefer to win titles with the team ahead of individual awards or scoring more goals than anyone else. I'm more worried about being a good person than being the best football player in the world. When all this is over, what are you left with? When I retire, I hope I am remembered for being a decent guy.
quotes.author: Lionel Messi

quotes.text: Football is a great deal like life in that it teaches that work, sacrifice, perseverance, competitive drive, selflessness and respect for authority is the price that each and every one of us must pay to achieve any goal that is worthwhile.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: You know, I never really paid attention to sports, which, coming from the mecca of football in Texas, is kind of odd. I played sports, but I was nerdy. Having a single mother, the pressure was on me to get good grades and a scholarship and go to college.
quotes.author: Sarah Shahi

quotes.text: As a kid, there are some things you looked forward to. You looked forward to Charlie Brown during Halloween and you looked forward to Monday Night Football.
quotes.author: Nick Ferguson

quotes.text: I never dreamed about being a millionaire - I dreamed about being a football player.
quotes.author: Victor Cruz

quotes.text: I've never been a fan of individual awards because football is such a team sport. There's so many things that goes into making plays. It's about teammates trusting one another and working together.
quotes.author: Troy Polamalu

quotes.text: It takes a tremendous amount of skill to be a football player. And some of these guys have enough skills to do other sports. Soccer could be one. Basketball could be another. Things where you need incredible hand-eye coordination are always options. I think a football player would be able to adapt to a lot of sports.
quotes.author: Troy Polamalu

quotes.text: In football, I don't have a lot of friends. The people who I really trust, there are not many... Most of the time, I'm alone.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.text: Football is a simple game. Twenty-two men chase a ball for 90 minutes and at the end, the Germans always win.
quotes.author: Gary Lineker

quotes.text: I love Halloween, trick or treating and decorating the house. And I love Thanksgiving, because of the football and the fall weather. And of course, I love Christmas - that's my favorite of all!
quotes.author: Joe Nichols

quotes.text: Something I like to do a lot is just sit by water when there's a current and just stare into the water. I don't fish, I don't hunt, I don't scuba, I don't spear, don't boat, don't play basketball or football - I excel at staring into space. I'm really good at that.
quotes.author: Iggy Pop

quotes.text: Football is, after all, a wonderful way to get rid of your aggressions without going to jail for it.
quotes.author: Woody Hayes

quotes.text: Look at a football field. It looks like a big movie screen. This is theatre. Football combines the strategy of chess. It's part ballet. It's part battleground, part playground. We clarify, amplify and glorify the game with our footage, the narration and that music, and in the end create an inspirational piece of footage.
quotes.author: Steve Sabol

quotes.text: Deeper fulfilment is rather different from the happiness of seeing a good film or watching your team win at football, and it doesn't come at the push of a button.
quotes.author: Geoff Mulgan

quotes.text: My private life is perfect. If your private life and your life outside football is good, then it is good on the field for you.
quotes.author: David Beckham

quotes.text: I like college football, but I'm a huge college basketball fan. I could sit and watch every game of March Madness and be happy. That could be a vacation.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.text: I obviously take a lot of pride in what I do on the football field, because that has the ability to influence a lot of people. That puts smiles on people's faces. That gives people a pep in their step on Monday morning when they go back to work.
quotes.author: Drew Brees

quotes.text: I was a quarterback in pee-wee football. I always wanted to be quarterback. They're the leaders, they make the calls. It didn't work out because I didn't have the arm. I also played wide receiver my senior year in high school.
quotes.author: Junior Seau

quotes.text: My thing is, and I've always been this way - to get to know as many people as I possibly can on a personal level, so that way, when you get on the football field, you've got your buddy right beside you, and you're ready to go.
quotes.author: Russell Wilson

quotes.text: And when I go around and talk to schools, what I tell the kids are, first of all, you have to accept each other's differences. Some of you are going to be a crappy football player, some of you are going to be a great mathematician. Whatever it is, accept each other's differences and help prop each other up.
quotes.author: Vince Flynn

quotes.text: The chairmen of the largest companies in the world can cancel an appointment or move a board meeting; a manager cannot change the date of a game. In the combined 42 years that Sir Alex Ferguson and Arsene Wenger have managed in English football, I can only remember one occasion when Sir Alex did not attend a Manchester United game.
quotes.author: Howard Wilkinson

quotes.text: Lombardi, a certain magic still lingers in the very name. It speaks of duels in the snow and November mud... He remains for many the heart of pro football, pumping hard right now.
quotes.author: Steve Sabol

quotes.text: Football is a game of mistakes. Whoever makes the fewest mistakes wins.
quotes.author: Johan Cruyff

quotes.text: You can talk about what you see from the outside; it's hard to tell me who I am when you're just looking at me with a football uniform on. That's a totally different person. That's my job, that's it.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.text: So if one day the result becomes 3-3, for me it doesn't change my mind, because it's football, it's normal. What is not normal is that we haven't been scoring enough goals playing such good football as we've been playing in the last few weeks.
quotes.author: Jose Mourinho

quotes.text: That smell of freshly cut grass makes me think of Friday night football in high school. The smell of popcorn and cigar smoke reminds me of the stadium. The cutting of the grass reminds me of the August practice.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.text: I think the thing about that was I was always willing to work; I was not the fastest or biggest player but I was determined to be the best football player I could be on the football field and I think I was able to accomplish that through hard work.
quotes.author: Jerry Rice

quotes.text: Baseball happens to be a game of cumulative tension but football, basketball and hockey are played with hand grenades and machine guns.
quotes.author: John Leonard

quotes.text: It's good for Brazilian football to have idols, stars, big stars coming back to Brazilian clubs. The tournaments become much better, more interesting. Ze Roberto, Juninho Pernambucano, Ronaldinho Gaucho, and other players who have returned to Brazil strengthen the league and improve the tournaments.
quotes.author: Neymar

quotes.text: At the end of the day, I'm a footballer who has played at some of the biggest football clubs in the world and played with some of the best players in the world.
quotes.author: David Beckham

quotes.text: I certainly didn't think of myself as gifted. The standards for being gifted in my environment were if you were good in Little League or if you were good in football.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.text: Positive thinking is the key to success in business, education, pro football, anything that you can mention. I go out there thinking that I'm going to complete every pass.
quotes.author: Ron Jaworski

quotes.text: The two saddest moments of my life were when my mother died and when I was told I couldn't play football for the Colts anymore.
quotes.author: Art Donovan

quotes.text: The majority of the time, they take air out of the football. I think that, for me, is a disadvantage.
quotes.author: Aaron Rodgers

quotes.text: What's so amazing in today's society is people look up to football players. And as a football player, you have a platform. And it's so much more important than any touchdown or trophy or anything you could win with football. Its taking that platform and be able to influence people.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.text: I don't think I could ever describe myself as unlucky because people would look at me, playing football for a living, and say: 'Are you winding me up?'
quotes.author: Jermain Defoe

quotes.text: I remember cleaning boots at Millwall on £250 a week and feeling like a millionaire. I'd made it then. At that time, if I never played for another club it wouldn't have bothered me too much because I'd made it with a football team in England.
quotes.author: Timothy F. Cahill

quotes.text: My favorite memory from school was going to football games with my friends. We always had so much spirit and dressed up to go to the games, even though our team was pretty bad.
quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

quotes.text: I was a football fan before I became a rugby fan.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.text: Brazil eats, sleeps and drinks football. It lives football!
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.text: Scarily, football helmets, which do a fine job of protecting against scalp laceration and skull fracture, do little to prevent concussions and may even exacerbate them, since even as the brain is rattling around inside the skull, the head is rattling around inside the helmet.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.text: I played softball and basketball growing up. I really wanted to play football but both parents said no. I was mad for a second, then got over it. Now, just because I'm tall doesn't mean I can play basketball. I was waaaaay better at swinging a bat.
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: Football is a simple game based on the giving and taking of passes, of controlling the ball and of making yourself available to receive a pass. It is terribly simple.
quotes.author: Bill Shankly

quotes.text: Arsenal have won that advantage, nobody gave it to them. By playing fantastic football and by winning matches and by winning trophies, they won that respect that the opponent has for them.
quotes.author: Jose Mourinho

quotes.text: The philosophy of FIFA is to expand world soccer space, to spread out the world football space.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.text: Football is controlled violence, but it is violence, which people have loved to watch since the gladiatorial contests in ancient Rome.
quotes.author: Michael Mandelbaum

quotes.text: The closest I've come to knowing myself is in losing myself. That's why I loved football before I loved music. I could lose myself in it.
quotes.author: Kris Kristofferson

quotes.text: Football spectators appreciate a bit of loyalty, and we're seeing that less and less. There are echelons of football, as in society, where some players are clearly mercenaries. I regret in a way that somehow the local identification, the local bonding between the community and its football team has been commercialised to such an extent.
quotes.author: Vincent Nichols

quotes.text: I think that when people join clubs as simple as a sorority or a fraternity, a football team, a baseball team, it's just - you want to be in a group. You want to be around people, you want to be with people.
quotes.author: Theo Rossi

quotes.text: I mean no disrespect to Scottish football, but the Premier League is the biggest stage and highest profile league of all.
quotes.author: Peter Shilton

quotes.text: I used to play football for Real Madrid, and to be on stage for two hours, I can tell you it takes the same amount of strength.
quotes.author: Julio Iglesias

quotes.text: Most people would say safety was my best position. To me, the biggest challenge and most gratifying thing I got out of playing football was playing corner, because it was a bigger challenge than playing safety. Playing corner provided me my biggest thrills and my biggest headaches.
quotes.author: Ronnie Lott

quotes.text: I didn't play football in school, but I've been a fan of football all my life. I have a fair understanding of it. Doing movies about it really helps because you know what makes them work and what doesn't.
quotes.author: Dennis Quaid

quotes.text: Don't walk through life just playing football. Don't walk through life just being an athlete. Athletics will fade. Character and integrity and really making an impact on someone's life, that's the ultimate vision, that's the ultimate goal - bottom line.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.text: Without football, my life is worth nothing.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.text: Football fans share a universal language that cuts across many cultures and many personality types. A serious football fan is never alone. We are legion, and football is often the only thing we have in common.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: One of my most vivid memories of the mid-1950s is of crying into a washbasin full of soapy grey baby clothes - there were no washing machines - while my handsome and adored husband was off playing football in the park on Sunday morning with all the delightful young men who had been friends to both of us at Cambridge three years earlier.
quotes.author: Claire Tomalin

quotes.text: It's so easy for a kid to join a gang, to do drugs... we should make it that easy to be involved in football and academics.
quotes.author: Snoop Dogg

quotes.text: It's something you dream about as a kid. Like when you play all those NCAA video games as a kid and you create your own player and win the Heisman with a bunch of crazy numbers. It's the biggest, most prestigious award in college football, so it'd definitely be a dream come true.
quotes.author: Johnny Manziel

quotes.text: I always had a philosophy which I got from my father. He used to say, 'Listen. God gave to you the gift to play football. This is your gift from God. If you take care of your health, if you are in good shape all the time, with your gift from God no one will stop you, but you must be prepared.'
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.text: Nobody in football should be called a genius. A genius is a guy like Norman Einstein.
quotes.author: Joe Theismann

quotes.text: People who work together will win, whether it be against complex football defenses, or the problems of modern society.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Schools across India do not have teachers, libraries, playing grounds and even toilets. I do not want to see empty classrooms, empty libraries. I do not want to see cattle grazing on fields meant to be cricket or football grounds.
quotes.author: Sachin Tendulkar

quotes.text: I just had a normal African childhood; we played football a lot, but it was always in the street and always without shoes. Boots were very expensive, and when there are seven in your family, and you say you want to buy a pair, your father wants to kill you.
quotes.author: Yaya Toure

quotes.text: Before the first year, nobody gave it a chance. Now, 36 years later, everybody knows Monday Night Football.
quotes.author: Frank Gifford

quotes.text: Nixon was a crook, of course, but he was also a rabid football fan - and he knew the game, which still astounds me, but I have always had a soft spot for him because of it.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: More and more these days what I find myself doing in my stories is making a representation of goodness and a representation of evil and then having those two run at each other full-speed, like a couple of PeeWee football players, to see what happens. Who stays standing? Whose helmet goes flying off?
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.text: Football management is such a pressurised thing - horseracing is a release. I'm also learning to play the piano - I'm quite determined - it's another release from the pressure of my job.
quotes.author: Alex Ferguson

quotes.text: It is not hard for me to remember when I was in college. I loved many things about college life: I loved learning. I loved the comradery. And I loved football.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.text: I am not better than anyone else just because I play football.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.text: I'm the luckiest guy in the world. I never really had a job. I was a football player, then a football coach, then a football broadcaster. It's been my life. Pro football has been my life since 1967. I've enjoyed every part of it. Never once did it ever feel like work.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.text: The only thing I ever wanted to be was a professional football player.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.text: Football is a great love because I was born into a family of players and therefore born into football. I'm fortunate to have a style of play that a lot of people like. It's a privilege to be able to do what I like best and in my own way, but I'm fortunate that people like it, and that motivates me even more.
quotes.author: Ronaldinho

quotes.text: At home I have a copy of the April 21, 1986, issue of 'Sports Illustrated.' I'm on the cover with the blurb, 'Can Lou Do It?' I'd just arrived at Notre Dame, and with spring football underway, I was the focal point of that week's coverage.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: There's no point in making predictions. It's not worth speculating because nothing is set in stone and things change all the time in football. Today there are opportunities that no one knows if they will come round again in the future.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.text: I never dreamed about being an actor, because that was out of reach. Coming from a small town that was big in farming, and also big in clothing factories, you don't dream about being a professional football player or an actor.
quotes.author: Herschel Walker

quotes.text: The game of basketball has been everything to me. My place of refuge, place I've always gone where I needed comfort and peace. It's been the site of intense pain and the most intense feelings of joy and satisfaction. It's a relationship that has evolved over time, given me the greatest respect and love for the game.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: I don't know what I'm going to do tomorrow. I just know for sure I'm going to keep playing basketball.
quotes.author: Kevin Durant

quotes.text: A basketball team is like the five fingers on your hand. If you can get them all together, you have a fist. That's how I want you to play.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.text: I gave everything I had to basketball. The passion is still there, but the desire to play is not. It was a great ride.
quotes.author: Allen Iverson

quotes.text: I treated it like every day was my last day with a basketball.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: It takes a tremendous amount of skill to be a football player. And some of these guys have enough skills to do other sports. Soccer could be one. Basketball could be another. Things where you need incredible hand-eye coordination are always options. I think a football player would be able to adapt to a lot of sports.
quotes.author: Troy Polamalu

quotes.text: There is no such thing as a perfect basketball player, and I don't believe there is only one greatest player either.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: A lot of late nights in the gym, a lot of early mornings, especially when your friends are going out, you're going to the gym, those are the sacrifices that you have to make if you want to be an NBA basketball player.
quotes.author: Jason Kidd

quotes.text: Something I like to do a lot is just sit by water when there's a current and just stare into the water. I don't fish, I don't hunt, I don't scuba, I don't spear, don't boat, don't play basketball or football - I excel at staring into space. I'm really good at that.
quotes.author: Iggy Pop

quotes.text: There's a tipping point that happens with soccer in which you just kinda get it. I was drawn to it because the best soccer teams play similarly to my favorite basketball teams - like the eighties Lakers or eighties Celtics - teams that emphasized teamwork over individualism and relied on passing as their biggest ongoing edge.
quotes.author: Bill Simmons

quotes.text: I was sporty in high school. I played tennis and hockey, and was basketball captain. Then I went to university and stopped doing sport and started eating ice cream.
quotes.author: Rebel Wilson

quotes.text: I like college football, but I'm a huge college basketball fan. I could sit and watch every game of March Madness and be happy. That could be a vacation.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.text: My focus is basketball, and that's it.
quotes.author: Kyrie Irving

quotes.text: It's a heavy duty to try to do everything and please everybody. My job was to go out there and play the game of basketball as best I can and provide entertainment for everyone who wanted to watch basketball. Obviously, people may not agree with that; again, I can't live with what everyone's impression of what I should or what I shouldn't do.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Joy comes from places you least expect it. It's usually the simple things, like watching my son play basketball or going through Central Park when the blossoms are blooming.
quotes.author: Dave Gahan

quotes.text: Baseball happens to be a game of cumulative tension but football, basketball and hockey are played with hand grenades and machine guns.
quotes.author: John Leonard

quotes.text: I never knew what basketball was. I started playing on the playground. People used to laugh at me and joke at me because I was so tall and I didn't know the game and couldn't play it.
quotes.author: Patrick Ewing

quotes.text: I am, first of all, a basketball player. I've done this for so very long... For me, it's been essential to be successful on the court.
quotes.author: Tony Parker

quotes.text: Whirlyball is only the most awesome sport on the planet! It's like bumper cars plus lacrosse meets basketball.
quotes.author: St. Vincent

quotes.text: Fatherhood will put a man through a lot, but it's a tremendous job, the best in the world - even better than playing basketball.
quotes.author: Derek Fisher

quotes.text: Playing in the playoffs is the best basketball in the world, and if you can learn under that pressure, succeed under that pressure, it gives you more confidence the next year.
quotes.author: Tony Parker

quotes.text: Michael Jordan changed so much in basketball, he took his power to make a difference. It's so much going on in music right now and somebody has to make a difference.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.text: If you're a basketball player and you don't stop and take pictures with your fans, you can have an amazing game and everyone still loves you.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: I played softball and basketball growing up. I really wanted to play football but both parents said no. I was mad for a second, then got over it. Now, just because I'm tall doesn't mean I can play basketball. I was waaaaay better at swinging a bat.
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: Magic Johnson, former basketball player, may run for mayor of L.A. in the next election. Remember the good 'ol days when only qualified people ran for office like actors and professional wrestlers.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.text: I'm not gonna be bad at anything, and I want to actually be the best at anything I'm doing. So if I'm playing basketball, if I'm taking the SATs, like, there's a competitive spirit behind it. With production, it's the same thing.
quotes.author: J. Cole

quotes.text: I have to tell you, I'm proudest of my life off the court. There will always be great basketball players who bounce that little round ball, but my proudest moments are affecting people's lives, effecting change, being a role model in the community.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.text: We can have no progress without change, whether it be basketball or anything else.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: I wanted to do two things when I was growing up, about your age. I wanted to play in the NBA, and I wanted to be a businessman after my basketball career was over, and that is what I am doing now.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.text: My days shouldn't be hard because I'm doing what I'm doing and that's playing basketball.
quotes.author: Derrick Rose

quotes.text: Faith, family, academics and then sports was the order of priorities in my family. My parents really stuck to these principles when raising me and my two brothers. As long as we took care of everything, they let us play as much basketball as we wanted.
quotes.author: Jeremy Lin

quotes.text: You have to be wired a certain way to be a professional basketball player, and the way my body grew, something happened genetically that allowed me to become a lot more explosive.
quotes.author: Jeremy Lin

quotes.text: When I lose the sense of motivation and the sense to prove something as a basketball player, it's time for me to move away from the game.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: In college I never realized the opportunities available to a pro athlete. I've been given the chance to meet all kinds of people, to travel and expand my financial capabilities, to get ideas and learn about life, to create a world apart from basketball.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: I'm not really a big X's and O's guy, but if you want to go there, I'm more of a space-the-floor type of coach: Five out, zero in, and that's the way we play basketball, screen and roll here and there, pocket passes everywhere; it's what it's about.
quotes.author: Kyrie Irving

quotes.text: A lot of times I blend in a little bit easier because I'm not like a basketball player who's going to stand out because of his height.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.text: I think the most important thing about coaching is that you have to have a sense of confidence about what you're doing. You have to be a salesman, and you have to get your players, particularly your leaders, to believe in what you're trying to accomplish on the basketball floor.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.text: That's the awesome part. Little girls now have a chance to look up and see women playing soccer, basketball, softball and now hockey - and know they can win a gold medal, too.
quotes.author: Angela Ruggiero

quotes.text: Trying to take money out of politics is like trying to take jumping out of basketball.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.text: I was not athletically inclined. I was very quiet, introverted, non-confrontational. My three older brothers were athletes - basketball, football - but I was kind of a momma's boy. Then one day, my brother Roger encouraged me to go to the boxing gym with him. I tried the gloves on, and it just felt so natural.
quotes.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quotes.text: Basketball is a team game. But that doesn't mean all five players should have the same amount of shots.
quotes.author: Dean Smith

quotes.text: March is a month without mercy for rabid basketball fans. There is no such thing as a 'gentleman gambler' when the Big Dance rolls around. All sheep will be fleeced, all fools will be punished severely... There are no Rules when the deal goes down in the final weeks of March. Even your good friends will turn into monsters.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: I was actually supposed to be a basketball player, not an actress. My parents had me playing basketball on competitive teams when I was in kindergarten. Even though my heart belongs to the arts, I'm a tomboy at heart, too.
quotes.author: Zendaya

quotes.text: I'm not playing for other people; if I start thinking in those terms I would put too much pressure on myself. I play basketball because that is what I love to do.
quotes.author: Jeremy Lin

quotes.text: Growing up, I looked up to major league baseball players, and now these young women have amazing, incredible women all across the board, from swimming to gymnastics to softball to basketball. It is incredible how far women have come and women in sports have come.
quotes.author: Jennie Finch

quotes.text: You don't play against opponents, you play against the game of basketball.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.text: I'm a basketball player. That's what I do and what I love but that's just not all who I am. I'm talented in a lot of different areas.
quotes.author: Kevin Durant

quotes.text: Basketball is a simple game. Your goal is penetration, get the ball close to the basket, and there are three ways to do that. Pass, dribble and offensive rebound.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.text: My greatest gift that I have in life is basketball.
quotes.author: Isaiah Thomas

quotes.text: But the point of using the number was to show that sex was a great part of my life as basketball was a great part of my life. That's the reason why I was single.
quotes.author: Wilt Chamberlain

quotes.text: I don't know how tall I am or how much I weigh. Because I don't want anybody to know my identity. I'm like a superhero. Call me Basketball Man.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: I'm the basketball version of a gravedigger.
quotes.author: Dennis Rodman

quotes.text: You know, I think more people should watch women's basketball. It'd do so much for the game.
quotes.author: Kevin Durant

quotes.text: My personal life is the same. At the end of the day, this is just a job. I love what I do, and it's a great job. But it's like my alter ego. There's Chris Brown the singer. And there's Christopher Brown, the down-home Tappahannock boy that plays video games and basketball and hangs out.
quotes.author: Chris Brown

quotes.text: I think probably one of the coolest things was when I went to play basketball at Rucker Park in Harlem. First of all, who would think that Larry the Cable Guy would go to Harlem to play basketball? And I was received like a rock star. It was amazing! There were people everywhere. There were guys walking by yelling, 'Git 'r done!'
quotes.author: Larry the Cable Guy

quotes.text: I always wanted to be a basketball player. Nothing more, nothing less.
quotes.author: Dirk Nowitzki

quotes.text: I am sure that no man can derive more pleasure from money or power than I do from seeing a pair of basketball goals in some out of the way place.
quotes.author: James Naismith

quotes.text: The invention of basketball was not an accident. It was developed to meet a need. Those boys simply would not play 'Drop the Handkerchief.'
quotes.author: James Naismith

quotes.text: If we can take young people who excel at the highest levels, put them on the same kind of pedestal as the all-state basketball player and the all-state football player, and begin to get the same kind of recognition, it will have a profound effect, and we are finding that it does.
quotes.author: Ben Carson

quotes.text: I'm not a role model... Just because I dunk a basketball doesn't mean I should raise your kids.
quotes.author: Charles Barkley

quotes.text: I love sports. I've played basketball, baseball, soccer, tennis, track and field growing up.
quotes.author: Michael B. Jordan

quotes.text: I also tell them that your education can take you way farther than a football, baseball, track, or basketball will - that's just the bottom line.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.text: I lived to play basketball. Growing up as a kid, Bill Russell and the Boston Celtics were my favorite team. The way they played, the teamwork, the sacrifice, the commitment, the joy, the camaraderie, the relationship with the fans.
quotes.author: Bill Walton

quotes.text: What you are as a person is far more important than what you are as a basketball player.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: First impressions matter more in basketball than in any other sport, and they can be savored only in person. Players can't hide behind pads or helmets, so we can stare at them, evaluate every move they make: running, jumping, walking, even ogling the cheerleaders. We can see every ripple and tattoo. If they're lazy, we can tell.
quotes.author: Bill Simmons

quotes.text: Going in, you want to play a perfect season and play throughout the whole entire season, but injuries are a part of basketball.
quotes.author: Kyrie Irving

quotes.text: I'm not going to lie; listen, I'm nice at basketball.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.text: If you're a basketball player, you've got to shoot.
quotes.author: Oscar Robertson

quotes.text: One reason outfielders don't have stronger arms might be they don't practice as much as we did. Most teams today don't take outfield practice. Another reason is baseball has to compete with other sports now - basketball, football, soccer - for the better athletes that might have more skills and stronger arms.
quotes.author: Al Kaline

quotes.text: When I was young, I had to learn the fundamentals of basketball. You can have all the physical ability in the world, but you still have to know the fundamentals.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: In an individual sport, yes, you have to win titles. Baseball's different. But basketball, hockey? One person can control the tempo of a game, can completely alter the momentum of a series. There's a lot of great individual talent.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.text: My father made me who I am. He gave me a basketball and told me to play with the ball, sleep with the ball, dream with the ball. Just don't take it to school. I used it as a pillow, and it never gave me a stiff neck.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.text: I wasn't a bad basketball player, but I was far from the world's greatest. Good defense, no offense - that was me.
quotes.author: Chuck Connors

quotes.text: We don't do things we aren't good at by nature. I wouldn't play basketball because I'm only 5' 1". Find what you enjoy - whether it's racing, flying a helicopter, being a doctor, or stitching clothes together. Once you've done that, you have the passion you need.
quotes.author: Danica Patrick

quotes.text: I grew up in Westlake Villiage, a suburb of L.A. There was a guy there who was a fighter and was like, 'I'll teach you to box.' I started a little bit of boxing, then it crossed over into jiu-jitsu. I was into it for a little while, but then I started doing basketball, baseball, team sports.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lipnicki

quotes.text: I was homecoming queen. I was star of my basketball team.
quotes.author: Marla Maples

quotes.text: That's what I do now: I lead and I teach. If we win basketball games from doing that, then that's great, but I lead and teach. Those are the two things I concentrate on.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.text: When it gets down to it, basketball is basketball.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.text: When I step on that basketball court, I'm thinking about basketball, I'm thinking about winning - but there's so much that goes into thought about how I'm going to open this game up to others. It's so much more than just basketball.
quotes.author: Carmelo Anthony

quotes.text: You don't cut anywhere, don't pick down anywhere, don't double screen, no weak side picking. All these things that should happen in a game of basketball don't happen anymore.
quotes.author: Oscar Robertson

quotes.text: I love the 6 Nations rugby. I feel very Scottish then. I feel very Scottish now, sitting in the middle of Chelsea. But that's part of our heritage - being part of Britain, part of Europe. I love being European.
quotes.author: Rory Bremner

quotes.text: As a teenager, I was always this strange mixture of kind of vice-captain of the rugby team and sensitive artist type the rest of the time. I was sent away to this public school in the middle of nowhere, and I think we managed to completely miss out on normal youth culture.
quotes.author: Mark Haddon

quotes.text: I was a football fan before I became a rugby fan.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.text: I think rugby is 80 per cent mental.
quotes.author: Francois Hougaard

quotes.text: I played rugby for years, and I had a rugby jacket that I lost when I was 14. Somehow, my brother found it in storage 15 years later, and he gave it back to me for my 30th birthday. That was amazing and probably one of the best gifts I've ever received.
quotes.author: Ryan Reynolds

quotes.text: I didn't have to play rugby that well, and I didn't have to play cricket that well, because I had this voice.
quotes.author: Tom Jones

quotes.text: It's like a rugby team. If you're picking for the World Cup final, you're picking experience with youth. Everything is better off having that balance and that mix. I think that, especially, goes for the monarchy as well.
quotes.author: Prince William

quotes.text: Looking back, my whole life seems so surreal. I didn't just turn up on the doorstep playing rugby; I had to go through a whole lot of things to get there.
quotes.author: Jonah Lomu

quotes.text: If there is no blood on the line, it is not rugby league.
quotes.author: Russell Crowe

quotes.text: Rugby gave me a confidence. I was quite shy and relatively timid, but it gave me the confidence to be a little bit more out-going and back myself a bit more.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.text: He was a professional rugby player in the area that I played as a youngster. So a lot of people who I went to school with knew who he was and knew that he was black. So I would get racist taunts in school.
quotes.author: Ryan Giggs

quotes.text: I never ever believed that I would be able to give up on this dream which has driven me to live, breathe, love and embrace the game of rugby from the earliest days that I can remember.
quotes.author: Jonny Wilkinson

quotes.text: Rugby is great. The players don't wear helmets or padding; they just beat the living daylights out of each other and then go for a beer. I love that.
quotes.author: Joe Theismann

quotes.text: Rugby is a different game. There is an interruption every two minutes also in American football. Our soccer is a moving game: play, play, play, move, move - you don't interrupt.
quotes.author: Franz Beckenbauer

quotes.text: The scrum and the tackle are the two really contentious areas of the game. If you get those two aspects right, most rugby matches will work in your favour.
quotes.author: Alan Lewis

quotes.text: The Tory party is like a rugby union match in which all 30 players are wearing the same strip. They're not sure who they are grabbing round the knees, but they're having a lot of fun doing it.
quotes.author: Simon Hoggart

quotes.text: For reasons that baffle me still, my high school sports coaches put me in the first division of the rugby, cricket, and soccer teams.
quotes.author: Hamish Bowles

quotes.text: I was overwhelmed with messages of support I received from people around the rugby world. Sometimes you take it for granted, but I can't thank people enough for how much they supported me.
quotes.author: Matthew Rees

quotes.text: I wasn't, you know, Mr. Popular. I was somewhere in the middle ground. I was quite alternative, the things I liked to do. Skateboarding, at the time. Playing in a band as opposed to playing in the rugby team. You know, that kind of thing.
quotes.author: Iwan Rheon

quotes.text: My week at school would be good or bad depending on whether Balmain won. I have such fond memories of those suburban grounds, and everything was so undiluted. The players weren't censored, and for me it was a wonderful period of my life when everything was simple and pure. For me, that resonated with rugby league.
quotes.author: Matthew Nable

quotes.text: For me now, I will continue to focus ever harder on my goal of being the very best I can be with Toulon Rugby Club and continue to embrace and enjoy wherever that path takes me.
quotes.author: Jonny Wilkinson

quotes.text: I lost a dear friend of mine from a rugby injury at 26. We don't usually deal with mortality at that early age and it's given me an appreciation of time, of trying to fit everything in.
quotes.author: Matthew Rhys

quotes.text: Soccer is a continuous game, rugby is a continuous game, but for the physical elements that are involved in playing a football game and the number of plays that you play, I don't know that it was ever intended to be a continuous game.
quotes.author: Nick Saban

quotes.text: As a kid in New Zealand, you play cricket in summer and rugby in winter. I played cricket and hockey. Not rugby. I wasn't brawny enough for it. Or silly enough, perhaps.
quotes.author: Glenn Turner

quotes.text: I played rugby most of my life and then I switched to snowboarding, which provided me a lot of inspiration.
quotes.author: Charlie Bewley

quotes.text: Wrestling and boxing is like Ping-Pong and rugby. There's no connection.
quotes.author: Mickey Rourke

quotes.text: Football is at least as 'gay' as rugby, Greco-Roman wrestling and the film '300.'
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: Rugby takes its toll.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.text: Your name or what you've done on the rugby pitch is not going to carry you through for the rest of your life. I realise I'm going to have to eventually do something else, and that does frighten me a little bit.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.text: The most scared I'd ever been was the first time I sang at a rugby match, Australia versus New Zealand, in front of one hundred thousand people. I had a panic attack the night before because people have been booed off and never worked again... just singing one song, the national anthem.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.text: I tried to play rugby but was never very good.
quotes.author: Ralph Fiennes

quotes.text: I love baseball. And American Football, too. But not rugby.
quotes.author: Carlos Slim

quotes.text: When things could've gone really bad, rugby caught my interest and I really stuck with it. The sport brought me, maybe off the streets where we'd be fighting, into putting in a good effort in the rugby field where you're kind of rewarded for that rough behaviour instead of in trouble with the law.
quotes.author: Daniel Cudmore

quotes.text: I've kind of banned myself from motorcycles. I've had broken ribs, broken shoulder, wrists, leg, broken collarbone - and it was all from motocross or rugby. All of my injuries have come from outside of sailing.
quotes.author: James Spithill

quotes.text: I like rugby - I watch it from time to time. It's basically football without pads but probably a little bit more dangerous than football. You've got to be a lot tougher in that sport - but I definitely like watching rugby and watching those guys knock each other around. It looks like a fun sport.
quotes.author: Reggie Bush

quotes.text: I passed the 11-plus, but it was decided that I should take the Common Entrance exam to Monmouth School, the nearest independent. I was never entirely comfortable there, as they didn't have girls, and they played rugby instead of football.
quotes.author: Saul David

quotes.text: I come from a country that lives and breathes rugby, and I didn't think there would be anywhere else in the world that could be the same. But New Zealand takes it to another dimension. It's extraordinary how much passion Kiwis have for the game.
quotes.author: Luke Evans

quotes.text: I like to think I play rugby as it should be played - there are no yellow or red cards in my collection - but I cannot say I'm an angel.
quotes.author: Jonny Wilkinson

quotes.text: My uncle played rugby, and my dad played football, and they used to argue which game was the roughest - and everybody agreed rugby was. It's a great team sport, and to be successful, every person has to play in the same level.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.text: I still dream about that one opportunity where the Welsh Rugby Union call me up and say, 'We need you.' There is an incredibly talented Welsh hooker called Matthew Rees, so maybe some incredible quirk of misfortune for him would mean I get called up instead.
quotes.author: Matthew Rhys

quotes.text: I'm a huge Rugby Union fan, which is a bit like American football - but tougher.
quotes.author: Alexander Hanson

quotes.text: As a kid, I was school swot, but I used to hang around the billiard halls, learning that Geordie sense of humour, mixing with low-lifes. They were the sort who'd pick your pocket and then say 'Here you are lad, here's tuppence, get yourself some chips'. I was a good rugby player, a good runner, so I fitted in at Cambridge quite easily.
quotes.author: Sid Waddell

quotes.text: I had my footballing heroes such as Bryan Robson and Diego Maradona but my dad was a rugby league star, and he was my real hero. But the relationship with my mum was rocky and we saw things that would affect any youngster.
quotes.author: Ryan Giggs

quotes.text: I see similarities in the sports I played growing up in the sense of how I tackle a role when I get a job. A lot of effort goes in on an individual basis. There is a lot of time spent by yourself working on your craft and what you have to do. But, at the end of the day, you're there to serve the movie just like you would the rugby team.
quotes.author: Luke Bracey

quotes.text: I've spent a lot of my teenage years working on sets. I've missed out on more than just playing rugby, but I think I've managed to keep my feet on the ground and keep my friends around me.
quotes.author: Douglas Booth

quotes.text: I'm not privy to the English set-up, but at the academies in Ireland, there is a huge focus on the weights room as opposed to whether they can throw a 10-metre pass on the run. They should be rugby players becoming athletes, not athletes becoming rugby players.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.text: I've always said that playing rugby in Spain is like being a bullfighter in Japan.
quotes.author: Javier Bardem

quotes.text: Playing football and rugby is the Samoan sport. It's part of the conversation at church. It's part of the conversation in their barbershops, in the grocery stores. It's what everyone is aware of and familiar with. They take a lot of pride in the beating you can take in the course of that sport.
quotes.author: Junior Seau

quotes.text: I've always played sport. I played rugby, I was involved in athletics, I played cricket... I'm an outdoors kind of guy.
quotes.author: Jai Courtney

quotes.text: I was playing rugby and the other games English school children do, and there was an event in which races were run, and I won these by a considerable margin.
quotes.author: Roger Bannister

quotes.text: I would have thought there's no greater country to watch rugby than New Zealand.
quotes.author: Jamie Bamber

quotes.text: With all the traveling and promotion I've been doing for 'Murderball,' its been difficult keeping up with my rugby training.
quotes.author: Mark Zupan

quotes.text: It's a really exciting time to be involved in Welsh rugby.
quotes.author: Jonah Lomu

quotes.text: To make this announcement fills me with great sadness, but I know I have been blessed in so many ways to have experienced what I have with the England rugby team.
quotes.author: Jonny Wilkinson

quotes.text: I turned up my nose at yoga for years. I was a rugby player growing up. But now I know. When I'm on those long international flights, like 22 hours from L.A. to Sydney, I'll get up sometimes and do yoga in the aisle just to stretch out a little bit.
quotes.author: Jason O'Mara
