quotes.text: One who doesn't throw the dice can never expect to score a six.
quotes.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quotes.text: Life is full of confusion. Confusion of love, passion, and romance. Confusion of family and friends. Confusion with life itself. What path we take, what turns we make. How we roll our dice.
quotes.author: Matthew Underwood

quotes.text: God does not play dice.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I shall never believe that God plays dice with the world.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The soldiers that didn't come back were the heroes. It's a roll of the dice. If a bullet has your name on it, you're a hero. If you hear a bullet go by, you're a survivor.
quotes.author: Bob Feller

quotes.text: Apple Computer would not have reached its current peak of success if it had feared to roll the dice and launch products that didn't always hit the mark. In the mid-1990s, the company was considered washed up, Steve Jobs had departed, and a string of lackluster product launches unrelated to the company's core business.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.text: Death and the dice level all distinctions.
quotes.author: Samuel Foote

quotes.text: I read Shakespeare and the Bible, and I can shoot dice. That's what I call a liberal education.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.text: So long as the laws remain such as they are today, employ some discretion: loud opinion forces us to do so; but in privacy and silence let us compensate ourselves for that cruel chastity we are obliged to display in public.
quotes.author: Marquis de Sade

quotes.text: All of a sudden, Hulk Hogan has become retro. Hulk Hogan has become cool again. So to come out and to hear how loud the fans are. To hear how loyal the fans are, it's truly overwhelming. I just can't believe I've been reborn in the WWE.
quotes.author: Hulk Hogan

quotes.text: It's good to have certain restrictions sometimes, but it's definitely more fun to play really loud, with distortion.
quotes.author: J Mascis

quotes.text: I'm a big personality. I walk into a room, big and tall and loud.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.text: Relaxing, experiencing nature and laughing are what rejuvenate me and make me feel happy. I believe that when I feel happy, that's when I look beautiful... I make a point of laughing out loud every single day.
quotes.author: Sui He

quotes.text: Musicians want to be the loud voice for so many quiet hearts.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.text: They say actions speak louder than words, but actions don't speak. People speak, and people are loud.
quotes.author: Jennette McCurdy

quotes.text: When you think about rock at its origin, and you think of the Beatles and millions of kids screaming as loud as they can and running as fast as they can towards the Beatles, there's no one who is that kind of lightning rod, who commands that kind of power and has that kind of creative magma.
quotes.author: Jack Black

quotes.text: I'm a Berliner - fast, loud, obnoxious, industrious, brutally open.
quotes.author: Hasso Plattner

quotes.text: In America, the race goes to the loud, the solemn, the hustler. If you think you're a great writer, you must say that you are.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.text: I come from a big, loud family, and I'm the quieter one. Performing is something I have to switch on. I've heard I get real sassy onstage, which I'm not in real life! It's fun to be that person for an hour a night.
quotes.author: Lorde

quotes.text: Quiet is better than loud.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams

quotes.text: It's a humbling thing, having kids. One of my sons came to rehearsals, and now he says Daddy's job is 'go play loud music.'
quotes.author: Trent Reznor

quotes.text: Quiet is the new loud.
quotes.author: Patrick Stump

quotes.text: My optimism wears heavy boots and is loud.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: The sound of a kiss is not so loud as that of a cannon, but its echo lasts a great deal longer.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.text: Everything becomes a little different as soon as it is spoken out loud.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.text: I remember my choir teacher in high school told me, 'When in doubt, sing loud.' I'm a terrible singer, but I always auditioned for the musicals, and would get cast in them because I really would just put it all out there. That was really good advice, and I think it works for everything, not just acting.
quotes.author: Judy Greer

quotes.text: The clock talked loud. I threw it away, it scared me what it talked.
quotes.author: Tillie Olsen

quotes.text: First thing every morning before you arise say out loud, 'I believe,' three times.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: When I plug in my guitar and play it really loud, loud enough to deafen most people, that's my shot of adrenaline, and there's nothing like it. That's what it's always been for me - to be the flame the tribe dances around.
quotes.author: Joe Perry

quotes.text: America's downgrade may serve as a wakeup call for its policymakers. It is an unambiguous and loud signal of the country's eroding economic strength and global standing. It renders urgent the need to regain the initiative through better economic policymaking and more coherent governance.
quotes.author: Mohamed El-Erian

quotes.text: If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.text: I spend several days at a time without enough sleep. At first, normal activities become annoying. When you are too tired to eat, you really need some sleep. A few days later, things become strange. Loud noises become louder and more startling, familiar sounds become unfamiliar, and life reinvents itself as a surrealist dream.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: This is my saddest story: In grade school, they would have us open our Valentine's cards and read them out loud. I always sent cards to myself because nobody else did.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.text: Perseverance is a great element of success. If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: One of my sensory problems was hearing sensitivity, where certain loud noises, such as a school bell, hurt my ears. It sounded like a dentist drill going through my ears.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.text: Many people believe that introversion is about being antisocial, and that's really a misperception. Because actually it's just that introverts are differently social. So they would prefer to have a glass of wine with a close friend as opposed to going to a loud party full of strangers.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.text: Strength does not have to be belligerent and loud.
quotes.author: Russell Brand

quotes.text: If you believe that your best years are behind you, you've guaranteed they are; I'm going to dance into that good night, with the oldies turned up loud.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.text: I don't think we realise just how fast we go until you stop for a minute and realise just how loud and how hectic your life is, and how easily distracted you can get.
quotes.author: Meg Ryan

quotes.text: I have this idea of myself as this quiet, observant, thoughtful child, which my parents roundly contradict. They claim that I was loud and bossy and dancing all the time.
quotes.author: Carrie Coon

quotes.text: Look up, laugh loud, talk big, keep the color in your cheek and the fire in your eye, adorn your person, maintain your health, your beauty and your animal spirits.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.text: In the household in which I was raised, the themes were pretty simple. 'Work hard. Don't quit. Be appreciative, be thankful, be grateful, be respectful. Also, never whine, never complain. And always, for crying out loud, keep a sense of humor.'
quotes.author: Michael Keaton

quotes.text: One of my favorite things to do is to play music really loud and dance my butt off in the morning. I'll do it alone in my apartment. You can't have a bad day after that.
quotes.author: Allison Williams

quotes.text: The suit does not represent the businessman anymore. Nor does the loud shirt represent the rock star. The same man can now wear both.
quotes.author: Donatella Versace

quotes.text: In my circle of friends, I've always been loud and funny and talkative. But as soon as I step out of that circle, I get very quiet and introspective. I don't want the spotlight on me.
quotes.author: Rosie Perez

quotes.text: I am an artist... I am here to live out loud.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.text: We humans are hard to deal with. We are a loud, complex and demanding bunch. Often, we are best dealt with from a safe distance and for only brief periods of time. This could be why a lot of marriages fail.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: I have a message from the Tea Party, a message that is loud and clear and does not mince words. We've come to take our government back.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.text: I think it's fantastic when the young enrage their elders. I really do believe that if it's too loud, you are indeed too old, and that if it has been standing for too long, it needs a thorough inspection.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: When the baby dies, On every side Rose stranger's voices, hard and harsh and loud. The baby was not wrapped in any shroud. The mother made no sound. Her head was bowed That men's eyes might not see Her misery.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.text: My mother hoped I would meet a nice doctor or barrister or accountant who would marry me and take me to live in what is now called Fashionable Dublin Four. But she felt that this was a vain hope. I was a bit loud to make a nice professional wife, and anyway, I was too keen on spending my holidays in far flung places to meet any of these people.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.text: Actually, I don't even like parties. I would much prefer a room with four friends who sit around and have dinner. I detest nightclubs. And I don't like places where the noise is so loud you can't talk to people.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.text: Great leaders state out loud what they intend to do and in doing so, they get things done.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.text: I am quite loud and bolshie. I'm a big personality. I walk into a room, big and tall and loud.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.text: Spoken word poetry is the art of performance poetry. I tell people it involves creating poetry that doesn't just want to sit on paper, that something about it demands it be heard out loud or witnessed in person.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.text: Justice Rehnquist was friendly and unpretentious. He wore scuffed Hush Puppy shoes. That was my first lesson. Clothes do not make the man. The Justice sported long sideburns and Buddy Holly glasses long after they were fashionable. And he wore loud ties that I am confident were never fashionable.
quotes.author: John Roberts

quotes.text: If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: Many scientists have been drawn to Buddhism out of a sense that the Western tradition has delivered an impoverished conception of basic, human sanity. In the West, if you speak to yourself out loud all day long, you are considered crazy. But speaking to yourself silently - thinking incessantly - is considered perfectly normal.
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.text: There's several ways of saying what's on your mind. And in states and counties where it ain't too healthy to talk too loud, speak your mind, or even vote like you want to, folks have found other ways of getting the word around. One of the mainest ways is by singing.
quotes.author: Woody Guthrie

quotes.text: My parents are both very funny but they're also relatively soft-spoken, normal human beings while I'm just a lunatic. I don't know where this loud, ballsy, hammy ridiculousness came from. I'm just glad I followed my goals and my parents did too. It's not like we even had a plan when I dragged my mom to Los Angeles.
quotes.author: Emma Stone

quotes.text: We've been taught to believe that actions speak louder than words. But I think words speak pretty loud all of our lives; we carry these words in our head.
quotes.author: Marlo Thomas

quotes.text: Loud is a way of life.
quotes.author: Steven Adler

quotes.text: I'm the gun guy, a loud guitar Dirty Harry with a ponytail.
quotes.author: Ted Nugent

quotes.text: If you love someone, you say it, right then, out loud. Otherwise, the moment just passes you by.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.text: Writing is a solitary experience. I'm extremely superstitious. If I talk about the book or name the title out loud before finishing, I feel the energy I need to write will be drained. It's so intimate, I can't even share it with my wife.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: I didn't learn to read until I was almost 14 years old. Reading out loud for me was a nightmare because I would mispronounce words or reconstruct things that weren't even there. That's when one of my teachers discovered I had a learning disability called dyslexia. Once I got help, I read very well!
quotes.author: Patricia Polacco

quotes.text: Dad could talk about peace and love out loud to the world, but he could never show it to the people who supposedly meant the most to him: his wife and son. How can you talk about peace and love and have a family in bits and pieces - no communication, adultery, divorce? You can't do it, not if you're being true and honest with yourself.
quotes.author: Julian Lennon

quotes.text: You can be strong and true to yourself without being rude or loud.
quotes.author: Paula Radcliffe

quotes.text: 'The Panorama' is also the last place anywhere in New York where the World Trade Center still stands, whole, as it stood in the early morning of September 11. I can also see the corner where I saw the first tower fall and howled out loud. Seeing the buildings again here is uplifting, healing.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: 'Talk to me,' it's what you say to someone to let them know you're there. Just three simple words. But saying them out loud could help save a life.
quotes.author: Kevin McHale

quotes.text: The applause was so loud and insistent that I had to respond with several encores. I was numb with happiness, when it was over, I knew that this alone must be my life and my world.
quotes.author: Leni Riefenstahl

quotes.text: Every now and then, someone will tell me that one of my books has made them laugh out loud. I never believe them because: a.) my books don't make me laugh out loud; and b.) sometimes I have said this to a writer, when really what I meant was, 'Your book made me smile appreciatively.'
quotes.author: Mary Roach

quotes.text: The White Company offers its loyalists an altogether better, whiter world. The White people have edited out any colours that aren't white, off-white, milk chocolate, grey, taupe or black. They can't be doing with Johnnie Boden's cheery Sloane jokes, his spots and stripes, his occasional 'if it's me, it's U' loud colours.
quotes.author: Peter York

quotes.text: With all singers, insecurity is your best security. That's why we're such loud people and why we walk all funny. You think, 'Are people interested?' But I think our band has something and they know we don't just put albums out. We do think about it.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.text: I love readings and my readers, but the din of voices of the audience gives me stage fright, and the din of voices inside whisper that I am a fraud, and that the jig is up. Surely someone will rise up from the audience and say out loud that not only am I not funny and helpful, but I'm annoying, and a phony.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: I feel like there's an obsession with pace right now in theater, with things being very fast and very witty and very loud, and I think we're all so freaked out about theater keeping audiences interested because everybody's so freaked out about theater becoming irrelevant.
quotes.author: Annie Baker

quotes.text: I'm so loud, as if I know what I'm on about, but deep inside, I'm so insecure. Just a little girl.
quotes.author: Katie Price

quotes.text: If you're politically correct, chances are you're not coming to one of my shows. I get to go onstage and say things that everybody thinks all the time, but can't say out loud.
quotes.author: Russell Peters

quotes.text: My parents allowed their two sons to be individuals. My family was a wild and wonderful place, with lots of friends and neighbors visiting and talking loud and eating loud and nobody telling the children to be quiet or putting them down.
quotes.author: John Cassavetes

quotes.text: All our fans are always very loud, especially Scousers.
quotes.author: Louis Tomlinson

quotes.text: I love loud music. I listen loud, and that's part of how I've learned how to do this. Record softly and play back loud and a whole other thing happens.
quotes.author: T Bone Burnett

quotes.text: Some animals utter a loud cry. Some are silent, and others have a voice, which in some cases may be expressed by a word; in others, it cannot. There are also noisy animals and silent animals, musical and unmusical kinds, but they are mostly noisy about the breeding season.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: I've always thought stand-up comedians were the oral storytellers of our time, because they know rhetoric, they know delivery, they know timing, they know all of these things that you can only learn by telling a story out loud and interacting with an audience.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.text: This is life we've been given, made to be lived out, so... live out loud.
quotes.author: Steven Curtis Chapman

quotes.text: I don't feel a day older when it comes to my approach to music or what gets me off than when I was a teenager. I've always been into different kinds of stuff and when I play I like to play loud. I like my arm hairs to move and I like my body to vibrate 'cause I like the feel of it; I'm still a teenager at heart.
quotes.author: Eddie Van Halen

quotes.text: There may be something good in silence. It's a brand new thing. You can hear the funniest little discussions, if you keep turning the volume down. Shut yourself up, and listen out loud.
quotes.author: Wes Borland

quotes.text: I do the protest stuff. I do country and western. I play both acoustic and electric guitar in a lot of different styles, from loud, psychedelic stuff to quiet finger-picking.
quotes.author: Eugene Chadbourne

quotes.text: My favorite way to blow off steam is to sing obnoxiously loud in the shower.
quotes.author: Chris Pratt

quotes.text: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: Music is a moral law. It gives soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and charm and gaiety to life and to everything.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Music expresses that which cannot be said and on which it is impossible to be silent.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Where words fail, music speaks.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.text: I think music in itself is healing. It's an explosive expression of humanity. It's something we are all touched by. No matter what culture we're from, everyone loves music.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.text: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: If music be the food of love, play on.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

quotes.text: I was born with music inside me. Music was one of my parts. Like my ribs, my kidneys, my liver, my heart. Like my blood. It was a force already within me when I arrived on the scene. It was a necessity for me - like food or water.
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.text: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.text: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.text: Music is the strongest form of magic.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.text: Music can change the world because it can change people.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.text: Music is the shorthand of emotion.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: Beautiful music is the art of the prophets that can calm the agitations of the soul; it is one of the most magnificent and delightful presents God has given us.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: After silence, that which comes nearest to expressing the inexpressible is music.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: It is cruel, you know, that music should be so beautiful. It has the beauty of loneliness of pain: of strength and freedom. The beauty of disappointment and never-satisfied love. The cruel beauty of nature and everlasting beauty of monotony.
quotes.author: Benjamin Britten

quotes.text: Jazz is smooth and cool. Jazz is rage. Jazz flows like water. Jazz never seems to begin or end. Jazz isn't methodical, but jazz isn't messy either. Jazz is a conversation, a give and take. Jazz is the connection and communication between musicians. Jazz is abandon.
quotes.author: Nat Wolff

quotes.text: If you want to be a rock star or just be famous, then run down the street naked, you'll make the news or something. But if you want music to be your livelihood, then play, play, play and play! And eventually you'll get to where you want to be.
quotes.author: Eddie Van Halen

quotes.text: Remember the first time you went to a show and saw your favorite band. You wore their shirt, and sang every word. You didn't know anything about scene politics, haircuts, or what was cool. All you knew was that this music made you feel different from anyone you shared a locker with. Someone finally understood you. This is what music is about.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.text: Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Music is forever; music should grow and mature with you, following you right on up until you die.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.text: Music is my religion.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: I don't make music for eyes. I make music for ears.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.text: Next to the Word of God, the noble art of music is the greatest treasure in the world.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: For me, singing sad songs often has a way of healing a situation. It gets the hurt out in the open into the light, out of the darkness.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.text: Classical music is the kind we keep thinking will turn into a tune.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.text: There are more love songs than anything else. If songs could make you do something we'd all love one another.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.text: Music is only love looking for words.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.text: All music is beautiful.
quotes.author: Billy Strayhorn

quotes.text: We all love musical architecture; there's no doubt about that.
quotes.author: Levon Helm

quotes.text: True music must repeat the thought and inspirations of the people and the time.
quotes.author: George Gershwin

quotes.text: The world's most famous and popular language is music.
quotes.author: Psy

quotes.text: Tones sound, and roar and storm about me until I have set them down in notes.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.text: Music should be your escape.
quotes.author: Missy Elliott

quotes.text: Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: You are the music while the music lasts.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: The iPod completely changed the way people approach music.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.text: I asked my daughter when she was 16, What's the buzz on the street with the kids? She's going, to be honest, Dad, most of my friends aren't into Kiss. But they've all been told that it's the greatest show on Earth.
quotes.author: Ace Frehley

quotes.text: You know, all my songs are relatives, brothers, sisters, cousins.
quotes.author: David Coverdale

quotes.text: I think its so cool that you can pick up the guitar and create something that didn't exist 5 minutes ago. You can write something that no ones ever heard before. You have music at your fingertips.
quotes.author: Michelle Branch

quotes.text: Music's not like becoming a doctor, who can walk into a community and find people who need him.
quotes.author: Charlie Byrd

quotes.text: Every song is like a painting.
quotes.author: Dick Dale

quotes.text: I see music as fluid architecture.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.text: I've said that playing the blues is like having to be black twice. Stevie Ray Vaughan missed on both counts, but I never noticed.
quotes.author: B. B. King

quotes.text: I guess a good song is a good song is a good song, ya know.
quotes.author: George Thorogood

quotes.text: That was when I realised that music is the most profound, magical form of communication there is.
quotes.author: Lesley Garrett

quotes.text: Music is love in search of a word.
quotes.author: Sidney Lanier

quotes.text: When words leave off, music begins.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.text: Music is God's gift to man, the only art of Heaven given to earth, the only art of earth we take to Heaven.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.text: But when you get music and words together, that can be a very powerful thing.
quotes.author: Bryan Ferry

quotes.text: Music has charms to sooth a savage breast, to soften rocks, or bend a knotted oak.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.text: Music is very spiritual, it has the power to bring people together.
quotes.author: Edgar Winter

quotes.text: The only love affair I have ever had was with music.
quotes.author: Maurice Ravel

quotes.text: Lean your body forward slightly to support the guitar against your chest, for the poetry of the music should resound in your heart.
quotes.author: Andres Segovia

quotes.text: The advice I am giving always to all my students is above all to study the music profoundly... music is like the ocean, and the instruments are little or bigger islands, very beautiful for the flowers and trees.
quotes.author: Andres Segovia

quotes.text: If you want to make beautiful music, you must play the black and the white notes together.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: Music happens to be an art form that transcends language.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.text: Music is the best means we have of digesting time.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.text: When people hear good music, it makes them homesick for something they never had, and never will have.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.text: It was my 16th birthday - my mom and dad gave me my Goya classical guitar that day. I sat down, wrote this song, and I just knew that that was the only thing I could ever really do - write songs and sing them to people.
quotes.author: Stevie Nicks

quotes.text: Music is moonlight in the gloomy night of life.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.text: Music, in performance, is a type of sculpture. The air in the performance is sculpted into something.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.text: Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.text: Music is everybody's possession. It's only publishers who think that people own it.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Music doesn't lie. If there is something to be changed in this world, then it can only happen through music.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: Music should strike fire from the heart of man, and bring tears from the eyes of woman.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.text: If a composer could say what he had to say in words he would not bother trying to say it in music.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.text: My music had roots which I'd dug up from my own childhood, musical roots buried in the darkest soil.
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.text: Times were changing. Clothes were changing. Morals were changing. We went from romantic loves songs like I used to do to rock 'n roll. Now that has changed to rap. So, there's always a new generation with new music.
quotes.author: Bobby Vinton

quotes.text: There's nothing like music to relieve the soul and uplift it.
quotes.author: Mickey Hart

quotes.text: Music is the soundtrack of your life.
quotes.author: Dick Clark

quotes.text: Who hears music feels his solitude peopled at once.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.text: You can never get silence anywhere nowadays, have you noticed?
quotes.author: Bryan Ferry

quotes.text: Music is the fourth great material want, first food, then clothes, then shelter, then music.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.text: The wise musicians are those who play what they can master.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.text: There's a lot of music that sounds like it's literally computer-generated, totally divorced from a guy sitting down at an instrument.
quotes.author: Aimee Mann

quotes.text: Sometimes before we make a record I go back and listen to a few. It's equally humbling and uplifting.
quotes.author: Michael Stipe

quotes.text: You have the sun, you have the moon, you have the air that you breathe - and you have the Rolling Stones!
quotes.author: Keith Richards

quotes.text: I've learned over the years that if you start thinking about the race, it stresses you out a little bit. I just try to relax and think about video games, what I'm gonna do after the race, what I'm gonna do just to chill. Stuff like that to relax a little before the race.
quotes.author: Usain Bolt

quotes.text: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.text: There are plenty of skills I've learned from playing video games. It's more interactive than watching TV, because there are problems to solve as you're using your brain.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.text: I'm very careful about how I portray violence in my films. I do believe that violence, especially violent video games, are not a good thing for young kids.
quotes.author: Spike Lee

quotes.text: Everyone has played video games at some point these days, and video games are fun.
quotes.author: PewDiePie

quotes.text: Most of the planet's terrestrial surfaces are visually accessible through video cameras and satellite imagery, if not physically within reach. Even the approaches to Mount Everest are now littered with human debris. One can drive to Timbuktu, which for centuries was synonymous with inaccessibility.
quotes.author: Alan Huffman

quotes.text: If I can have the opportunity to go into an editing room, it's like the golden ticket for me. All I want is to learn about everything else in the filmmaking process. I just directed a music video which just came out and that'd sort of be the area of the field that I'm going to move into, I hope.
quotes.author: Nikki Reed

quotes.text: Riding my motorcycle around L.A. is like my own video game. But unlike many folks at the wheel, I am occupied with getting where I'm going and keeping myself safe. Most people are applying makeup, texting, and checking out the beauty in the next car.
quotes.author: Hugh Laurie

quotes.text: While films are a very visual and emotional artistic medium, video games take it one step further into the realm of a unique personal experience.
quotes.author: Jet Li

quotes.text: That's really one of the things I love about video games. It's a whole new world every time you start.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hale

quotes.text: I didn't grow up playing video games. I grew up catching crawdads in the creek and minnows and lizards and snakes.
quotes.author: Blake Shelton

quotes.text: It's got to be harder in real life to win a World Cup. But depending on if you play World Class level on FIFA, it's going to be difficult to win in the video game, too.
quotes.author: Landon Donovan

quotes.text: Each week, I post a video about some 'Pigeon of Discontent' raised by a reader. Because, as much as we try to find the 'Bluebird of Happiness,' we're also plagued by those small but pesky 'Pigeons of Discontent.'
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.text: The very first video experience I had was in high school. They brought a black-and-white closed-circuit surveillance camera into the classroom. I will never forget, as a kid, looking at that image.
quotes.author: Bill Viola

quotes.text: For me, seeing the progression of video games and consoles - whether it be PlayStation, Xbox, or whatever - I think just seeing how good they've gotten from the days when I first started playing is just amazing.
quotes.author: Justin Verlander

quotes.text: People think about the world of TV and the world of online video as being different ways to distribute video. But what happens when every TV is connected to wi-fi with a browser?
quotes.author: Chad Hurley

quotes.text: Advertisers and marketers should be looking to bring new experiences to different parts of the brain. It's a more profound idea than just dropping a billboard into a video game.
quotes.author: Jaron Lanier

quotes.text: Video games and computers have become babysitters for kids.
quotes.author: Taylor Kitsch

quotes.text: I like video games, but they are very violent. I want to create a video game in which you have to help all the characters who have died in the other games. 'Hey, man, what are you playing?' 'Super Busy Hospital. Could you leave me alone? I'm performing surgery! This guy got shot in the head, like, 27 times!'
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: It's not good enough for us to have generations of kids that... look forward to a better version of a cell phone with a video in it. They need to look forward to exploration.
quotes.author: Burt Rutan

quotes.text: It's something you dream about as a kid. Like when you play all those NCAA video games as a kid and you create your own player and win the Heisman with a bunch of crazy numbers. It's the biggest, most prestigious award in college football, so it'd definitely be a dream come true.
quotes.author: Johnny Manziel

quotes.text: To the casual observer, the Dropbox demo video looked like a normal product demonstration, but we put in about a dozen Easter eggs that were tailored for the Digg audience. References to Tay Zonday and 'Chocolate Rain' and allusions to 'Office Space' and 'XKCD.' It was a tongue-in-cheek nod to that crowd, and it kicked off a chain reaction.
quotes.author: Drew Houston

quotes.text: When it comes to the video channels and the programs, the radio stations, the music is geared towards kids, and it's made by kids.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.text: The video game culture was an important thing to keep alive in the film because we're in a new era right now. The idea that kids can play video games like Grand Theft Auto or any video game is amazing. The video games are one step before a whole other virtual universe.
quotes.author: Vin Diesel

quotes.text: It's very difficult to get any footage of yourself doing what you love unless you have a friend who's a photographer or videographer and wants to document you. That was really the idea and the goal from the beginning: to help people get a good photo, and then it was to help people get a good video.
quotes.author: Nick Woodman

quotes.text: The obvious objective of video games is to entertain people by surprising them with new experiences.
quotes.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quotes.text: But audio is a component of video, so there's always been that anyway, and although we've never expressed a visual side apart from the Grateful Dead movie, I don't find it that remote, you know what I mean? It's a departure of sorts, but it's like a first cousin.
quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

quotes.text: My wife Juliana and I first saw Eurovision while on our honeymoon in Greece in 2006, and we were amazed by it. They basically recreate a music video onstage, and pyro cannons, LED video screens, background dancers, fireworks, costume changes, and wind machines are their tools.
quotes.author: Seamus Dever

quotes.text: Video games are bad for you? That's what they said about rock-n-roll.
quotes.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quotes.text: I moved to California when I was twelve and I got a video camera and made little movies because I didn't have any friends yet. I would force my sister to make these movies with me - which became my YouTube channel.
quotes.author: Dylan O'Brien

quotes.text: There are big lines between those who play video games and those who do not. For those who don't, video games are irrelevant. They think all video games must be too difficult.
quotes.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quotes.text: For all the power of video and film, I am not giving up my pen. I am just much more likely to try to link essays to webcasts or videos. The best way for these two media to move forward, to inform and make change, is in tandem; together they are more than the sum of their parts.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.text: 'Y Tu Mama Tambien' is one of the first unrated movies to be nominated for an Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay. But many video stores won't take a movie that's not rated, so I had to make the movie an R.
quotes.author: Alfonso Cuaron

quotes.text: My mom didn't let me play video games growing up, so now I do. Gaming gives me a chance to just let go, blow somebody up and fight somebody from another dimension. It's all escapism.
quotes.author: Wayne Brady

quotes.text: I see fighters make funny videos about me and stick them on Facebook and get 20 likes. When I make a video, I sell it to Fox and make seven figures. That's the difference.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.text: Most of us grew up with video games in the household, either the original Nintendo in the living room or hoarding quarters for that trip to the arcade. And as time moves on, that line of nostalgia will keep moving forward where 'Frogger' gets replaced with 'Street Fighter 2' or 'Resident Evil 4.'
quotes.author: Rob Manuel

quotes.text: I think I was just bored one summer afternoon, and I decided to post a little video of me singing and playing guitar out of tune.
quotes.author: Shawn Mendes

quotes.text: My personal life is the same. At the end of the day, this is just a job. I love what I do, and it's a great job. But it's like my alter ego. There's Chris Brown the singer. And there's Christopher Brown, the down-home Tappahannock boy that plays video games and basketball and hangs out.
quotes.author: Chris Brown

quotes.text: I'm a huge video gamer, sometimes a little too much. I'll shut myself in my room just so I can play video games all day and I end up neglecting my friends.
quotes.author: Lucas Till

quotes.text: Technology is permeating every single thing we do... And to the extent that we can better expose our young people to all the different ways that technology can be used, not just for video games or toys, we're planning for the future.
quotes.author: Marc Morial

quotes.text: We cannot and will not ban the creation of violent video games. But, we can prevent the distribution of these disturbing games to children, where their effects can be negative.
quotes.author: Herb Kohl

quotes.text: I used to do my best thinking while staring out airplane windows. The seat-back video system put a stop to that. Now I sit and watch old' Friends' and 'Everybody Loves Raymond' episodes. Walking is good, but here again, technology has interfered. I like to listen to iTunes while I walk home. I guess I don't think anymore.
quotes.author: Mary Roach

quotes.text: I feel like maybe I'm part of that generation that became more of a gamer than a video consumer. It's always been something I've done with my spare time. If I had three hours on a Friday night, I'm not out partying. I'm probably playing video games.
quotes.author: Felicia Day

quotes.text: This generation is so dead. You ask a kid, 'What are you doing this Saturday?' and they'll be playing video games or watching cable, instead of building model cars or airplanes or doing something creative. Kids today never say, 'Man, I'm really into remote-controlled steamboats.'
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.text: People think they have a perfect idea of who you are from a four-second Snapchat video... and fake blogs, stories, magazine covers. In reality, that's not the case. Nobody knows who I am except family and my close friends.
quotes.author: Kylie Jenner

quotes.text: All of the books in the world contain no more information than is broadcast as video in a single large American city in a single year. Not all bits have equal value.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: I'm a video game fan, and I always thought it would be cool to be able to control a character.
quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

quotes.text: I've got an extra-specific story about Dr. Dre. I saw him when I was 9 years old in Compton - him and Tupac. They were shooting the second 'California Love' video. My pops had seen him and ran back to the house and got me, put me on his neck, and we stood there watching Dre and Pac in a Bentley.
quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.text: The more downtime we have, the more time you have to play games like 'Ghost Recon Future Soldiers,' so for me it's a fun way to get integrated into video games and for me to have fun with my buddies and team up and go into battle with 'em, kind of like out there on court.
quotes.author: Kevin Love

quotes.text: I'd much rather see a world where, when you make some quirky comment on a blog or news story or you upload a video clip, instead of just a moment of fame for your pseudonym, you'll get 50 bucks. The first time that happens, you'll realise that you're a full-class citizen. You have the potential to make money from the system.
quotes.author: Jaron Lanier

quotes.text: We have parties at my house. My girlfriends and I play our iPods, with all of our favorite songs. We pick our songs and jump up on the counter and dance, and do runway stuff, and we take video with my camera. When I'm with my girlfriends, I act like I'm 19.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.text: I was on the yearbook staff, so I would take out film cameras and Nikons and take photos around school and at sporting events and things like that. We had a darkroom as well. I just loved it. I also saved up for a video camera to video my friends and cut and paste the videos together and I gave them to all of my friends for graduation.
quotes.author: Dianna Agron

quotes.text: I cannot get myself interested in video games. I've been given video game players and they just sit there connected to my TVs gathering dust until eventually I unplug them so I can put in another special-region DVD player.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.text: I don't like new cars; I'm into vintage cars - there's a Jaguar E-Type in the 'Goldie' video.
quotes.author: ASAP Rocky

quotes.text: 'Modern Warfare,' 'Black Ops,' these are all the next level of video games. The people are more detailed, the fighting is more exact, and I can't speak for every gamer out there, but I know when I play, I feel like I'm actually in the game. It's that intense.
quotes.author: Kevin Garnett

quotes.text: It could be that all awful dictators are frustrated artists - Mao with his poetry and Mussolini with his monuments. Stalin was once a journalistic hack, and I can personally testify to how frustrated they are. Pol Pot left a very edgy photo collection behind. And Osama seems quite interested in video.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: Have you ever played a video game that didn't have escalating levels of difficulty? Well, life can feel like play, too, when we purposefully engage in activities that demand we test and develop our skills.
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.text: Our demand for good looks, expressed in the biting comments that ensue when public figures fall short of perfection, puts enormous pressures on these individuals and may screen out the otherwise qualified. If video killed the radio star, it may also be doing away with the homely politician.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.text: Up until now, the biggest question in society about video games has been what to do about violent games. But it's almost like society in general considers video games to be something of a nuisance, that they want to toss into the garbage can.
quotes.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quotes.text: So, I'm always around video games but I've always been interested in them from a visual perspective, with the graphic design and that whole thing. I don't know if that comes from my love of photography or what but that's always what's held my interest about them.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.text: Just think of the opportunities we can unlock by making education as addictive as a video game. This type of experiential, addictive learning improves decision-making skills and increases the processing speed and spatial skills of the brain. When was the last time your child asked for help with a video game?
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.text: In college, before video games, we would amuse ourselves by posing programming exercises.
quotes.author: Ken Thompson

quotes.text: New video gaming systems are coming out that track every joint of your body. It's basically going to become a normal thing for us to allow Microsoft to put a three-dimensional camera on top of your television set looking at you, which sounds like a Big Brother scenario if ever I heard one, but, still, it's what we're going to allow.
quotes.author: Jesse Schell

quotes.text: As others have recently suggested, the term 'gamer' is no longer useful as an identity because games are for everyone. These days, even my mom spends an inordinate amount of time gaming on her iPad. So I'll take a cue from my younger self and say I don't care about being a 'gamer,' but I sure do love video games.
quotes.author: Anita Sarkeesian

quotes.text: Video games are a waste of time for men with nothing else to do. Real brains don't do that.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: Hacking was the only entertainment that would occupy my mind - like a huge video game, but with real consequences. I could have evaded the FBI a lot longer if I had been able to control my passion for hacking.
quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

quotes.text: When I'm making video games today, I want people to be entertained. I am always thinking, How are people going to enjoy playing the games we are making today? And as long as I can enjoy something other people can enjoy it, too.
quotes.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quotes.text: For the last 10 years, I've felt increasing pressure to stop shooting film and start shooting video, but I've never understood why. It's cheaper to work on film, it's far better looking, it's the technology that's been known and understood for a hundred years, and it's extremely reliable.
quotes.author: Christopher Nolan

quotes.text: I've been fascinated by the Internet from the very start. In 2001, I had made a funny black-and-white film called 'How to Dance Properly,' a short video of me dancing to a Madonna song. I sent it to 17 of my friends on a Thursday, and by Monday, one million people a day were logging on to view it.
quotes.author: Ze Frank

quotes.text: They say you can rap about anything except for Jesus, that means guns, sex, lies, video tapes, but if I talk about God my record won't get played Huh?
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.text: I remember the first time I saw the 'Smells Like Teen Spirit' video. I will never forget that day. I just wanted to see Kurt Cobain's face. I had a feeling he was very cute. But, I couldn't see his face. When I finally did see him, he was even cuter than I imagined!
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.text: Dancing was always part of my culture growing up in Barbados. When I shot my 1st video I worked really hard with my choreographer to perfect the routines.
quotes.author: Rihanna

quotes.text: The stock market to me was like a video game. When it went off, it was like turning the game off. It wasn't something I'd think about until I'd turn the machine on again.
quotes.author: Jo Nesbo

quotes.text: I had a TV set and a typewriter and that made me think a computer should be laid out like a typewriter with a video screen.
quotes.author: Steve Wozniak

quotes.text: My high-school years were so mediocre - I moved out when I was 16 and started living with my girlfriend who was 10 years older. Apart from that, I was just a video nerd.
quotes.author: Jason Reitman

quotes.text: If there were teenagers who had a video camera and saw what I did on a daily basis, they'd be bored out of their mind.
quotes.author: Ian Harding

quotes.text: I'm a mama's boy because everything I do is with respect to my mother. I won't do a movie or a video that would bring disrespect to my mother.
quotes.author: Mr. T

quotes.text: I enjoy going out by myself... always have, always will. I don't have security guards, and, for the most part, I enjoy meeting new people. I see myself as a regular guy who likes playing video games with his nieces and nephews and poker with his family. I don't have an art collection or take exotic vacations. I enjoy being at home.
quotes.author: Vince Vaughn

quotes.text: Video games are a special kind of play, but at root, they're about the same things as other games: embracing particular rules and restrictions in order to develop skills and experience rewards. When a game is well-designed, it's the balance between these factors that engages people on a fundamental level.
quotes.author: Tom Chatfield

quotes.text: The only time I waste is time I spend doing something that, in my gut, I know I shouldn't. If I choose to spend time playing video games or sleeping in, then it's time well spent, because I chose to do it. I did it for a reason - to relax, to decompress or to feel good, and that was what I wanted to do.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.text: When you look at the light bulb above you, you remember Thomas Alva Edison. When the telephone bell rings, you remember Alexander Graham Bell. Marie Curie was the first woman to win the Nobel Prize. When you see the blue sky, you think of Sir C.V. Raman.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: The most compelling reason for most people to buy a computer for the home will be to link it to a nationwide communications network. We're just in the beginning stages of what will be a truly remarkable breakthrough for most people - as remarkable as the telephone.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: I am, in fact, Superman. Every morning I wake up and go into a telephone booth and change my costume, and then go to work.
quotes.author: Stephen Daldry

quotes.text: The telephone book is full of facts, but it doesn't contain a single idea.
quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

quotes.text: The moment I was introduced to my wife, Emma, at a party I thought, here she is - and 20 minutes later I told her she ought to marry me. She thought I was as mad as a rat. She wouldn't even give me her telephone number - and she wrote in her diary: 'A funny little man asked me to marry him.'
quotes.author: Julian Fellowes

quotes.text: Growing up in the days when you still had to punch buttons to make a telephone call, I could recall the numbers of all my close friends and family. Today, I'm not sure if I know more than four phone numbers by heart. And that's probably more than most.
quotes.author: Joshua Foer

quotes.text: By an irony of fate, my first employment was as a draughtsman. I hated drawing; it was for me the very worst of annoyances. Fortunately, it was not long before I secured the position I sought, that of chief electrician to the telephone company.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: The problem is, I think, that so many of us pray as if we are ordering groceries. We pick up the telephone and say, 'Is this the right place to place my order?' and we proceed right to dictating our order. When we have then ended that list, we hang up.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: No, I'm not interested in developing a powerful brain. All I'm after is just a mediocre brain, something like the President of the American Telephone and Telegraph Company.
quotes.author: Alan Turing

quotes.text: People used what they called a telephone because they hated being close together and they were scared of being alone.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.text: Computer hacking really results in financial losses and hassles. The objectives of terrorist groups are more serious. That is not to say that cyber groups can't access a telephone switch in Manhattan on a day like 9/11, shut it down, and therefore cause more casualties.
quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

quotes.text: I have gone on the air and announced my telephone number at the Washington Post. I go into the night, talking to people, looking for things. The great dreaded thing every reporter lives with is what you don't know. The source you didn't go to. The phone call you didn't return.
quotes.author: Bob Woodward

quotes.text: I don't know about other writers, but for myself, to write I must be relatively quiet - it's very difficult to write with the telephone and the doorbell ringing and conversation going on; I'm not that good a writer to write through all that!
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.text: Sometimes a director is making three films. Perhaps he is shooting a film in Madras and a film in Bombay and he can't leave Madras as some shooting has to be done, so he directs by telephone. The shooting takes place. On schedule.
quotes.author: Satyajit Ray

quotes.text: Technology gives us the facilities that lessen the barriers of time and distance - the telegraph and cable, the telephone, radio, and the rest.
quotes.author: Emily Greene Balch

quotes.text: The difference between utility and utility plus beauty is the difference between telephone wires and the spider web.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.text: Our daily life is filled with electronic pianos, ring tones, the disembodied voice giving you your bank balance over the telephone. Even silence can be electronic, courtesy of sound-canceling headphones.
quotes.author: Serge Schmemann

quotes.text: The major advances in speed of communication and ability to interact took place more than a century ago. The shift from sailing ships to telegraph was far more radical than that from telephone to email!
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: It's a dialogue, not a monologue, and some people don't understand that. Social media is more like a telephone than a television.
quotes.author: Amy Jo Martin

quotes.text: I'd rather entrust the government of the United States to the first 400 people listed in the Boston telephone directory than to the faculty of Harvard University.
quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quotes.text: The telephone, which interrupts the most serious conversations and cuts short the most weighty observations, has a romance of its own.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: There is never going to be a substitute for face-to-face communication, but we have seen since the alphabet, to the telephone and now the Internet, that whenever people find a new way to communicate, they will flock to it.
quotes.author: Howard Rheingold

quotes.text: The fear of the never-ending onslaught of gizmos and gadgets is nothing new. The radio, the telephone, Facebook - each of these inventions changed the world. Each of them scared the heck out of an older generation. And each of them was invented by people who were in their 20s.
quotes.author: Daniel H. Wilson

quotes.text: I often put any project I write in a different decade just to roll the thought around in my head. There's a thriller I've written that I think would be nice to set in the '70s or '80s, just to take cell phones away from the movie. There's nothing like the piercing ring of an old-school telephone to really scare an audience.
quotes.author: Joel Edgerton

quotes.text: And when your phone rings, pick it up. Open yourself up to the possibility a phone call offers. Discover this remarkable device called the telephone. It will give you a serious competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Dan Pallotta

quotes.text: I'm one of those guys that is still a bit afraid of the telephone, its implications for conversation. I still wonder if the jukebox might be the death of live music.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.text: Garbage can provide important details for hackers: names, telephone numbers, a company's internal jargon.
quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

quotes.text: Before computers, telephone lines and television connect us, we all share the same air, the same oceans, the same mountains and rivers. We are all equally responsible for protecting them.
quotes.author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quotes.text: Utility is when you have one telephone, luxury is when you have two, opulence is when you have three - and paradise is when you have none.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.text: Gossip is nature's telephone.
quotes.author: Sholom Aleichem

quotes.text: I stay away from the telephone if at all possible.
quotes.author: Lee Trevino

quotes.text: Television is the same as the telephone, and the same as the World Wide Web for that matter. People who become obsessed by the peculiarities of these communications media have simply failed to adjust to the shock of the old. People who bleat on about the 'artistic' potential of television qua television are equally deluded.
quotes.author: Will Self

quotes.text: Middle age is when you're sitting at home on a Saturday night and the telephone rings and you hope it isn't for you.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.text: If we discovered that we only had five minutes left to say all that we wanted to say, every telephone booth would be occupied by people calling other people to stammer that they loved them.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.text: I was nine or 10 years old and my father was sacked on Christmas Day. He was a manager, the results had not been good, he lost a game on December 22 or 23. On Christmas Day, the telephone rang and he was sacked in the middle of our lunch.
quotes.author: Jose Mourinho

quotes.text: Sisters are always drying their hair. Locked into rooms, alone, they pose at the mirror, shoulders bare, trying this way and that their hair, or fly importunate down the stair to answer the telephone.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.text: You can't pick up the telephone and say, 'Connect me with someone else who has a kid with leukemia.'
quotes.author: Howard Rheingold

quotes.text: And so the idea was, well maybe you can take an Atari video game machine, where people plug in a game cartridge, and plug in a modem, and tie that into a telephone, and essentially turn that game in the machine into an interactive terminal.
quotes.author: Steve Case

quotes.text: Seriously, we are in the midst of the convergence of voice and data and that is challenging the infrastructure of the telephone companies. There are huge commercial interests in the basic technology, but even more so in content delivery and control of content.
quotes.author: Steve Crocker

quotes.text: The average man has a carefully cultivated ignorance about household matters - from what to do with the crumbs to the grocer's telephone number - a sort of cheerful inefficiency which protects him.
quotes.author: Crystal Eastman

quotes.text: Telephone, n. An invention of the devil which abrogates some of the advantages of making a disagreeable person keep his distance.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: America's best buy is a telephone call to the right man.
quotes.author: Ilka Chase

quotes.text: The best remote companies I've seen do almost everything online, via email and telephone. But they also get together face to face on a regular basis.
quotes.author: Margaret Heffernan

quotes.text: Despite our ever-connective technology, neither Skype nor Facebook - not even a telephone call - can come close to the joy of being with loved ones in person.
quotes.author: Marlo Thomas

quotes.text: The telephone is a good way to talk to people without having to offer them a drink.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.text: I was born Maurice Joseph Micklewhite. Imagine signing that autograph! You'd get a broken arm. So I changed my name to Michael Caine after Humphrey Bogart's 'The Caine Mutiny,' which was playing in the theater across from the telephone booth where I learned that I'd gotten my first TV job.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.text: I watch for emergent technologies and pay attention to what people say they'll be good for, then see what we actually use them for. It never occurred to me that a tiny telephone with a wireless transceiver would do whatever it is that it's done to us.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.text: There's all these ways to instantly communicate - cars, computers, telephone and transportation - and even with all that, it's so hard to find people and have an honest communication with them.
quotes.author: Jason Schwartzman

quotes.text: Last night, I had a telephone townhall for my constituents back in Vermont, and we had 11,500 people on it. And I had people on Social Security saying if getting fewer benefits will help us on the debt, they're for it. And I had a farmer saying that he's had subsidies for 35 years but we can't afford them anymore.
quotes.author: Peter Welch

quotes.text: So technologies, whether it is a telephone or an iPhone, computers in general or automobiles, television even, all individualize us. We all sit in front of our iPhones and communicating but are we really communicating?
quotes.author: Henry Mintzberg

quotes.text: We must get into the picture business. This is a new industry and a gold mine. it looks like another telephone industry.
quotes.author: Joseph P. Kennedy

quotes.text: I get letters constantly from all over the world, telephone calls from America, Brazil, Australia, all over, especially on my birthday. A family? I have a huge international family. That's all I need.
quotes.author: Renata Tebaldi

quotes.text: This is like the telephone problem - no one wants to have the first one. But we are seeing a lot of people who want some sort of technology to solve the spam problem.
quotes.author: Eric Allman

quotes.text: If you get stuck, get away from your desk. Take a walk, take a bath, go to sleep, make a pie, draw, listen to music, meditate, exercise; whatever you do, don't just stick there scowling at the problem. But don't make telephone calls or go to a party; if you do, other people's words will pour in where your lost words should be.
quotes.author: Hilary Mantel

quotes.text: The telephone is a 100-year-old technology. It's time for a change. Charging for phone calls is something you did last century.
quotes.author: Niklas Zennstrom

quotes.text: Innovation is hard. It really is. Because most people don't get it. Remember, the automobile, the airplane, the telephone, these were all considered toys at their introduction because they had no constituency. They were too new.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.text: My workspace is defined by books, ephemera, quiet and light. I don't have a computer, telephone or a fax machine there.
quotes.author: Maira Kalman

quotes.text: What is special about VOIP is that it's just another thing you can do on the Internet, whereas it is the only thing - or nearly the only thing with the exception of the dial-up modem and fax - that you can do on the public switched telephone network.
quotes.author: Vint Cerf

quotes.text: While the United States has never decreed that everyone has a 'right' to a telephone, we have come close to this with the notion of 'universal service' - the idea that telephone service (and electricity, and now broadband Internet) must be available, even in the most remote regions of the country.
quotes.author: Vint Cerf

quotes.text: Never once, during any of my bouts of depression, had I been inclined or able to pick up a telephone and ask a friend for help. It wasn't in me.
quotes.author: Kay Redfield Jamison

quotes.text: The telephone is virtual reality in that you can meet with someone as if you are together, at least for the auditory sense.
quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

quotes.text: Calculus, the electrical battery, the telephone, the steam engine, the radio - all these groundbreaking innovations were hit upon by multiple inventors working in parallel with no knowledge of one another.
quotes.author: Steven Johnson

quotes.text: Women who marry early are often overly enamored of the kind of man who looks great in wedding pictures and passes the maid of honor his telephone number.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.text: The first one, obviously, was walking into my office at eight o'clock in the morning on Wednesday, and being told there was a telephone call saying that there was an incident at Three Mile Island, and that it had shut down and that beyond that we didn't know.
quotes.author: William Scranton

quotes.text: My sole inspiration is a telephone call from a director.
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.text: Two of the cruelest, most primitive punishments our town deals out to those who fall from favor are the empty mailbox and the silent telephone.
quotes.author: Hedda Hopper

quotes.text: I assume everything I'm saying in an email or saying on the telephone is being looked at.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.text: What I'm seeing is a generation that says consistently, 'I would rather text than make a telephone call.' Why? It's less risky. I can just get the information out there. I don't have to get all involved; it's more efficient. I would rather text than see somebody face to face.
quotes.author: Sherry Turkle

quotes.text: Worldwide, enormous areas of peatland are still being lost to agricultural development, drainage schemes, overgrazing, and exploitation-based infrastructure development projects such as roads, electricity pylons, telephone masts and gas pipelines.
quotes.author: John Burnside

quotes.text: Bridging the virtual world with the physical word is really when social media channels come to life and the magic happens. Because whoever coined the term 'social media' didn't do us any favors. It's not really media. It's more like the telephone, less like the TV.
quotes.author: Amy Jo Martin

quotes.text: My personal telephone book is a book of the dead now. I'm so old. Almost all of my friends have died, and I don't have the guts to take their names out of the book.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: To me, emails are a little bit frustrating. I think that the telephone is much preferred because you get the sound of the voice and the interest and everything else you can't see in an email.
quotes.author: T. Boone Pickens

quotes.text: One of the most powerful scientific tools ever invented is the telephone.
quotes.author: John C. Mather

quotes.text: The Internet is a telephone system that's gotten uppity.
quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

quotes.text: Unfortunately, poetry is not born in noise, in crowds, or on a bus. There have to be four walls and the certainty that the telephone will not ring. That's what writing is all about.
quotes.author: Wislawa Szymborska

quotes.text: The utility model of computing - computing resources delivered over the network in much the same way that electricity or telephone service reaches our homes and offices today - makes more sense than ever.
quotes.author: Scott McNealy

quotes.text: We live in a modest system, a galaxy called the Milky Way. If we named every star in the Milky Way and put them in the Hollywood telephone directory and stacked those telephone directories up, we'd have a pile of telephone directories 70 miles high.
quotes.author: John Rhys-Davies

quotes.text: I don't even have voice mail or answering machines anymore. I hate the phone, and I don't want to call anybody back. If I go to hell, it will be a small closet with a telephone in it, and I will be doomed and destined for eternity to return phone calls.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: Older Americans are perfect telemarketing customers, analysts say, because they are often at home, rely on delivery services, and are lonely for the companionship that telephone callers provide.
quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

quotes.text: When the 'New York Times' revealed the warrantless surveillance of voice calls, in December 2005, the telephone companies got nervous.
quotes.author: Barton Gellman

quotes.text: I had already developed inherited back problems. I had degenerative disk disease, a form of scoliosis, arthritis. And I truly believe that if it weren't for the use of steroids - I'm not saying steroids is for everyone, but in my case in general, if I have not used steroids, I mean, physically right now I'd probably be a wreck.
quotes.author: Jose Canseco

quotes.text: Radio news is bearable. This is due to the fact that while the news is being broadcast, the disk jockey is not allowed to talk.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.text: Time travel and teleportation will have to wait. It may take centuries to master these technology. But within the coming decades, we will understand dark matter, perhaps test string theory, find planets which can harbor life, and maybe have Brain 2.0, i.e. our consciousness on a disk which will survive even after we die.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.text: I used to play - when I first started trying to be professional, I disk jockey from 1949 to 1955 in Memphis, Tennessee, and I was quite popular there as a disk jockey.
quotes.author: B. B. King

quotes.text: The thing about HD-DVD that is attractive to Microsoft is that it's very pro-consumer in letting you copy all movies up onto the hard disk.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Technology has moved away from sharing and toward ownership. This suits software and hardware companies just fine: They create new, bloated programs that require more disk space and processing power. We buy bigger, faster computers, which then require more complex operating systems, and so on.
quotes.author: Douglas Rushkoff

quotes.text: I mean, this whole digital revolution is really eroding the director's importance on a movie because, number one, just from a practical standpoint, with floppy disks and the ability to put all of the film onto a disk, more people have access to the movie.
quotes.author: John Frankenheimer

quotes.text: Complex astronomical instruments like the Antikythera Mechanism and the Nebra Sky Disk were made by Pagans. Our Pagan intellectual heritage includes poets and scientists and literary intellectuals of every kind, especially including those who wrote some of the most important and influential books in all of Western history.
quotes.author: Brendan Myers

quotes.text: The paintings are transferred from my computer to a disk, and I can hand it to the printer this way; or I can modem the painting to the printer over the phone lines from my house in Hawaii.
quotes.author: Buffy Sainte-Marie

quotes.text: I was nerdy girl who went to Catholic school and wanted to be an engineer. I was all set to attend the Illinois Institute of Technology. And then I took a hard left turn and studied Liberal Arts at Northern Illinois University, majored in Communications. Then worked in radio as a disk jockey and as the weather girl.
quotes.author: Cindy Morgan

quotes.text: I don't go to the cinema often anymore - I'd rather just pop in a disk and get the biggest monitor you've got, and if the quality is superb, I can watch a film, and if I don't like it I can pop it out.
quotes.author: Ridley Scott

quotes.text: Blinking is some way of tabulating - a kind of carriage return, click, or save to disk - that helps the process of 'Okay, now change the subject.' Every time you move your eyes, there's an interruption in the visual field - you go momentarily blind when your eyeballs are moving.
quotes.author: Walter Murch

quotes.text: I do everything from home. I broadcast commentaries for CBS News Radio every day - from home, on a disk that I mail in. I write a weekly op-ed piece for the 'New York Daily News,' and any books or plays or movies that I'm crazy enough to write, I do that from home.
quotes.author: Charles Grodin

quotes.text: Our moon was born too small to harbor life. It came from the collision of a Mars-sized world into the primordial Earth. From that colossal crunch spun a disk of rocks that condensed into a satellite.
quotes.author: Gregory Benford

quotes.text: A disk unbeknownst to the director can go to the producer in another city or in another office and that producer can edit behind the director's back much easier than in the old days. Since these dailies are now put on videotape, more kinds of people have access to dailies.
quotes.author: John Frankenheimer

quotes.text: My favorite laser disk ever was the laser disk for The Graduate, which had a commentary track that wasn't even the filmmakers, it was a professor, some film criticism guy who just happen to be this amazing commentator who went off into the whole theory of comedy.
quotes.author: Jay Roach

quotes.text: To primitive man, the sky was wonderful, mysterious and awesome, but he could not even dream of what was within the golden disk or silver points of light so far beyond his reach.
quotes.author: Rosalyn Sussman Yalow

quotes.text: I've got an L3 bulging disk and degenerating disk. It's bulging in two places. Yeah, it's not good.
quotes.author: Retief Goosen

quotes.text: I had already developed inherited back problems. I had degenerative disk disease, a form of scoliosis, arthritis.
